GS24pmbhasuu:0_0: (Pas_1) KA_I,1.1-5 Ro_I,1-4 atha śabdānuśāsanam . atha iti ayam śabdaḥ adhikārārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:0_1: prayujyate . śabdānuśāsanam śāstram adhikṛtam veditavyam . keṣām śabdānām . laukikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1: gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī śakuniḥ mṛgaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti . vaidikāḥ khalu api :
GS24pmbhasuu:2: śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye . iṣe tvā ūrje tvā . agnim īḷe purohitam . agne ayāhi vītaye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3_0: (Pas_2) KA_I,1.6-13 Ro_I,5-7 atha gauḥ iti atra kaḥ śabdaḥ . kim yat tat sāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3_1: artharūpam saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha . dravyam nāma tat . yat tarhi tat iṅgitam ceṣṭitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3_2: nimiṣitam saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha . kriyā nāma sā . yat tarhi tat śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3_3: kapilaḥ kapotaḥ iti saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha . guṇaḥ nāma saḥ . yat tarhi tat bhinneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3_4: abhinnam chinneṣu acchinnam sāmānyabhūtam saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha . ākṛtiḥ nāma sā
GS24pmbhasuu:3_5: . kaḥ tarhi śabdaḥ . yena uccāritena sāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇinām sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3_6: bhavati saḥ śabdaḥ . atha vā pratītapadārthakaḥ loke dhvaniḥ śabdaḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3_7: tat yathā śabdam kuru mā śabdam kārṣīḥ śabdakārī ayam māṇavakaḥ iti . dhvanim kurvan
GS24pmbhasuu:4_0: (Pas_3) KA_I,1.14-2.2 Ro_I,8-14 kāni punaḥ śabdānuśāsanasya prayojanāni . rakṣohāgamalaghvasandehāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4_1: proyojanam . rakṣārtham vedānām adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . lopāgamavarṇavikārajñaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4_2: samyak vedān paripālayiṣyati . ūhaḥ khalu api. na sarvaiḥ liṅgaiḥ na ca sarvābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4_3: vibhaktibhiḥ vede mantrāḥ nigaditāḥ. te ca avaśyam yajñagatena yathāyatham vipariṇamayitavyāḥ.
GS24pmbhasuu:4_4: tān na avaiyākaraṇaḥ śaknoti yathāyatham vipariṇamayitum. tasmāt adhyeyam vyākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4_5: . āgamaḥ khalu api . brāhmaṇena niṣkāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgaḥ vedaḥ adhyeyaḥ jñeyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4_6: iti . pradhānam ca ṣaṭsu aṅgeṣu vyākaraṇam . pradhāne ca kṛtaḥ yatnaḥ phalavān bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4_7: . laghvartham ca adhyeyam vyākaraṇam. brāhmaṇena avaśyam śabdāḥ jñeyāḥ iti . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4_8: antareṇa vyākaraṇam laghunā upāyena śabdāḥ śakyāḥ jñātum . asandehārtham ca adhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4_9: vyākaraṇam . yājñikāḥ paṭhanti . sthūlapṛṣatīm āgnivāruṇīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4_10: . tasyām sandehaḥ sthūlā ca asau pṛṣatī ca sthūlapṛṣatī sthūlāni pṛṣanti yasyāḥ sā
GS24pmbhasuu:4_11: sthūlapṛṣatī . tām na avaiyākaraṇaḥ svarataḥ adhyavasyati . yadi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4_12: tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ. atha antodāttatvam tataḥ tatpuruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5: (Pas_4.1) KA_I,2.3-9 Ro_I,11-12 imāni ca bhūyaḥ śabdānuśāsanasya prayojanāni . te asurāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:17_0: sudevaḥ asi varuṇa iti . te asurāḥ . te asurāḥ helayaḥ helayaḥ iti kurvantaḥ parā
GS24pmbhasuu:17_1: babhūvuḥ . tasmāt brāhmaṇena na mlecchitavai na apabhāṣitavai . mlecchaḥ ha vai eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:17_2: yat apaśabdaḥ . mlecchāḥ mā bhūma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . te asurāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18_0: (Pas_4.2) KA_I,2.10-14 Ro_I,12-13 duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ . duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ svarataḥ varṇataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18_1: vā mithyā prayuktaḥ na tam artham āha . saḥ vāgvajraḥ yajamānam hinasti yathā indraśatruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18_2: svarataḥ aparādhāt . duṣṭān śabdān mā prayukṣmahi iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:19_0: (Pas_4.3) KA_I,2.14-17 Ro_I,3 yat adhītam . yat adhītam avijñātam nigadena eva śabdyate
GS24pmbhasuu:19_1: anagnau iva śuṣkaidhaḥ na tat jvalati karhi cit . tasmāt anarthakam mā adhigīṣmahi
GS24pmbhasuu:20_0: (Pas_4.4) KA_I,2.18-3.5 Ro_I,13-15 yaḥ tu prayuṅkte . yaḥ tu prayuṅkte kuśalaḥ viśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:20_1: śabdān yathāvat vyavahārakāle saḥ anantam āpnoti jayam paratra vāgyogavit duṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:20_2: ca apaśabdaiḥ . kaḥ . vāgyogavit eva . kutaḥ etat . yaḥ hi śabdān jānāti apaśabdān
GS24pmbhasuu:20_3: api asau jānāti . yathā eva hi śabdajñāne dharmaḥ evam apaśabdajñāne api adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20_4: . atha vā bhūyān adharmaḥ prāpnoti . bhūyāṃsaḥ apaśabdāḥ alpīyāṃsaḥ śabdāḥ . ekaikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20_5: hi śabdasya bahavaḥ apaśabdāḥ . tat yathā gauḥ iti asya śabdasya gāvī goṇī gotā gopotalikā
GS24pmbhasuu:20_6: iti evamādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . atha yaḥ avāgyogavit . ajñānam tasya śaraṇam . na atyantāya
GS24pmbhasuu:20_7: ajñānam śaraṇam bhavitum arhati . yaḥ hi ajānan vai brāhmaṇam hanyāt surām vā pibet
GS24pmbhasuu:20_8: saḥ api manye patitaḥ syāt. evam tarhi saḥ anantam āpnoti jayam paratra vāgyogavit
GS24pmbhasuu:20_9: duṣyati ca apaśabdaiḥ . kaḥ. avāgyogavit eva . atha yaḥ vāgyogavit . vijñānam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:20_10: śaraṇam . kva punaḥ idam paṭhitam . bhrājāḥ nāma ślokāḥ . kim ca bhoḥ ślokāḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:20_11: pramāṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pramāṇam ayam api ślokaḥ pramāṇam bhavitum arhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:20_12: yat udumbaravarṇānām ghaṭīnām maṇḍalam mahat pītam na svargam gamayet kim tat kratugatam
GS24pmbhasuu:20_13: nayet iti . pramattagītaḥ eṣaḥ tatrabhavataḥ . yaḥ tu apramattagītaḥ tat pramānam
GS24pmbhasuu:21_0: (Pas_4.5) KA_I,3.6-9 Ro_I,15 avidvāṃsaḥ . avidvāṃsaḥ pratyabhivāde nāmnaḥ ye plutim
GS24pmbhasuu:21_1: na viduḥ kāmam teṣu tu viproṣya strīṣu iva ayam aham vadet . abhivāde strīvat mā
GS24pmbhasuu:22: (Pas_4.6) KA_I,3.10-11 Ro_I,16 vibhaktim kurvanti . yājñikāḥ paṭhanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:23: prayājāḥ savibhaktikāḥ kāryāḥ iti . na ca antareṇa vyākaraṇam prayājāḥ savibhaktikāḥ śakyāḥ kartum. vibhaktim kurvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:24: (Pas_4.7) KA_I,3.12-13 Ro_I,16 yaḥ vai imām . yaḥ vai imām padaśaḥ svaraśaḥ akṣaraśaḥ vācam vidadhāti saḥ ārtvijīnaḥ . ārtvijīnāḥ syāma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . yaḥ vai imām .
GS24pmbhasuu:25_0: (Pas_4.8) KA_I,3.14-29 Ro_I,16-18 catvāri . catvari śṛṅgā trayaḥ asya padā dve śīrṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:25_1: sapta hastāsaḥ asya tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti mahaḥ devaḥ martyān a viveśa
GS24pmbhasuu:25_2: . catvāri śṛṅgāni catvāri padajātāni nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ ca . trayaḥ asya pādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25_3: trayaḥ kālāḥ bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ . dve śīrṣe dvau śabdātmānau nityaḥ kāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25_4: ca . sapta hastāsaḥ asya sapta vibhaktayaḥ . tridhā baddhaḥ triṣu sthāneṣu baddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25_5: urasi kaṇṭhe śirasi iti . vṛṣabhaḥ varṣaṇāt . roravīti śabdam karoti . kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:25_6: . rautiḥ śabdakarmā . mahaḥ devaḥ martyān āviveśa iti . mahān devaḥ śabdaḥ . martyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:25_7: maraṇadharmāṇaḥ manuṣyāḥ . tān āviveśa . mahatā devena naḥ sāmyam yathā syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:26_0: catvari vak parimitā padani tani viduḥ brāhmaṇa ye manīṣiṇaḥ guhā trīṇi nihitā na
GS24pmbhasuu:26_1: iṅgayanti turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti . catvāri vāk parimitā padāni . catvāri
GS24pmbhasuu:26_2: padajātāni nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ ca . tāni viduḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ . manasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:26_3: īṣiṇaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ . guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti . guhāyām trīṇi nihitāni na iṅgayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:26_4: . na ceṣṭante . na nimiṣanti iti arthaḥ . turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti . turīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:26_5: ha vai etat vācaḥ yat manuṣyeṣu vartate . caturtham iti arthaḥ . catvāri .
GS24pmbhasuu:27_0: (Pas_4.9) KA_I,4.5-8 Ro_I,18-19 uta tvaḥ . uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vacam uta tvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:27_1: śrṇvan na śṛṇoti enām uto tvasmai tanvam visasre jāya iva patye uśatī suvasāḥ . api
GS24pmbhasuu:27_2: khalu ekaḥ paśyan api na paśyati vācam . api khalu ekaḥ śrṇvan api na śrṇoti enām
GS24pmbhasuu:27_3: . avidvāṃsam āha ardham . uto tvasmai tanvam visasre . tanum vivṛṇute . jāyā iva
GS24pmbhasuu:27_4: patye uśatī suvāsāḥ . tad yathā jāyā patye kāmayamānā suvāsāḥ svam ātmānam vivṛṇute
GS24pmbhasuu:27_5: evam vāk vāgvide svātmānam vivṛṇute . vāk naḥ vivṛṇuyāt ātmānam iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . uta tvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:28_0: (Pas_4.10) KA_I,4.9-18 Ro_I,19-20 saktum iva . saktum iva titaunā punantaḥ yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:28_1: dhīrāḥ manasā vacam akrata atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyani jānate bhadra eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā
GS24pmbhasuu:28_2: adhi vāci . saktuḥ sacateḥ durdhāvaḥ bhavati . kasateḥ vā viparītāt vikasito bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28_3: . titau paripavanam bhavati tatavat vā tunnavat vā . dhīrāḥ dhyānavantaḥ manasā prajñānena
GS24pmbhasuu:28_4: vācam akrata vācam akṛṣata . atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate . sāyujyāni jānate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:28_5: . yaḥ eṣaḥ durghaḥ mārgaḥ ekagamyaḥ vāgviṣayaḥ . ke punaḥ te . vaiyākaraṇāḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:28_6: etat . bhadrā eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā adhi vāci . eṣām vāci bhadrā lakṣmīḥ nihitā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:28_7: . lakṣmīḥ lakṣaṇāt bhāsanāt parivṛḍhā bhavati . saktum iva .
GS24pmbhasuu:30: āhitāgniḥ apaśabdam prayujya prāyaścittīyām sārasvatīm iṣṭim nirvapet iti . prāyaścittīyāḥ mā bhūma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . sārasvatīm .
GS24pmbhasuu:31: (Pas_4.12) KA_I,4.22-25 Ro_I,21 daśamyām putrasya . yājñikāḥ paṭhanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:32_0: daśamyuttarakālam putrasya jātasya nāma vidadhyāt ghoṣavadādi antarantaḥstham avṛddham
GS24pmbhasuu:32_1: tripuruṣānūkam anaripratiṣṭhitam . tat hi pratiṣṭhitatamam bhavati . dvyakṣaram caturakṣaram
GS24pmbhasuu:32_2: vā nāma kṛtam kuryāt na taddhitam iti . na ca antareṇa vyākaraṇam kṛtaḥ taddhitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:33_0: (Pas_4.13) KA_I,4.26-5.4 Ro_I,21-22 sudevaḥ asi . sudevaḥ asi varuṇa yasya te sapta
GS24pmbhasuu:33_1: sindhavaḥ anukṣaranti kākudam sūrmyam suṣiram iva . sudevaḥ asi varuṇa satyadevaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:33_2: asi yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ . anukṣaranti kākudam . kākudam tālu
GS24pmbhasuu:33_3: . kākuḥ jihvā sā asmin udyate iti kākudam . sūrmyam suṣirām iva . tad yathā śobhanām
GS24pmbhasuu:33_4: ūrmīm suṣirām agniḥ antaḥ praviśya dahati evam tava sapta sindhavaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:33_5: tālu anukṣaranti . tena asi satyadevaḥ . satyadevāḥ syāma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . sudevaḥ asi .
GS24pmbhasuu:34_0: (Pas_5) KA_I,5.5-11 Ro_I,22-23 kim punaḥ idam vyākaranam eva adhijigāṃsamānebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:34_1: prayojanam anvākhyāyate na punaḥ anyat api kim cit . om iti uktvā vṛttāntaśaḥ śam
GS24pmbhasuu:34_2: iti evamādīn śabdān paṭhanti . purākalpe etat āsīt :
GS24pmbhasuu:35_0: saṃskārottarakālam brāhmaṇāḥ vyākaraṇam sma adhīyate . tebhyaḥ tatra sthānakaraṇānupradānajñebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:35_1: vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ upadiśyante . tat adyatve na tathā . vedam adhītya tvaritāḥ vaktāraḥ bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:36: vedāt naḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ siddhāḥ lokāt ca laukikāḥ . anarthakam vyākaraṇam iti . tebhyaḥ vipratipannabuddhibhyaḥ adhyetṛbhyaḥ ācāryaḥ idam śāstram anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:38_0: (Pas_6) KA_I,5.11-22 Ro_I,23-24 uktaḥ śabdaḥ . svarūpam api uktam . prayojanāni api
GS24pmbhasuu:38_1: uktāni . śabdānuśāsanam idānīm kartavyam . tat katham kartavyam . kim śabdopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:38_2: kartavyaḥ āhosvit apaśabdopadeśaḥ āhosvit ubhayopadeśaḥ iti . anyataropadeśena kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:38_3: syāt . tat yathā bhakṣyaniyamena abhakṣyapratiṣedho gamyate . pañca pañcanakhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:39: ataḥ anye abhakṣyāḥ iti . abhakṣyapratiṣedhena vā bhakṣyaniyamaḥ . tat yathā abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ukte gamyate etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:40: āraṇyaḥ bhakṣyaḥ iti . evam iha api :
GS24pmbhasuu:41: yadi tāvat śabdopadeśaḥ kriyate gauḥ iti etasmin upadiṣṭe gamyate etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:42: gāvyādayaḥ apaśabdāḥ iti . atha apaśabdopadeśaḥ kriyate gāvyādiṣu upadiṣṭeṣu gamyate etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:43_0: gauḥ iti eṣaḥ śabdaḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . laghutvāt śabdopadeśaḥ . laghīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:43_1: śabdopadeśaḥ garīyān apaśabdopadeśaḥ . ekaikasya śabdasya bahavaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:43_2: yathā . gauḥ iti asya śabdasya gāvīgoṇīgotāgopotalikādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . iṣṭānvākhyānam khalu api bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:44: (Pas_7) KA_I,5.23-6.7 Ro_I,24-25 atha etasmin śabdopadeśe sati kim śabdānām pratipattau pratipadapāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:45: gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī śakuniḥ mṛgaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ paṭhitavyāḥ . na iti āha . anabhyupāyaḥ eṣaḥ śabdānām pratipattau pratipadapāṭhaḥ . evam hi śrūyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:46_0: bṛhaspatiḥ indrāya divyam varṣasahasram pratipadoktānām śabdānām śabdapārāyaṇam provāca
GS24pmbhasuu:46_1: na antam jagāma . bṛhaspatiḥ ca pravaktā indraḥ ca adhyetā divyam varṣasahasram adhyayanakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:46_2: na ca antam jagāma . kim punaḥ adyatve . yaḥ sarvathā ciram jīvati saḥ varṣaśatam
GS24pmbhasuu:46_3: jīvati . caturbhiḥ ca prakāraiḥ vidyā upayuktā bhavati āgamakālena svādhyāyakālena
GS24pmbhasuu:46_4: pravacanakālena vyavahārakālena iti . tatra ca āgamakālena eva āyuḥ paryupayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:46_5: syāt . tasmāt anabhyupāyaḥ śabdānām pratipattau pratipadapāṭhaḥ . katham tarhi ime
GS24pmbhasuu:46_6: śabdāḥ pratipattavyāḥ . kim cit sāmanyaviśeṣavat lakṣaṇam pravartyam yena alpena
GS24pmbhasuu:46_7: yatnena mahataḥ mahataḥ śabdaughān pratipadyeran . kim punaḥ tat . utsargāpavādau
GS24pmbhasuu:46_8: . kaḥ cit utsargaḥ kartavyaḥ kaḥ cit apavādaḥ . kathañjātīyakaḥ punaḥ utsargaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:46_9: kathañjātīyakaḥ apavādaḥ . sāmanyena utsargaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā karmaṇi aṇ .
GS24pmbhasuu:46_10: tasya viśeṣeṇa apavādaḥ . tat yathā . ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:47_0: (Pas_8) KA_I,6.8-11 Ro_I,25-26 kim punaḥ ākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ āhosvit dravyam . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:47_1: iti āha . katham jñāyate . ubhayathā hi ācāryeṇa sūtrāṇi paṭhitāni . ākṛtim padārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:47_2: matvā jātyākhyāyām ekasmin bahuvacanam anyatarasyām iti ucyate . dravyam padārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:47_3: matvā sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:48_0: (Pas_9) KA_I,6.12-14 Ro_I,26-27 kim punaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvit kāryaḥ . saṅgrahe
GS24pmbhasuu:48_1: etat prādhānyena parīkṣitam nityaḥ vā syāt kāryaḥ vā iti . tatra uktāḥ doṣāḥ prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:48_2: api uktāni . tatra tu eṣaḥ nirṇayaḥ yadi eva nityaḥ atha api kāryaḥ ubhayathā api
GS24pmbhasuu:49_0: (Pas_10.1) KA_I,6.14-7.7 Ro_I,27-30 katham punaḥ idam bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ ācāryasya
GS24pmbhasuu:49_1: lakṣaṇam pravṛttam . siddhe śabdārthasambandhe . siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:49_2: iti . atha siddhaśabdasya kaḥ padārthaḥ . nityaparyāyavācī siddhaśabdaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:49_3: jñāyate . yat kūṭastheṣu avicāliṣu bhāveṣu vartate . tat yathā siddhā dyauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:50: siddhā pṛthivī siddham ākāśam iti . nanu ca bhoḥ kāryeṣu api vartate . tat yathā siddhaḥ odanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:51_0: siddhaḥ sūpaḥ siddhā yavāgūḥ iti . yāvatā kāryeṣu api vartate tatra kutaḥ etat nityaparyāyavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:51_1: grahaṇam na punaḥ kārye yaḥ siddhaśabdaḥ iti . saṅgrahe tāvat kāryapratidvandvibhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:51_2: manyāmahe nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam iti . iha api tat eva . atha vā santi ekapadāni
GS24pmbhasuu:52: abbhakṣaḥ vāyubhakṣaḥ iti . apaḥ eva bhakṣayati vāyum eva bhakṣayati iti gamyate . evam iha api siddhaḥ eva na sādhyaḥ iti . atha vā pūrvapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:53: atyantasiddhaḥ siddhaḥ iti . tat yathā devadattaḥ dattaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:54_0: satyabhāmā bhāmā iti . atha vā vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:54_1: iti nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . kim punaḥ anena varṇyena . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:54_2: na mahatā kaṇṭhena nityaśabdaḥ eva upāttaḥ yasmin upādīyamāne asandehaḥ syāt . maṅgalārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:54_3: . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham siddhaśabdam āditaḥ prayuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:54_4: . maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:54_5: ca . adhyetāraḥ ca siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . ayam khalu api nityaśabdaḥ na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:54_6: kūṭastheṣu avicāliṣu bhāveṣu vartate . kim tarhi . ābhīkṣṇye api vartate . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:54_7: nityaprahasitaḥ nityaprajalpitaḥ iti . yāvatā ābhīkṣṇye api vartate tatra api anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:54_8: eva arthaḥ syāt vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:54_9: tu ācāryaḥ maṅgalārthaḥ ca eva siddhaśabdaḥ āditaḥ prayuktaḥ bhaviṣyati śakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:54_10: ca enam nityaparyāyavācinam varṇayitum iti . ataḥ siddhaśabdaḥ eva upāttaḥ na nityaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:55_0: (Pas_10.2) KA_I,7.8-8.1 Ro_I,30-32 atha kam punaḥ padārtham matvā eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:55_1: siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti . ākṛtim iti āha . kutaḥ etat . ākṛtiḥ hi nityā
GS24pmbhasuu:55_2: . dravyam anityam . atha dravye padārthe katham vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ . siddhe śabde
GS24pmbhasuu:55_3: arthasambandhe ca iti . nityaḥ hi arthavatām arthaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ . atha vā dravye
GS24pmbhasuu:55_4: eva padārthe eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ nyāyyaḥ siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti. dravyam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:55_5: nityam ākṛtiḥ anityā . katham jñāyate . evam hi dṛśyate loke . mṛt kayā cit ākṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:55_6: yuktā piṇḍaḥ bhavati . piṇḍākṛtim upamṛdya ghaṭikāḥ kiryante . ghaṭikākṛtim upamṛdya
GS24pmbhasuu:55_7: kuṇḍikāḥ kriyante . tathā suvarṇam kayā cit ākṛtyā yuktam piṇḍaḥ bhavati . piṇḍākṛtim
GS24pmbhasuu:55_8: upamṛdya rucakāḥ kriyante . rucakākṛtim upamṛdya kaṭakāḥ kriyante . kaṭakākṛtim upmṛdya
GS24pmbhasuu:55_9: svastikāḥ kriyante . punaḥ āvṛttaḥ suvarṇapiṇḍaḥ punaḥ aparayā ākṛtyā yuktaḥ khadirāgārasavarṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:55_10: kuṇḍale bhavataḥ . ākṛtiḥ anyā ca anyā ca bhavati dravyam punaḥ tad eva . ākṛtyupamardena
GS24pmbhasuu:55_11: dravyam eva avaśiṣyate . ākṛtau api padārthe eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ nyāyyaḥ siddhe śabde arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:55_12: sambandhe ca iti . nanu ca uktam ākṛtiḥ anityā iti . na etat asti . nityā ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:55_13: . katham . na kva cit uparatā iti kṛtvā sarvatra uparatā bhavati . dravyāntarasthā
GS24pmbhasuu:55_14: tu upalabhyate . atha vā na idam eva nityalakṣaṇam dhruvam kūṭastham avicāli anapāyopajanavikāri
GS24pmbhasuu:55_15: anutpatti avṛddhi avyayayogi iti tan nityam iti . tat api nityam yasmin tattvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:55_16: vihanyate . kim punaḥ tattvam . tadbhāvaḥ tattvam . ākṛtau api tattvam na vihanyate
GS24pmbhasuu:55_17: . atha vā kim naḥ etena idam nityam idam anityam iti . yat nityam tam padārtham matvā
GS24pmbhasuu:55_18: eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ kriyate siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:55_19: siddhaḥ śabdaḥ arthaḥ sambandhaḥ ca iti . lokataḥ . yat loke artham upādāya śabdān
GS24pmbhasuu:55_20: prayuñjate . na eṣām nirvṛttau yatnam kurvanti . ye punaḥ kāryāḥ bhāvāḥ nirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:55_21: tāvat teṣām yatnaḥ kriyate . tat yathā . ghaṭena kāryam kariṣyan kumbhakārakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:55_22: gatvā āha kuru ghaṭam . kāryam anena kariṣyāmi iti . na tadvat śabdān prayokṣyamāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:55_23: vaiyākaraṇakulam gatvā āha . kuru śabdān . prayokṣye iti . tāvati eva artham upādāya śabdān prayuñjate .
GS24pmbhasuu:56_0: (Pas_11) KA_I,8.1-22 Ro_I,32-35 yadi tarhi lokaḥ eṣu pramāṇam kim śāstreṇa kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:56_1: . lokataḥ arthaprayukte śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa dharmaniyamaḥ . lokataḥ arthaprayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:56_2: śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa dharmaniyamaḥ kriyate . kim idam dharmaniyamaḥ iti . dharmāya
GS24pmbhasuu:56_3: niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ dharmārthaḥ vā niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ dharmaprayojanaḥ vā niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:56_4: dharmaniyamaḥ . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . priyataddhitāḥ dākṣiṇātyāḥ . yathā loke
GS24pmbhasuu:56_5: vede ca iti prayoktavye yathā laukikavaidikeṣu iti prayuñjate . atha vā yuktaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:56_6: taddhitārthaḥ . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:56_7: abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ucyate . bhakṣyam ca nāma kṣutpratīghātārtham upādīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:56_8: . śakyam ca anena śvamāṃsādibhiḥ api kṣut pratihantum . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:56_9: bhakṣyam . idam abhakṣyam iti . tathā khedāt strīṣu pravṛttiḥ bhavati . samānaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:56_10: khedavigamaḥ gamyāyām ca agamyāyām ca . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:57_0: iyam gamyā iyam agamyā iti . vede khalu api payovrataḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yavāgūvrataḥ rājanyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:57_1: āmikṣāvrataḥ vaiśyaḥ iti ucyate . vratam ca nāma abhyavahārārtham upādīyate . śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:57_2: ca anena śālimāṃsādīni api vratayitum . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . tathā bailvaḥ khādiraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:57_3: vā yūpaḥ syāt iti ucyate . yūpaḥ ca nāma paśvanubandhārtham upādīyate . śakyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:57_4: anena kim cit eva kāṣṭham ucchritya anucchritya vā paśuḥ anubanddhum . tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:57_5: kriyate . tathā agnau kapālāni adhiśritya abhimantrayate . bhṛgūṇām aṅgirasām gharmasya
GS24pmbhasuu:57_6: tapasā tapyadhvam iti . antareṇa api mantram agniḥ dahanakarmā kapālāni santāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:57_7: . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . evam kriyamāṇam abhyudayakāri bhavati iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:57_8: samānāyām arthagatau śabdena ca apaśabdena ca dharmaniyamaḥ kriyate . śabdena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:57_9: arthaḥ abhidheyaḥ na apaśabdena iti . evam kriyamāṇam abhyudayakāri bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:58_0: (Pas_12) KA_I,8.23-10.3 Ro_I,35-39 asti aprayuktaḥ . santi vai śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_1: . tat yathā ūṣa tera cakra peca iti . kim ataḥ yat santi aprayuktāḥ . prayogāt hi
GS24pmbhasuu:58_2: bhavān śabdānām sādhutvam adhyavasyati . ye idānīm aprayuktāḥ na amī sādhavaḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_3: . idam vipratiṣiddham yat ucyate santi vai śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . yadi santi na
GS24pmbhasuu:58_4: aprayuktāḥ . atha aprayuktāḥ na santi . santi ca aprayuktāḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:58_5: . prayuñjānaḥ eva khalu bhavān āha santi śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . kaḥ ca idānīm anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_6: bhavajjātīyakaḥ puruṣaḥ śabdānām prayoge sādhuḥ syāt . na etat vipratiṣiddham . santi
GS24pmbhasuu:58_7: iti tāvat brūmaḥ yat etān śāstravidaḥ śāstreṇa anuvidadhate . aprayuktāḥ iti brūmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_8: yat loke aprayuktāḥ iti . yat api ucyate kaḥ ca idānīm anyaḥ bhavajjātīyakaḥ puruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_9: śabdānām prayoge sādhuḥ syāt iti . na brūmaḥ asmābhiḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:58_10: . loke aprayuktāḥ iti . nanu ca bhavān api abhyantaraḥ loke . abhyantaraḥ aham loke
GS24pmbhasuu:58_11: na tu aham lokaḥ . asti aprayuktaḥ iti cet na arthe śabdaprayogāt . asti aprayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_12: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . arthe śabdaprayogāt . arthe śabdāḥ prayujyante . santi
GS24pmbhasuu:58_13: ca eṣām śabdānām arthāḥ yeṣu artheṣu prayujyante . aprayogaḥ prayogānyatvāt . aprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_14: khalu eṣāṃ śabdānām nyāyyaḥ . kutaḥ . prayogānyatvāt . yat eteṣām śabdānām arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:58_15: anyān śabdān prayuñjate . tat yathā . ūṣa iti etasya śabdasya arthe kva yūyam uṣitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_16: . tera iti asya arthe kim yūyam tīrṇāḥ . cakra iti asya arthe kim yūyam kṛtavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_17: . peca iti asya arthe kim yūyam pakvavantaḥ iti . aprayukte dīrghasattravat . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:58_18: api aprayuktāḥ avaśyam dīrghasattravat lakṣaṇena anuvidheyāḥ . tat yathā . dīrghasattrāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:58_19: vārṣaśatikāni vārṣasahasrikāṇi ca . na ca adyatve kaḥ cit api vyavaharati . kevalam
GS24pmbhasuu:58_20: ṛṣisampradāyaḥ dharmaḥ iti kṛtvā yājñikāḥ śāstreṇa anuvidadhate . sarve deśāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:58_21: . sarve khalu api ete śabdāḥ deśāntare prayujyante . na ca ete upalabhyante . upalabdhau
GS24pmbhasuu:58_22: yatnaḥ kriyatām . mahān hi śabdasya prayogaviṣayaḥ . saptadvīpā vasumatī trayaḥ lokāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_23: catvāraḥ vedāḥ sāṅgāḥ sarahasyāḥ bahudhā vibhinnāḥ ekaśatam adhvaryuśākhāḥ sahasravartmā
GS24pmbhasuu:58_24: sāmavedaḥ ekaviṃsatidhā bāhvṛcyam navadhā ātharvaṇaḥ vedaḥ vākovākyam itihāsaḥ purāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:58_25: vaidyakam iti etāvān śabdasya prayogaviṣayaḥ . etāvantam śabdasya prayogaviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:58_26: ananuniśamya santi aprayuktāḥ iti vacanam kevalam sāhasamātram . etasmin atimahati
GS24pmbhasuu:58_27: śabdasya prayogaviṣaye te te śabdāḥ tatra tatra niyataviṣayāḥ dṛśyante . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:58_28: . śavatiḥ gatikarmā kambojeṣu eva bhāṣitaḥ bhavati . vikāre enam āryāḥ bhāṣante śavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_29: iti . hammatiḥ surāṣṭreṣu raṃhatiḥ prācyamadhyeṣu gamim eva tu āryāḥ prayuñjate .
GS24pmbhasuu:58_30: dātiḥ lavanārthe prācyeṣu dātram udīcyeṣu . ye ca api ete bhavataḥ aprayuktāḥ abhimatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:58_31: śabdāḥ eteṣām api prayogaḥ dṛśyate . kva . vede . yat vaḥ revatīḥ revatyam tat ūṣa
GS24pmbhasuu:58_32: . yat me naraḥ śrutyam brahma cakra . yatra naḥ cakra jarasam tanunām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:59_0: (Pas_13) KA_I,10.4-11.14 Ro_I,39-42 kim punaḥ śabdasya jñāne dharmaḥ āhosvit prayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:59_1: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . jñāne dharmaḥ iti cet tathā adharmaḥ . jñāne dharmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:59_2: cet tathā adharmaḥ prāpnoti . yaḥ hi śabdān jānāti apaśabdān api asau jānāti . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:59_3: eva śabdajñāne dharmaḥ evam apaśabdajñāne api adharmaḥ . atha vā bhūyān adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:59_4: prāpnoti .bhūyāṃsaḥ apaśabdāḥ alpīyāṃsaḥ śabdāḥ . ekaikasya śabdasya bahavaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:59_5: . tat yathā . gauḥ iti asya gāvī goṇī gotā gopotalikā iti evamādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:59_6: . ācāre niyamaḥ . ācāre punaḥ ṛṣiḥ niyamam vedayate . te asurāḥ helayaḥ helayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:59_7: kurvantaḥ parābabhūvuḥ iti . astu tarhi prayoge . prayoge sarvalokasya . yadi prayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:59_8: dharmaḥ sarvaḥ lokaḥ abhyudayena yujyeta . kaḥ ca idānīm bhavataḥ matsaraḥ yadi sarvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:59_9: lokaḥ abhyudayena yujyeta . na khalu kaḥ cit matsaraḥ . prayatnānarthakyam tu bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:59_10: . phalavatā ca nāma prayatnena bhavitavyam na ca prayatnaḥ phalāt vyatirecyaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:59_11: ca ye kṛtaprayatnāḥ te sādhīyaḥ śabdān prayokṣyante . te eva sādhīyaḥ abhyudayena
GS24pmbhasuu:59_12: yokṣyante . vyatirekaḥ api vai lakṣyate . dṛśyante hi kṛtaprayatnāḥ ca apravīṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:59_13: akṛtaprayatnāḥ ca pravīṇāḥ . tatra phalavyatirekaḥ api syāt . evam tarhi na api jñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:59_14: eva dharmaḥ na api prayoge eva . kim tarhi śāstrapūrvake prayoge abhyudayaḥ tat tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:59_15: vedaśabdena . śāstrapūrvakam yaḥ śabdān prayuṅkte saḥ abhyudayena yujyate . tat tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:59_16: vedaśabdena . vedaśabdāḥ api evam abhivadanti . yaḥ agniṣṭomena yajate yaḥ u ca enam
GS24pmbhasuu:59_17: evam veda . yaḥ agnim nāciketam cinute yaḥ u ca enam evam veda . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:60_0: tat tulyam vedaśabdena iti . yathā vedaśabdāḥ niyamapūrvam adhītāḥ phalavantaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:60_1: evam yaḥ śāstrapūrvakam śabdān prayuṅkte saḥ abhyudayena yujyate iti . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:60_2: astu jñāne eva dharmaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam jñāne dharmaḥ iti cet tathā adharmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:60_3: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabdapramāṇakāḥ vayam . yat śabdaḥ āha tat asmākam pramāṇam . śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:60_4: ca śabdajñāne dharmam āha na apaśabdajñāne adharmam . yat ca punaḥ aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:60_5: na eva tat doṣāya bhavati na abhyudayāya . tat yathā . hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni na
GS24pmbhasuu:60_6: eva doṣāya bhavanti na api abhyudayāya . atha vā abhyupāyaḥ eva apaśabdajñānam śabdajñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:60_7: . yaḥ apaśabdān jānāti śabdān api asau jānāti . tat evam jñāne dharmaḥ iti bruvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:60_8: arthāt āpannam bhavati apaśabdajñānapūrvake śabdajñāne dharmaḥ iti . atha vā kūpakhānakavat
GS24pmbhasuu:60_9: etat bhavati . tat yathā kūpakhānakaḥ khanan yadi api mṛdā pāṃsubhiḥ ca avakīrṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:60_10: bhavati saḥ apsu sañjātāsu tataḥ eva tam guṇam āsādayati yena saḥ ca doṣaḥ nirhaṇyate
GS24pmbhasuu:60_11: bhūyasā ca abhyudayena yogaḥ bhavati evam iha api yadi api apaśabdajñāne adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:60_12: tathā api yaḥ tu asau śabdajñāne dharmaḥ tena saḥ ca doṣaḥ nirghāniṣyate bhūyasā
GS24pmbhasuu:60_13: ca abhyudayena yogaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate ācāre niyamaḥ iti yājñe karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:60_14: saḥ niyamaḥ . evam hi śrūyate . yarvāṇaḥ tarvāṇaḥ nāma ṛṣayaḥ babhūvuḥ pratyakṣadharmāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:60_15: parāparajñāḥ viditaveditavyāḥ adhigatayāthātathyāḥ . te tatrabhavantaḥ yat vā naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:60_16: tat vā naḥ iti proyoktavye yar vā ṇaḥ tar vā ṇaḥ iti prayuñjate yājñe punaḥ karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:60_17: na apabhāṣante . taiḥ punaḥ asuraiḥ yājñe karmaṇi apabhāṣitam . tataḥ te parābabhūtāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:61_0: (Pas_14) KA_I,11.14-12.27 Ro_I,42-47 atha vyākaraṇam iti asya śabdasya kaḥ padārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:61_1: . sūtram . sūtre vyākaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ anupapannaḥ . sūtre vyākaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:61_2: na upapadyate vyākaraṇasya sūtram iti . kim hi tat anyat sūtrāt vyākaraṇam yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:61_3: adaḥ sūtram syāt . śabdāpratipattiḥ . śabdānām ca apratipattiḥ prāpnoti vyākaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:61_4: śabdān pratipadyāmahe iti . na hi sūtrataḥ eva śabdān pratipadyante . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:61_5: vyākhyānataḥ ca . nanu ca tat eva sūtram vigṛhītam vyākhyānam bhavati . na kevalāni
GS24pmbhasuu:61_6: carcāpadāni vyākhyanam vṛddhiḥ āt aic iti . kim tarhi . udāharaṇam pratyudāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:61_7: vākyādhyāhāraḥ iti etat samuditam vyākhyānam bhavati . evam tarhi śabdaḥ . śabde
GS24pmbhasuu:61_8: lyuḍarthaḥ . yadi śabdaḥ vyākaraṇam lyuḍarthaḥ na upapadyate vyākriyate anena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:61_9: vyākaraṇam . na hi śabdena kim cit vyākriyate . kena tarhi . sūtreṇa . bhave . bhave
GS24pmbhasuu:61_10: ca taddhitaḥ na upapadyate vyākaraṇe bhavaḥ yogaḥ vaiyākaraṇaḥ iti . na hi śabde
GS24pmbhasuu:61_11: bhavaḥ yogaḥ . kva tarhi . sūtre . proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ . proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:63_0: kāśakṛtsnam iti . na hi pāṇininā śabdāḥ proktāḥ . kim tarhi . sūtram . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:63_1: idam ubhayam ucyate bhave proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ iti na proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:63_2: iti eva bhave api taddhitaḥ coditaḥ syāt . purastāt idam ācāryeṇa dṛṣṭam bhave taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:63_3: iti tat paṭhitam . tataḥ uttarakālam idam dṛṣṭam proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ iti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:63_4: api paṭhitam . na ca idānīm ācāryāḥ sūtrāṇi kṛtvā nivartayanti . ayam tāvat adoṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:63_5: yat ucyate śabde lyuḍarthaḥ iti . na avaśyam karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ eva lyuṭ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:63_6: kim tarhi anyeṣu api kārakeṣu kṛtyalyuṭaḥ bahulam iti . tat yathā praskandanam prapatanam
GS24pmbhasuu:63_7: iti . atha vā śabdaiḥ api śabdāḥ vyākriyante . tat yathā gauḥ iti ukte sarve sandehāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:63_8: nivartante na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ iti . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ bhave proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:63_9: iti . evam tarhi lakṣyalakṣaṇe vyākaraṇam . lakṣyam ca lakṣaṇam ca etat samuditam
GS24pmbhasuu:63_10: vyākaraṇam bhavati . kim punaḥ lakṣyam lakṣaṇam ca . śabdaḥ lakṣyam sūtram lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:63_11: . evam api ayam doṣaḥ samudāye vyākaraṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayave na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:63_12: sūtrāṇi ca adhīyānaḥ iṣyate vaiyākaraṇaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyeṣu hi śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:63_13: pravṛttāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante . tat yathā pūrve pañcālāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:69_0: kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam samudāye vyākaraṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayave api vartate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:69_1: vā punaḥ astu sūtram . nanu ca uktam sūtre vyākaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ anupapannaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:69_2: . na eṣa doṣaḥ . vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate śabdāpratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:69_3: iti na hi sūtrataḥ eva śabdān pratipadyante kim tarhi vyākhyānataḥ ca iti parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:69_4: etat tat eva sūtram vigṛhītam vyākhyānam bhavati iti . nanu ca uktam na kevalāni
GS24pmbhasuu:69_5: carcāpadāni vyākhyānam vṛddhiḥ āt aic iti kim tarhi udāharaṇam pratyudāharaṇam vākyādhyāhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:69_6: iti etat samuditam vyākhyānam bhavati iti . avijānataḥ etat evam bhavati . sūtrataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:69_7: eva hi śabdān pratipadyante . ātaḥ ca sūtrataḥ eva yaḥ hi utsūtram kathayet na adaḥ gṛhyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:70_0: (Pas_15) KA_I,13.1-14.22 Ro_I,47-53 atha kimarthaḥ varṇānām upadeśaḥ . vṛttisamavāyārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:70_1: upadeśaḥ . vṛttisamavāyārthaḥ varṇānām upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kim idam vṛttisamavayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:72_0: vṛttiprayojanaḥ vā vṛttisamavayaḥ . kā punaḥ vṛttiḥ . śāstrapravṛttiḥ . atha kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:72_1: samavayaḥ . varṇānām ānupūrvyeṇa sanniveśaḥ . atha kaḥ upadeśaḥ . uccāraṇam . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:72_2: etat . diśiḥ uccāraṇakriyaḥ . uccārya hi varṇān āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:73_0: upadiṣṭāḥ ime varṇāḥ iti . anubandhakaraṇārthaḥ ca . anubandhakaraṇārthaḥ ca varṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:73_1: upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . anubandhān āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . na hi anupadiśya varṇān anubandhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:73_2: śakyāḥ āsaṅktum . saḥ eṣaḥ varṇānām upadeśaḥ vṛttisamavāyārthaḥ ca anubandhakaraṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:73_3: ca . vṛttisamavāyaḥ ca anubandhakaraṇārthaḥ ca pratyāhārārtham . pratyāhāraḥ vṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:73_4: . iṣṭabuddhyarthaḥ ca . iṣṭabuddhyarthaḥ ca varṇānām upadeśaḥ . iṣṭān varṇān bhotsye
GS24pmbhasuu:73_5: iti . iṣṭabuddhyarthaḥ ca iti cet udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikdīrghaplutānām api upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:73_6: . iṣṭabuddhyarthaḥ ca iti cet udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikdīrghaplutānām api upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:73_7: kartavyaḥ . evaṅguṇāḥ api hi varṇāḥ iṣyante . ākṛtyupadeśāt siddham . ākṛtyupadeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:73_8: siddham etat . avarṇākṛtiḥ upadiṣṭā sarvam avarṇakulam grahīṣyati . tathā ivarṇakulākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:73_9: . tathā uvarṇakulākṛtiḥ . ākṛtyupadeśāt siddham iti cet saṃvṛtādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:73_10: . ākṛtyupadeśāt siddham iti cet saṃvṛtādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ saṃvṛtādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:73_11: . saṃvṛtaḥ kalaḥ dhmātaḥ eṇīkṛtaḥ ambūkṛtaḥ ardhakaḥ grastaḥ nirastaḥ pragītaḥ upagītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:74_0: grastam nirastam avilambitam nirhatam ambūkṛtam dhmātam atho vikampitam sandaṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:74_1: eṇīkṛtam ardhakam drutam vikīrṇam etāḥ svaradoṣabhāvanāḥ iti . ataḥ anye vyañjanadoṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:74_2: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . gargādibidādipāṭhāt saṃvṛtādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:74_3: gargādibidādipāṭhe prayojanam . kim . samudāyānām sādhutvam yathā syāt iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:74_4: tarhi aṣṭādaśadhā bhinnām nivṛttakalādikām avarṇasya pratyāpattim vakṣyāmi . sā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:74_5: vaktavyā . liṅgārthā tu pratyāpattiḥ . liṅgārtha sā tarhi bhaviṣyati . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:74_6: vaktavyam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi anubandhaśatam na uccāryam itsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:74_7: ca na vaktavyā lopaḥ ca na vaktavyaḥ . yat anubandhaiḥ kriyate tat kalādibhiḥ kariṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:74_8: . sidhyati evam apāṇinīyam tu bhavati . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ākṛtyupadeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:74_9: siddham iti cet saṃvṛtādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ iti .parihṛtam etat gargādibidādipāṭhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:74_10: saṃvṛtādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . nanu ca anyat gargādibidādipāṭhe prayojanam uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:74_11: . kim . samudāyānām sādhutvam yathā syāt iti . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:74_12: pāṭhaḥ ca eva viśeṣyate kalādayaḥ ca nivartyante . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:74_13: labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . dvigatāḥ api hetavaḥ bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:75: āmrāḥ ca siktāḥ pitaraḥ ca prīṇitāḥ iti . tathā vākyāni api ḍviṣṭhāni bhavanti . śvetaḥ dhāvati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:76_0: alambusānām yātā iti . atha vā idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . kve ime saṃvṛtādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:76_1: śrūyeran iti . āgameṣu . āgamāḥ śuddhāḥ paṭhyante . vikāreṣu tarhi . vikārāḥ śuddhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:76_2: paṭhyante . pratyayeṣu tarhi . pratyayāḥ śuddhāḥ paṭhyante . dhātuṣu tarhi . dhātavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:76_3: api śuddhāḥ paṭhyante . prātipadikeṣu tarhi . prātipadikāni api śuddhāni paṭhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:76_4: . yāni tarhi agrahaṇāni prātipadikāni . eteṣām api svaravarṇānupūrvījñānārthaḥ upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:76_5: kartavyaḥ . śaśaḥ ṣaṣaḥ iti mā bhūt . palāśaḥ palāṣaḥ iti mā bhūt . mañcakaḥ mañjakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:76_6: iti mā bhūt . āgamāḥ ca vikārāḥ ca pratyayāḥ saha dhātubhiḥ uccāryante tataḥ teṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:77_0: (Śs_1.1) KA_I,15.2-16.18 Ro_I,54-60 akārasya vivṛtopadeśaḥ ākāragrahaṇārthaḥ . akārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:77_1: vivṛtopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . ākāragrahaṇārthaḥ . akāraḥ savarṇagragaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:77_2: ākāram api yathā gṛhṇīyāt . kim ca kāraṇam na gṛhṇīyāt . vivārabhedāt . kim ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:77_3: vivārabhedāt iti na punaḥ kālabhedād api . yathā eva hi vivārabhinnaḥ evam kālabhinnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:77_4: api . satyam etat . vakṣyati tulyāsyaprayatnam savarṇam iti atra āsyagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:77_5: āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ prayatnaḥ ca te savarṇasañjñakāḥ bhavanti iti . bāhyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:77_6: punaḥ āsyāt kālaḥ . tena syāt eva kālabhinnasya grahaṇam na punaḥ vivārabhinnasya
GS24pmbhasuu:77_7: . kim punaḥ idam vivṛtasya upadiśyamānasya prayojanam anvākhyāyate āhosvit saṃvṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:77_8: upadiśyamānasya vivṛtopadeśaḥ codyate . vivṛtasya upadiśyamānasya prayojanam anvākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:77_9: . katham jñāyate . yat ayam a* a iti akārasya vivṛtasya saṃvṛtatāpratyāpattim śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:77_10: . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . atikhaṭvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:78_0: atimālaḥ iti atra āntaryataḥ vivṛtasya vivṛtaḥ prāpnoti . saṃvṛtaḥ syāt iti evamarthā
GS24pmbhasuu:78_1: pratyāpattiḥ . na etat asti . na eva loke na ca vede akāro vivṛtaḥ asti . kaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:78_2: . saṃvṛtaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati . tat etat pratyāpattivacanam jñāpakam eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:78_3: vivṛtasya upadiśyamānasya prayojanam anvākhyāyate iti . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ vivṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:78_4: upadiśyamānasya prayojanam anvākhyāyeta saṃvṛtasya upadiśyamānasya vā vivṛtopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_5: codyeta iti . na khalu kaḥ cid viśeṣaḥ . āhopuruṣikāmātram tu bhavān āha saṃvṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:78_6: upadiśyamānasya vivṛtopadeśaḥ codyate iti . vayam tu brūmaḥ vivṛtasya upadiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:78_7: prayojanam anvākhyāyate iti. tasya vivṛtopadeśāt anyatra api vivṛtopadeśaḥ savarṇagrahaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_8: . tasya etasya ākṣarasamāmnāyikasya vivṛtopadeśāt anyatra api vivṛtopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_9: . kva anyatra . dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātasthasya . kim prayojanam . savarṇagrahaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_10: . ākṣarasamāmnāyikena asya grahaṇam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . vivārabhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:78_11: eva . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ākṣarasamāmnāyikena dhātvādisthasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:78_12: iti yat ayam akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti pratyāhāre akaḥ grahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:78_13: jñāpakam . na hi dvayoḥ ākṣarasamāmnāyikayoḥ yugapat samavasthānam asti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:78_14: asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim. yasya ākṣarasamāmnāyikena
GS24pmbhasuu:78_15: grahaṇam asti tadartham etat syāt . khaṭvāḍhakam mālāḍhakam iti . sati prayojane
GS24pmbhasuu:78_16: na jñāpakam bhavati . tasmāt vivṛtopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kaḥ eṣaḥ yatnaḥ codyate vivṛtopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_17: nāma . vivṛtaḥ vā upadiśyeta saṃvṛtaḥ vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . saḥ eṣaḥ sarvaḥ evamarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_18: yatnaḥ yāni etāni prātipadikāni agrahaṇāni teṣām etena abhyupāyena upadeśaḥ codyate
GS24pmbhasuu:78_19: . tat guru bhavati . tasmāt vaktavyam dhātvādisthaḥ ca vivṛtaḥ iti . dīrghaplutavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:78_20: ca saṃvṛtanivṛttyarthaḥ . dīrghaplutavacane ca saṃvṛtanivṛttyarthaḥ vivṛtopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_21: kartavyaḥ . dīrghaplutau saṃvṛtau mā bhūtām iti . vṛkṣābhyām devadattā iti . na eva
GS24pmbhasuu:78_22: loke na ca vede dīrghaplutau saṃvṛtau staḥ . kau tarhi . vivṛtau . yau staḥ tau bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_23: . sthānī prakalpayet etau anusvāraḥ yathā yaṇam . saṃvṛtaḥ sthānī saṃvṛtau dīrghaplutau
GS24pmbhasuu:78_24: prakalpayet anusvāraḥ yathā yaṇam . tat yathā sayṃyantā savṃvatsaraḥ yalṃ lokam talṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_25: lokam iti . ansvāraḥ sthānī yaṇam anunāsikam prakalpayati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:78_26: yat sataḥ tatra prakḷptiḥ bhavati . santi hi yaṇaḥ sānunāsikāḥ niranunāsikāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:78_27: dīrghaplutau punaḥ na eva loke na ca veda saṃvṛtau staḥ . kau tarhi . vivṛtau . yau
GS24pmbhasuu:78_28: staḥ tau bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api kutaḥ etat tulyasthānau prayatnabhinnau bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:78_29: na punaḥ tulyaprayatnau sthānabhinnau syātām īkāraḥ ūkāraḥ vā iti . vakṣyati sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:78_30: antaratamaḥ iti atra sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthānegrahaṇasya prayojanam . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:78_31: anekavidham āntaryam tatra sthānataḥ eva āntaryam balīyaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:79_0: (Śs_1.2) KA_I,16.19-19.8 Ro_I,60-69 tatra anuvṛttinirdeśe savarṇāgrahaṇam anaṇtvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:79_1: . tatra anuvṛttinirdeśe savarṇānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti . asya cvau yasya īti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:79_2: . kim kāraṇam . anaṇtvāt . na hi ete aṇaḥ ye anuvṛttau . ke tarhi . ye akṣarasamāmnaye
GS24pmbhasuu:79_3: upadiśyante . ekatvāt akārasya siddham . ekaḥ ayam akāraḥ yaḥ ca akṣarasamāmnaye
GS24pmbhasuu:79_4: yaḥ ca anuvṛttau yaḥ ca dhātvādisthaḥ . anubandhasaṅkaraḥ tu . anubandhasaṅkaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:80_0: ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti ke api ṇitkṛtam prāpnoti . ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu ca anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:80_1: . ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu ca anupapattiḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . kiriṇā giriṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:80_2: iti atra ekājlakṣaṇam antodāttatvam prāpnoti . iha ca ghaṭena tarati ghaṭika iti
GS24pmbhasuu:80_3: dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ ṭhan na prāpnoti . dravyavat ca upacārāḥ . dravyavat ca upacārāḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:80_4: . tat yathā . dravyeṣu na ekena ghaṭena anekaḥ yugapat kāryam karoti . evam imam
GS24pmbhasuu:80_5: akāram na anekaḥ yugapat uccārayet . viṣayeṇa tu nānāliṅgakāraṇāt siddham . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:80_6: viṣaye viṣaye nānāliṅgam akāram karoti karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti tena jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:80_7: nānubandhasaṅkaraḥ asti iti . yadi hi syāt nānāliṅgakaraṇam anarthakam syāt . ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:80_8: eva ayam sarvaguṇam uccārayet . na etat asti jñapakam . itsañjñāprakḷptyartham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:80_9: syāt . na hi ayam anubandhaiḥ śalyakavat śakyaḥ upacetum . itsañjñayām hi doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:80_10: . āyamya hi dvayoḥ itsañjñā syāt . kayoḥ . ādyantayoḥ . evam tarhi viṣayeṇa tu punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:80_11: liṅgakaraṇāt siddham . yat ayam viṣaye viṣaye punaḥ liṅgam akāram karoti prāk dīvyataḥ aṇ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:81_0: śivādibhyaḥ aṇ iti tena jñāyate na anubandhasaṅkaraḥ asti iti . yadi hi syāt punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:81_1: liṅgakaraṇam anarthakam syāt . atha vā punaḥ astu viṣayeṇa tu nānāliṅgakāraṇāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:81_2: iti eva . nanu ca uktam itsañjñāprakḷptyartham etat syāt iti . na eṣa doṣaḥ . lokataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:85_0: iha śikhī bhava iti . yalliṅgaḥ yatra ucyate talliṅgaḥ tatra upatiṣṭhate . evam akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:85_1: yalliṅgaḥ yatra ucyate talliṅgaḥ tatra upasthāsyate . yat api ucyate ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:85_2: ca anupapattiḥ iti . ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu ca āvṛttisaṅkhyānāt . ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:85_3: ca āvṛtteḥ saṅkhyānāt anekāctvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:85_4: iti triḥ prathamam anvāha triḥ uttamam iti āvṛttitaḥ saptadaśatvam bhavati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:85_5: iha api āvṛttitaḥ anekāctvam bhaviṣyati . bhaved āvṛttitaḥ kāryam parihṛtam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:85_6: tu khalu kiriṇā giriṇā iti ekājlakṣaṇam antodāttatvam prāpnoti eva . etat api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:85_7: . katham . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke ṛṣisahasram ekām kapilām ekaikaśaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:85_8: dattvā tayā sarve te sahasradakṣiṇaḥ saṃpannāḥ evam iha api anekāctvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:85_9: . yat api ucyate dravyavat ca upacārāḥ prāpnuvanti iti . bhavet yat asambhavi kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:85_10: tat na anekaḥ yugapat kuryāt . yat tu khalu sambhavi kāryam anekaḥ api tat yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:85_11: karoti . tat yathā ghaṭasya darśanam sparśanam vā . sambhavi ca idam kāryam akārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:85_12: uccāraṇam nāma anekaḥ api tat yugapat kariṣyati . ānyabhāvyam tu kālaśabdavyavāyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:85_13: . ānyabhāvyam tu akārasya . kutaḥ . kālaśabdavyavāyāt . kālavyavāyāt śabdavyavāyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:87_0: daṇḍaḥ . na ca ekasya ātmanaḥ vyavāyena bhavitavyam . bhavati cet bhavati ānyabhāvyam
GS24pmbhasuu:87_1: akārasya . yugapat ca deśapṛthaktvadarśanāt . yugapat ca deśapṛthaktvadarśanāt manyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:87_2: ānyabhāvyam akārasya iti . yat ayam yugapat deśapṛthaktveṣu upalabhyate . aśvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:89_0: arthaḥ iti . na hi ekaḥ devadattaḥ yugapat srughne ca bhavati mathurāyām ca . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:89_1: punaḥ ime varṇāḥ śakunivat syuḥ . tat yathā śakunayaḥ āśugamitvāt purastāt utpatitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:89_2: paścāt dṛśyante evam ayam akāraḥ da iti atra dṛṣṭaḥ ṇḍa iti atra dṛśyate . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:89_3: śakyam . anityatvam evam syāt . nityāḥ ca śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:89_4: avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ . yadi ca ayam da iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:89_5: dṛṣṭaḥ ṇḍa iti atra dṛśyeta na ayam kūṭasthaḥ syāt . yadi punaḥ ime varṇāḥ ādityavat
GS24pmbhasuu:89_6: syuḥ . tat yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇsthaḥ yugapat deśapṛthaktveṣu upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:89_7: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā ādityam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat deśapṛthaktveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:90_0: akāram api na upalabhate . kim kāraṇam . śrotropalabdhiḥ buddhinirgrāhyaḥ prayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:90_1: abhijvalitaḥ ākāśadeśaḥ śabdaḥ ekam ca ākāśam . ākāśadeśāḥ api bahavaḥ . yāvatā bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:90_2: tasmāt ānyabhāvyam akārasya . ākṛtigrahaṇāt siddham . avarṇākṛtiḥ upadiṣṭā sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:90_3: avarṇakulam grahīṣyati . tathā ivarṇākṛtiḥ . tathā uvarṇākṛtiḥ . tadvat ca taparakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:90_4: . evam ca kṛtvā taparāḥ kriyante . ākṛtigrahaṇena atiprasaktam iti . nanu ca savarṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:90_5: atiprasaktam iti kṛtvā taparāḥ kriyeran . pratyākhyāyate tat :
GS24pmbhasuu:91: savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam ākṛtigrahaṇāt ananyatvāt ca iti . halgrahaṇeṣu ca . kim . ākṛtigrahaṇāt siddham iti eva . jhalo jhali :
GS24pmbhasuu:92: avāttām avāttam avātta yatra etat na asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:93: aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . rūpasāmanyāt vā . rūpasāmānyāt vā siddham . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:94: tān eva śāṭakān ācchādayāmaḥ ye mathurāyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:95: tān eva śālīn bhuñjmahe ye magadheṣu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:96: tat eva idam bhavataḥ kārṣāpaṇam yat mathurāyām gṛhītam . anyasmin ca anyasmin ca rūpasāmānyāt tat eva idam iti bhavati . evam iha api rūpasāmānyāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:97_0: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 ḷkāropadeśaḥ kimarthaḥ . kim viśeṣeṇa ḷkāropadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:97_1: codyate na punaḥ anyeṣām api varṇānām upadeśaḥ codyate . yadi kim cit anyeṣām api
GS24pmbhasuu:97_2: varṇānām upadeśe prayojanam asti ḷkāropadeśasya api tat bhavitum arhati . kaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:97_3: viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . asya hi ḷkārasya alpīyān ca eva prayogaviṣayaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:97_4: ca api prayogaviṣayaḥ saḥ api kḷpisthasya . kḷpeḥ ca latvam asiddham . tasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:97_5: ṛkārasya eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti . na arthaḥ ḷkāropadeśena . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:98_1: aśaktijānukaraṇārthaḥ plutyādyarthaḥ ca . yadṛcchāśabdārthaḥ tāvat . yadṛcchayā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:98_2: cit ḷtakaḥ nāma tasmin ackāryāṇi yathā syuḥ . dadhi ḷtaka dehi . madhu ḷtaka dehi
GS24pmbhasuu:98_3: . udaṅ ḷtakaḥ agamat . pratyaṅ ḷtakaḥ agamat . catuṣṭayī śabdānām pravṛttiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:99: jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ kriyāśabdāḥ yadṛcchāśabdāḥ caturthāḥ . aśaktijānukaraṇārthaḥ . aśaktyā kayā cit brāhmaṇyā ṛtakaḥ iti prayoktavye ḷtakaḥ iti prayuktam . tasya anukaraṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:100: brāhmaṇī ḷtakaḥ iti āha . kumārī ḷtakaḥ iti āha iti . plutādyarthaḥ ca ḷkāropadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . ke punaḥ plutādayaḥ . plutidvirvacanasvaritāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:102_0: prakḷptaḥ . plutyādiṣu kāryeṣu kḷpeḥ latvam siddham . tasya siddhatvāt ackāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:102_1: na sidhyanti . tasmāt ḷkāropadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na etāni santi prayojanāni . nyāyyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:102_2: kalpanam sañjñādiṣu . nyāyyasya ṛtakaśabdasya bhāvāt kalpanam sañjñādiṣu sādhu manyante
GS24pmbhasuu:102_3: . ṛtakaḥ eva asau na ḷtakaḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:103_0: nyāyyaḥ ṛtakaśabdaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ asti . saḥ kalpayitavyaḥ sādhuḥ sañjñādiṣu . ṛtakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:103_1: eva asau na ḷtakaḥ . ayam tarhi yadṛcchāśabdaḥ aparihāryaḥ . ḷphiḍaḥ ḷphiḍḍaḥ . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:103_2: api ṛphiḍaḥ ṛphiḍḍaḥ ca . katham . artipravṛttiḥ ca eva loke lakṣyate phiḍiphiḍḍau
GS24pmbhasuu:103_3: auṇādikau pratyayau . trayī ca śabdānām pravṛttiḥ . jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ kriyāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:103_4: iti . na santi yadṛcchāśabdāḥ . anyathā kṛtvā prayojanam uktam anyathā kṛtvā parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:103_5: . santi yadṛcchāśabdāḥ iti kṛtvā prayojanam uktam . na santi iti parihāraḥ . samāne
GS24pmbhasuu:103_6: ca arthe śāstrānvitaḥ aśāstrānvitasya nivartakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . devadattaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:103_7: devadiṇṇaśabdaṃ nivartayati na gāvyādīn . na eṣa doṣaḥ . pakṣāntaraiḥ api parihārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:103_8: bhavanti . anukaraṇam śiṣṭāśiṣṭāpratiṣiddheṣu yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . anukaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:103_9: hi śiṣṭasya sādhu bhavati . aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddhasya vā na eva tat doṣāya bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:103_10: abhyudayāya . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:104: yaḥ evam asau dadāti yaḥ evam asau yajate yaḥ evam asau adhīte iti tasya anukurvan dadyāt ca yajeta ca adhīyīta ca saḥ abhyudayena yujyate . vede api :
GS24pmbhasuu:105_0: ye evam viśvasṛjaḥ sattrāṇi adhyāsate iti teṣām anukurvan tadvat sattrāṇi adhyāsīta
GS24pmbhasuu:105_1: saḥ api abhyudayena yujyate . aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddham . yaḥ evam asau hikkati yaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:105_2: asau hasati yaḥ evam asau kaṇḍūyati iti tasya anukurvan hikket ca haset ca kaṇḍūyet
GS24pmbhasuu:105_3: ca na eva tat doṣāya syāt na abhyudayāya . yaḥ tu khalu evam asau brāhmaṇam hanti
GS24pmbhasuu:105_4: evam asau surām pibati iti tasya anukurvan brāhmaṇam hanyāt surām vā pibet saḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:105_5: manye patitaḥ syāt . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yaḥ ca evam hanti yaḥ ca anuhanti ubhau
GS24pmbhasuu:105_6: tau hataḥ . yaḥ ca pibati yaḥ ca anupibati ubhau tau pibataḥ . yaḥ tu khalu evam
GS24pmbhasuu:105_7: asau brāhmaṇam hanti evam asau surām pibati iti tasya anukurvan snātānuliptaḥ mālyaguṇakaṇṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:105_8: kadalīstambham chindyāt payaḥ vā pibet na sa manye patitaḥ . evam iha api yaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:105_9: asau apaśabdam prayuṅkte iti tasya anukurvan apaśabdam prayuñjīta saḥ api apaśabdabhāk
GS24pmbhasuu:105_10: syāt . ayam tu anyaḥ apaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:105_11: ca apaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ apaśabdaḥ bhavati . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:105_12: yaḥ hi manyeta apaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ apaśabdaḥ bhavati iti apaśabdaḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:105_13: tasya apaśabdaḥ syāt . na ca eṣaḥ apaśabdaḥ . ayam khalu api bhūyaḥ anukaraṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:105_14: aparihāryaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . sādhu ḷkāram adhīte . madhu ḷkāram adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:105_15: iti . kvasthasya punaḥ etat anukaraṇam . kḷpisthasya . yadi kḷpisthasya kḷpeḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:105_16: latvam asiddham tasya asiddhatvāt ṛkāre eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti . bhavet tadarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:105_17: na arthaḥ syāt . ayam tu anyaḥ kḷpisthapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:105_18: . na kartavyaḥ . idam avaśyam vaktavyam . prakṛtivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:106_0: āha . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt . agnī iti āha . īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:106_1: iti pragṛhyasañjñā yathā syāt . yadi prakṛtivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti ucyate apaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:106_2: eva asau bhavati kumārīḷtakaḥ iti āha . brahmaṇī ḷtakaḥ iti āha . apaśabdaḥ hi asya
GS24pmbhasuu:106_3: prakṛtiḥ . na cāpaśabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ . na hi apaśabdāḥ upadiśyante . na ca anupadiṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:106_4: prakṛtiḥ asti. ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvāt plutyādayaḥ . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat
GS24pmbhasuu:106_5: bhavati iti plutyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . yadi ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:106_6: rājñaḥ ka ca rājakīyam allopaḥ anaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat
GS24pmbhasuu:106_7: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya iti vakṣyāmi . yadi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya iti ucyate kḷptaśikha iti
GS24pmbhasuu:106_8: plutaḥ na prāpnoti . na hi atra ṛkāraḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . rephaḥ . ṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:106_9: api atra ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kṛpa uḥ raḥ laḥ kṛpo
GS24pmbhasuu:106_10: ro laḥ iti . atha vā punaḥ astu aviśeṣeṇa . nanu ca uktam . rājñaḥ ka ca rājakīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:106_11: allopaḥ anaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti iti . vakṣyati etat . śvādīnām prasāraṇe nakārāntagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:106_12: anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham iti . tat prakṛtam uttaratra anuvartiṣyate . allopaḥ anaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:106_13: nakārāntasya iti . iha tarhi kḷptaśikha iti anṛtaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ravatpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:106_14: ca . ravatpratiṣedhāt ca etat sidhyati . guroḥ aravataḥ iti vakṣyāmi . yadi aravataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:108: atra na prāpnoti . guroḥ aravataḥ hrasvasya iti vakṣyāmi . saḥ eṣaḥ sūtrabhedena ḷkāraḥ plutyādyarthaḥ san pratyākhyāyate . sā eṣā mahataḥ vaṃśastambāt laṭvā anukṛṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:109: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 idam vicāryate . imāni sandhyakṣarāṇi taparāṇi vā upadiśyeran . et ,
GS24pmbhasuu:113_0: c iti . ataparāṇi vā yathānyāsam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sandhyakṣareṣu taparopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:113_1: cet taparoccāraṇam . sandhyakṣareṣu taparopadeśaḥ cet taparoccāraṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:113_2: plutyādiṣu ajvidhiḥ . plutyādiṣu ajāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ na sidhyati . gotrāta nautrāta
GS24pmbhasuu:113_3: iti atra anaci ca iti acaḥ uttarasya yaraḥ dve bhavataḥ iti dvirvacanam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:113_4: . iha ca pratyaṅ aitikayana udaṅ aupagava iti aci iti ṅamuṭ na prāpnoti . plutasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:113_5: ca . plutasañjñā ca na sidhyati . aitikayana aupagava . ūkalaḥ ac hrasvadīrghaplutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:113_6: iti plutasañjñā na prāpnoti . santu tarhi ataparāṇi . atapare ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:113_7: . yadi ataparāṇi ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ecaḥ hrasvādeśaśāsaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:113_8: ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti . nanu ca yasya api taparāṇi tena api
GS24pmbhasuu:113_9: etat vaktavyam . imau aicau samāhāravarṇau mātrā avarṇasya mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:113_10: tayoḥ hrasvādeśaśāsaneṣu kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau . mā kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:114: aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt iti . yadi pratyākhyānapakṣaḥ idam api pratyākhyāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:115_0: siddham eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt iti . nanu ca eṅaḥ sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:115_1: ca . na tau staḥ . yadi hi tau syātām tau eva ayam upadiśet . nanu ca bhoḥ chandogānām
GS24pmbhasuu:115_2: sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ ardham ekāram ardham okāram ca adhīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:118_0: śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat iti . pārṣadakṛtiḥ eṣā tatrabhavatām . na eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:118_1: loke na anyasmin vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti . ekādeśe dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:118_2: . ekādeśe dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . āt guṇaḥ dīrghaḥ . vṛddhiḥ eci dīrghaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:118_3: kim prayojanam . āntaryataḥ trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:133_0: aupagavaḥ khaṭvaupagavaḥ . tat tarhi dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . upariṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:133_1: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . akaḥ savarṇe ekaḥ bhavati . tataḥ dīrghaḥ . dīrghaḥ ca sa
GS24pmbhasuu:133_2: bhavati yaḥ saḥ ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ iti evam nirdiṣṭaḥ iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . paśum ,
GS24pmbhasuu:135_0: pacanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat paśum iti ami ekaḥ iti iyatā siddham . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:135_1: ayam evam siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yathājātīyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:135_2: pūrvaḥ tathājātīyakaḥ ubhayoḥ yathā syāt iti . viddham iti pūrvaḥ iti eva anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:135_3: . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anena samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:135_4: yat ayam halaḥ uttarasya samprasāraṇasya dīrghatvam śāsti . pacanti iti ataḥ guṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:135_5: paraḥ iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat rūpagrahaṇam karoti tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:135_6: etat prayojanam yathājātīyakam parasya rūpam tathājātīyakam ubhayoḥ yathā syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:135_7: . iha tarhi khaṭvarśyaḥ mālarśyaḥ iti dīrghavacanāt akāraḥ na ānantaryāt ekākaukārau
GS24pmbhasuu:135_8: na . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . vigṛhītasya śravaṇam prasajyeta . na brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:135_9: doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:135_10: . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ . sañjñāvidhau . vṛddhīḥ āt aic dīrghaḥ . at eṅ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:135_11: dīrghaḥ iti . tat tarhi dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kasmāt eva āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:135_12: trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninam trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ na bhavanti . tapare guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:135_13: . nanu ca bhoḥ taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:135_14: iti . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:136_0: yavaḥ stavaḥ . lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:136_1: . kim dakāre prayojanam . atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:136_2: dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:137_0: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 idam vicāryate . ye ete varṇeṣu varṇaikadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:137_1: varṇāntarasamānākṛtayaḥ eteṣām avayavagrahaṇena grahaṇam syāt vā na vā iti . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:137_2: punaḥ iyam vicāraṇā . iha samudāyāḥ api upadiśyante avayavāḥ api . abhyantaraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:138_0: vṛkṣaḥ pracalan saha avayavaiḥ pracalati . tatra samudāyasthasya avayavasya avayavagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:138_1: grahaṇam syāt vā na vā iti jāyate vicāraṇā . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . varṇaikadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:138_2: varṇagrahaṇena cet sandhyakṣre samānākṣaravidhipratiṣedhaḥ . varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:138_3: iti cet sandhyakṣare samānākṣarāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . sa pratiṣedhyaḥ : agne ,
GS24pmbhasuu:140: udakam . akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . dīrghe hrasvavidhipratiṣedhaḥ . dīrghe hrasvākṣarāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . sa pratiṣedhyaḥ . grāmaṇīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:142_0: pralūya . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:142_1: jñāpayati na dīrghe hrasvāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam dīrghāt che tukam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:142_2: . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . padāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:142_3: vā iti vibhāṣām vakṣyāmi iti . yat tarhi yogavibhāgam karoti . itarathā hi dīrghāt
GS24pmbhasuu:142_4: padāntāt vā iti eva brūyāt . iha tarhi khaṭvābhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:145: iti aisbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi yātā vātā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:146_0: ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke iti akāralopaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca atra api taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:146_1: eva na bhaviṣyati . asti hi anyat taparakaraṇe prayojanam . kim . sarvasya lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:146_2: mā bhūt iti . atha kriyamāṇe api tapare parasya lope kṛte pūrvasya kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:146_3: . paralopasya sthānivadbhāvāt asiddhatvāt ca . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:146_4: nākārasthasya akārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:146_5: anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . kitkaraṇe etat prayojanam kiti iti ākārlopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:146_6: yathā syāt iti . yadi ca ākārasthasya api akārlopaḥ syāt kitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:146_7: . parasya akārasya lope kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpe hi siddham rūpam syāt: godaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:147_0: kambaladaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ nākārasthasya akārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:147_1: kakāram anubandham karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . uttarārtham etat syāt . tundaśokayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:147_2: parimṛjāpanudoḥ iti . yat tarhi gāpoḥ ṭhak iti ananyārtham kakāram anubandham karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:147_3: . ekavarṇavat ca . ekavarṇavat ca dīrghaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:147_4: . vācā tarati iti dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ ṭhan mā bhūt iti . iha ca vācaḥ nimittam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:148: tasya nimittam saṃyogotpāttau iti dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ yat mā bhūt iti . atra api gonaugrahaṇam jñāpakam dīrghāt dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ na bhavati iti . ayam tu sarveṣām parihāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:149: na avyapavṛktasya avayave tadvidhiḥ yathā dravyeṣu . na avyapavṛktasya avayavsya avayavāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati yathā dravyeṣu . tat yathā dravyeṣu :
GS24pmbhasuu:150_0: saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ bhavanti iti na saptadaśāratnimātram kāṣṭham agnau abhyādhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:150_1: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . pratyṛcam ca eva hi tat karma codyate asambhavaḥ ca agnau vedyām
GS24pmbhasuu:150_2: ca . yathā tarhi saptadaśa prādeśamātrīḥ aśvatthīḥ samidhaḥ abhyādadhīta iti na saptadaśaprādeśamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:150_3: kāṣṭham abhyādhīyate . atra api pratipravaṇam ca etat karma codyate tulyaḥ ca asambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:150_4: agnau vedyām ca . yathā tarhi tailam na vikretavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:151: māṃsam na vikretavyam iti . vyapavṛtkam ca na vikrīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:152: avyapavṛktam ca gāvaḥ ca sarṣapāḥ ca vikriyante . tathā lomanakham spṛṣṭvā śaucam kartavyam iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:153_0: vyapavṛktam spṛṣṭvā niyogataḥ kartavyam avyapavṛkte kāmacāraḥ . yatra tarhi vyapavargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:153_1: asti . kva ca vyapavargaḥ asti . sandhyakṣareṣu . sandhyakṣareṣu vivṛtatvāt . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:153_2: atra avarṇam vivṛtataram tat anyasmāt avarṇāt . ye*api ivarṇovarṇe vivṛtatare te*anyābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:153_3: ivarṇovarṇābhyām . athavā punaḥ na gṛhyante . agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:153_4: ṛkāragrahaṇam . agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu ṛkārasya grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:154: ṛkāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : ānṛdhatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:155: ānṛdhuḥ iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante dvihalaḥ iti eva tasya siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:156: . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . dvihalgrahaṇam na kariṣyate . tasmāt nuṭ bhavati iti eva . yadi na kriyate āṭatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:157: āṭuḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . aśnotigrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . aśnoteḥ eva avarṇopadhasya na anyasya avarṇopadhasya iti . lādeśe ca ṛkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛpaḥ raḥ laḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:158: ṛkārasya ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : kḷptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:159: kḷptavān iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante raḥ iti eva tasya siddham . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . ṛkāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . katham . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kṛpa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:162: laḥ kṛpo ro laḥ iti . atha vā ubhayataḥ sphoṭamātram nirdiśyate . raśruteḥ laśrutiḥ bhavati iti . vināme ṛkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade ,
GS24pmbhasuu:163: ṛkārāt ca iti vaktayvam iha api yathā syāt : mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:164_0: pitṝṇām iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante raṣābhyām iti eva tasya siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:164_1: . yat tat rephāt param bhakteḥ tena vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . aḍvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:164_2: iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . varṇaikadeśāḥ ke varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante . ye vyapavṛktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:164_3: api varṇāḥ bhavanti . yat ca api rephāt param bhakteḥ na tat kva cit api vyapavṛktam
GS24pmbhasuu:164_4: dṛśyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:164_5: vyavāye . vyavāye ca raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ aṭkupvāṅnumbhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:164_6: idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . etaiḥ eva ākṣarasamamnāyikaiḥ vyavāye na anyaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:164_7: iti . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:164_8: ṛkārāt naḥ ṇatvam iti yat ayam kṣubhādiṣu nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:165_0: nārnamaniḥ . yat tarhi tṛpnotiśabdam paṭhati . yat ca api nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:165_1: . nanu ca uktam vṛddhyartham etat syāt iti . bahiraṅgā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam ṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:165_2: . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ṛto
GS24pmbhasuu:165_3: naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati . tataḥ chandasi avagrahāt . ṛtaḥ iti eva . plutau aicaḥ idutau .
GS24pmbhasuu:165_4: etat ca vaktavyam . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante guroḥ ṭeḥ iti eva plutyā tasya siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:165_5: yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva . tulyarūpe
GS24pmbhasuu:165_6: saṃyoge dvivyañjanavidhiḥ . tulyarūpe saṃyoge dvivyañjanāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ na sidhyati : kukkuṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:167_0: pittam iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante tasya dvau kakārau dvau pakārau dvau takārau .
GS24pmbhasuu:167_1: yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api dvau kakārau dvau pakārau dvau takārau . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:167_2: mātrākālaḥ atra gamyate . na ca mātrikam vyañjanam asti . anupadiṣṭam sat katham
GS24pmbhasuu:167_3: śakyam vijñātum . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra etat na asti aṇ savarṇān
GS24pmbhasuu:167_4: gṛhṇāti iti iha tu katham sayṃyantā savṃvatsaraḥ yalṃ lokam talṃ lokam iti yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:167_5: etat asti aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . atra api mātrākalaḥ gṛhyate na ca mātrikam vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:167_6: asti . anupadiṣṭam sat katham śakyam pratipattum .
GS24pmbhasuu:168_0: (Śs_5.1) KA_I,27.2-20 Ro_I,93-94 sarve varṇāḥ sakṛt upadiṣṭāḥ . ayam hakāraḥ dviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:168_1: upadiśyate pūrvaḥ ca paraḥ ca . yadi punaḥ pūrvaḥ eva upadiśyeta paraḥ eva vā . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:168_2: ca atra viśeṣaḥ . hakārasya paropadeśe aḍgrahaṇeṣu hagrahaṇam . hakārasya paropadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:168_3: aḍgrahaṇeṣu hagrahaṇam kartavyam . ātaḥ aṭi nityam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:170: dīrghāt aṭi samānapade . hakāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:171: mahāṃ hi saḥ . uttve ca . uttve ca hakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . ataḥ roḥ aplutāt aplute ,
GS24pmbhasuu:172: haśi ca . hakāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:174_0: brāhmaṇaḥ hasati iti . astu tarhi pūrvopadeśaḥ . pūrvopadeśe kittvakseḍvidhayaḥ jhalgrahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:174_1: ca . yadi pūrvopadeśaḥ kittvam vidheyam . snihitvā snehitvā sisnihiṣati sisnehiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:174_2: . ralaḥ vyupadhāt halādeḥ iti kittvam na prāpnoti . ksavidhiḥ . ksaḥ ca vidheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:174_3: . adhukṣat alikṣat . śalaḥ igupadhāt aniṭaḥ ksaḥ iti ksaḥ na prāpnoti . iḍvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:174_4: . iṭ ca vidheyaḥ . rudihi svapihi . valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ na prāpnoti. jhalgrahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:174_5: ca . kim . ahakārāṇi syuḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalaḥ jhali iti iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:175: adāgdhām adāgdham . tasmāt pūrvaḥ ca upadeṣṭavyaḥ paraḥ ca . yadi ca kim cit anyatra api upadeśe prayojanam asti tatra api upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:177_0: ayam rephaḥ yakāravakārābhyām pūrvaḥ eva upadiśyeta ha ra ya vaṭ iti paraḥ eva vā
GS24pmbhasuu:177_1: yathānyāsam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . rephasya paropadeśe anunāsikadvirvacanaparasavarṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:177_2: . rephasya paropadeśe anunāsikadvirvacanaparasavarṇānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anunāsikasya :
GS24pmbhasuu:179: prātaḥ nayati iti yaraḥ anunāsike anunāsikaḥ vā iti anunāsikaḥ prāpnoti . dvirvacanasya :
GS24pmbhasuu:181: madrahradaḥ iti yaraḥ iti dvirvacanam prāpnoti . parasavarṇasya :
GS24pmbhasuu:183_0: vanam rathena . anusvārasya yayi iti parasavarṇaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi pūrvopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:183_1: . pūrvopadeśe kittvapratiṣedhaḥ vyalopavacanam ca . yadi pūrvopadeśaḥ kittvam pratiṣedhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:183_2: . devitvā dideviṣati . ralaḥ vyupadhāt iti kittvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:183_3: evam vijñāyate ralaḥ vyupadhāt iti . kim tarhi . ralaḥ avvyupadhāt iti . kim idam
GS24pmbhasuu:183_4: avvyupadhāt iti . avakārāntāt vyuvpadhāt avvyupadhāt iti . vyalopavacanam ca . vyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:185_0: jīradānuḥ . vali iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . rephaḥ api atra nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:185_1: . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti rephe ca vali ca iti . atha vā punaḥ astu paropadeśaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:185_2: ca uktam rephasya paropadeśe anunāsikadvirvacanaparasavarṇapratiṣedhaḥ iti . anunāsikaparasavarṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:185_3: tāvat pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ . rephoṣmaṇām savarṇāḥ na santi . dvirvacane api na
GS24pmbhasuu:185_4: imau rahau kāryiṇau dvirvacanasya . kim tarhi . nimittam imau rahau dvirvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:185_5: . tat yathā . brāhmaṇāḥ bhojyantām . māṭharakauṇḍinyau pariveviṣṭām iti. na idānīm tau bhuñjāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:186_0: (Śs_5.3) KA_I,28.16-29.28 Ro_I,97-101 idam vicāryate . ime ayogavāhāḥ na kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:186_1: upadiśyante śrūyante ca . teṣām kāryārthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . ke punaḥ ayogavāhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:186_3: . yat ayuktāḥ vahanti anupadiṣṭāḥ ca śrūyante . kva punaḥ eṣām upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:186_4: . ayogavāhānām aṭsu ṇatvam . ayogavāhānām aṭsu upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:187_0: uraḥpeṇa : aḍvyavāye iti ṇatvam siddham bhavati . śarṣu jaśbhāvaṣatve . śarṣu upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:187_1: kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . jaśbhāvaṣatve . ayam ubjiḥ upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:187_2: . tasya jaśtve kṛte ubjitā ubjitum iti etat rūpam yathā syāt . yadi ubjiḥ upadhmānīyopadhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:187_3: paṭhyate ubjijiṣati iti upadhmānīyādeḥ eva dvirvacanam prāpnoti. dakāropadhe punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:187_4: nandrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ iti pratiṣedhasḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi dakāropadhaḥ paṭhyate kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:188_0: ubjitā ubjitum iti . asiddhe bhaḥ udjeḥ . idam asti stoḥ ścunā ścuḥ iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:188_1: bhaḥ udjeḥ . udjeḥ ścunā sannipāte bhaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:188_2: . nipātanāt eva siddham . kim nipātanam . bhujanyubjau paṇyupatapayoḥ iti . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:189_0: samudgaḥ iti . akutvaviṣaye tat nipātanam . atha vā na etat ubjeḥ rūpam . gameḥ dvyuparsargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:189_1: ḍaḥ vidhīyate . abhyudgataḥ abhyudgaḥ . samudgataḥ samudgaḥ iti . ṣatvam ca prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:189_2: . sarpiḥṣu dhanuḥṣu . śarvyavāye iti ṣatvam siddham bhavati . numvisarjanīyaśarvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:189_3: api iti visarjanīyagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . numaḥ ca api tarhi grahaṇam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:189_4: akartum . katham sarpīṃṣi dhanūṃṣi . anusvāre kṛte śarvyavāye iti eva siddham . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:189_5: numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam anusvāraviśeṣaṇam numgrahaṇam numaḥ yaḥ anusvāraḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:190_0: puṃsu iti . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . aviśeṣeṇa saṃyogopadhāsañjñālontyadvirvacanasthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:190_1: . aviśeṣeṇa saṃyogasañjñā prayojanam . ūbjaka . halaḥ anantarāḥ saṃyogaḥ iti saṃyogasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:190_2: saṃyoge guru iti gurusañjñā guroḥ iti plutaḥ bhavati . upadhāsañjñā ca prayojanam . duṣkṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:193_0: duṣpītam . idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya iti ṣatvam siddham bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:193_1: prayojanam . na idudupadhagrahaṇanena visarjanīyaḥ viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:193_2: viśeṣyate . idudupadhasya sakārasya yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti . atha vā upadhāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:193_3: na kariṣyate . idudbhyām tu visarjanīyam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . idudbhyām uttarasya visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:193_4: iti . alaḥ antyavidhiḥ prayojanam . vṛkṣaḥ tarati . plakṣaḥ tarati . alaḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:193_5: vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti alaḥ antyasya satvam siddham bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:193_6: . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti visarjanīyasya eva bhaviṣyati . dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:194: uraḥpaḥ . anaci ca . acaḥ uttarasya yaraḥ dve bhavataḥ iti dvirvacanam siddham bhavati . sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ ca prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati uraḥkeṇa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:195: uraḥpeṇa iti aḍvyavāye api iti ṇatvam evam iha api sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti vyūḍhoraskena mahoraskena iti . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:196_0: (Śs_5.4) KA_I,30.1-32.11 Ro_I,101-106 kim punaḥ ime varṇāḥ arthavantaḥ āhosvit anarthakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:198: adhīte iti . prātipadikani ekavarṇāni arthavanti : ābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:202_0: a*apehi . i*indram paśya . u*uttiṣṭha . dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām ekavarṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:202_1: arthadarśanāt manyāmahe arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ iti . varṇavyatyaye ca arthāntaragamanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:202_2: . varṇavyatyaye ca arthāntaragamanāt manyāmahe arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ iti . kūpaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:204_0: yūpaḥ iti . kūpaḥ iti sakakāreṇa kaḥ cit arthaḥ gamyate . sūpaḥ iti kakārāpāye sakāropajane
GS24pmbhasuu:204_1: ca arthāntaram gamyate . yūpaḥ iti kakārasakārāpāye yakāropajane ca arthāntatam gamyate . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:205_0: yaḥ kūpe kūpārthaḥ saḥ kakārasya . yaḥ sūpe sūpārthaḥ saḥ sakārasya . yaḥ yūpe yūpārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:205_1: saḥ yakārasya iti . varṇānupalabdhau ca anarthagateḥ . varṇānupalabdhau ca anarthagateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:208_0: āṇḍīraḥ . vṛkṣaḥ iti sakakāreṇa kaḥ cit arthaḥ gamyate . ṛkṣaḥ iti vakārāpāye saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:208_1: arthaḥ na gamyate . kāṇḍīraḥ iti sakakāreṇa kaḥ cit arthaḥ gamyate . āṇḍīraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:208_2: kakārāpāye saḥ arthaḥ na gamyate . kim tarhi ucyate anarthagateḥ iti . na sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:208_3: hi atra arthasya gatiḥ bhavati . evam tarhi idam paṭhitavyam syāt . varṇānupalabdhau
GS24pmbhasuu:208_4: ca atadarthagateḥ . kim idam atadarthagateḥ iti . tasya arthaḥ tadarthaḥ . tadarthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:208_5: gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ . na tadarthagatiḥ atadarthagatiḥ . atadarthagateḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:208_6: vā saḥ arthaḥ tadarthaḥ . tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ . na tadarthagatiḥ atadarthagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:208_7: . atadarthagateḥ iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:210_0: kharamukham iva mukham asya kharamukhaḥ . evam atadarthagateḥ anarthagateḥ . saṅghātārthavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:210_1: ca . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca manyāmahe arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ iti . yeṣām saṅghātāḥ arthavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:210_2: avayavāḥ api teṣām arthavantaḥ . yeṣām punaḥ avayavāḥ anarthakāḥ samudāyāḥ api teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:211_0: ekaḥ cakṣuṣmān darśane samarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca śatam api samartham . ekaḥ ca tilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:211_1: tailadāne samarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca khārī api samarthā . yeṣām punaḥ avayavāḥ anarthakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:211_2: samudāyāḥ api teṣām anarthakāḥ . tat yathā:
GS24pmbhasuu:212_0: ekaḥ andhaḥ darśane asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca śatam api asamartham . ekā ca sikatā
GS24pmbhasuu:212_1: tailadāne asamarthā tatsamudāyaḥ ca khārīśatam api asamartham . yadi tarhi ime varṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:212_2: arthavantaḥ arthavatkṛtāni prāpnuvanti . kāni . arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:212_3: prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ subantam padam iti padasañjñā . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:213_0: vanam iti . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt subabhāvaḥ varṇāt . saṅghātasya ekatvam arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:213_1: . tena varṇāt subutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . anarthakāḥ tu prativarṇam arthānupalabdheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:213_2: . anarthakāḥ tu varṇāḥ . kutaḥ . prativarṇam arthānupalabdheḥ . na hi prativarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:213_3: arthāḥ upalabhyante . kim idam prativarṇam iti . varṇam varṇam prati prativarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:213_5: arthadarśanāt manyāmahe anarthakāḥ varṇāḥ iti . varṇavyatyaye:
GS24pmbhasuu:216: hiṃseḥ siṃhaḥ . varṇavyatyayaḥ na arthavyatyayaḥ . apāyaḥ lopaḥ . ghnanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:218: aghnan . varṇāpāyaḥ nārthāpāyaḥ . upajanaḥ āgamaḥ . lavitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:219: lavitum . varṇopajanaḥ na arthopajanaḥ . vikāraḥ ādeśaḥ . ghātayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:220_0: ghātakaḥ . varṇavikāraḥ na arthavikāraḥ . yathā eva varṇavyatyayāpāyopajanavikārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:220_1: bhavanti tadvat arthavyatyayāpāyopajanavikāraiḥ bhavitavyam . na ca iha tadvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:220_2: ataḥ manyāmahe anarthakāḥ varṇāḥ iti . ubhayam idam varṇeṣu uktam arthavantaḥ anarthakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:220_3: iti ca . kim atra nyāyyam . ubhayam iti āha . kutaḥ . svabhāvataḥ . tat yathā:
GS24pmbhasuu:221: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum ,
GS24pmbhasuu:222_0: kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum
GS24pmbhasuu:222_1: . yat dhātupratyayaprātipadikanipātāḥ ekavarṇāḥ arthavantaḥ ataḥ anye anarthakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:222_2: iti svābhāvikam etat . katham yaḥ eṣaḥ bhavatā varṇānām arthavattāyām hetuḥ upadiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:222_3: arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām ekavarṇānām arthadarśanāt varṇavyatyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:222_4: ca arthāntaragamanāt varṇānupalabdhau ca anarthagateḥ saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti . saṅghātāntarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:223: eva etāni evañjātīyakāni arthāntareṣu vartante: kūpaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:225_0: yūpaḥ iti . yadi hi varṇavyatyayakṛtam arthāntaragamanam syāt bhūyiṣṭhaḥ kūpārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:225_1: sūpe syāt sūpārthaḥ ca kūpe kūpārthaḥ ca yūpe yūpārthaḥ ca kūpe sūpārthaḥ ca yūpe
GS24pmbhasuu:225_2: yūpārthaḥ ca sūpe . yataḥ tu khalu na kaḥ cit kūpasya vā sūpe sūpasya vā kūpe kūpasya
GS24pmbhasuu:225_3: vā yūpe yūpasya vā kūpe sūpasya vā yūpe yūpasya vā sūpe ataḥ manyāmahe saṅghātāntarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:225_4: eva etāni evañjātīyakāni arthāntareṣu vartante iti . idam khalu api bhavatā varṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:225_5: arthavattām bruvatā sādhīyaḥ anarthakatvam dyotitam . yaḥ manyate yaḥ kūpe kūpārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:225_6: saḥ kakārasya sūpe sūpārthaḥ saḥ sakārasya yūpe yūpārthaḥ saḥ yakārasya iti ūpaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:225_7: tasya anarthakaḥ syāt . tatra idam aparihṛtam saṅghātārthavattvāt ca . etasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:231_0: auc . pratyāhāre anubandhānām katham ajgrahaṇeṣu na . ye ete akṣu pratyāhārārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:231_1: anubandhāḥ kriyante eteṣām ajgrahaṇeṣu grahaṇam kasmāt na bhavati . kim ca syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:231_2: dadhi ṇakārīyati madhu ṇakārīyati iti . ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti yaṇādeśaḥ prasajyeta . ācārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:231_3: . kim idam ācārāt iti . ācāryāṇām upacārāt . na eteṣu ācāryāḥ ackāryāṇi kṛtavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:231_4: . apradhānatvāt . apradhānatvāt ca . na khalu api eteṣām akṣu prādhānyena upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:231_5: kriyate . kva tarhi . halṣu . kutaḥ etat . eṣā hi ācāryasya śailī lakṣyate yat tulyajātīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:231_6: tulyajātīyeṣu upadiśati . acaḥ akṣu halaḥ halṣu . lopaḥ ca balavattaraḥ . lopaḥ khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:231_7: api tāvat bhavati . ūkālaḥ ac iti vā yogaḥ tatkālānām yathā bhavet acām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:231_8: ackāryam tena eteṣām na bhaviṣyati . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ūkālaḥ ac .
GS24pmbhasuu:231_9: u ū u3 iti evaṅkālaḥ ac bhavati . tataḥ hrasvadīrghaplutaḥ . hrasvadīrghaplutasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:231_10: ca bhavati ūkālaḥ ac . evam api kukkuṭaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tasmāt pūrvoktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:231_11: eva parihāraḥ . eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ. aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:232: hrasvādīnām vacanāt prāk yāvat tāvat eva yogaḥ astu ackāryāṇi yathā syuḥ tatkāleṣu akṣu kāryāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:233_0: (Śs_5.6) KA_I,33.5-34.2 Ro_I,108-110 atha kimartham antaḥsthānām aṇsu upadeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:233_1: . iha sayṃyṃyantā savṃvṃvatsaraḥ yalṃ lṃlokam talṃ lṃlokam iti parasavarṇasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:233_2: anusvārasya eva dvirvacanam . tatra parasya parasavarṇe kṛte tasya yaygrahaṇena grahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:233_3: pūrvasya api parasavarṇaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:233_4: dvirvacane parasavarṇatvam siddham vaktavyam iti . yāvatā siddhatvam ucyate parasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:233_5: eva tāvad bhavati . parasavarṇe tarhi kṛte tasya yargrahaṇeṇa grahaṇāt dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:233_6: yathā syāt . mā bhūt dvirvacanam . nanu ca bhedaḥ bhavati. sati dvirvacane triyakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:233_7: asati dvirvacane dviyakāram . na asti bhedaḥ . sati api dvirvacane dviyakāram eva
GS24pmbhasuu:233_8: . katham . halaḥ yamām yami lopaḥ iti evam ekasya lopena bhavitavyam . evam api bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:233_9: . sati dvirvacane kadā cit dviyakāram kadā cit triyakāram . saḥ eṣaḥ katham bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:233_10: na syāt . yadi nityaḥ lopaḥ syāt . vibhāṣā ca saḥ lopaḥ . yathā abhedaḥ tathā astu
GS24pmbhasuu:233_11: . anuvartate vibhāṣā śaraḥ aci yat vārayati ayam dvitvam . yat ayam śaraḥ aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:233_12: dvirvacanapratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anuvartate vibhāṣā iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:233_13: kṛtvā jñāpakam . nitye hi tasya lope pratiṣedhārthaḥ na kaḥ cit syāt . yadi nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:233_14: lopaḥ syāt pratiṣedhavacanam anarthakam syāt . astu atra dvirvacanam . jharaḥ jhari
GS24pmbhasuu:233_15: savarṇe iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ vibhāṣā saḥ lopaḥ iti . tataḥ dvirvacanapratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:233_16: śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . nitye api tasya lope saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ avaśyam vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:233_17: . yat etat acaḥ rahābhyām iti dvirvacanam lopāpavādaḥ saḥ vijñāyate . katham . yaraḥ
