GS24pmbhasuu:233_18: iti ucyate . etāvantaḥ ca yaraḥ yat uta jharaḥ vā yamaḥ vā . yadi ca atra nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:233_19: lopaḥ syāt dvirvacanam anarthakam syāt . kim tarhi tayoḥ yogayoḥ udāharaṇam . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:236: harttā iti dvirvacanasāmarthyāt lopaḥ na bhavati . evam iha api lopaḥ na syāt:
GS24pmbhasuu:238: karṣati varṣati iti . tasmāt nitye api lope avaśyam saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tat etat atyantam sandigdham vartate ācāryāṇām vibhāṣā anuvartate na vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:239_0: (Śs_6) KA_I,34.4-35.18 Ro_I,111-115 ayam ṇakāraḥ dviḥ anubadhyate pūrvaḥ ca paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:239_1: ca . tatra aṇgrahaṇeṣu iṇgrahaṇeṣu ca sandehaḥ bhavati pūrveṇa vā syuḥ pareṇa vā
GS24pmbhasuu:239_2: iti . katarasmin tāvat aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ . ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrghaḥ aṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:239_3: asandigdham pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt . na hi ḍhralope pare aṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:240_0: ātṛḍham āvṛḍham iti . evam tarhi sāmarthyāt pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi hi pareṇa syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:240_1: aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti eva brūyāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:240_2: vā etat api na brūyāt . acaḥ hi etat bhavati hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti . asmin tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:240_3: aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ ke aṇaḥ iti . asandigdham pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:240_4: . na hi ke pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu ca ayam asti . gokā naukā iti . evam tarhi sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:240_5: pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi hi pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . ke acaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:240_6: eva brūyāt . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . acaḥ hi etat bhavati hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:240_7: iti . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti . asandigdham
GS24pmbhasuu:240_8: pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt . na hi padāntāḥ pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:240_9: ca ayam asti kartṛ hartṛ iti . evam tarhi sāmarthyāt pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi hi
GS24pmbhasuu:240_10: pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .acaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti eva brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:240_11: . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . acaḥ eva hi pragṛhyāḥ bhavanti . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:240_12: sandehaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . asandigdham pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:240_13: . na hi uḥ sthāne pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu ca ayam asti kartrartham hartrartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:240_14: . kim ca syāt . yadi atra raparatvam syāt dvayoḥ rephayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:240_15: yamām yami lopaḥ iti evam ekasya atra lopaḥ bhavati. vibhāṣā saḥ lopaḥ . vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:240_16: śravaṇam prasajyeta . ayam tarhi nityaḥ lopaḥ raḥ ri iti . padāntasya iti evam saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:240_17: . na śakyaḥ padāntasya vijñātum . iha hi lopaḥ na syāt jargṛdheḥ laṅ ajarghāḥ pāspardheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:240_18: apāspāḥ iti . iha tarhi mātṝṇām pitṝṇām iti raparatvam prasajyeta . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:240_19: jñāpayati na atra raparatvam bhavati iti yat ayam ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ iti dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:240_20: karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . dhātugrahaṇasya etat prayojanam . iha mā bhūt : mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:241_0: pitṝṇām iti . yadi ca atra raparatvam syāt dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . raparatve
GS24pmbhasuu:241_1: kṛte anantyatvāt ittvam na bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na atra raparatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:241_2: iti tataḥ dhātugrahaṇam karoti . iha api tarhi ittvam na prāpnoti cikīrṣati jihīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:241_3: iti . mā bhūt evam . upadhāyāḥ ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:242_0: pitṝṇām iti . tasmāt tatra dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . evam tarhi aṇgrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:242_1: pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . uḥ ac raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:242_2: eva brūyāt . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:243_0: aṇuditsavarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti . asandigdham pareṇa na pūrveṇa iti. kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:243_1: . savarṇe aṇ taparam hi uḥ ṛt . yat ayam uḥ ṛt iti ṛkāram taparam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:243_2: ācāryaḥ pareṇa na pūrveṇa . iṇgrahaṇeṣu tarhi sandehaḥ . asandigdham pareṇa na pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:243_3: iti. kutaḥ etat . yvoḥ anyatra pareṇa iṇ syāt . yatra icchati pūrveṇa sammṛdya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:243_4: tatra karoti yvoḥ iti . tat ca guru bhavati . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . tatra vibhaktinirdeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:243_5: sammṛdya grahaṇe ardhacatasraḥ mātrāḥ . pratyāhāragrahaṇe punaḥ tisraḥ mātrāḥ . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:243_6: ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:243_7: ācāryaḥ pareṇa na pūrveṇa iti . kim punaḥ varṇotsattau iva ṇakāraḥ dviḥ anubadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:243_8: . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:243_9: hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti. aṇuditsavarṇam parihāya pūrveṇa aṇgrahaṇam pareṇa iṇgrahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:244_0: (Śs_7-8.1) KA_I,35.20-36.4 Ro_I,115-116 kimartham imau mukhanāsikāvacanau varṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:244_1: ubhau api anubadhyete na ñakāra eva anubadhyeta . katham yāni makāreṇa grahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:244_2: halaḥ yamām yami lopaḥ iti . santu ñakāreṇa halaḥ yañām yañi lopaḥ iti . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:244_3: śakyam. jhakārabhakāraparayoḥ api hi jhakārabhakāryoḥ lopaḥ prasajyeta . na jhakārabhakārau
GS24pmbhasuu:244_4: jhakārabhakārayoḥ staḥ . katham pumaḥ khayyi ampare iti . etat api astu ñakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:244_5: pumaḥ khayyi añpare iti . na evam śakyam . jhakārabhakārapare hi khayyi ruḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:244_6: . na jhakārabhakāraparaḥ khay asti .katham ṅamaḥ hrasvāt aci ṅamuṭ nityam iti . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:244_7: api astu ñakāreṇa ṅañaḥ hrasvāt aci ṅañuṭ nityam iti . na evam śakyam . jhakārabhakāraparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:244_8: api hi padāntayoḥ jhakārabhakārau āgamau syātām . na jhakārabhakārau padāntau staḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:244_9: . evam api pañca āgamāḥ trayaḥ āgaminau vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:244_10: santu tāvat yeṣām āgamānām āgaminaḥ santi . jhakārabhakārau padāntau na staḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:245_0: (Śs_7-8.2) KA_I,36.5-11 Ro_I,117 atha kim idam akṣaram iti . akṣaram na kṣaram vidyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:245_1: . na kṣīyate na kṣarati iti vā akṣaram . aśnoteḥ vā saraḥ akṣaram . aśnoteḥ vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:245_2: ayam auṇādikaḥ saranpratyayaḥ . varṇam vā āhuḥ pūrvasūtre . atha vā pūrvasūtre varṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:246_0: (Śs_7-8.3) KA_I,36.12-18 Ro_I,118-120 kimartham idam upadiśyate . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:246_1: idam upadiśyate . varṇajñānam vāgviṣayaḥ yatra brahma vartate . tadartham iṣṭadbuddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:246_2: laghvartham ca upadiśyate . saḥ ayam akṣarasamāmnāyaḥ vāksamāmnāyaḥ puṣpitaḥ phalitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:246_4: ca asya jñāne bhavati . mātāpitarau ca asya svarge loke mahīyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:248_0: 121-123 kutvam kasmāt na bhavati coḥ kuḥ padasya iti . bhatvāt . katham bhasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:248_1: . ayasmayādīni chandasi iti . chandasi iti ucyate . na ca idam chandaḥ . chandovat
GS24pmbhasuu:248_2: sūtrāṇi bhavanti . yadi bhasañjñā vṛddhiḥ ād aic at eṅ guṇaḥ iti jaśtvam api na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:248_3: . ubhayasañjñāni api chandāṃsi dṛśyante . tat yathā . saḥ suṣṭubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:248_4: . padatvāt kutvam bhatvāt jaśvtam na bhavati . evam iha api bhatvāt kutvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:251_0: vṛddhiḥ iti evam ye ākāraikāraukārāḥ bhāvyante teṣām grahaṇam āhosvit ādaijmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:251_1: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tadbhāvitagrahaṇam śālīyaḥ mālīyaḥ iti vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ chaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:251_2: prāpnoti . āmramayam śālamayam vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ mayaṭ na prāpnoti . āmraguptāyaniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:251_3: śālaguptayaniḥ vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ phiñ na prāpnoti . atha aijmātrasya grahaṇam sarvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:251_4: bhāsaḥ sarvabhāsaḥ iti uttarapadapadavṛddhau sarvam ca iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:251_5: iha ca tāvatī bhāryā asya tāvadbhāryaḥ yāvadbhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:251_6: prāpnoti . astu tarhi aijmātrasya . nanu ca uktam sarvaḥ bhāsaḥ sarvabhāsaḥ iti uttarapadapadavṛddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:251_7: sarvam ca iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:251_8: vṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhau iti . katham tarhi . uttarapadasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:251_9: evam prakṛtya yā vṛddhiḥ tadvati uttarapade iti evam etat vijñāyate . avaśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:251_10: etat evam vijñeyam . tadbhāvitagrahaṇe sati api iha prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:252_0: sarvaḥ kārakaḥ sarvakārakaḥ iti . yad api ucyate iha tāvatī bhāryā asya tāvadbhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:252_1: yāvadbhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti iti na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:252_2: . na evam vijñāyate vṛddheḥ nimittam vṛddhinimittam vṛddhinimittasya iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:252_3: tarhi . vṛddheḥ nimittam yasmin saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:252_4: ca vṛddheḥ nimittam. yaḥ asau kakāraḥ ṇakāraḥ ñakāraḥ vā . atha vā yaḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:252_5: vṛddheḥ nimittam . kaḥ ca kṛtsnāyāḥ vṛddheḥ nimittam . yaḥ trayāṇām ākāraikāraukārāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:254_0: 125-133 sañjñādhikāraḥ sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ . atha sañjñā iti prakṛtya vṛddhyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:254_1: śabdāḥ paṭhitavyāḥ . kim prayojanam . sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ . vṛddhyādīnām śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:254_2: sañjñā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt . itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ yathā loke .
GS24pmbhasuu:254_3: akriyamāṇe hi sañjñādhikāre vṛddhyādīnām sañjñā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ na syāt . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:254_4: idānīm bahusūtram anarthakam syāt . anarthakam iti āha . katham . yathā loke . loke
GS24pmbhasuu:254_5: hi arthavanti ca anarthakāni ca vākyāni dṛśyante . arthavanti tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:255_0: devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām daṇḍena . devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām iti . anarthakāni
GS24pmbhasuu:255_1: ca . daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṭ apūpāḥ kuṇḍam ajājinam palalapiṇḍaḥ adhorukam etat kumāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:255_2: sphaiyakṛtasya pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti . sañjñāsañjñyasandehaḥ ca . kriyamāṇe api sañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:255_3: sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kutaḥ hi etat vṛddhiśabdaḥ sañjñā ādaicaḥ sañjñinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:255_4: iti . na punaḥ ādaicaḥ sañjñā vṛddhiśabdaḥ sañjñī iti . yat tāvat ucyate sañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:255_5: kartavyaḥ sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ iti na kartavyaḥ . ācāryācārāt sañjñāsiddhiḥ . ācāryācārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:255_6: sañjñāsiddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kim idam ācāryācārāt . ācāryāṇām upacārāt . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:255_7: . tat yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:256: mātāpitarau putrasya jātasya saṃvṛte avakāśe nāma kurvāte devadattaḥ yajñadattaḥ iti . tayoḥ upacārāt anye api jānanti iyam asya sañjñā iti . vede :
GS24pmbhasuu:257_0: yājñikāḥ sañjñām kurvanti sphyaḥ yūpaḥ caṣālaḥ iti . tatrabhavatām upacārāt anye
GS24pmbhasuu:257_1: api jānanti iyam asya sañjñā iti . apare punaḥ sici vṛddhiḥ iti uktvā ākāraikāraukārān
GS24pmbhasuu:258_0: yayā pratyāyyante sā sañjñā ye pratīyante te sañjñinaḥ iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:258_1: api sañjñādhikāre sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . sañjñāsañjñyasandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258_2: . sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ siddhaḥ . kutaḥ . ācāryācārāt eva . uktaḥ ācāryācāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258_3: . anākṛtiḥ . atha vā anākṛtiḥ sañjñā . ākṛtimantaḥ sañjñinaḥ . loke api hi ākrtimataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258_4: māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā kriyate . liṅgena vā . atha vā kim cit liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:258_5: āsajya vakṣyāmi itthaṃliṅgā sañjñā iti . vṛddhiśabde ca tat liṅgam kariṣyate na ādaicchabde
GS24pmbhasuu:258_6: . idam tāvat ayuktam yat ucyate ācāryācārāt iti . kim atra ayuktam . tam eva upālabhya
GS24pmbhasuu:258_7: agamakam te sūtram iti tasya eva punaḥ pramāṇīkaraṇam iti etat ayuktam . aparituṣyan
GS24pmbhasuu:258_8: khalu api bhavān anena parihāreṇa ākṛtiḥ liṅgena vā iti āha . tat ca api vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:258_9: . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi itsañjñā na vaktavyā lopaḥ ca na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258_10: . sañjñāliṅgam anubandheṣu kariṣyate . na ca sañjñāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ ucyate . svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258_11: sañjñāḥ sañjñinaḥ pratyāyya nivartante . tena anubandhānām api nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:258_12: . sidhyati evam . apāṇinīyam tu bhavati . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam sañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258_13: sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ yathā loke iti . na yathā loke tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:258_14: vyākaraṇe . pramāṇabhūtaḥ ācāryaḥ darbhapavitrapāṇiḥ śucau avakāśe prāṅmukhaḥ upaviśya
GS24pmbhasuu:258_15: mahatā yatnena sūtram praṇayati sma . tatra aśakyam varṇena api anarthakena bhavitum
GS24pmbhasuu:258_16: kim punaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa . kim ataḥ yat aśakyam . ataḥ sañjñāsañjñinau eva . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258_17: nu khalu etat sañjñāsañjñinau eva iti na punaḥ sādhvanuśāsane asmin śāstre sādhutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:258_18: anena kiryate . kṛtam anayoḥ sādhutvam . katham . vṛdhiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258_19: prakṛtipāṭhe . tasmāt ktinpratyayaḥ . ādaicaḥ api akṣarasamāmnāye upadiṣṭāḥ . prayoganiyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:258_20: tarhi idam syāt . vṛddhiśabdāt paraḥ ādaicaḥ prayoktavyāḥ iti . na iha prayoganiyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258_21: ārabhyate . kim tarhi . saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya padāni utsṛjyante . teṣām yatheṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:260_0: pātram āhara iti . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime syuḥ . vṛddhiśabdasya ādaicaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:260_1: ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . āgamāḥ tarhi ime syuḥ . vṛddhiśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:260_2: ādaicaḥ āgamāḥ . āgamāḥ api ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya eva ucyante liṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:261_0: ca . na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm na khalu api āgamaliṅgam paśyāmaḥ . idam khalu api bhūyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:261_1: sāmanādhikaraṇyam ekavibhaktikatvam ca . dvayoḥ ca etat bhavati . kayoḥ . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:261_2: vā sañjñāsañjñinoḥ vā . tatra etat syāt viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye iti . tat ca na . dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:261_3: hi pratītpadārthakayoḥ loke viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ bhavati . na ca ādaicchabdaḥ pratītapadārthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:261_4: . tasmāt sañjñāsañjñinau eva . tatra tu etāvān sandedhaḥ kaḥ sañjñī kā sañjñā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:261_5: . saḥ ca api kva sandehaḥ . yatra ubhe samānākṣare . yatra tu anyatarat laghu yat
GS24pmbhasuu:261_6: laghu sā sañjñā . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra api ayam na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:261_7: gurulaghutām eva upalakṣayitum arhati . kim tarhi . anākṛtitām api . anākṛtiḥ sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:261_8: . ākṛtimantaḥ sañjñinaḥ . loke hi ākṛtimataḥ māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:261_9: kriyate . atha vā āvartinyaḥ sañjñāḥ bhavanti . vṛddhiśabdaḥ ca āvartate na ādaicchabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:261_10: . tat yathā . itaratra api devadattaśabdaḥ āvartate na māṃsapiṇḍaḥ . atha vā pūrvoccāritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:261_11: sañjñī paroccāritā sañjñā . kutaḥ etat . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:261_12: tat yathā . itaratra api sataḥ māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā kriyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:261_13: vṛddhiḥ āt aic iti . etat ekam ācāryasya maṅgalārtham mṛṣyatām . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:261_14: mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham vṛddhiśabam āditaḥ prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni hi
GS24pmbhasuu:261_15: śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi ca . adhyetāraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:261_16: siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . sarvatra eva hi vyākaraṇe pūrvoccāritaḥ sañjñī paroccāritā
GS24pmbhasuu:261_17: sañjñā . at eṅ guṇaḥ iti yathā . doṣavān khalu api sañjñādhikāraḥ . aṣṭame api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:261_18: sañjñā kriyate tasya param āmreḍitam iti . tatra api idam anuvartyam syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:261_19: vā asthāne ayam yatnaḥ kriyate . na hi idam lokāt bhidyate . yadi idam lokāt bhidyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:261_20: tataḥ yatnārham syāt . tat yathā agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakthani karṇe vā gṛhītvā upadiśati
GS24pmbhasuu:261_21: ayam gauḥ iti . na ca asmai ācaṣṭe iyam asya sañjñā iti . bhavati ca asya sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:261_22: . tatra etat syāt kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ iti . iha api kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:261_23: . kaiḥ . ācāryaiḥ . tatra etat syāt . yasmai samprati upadiśati tasya akṛtaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:261_24: . loke api yasmai samprati upadiśati tasya akṛtaḥ . atha tatra kṛtaḥ iha api kṛtaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:263_0: 133-134 sataḥ vṛddhyādiṣu sañjñābhāvāt tadāśraye itaretarāśrayatvāt asiddhiḥ . sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:263_1: sañjñinaḥ sañjñābhāvāt sañjñāśraye sañjñini vṛddhyādiṣu itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:263_2: . kā iteretarāśrayatā . satām ādaicām sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca ādaicaḥ bhāvyante
GS24pmbhasuu:264_0: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . tat yathā . nauḥ nāvi baddhā na itaratrāṇāya
GS24pmbhasuu:264_1: bhavati. nanu ca bhoḥ itaretarāśrayāṇi api kāryāṇi dṛśyante . tat yathā . nauḥ śakaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:264_2: vahati śakaṭam ca nāvam vahati . anyat api tatra kim cit bhavati jalam sthalam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:264_3: . sthale śakaṭam nāvam vahati . jale nauḥ śakaṭam vahati . yathā tari triviṣṭabdhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:264_4: . tatra api antataḥ sūtrakam bhavati . idam punaḥ itaretarāśrayam eva . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:264_5: nityaśabdatvāt . siddham etat . katham . nityaśabdatvāt . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:264_6: śabdeṣu satām ādaicām sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā ādaicaḥ bhāvyante . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:264_7: nityāḥ śabdāḥ kimartham śāstram . kimartham śāstram iti cet nivartakatvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:264_8: . nivartakam śāstram . katham . mṛjiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ . tasya sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:264_9: mṛjibuddhiḥ prasaktā . tatra anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . mṛjeḥ akṅitsu pratyayeṣu mṛjiprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:266_0: 134-136 pratyekam vṛddhiguṇasañjñe bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:266_1: mā bhūtām iti . anyatra sahavacanāt samudāye sañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . anyatra sahavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:266_2: samudāye vṛddhiguṇasañjñayoḥ aprasaṅgaḥ . yatra icchati sahabhūtānām kāryam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:266_3: tatra sahagrahaṇam . tat yathā . saha supā . ubhe abhyastam saha iti . pratyavayavam
GS24pmbhasuu:266_4: ca vākyaparisamāpteḥ . pratyavayavam ca vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:266_5: bhojyantām iti . na ca ucyate pratyekam iti . pratyekam ca bhujiḥ parisamāpyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:266_6: nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:266_7: śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti

GS24pmbhasuu:268_1: . ākārasya taparakaraṇam kriyate . kim prayojanam . savarṇārtham . taparaḥ tatkālasya

GS24pmbhasuu:268_8: katham punaḥ jñāyate bhedakāḥ guṇāḥ iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . ekaḥ ayam ātmā udakam

GS24pmbhasuu:281_1: anubandham karoti . sandhyakṣarārthena api na arthaḥ . upadeśasāmarthyāt sandhyakṣarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:281_2: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . vyañjananivṛttyarthena api na arthaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:281_3: na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam janeḥ ḍam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:281_4: . ḍitkaraṇe etat prayojanam ḍiti iti ṭilopaḥ yathā syāt . yadi vyañjansya guṇaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:281_5: ḍitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt . guṇe kṛte trayāṇām akārāṇām pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:283_0: mandurajaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ janeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:283_1: ḍam śāsti. na etāni santi prayojanāni . yat tāvat ucyate kitkaraṇam jñāpakam ākārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:283_2: guṇaḥ na bhavati iti . uttarārtham etat syāt . tundaśokayoḥ parimṛjāpanudoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:283_3: yat tarhi gāpoḥ ṭhak iti ananyārtham kakāram anubandham karoti . yat api ucyate upadeśasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:283_4: sandhyakṣarasya guṇaḥ na bhavati iti . yadi yat yat sandhyakṣarasya prāpnoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:283_5: tat upadeśasāmarthyāt bādhyate āyādayaḥ api tarhi na prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:283_6: . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ sa vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:283_7: eva na asau bādhyate . guṇam ca prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ āyādīnām punaḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:283_8: eva . yat api ucyate janeḥ ḍavacanam jñāpakam na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:283_9: siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati . na ca janeḥ guṇena sidhyati . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:283_10: hi etat janeḥ guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ akāraḥ bhavati na punaḥ ekāraḥ vā syāt okāraḥ vā iti

GS24pmbhasuu:283_12: prāpnoti . pararūpeṇa śuddhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi gameḥ api ayam ḍaḥ vaktavyaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:286_7: utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate vṛddhiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:319: rājakīyam . ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti asya avakāśaḥ : cayanam ,

GS24pmbhasuu:324_2: . na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ . na avaśyam dvikāryayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:324_3: tarhi. asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca asti atra asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asau asmbhavaḥ . iha tāvat :

GS24pmbhasuu:504_7: vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti . asti vāṭaparikṣepe vartate . tat yathā grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:504_8: praviṣṭaḥ . asti manuṣyeṣu vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ gataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:505_0: grāmaḥ āgataḥ iti . asti sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:505_1: labdhaḥ iti . tat yaḥ sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate tam abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:506: anantarau imau grāmau iti . sarvatra eva hi atajjātīyakam vyavadhāyakam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:508_0: 192-193 kim idam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ iti . mukham ca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikam . mukhanāsikam
GS24pmbhasuu:508_1: vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ . yadi evam mukhanāsikavacanaḥ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:508_2: . nipātanāt dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā mukhanāsikam āvacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:508_3: . kim idam āvacanam iti . īṣadvacanam āvacanam . kim cit mukhavacanam kim cit nāsikāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:508_4: . mukhadvitīyā vā nāsikā vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ . mukhopasaṃhitā
GS24pmbhasuu:508_5: vā nāsikā vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:510_0: 193-194 atha mukhagrahaṇam kimartham . nāsikāvacanaḥ anunāsikaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:510_1: yamānusvārāṇām eva prasajyeta . mukhagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:510_2: nāsikāgrahaṇam kimartham . mukhavacanaḥ anunāsikaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne kacaṭatapānām
GS24pmbhasuu:510_3: eva prasajyeta . nāsikāgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . mukhagrahaṇam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:510_4: akartum . kena idānīm ubhayavacanānām bhaviṣyati . prāsādavāsinyāyena . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:510_5: . ke cit prāsādavāsinaḥ ke cit bhūmivāsinaḥ ke cit ubhayavāsinaḥ . ye prāsādavāsinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:510_6: gṛhyante te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena . ye bhūmivāsinaḥ gṛhyante te bhūmivāsinyāyena .
GS24pmbhasuu:510_7: ye ubhayavāsinaḥ gṛhyante te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena bhūmivāsinyāyena ca . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:510_8: api ke cit mukhavacanāḥ ke cit nāsikāvacanāḥ ke cit ubhayavacanāḥ . tatra ye mukhavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:510_9: gṛhyante te mukhagrahaṇena . ye nāsikāvacanāḥ gṛhyante te nāsikāgrahaṇena . ye ubhayavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:510_10: gṛhyante eva te mukhagrahaṇena nāsikāgrahaṇena ca. bhavet ubhayavacanānām siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:510_11: . yamānusvārāṇām api prāpnoti . na eva doṣaḥ na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:512_0: 194-195 itaretarāśrayam tu bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sataḥ anunāsikasya sañjñayā
GS24pmbhasuu:512_1: bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca nāma anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:512_2: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . anunāsikasañjñāyām itaretarāśraye uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:512_3: . siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu śabdeṣu sataḥ anunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:512_4: sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . yadi tarhi nityāḥ śabdāḥ kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:512_5: śāstram . kimartham śāstram iti cet nivartakatvāt siddham . nivartakam śāstram .
GS24pmbhasuu:512_6: katham . āṅ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ ananunāsikaḥ . tasya sarvatra ananunāsikabuddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:512_7: prasaktā . tatra anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . chandasi aci parataḥ āṅaḥ ananunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:514_0: 195-197 tulayā sammitam tulyam . āsyam ca prayatnaḥ ca āsyaprayatnam . tulyāsyam
GS24pmbhasuu:514_1: tulyaprayatnam ca savarṇasañjñam bhavati . kim punaḥ āsyam . laukikam āsyam oṣṭhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:514_2: prabhṛti prāk kākalakāt . katham punaḥ āsyam . asyanti anena varṇān iti āsyam . annam
GS24pmbhasuu:514_3: etat āsyandate iti vā āsyam . atha kaḥ prayatnaḥ . prayatanam prayatnaḥ . prapūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:514_4: yatateḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ naṅpratyayaḥ . yadi laukikam āsyam kim āsyopādāne prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:514_5: . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam bhavati . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:517_1: bhinnadeśeṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati jabagaḍadaśām . kim kāraṇam . prayatnasāmānyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:517_2: . eteṣām hi samānaḥ prayatnaḥ . siddham tu āsye tulyadeśaprayatnam savarṇam . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:517_3: etat. katham . āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ yatnaḥ ca te savarṇasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:517_4: . evam api kim āsyopādāne prayojanam . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam . prayatnaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:517_5: āsyopādānam . santi hi āsyāt bāhyāḥ prayatnāḥ . te hāpitāḥ bhavanti . teṣu satsu
GS24pmbhasuu:517_6: asatsu api savarṇasañjñā sidhyati . ke punaḥ te . vivārasaṃvārau śvāsanādau ghoṣavadaghoṣatā
GS24pmbhasuu:517_7: alpaprāṇatā mahāprāṇatā iti . tatra vargāṇām prathamadvitīyāḥ vivṛtakaṇṭhāḥ śvāsānupradānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:517_8: aghoṣāḥ . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . tṛtīyacaturthāḥ saṃvṛtakaṇṭhāḥ nādānupradānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:517_9: ghoṣavantaḥ . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . yathā tṛtīyāḥ tathā pañcamāḥ ānunāsikyavarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:517_10: . ānunāsikyam teṣām adhikaḥ guṇaḥ . evam api avarṇasya savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:517_11: . kim kāraṇam . bāhyam hi āsyāt sthānam avarṇasya . sarvamukhasthānam avarṇam eke
GS24pmbhasuu:517_12: icchanti . evam api vyapadeśaḥ na prakalpate :
GS24pmbhasuu:518_0: āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ iti . vyapadeśivadbhāvena vyapadeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:518_1: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam savarṇasañjñayām bhinnadeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:518_2: atiprasaṅgaḥ prayatnasāmānyāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi laukikam āsyam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:519_0: āsye bhavam āsyam . śarīrāvayavāt yat . kim punaḥ āsye bhavam . sthānam karaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:519_1: . evam api prayatnaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . prayatnaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:519_2: prayatanam prayatnaḥ . kim tarhi . prārambhaḥ yatnasya prayatnaḥ . yadi prārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:519_3: yatnasya prayatnaḥ evam api avarṇasya eṅoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . praśliṣṭavarṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:519_4: etau . avarṇasya tarhi aicoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . vivṛtatarāvarṇau etau .
GS24pmbhasuu:519_5: etayoḥ eva tarhi mithaḥ savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . na etau tulyasthānau . udāttādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:519_6: tarhi savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti . abhedakāḥ udāttādayaḥ . atha vā kim naḥ etena prārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:519_7: yatnasya prayatnaḥ iti .prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ . tat eva ca taddhitāntam āsyam
GS24pmbhasuu:519_8: . yat samānam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . kim sati bhede . sati iti āha . sati eva hi bhede
GS24pmbhasuu:519_9: savarṇasañjñayā bhavitavyam . kutaḥ etat . bhedādhiṣṭhānā hi savarṇasañjñā . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:519_10: hi yatra sarvam samānam tatra syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:519_11: sati bhede kim cit samānam iti kṛtva savarṇasañjñā bhaviṣyati śakārachakārayoḥ ṣakāraṭhakārahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:519_12: sakārathakārayoḥ savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . eteṣām hi sarvam anyat samānam karaṇavarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:519_13: . evam tarhi prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ tat eva taddhitāntam āsyam na tu ayam dvandvaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:520: āsyam ca prayatnaḥ ca āsyaprayatnam iti . kim tarhi . tripadaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:521: tulyaḥ āsye prayatnaḥ eṣām iti . atha vā pūrvaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:523: tulyāsyaḥ prayatnaḥ eṣām iti . atha vā paraḥ tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:527_0: 202-203 tasya . tasya iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . yaḥ yasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:527_1: saḥ tasya savarṇasañjñaḥ yathā syāt . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:527_2: mā bhūt . tasya avacanam vacanaprāmāṇyāt . tasya iti na vaktavyam . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:527_3: anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:528_0: savarṇasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt . yadi hi anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ saḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:528_1: syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:528_2: vā punaḥ tulyam etat . tat yathā sambandhiśabdāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:530_0: pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari iti sambandhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:530_1: ca etat gamyate yā yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api tulyāsyaprayatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:530_2: savarṇam iti atra sambandiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:531: yat prati yat tulyāsyaprayatnam tat prati tat savarṇasañjñam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:533: 203-207 ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ savarṇavidhiḥ . ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ savarṇasañjñā vidheyā . hotṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:535: hotṝḷkāraḥ . kim prayojanam . akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . savarṇadīrghatve ṛti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:537: lḷvāvacanam iti . tat savarṇe yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : dadhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:540_0: ḷkāraḥ iti . yat etat savarṇadīrghatve ṛti iti etat ṛtaḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tataḥ ḷti
GS24pmbhasuu:540_1: . ḷti ca vā lḷ bhavati . ṛtaḥ iti eva . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . avaśyam tat vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:540_2: . ūkālaḥ ac hrasvardīrghaplutasañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca rṛkāraḥ lḷkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:541: lḷkārasya ca actvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam plutaḥ yathā syāt : hotṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:547_0: hotḷ3kāraḥ . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . savarṇasañjñāvacanam eva jyāyaḥ . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:547_1: ca eva hi siddham bhavati. api ca ṛkāragrahaṇe ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati . yathā iha bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:550: māla ṛśyaḥ idam api saṅgṛhītam bahavati : khaṭva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:558: upālkārīyati iti . yadi tarhi ṛkāragrahaṇe ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati uḥ aṇ raparaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:559_0: ḷkārasya api raparatvam prāpnoti . ḷkārasya laparatvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:559_1: vaktavyam asatyām savarṇasañjñāyām vidhyartham . tat eva satyām rephabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:559_2: bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade iti ṛkāragrahaṇam coditam mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:560: pitṝṇām iti evamartham . tat iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:561: kḷpyamānam paśya iti . atha asatyām api savarṇasañjñāyām iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:562: prakḷpyamānam paśya iti . cuṭutulaśarvyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:563_0: tribhiḥ ca madhyamaiḥ vargaiḥ laśasaiḥ ca vyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi iti . varṇaikadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:563_1: ca varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante iti yaḥ asau ḷkāre lakāraḥ tadāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:563_2: . yadi evam na arthaḥ raṣābhyām ṇatve ṛkāragrahaṇena . varṇaikadeśāḥ ca varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:563_3: gṛhyante iti yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tadāśrayam ṇatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:565_0: 207-211 ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ ajjhaltvāt . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:565_1: śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca
GS24pmbhasuu:565_2: eva hi śakāraḥ hal ca . katham tāvat actvam . ikāraḥ savarṇagrahaṇena śakāram api
GS24pmbhasuu:565_3: gṛhṇāti iti actvam . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:565_4: doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ bhavati . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:565_5: iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham anactvāt . siddham etat . katham . anactvāt . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:565_6: anactvam . spṛṣṭam sparśānām karaṇam . īṣatspṛṣṭam antaḥsthānām . vivṛtam ūṣmaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:565_7: . īṣat iti anuvartate . svarāṇām vivṛtam . īṣat iti nivṛttam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:565_8: vā . vākyāparisamāpteḥ vā siddham etat . kim idam vākyāparisamāpteḥ iti . varṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:565_9: upadeśaḥ tāvat . upadeśottarakālā itsañjñā . itsañjñottarakālaḥ ādiḥ antyena saha
GS24pmbhasuu:565_10: itā iti pratyāhāraḥ . pratyāhārottarakālā savarṇasañjñā . savarṇasañjñottarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:565_11: aṇ udit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti savarṇagrahaṇam . etena sarveṇa samuditena vākyena
GS24pmbhasuu:565_12: anyatra savarṇānām grahaṇam bhavati . ca ca atra ikāraḥ śakāram gṛhṇāti . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:565_13: tarhi ikāraḥ śakāram na gṛhṇāti evam īkāram api na gṛhṇīyāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . kumārī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:566_0: īhate kumārīhate . akaḥ savarṇadīrghatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:566_1: akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti pratyāhāragrahaṇam tata ikāraḥ īkāram gṛhṇāti . śakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:567_0: ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ ajhaltvāt . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārasya śakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:567_1: savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca eva śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:567_2: hal ca . katham tāvat actvam . ikāraḥ savarṇagrahaṇena śakāram api gṛhṇāti iti actvam
GS24pmbhasuu:567_3: . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:567_4: doṣaḥ bhavati . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:567_5: . siddham anactvāt . siddham etat . katham . anactvāt . katham anactvam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:567_6: vā . uktā vākyāparisamāptiḥ . asmin pakṣe vā iti etat asamarthitam bhavati . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:567_7: ca samarthitam . katham . astu vā śakārasya śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñā mā vā bhūt . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:568_0: paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti iti . mā bhūt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:568_1: . nanu ca bhedaḥ bhavati . sati lope dviśakāram asati lope triśakāram . na asti bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:568_2: . asati api lope dviśakāram eva . katham . vibhāṣā dvirvacanam . evam api bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:568_3: . asati lope kadā cit dviśakāram kadā cit triśakāram sati lope dviśakāram eva . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:568_4: eṣaḥ katham bhedaḥ na syāt . yadi nityaḥ lopaḥ syāt . vibhāṣā tu saḥ lopaḥ . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:570_0: 213-217 kimartham īdādīnām taparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā ucyate . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:570_1: tatkālānām savarṇānām grahaṇam yathā syāt . keṣām . udāttānudāttasvaritānām . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:570_2: prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . plutānām tu pragṛhyasañjñā na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:570_3: . atatkālatvāt . na hi plutāḥ tatkālāḥ . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasyāsiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:570_4: eva bhavanti . siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:570_5: iti . yat ayam plutapragṛhyāḥ aci iti plutasya prakṛtibhāvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:570_6: jñāpakam . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:570_7: . aplutāt aplute iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . kim ataḥ yat siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:570_8: . sañjñāvidhau asiddhaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva bhavanti . sañjñāvidhau

GS24pmbhasuu:632_0: 235-238 īdūtau saptamī iti eva . īdūtau saptamī iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ arthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:632_1: . lupte arthagrahaṇāt bhavet . luptāyam saptamyām pragṛhyasañjñā na prāpnoti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:632_2: . somo gaurī adhi śritaḥ . iṣyate ca atra api syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na
GS24pmbhasuu:632_3: sidhyati iti evamartham arthagrahaṇam . na atra saptamī lupyate . kim tarhi . pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:632_4: atra bhavati . pūrvasya cet savarṇaḥ asau āḍāmbhāvaḥ prasajyate . yadi pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:632_5: āṭ āmbhāvaḥ ca prāpnoti . evam tarhi āha ayam īdūtau saptamī iti na sa asti saptamī

GS24pmbhasuu:632_7: asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . yatra saptamyāḥ dīrghatvam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:633_0: dṛtim na śuṣkam sarasī śayānam iti . sati prayojane iha na prāpnoti somo gaurī adhi
GS24pmbhasuu:633_1: śritaḥ iti . tatra api sarasī yadi . tatra api siddham . katham . yadi sarasīśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:633_2: pravṛttiḥ asti . asti ca loke sarasīśabdasya pravṛttiḥ . katham . dakṣiṇāpathe hi

GS24pmbhasuu:633_4: ācāryaḥ na pragṛhyasañjñāyām pratyayalakṣaṇam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:634: vadhvoḥ agāram vadhvagāram . pratyayalakṣaṇena pragṛhyasañjñā na bhavati . mā vā pūrvapadasya bhūt . atha vā pūrvapadasya mā bhūt iti evamartham arthagrahaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:636_0: nadyām ātiḥ nadyātiḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api arthagrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:636_1: . jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ iti . atha ajahatsvārthāyām vṛttau doṣaḥ eva . ajahatsvārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:636_2: ca na doṣaḥ . samudāyārthaḥ abhidhīyate . īdutau saptamī iti eva lupte arthagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:636_3: bhavet pūrvasya cet savarṇaḥ asau āḍāmbhāvaḥ prasajyate vacanāt yatra dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:636_4: tatra api sarasī yadi jñāpakam syāt tadantatve mā vā pūrvapadasya bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:638_0: 239-241 ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam śidartham. ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:638_1: . dādhāprakṛtayaḥ ghusañjñā bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . āttvabhūtānām
GS24pmbhasuu:638_2: iyam sañjñā kriyate . sā āttvabhūtānām eva syāt anāttvabhūtānām na syāt . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:638_3: bhūyiṣthāni ghusañjñākāryāṇi ārdhadhātuke tatra ca ete āttvabhūtāḥ dṛśyante . śidartham
GS24pmbhasuu:638_4: . śidartham prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam . śiti āttvam pratiṣidhyate tadartham :
GS24pmbhasuu:639_0: praṇidayate praṇidhayati iti . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:639_1: śidvikṛtārtham . ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam kriyate . kim prayojanam . śidartham
GS24pmbhasuu:639_2: vikṛtārtham ca . śiti udāhṛtam . vikṛtārtham khalu api :
GS24pmbhasuu:640_0: praṇidātā praṇidhātā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:640_1: eva iti pratipadam ye āttvabhūtāḥ teṣām eva syāt . lakṣaṇena ye āttvabhūtāḥ teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:640_2: na syāt . atha kriyamāṇe api prakṛtigrahaṇe katham idam vijñāyate . dādhāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:640_3: āhosvit dādhām prakṛtayaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate dādhāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:640_4: saḥ eva doṣaḥ . āttvabhūtānām eva syāt anāttvabhūtānām na syāt . atha vijñāyate dādhām
GS24pmbhasuu:640_5: prakṛtayaḥ iti anāttvabhūtānām eva syāt āttvabhūtānām na syāt . evam tarhi na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:640_6: vijñāyate dādhāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti na api dādhām prakṛtayaḥ iti . katham tarhi . dādhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:640_7: ghusañjñāḥ bhavanti prakṛtayaḥ ca eṣām iti . tat tarhi prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:640_8: . na kartavyam . idam prakṛtam arthagrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . īdūtau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:640_9: saptamyarthe iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi dādhāḥ ghu adāp . arthe iti . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:640_10: dadātinā samānārthān rātirāsatidāśatimaṃhatiprīṇātiprabhṛtīn āhuḥ . eteṣām api ghusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:640_11: prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam . śidarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:640_12: tāvat na arthaḥ prakṛtigrahaṇena . avaśyam tatra mārtham prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:640_13: praṇimayate praṇyamayata iti evamartham . tat purastāt apakrakṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:641: ghuprakṛtau māprakṛtau ca iti . yadi prakṛtigrahaṇam kriyate praniminoti pranimīnāti atra api prāpnoti . atha akriyamāṇe api prakṛtigrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:642_0: pranimātā pranimātum iti . ākārāntasya ṅitaḥ grahaṇam vijñāsyate . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:642_1: akriyamāṇe prakṛtigrahaṇe ākārāntasya ṅitaḥ grahaṇam vijñāyate evam kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:642_2: prakṛtigrahaṇe ākārāntasya ṅitaḥ grahaṇam vijñāsyate . vikṛtārthena ca api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:642_3: . doṣaḥ eva etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti gāmādāgrahaṇeṣu aviśeṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:645_0: pranidārayati pranidhārayati . dādhāḥ ghusañjñāḥ bhavanti iti ghusañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:645_2: pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . ghusañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . arthavadgrahaṇāt . arthavatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:645_3: dādhoḥ grahaṇam . na ca etau arthavantau . anupasargāt vā . atha vā yatkriyāyuktās
GS24pmbhasuu:645_4: prādayaḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ . na ca etau dādhau prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:645_5: . yadi evam iha api tarhi na prāpnoti praṇidāpayati praṇidhāpayati . atra api na
GS24pmbhasuu:645_6: etau dādhau arthavantau na api etau dādhau prati kriyāyogaḥ . na vā arthavataḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:645_7: āgamaḥ tadguṇībhūtaḥ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā anyatra . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:645_8: kāraṇam . arthavataḥ āgamaḥ tadguṇībhūtaḥ arthavadgrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:645_9: . tat yathā . anyatra api arthavataḥ āgamaḥ arthavadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . kva anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:645_10: . lavitā cikīrṣitā iti . yuktam punaḥ yat nityeṣu nāma śabdeṣu āgamaśāsanam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:645_11: na nityeṣu śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:645_12: . āgamaḥ ca nāma apūrvaḥ śabdopajanaḥ . atha yuktam yat nityeṣu śabdeṣu ādeśāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:645_13: . bāḍham yuktam . śabdāntaraiḥ iha bhavitavyam . tatra śabdāntarāt śabdāntarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:645_14: pratipattiḥ yuktā . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime bhaviṣyanti anāgamakānām sāgamakāḥ . tat katham
GS24pmbhasuu:645_15: . sarve sarvapadādeśāḥ dākṣīputrasya pāṇineḥ ekadeśavikāre hi nityatvam na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:647_0: 245-246 dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve . dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:647_1: . upādāsta asya svaraḥ śikṣakasya iti . mīnātiminoti iti āttve kṛte sthāghvoḥ it
GS24pmbhasuu:647_2: ca iti ittvam prāpnoti . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam doṣaḥ jāyate . kim prakṛtigrahaṇāt āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:647_3: rūpagrahaṇāt . rūpagrahaṇāt iti āha . iha khalu prakṛtigrahaṇāt doṣaḥ jāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:648_0: upadidīṣate . sani mīmāghurabhalabha iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dāprakṛtiḥ iti ucyate

GS24pmbhasuu:650: 246-247 dāppratiṣedhe na daipi anejantatvāt . dāppratiṣedhe daipi pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:651_0: avadātam mukham . nanu ca āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . tat hi āttvam na prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:651_1: kāraṇam . anejantatvāt . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:651_2: . anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . pitpratiṣedhāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:651_3: dādhāḥ ghu apit iti vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam . adāp iti hi ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:652_0: praṇidāpayati iti . śakyam tāvat anena adāp iti bruvatā bāntasya pratiṣedhaḥ vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:652_1: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam dappratiṣedhe na daipi
GS24pmbhasuu:652_2: iti . parihṛtam etat siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt iti . atha ekānteṣu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:652_3: eva . ekānteṣu ca na doṣaḥ . āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam tat hi āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:652_4: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anejantatvāt iti . pakāralope kṛte bhaviṣyati . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:652_5: ayam tadā dāp bhavati . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . etat ca atra yuktam yat sarveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:652_6: eva sānubandhakagrahaṇeṣu bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyate . anaimittikaḥ hi anubandhalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:652_7: tāvati eva bhavati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:652_8: iti yat ayam udīcām māṅaḥ vyatīhāre iti meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:652_9: karoti . atha vā dāp eva ayam na daip asti . katham avadāyayati iti . śyan vikaraṇaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:654_0: 247-252 kimartham idam ucyate . sati anyasmin ādyantavadbhāvāt ekasmin ādyantavadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:654_1: . sati anyasmin yasmāt pūrvam na asti param asti saḥ ādiḥ iti ucyate . sati anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:654_2: yasmāt param na asti pūrvam asti saḥ antaḥ iti ucyate . sati anyasmin ādyantavadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:654_3: etasmāt kāraṇāt ekasmin ādyantāpadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi na sidhyanti . iṣyante ca syuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:654_4: . tāni antareṇa yatnam na sidhyanti iti ekasmin ādyantavadvacanam . evamartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:654_5: ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:654_6: vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vyapadeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:654_7: . kim prayojanam . ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham . vakṣyati ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:654_8: bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:656_0: āra iti atra na syāt . vyapdeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:656_1: . ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham . vakṣyati ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī eva
GS24pmbhasuu:656_2: iti . etasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:659_0: saḥ devan yakṣat . vyapdeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:659_1: . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:659_2: . antareṇa eva vacanam lokavijñānāt siddham etat . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:660_0: loke śālāsamudāyaḥ grāmaḥ iti ucyate . bhavati ca etat ekasmin api ekaśālaḥ grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:660_1: iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . grāmaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva śālāsamudāye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:660_2: . tat yathā grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti . asti vāṭaparikṣepe vartate . tat yathā grāmam praviṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:660_3: . asti manuṣyeṣu vartate . tat yathā . grāmaḥ gataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:661_0: grāmaḥ āgataḥ iti . asti sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:661_1: labdhaḥ iti . tat yaḥ sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate tam abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:662_0: ekaśālaḥ grāmaḥ iti . yathā tarhi varṇasamudāyaḥ padam padasamudāyaḥ ṛk ṛksamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:662_1: sūktam iti ucyate . bhavati ca etat ekasmin api ekavarṇam padam ekapadā ṛk ekarcam
GS24pmbhasuu:662_2: sūktam iti . atra api arthena yuktaḥ vyapadeśaḥ . padam nāma arthaḥ sūktam nama arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:662_3: . yathā tarhi bahuṣu putreṣu etat upapannam :
GS24pmbhasuu:663_0: bhavati ayam me jyeṣṭhaḥ ayam eva me madhyamaḥ ayam eva me kanīyān iti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:663_1: ca etat ekasmin api ayam eva me jyeṣṭhaḥ ayam me madhyamaḥ ayam me kanīyān iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:663_2: tathā asūtāyām asoṣyamāṇāyām ca bhavati prathamagarbheṇa hatā iti . tathā anetya
GS24pmbhasuu:663_3: anājigamiṣuḥ āha idam me prathamam āgamanam iti . ādyantavadbhāvaḥ ca śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:663_4: . katham . apūrvānuttaralakṣaṇatvāt ādyantayoḥ siddham ekasmin . apūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:663_5: anuttaralakṣaṇaḥ antaḥ . etat ca ekasmin api bhavati . apūrvānuttaralakṣaṇatvāt etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:663_6: kāraṇāt ekasmin api ādyantāpadiṣṭani kāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti . na arthaḥ ādyantavadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:663_7: . gonardīyaḥ tu āha satyam etat sati tu anyasmin iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:665: 252-254 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . ādivattve prayojanam pratyayañnidādyudāttatve . pratyayasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva syāt : kartavyam ,

GS24pmbhasuu:670: kṛtiḥ iti atra na syāt . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ prayojanam . ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iha eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:672_0: manidṣat iti atra na syāt . yasmin vidhiḥ tadāditve . yasmin vidhiḥ tadāditve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:672_1: . vakṣyati yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe aci śnudhātubhruvām
GS24pmbhasuu:672_2: yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iha eva syāt : śriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:673: bhruvaḥ . śriyau bhruvau iti atra na syāt . ajādyāṭtve . ajādyāṭtve prayojanam . āṭ ajādīnām iha eva syāt : aihiṣṭa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:675_0: adhyaiṣṭa iti atra na syāt . atha antavattve kāni prayojanāni . antavat dvivacanāntapragṛhyatve
GS24pmbhasuu:675_1: . antavat dvivacanāntapragṛhyatve prayojanam . īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:676: pacete* iti pacethe* iti . khaṭve* iti māle* iti iti atra na syāt . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ prayojanam . iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:677: kuṇḍāni vanāni . tāni yāni iti atra na syāt . acaḥ antyādi ṭi . acaḥ antyādi ṭi prayojanam . ṭitaḥ ātmanepadānām ṭeḥ e iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:678: kurvāte kurvāthe . kurute kurve iti atra na syāt . alaḥ antyasya . alaḥ antyasya prayojanam . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:680: paṭābhyām . ābhyām iti atra na syāt . yena vidiḥ tadantatve . yena vidiḥ tadantatve prayojanam . acaḥ yat iha eva syāt : ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:681: jeyam . eyam adhyeyam iti atra na syāt . ādyantavat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:683_0: 255-256 ghasañjñāyām nadītare pratiṣedhaḥ . ghasañjñāyām nadītare pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:683_1: . nadyāḥ taraḥ nadītaraḥ iti . ghasañjñāyām nadītare apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:683_2: apratiṣedhaḥ . ghasañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . tarabgrahaṇam hi aupadeśikam . aupadeśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:683_3: tarapaḥ grahaṇam . na ca eṣaḥ upadeśe tarapśabdaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:683_4: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . iha hi vyākaraṇe sarveṣu eva sānubandhakeṣu grahaṇeṣu rūpam āśrīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:684_0: yatra etat rūpam iti . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca na antareṇa laukikam prayogam . tasmin ca
GS24pmbhasuu:684_1: laukike prayoge sānubandhakānām prayogaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:684_2: . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . na ca eṣaḥ upadeśe tarapśabdaḥ . atha vā astu asya ghasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:684_3: . kaḥ doṣaḥ . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . samānādhikaraṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:684_4: ghādiṣu iti evam tat . yadā tarhi sā eva nadī saḥ eva taraḥ tadā prāpnoti . strīliṅgeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:684_5: eva ghādiṣu iti evam tat . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . samānādhikaraṇeṣu ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:684_6: iti ucyamāne iha prasajyeta mahiṣī rūpam iva brāhmaṇī rūpam iva .
GS24pmbhasuu:686_1: . bahugaṇvatuḍatayaḥ saṅkhyāsañjñāḥ bhavanti . saṅkhyā ca saṅkhyāsañjñā bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:686_2: vaktavvyam . kim prayojanam . saṅkhyāsampratyayārtham . ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:686_3: saṅkhyā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca ekādikā saṅkhyā loke saṅkhyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:686_4: pratītā . tena asyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu saṅkhyāsampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:686_5: . itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ akṛtrimatvāt yathā loke . akriyamāṇe hi saṅkhyāgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:686_6: ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyā iti sampratyayaḥ na syāt . kim kāraṇam . akṛtrimatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:686_7: . bahvādīnām kṛtrimā sañjñā . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime kāryasampratyayaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:686_8: yathā loke . tat yathā loke gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya iti yasya eṣā sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:686_9: bhavati saḥ ānīyate na yaḥ gāḥ pālayati yaḥ vā kaṭe jātaḥ . yadi tarhi kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:686_10: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati nadīpaurṇamāsyāgrahāyaṇībhyaḥ iti atra api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:686_11: . paurṇamāsyāgrahāyaṇīgrahaṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . tadviśeṣebhyaḥ tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:687: gaṅgā yamunā iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tadviśeṣebhyaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam vipāṭśabdam śaratprabhṛtiṣu paṭhati . iha tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:688_0: nadībhiḥ ca iti . bahuvacananirdeśāt na bhaviṣyati . svarūpavidhiḥ tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:688_1: . bahuvacananirdeśāt eva na bhaviṣyati . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:688_2: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ . uttarārtham ca . uttarārtham ca saṅkhyāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:688_3: kartavyam . ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ . ṣakāranakārāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ ṣaṭsañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : pāmānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:689_0: vipruṣaḥ iti . ihārthena tāvat na arthaḥ saṅkhyāgrahaṇena . nanu ca uktam itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:689_1: hi asampratyayaḥ akṛtrimatvāt yathā loke iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthāt prakaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:689_2: vā loke kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . arthaḥ vā asya evaṃsaṅjñakena
GS24pmbhasuu:689_3: bhavati prakṛtam vā tatra bhavati idam evaṃsaṅjñakena kartavyam iti. ātaḥ ca arthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:689_4: prakaraṇāt vā . aṅga hi bhavān grāmyam pāṃsurapādam aprakaraṇajñam āgatam bravītu
GS24pmbhasuu:689_5: gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya iti . ubhayagatiḥ tasya bhavati sādhīyaḥ vā yaṣṭihastam
GS24pmbhasuu:689_6: gamiṣyati . yathā eva tarhi arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:689_7: bhavati evam iha api prāpnoti . jānāti hi asau bahvādīnām iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:689_8: na yathā loke tathā vyākaraṇe . ubhayagatiḥ punaḥ iha bhavati . anyatra api na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:690_0: kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti kṛtrimā sañjñā . karmapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:690_1: . karmaṇi dvitīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam kartari karmavyatihāre iti akṛtrimasya
GS24pmbhasuu:690_2: . tathā sādhakatamam karaṇam iti kṛtrimā karaṇasañjñā . karaṇapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:690_3: bhavati . kartṛkaraṇayoḥ tṛtīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam śabdavairakalahābhrakaṇvameghebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:690_4: karaṇe iti akṛtrimasya . tathā ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam iti kṛtrimā adhikaraṇasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:690_5: adhikaraṇepradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati . saptamī adhikaraṇe ca iti kṛtrimasya
GS24pmbhasuu:690_6: grahaṇam vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇavāci iti akṛtrimasya . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:691: bahugaṇavatuḍatayaḥ saṅkhyāvat bhavanti iti . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:692: eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:693_0: brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api asaṅkhyām saṅkhyā iti āha . saṅkhyāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:693_1: iti gamyate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:693_2: saṅkhyāsampratyayaḥ iti yat ayam saṅkhyāyāḥ atiśadantāyāḥ kan iti tiśadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:693_3: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi kṛtrimā tyantā śadantā vā saṅkhyā asti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:693_4: ca iyam asti ḍatiḥ . yat tarhi śadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . yat ca api tyantāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:693_5: pratiṣedham śāsti . nanu ca uktam ḍatyartham etat syāt iti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:693_6: iti arthavataḥ tiśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca ḍateḥ tiśabdaḥ arthavān. atha vā mahatī
GS24pmbhasuu:693_7: iyam sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:694_0: hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:694_1: yatha vijñāyeta . saṅkhyāyate anayā saṅkhyā iti . ekādikayā ca api saṅkhyāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:694_2: uttarārthena ca api na arthaḥ saṅkhyāgrahaṇena . idam prakṛtam anuvartiṣyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:694_3: vai sañjñārtham uttaratra ca sañjñiviśeṣaṇārthaḥ . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:694_4: bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī
GS24pmbhasuu:694_5: sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:694_6: iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:695_0: śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate ca śālayaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:695_1: bhāvyante . yad api ucyate na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:695_2: . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu etat evam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:695_3: . śabdaḥ tu khalu yena yena viśeṣeṇa abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:695_4: . atha vā sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate na ca anyat kim cit apekṣyam asti . te saṅkhyām eva apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:697_0: 263-265 adhyardhagrahaṇam ca samāsakanvidhyartham . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:697_1: . kim prayojanam . samāsakanvidhyartham . samāsavidhyartham kandvidhyartham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:699: adhyardhakam . luki ca agrahaṇam . luki ca adhyardhagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:700_0: adhyardhapūrvadvigoḥ luk asañjñāyām iti . dvigoḥ iti eva siddham . ardhapūrvapadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:700_1: ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ . ardhapūrvapadaḥ ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ saṅkhyāsañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:700_2: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . samāsakanvidhyartham . samāsavidhyartham kandvidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:702_0: ardhapañcamakam . adhikagrahaṇam ca aluki samāsottarapadavṛddhyartham . adhikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:702_1: ca aluki kartavyam . kim prayojanam . samāsottarapadavṛddhyartham . samāsavṛddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:705: adhikasāptatikaḥ . aluki iti kim artham . adhikaṣāṣṭhikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:706: adhikasāptatikaḥ . bahuvrīhau ca agrahaṇam . bahuvrīhau ca adhikaśabdasya grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:707_0: saṅkhyayā avyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . saṅkhyā iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:707_1: bahvādīnām agrahaṇam . bahvādīnām grahaṇam śakyam akartum . kena idānīm saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:707_2: saṅkhyasampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . jñāpakāt siddham . kim jñāpakam . yat ayam vatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:707_3: iṭ vā iti saṅkhyāyāḥ vihitasya kanaḥ vatvantāt iṭam śāsti . vatoḥ eva tat jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:707_4: syāt . na iti āha . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:709_0: 265-269 ṣaṭsañjñāyām upadeśavacanam . ṣaṭsañjñāyām upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:709_1: ṣakāranakārāntā saṅkhyā ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . śatādyaṣṭanoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:709_2: numnuḍartham . śatāni sahasrāṇi . numi kṛte ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti ṣaṭsañjñā prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:709_3: na bhavati . aṣṭānām iti atra ātve kṛte ṣaṭsañjñā na prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:709_4: . uktam vā . kim uktam . iha tāvat śatāni sahasrāṇi iti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:709_5: animittam tadvighātasya iti . aṣṭanaḥ api uktam . kim uktam . aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:709_6: ṣaṭsañjñājñāpakam ākārāntasya nuḍartham iti . atha vā ākāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:709_7: . ṣakārāntā nakārāntā ākārāntā ca saṅkhyā ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:710: sadhamadhaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ ekāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā : ekaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:712: bahavaḥ iti . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā : ekāgnayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:714: ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . asahāyaiḥ iti arthaḥ . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:715: prajam ekā rakṣati urjam ekā iti . anyā iti arthaḥ . sadhamadaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ . iha tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:716: dvabhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatya ca iti . evam tarhi saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . tataḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:717: ṣaḍbhyaḥ ca yat uktam aṣṭābhyaḥ api tat bhavati . tataḥ luk :
GS24pmbhasuu:718: luk ca bhavati ṣaḍbhyaḥ iti . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṣṭanaḥ ā vibhaktau . tataḥ rāyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:719: rāyaḥ ca vibhaktau ākārādeśaḥ bhavati . hali iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . yadi evam priyāṣṭau priyāṣṭāḥ iti na sidhyati priyāṣṭānau priyāṣṭānaḥ iti ca prāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte .
GS24pmbhasuu:721_0: 269 idam ḍatigrahaṇam dviḥ kriyate saṅkhyāsañjñāyām ṣaṭsañjñāyām ca . ekam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:721_1: akartum . katham . yadi tāvat saṅkhyāsañjñāyām kriyate ṣaṭsañjñāyām na kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:721_2: . katham . ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti atra ḍati iti anuvartiṣyate . atha ṣaṭsañjñāyām kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:721_3: saṅkhyāsañjñāyām na kariṣyate . ḍati ca iti atra saṅkhyāsañjñā anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:723_1: kartavyaḥ . lotaḥ gartaḥ iti . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:723_2: samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñā kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:723_3: na bhavati . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ . anubandhaḥ kriyate . saḥ anyatvam kariṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:723_4: . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti cet na lopāt . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti cet tat
GS24pmbhasuu:723_5: na . kim kāraṇam . lopāt . lupyate atra anubandhaḥ . lupte atra anubandhe na anyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:724_0: katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke naṣṭam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:724_1: gṛham bhavati . evam iha api lupte anubandhe naṣṭaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:724_2: lupyate jānāti tu asau sānubandhakasya iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti . tat yathā itaratra api :
GS24pmbhasuu:725_0: katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:725_1: tat gṛham bhavati antataḥ tam uddeśam jānāti . siddhaviparyāsaḥ ca . siddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:725_2: . yadi api jānāti sandehaḥ tasya bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:726: ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ lotaḥ gartaḥ iti ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ lūnaḥ gīrṇaḥ iti . tat yathā itaratra api :
GS24pmbhasuu:727: katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam tat gṛham bhavati antataḥ tam uddeśam jānāti . sandehaḥ tu tasya bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:728_0: idam tat gṛham idam tat gṛham iti . evam tarhi . kārakakālaviśeṣāt siddham . kārakakālaviśeṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:728_1: upādeyau . bhūte yaḥ taśabdaḥ kartari karmaṇi bhāve ca iti . tat yathā itaratra api
GS24pmbhasuu:728_2: . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ adhruveṇa nimittena dhruvam nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:728_3: upādatte vedikām puṇḍarīkam vā . evam api prākīrṣṭa iti atra prāpnoti . luṅi sijādidarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:728_4: . luṅi sijādidarśanāt na bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi sijādayaḥ na dṛśyante prābhitta
GS24pmbhasuu:728_5: iti . dṛśyante atra api sijādayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:728_6: gaṃsyate . yathā eva ayam anupadiṣṭān kārakakālaviśeṣān avagacchati evam etat api avagantum arhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:731_0: 273-274 sarvādīni iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:731_1: sarvaśabdaḥ ādiḥ yeṣām tāni imāni iti . yadi evam sarvaśabdasya sarvanāmasañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:731_2: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anyapadārthatvāt bahuvrīheḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ ayam anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:731_3: vartate . tena yat anyat sarvaśabdāt tasya sarvanāmasñjñā prāpnoti . tat yathā citraguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:731_4: ānīyatām iti ukte yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ bhavanti sa ānīyate na gāvaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:731_5: bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:732: citravāsam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:734_0: 274-277 iha sarvanāmāni iti pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām agaḥ iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:734_1: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām nipātanāt ṇatvābhāvaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:734_2: nipātanāt ṇatvam na bhaviṣyati . kim etat nipātanam nāma . atha kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:734_3: . aviśeṣeṇa kim cit uktvā viśeṣeṇa na iti ucyate . tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:735: idam na bhavati iti . nipātanam api evañjātīyakam eva . aviśeṣeṇa ṇatvam uktvā viśeṣeṇa nipātanam kriyate . tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:736_0: idam na bhavati iti . nanu ca nipātanāt ca aṇatvam syāt yathāprāptam ca ṇatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:736_1: kim anye api evam vidhayaḥ bhavanti . iha ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti vacanāt ca yaṇ syāt yathāprāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:736_2: ca ik śrūyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyā atra nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:736_3: . ṣaṣṭhī ca punaḥ sthāninam nivartayati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:737_0: kartari śap divādibhyaḥ śyan iti vacanāt ca śyan syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca śap śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:737_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:737_2: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:737_3: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . divādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:738: tasmāt iti uttarasya . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:739_0: avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti . vacanāt ca akac syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca kaḥ śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:739_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na aprāpte hi ke akac ārabhyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:739_2: api evañjātīyakam eva . na aprāpte ṇatve nipātanam ārabhyate . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:739_3: . yadi tarhi nipātanāni api evañjātīyakāni bhavanti samaḥ tate doṣaḥ bhavati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:739_4: anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ samaḥ tate vibhāṣā lopam ārabhante :

GS24pmbhasuu:743_1: iti yathāprāptam ca alopam santatam iti . etat na sidhyati . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:745_3: . śuddhānām paṭhitānām sañjñā kartavyā . sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni bhavanti . sañjñopasarjanībhūtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:745_4: na sarvādīni . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . viśeṣeṇa ca . kim prayojanam . sarvādyānantaryakāryārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:745_5: . sarvādīnām ānantaryeṇa yat ucyate kāryam tat api sañjñopasarjanībhūtānām mā bhūt

GS24pmbhasuu:746_0: atikataram brāhmaṇakulam iti . tyadādividhau ca . tyadādividhau ca prayojanam . atikrāntaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:746_4: . upasarjanapratiṣedhaḥ ca na kartavyaḥ . anupasarjanāt iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:747: anupasarjana* a* at iti . kim idam a* at iti . akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau . yadi evam atiyuṣmat atyasmat iti na sidhyati . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:748_0: anupasarjana* a* a* at iti . akārāntāt akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:748_1: . atha vā aṅgādhikāre yat ucyate gṛhyamāṇavibhakteḥ tat bhavati . yadi evam paramapañca
GS24pmbhasuu:748_2: paramasapta ṣaḍbhyaḥ luk iti luk na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ṣaṭpradhānaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:748_3: samāsaḥ . iha tarhi priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena anaṅ na prāpnoti . saptamīnirdiṣṭe yat
GS24pmbhasuu:748_4: ucyate prakṛtavibhaktau tat bhavati . yadi evam atitat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:750_0: atitadaḥ iti atvam prāpnoti . tat ca api vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat adḍ
GS24pmbhasuu:750_1: ḍatarādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ iti pañcamī aṅgasya iti ṣaṣṭhī . tatra aśakyam vivibhaktitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:750_2: ḍatarādibhyaḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam viśeṣayitum . tatra kim anyat śakyam viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:750_3: anyat ataḥ vihitāt pratyayāt . ḍatarādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . iha idānīm asthidadhisakhthyakṣṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:750_4: anaṅ udāttaḥ iti tyadādīnām aḥ bhavati iti asthyādīnām iti eṣā ṣaṣṭhī aṅgasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:750_5: api tyadādīnām iti api ṣaṣṭhī aṅgasya iti api . tatra kāmacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:751: gṛhyamāṇena vā vibhaktim viśeṣayitum aṅgena vā . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ iha tāvat asthidadhisakhthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ iti aṅgena vibhaktim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ asthyādibhiḥ anaṅam :
GS24pmbhasuu:752: aṅgasya vibhaktau anaṅ bhavati asthyādīnām iti . iha idānīm tyadādīnām aḥ bhavati iti gṛhyamāṇena vibhaktim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ aṅgena akāram :
GS24pmbhasuu:753: tyadādīnām vibhaktau aḥ bhavati aṅgasya iti . yadi evam atisaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:754: atvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tyadādipradhānaḥ eṣaḥ samāsaḥ . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam . pāṭhaviśeṣaṇam idam :
GS24pmbhasuu:755: sarveṣām yāni nāmāni tāni sarvādīni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete . yadi evam sañjñāśrayam yat kāryam tat na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:757: āmi sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ iti . anvarthagrahaṇam tatra vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:758: sarveṣām yat nāma tat sarvanāma . sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya ṅeḥ smai bhavati . sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya āmaḥ suṭ bhavati . yadi evam sakalam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:760_0: jagat iti atra api prāpnoti . eteṣām ca api śabdānām ekaikasya saḥ saḥ viṣayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:760_1: tasmin tasmin viṣaye yaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ vartate tasya tasya tasmin tasmin vartamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:760_2: sarvanāmakāryam prāpnoti . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate . pāṭhaḥ ca eva viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:760_3: sañjñā ca . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:761: sarvādīni ca sarvādīni ca sarvādīni . sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni bhavanti . sarveṣām yāni ca nāmāni tāni sarvādīni .
GS24pmbhasuu:762_0: sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete . atha vā mahatī iyam sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:762_1: ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:762_2: sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni
GS24pmbhasuu:762_3: bhavanti sarveṣām nāmāni iti ca ataḥ sarvanāmāni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete .

GS24pmbhasuu:765_1: dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt . anyeṣām sarvanāmkāryāṇām abhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:765_2: . ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ . anyāni ca sarvanāmakāryāṇi ekavacanabahuvacaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:765_3: ucyante . yadā punaḥ ayam ubhaśabdaḥ dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ kaḥ idānīm asya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:765_4: bhavati . ubhayaḥ anyatra . ubhayaśabdaḥ asya anyatra bahvati . ubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:766_0: ubhayaḥ maṇiḥ iti . kim ca syāt yadi atra akac na syāt . kaḥ prasajyeta . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:766_1: idānīm kākacoḥ viśeṣaḥ . ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ iti uktam . tatra akaci
GS24pmbhasuu:766_2: sati akacaḥ tanmadhyapatitatvāt śakyate etat vaktum :
GS24pmbhasuu:767_0: dvivacanaparaḥ ayam iti . ke punaḥ sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra dvivacanaparatā
GS24pmbhasuu:767_1: vaktavyā . yathā eva tarhi ke sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ evam āpi api sati na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:767_2: dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra api dvivacanaparatā vaktavyā . avacanāt api tatparavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:767_3: . antareṇa api vacanam āpi dvivacanaparaḥ ayam bhaviṣyati . kim vaktavyam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:767_4: na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ekādeśe kṛte dvivacanaparaḥ ayam antādivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:767_5: . avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam iti cet ke api tulyam . avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:767_6: iti cet ke api antareṇa vacanam dvivacanaparaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham . svārthikāḥ pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:767_7: prakṛtitaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti iti prakṛtigrahaṇena svārthikānām api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:767_8: . atha bhavataḥ sarvanāmatve kāni projanāni . bhavataḥ akaccheṣātvāni . bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:769: saḥ ca bhavān ca bhavantau . ātvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:770: bhavādṛk iti . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . udāharaṇamātram iti āha . tṛtīyādayaḥ api hi iṣyante . sarvanāmnaḥ tṛtīyā ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:774_0: 289-291 diggrahaṇam kimartham . na bahuvrīhau iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tatra na
GS24pmbhasuu:774_1: jñāyate kva vibhāṣā kva pratiṣedhaḥ iti . diggrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:774_2: . digupadiṣṭe vibhāṣā anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ . atha samāsagrahaṇam kimartham. samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:774_3: eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra yathā syāt . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:775_0: dakṣiṇadakṣiṇasyai dehi iti . atha bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kimartham . dvandve mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:775_1: dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . dvandve ca iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:775_2: . na aprāpte pratiṣedhe iyam paribhāṣā ārabhyate . sā yathā eva bahuvrīhau iti etam
GS24pmbhasuu:775_3: pratiṣedham bādhate evam dvandve ca iti etam api bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:775_4: . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte na bahuvrīhau iti etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:775_5: pratiṣedhe iyam paribhāṣā ārabhyate . dvandve ca iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:775_6: ca . atha vā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā na
GS24pmbhasuu:775_7: bahuvrīhau iti etam pratiṣedham bādhiṣyate dvandve ca iti etam pratiṣedham na bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:775_8: . atha vā idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:776: yā pūrvā sā uttarā asya unmugdhasya saḥ ayam pūrvottaraḥ unmugdhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:777_0: tasmai pūrvottarāya dehi . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:777_1: evam na arthaḥ bahuvrīhigrahaṇena . dvandve kasmāt na bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:777_2: pratipadoktasya eva iti . uttarārtham tarhi bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:777_3: . kriyate tatra eva bahuvrīhau iti . dvitīyam kartavyam . bahuvrīhiḥ eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:777_4: tatra yathā syāt . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:778: ekaikasmai dehi . etat api na asti prayojanam. samāse iti vartate . tena bahuvrīhim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:779_0: samāsaḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . avayavabhūtasya api bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:779_1: pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt vastram antaram eṣām te ime vastrāntarāḥ vasanam
GS24pmbhasuu:779_2: antaram eṣām te ime vasanāntarāḥ vastrāntarāḥ ca vasanāntarāḥ ca vastrāntaravasanāntarāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:781: 291-293 kim udāharaṇam . priyaviśvāya . na etat asti prayojanam . sarvādyantasya bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam . vakṣyati ca etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:782: bahuvrīhau sarvanāmasaṅkhyayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam iti . tatra viśvapriyāya iti bhavitavyam . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:783: dvyanyāya tryanyāya . nanu ca atra api sarvanāmnaḥ eva pūrvanipātena bhavitavyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:784_0: saṅkhyāsarvanāmnoḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ paratvāt tatra saṅkhyāyāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:784_1: iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam priyaviśvāya . nanu ca uktam viśvapriyāya iti bhavitavyam

GS24pmbhasuu:785_1: bhavitavyam . kim tarhi . asarvādyantasya api bhavitavyam . kim prayojanam . akac

GS24pmbhasuu:785_3: . vyañjanānteṣu viśeṣaḥ . ahakam pitā asya makatpitṛkaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:786: tvakam pitā asya tvakatpitṛkaḥ iti prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:787_0: matkapitṛkaḥ tvatkapitṛkaḥ iti ca iṣyate . katham punaḥ icchatā api bhavatā bahiraṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:787_1: pratiṣedhena antaraṅgaḥ vidhiḥ śakhyaḥ bādhitum . antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:787_2: vidhiḥ bādhate gomatpriyaḥ iti yathā . kriyate tatra yatnaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:788: pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti . nanu ca iha api kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:789_0: na bahuvrīhau iti . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . priyaviśvāya . upasarjanapratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:789_1: api etat siddham . ayam khalu api bahuvrīhiḥ asti eva prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:789_2: aikasvaryam aikavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:790_0: bahuvrīhyarthāni padāni bahuvrīhiḥ iti . tat yat tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya idam
GS24pmbhasuu:790_1: grahaṇam . gonardīyaḥ āha akacsvarau tu kartavyau pratyaṅgam muktasaṃśayau . tvakatpitṛkaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:802_1: ca punaḥ sūtrapāṭhe grahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . gaṇe paṭhitatvāt . gaṇe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:802_2: etāni paṭhyante . katham punaḥ jñāyate saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:802_3: tāni hi pūrvādīni imāni avarādīni . imāni api pūrvādīni . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:802_4: jñāpayati saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti yat ayam pūrvādibhyaḥ navabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:802_5: vā iti navagrahaṇam karoti . nava eva pūrvādīni . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:803_0: vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . evaṃviśiṣṭāni
GS24pmbhasuu:803_1: eva etāni gaṇe paṭhyante . idam tarhi prayojanam dvyādiparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:803_2: bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na eṣām dvyādiparyudāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:803_3: paryudāsaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam pūrvatra asiddham iti nipātanam karoti . vārttikakāraḥ ca paṭhati :
