GS24pmbhasuu:894_0: anuttarapadasthasya iti vartate . tatra mukhasvaraḥ ekaḥ prayojayati . na ca ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:894_1: prayojanam yogārambham prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:896: 320-322 śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ . śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śeḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:897: kuṇḍāni tiṣṭhanti vanāni tiṣṭhanti . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ anapuṃsakasya iti . na hi nañaḥ napuṃsakena sāmarthyam. kena tarhi . bhavatinā :
GS24pmbhasuu:898: na bhavati napuṃsakasya iti . yat tāvat ucyate śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ iti . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:899: napuṃsakasya na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:900_0: yat anyat napuṃsakāt iti . napuṃsake avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:900_1: . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:900_2: . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:900_3: . tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:900_4: satī bādhitum . yat api ucyate . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ iti yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:900_5: vaktavyaḥ atha vā etarhi bahūni prayojanāni . kāni . asūryampaśyāni mukhāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:904_0: 322-323 na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasañjñākaraṇam . na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasya sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:904_1: kartavyā . navāśabdasya yaḥ arthaḥ tasya sañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:904_2: . śabdasañjñāyām hi arthāsampratyayaḥ yathā anyatra . śabdasañjñāyām hi satyām arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:904_3: asampratyayaḥ syāt yathā anyatra . anyatra api śabdasañjñāyām śabdasya sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:904_4: bhavati na arthasya . kva anyatra . dādhāḥ ghu adāp taraptamapau ghaḥ iti ghugrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:904_5: ghagrahaṇeṣu ca śabdasya sampratyayaḥ bhavati na arthasya . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:904_6: na vaktavyam . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ . itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . saḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:904_7: bhaviṣyati . kim gatam etat itinā āhosvit śabādhikyāt arthādhikyam . gatam iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:904_8: . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke gauḥ ayam iti āha iti gośabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:904_9: prayujyamānaḥ gośabdam svasmāt padārthāt pracyāvayati . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:904_10: pracyutaḥ yā asau arthapadārthakatā tasyāḥ śabdapadārthakaḥ sampadyate . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:904_11: api navāśabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ prayujyamānaḥ navāśabdam svasmāt padārthāt pracyāvayati
GS24pmbhasuu:904_12: . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt pracyutaḥ yā asau śabdapadārthakatā tasyāḥ laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:904_13: artham sampratyāyayati . na vā iti yat gamyate na vā iti yat pratīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:907: navā kuṇḍikā navā ghaṭikā iti . kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api vibhāṣāsañjñā syāt . vibhāṣā diksamāse bahuvrīhau :
GS24pmbhasuu:908_0: dakṣiṇapūrvasyām śālāyām . acirakṛtāyām sampratyayaḥ syāt . na vā vidhipūrvakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:908_1: pratiṣedhasamapratyayaḥ yathā loke . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . vidhipūrvakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:908_2: . vidhāya kim cit na vā iti ucyate . tena pratiṣedhavācinaḥ samapratyayaḥ bhavati . tat yathā loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:909_0: grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ na vā . na iti gamyate . asti kārṇam yena loke pratiṣedhavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:909_1: samapratyayaḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . viliṅgam hi bhavān loke nirdeśam karoti . āṅga
GS24pmbhasuu:909_2: hi samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyatām pratyagravācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:910: grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ navaḥ . pratyagraḥ iti gamyate . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:911: kva cit vyākaraṇe samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate iti . api ca kāmacāraḥ prayoktuḥ śabdānām abhisambandhe . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:912: yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā navā . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ bhujinā abhisambadhyate bhujiḥ navāśabdena tadā pratiṣedhavācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:913: yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā navā . na iti gamyate . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ navāśabdena abhisambadhyate na bhujinā tadā pratyagravācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:914: yavāgūḥ navā bhavatā bhoktavyā . pratyagrā iti gamyate . na ca iha vayam vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sarvādīni abhisambadhnīmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:915: diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni vibhāṣā bhavanti iti . kim tarhi . bhavatiḥ abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:916: diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni bhavanti vibhāṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:918: 325-328 vidhyanityatvam anupapannam pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . vidhyanityatvam na upapadyate : śuśāva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:923_0: śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam . pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . pratiṣedhasya iyam sañjñā kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:923_1: . tena vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu pratiṣedhasya eva sampratyayaḥ syāt . siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:923_2: . siddham etat . katham . prasajyapratiṣedhāt . prasajya kim cit na vā iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:923_3: . tena ubhayam bhaviṣyati . vipratiṣiddham tu . vipratiṣiddham tu bhavati . atra na jñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:924_0: kena abhiprāyeṇa prasajati kena nivṛttim karoti iti . na vā prasaṅgasāmarthyāt anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:924_1: pratiṣedhaviṣayāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . prasaṅgasāmarthyāt . prasaṅgasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:924_2: ca vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati anyatra pratiṣedhaviṣayāt pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:924_3: bhaviṣyati anyatra vidhiviṣayāt . tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yā aprāpte vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:924_4: . yā hi prāpte kṛtasāmarthyaḥ tatra pūrveṇa vidhiḥ iti kṛtvā pratiṣedhasya eva sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:924_5: syāt . etat api siddham . katham . vibhāṣā iti mahatīsañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:924_6: yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:924_7: karaṇe etat prayojanam ubhayoḥ sañjñā yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:925: na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra yā tāvat aprāpte vibhāṣā tatra pratiṣedhyam na asti iti kṛtvā vā iti anena vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati . yā hi prāpte vibhāṣā tatra ubhayam upasthitam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:926_0: na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra na iti anena pratiṣiddhe vā iti anena vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:926_1: . evam api vipratiṣedhayoḥ yugapadvacanānupapattiḥ . vipratiṣedhayoḥ yugapadvacanam na upapadyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:927_0: śuśāva śuśuvatuḥ śuśuvuḥ śiśvāya śiśviyatuḥ śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam . bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:927_1: cet na pratiṣedhaḥ . bhavati iti cet pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na iti cet na vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:927_2: . na it cet vidhiḥ na sidhyati . siddham tu pūrvasya uttareṇa bādhitatvāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:927_3: etat. katham . pūrvavidhim uttarvidhiḥ bādhate . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśāṛthaḥ iti uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:929_0: 328-332 sādhvanuśāsane asmin yasya vibhāṣā tasya sādhutvam . sādhvanuśāsane asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:929_1: śāstre yasya vibhāṣā kriyate saḥ vibhāṣā sādhuḥ syāt . samāsaḥ ca eva hi vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:929_2: . tena samāsasya eva vibhāṣā sādhutvam syāt . astu . yaḥ sādhuḥ saḥ prayokṣyate.
GS24pmbhasuu:929_3: asādhuḥ na prayokṣyate . na ca eva hi kadā cit rājapuruṣaḥ iti asyām avasthāyām asādhutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:929_4: iṣyate . api ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . dvaidham śabdānām apratipattiḥ . icchāmaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:929_5: punaḥ vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu dvaidham śabdānām pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:929_6: . yasya punaḥ kāryāḥ śabdāḥ vibhāṣā asau samāsam nirvartayati . yasya api nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:929_7: śabdāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sādhutvam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:930: samāsaḥ iti eṣā sañjñā vibhāṣā bhavati iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:931: medhyaḥ paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . na etat vicāryate :
GS24pmbhasuu:932_0: anaḍvān na anaḍvān iti . kim tarhi ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti . kārye yugapadanvācayayaugapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:932_1: . kāryeṣu śabdeṣu yugapat anvācayena ca yat ucyate tasya yugapadvacanatā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:934_0: ḍhak ca maṇḍūkāt iti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ śabdāḥ prayuktānām asau sādhutvam anvācaṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:934_1: . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . pratyayaḥ paraḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:934_2: iti ucyate . na ca ekasyāḥ prakṛteḥ anekasya pratyayasya yugapat paratvena sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:934_3: asti . na api brūmaḥ pratyayamālā prāpnoti . kim tarhi . kartavyam iti prayoktavye
GS24pmbhasuu:934_4: yugapat dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca prayogaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthagatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:934_5: śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:934_6: tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ācāryadeśaśīlane
GS24pmbhasuu:934_7: ca tadviṣayatā . ācāryadeśaśīlanena yat ucyate tasya tadviṣayatā prāpnoti . ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:934_8: hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ gālavasya prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam iti gālavāḥ eva hrasvān prayuñjīran
GS24pmbhasuu:934_9: prākṣu ca eva hi phin syāt . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:935_0: jamadagniḥ vai etat pañcamam avadānam avādyat tasmāt na ajāmadagnyaḥ pañcāvattam
GS24pmbhasuu:935_1: juhoti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ śabdāḥ gālavagrahaṇam tasya pūjārtham deśagrahaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:935_2: kīrtyartham . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api pūjārtham gālavagrahaṇam syāt deśagraham
GS24pmbhasuu:935_3: ca kīrtyartham . tatkīrtane ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . tatkīrtane ca dvaidham śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:935_4: apratipattiḥ syāt . icchāmaḥ ca punaḥ ācāryagrahaṇeṣu deśagrahaṇeṣu ca dvaidham śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:935_5: pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:937_0: 332-333 aśiṣyaḥ vā viditatvāt . aśiṣyaḥ vā punaḥ ayam yogaḥ . kim kāraṇam . viditatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:937_1: . yat anena yogena prārthyate tasya arthasya viditatvāt . ye api hi etām sañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:937_2: na ārabhante te api vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . yājñikāḥ khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:937_3: sañjñām anārabhamāṇāḥ vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . tat yathā . medhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:937_4: paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:937_5: gamyate . ācāryaḥ khalu api sañjñām ārabhamāṇaḥ bhūyiṣṭham anyaiḥ api śabdaiḥ etam
GS24pmbhasuu:937_6: artham sampratyāyayati bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:939: 333-339 aprāpte trisaṃśayāḥ . itaḥ uttaram yāḥ vibhāṣāḥ anukramiṣyāmaḥ aprāpte tāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ . trisaṃśayāḥ tu bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:940: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . dvandve ca vibhāṣā jasi :
GS24pmbhasuu:941_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:941_1: vā ubhayatra . ubhayaśabdaḥ sarvādiṣu paṭhyate tayapaḥ ca ayajādeśaḥ kriyate . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:941_2: vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . ayac pratyayāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:941_3: . yadi pratyayāntaram ubhayī iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . mātracaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:941_4: evam bhaviṣyati . katham . mātrac iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:941_5: . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . mātraśabdāt prabhṛti ā āyacaḥ cakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:942: atra api prāpnoti . ataḥ iti vartate . evam api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti . sadṛśasya api asanniviṣṭasya na bhaviṣyati pratyāhāreṇa grahaṇam . ūrṇoḥ vibhāṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:943_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:943_1: vā ubhayatra . asaṃyogāt liṭ kit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:943_2: vā iti . aprāpte . anyat hi kittvam anyat ṅittvam . ekam cet ṅitkitau . yadi ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:943_3: ṅitkitau tataḥ asti sandehaḥ . atha hi nānā na asti sandehaḥ . yadi api nānā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:943_4: api sandehaḥ . katham . praurṇuvi iti . sārvadhātukam apit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:943_5: vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . vibhāṣā upayamane :
GS24pmbhasuu:944_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:944_1: vā ubhayatra . gandhane iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:944_2: aprāpte . gandhane iti nivṛttam . anupasargāt vā :
GS24pmbhasuu:945_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:945_1: vā ubhayatra . vṛttisargatāyaneṣu kramaḥ iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:945_2: vā iti . aprāpte . vṛttyādiṣu iti nivṛttam . vibhāṣā vṛkṣamṛgādīnām :
GS24pmbhasuu:946_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:946_1: vā ubhayatra . jātiḥ aprāṇinām iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:946_2: iti . aprāpte . jātiḥ aprāṇinām iti nivṛttam . uṣavidajāgṛbhyaḥ anyatarasyām :
GS24pmbhasuu:947_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:947_1: vā ubhayatra . pratyayāntāt iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:948_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:948_1: vā ubhayatra . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:948_2: iti . aprāpte . kartari iti vartate . evam api sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:949_0: nyāyye vā kartari karmakartari vā iti . na asti sandehaḥ . sakarmakasya kartā karmavat
GS24pmbhasuu:949_1: bhavati akarmakāḥ ca dīpādayaḥ . akarmakāḥ api vai sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:949_2: . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇām ca bhavanti kartṛsthabhāvakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:950_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:950_1: vā ubhayatra . ābhīkṣṇye iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:950_2: . aprāpte . ābhīkṣṇye iti nivṛttam . tṛnādīnām vibhāṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:951_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:951_1: vā ubhayatra . ākrośe iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:951_2: . ākrośe iti nivṛttam . ekahalādau pūrayitavye anyatarasyām . prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:951_3: vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . udakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:951_4: udaḥ sañjñāyām iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:951_5: . sañjñāyām iti nivṛttam . śvādeḥ iñi padāntasya anyatarasyām . prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:951_6: vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . iñi iti

GS24pmbhasuu:1047_3: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhakte dīrghanalopasvaraṇatvānusvāraśībhāvāḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1048: kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dīrgha . nalopa :
GS24pmbhasuu:1050: agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1051: ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa . svara :
GS24pmbhasuu:1053: sarvāṇi jyotīṃṣi . sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . svara . ṇatva :
GS24pmbhasuu:1055: māṣavāpāṇi vrīhivāpāṇi . pūrvānte prātipadikāntanakārasya iti siddham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1057: abhakte numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:1061: parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_0: trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . napuṃsakāt uttarasya auṅaḥ śībhāvaḥ bhavati iti śībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_1: na prāpnoti . śībhāva . evam tarhi parādiḥ kariṣyate . parādau guṇavṛddhyauttvadīrghanalopānusvāraśībhāvenakārapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1066: trapuṇe jatune tumburuṇe . gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇa . vṛddhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1068: atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . sakhyuḥ asambuddhau iti ṇittve acaḥ ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . vṛddhi . auttva :
GS24pmbhasuu:1070: trapuṇi jatuni tumburuṇi . idudbhyām aut at ca gheḥ iti auttvam prāpnoti . auttva . dīrgha :
GS24pmbhasuu:1072: kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1073: asthīni dadhīni priyasakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . dīrgha . nalopa :
GS24pmbhasuu:1075: agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1076: ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa . anusvāra :
GS24pmbhasuu:1079: parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1083_0: trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . sanumkasya śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1083_1: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1083_2: kasmāt . numā vyavahitatvāt . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1083_3: dvigusvaraḥ ca . yadi pūrvantaḥ kriyate napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1085_0: pañcāratninī daśāratninī . numi kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnunvanti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1085_1: vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ num ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1088: saṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na utsahate avayavasya igantatām vihantum iti kṛtvā dvigusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1090: 357-359 kimartham idam ucyate . ecaḥ ik savarṇākāranivṛttyartham . ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ucyate savarṇanivṛttyartham akāranivṛttyartham ca . savarṇnivṛttyartham tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_0: eṅaḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti . akāranivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_1: ca . imau aicau samāhāravarṇau . mātrā avarṇasya mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ . tayoḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_2: kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau . mā kadā cit avarṇam bhūt iti evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_3: idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . dīrghāḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_4: ikaḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca hrasvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_5: iti ucyate . tena dīrghāḥ na bhaviṣyanti . viṣyārtham etat syāt . ecaḥ hrasvaprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_6: ik bhavati iti . dīrghāprasaṅgaḥ tu nivartakatvāt . dīrghāṇām tu ikām aprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_7: . kim kāraṇam . nivartakatvāt . na anena ikaḥ nirvartyante . kim tarhi . anikaḥ nivartyante
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_8: . siddhāḥ eva hrasvāḥ ikaḥ ca anikaḥ ca . tatra anena anikaḥ nivartyante . savarṇanivṛttyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_9: tāvat na arthaḥ . siddham eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt . siddham etat . katham . eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_10: ikārokārau bhaviṣyataḥ . ardhaḥ ekāraḥ aradhaḥ okāraḥ vā na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_11: eṅaḥ sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraukārau . na tau staḥ . yadi hi tau syātām tau eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1091_12: ayam upadiśet . nanu ca bhoḥ chandogānām sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ ardham ekāram ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:1094_0: śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat iti . pārṣadakṛtiḥ eṣā tatrabhavatām . na eva loke
GS24pmbhasuu:1094_1: na anyasmin vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti . akāranivṛttyarthena api na
GS24pmbhasuu:1094_2: arthaḥ . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt avarṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1094_3: . bhūyasī mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ alpīyasī avarṇasya . bhūyasaḥ eva grahaṇāni bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1094_4: . tat yathā brāhmaṇagrāmaḥ ānīyatām iti ucyate tatra ca avarataḥ pañcakārukī bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1096: 360 kim idam sthāneyogā iti . sthāne yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā . saptamyalopaḥ nipātanāt . tṛtiyāyā vā etvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1097: sthānena yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_0: 360-364 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . niyamāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_2: . iṣyate ca vyākaraṇe yā ṣaṣṭhī sā sthāneyogā eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_3: na sidhyati iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_4: asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ śāsaḥ gohaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_5: iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ tu na sidhyanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_6: śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti gohaḥ ca antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_7: syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprāptiḥ yogasya asandigdhatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_8: avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca niyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yogasya asandigdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_9: . sandehe niyamaḥ na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1099_10: . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate. laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāṇtaḥ . tat yathā loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:1101_0: grāmāntaram gamiṣyāmi panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe . amuṣmin
GS24pmbhasuu:1101_1: avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ amuṣmin avakāśe hastavāmaḥ iti . yaḥ tu atra tiryakpathaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1101_2: bhavati na tasmin sandehaḥ iti kṛtvā na asau upadiśyate . evam iha api sandehe niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1101_3: na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . atha vā sthāne ayogā sthāneyogā kim idam ayogā
GS24pmbhasuu:1101_4: iti . avyaktayogā ayogā . atha vā yogavatī yogā . kā punaḥ yogavatī . yasyāḥ bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1101_5: yogāḥ . kutaḥ etat . bhūmni hi matup bhavati . viśiṣṭā vā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1101_6: vā kim cid liṅgam āsajya vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_0: itthaṃliṅgā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā bhavati iti . na tat liṅgam avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_1: . yadi evam śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ śā hau śāsigrahaṇam kartavyam sthāneyogārtham liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_2: āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . na kartavyam . yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_3: etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . katham . adhikāraḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_4: triprakāraḥ . kaḥ cit ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati yathā pradīpaḥ supravijvalitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_5: sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ yathā rajjvā ayasā vā baddham kāṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_6: anukṛṣyate tadvat anukṛṣyate cakāreṇa . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_7: iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . tat yadā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_8: iti tadā hi yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakaṛtam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_9: sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . sampratyayamātram etat bhavati . na hi anuccārya
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_10: śabdam liṅgam śakyam āsaṅktum . evam tarhi ādeśe tat liṅgam kariṣyate tat prakṛtim
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_11: āskantsyati . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate yatra ekā ṣaṣṭhī anekam ca viśeṣyam tatra na sidhyati : aṅgasya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_0: samprasāraṇasya iti . hal api viśeṣyaḥ aṇ api viśeṣyaḥ samprasāraṇam api viśeṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_1: . asati punaḥ niyame kāmacāraḥ ekayā ṣaṣthyā anekam viśeṣayitum . tat yathā . devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_2: putraḥ pāṇiḥ kambalaḥ iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ niyamena . nanu ca uktam ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_3: yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_4: api loke bahavaḥ abhisambandhāḥ ārthāḥ yaunāḥ maukhāḥ srauvāḥ ca śabdasya tu śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_5: kaḥ anyaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ sthānāt . śabdasya api śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_6: anantarādayaḥ abhisambandhāḥ . asteḥ bhūḥ bhavati iti sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1106: sthāne anantare samīpe iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1107_0: vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . sthāne iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1107_1: . na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . ṣaṣṭhyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:1107_2: sthānena yathā yujyeta yataḥ ṣaṣṭhī uccāritā . kim kṛtam bhavati . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1107_3: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1111: tālusthānasya tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānasya oṣṭhasthānaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti . saṅkhyātānudeśena api etat siddham . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1112: tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahuvarthaḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca etat api saṅkhyātānudeśena eva siddham . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1117_0: kaṇṭhasthānayoḥ kaṇṭhasthānaḥ tālusthānayoḥ tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānayoḥ oṣṭhasthānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1117_1: yathā syāt iti . atha sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthānagrahaṇam kimartham . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1117_2: anekavidham āntaryam tatra sthānataḥ eva āntaryam balīyaḥ yathā syāt . kim punaḥ tat . cetā stotā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1118_0: pramāṇataḥ akāraḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti sthānataḥ ekāraukārau . punaḥ sthānagrahaṇāt ekāraukārau
GS24pmbhasuu:1118_1: bhavataḥ . atha tamabgrahaṇam kimartham . jhayaḥ haḥ anyatarasyām iti atra soṣmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1118_2: soṣmāṇaḥ iti dvitīyāḥ prasaktāḥ nādavataḥ nādavantaḥ iti tṛtīyāḥ . tamapgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:1118_3: soṣmāṇaḥ nādavantaḥ ca te bhavanti caturthāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1121: 366-370 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt sthānentaratamavacanam . sthānī ekatvena nirdiśyate : akaḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1123_0: dīrghaḥ iti . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:1123_1: sarvatra prāpnuvanti . iṣyate ca antaratamāḥ eva syuḥ iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:1123_2: na sidhyati . tasmāt sthāne antaratamaḥ iti vacanam niyamārtham . evamartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1123_3: ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathā punaḥ iyam antaratamanirvṛtttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1126: sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . kutaḥ punaḥ iyam vicāraṇā . ubhayathā api tulyā saṃhitā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1128: uraṇ raparaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prakṛtitaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1130: yaṇām ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1131: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1132: dadhi atra madhu atra . kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1133: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:1134: guṇavṛddhyoḥ ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1135: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1136: netā lavitā nāyakaḥ lāvakaḥ . cetā stotā cāyakaḥ stāvakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1137: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge guṇavṛddhyoḥ yat antaratamam ṛvarṇam tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1138: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1142: hārakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1143: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . atha ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ayam doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1145: sthāninirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . okāraukārayoḥ iti vaktavyam ekāraikārayoḥ mā bhūt iti . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām vāntādeśasya yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1146_0: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa sthāninirdeśam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1146_1: ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . katham . vāntagrahaṇam na kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1146_2: . yi pratyaye ecaḥ ayādayaḥ bhavanti iti eva. yadi na kriyate ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1147: jeyam iti atra api prāpnoti . kṣayyajayyau śakyārthe iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1148: kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ iti . tayoḥ tarhi śakyārthāt anyatra api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1149: kṣeyam pāpam jeyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1150: kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ anayoḥ ca śakyāṛthe eva iti . iha api tarhi niyamāt na prāpnoti : lavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1151_0: pavyam avaśyalāvyam avaśyapāvyam iti . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1151_1: . yathājātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . kathañjātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . ekāraḥ . evam api rāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1151_2: icchati raiyati atra api prāpnoti . rāyiḥ chāndasaḥ . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1152: ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām upadhāgrahaṇam kartavyam . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ūkārasya gohaḥ yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1153_0: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa upadhāgrahaṇam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1153_1: ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva . radābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1154: ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām takāragrahaṇam kartavyam . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām nakārasya niṣṭhāyām yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1155: yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa takāragrahaṇam siddham bhavati . ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva .

GS24pmbhasuu:1161_1: dadhiśabdaḥ eva madhuśabdasya madhuśabdaḥ eva ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi ca evam kva
GS24pmbhasuu:1163_0: musalam musalam . iṇkoḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . api ca iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta
GS24pmbhasuu:1163_1: . tat yathā tapte bhrāṣṭre tilāḥ kṣiptāḥ muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭhante evam ime varṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1163_2: muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭheran . astu tarhi pratipādakam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_0: anyena nirvṛttānām anena pratipattiḥ . nirvṛttapratipattau nirvṛttiḥ . nirvṛttapratipattau
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_1: nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati . sarve sarvatra prāpnuvanti . kim tarhi ucyate nirvṛttiḥ na

GS24pmbhasuu:1164_3: iti . kim tarhi . iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . na sarve sarvatra iṣyante . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_4: idānīm kimartham syāt . anarthakam ca . anarthakam etat syāt . yaḥ hi bhuktavantam
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_5: brūyāt mā bhukthāḥ iti kim tena kṛtam syāt . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_6: vacanāt iti . ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ayam yogaḥ kartvyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1167_0: 372-373 pratyātmavacanam ca . pratyātmam iti ca vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1167_1: yasya antaratamaḥ sa tasya sthāne yathā syāt anyasya antaratamaḥ anyasya sthāne mā
GS24pmbhasuu:1167_2: bhūt iti . pratyātmavacanam aśiṣyam svabhāvasiddhatvāt . pratyātmavacanam aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1167_3: . kim kāraṇam . svabhāvasiddhatvāt . svabhāvataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1168_0: samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ucyate . na ca ucyate pratyātmam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1168_1: pratyātmam ca āsate . antaratamavacanam ca . antaratamavacanam ca aśiṣyam . yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1168_2: ca api ayam aśiṣyaḥ . kutaḥ . svabhāvasiddhatvāt eva . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1169_0: samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ukte na eva kṛśāḥ kṛśaiḥ saha āsata na
GS24pmbhasuu:1169_1: pāṇḍavaḥ pāṇḍubhiḥ . yeṣām eva kim cit arthakṛtam āntaryam taiḥ eva saḥ āsate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1169_2: gāvaḥ divasam caritavatyaḥ yaḥ yasyāḥ prasavaḥ bhavati tena saha śerate . tathā yāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1169_3: etāni goyuktakāni saṅghuṣṭakāni bhavanti tāni anyonyam paśyanti sabdam kurvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1169_4: evam tāvat cetanāvatsu . acetaneṣu api . loṣṭaḥ kṣiptaḥ bāhuvegam gatvā na eva tiryak
GS24pmbhasuu:1169_5: gacchati na ūrdhvam ārohati pṛthivīvikāraḥ pṛthivīm gacchati āntaryataḥ . tathā yā

GS24pmbhasuu:1169_7: gacchati na avāk avarohati abvikāraḥ apaḥ eva gacchati āntaryataḥ . tathā jyotiṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1169_8: vikāraḥ arciḥ ākāśadeśe nivāte suprajvalitaḥ na eva tiryak gacchati na avāk avarohati

GS24pmbhasuu:1171: 373-377 vyañjanasvaravyatikrame ca tatkālaprasaṅgaḥ . vyañjanavyatikrame svaravyatikrame ca tatkālatā prāpnoti . vyañjanavyatikrame :

GS24pmbhasuu:1172_1: na eva loke na ca vede ardhamātrikaḥ ik asti . kaḥ tarhi . mātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1173_0: dadhi atra madhu atra kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti . āntaryataḥ mātrikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1173_1: dvimātrikasya ikaḥ mātrikaḥ dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ prāpnoti . na eva loke na ca vede
GS24pmbhasuu:1173_2: mātrikaḥ dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ asti .kaḥ tarhi . ardhamātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1173_3: . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu tatkālatā prāpnoti . idamaḥ iś :
GS24pmbhasuu:1174_0: āntaryataḥ ardhtṛtīyamātrasya idamaḥ sthāne ardhtṛtīyamātram ivarṇam prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1174_1: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti evam na bhaviṣyati . guṇavṛddhyejbhāveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1175: khaṭvā indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ khaṭvā udakam khaṭvodakam khaṭvā īṣā khaṭveṣā khaṭvā ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā khaṭvā elakā khaṭvailakā khaṭvā odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1177_0: khaṭvā aupagavaḥ khaṭvaupagavaḥ iti . āntaryataḥ trimātrcaturmātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1177_1: ādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . tapare guṇavṛddhī . nanu ca taḥ paraḥ yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1177_2: saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1177_3: ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt : yavaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1179_0: pavaḥ iti atra na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . kim dakāre prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1179_1: . atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_0: kurvāte kurvāthe . āntaryataḥ ardhatṛtīyamātrasya ṭisañjñakasya ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_1: eḥ prāpnoti . na eva loke na ca vede ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ eḥ asti . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_2: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve guṇavṛddhisañjñakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_3: ṛvarṇasya sthāne prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_4: evañjātīyakaḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_5: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . na vā ṛvarṇasya sthāne raparaprasaṅgāt avarṇasya āntaryam . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_6: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṛvarṇasya sthāne raparaprasaṅgāt . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_7: eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . tatra ṛvarṇasya āntaryataḥ rephavataḥ rephavān akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_8: eva antaratamaḥ bhavati . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu anekāltvāt . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_9: guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ ṛvarṇasya prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvāt . anekāl śit sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_10: iti . na vā anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya avighātaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_11: . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt . yadā ayam uḥ sthāne tadā anekāl . anekāltvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_12: tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya vighātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . athavā anāntaryam eva etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_13: āntaryam . ekasya api antaratamā prakṛtiḥ na asti aparasya api antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_14: na asti . etat eva etayoḥ āntaryam . samprayogaḥ vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1180_15: vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat samprayogaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1181: tava aśvaḥ naṣṭaḥ mama api rathaḥ dagdhaḥ . ubhau samprayujyāvahai iti . evam iha api :
GS24pmbhasuu:1182_0: tava api antaratamā prakṛtiḥ na asti mama api antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ na asti . astu nau
GS24pmbhasuu:1182_1: samprayogaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . cetanāvatsu arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke samprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1182_2: bhavati . varṇāḥ ca punaḥ acetanāḥ . tatra kiṅkṛtaḥ samprayogaḥ . yadi api varṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1182_3: acetanāḥ yaḥ tu asau prayuṅkte saḥ cetanāvān . ejavarṇayoḥ ādeśe avarṇam sthāninaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1184_0: mālā aupagavaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sthāninaḥ avarṇapradhānatvāt . sthānī hi atra avarṇapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1184_1: . siddham tu ubhayāntaryāt . siddham etat . katham . ubhayoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:1184_2: bhavitavyam . na ca avarṇam ubhayoḥ antaratamam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1187: uḥ sthāne aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ ca iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1189_0: uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ eva . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1189_1: anyanivṛttyartham cet udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam anyanivṛttyartham cet
GS24pmbhasuu:1189_2: udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . ke punaḥ udāttādayaḥ . udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikāḥ . kṛtiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_0: prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi . astu tarhi uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ iti . yaḥ uḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_1: sthāne saḥ raparaḥ iti cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . yaḥ uḥ sthāne saḥ raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_2: iti cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . kartā hartā vārṣagaṇyaḥ . kim hi sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_3: ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ eṅaicau . pūrvasmin api pakṣe eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_4: . kim hi sādhīyaḥ tatra api ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ ivarṇovarṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_5: . atha matam etat uḥ sthāne aṇaḥ ca anaṇaḥ ca prasaṅge aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_6: iti siddhā pūrvasmin pakṣe avarṇasya pratipattiḥ . yat tu tat uktam udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_7: bhavati iti iha saḥ doṣaḥ jāyate . na jāyate . jāyate saḥ doṣaḥ . katham . udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_8: iti anena aṇaḥ api pratinirdiśyante anaṇaḥ api . yadi api pratinirdiśyante na tu
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_9: prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati . kutaḥ nu khalu dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_10: sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ sthāne antaratamaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti ca sthāne antaratamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1194_11: iti anayā paribhāṣayā vyavasthā bhaviṣyati na punaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . ataḥ kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1195: udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ iti . ye ca api ete ṛvarṇasya sthāne pratipadam ādeśāḥ ucyante teṣu raparatvam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1196_0: ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ ut oṣṭhyapūrvasya iti . siddham tu prasaṅge raparatvāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1196_1: . katham . prasaṅge raparatvāt . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1196_2: . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . sthāne iti vartate sthānaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1196_3: ca prasaṅgavācī . yadi evam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . ādeśaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1196_4: . dvitīyam sthānagrahaṇam prakṛtam anuvartate. tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1197: uḥ sthāne aṇ sthāne iti . uḥ prasaṅge aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1199_0: 382 atha aṇgrahaṇam kimartham na uḥ raparaḥ iti eva ucyeta . uḥ raparaḥ iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1199_1: ucyamāne kaḥ idānīm raparaḥ syāt . yaḥ uḥ sthāne bhavati . kaḥ ca uḥ sthāne bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1199_2: . ādeśaḥ . ādeśaḥ raparaḥ iti cet rīrividhiṣu raparapratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśaḥ raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1199_3: iti cet rīrividhiṣu raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ rīrividhayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1205: kriyate hriyate . udāttādiṣu ca . kim . raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛtiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1210: prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi . tasmāt aṇgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1214_0: mālarśyaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1214_1: bhavati iti ucyate na ca ayam uḥ eva sthāne aṇ śiṣyate . kim tarhi . uḥ ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1214_2: ca . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham . yat atra ṛvarṇam tadāśrayam raparatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1214_3: . tat yathā māṣāḥ na bhoktavyāḥ iti miśrāḥ api na bhujyante . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1214_4: iti cet ādeśe rāntapratiṣedhaḥ . avyayavagrahaṇāt siddham iti cet ādeśe rāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1215: hotāpotārau . yathā eva uḥ ca anyasya ca sthāne aṇ raparaḥ bhavati evam yaḥ uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca saḥ api raparaḥ syāt . yadi punaḥ ṛvarṇāntasya sthāninaḥ raparatvam ucyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1217: mālarśyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1218_0: kartā hartā kirati girati . ṛvarṇāntasya iti ucyate . na ca etat ṛvarṇāntam . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:1218_1: ca etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena ṛvarṇāntam . arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ na ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1218_2: arthavān . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca raparatvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : mātuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1219: pituḥ iti . ubhayam na vaktavyam . katham . iha yaḥ dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau anyatarataḥ vyapadeśam . tat yathā devadattasya putraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1220_0: devadattāyāḥ putraḥ iti . katham mātuḥ pituḥ iti . astu atra raparatvam . kā rūpasiddiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1220_1: . rāt sasya iti sakārasya lopaḥ rephasya visarjanīyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi mātuḥ karoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1221_0: pituḥ karoti iti apratyayavisarjanīyasya iti ṣatvam prasajyeta . apratyayasvisarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1221_1: iti ucyate . pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca ayam . lupyate atra pratyayaḥ rāt sasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1221_2: . evam tarhi bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:1221_3: ayam kaskādiṣu bhrātuṣputraśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimitttāt ṣatvam bhavati iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:1223_0: 385-391 kim punaḥ ayam pūrvāntaḥ āhosvit parādiḥ āhosvit abhaktaḥ . katham ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1223_1: pūrvāntaḥ syāt katham vā parādiḥ katham vā abhaktaḥ . yadi antaḥ iti vartate tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1223_2: pūrvāntaḥ . atha ādiḥ iti vartate tataḥ parādiḥ . atha ubhayam nivṛttam tataḥ abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1223_4: pratyayāvyavasthā ca . yadi abhaktaḥ dīrghatvam na prāpnoti : gīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1224_0: pūḥ . rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam rephavakārābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1224_1: dhātuḥ viśeṣyate na punaḥ padam viśeṣyate rephavakārāntasya padasya iti . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1225: vāyuḥ iti . evam tarhi rephavakārābhyām padam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ dhātunā ikam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1226: rephavakārāntasya padasya ikaḥ dhātoḥ iti . evam api priyam grāmaṇi kulam asya priyagrāmaṇiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1227: priyasenāniḥ atra api prāpnoti . tasmāt dhātuḥ eva viśeṣyate . dhātau ca viśeṣyamāṇe iha dīrghatvam na prāpnoti : gīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1230_0: nijegilyate . graḥ yaṅi iti latvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . graḥ iti anantarayogā
GS24pmbhasuu:1230_1: eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . evam api svaḥ jegilyate iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi yaṅā ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:1230_2: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . atha vā graḥ iti pañcamī . latva . yaksvara :
GS24pmbhasuu:1231: yaksvaraḥ ca na sidhyati . gīryate svayam eva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1232_0: puryate svayam eva . acaḥ kartṛyaki iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti repheṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1232_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti na asti vyavadhānam . yaksvara . abhyastasvara :

GS24pmbhasuu:1235_1: eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti repheṇa vyavahitatvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaravidhau vyañjamam
GS24pmbhasuu:1235_2: avidyamānavat iti na asti vyavadhānam . abhyastasvara . halādiśeṣa :
GS24pmbhasuu:1237: vavṛte vavṛdhe . abhyāsasya iti halādiśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . halādiśeṣa . visarjanīya :
GS24pmbhasuu:1239: nārpatyaḥ . kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . visarjanīya . pratyayāvyavasthā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1241_0: girataḥ . rephaḥ api abhaktaḥ pratyayaḥ api . tatra vyavasthā na prakalpate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1241_1: tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte rvavadhāraṇam visarjanīyapratiṣedhaḥ yaksvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1241_2: ca . yadi pūrvāntaḥ roḥ avadhāraṇam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1242: roḥ supi . roḥ eva supi na anyasya rephasya :
GS24pmbhasuu:1244: gīrṣu pūrṣu . parādau api sati avadhāraṇam kartavyam caturṣu iti evam artham . visarjanīyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1246_0: nārpatyaḥ . kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . parādau api visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1246_1: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ nārkalpiḥ iti evamartham . kalpipadasaṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na
GS24pmbhasuu:1246_2: utsahate avayavasya padāntatām vihantum iti kṛtvā visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . yaksvaraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1249_0: puryate svayam eva . acaḥ kartṛyaki iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1249_1: upadeśe iti vartate . atha vā punaḥ astu parādiḥ . parādau akāralopautvapukpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1249_2: caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam iṭaḥ avyavasthā abhyāsalopaḥ abhyastatādisvaraḥ dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1251: ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke iti akāralopaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate . yadi upadeśe iti vartate dhinutaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1252_0: kṛṇutaḥ atra lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na upadeśagrahaṇena prakṛtiḥ abhisambadhyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1252_1: tarhi . ārdhadhātukam abhisambadhyate . ārdhadhātukopadeśe yat akārāntam iti . akāralopa . autva :
GS24pmbhasuu:1254: cakāra jahāra . ātaḥ au ṇalaḥ iti autvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1255: nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na bhavati . rephena vyavahitatvāt . autva . pukpratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1257: kārayati hārayati . ātām puk iti puk prāpnoti . pukpratiṣedhaḥ . caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam ca na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1258: acīkarat ajīharat . ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ iti hrasvatvam na prāpnoti . caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam . iṭaḥ avyavasthā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1260: āstaritā niparitā . iṭ api parādiḥ rephaḥ api . tatra vyavasthā na prakalpate . iṭaḥ avyavasthā . abhyāsalopaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1262: vavṛte vavṛdhe . abhyāsasya iti halādiśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . abhyāsalopaḥ . abhyastasvara :
GS24pmbhasuu:1265: ma hi sma te bibharuḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ajādau lasārvadhātuke iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . abhyastasvara . tādisvaraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1268: prahartā prahartum . tādau ca niti kṛti atau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1269: kṛdupadeśe vā tādyartham iḍartham iti . tādisvaraḥ . dīrghatvam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1271: pūḥ . rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1273_0: 391-392 kim idam algrahaṇam antyaviśeṣaṇam āhosvit ādeśaviśeṣaṇam . kim ca ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1273_1: yadi antyaviśeṣaṇam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . anekāl api ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1273_2: antyasya prasajyeta . yadi punaḥ al antyasya iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ anekāl
GS24pmbhasuu:1273_3: śit sarvasya iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . idam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1274_0: al eva antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ iti . evam api antyaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1274_1: kaḥ doṣaḥ . vākyasya api padasya api antyasya prasajyeta . yadi khalu api eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1274_2: tat na kriyeta iti antyaviśeṣaṇe api sati tat na kariṣyate . katham . ṅit ca alaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1275: ṅit eva anekāl antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1277_0: 392-394 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1277_1: . alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ kriyate sthāne prasaktasya . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1277_2: hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ prasajyeta . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1277_3: syuḥ . yadi punaḥ ayam yogaśeṣaḥ vijñāyeta . yogaśeṣe ca . kim . aniṣṭam prasajyete
GS24pmbhasuu:1277_4: . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya syuḥ . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1278: alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1280_0: 394-395 tātaṅ antyasya kasmāt na bhavati . ṅit ca alaḥ antyasya iti prāpnoti . tātaṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:1280_1: ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśam
GS24pmbhasuu:1280_2: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1280_3: vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . prayojanam nāma tat vaktavyam yat niyogataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1280_4: syāt . yadi ca ayam niyogataḥ sarvādeśaḥ syāt tataḥ etat prayojanam syāt . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1280_5: nu khalu etat ṅitkaraṇāt ayam sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ antyasya syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1280_6: evam tarhi etat eva jñāpayati na tātaṅ antyasya sthāne bhavati iti yat etam ṅitam
GS24pmbhasuu:1280_7: karoti . itarathā hi loṭaḥ eruprakaraṇe eva brūyāt tihyoḥ tāt āśiṣi anyatarasyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1282_0: 395-396 alaḥ antyasya adeḥ parasya anekāl śit sarvasya iti apavādavipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1282_1: . alaḥ antyasya iti utsargaḥ . tasya ādeḥ parasya anekālśit sarvasya iti apavādau
GS24pmbhasuu:1282_2: . apavādavipratiṣedhāt tu sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1283: dvīpam anvīpam . anekālśit sarvasya iti asya avakāśaḥ asteḥ bhūḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1285: ataḥ bhisaḥ ais . anekālśit sarvasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . śit sarvasya iti asya avakāśaḥ idamaḥ iś : itaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1286: iha . ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1287: aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . śit sarvasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:1289: 396-397 śit sarvasya iti kim udāharaṇam . idamaḥ iś : itaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1290: iha . na etat asti prayojanam . śitkaraṇāt eva atra sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1291: aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . nanu ca atra api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1292_0: jasaḥ śī jaśśasoḥ śiḥ . nanu ca atra api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1292_1: anyat śitkaraṇe prayojanam . kim . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . śi
GS24pmbhasuu:1292_2: sarvanāmasthānam vibhāṣā ṅiśyoḥ iti . śit sarvasya iti śakyam akartum . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1292_3: antyasya ayam sthāne bhavan na pratyayaḥ syāt . asatyām pratyayasañjñāyām itsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1292_4: na syāt . asatyām itsañjñāyām lopaḥ na syāt . asati lope anekāl . yadā anekāl tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:1292_5: sarvādeśaḥ . yadā sarvādeśaḥ tada pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ tadā itsañjñā . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:1292_6: itsañjñā tadā lopaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat śit sarvasya iti āha tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:1293_0: na anubandhakṛtam anekāltvam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1293_1: asarūpasarvādeśāppratiṣedheṣu pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ anākārāntatvāt iti uktam . tat na
GS24pmbhasuu:1295_0: 398-401 vatkaraṇam kimartham . sthānī ādeśaḥ analvidhau iti iyati ucyamāne sañjñādhikaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1295_1: ayam tatra sthānī ādeśasya sañjñā syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:1295_2: bhavati iti vadheḥ eva syāt . hanteḥ na syāt . vatkaraṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1295_3: bhavati . sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate guruvat guruputraḥ iti yathā . atha ādeśagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1295_4: kimartham . sthānivat analvidhau iti iyati ucyamāne kaḥ idānīm sthānivat syāt . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1295_5: sthāne bhavati . kaḥ ca sthāne bhavati . ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam ādeśamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:1295_6: sthānivat yathā syāt . ekadeśavikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam codayiṣyati . tat na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1295_7: bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham. sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_0: alā vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prātipadikarnirdeśaḥ ayam . prātipadikarnirdeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_1: ca arthatantrāḥ bhavanti . na kāṃ cit prādhānyena vibhaktim āśrayanti . tatra prātipadikārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_2: nirdiṣṭe yām yām vibhaktim āśrayitum buddhiḥ upajāyate sā sā āśrayitavyā . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1302_0: alāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate tatra eva pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1302_1: syāt . yatra viśeṣaṇatvena al āśrīyate tatra pratiṣedhaḥ na syāt . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1302_2: . pradīvya prasīvya iti valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1304_0: 401-402 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt ādeśe sthānivadanudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1304_1: guruvat guruputre iti yathā . anyaḥ sthānī anyaḥ ādeśaḥ . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1304_2: kāraṇāt sthānikāryam ādeśe na prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:1304_3: bhavati iti hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . iṣyate ca vadheḥ api syāt iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1304_4: ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt . sthānivadanudeśaḥ . evamartham idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1304_5: . guruvat guruputraḥ iti yathā . tat yathā guruvat asmin guruputre vartitavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1304_6: gurau yat kāryam tat guruputre atidiśyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_0: evam iha api sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate . na etat asti prayojanam . lokataḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_1: siddham . tat yathā loke yaḥ yasya prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau tatkāryāṇi . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_2: yathā upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ yājyakulāni gatvā agrāsanādīni labhate . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_3: loke eṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya api tu puruṣārambhaḥ nivartakaḥ bhavati . asti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_4: iha kaḥ cit puruṣārambhaḥ . asti iti āha . kaḥ . svarūpavidhiḥ . hanteḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_5: ucyamānam hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_6: ādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam yuṣmadasmadoḥ anādeśe iti ādeśapratiṣedham śāsti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_7: kṛtvā jñāpakam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktau kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_8: syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ sthānivat ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . ataḥ ādeśe pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:1309_0: saḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati alvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1309_1: na bhavati iti yat ayam adaḥ jagdhiḥ lyap ti kiti iti ti kiti iti eva siddhe lyabgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1309_2: karoti . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:1311_0: 403-406 ārabhyamāṇe api etasmin yoge alvidhau pratiṣedhe aviśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1311_1: adarśanāt . alvidhau pratiṣedhe asati api viśeṣaṇe samāśrīyamaṇe asati tasmin viśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ vidheḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1312: pradīvya prasīvya . kim kāraṇam . tasya adarśanāt . valādeḥ iti ucyate na ca atra valādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca evamarthaḥ eva ayam yatnaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1313_0: anyasya kāryam ucyamānam anyasya yathā syāt iti . satyam evamarthaḥ na tu prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1313_1: . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyātideśe viśeṣānatideśaḥ . sāmanye hi atidiśyamāne viśeṣaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1314_0: brahmaṇavat asmin kṣatriye vartitavyam iti sāmānyam yat brāhmaṇakāryam tat kṣatriye
GS24pmbhasuu:1314_1: atidiśyate . yat viśiṣṭam māṭhare kauṇḍinye vā na tat atidiśyate . evam iha api sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1314_2: yat pratyayakāryam tat atidiśyate yat viśiṣṭam valādeḥ iti na tat atidiśyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1314_3: evam agrahīt iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sicaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . analvidhau iti punaḥ ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1315: pradīvya prasīvya iti . viśiṣṭam hi eṣaḥ alam āśrayate valam nāma . iha ca pratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1316: agrahīt iti . viśiṣṭam hi eṣaḥ analam āśrayati iṭam nāma . yadi tarhi sāmānyam api atidiśyate viśeṣaḥ ca sati āśraye vidhiḥ iṣṭaḥ . sati ca valāditve iṭā bhavitavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1317_0: aruditām aruditam arudita . kim ataḥ yat sati bhavitavyam . pratiṣedhaḥ tu prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1317_1: alvidhitvāt . pratiṣedhaḥ tu prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . alvidhitvāt . alvidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1317_2: bhavati . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na vā ānudeśikasya pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1317_3: itareṇa bhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ānudeśikasya pratiṣedhāt . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:1317_4: atra ānudeśikasya valāditvasya pratiṣedhaḥ . svāśrayam atra valāditvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1317_5: . na etat vivadāmahe valādiḥ na valādiḥ iti . kim tarhi . sthānivadbhāvāt sārvadhātukatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1317_6: eṣitavyam . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1319_0: 406-408 kim punaḥ ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa ādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:1319_1: ādeśini ca . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe kuruvadhapibām guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1319_2: . ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe kuruvadhapibām guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kuru iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1319_3: atra sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgasañjñā śvāśrayam ca laghūpadhatvam . tatra laghūpadhaguṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1319_4: prāpnoti . vadhakam iti atra sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgasañjñā śvāśrayam ca adupadhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1319_5: . tatra vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . piba iti atra sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgasañjñā śvāśrayam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1319_6: laghūpadhatvam . tatra guṇaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa ādeśe ādeśini ca . ādeśyādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:1319_7: iti cet suptiṅkṛdatidiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam . ādeśyādeśe iti cet suptiṅkṛdatidiṣṭeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1320: vṛkṣāya plakṣāya . sthānivadbhāvāt supsañjñā svāśrayam ca yañāditvam . tatra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . sup . tiṅ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1321: aruditām aruditam arudita . sthānivadbhāvāt sārvadhātukasañjñā svāśrayam ca valāditvam . tatra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tiṅ . kṛdatidiṣṭam : bhuvanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1323_0: dhuvanam . sthānivadbhāvāt pratyayasañjñā svāśrayam ca ajāditvam . tatra pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1323_1: prāpnoti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe pratiṣedhaḥ iti jyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1323_2: . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam viśiṣṭam sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśati guruvat guruputre
GS24pmbhasuu:1324_0: guruvat guruputre vartitavyam anyatra ucchiṣṭabhojanāt pādopasaṅgrahaṇāc ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1324_1: yadi ca guruputraḥ api guruḥ bhavati tat api kartavyam . astu tarhi ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1324_2: pratiṣedhaḥ . nanu ca uktam ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe kuruvadhapibām guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1324_3: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . karotau taparakaraṇanirdeśāt siddham . pibatiḥ adantaḥ . vadhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1324_4: iti na ayam ṇvul . anyaḥ ayam akaśabdaḥ kit auṇādikaḥ rucakaḥ iti yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1326_1: . kim prayojanam . pacatu pacantu . tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . ekadeśavikṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1326_2: ananyatvāt siddham . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam bhaviṣyati . tat yatha :
GS24pmbhasuu:1327_0: śvā karṇe vā pucche vā chinne śvā eva bhavati na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ iti . anityatvavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:1327_1: tu tasmāt upasaṅkhyanam . anityatvavijñānam tu bhavati . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1327_2: nāma śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1327_3: tatra saḥ eva ayam vikṛtaḥ ca etat nityeṣu na upapadyate . tasmāt upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1328: ekadeśavikṛteṣu upasaṅkhyānam . ekadeśavikṛteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . pacatu pacantu :
GS24pmbhasuu:1329: tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . anādeśatvāt . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti ucyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1330_0: na ca ime ādeśāḥ . rūpānyatvāt ca . anyat khalu api rūpam pacati iti anyat pacatu
GS24pmbhasuu:1330_1: iti . ime api ādeśāḥ . katham . ādiśyate yaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ . ime ca api ādiśyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:1330_2: ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet na anāśritatvāt . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet tat na . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1330_3: kāraṇam . anāśritatvāt . yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:1331: samudāye āśrīyamāṇe avayavaḥ na āśrīyate iti . abhyantaraḥ hi samudāyasya avayavaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1332_0: vṛkṣaḥ pracalan saha avayavaiḥ pracalati . āśrayaḥ iti cet alvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . āśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1332_1: iti cet alvidhiḥ ayam bhavati . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1332_2: doṣaḥ . na evam sati kaḥ cit api analvidhiḥ syāt . ucyate ca idam analvidhau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1333: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ alvidhiḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ alvidhiḥ . yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate . yatra nāntarīyakaḥ al āśrīyate na asau alvidhiḥ . atha vā uktam ādeśagrahaṇasya prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1336_0: 411-412 anupapannam sthānyādeśatvam nityatvāt . sthānī ādeśaḥ iti etat nityeṣu śabdeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1336_1: na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . nityatvāt . sthānī hi nām yaḥ bhūtvā na bhavati . ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1336_2: hi nāma yaḥ abhūtvā bhavati . etat ca nityeṣu śabdeṣu na upapadyate yat sataḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:1336_3: vināśaḥ syāt asataḥ vā prādurbhāvaḥ iti . siddham tu yathā laukikavaidikeṣu abhūtapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:1336_4: api sthānaśabdaprayogāt . siddham etat . katham . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1336_5: abhūtapūrve api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1337: upādhyāyasya sthāne śiṣyaḥ iti ucyate na ca tatra upādhyāyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati . vede api :
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_0: somasya sthāne pūtīkatṛṇāni abhiṣuṇuyāt iti ucyate na ca tatra somaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_1: bhavati . kāryavipariṇāmāt vā siddham . atha vā kāryavipariṇāmāt siddham etat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_2: idam kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . kāryā buddhiḥ . sā vipariṇamyate . nanu ca kāryāvipariṇāmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_3: iti bhavitavyam . santi ca eva hi auttarpadikāni hrasvatvāni . api ca buddhiḥ sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_4: iti anarthāntaram . kāryā buddhiḥ kāryaḥ sampratyayaḥ kāryasya sampratyayasya vipariṇāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_5: kāryavipariṇāmaḥ kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . parihārantaram eva idam matvā paṭhitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_6: katham ca idam parihārāntaram syāt . yadi bhūtapūrve sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . bhūtapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_7: ca api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . katham . buddhyā . tat yathā kaḥ cit kasmai cit upadiśati
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_8: prācīnam grāmāt āmrāḥ iti . tasya sarvatra āmrabuddhiḥ prasaktā . tataḥ paścāt aha
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_9: ye kṣīriṇaḥ avarohavantaḥ pṛthuparṇāḥ te nyagrodhāḥ iti. saḥ tatra āmrabuddhyāḥ nyagrodhabuddhim
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_10: pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati buddhyā āmrān ca apakṛṣyamāṇān nyagrodhān ca ādhīyamānān
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_11: . nityāḥ eva ca svasmin viṣaye āmrāḥ nityāḥ ca nyagrodhāḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_12: . evam iha api astiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ . tasya sarvatra astibuddhiḥ prasaktā
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_13: . saḥ asteḥ bhūḥ iti astibuddhyāḥ bhavatibuddhim pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_14: buddhyā astim ca apakṛṣyamāṇam bhavatim ca ādhīyamānam . nityaḥ eva svasmin viṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:1338_15: astiḥ nityaḥ bhavatiḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:1340_2: . uktam vā . kim uktam . viṣayeṇa tu nānāliṅgakaraṇāt siddham iti . atha vā . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1340_3: tu ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya sthānivadvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1340_4: ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭagrahaṇam kartavyam . na

GS24pmbhasuu:1345: 414-421 tasya doṣaḥ tayādeśe ubhayapratiṣedhaḥ . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1347_0: ubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ . tayapaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt jasi vibhāṣā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1347_1: doṣaḥ . ayac pratyayāntaram . yadi pratyayāntaram ubhayī iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1347_2: mā bhūt evam . mātracaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . katham . mātrac iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1347_3: . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . mātraśabdāt prabhṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:1347_4: ā āyacaḥ cakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti atra api prāpnoti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1347_5: iti vartate . evam api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti . sadṛśasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:1347_6: asanniviṣṭasya na bhaviṣyati pratyāhāreṇa grahaṇam . jātyakhyāyām vacanātideśe sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1347_7: . jātyakhyāyām vacanātideśe sthānivadbhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vrīhibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1347_8: āgataḥ iti atra gheḥ ṅiti it guṇaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1348: arthātideśāt siddham iti . ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ ādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . niṣkauśāmbiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1349_0: atikhaṭvaḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇena grahaṇāt sulopaḥ mā bhūt iti . nanu ca dīrghāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1349_1: . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . sthānivatpratiṣedhaḥ eva jyāyān
GS24pmbhasuu:1350_0: atikhaṭvāya atimālāya . yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ na bhavati . atha idānīm asati api sthānivadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:1350_1: dīrghatve kṛte pit ca asau bhūtapūrvaḥ iti kṛtvā yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1350_2: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . nanu ca idānīm sati api sthānivadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:1350_3: etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam iha upasthātum . na iti āha . na hi idānīm kva cit api sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1350_4: syāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam. praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1351: ṅī* ī* īkārāntāt ā* āp ākārāntāt iti . āhibhuvoḥ īṭpratiṣedhaḥ . āhibhuvoḥ īṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1352_0: āttha abhūt . astibrūgrahaṇena grahaṇāt īṭ prāpnoti . āheḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1352_1: jñāpayati na āheḥ īṭ bhavati iti yat ayam āhaḥ thaḥ iti jhalādiprakaraṇe thatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1352_2: śāsti . na etat asti prayojanam. asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . bhūtapūrvagatiḥ yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1353: jhalādiḥ yaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ iti . yadi evam thavacanam anarthakam syāt . āthim eva ayam uccārayet :
GS24pmbhasuu:1354: bruvaḥ pañcānām āditaḥ āthaḥ bruvaḥ iti . bhavateḥ ca api na vaktavyaḥ . astisicaḥ apṛkte iti dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1355: asteḥ sakārāntāt iti . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1356: vadhakam puṣkaram iti . sthānivadbhāvāt vṛddhitatve prāpnutaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1357: na ayam ṇvul . anyaḥ ayam akaśabdaḥ kit auṇādikaḥ rucakaḥ iti yathā . iḍvidhiḥ ca . iḍvidheyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1358_0: āvadhiṣīṣṭa . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1358_1: ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . sa nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1358_2: . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathā eva hi nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_0: āvadhiṣīṣṭa iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti anavasthiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_1: pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye vadhibhāve kṛte sati śiṣṭatvāt pratyayasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1359_2: bhaviṣyati . ākārāntāt nukṣukpratiṣedhaḥ . ākārāntāt nukṣukoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1360: vilāpayati bhāpayate . lībhīgrahaṇena grahaṇāt nukṣukau prāpnutaḥ . lībhiyoḥ praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . lībhiyoḥ praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1361: lī* ī* īkārāntasya bhī* ī* īkārāntasya ca iti . loḍādeśe śābhāvajabhāvadhitvahilopaittvapratiṣedhaḥ . loḍādeśe eṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : śiṣṭāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1363: , kurutāt , stāt . loḍādeśe kṛte śābhāvaḥ jabhāvaḥ dhitvam hilopaḥ ettvam iti ete vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1364_0: loḍādeśaḥ kriyatām ete vidhayaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt loḍādeśaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1364_1: idānīm loḍādeśe kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt kasmāt ete vidhayaḥ na bhavanti . sakṛdgatau

GS24pmbhasuu:1366_0: tisṛbhāvaḥ kriyatām trayādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt tisṛbhāvaḥ . atha

GS24pmbhasuu:1366_2: vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . āmvidhau ca . āmvidhau ca srantasya

GS24pmbhasuu:1368_0: catasṛbhāvaḥ kriyatām caturanaḍuhoḥ ām udāttaḥ iti ām iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt

GS24pmbhasuu:1368_2: . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . svare vasvādeśe . svare
GS24pmbhasuu:1369_0: viduṣaḥ paśya . śatuḥ anumaḥ nadyajādī antodāttāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1369_1: doṣaḥ . anumaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . anumaḥ iti ucyate na ca atra numam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1369_2: . anumaḥ iti na idam āgamagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1369_3: pratyāhāraḥ . ukārāt prabhṛti ā numaḥ makārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam lunata punata
GS24pmbhasuu:1369_4: atra api prāpnoti . anumgrahaṇena na śatrantam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . śatā eva viśeṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1370: śatā yaḥ anumkaḥ iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . āgamagrahaṇe hi sati iha prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1371: muñcatā muñcataḥ iti . goḥ pūrvaṇittvātvasvareṣu . goḥ pūrvaṇittvātvasvareṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1373_0: śabalagvagram . sarvatra vibhāṣā goḥ iti vibhāṣā pūrvatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1373_1: . eṅaḥ iti vartate . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api he citrago
GS24pmbhasuu:1374: citragū citragavaḥ . goto ṇit iti ṇittvam prāpnoti . ātvam :

GS24pmbhasuu:1376: bahugumān . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . karotipibyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . karotipibyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1377: kuru piba iti . sthānivadbhāvāt laghūpadhaguṇaḥ prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam . karotau taparakaraṇanirdeśāt siddham ,

GS24pmbhasuu:1383_1: iti tuk prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . kriyamāṇe

GS24pmbhasuu:1397_0: āvevye . ikārasya ekāraḥ na paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt yīvarṇayoḥ dīdhīvevyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1397_1: iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati . atha pūrvavidhau iti kim artham . he gauḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:1399_1: sambuddheḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . na etat asti

GS24pmbhasuu:1401_0: mādhavīyāḥ . vāntādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt halaḥ taddhitasya

GS24pmbhasuu:1402_1: na prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham .

GS24pmbhasuu:1407_2: na bhavati . apīpacan iti ekādeśe kṛte abhyastāt jheḥ jus bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:1407_5: āśrayanti . tatra prātipadikārthe nirdiṣṭe yām yām vibhaktim āśrayitum buddhiḥ upajāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1407_6: sā sā āśrayitavyā . idam tarhi prayojanam :

GS24pmbhasuu:1414_0: āsan iti iṇastyoḥ yaṇlopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ anajāditvāt āṭ ajādīnām iti āṭ na prāpnoti .

GS24pmbhasuu:1414_2: prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . dadhi atra madhu atra iti yaṇādeśe kṛte saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1415: cakruḥ iti yaṇādeśe kṛte anactvāt dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . yadi tarhi svavidhau api sthānivadbhāvaḥ bhavati dvābhyām ,

GS24pmbhasuu:1417_1: na prāpnoti . deyam iti īttvasya sthānivadbhāvāt guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . lavanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1417_2: guṇasya sthānivadbhāvāt avādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svāśrayāḥ atra ete

GS24pmbhasuu:1418: ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . ādeśāt iti . kim tarhi . nimittam abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1419_0: ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1419_1: . nimittāt iti . atha nimitte abhisambadhyamāne yat tat asya yogasya mūrdhābhiṣiktam
GS24pmbhasuu:1419_2: udāharaṇam tat api saṅgṛhītam bhavati . kim punaḥ tat . paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti . bāḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:1419_3: saṅgṛhītam . nanu ca īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt na asau nimittāt pūrvaḥ bhavati . vyavahite

GS24pmbhasuu:1424: vidhānam vidhiḥ iti . karmasādhanasya vidhiśabdasya upādāne na sarvam iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam iti kṛtvā bhāvasādhanasya vidhiśabdasya upādānam vijñāsyate :

GS24pmbhasuu:1430_2: . nityatvāt . nityaḥ parayaṇādeśaḥ . kṛte api pūrvayaṇādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:1430_8: asau . ārabhyamāṇe tu asmin yoge nityaḥ pūrvayaṇādeśaḥ . kṛte api parayaṇādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_9: akṛte api . parayaṇādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api pūrvayaṇādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_10: . paraḥ ca asau vyavasthā . vyavasthayā ca asau paraḥ . yugapatsambhavaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_11: . na ca asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . katham ca sidhyati . bahiraṅgeṇa sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_12: asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti anena sidhyati . evam tarhi yaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_13: udāttayaṇ tadāśrayaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . svaravidhau

GS24pmbhasuu:1430_15: kartavyā . nanu ca iyam api kartavyā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1431_0: asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . bahuprayojanā eṣā paribhāṣā . avaśyam

GS24pmbhasuu:1437_1: . acaḥ pūrvavijñānāt aicoḥ siddham . yaḥ anādiṣṭāt acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhim prati

GS24pmbhasuu:1438_0: acaḥ pūrvasya . yadi evam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . ādeśaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1438_1: . na brūmaḥ yat ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam tat pañcamīnirdiṣṭam kartavyam . kim tarhi

GS24pmbhasuu:1440: ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . ādeśāt iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:1443_1: paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati asiddhaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1443_2: siddham iti cet utsargalakṣaṇānām anudeśaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet utsargalakṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_0: paṭvyā mrdvyā iti . nanu ca etat api asiddhavacanāt siddham . asiddhavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_1: iti cet na anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_2: tat na . kim kāraṇam . na anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . na hi anyasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_3: anyasya prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati . na hi devadattasya hantari hate devadattasya prādurbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_4: bhavati . tasmāt sthānivadvacanam asiddhatvam ca . tasmāt sthānivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_5: asiddhatvam ca . paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ . vāyvoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1445: adhvaryvoḥ iti asiddhatvam . uktam vā . kim uktam . sthānivadvacanānarthakyam śāstrāsiddhatvāt iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra yat ekādeśaśāstram tukśāstre asiddham syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1446: anyat anyasmin . iha punaḥ na yuktam . katham hi tad eva nāma tasmin asiddham syāt . tad eva ca api tasmin asiddham bhavati . vakṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_0: ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇānarthakyam saṅghātasya apratyayatvāt talopasya ca asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_1: iti . ciṇaḥ luk ciṇaḥ luki eva asiddhaḥ bhavati . kāmam atidiśyatām vā sat ca asat
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_2: ca api na iha bhāraḥ asti . kalpyaḥ hi vākyaśeṣaḥ vākyam vaktari adhīnam hi . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_3: vā vatinirdeśaḥ ayam . kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_4: . uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_5: santi . evam iha api sthānivat bhavati sthānivat na bhavati iti vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_6: . iha tāvat paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti yathā sthānini yaṇādeśaḥ bhavati evam ādeśe api . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_7: idānīm vāyvoḥ adhvaryvoḥ iti yathā sthānini yalopaḥ na bhavati evam ādeśe api na bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:1454_1: . pūrvamātrasya iti cet upadhāhrasvatvam . pūrvamātrasya iti cet upadhāhrasvatvam vaktavyam :
