GS24pmbhasuu:1585: dvirvacanam asmin asti saḥ ayam dvirvacanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1586_0: dvirvacane iti . evam api na jñāyate kiyantam asau kālam sthānivat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1586_1: yaḥ punaḥ āha dvirvacane kartavye iti kṛte tasya dvirvacane sthānivat na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1586_2: . evam tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ prakṛtaḥ . saḥ anuvartiṣyate . kva prakṛtaḥ . na padāntadvirvacana
GS24pmbhasuu:1586_3: iti . dvirvacananimitte aci ajādeśaḥ na bhavati iti . evam api na jñāyate kiyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:1586_4: asau kālam na bhavati iti . yaḥ punaḥ āha dvirvacane kartavye iti kṛte tasya dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:1586_5: ajādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1587: pratyayaḥ ca viśeṣyate dvirvacanam ca . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1588_0: dvirvacanam ca dvirvacanam ca dvirvacanam . dvirvacane ca kartavye dvirvacane aci
GS24pmbhasuu:1588_1: pratyaye iti dvirvacananimitte aci sthānivat bhavati . dvirvacananimitte aci sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:1588_2: iti cet ṇau sthānivadvacanam . dvirvacananimitte aci sthānivat iti cet ṇau sthānivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1590_0: avacukṣāvayiṣati . na vaktavyaḥ . oḥ puyaṇjiṣu vacanam jñāpakam ṇau sthānivadbhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1590_1: . yat ayam puyaṇji apare iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati ṇau sthānivat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1590_2: . yadi etat jñāpyate acīkīrtat atra api prāpnoti . tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1590_3: ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakāḥ puyaṇjayaḥ . kathañjātīyakāḥ ca ete . avarṇaparāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1590_4: . katham jagle mamle . anaimittikam āttvam śiti tu pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1592: 466-468 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . papatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_0: cakruḥ iti . āllopopadhālopaṇilopayaṇādeśeṣu kṛteṣu anackatvāt dvirvacanam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_1: . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . na etāni santi prayojanāni . pūrvavipratiṣedhena api
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_2: etāni siddhāni . katham . vakṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1602_1: na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . sthānivadbhāvaḥ eva jyāyān . pūrvavipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:1603: odaudādeśasya ut bhavati cuṭutuśarādeḥ abhyāsasya iti . nanu ca tvayā api ittvam vaktavyam . parārtham mama bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1604: sani ataḥ it bhavati iti . mama api tarhi uttvam parārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1605: utparasya ataḥ ti ca iti . ittvam api tvayā vaktavyam yat samānāśrayam tadartham :
GS24pmbhasuu:1606: utpipaviṣate saṃyiyaviṣati iti evamartham . tasmāt sthānivat iti eṣaḥ eva pakṣaḥ jyāyān .
GS24pmbhasuu:1608_0: 469-471 arthasya sañjñā kartavyā śabdasya mā bhūt iti . itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1608_1: . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sataḥ adarśanasya sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñaya ca adarśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1608_2: bhāvyate . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:1608_3: . lopasañjñāyām arthasatoḥ uktam . kim uktam . arthasya tāvat uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1609: itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ iti . sataḥ api uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_0: siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu sataḥ adarśanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_1: sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā adarśanam bhāvyate . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tu sarvasya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_2: adṛṣṭatvāt . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tu bhavati . sarvasya adarśanasya lopasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_3: . kim kāraṇam . sarvasya anyatra adṛṣṭatvāt . sarvaḥ hi śabdaḥ yaḥ yasya prayogaviṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_4: saḥ tataḥ anyatra na dṛśyate . trapu jatu iti atra aṇaḥ adarśanam . tatra adarśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_5: lopaḥ iti lopasañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_6: . tatra pratyayalakṣaṇam kāryam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . acaḥ ñṇiti
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_7: iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ñṇiti aṅgasya acaḥ vṛddhiḥ ucyate . yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_8: pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgam bhavati . yasmāt ca atra pratyayavidhiḥ na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_9: pratyaye parataḥ yat ca pratyaye parataḥ na tasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ . kvipaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_10: adarśanam . tatra adarśanam lopaḥ iti lopasañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_11: pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra pratyayalakṣaṇam kāryam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_12: vaktavyaḥ . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . siddham tu prasaktādarśanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_13: lopasañjñitvāt . siddham etat . katham . prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_14: vaktavyam . yadi prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati iti ucyate grāmaṇīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_0: senānīḥ : atra vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_1: . yadi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya iti ucyate cāhalope eva iti avadhāraṇe cādilope vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_2: iti atra lopasañjñā na prāpnoti . atha prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_3: katham iva etat sidhyati . kaḥ śabdasya prasaṅgaḥ . yatra gamyate ca arthaḥ na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_4: prayujyate . astu tarhi prasaktādarśanam lopasañjñam bhavati iti eva . katham grāmaṇīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1612: senānīḥ . yaḥ atra aṇaḥ prasaṅgaḥ kvipā asau bādhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1614_1: . lumati pratyayagrahaṇam kriyate apratyayasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ mā bhūvan iti . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1614_2: . prayojanam taddhitaluki kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ luki ca goprakṛtinivṛttyartham . taddhitaluki
GS24pmbhasuu:1614_3: gonivṛttyartham kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ ca luki prakṛtinivṛttyartham . luk taddhitaluki
GS24pmbhasuu:1614_4: iti goḥ api luk prāpnoti . pratyayagrahaṇāt na bhavati . kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ yañañau
GS24pmbhasuu:1614_5: luk ca iti prakṛteḥ api luk prāpnoti . pratyayagrahaṇāt na bhavati . gonivṛttyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:1614_6: tāvat na arthaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_0: goḥ upasarjanasya . gontasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya hrasvaḥ bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_1: striyāḥ . strīpratyayāntasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya hrasvaḥ bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_2: luk taddhitaluki iti . striyāḥ iti vartate . goḥ iti nivṛttam . kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1615_3: viśiṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ api viśiṣṭanirdeśḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1616: kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ yañañau bhavataḥ chayatoḥ ca luk bhavati iti . saḥ ca avaśyam viśiṣṭanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ kriyamāṇe api vai pratyayagrahaṇe ukārasaśabdayoḥ mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1617_0: kameḥ saḥ kaṃsaḥ . parān śṛṇāti iti paraśuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1617_1: prātipadikāni . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ viśiṣṭanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ pratyayagrahaṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1617_2: kartavyam . uktam vā . kim uktam . ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇam āṅgabhapadasañjñārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1617_3: yacchayoḥ ca lugartham iti . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham tu . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1617_4: kartavyam . anirdeśe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe hi pratyayagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1617_5: aprasiddhiḥ syāt . kasya . sthāneyogatvasya . kva punaḥ iha ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārthena arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1617_6: pratyayagrahaṇena yāvatā sarvatra eva ṣaṣṭhī uccāryate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1618: aṇiñoḥ tadrājasya yañañoḥ śapaḥ iti . iha na kā cit ṣaṣṭhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_0: janapade lup iti . atra api prakṛtam pratyayagrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_1: pratyayaḥ paraḥ ca iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_2: . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti eṣā pañcamī pratyayaḥ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_3: tasmāt iti uttarasya . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_4: bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . sarvādeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_5: vā vacanaprāmāṇyāt . sarvādeśārtham tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam . lukślulupaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_6: sarvādeśāḥ yathā syuḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api pratyayagrahaṇe katham iva lukślulupaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1620_0: pratyayagrahaṇasāmāṛthyāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:1620_1: lukślulupaḥ sarvādeśāḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam luk vā duhadihalihaguhām ātmanepade
GS24pmbhasuu:1620_2: dantye iti lope kṛte lukam śāsti . uttarārtham tu . uttarārtham tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1620_3: kartavyam . na kartavyam. kriyate tatra eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:1621: pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . dvitīyam kartavyam kṛtsnapratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam yathā syāt . ekadeśalope mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1624: 476-478 pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham. lope pratyayalakṣaṇam iti iyati ucyamāne saurathī vahatī iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ ṣyaṅ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1625: lope pratyayalakṣaṇam pratyayasya prādurbhāvaḥ iti . katham tarhi . pratyayaḥ lakṣaṇam yasya kāryasya tat lupte api bhavati iti . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1626: sati pratyaye yat prāpnoti tat pratyayalakṣanena yathā syāt . lopottarakālam yat prāpnoti tat pratyayalakṣaṇena mā bhūt iti . kim prayojanam . grāmaṇikulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1628_0: auttarapadike hrasvatve kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1628_1: mā bhūt iti . yadi tarhi yat sati pratyaye prāpnoti tat pratyayalakṣanena bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1628_2: . lopottarakālam yat prāpnoti tat na bhavati jagat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1629: janagat iti atra tuk na prāpnoti . lopottarakalaḥ hi atra tuk āgamaḥ . tasmāt na arthaḥ evamarthena pratyayagrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati grāmaṇikulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1630: senānikulam . bahiraṅgam hrasvatvam . antaraṅgaḥ tuk . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1631: kṛtsnapratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam yathā syāt . ekadeśalope mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1632_0: āghnīta sam rāyaspoṣeṇa gmīya iti . pūrvasmin api yoge pratyayagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1632_1: uktam. anyatarat śakyam akartum . atha dvitīyam pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1632_2: yathā syāt varṇalakṣaṇam mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1636_0: 479-482 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇavacanam sadanvākhyānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1636_1: śāstrasya . pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam iti ucyate sadanvākhyānāt śāstrasya . sat
GS24pmbhasuu:1636_2: śāstreṇa anvākhyāyate sataḥ vā śāstram anvyākhāyakam bhavati . sadanvākhyānāt śāstrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1637_0: eva syāt gomantau yavamantau . gomān yavamān iti atra na syāt . iṣyate ca syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1637_1: . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . ataḥ pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇavacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1637_2: evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti. luki upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:1638_0: pañca sapta . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lope hi vidhānam . lope hi pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1638_1: vidhīyate . tena luki na prāpnoti . na vā adarśanasya lopasañjñitvāt . na vā kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1638_2: . kim kāraṇam . adarśanasya lopasañjñitvāt . adarśanam lopasañjñam iti ucyate . lumatsañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1638_3: ca adarśanasya kriyante . tena luki api bhaviṣyati . yadi evam . pratyayādarśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1638_4: tu lumatsañjñam . pratyayādarśanam tu lumatsañjñam api prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1638_5: . tatra luki śluvidhipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra luki śluvidhiḥ api prāpnoti . saḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1639_0: atti hanti . ślau iti dvirvacanam prāpnoti . na vā pṛthaksañjñākaraṇāt . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1639_1: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pṛthaksañjñākaraṇāt . pṛthaksañjñākaraṇasāmarthyāt luki śluvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1639_2: na bhaviṣyati . tasmāt adarśanasāmānyāt lopasañjñā lumatsañjñāḥ avagāhate . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1639_3: eva tarhi adarśanasāmānyāt lopasañjñā lumatsañjñāḥ avagāhate evam lumatsañjñāḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:1639_4: lopasañjñām avagāheran . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . agomatī gomatī sampannā gomatībhūtā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1640_0: luk taddhitaluki iti ṅīpaḥ luk prasajyeta . nanu ca atra api pṛthaksañjñākaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1640_1: iti eva siddham . yathā eva tarhi pṛthaksañjñākaraṇasāmarthyāt lumatsañjñāḥ lopasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:1640_2: na avagāhante evam lopasañjñā api lumatsañjñāḥ na avagāheta . tatra saḥ eva doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1641_0: luki upasaṅkhyānam iti . asti anyat lopasañjñāyāḥ pṛthaksañjñākaraṇe prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1641_1: kim. lumatsañjñāsu yat ucyate tat lopamātre mā bhūt iti . lumati pratiṣedhāt vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1641_2: atha vā yat ayam na lumatā aṅgasya iti pratṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1643: 482-486 sataḥ nimittābhāvāt padasañjñābhāvaḥ . san pratyayaḥ yeṣām kāryāṇām animittam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1644: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti saḥ luptaḥ api animittam syāt:
GS24pmbhasuu:1645: rājapuruṣaḥ iti . astu tasyāḥ animittam yā svādau padam iti padasañjñā yā tu subantam padam iti padasañjñā sā bhaviṣyati . sati etatpratyaye āsīt :
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_0: anayā bhaviṣyati anayā na bhaviṣyati iti . lupte idānīm pratyaye yāvataḥ eva avadheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_1: svādau padam iti padasañjñā tāvataḥ eva avadheḥ subantam padam iti . asti ca pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_2: yajādiparatā iti kṛtvā bhasañjñā prāpnoti . tugdīrghatvayoḥ ca vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_3: ekayogalakṣaṇatvāt parivīḥ iti . tugdīrghatvayoḥ ca vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_4: kva . parivīḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . ekayogalakṣaṇatvāt . ekayogalakṣaṇe tugdīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_5: . iha lupte pratyaye sarvāṇi pratyayāśrayāṇi kāryāṇi paryavapannāni bhavanti . tāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_6: etāni pratyutthāpyante . anena eva tuk anena eva ca dīrghatvam iti . tat etat ekayogalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_7: bhavati . ekayogalakṣaṇāni ca na prakalpante . siddham tu sthānisañjñānudeśāt ānyabhāvyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_8: . siddham etat . katham . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_9: bhavati . sattāmātram anena kriyate . yathāprāpte tugdīrghatve bhaviṣyataḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_10: vaktavyam bhavati . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_11: . sthānisañjñā anyabhūtasya analvidhau iti vakṣyāmi . yadi evam āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_12: bhavati iti hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . na hi kā cit hanteḥ sañjñā asti yā vadheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_13: atidiśyeta . hanteḥ api sañjñā asti . kā . hantiḥ eva . katham . svam rūpam śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_14: aśabdasañjñā iti vacanāt svam rūpam śabdasya sañjñā bhavati iti hanteḥ api hantiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2062: yathā iha bhavati iṣṭam evam yajñaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2063: atra api prāpnoti . jāgraḥ aguṇavidhiḥ . jāgarteḥ aguṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgṛtaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2064: jāgṛthaḥ iti aṅiti iti paryudāsaḥ evam jāgaritaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2065: jāgaritavān iti atra api prāpnoti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2066: jāgraḥ guṇavidhiḥ . jāgarteḥ guṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgaritaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2067_0: jāgaritavān evam jāgṛtaḥ jāgṛthaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2067_1: . kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati lūtvā pūtvā śryukaḥ kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:2068_0: atra api prāpnoti . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2068_1: . kim ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . na iti āha . adeśe ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām ca kitpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2068_2: iti . yathā iha bhavati devitvā sevitvā na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ evam kuṭitvā puṭitvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2069: atra api prāpnoti . atha vā deśe eva ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2070: yathā iha bhavati lūtvā pūtvā śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ evam nuvitvā dhuvitvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2071_0: atra api prāpnoti . syāt etat prayojanam yadi atra niyogataḥ ātideśikena ṅittvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2071_1: aupadeśikam kittvam bādhyeta . sati api tu ṅittve kit eva eṣaḥ . tasmāt nūtvā dhūtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2073: 10-11 sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kimartham . apit iti iyati ucyamāne ārdhadhātukasya api apitaḥ ṅittvam prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:2074: kartā hartā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anena ārdhadhātukasya ṅittvam bhavati iti yat ayam ārdhadhātukīyān kān cit ṅitaḥ karoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2075_0: caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ . sārvadhātuke api etat jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha . tulyajātīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2075_1: jñāpakam . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakāḥ caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ . kathañjātīyakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2075_2: ca ete . ārdhadhātukāḥ . yadi etat asti tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam iti caṅaṅau luṅvikaraṇānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2075_3: jñāpakau syātām najiṅ vartamānakālānām ṅvanip bhūtakālānām athaṅśabdaḥ auṇādikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2080: pit na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśapratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2081: cyavante plavante . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . pidapitoḥ ekādeśaḥ apitaḥ ādivat syāt . asti anyat pitaḥ iti kṛtvā ṅittvam prāpnoti . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2082: pit na iti . na pit ṅit iti cet uttamaikādeśapratiṣedhaḥ . pit na iti cet uttamaikādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2083_0: tudāni likhāni . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt eva . pidapitoḥ ekādeśaḥ pitaḥ ādivat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2083_1: . tatra pit na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2083_2: ubhayathā api doṣaḥ iti . ubhayathā api na doṣaḥ . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:2085: 12-13 ṛdupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt vipratiṣedhena . ṛdupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena :
GS24pmbhasuu:2086_0: vavṛte vavṛdhe . uktam vā . kim uktam . na vā ksasya anavakāśatvāt apavādaḥ guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2086_1: iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra yat anavakāśam kitkaraṇam guṇam bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2086_2: iha punaḥ ubhayam sāvakāśam . kitkaraṇasya avakāśaḥ:
GS24pmbhasuu:2089: vavṛte vavṛdhe . paratvāt guṇaḥ prāpnoti . idam tarhi uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2090: iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati itI .
GS24pmbhasuu:2092_0: 14 kimartham idam ucyate . indheḥ samyogārtham vacanam bhavateḥ pidartham . ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2092_1: yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . indheḥ chandoviṣayatvāt bhuvaḥ vukaḥ nityatvāt tābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2092_2: kidvacanānarthakyam . indheḥ chandoviṣayaḥ liṭ . na hi antareṇa chandaḥ indheḥ anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2092_3: liṭ labhyaḥ . āmā bhāṣāyām bhavitavyam . bhuvaḥ vukaḥ nityatvāt . bhavateḥ api nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2092_4: vuk . kṛte api prāpnoti akṛte api . tābhyām kidvacanānarthakyam . tābhyām indhibhavitibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2094_0: 15 kimartham mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ kittvam ucyate . kit eva hi ktvā . na ktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2094_1: seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti tadbādhanārtham . yadi tarhi mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2094_2: kittvam ucyate na arthaḥ na ktvā seṭ iti anena kittvapratiṣedhena . idam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2095: mṛḍādibhyaḥ eva parasya ktvaḥ kittvam bhavati na anyebhyaḥ iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate iha api tarhi niyamān na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2096_0: lūtvā pūtvā . atra api akittvam prāpnoti . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2096_1: . yathājātīyakaḥ mṛḍādibhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā . kathañjātīyakaḥ mṛḍādibhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2096_2: . seṭ . evam api asti atra kaḥ cit vibhāṣiteṭ . saḥ aniṭām niyāmakaḥ syāt . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:2096_3: tāvat ye seṭaḥ teṣām grahaṇam niyamāṛtham . yaḥ idānīm vibhāṣiteṭ tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2098: 16 svapipracchyoḥ sanartham grahaṇam kit eva hi ktvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2100: 16-21 kimartham ikaḥ parasya sanaḥ kittvam ucyate . ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt . ikaḥ kittvam ucyate guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_0: cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati . na etat asti prayojanam . dīrghārambhāt . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_1: bhaviṣyati . kṛte bhavet . kṛte khalu dīrghatve guṇaḥ prāpnoti . anarthakam tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_2: anarthakam evam sati dīrghatvam syāt . na anarthakam . hrasvārtham . hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_3: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . bhavet hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na syāt . dīrghāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_4: tu prasajyate . dīrghāṇām tu khalu guṇaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca dīrghāṇām api dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_5: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na dīrghāṇām dīrghāḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . na hi bhuktavān
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_6: punaḥ bhuṅkte na ca kṛtaśmaśruḥ punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . nanu ca punaḥ pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_7: api dṛṣṭā . bhuktavān ca punaḥ bhuṅkte kṛtaśmaśruḥ ca punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_8: hi punaḥ bhāvyam . sāmarthyāt tatra punaḥ pravṛttiḥ bhavati bhojanaviśeṣāt śilpiviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_9: vā . dīrghāṇām punaḥ dīrghatvavacane na kim cit prayojanam asti . akṛtakāri khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_10: api śāstram agnivat . tat yathā agniḥ yad adagdham tat dahati . dīrghāṇām api dīrghavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_11: etat prayojanam guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti . kṛtakāri khalu api śāstram parjanyavat . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_12: yathā parjanyaḥ yāvat ūnam pūrṇam ca sarvam abhivarṣati . yathā eva tarhi dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2101_13: guṇaḥ na bhavati evam ṝdittvam api na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2102_0: cikīrṣati jihīrṣati iti. ṝdittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam . na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2102_1: . kim kāraṇam . ṝtaḥ iti ucyate . bhavet hrasvānām na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2102_2: dīrghāṇām tu khalu akṛte api dīrghatve ṝdittvam prāpnoti . dīrghāṇām na akṛte dīrghe
GS24pmbhasuu:2102_3: . dīrghāṇām api na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam prāpnoti . yadā dīrghatvena guṇaḥ bādhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2102_4: tataḥ uttarakālam ṝdittvam bhavati . ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2104_0: jñīpsati . kva astāḥ kva nipatitāḥ kva kittvam kva ṇilopaḥ . kaḥ vā abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2104_1: yat sati kittve ṇilopaḥ syāt asati na syāt . eṣaḥ abhisambandhaḥ yat sati kittve
GS24pmbhasuu:2104_2: sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate . asati punaḥ kittve anavakāśam dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2104_3: yathā eva guṇam bādhate evam ṇilopam api bādheta . tatra ṇilopasya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2107_0: jñīpsati . paratvāt ṇilopaḥ . asati api kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2107_1: . isbhāvaḥ . nimitsati pramitsati . mīnātiminotyoḥ dīrghatve kṛte mīgrahaṇena grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2107_2: yathā syāt . yathā eva tarhi asati kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:2107_3: evam guṇaḥ api bādheta . tasmāt kittvam vaktavyam . ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt dīrghārambhāt kṛte bhavet /
GS24pmbhasuu:2108: anarthakam tu hrasvārtham dīrghāṇām tu prasajyate //
GS24pmbhasuu:2109: sāmarthyāt hi punaḥ bhāvyam ṝdittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam dīrghāṇām na akṛte dīrghe ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2111_0: 22-23 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . katham hi ikaḥ nāma hal antaḥ syāt anyasya anyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2111_1: katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . igvataḥ halaḥ iti . yadi evam yiyakṣati atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:2111_2: prāpnoti . evam tarhi igupadhāt halantāt iti vakṣyāmi . evam api dambheḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2111_3: . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2111_4: iti . na ayuktaḥ . antaśabdaḥ ayam asti eva avayavavācī . tat yathā vastrāntaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2114_0: vasanāvayavaḥ iti gamyate . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā udakāntam gataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2114_1: . udakasamīpam gataḥ iti gamyate . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2114_2: evam api dambheḥ na sidhyati . yaḥ atra iksamīpe hal na tasmāt uttaraḥ san . yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2114_3: uttaraḥ san na asau iksamīpe hal . evam tarhi dambheḥ halgrahaṇasya jātivācakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_0: ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti āhosvit ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_1: ca ataḥ. yadi vijñāyate ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti liṅ viśeṣitaḥ sic aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_2: . atha vijñāyate ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_3: . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_4: . liṅ viśeṣitaḥ sic aviśeṣitaḥ iti . sic ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ātmanepadam sic
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_5: na asti iti kṛtvā ātmanepadapare sici kāryam vijñāsyate . atha vā punaḥ astu ātmanepadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_6: parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti . nanu ca uktam sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ aviśeṣitaḥ iti . liṅ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_7: viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ liṅ na asti iti kṛtvā ātmanepade liṅi kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_8: vijñāsyate . na eva vā punaḥ arthaḥ liṅviśeṣaṇena ātmanepadagrahaṇena . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_9: . jhal iti vartate . ātmanepadeṣu ca eva liṅ jhalādiḥ na parasmaipadeṣu . tat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2118_10: sijviśeṣaṇam ātmanepadagrahaṇam . atha sijviśeṣaṇe ātmanepadagrahaṇe sati kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2119: avātsīt . na etat asti . ikaḥ iti vartate . evam api anaiṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2120: acaiṣīt : atra api prāpnoti . etat api na asti prayojanam . halantāt iti vartate . evam api akoṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2121: amoṣīt : atra api prāpnoti . na etat asti prayojanam . jhal iti vartate . evam api abhaitsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2123: atra api prāpnoti . na etat asti . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2125: asrākṣīt . kim ca syāt . akillakṣaṇaḥ amāgamaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2127: 25-27 it ca kasya takārettvam . kasya hetoḥ ikāraḥ taparaḥ kriyate . dīrghaḥ mā bhūt . dīrghaḥ mā bhūt iti . ṛte api saḥ . antareṇa api ārambham siddhaḥ atra dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2128: ghumāsthāgāpājahāti iti . anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2129_0: anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt iti . kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantarārthe ārambhe hrasvaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2129_1: na punaḥ plutaḥ iti . plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ . viṣaye khalu plutaḥ ucyate . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2129_2: ca saḥ viṣayaḥ bhavitavyam eva tadā plutena . it ca kasya takārettvam dīrghaḥ mā bhūt ṛte api saḥ /
GS24pmbhasuu:2130: anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2132: 27-31 na seṭ iti kṛte akittve . na seṭ iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ ktvāgrahaṇena . niṣṭhāyam api tarhi prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2133_0: gudhitaḥ gudhitavān iti . niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt . niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2133_1: . kim avadhāraṇam . niṣṭhā śīṅsvidimidikṣvididhṛṣaḥ iti . parokṣāyām tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2134: kṅiti iti ākāralopaḥ na syāt . mā bhūt evam . iṭi iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2135_0: jagmiva jaghniva . kṅiti iti upadhālopaḥ na syāt . jñāpakāt na parokṣāyām . jñāpakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2135_1: parokṣāyām na bhaviṣyati . kim jñāpakam . sani jhalgrahaṇam viduḥ . yat ayam ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2135_2: jhal iti jhalgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2135_3: na ātideśikasya iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . jhalgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2137_0: śiśayiṣate iti . yadi ca atra ātideśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ syāt jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2137_1: anarthakam syāt . astu atra kittvam . na seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2137_2: tu ācāryaḥ aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ na ātideśikasya iti . tataḥ jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2137_3: karoti . na etat asti prayojanam . uttarārtham etat syāt . sthāghvoḥ it ca jhalādau
GS24pmbhasuu:2138: upāsthāyiṣātām upāsthāyiṣata . ittvam kitsanniyogena . kitsanniyogena ittvam ucyate . tena asati kittve ittvam na bhaviṣyati . reṇa tulyam sudhīvani . tat yathā sudhīvā supīvā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2139_0: ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ ucyamānaḥ asati ṅīpi na bhavati . atha vā astu atra ittvam . kā
GS24pmbhasuu:2139_1: rūpasiddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām āyādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . vasvartham . vasvartham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2139_2: ktvāgrahaṇam kartavyam . vasau hi aupadeśikam kittvam . kim ca syāt . papivān papimān :
GS24pmbhasuu:2140: kṅiti iti ākāralopaḥ na syāt . mā bhūt evam . iṭi iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi : jagmivān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2141: jaghnivān : kṅiti iti upadhālopaḥ na syāt . kidatīdeśāt . astu atra aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ . ātideśikasya kittvam bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi tat pratiṣidhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2142_0: añjeḥ ājivān iti . evam tarhi chāndasḥ kvasuḥ liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2142_1: . tatra sārvadhātukam apit ṅit bhavati iti ṅiti upadhālopaḥ bhaviṣyati . nigṛhītiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2145: nikucitiḥ . tat tarhi ktvāgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ktvā ca vigrahāt . upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2146_0: na seṭ niṣṭhā śīṅsvidimidikṣvididhṛṣaḥ . mṛṣaḥ titikṣāyām . udupadhāt bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2146_1: anyatarasyām . tataḥ pūṅaḥ . pūṅaḥ niṣṭhā seṭ na kit bhavati . tataḥ ktvā . ktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2146_2: ca seṭ na kit bhavati . pūṅ iti nivṛttam . na seṭ iti kṛte akittve niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt /
GS24pmbhasuu:2147: jñāpakāt na parokṣāyām sani jhalgrahaṇam viduḥ //
GS24pmbhasuu:2149: vasvartham kidatīdeśāt nigṛhītiḥ ktvā ca vigrahāt //
GS24pmbhasuu:2151: 31 iha kasmāt na bhavati . gudhitaḥ gudhitavān iti . udupadhāt śapaḥ . śabvikaraṇebhyaḥ iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2153_0: 31-32 pūṅaḥ ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iṭi vāprasaṅgaḥ seṭprakaraṇāt . pūṅaḥ ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:2153_1: vibhāṣā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . seṭprakaraṇāt . seṭ iti vartate . na vā seṭtvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2153_2: akidāśrayatvāt aniṭi vā kittvam . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . seṭtvasya akidāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2153_3: . akidāśrayam seṭtvam . yadā akittvam tadā iṭā bhavitavyam . seṭtvasya akidāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2153_4: aniṭi eva vibhāṣā kittvam bhaviṣyati . iḍvidhau pūṅaḥ grahaṇam kriyate . tena vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2153_5: iṭ seṭprakaraṇāt ca iṭi eva vibhāṣā kittvam prāpnoti . iḍvidhau hi agrahaṇam . iḍvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:2153_6: hi pūṅaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2154_0: nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ . ktvāgrahaṇam uttarārtham . nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2154_1: . katham. vibhāṣāmadhye ayam yogaḥ kriyate . vibhāṣāmadhye ca ye vidhayaḥ te nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2154_2: bhavanti . kimartham tarhi ktvāgrahaṇam . ktvāgrahaṇam uttarārtham . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2155: nopadhāt thapāntāt vā vañciluñcyṛtaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2157: 33 kāśyapagrahaṇam kimartham. kāśyapagrahaṇam pūjārtham . vā iti eva hi vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2159_0: 33 kim idam ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam vidhīyate āhosvit pratiṣidhyate . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2159_1: . yadi vidhīyate ktvāgrahaṇam anarthakam . kit eva hi ktvā . atha pratiṣidhyate sangrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2159_2: anarthakam . akit eva hi san . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2160: ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam . ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam vidhīyate . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2161: ktvāgrahaṇam anarthakam . kit eva hi ktvā iti . na anarthakam . na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tadbādhanārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2163_0: 34 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . ū iti anena kālaḥ pratinirdiśyate ū iti ayam ca varṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2163_1: . tatra ayuktam varṇasya kālena saha sāmanādhikaraṇyam . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2163_2: . ūkālakālasya iti . kim idam ūkālakālasya iti . ū iti etasya kālaḥ ūkālaḥ . ūkālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2163_3: kālaḥ asya ūkālakālaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2163_4: atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā uṣṭramukham mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2164: kharamukhaḥ evam ūkālakālaḥ ūkālaḥ iti . atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . kālasahacaritaḥ varṇaḥ api kālaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2166_1: aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . nirdeśavaiṣamyāt . tisraḥ sañjñāḥ ekā sañjñī . vaiṣamyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2166_2: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu samasṅkhyatvāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2166_3: . samasaṅkhyatvāt . katham samasaṅkhyatvam . trayāṇām hi vikāranirdeśaḥ . trayāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2166_4: ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate trayāṇām ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2166_5: . tisṛṇām sañjñānām karaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi api tāvat tisṛṇām sañjñānām karaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2166_6: jñāyate trayāṇām ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_0: etena ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭānām sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti . ādau mātrikaḥ tataḥ dvimātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_1: tataḥ trimātraḥ iti . na punaḥ mātrikaḥ madhye vā ante vā syāt tathā dvimātraḥ ādau
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_2: vā ante vā syāt tathā trimātraḥ ādau vā madhye vā syāt . ayam tāvat trimātraḥ aśakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_3: ādau vā madhye vā kartum . kutaḥ . plutāśrayaḥ hi prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . mātrikadvimātrikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_4: api ghyantam pūrvam nipatati iti mātrikasya pūrvanipātaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_5: ayam tāvat trimātraḥ aśakyaḥ ādau vā madhye vā kartum . plutāśrayaḥ hi prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_6: prasajyeta iti . plutāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ plutasañjñā ca anena eva . yadi ca trimātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_7: ādau vā madhye vā syāt plutasañjñā eva asya na syāt kutaḥ pratkṛtibhāvaḥ . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_8: ucyate mātrikadvimātrikayoḥ api ghyantam pūrvam nipatati iti mātrikasya pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_9: bhaviṣyati iti . hrasvāśrayā hi ghisañjñā hrasvasañjñā ca anena eva. yadi ca mātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_10: madhye vā ante vā syāt hrasvasañjñā eva asya na syāt kutaḥ ghisañjñā kutaḥ pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_11: . evam eṣā vyavasthā na prakalpate . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na mātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_12: ante bhavati iti yat ayam vibhāṣā pṛṣṭaprativacane heḥ iti mātrikasya plutam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_13: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yaḥ ante saḥ plutasañjñakaḥ . yadi ca mātrikaḥ ante syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_14: plutasañjñā asya syāt. tatra mātrākālasya mātrākālavacanam anarthakam syāt . madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_15: tarhi syāt iti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na mātrikaḥ madhye bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_16: yat ayam ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca it dīrghatvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_17: yaḥ madhye saḥ dīrghasañjñakaḥ . yadi ca mātrikaḥ madhye syāt dīrghasañjñā asya syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_18: . tatra mātrākālasya mātrākālavacanam anarthakam syāt . dvimātraḥ tarhi ante syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_19: . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dvimātraḥ ante bhavati iti yat ayam om abhyādāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_20: iti dvimātrikasya plutam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yaḥ ante saḥ plutasañjñakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_21: . yadi ca dvimātrikaḥ ante syāt plutasañjñā asya syāt . tatra dvimātrakālasya dvimātrakālavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_22: anarthakam syāt . mātrikeṇa ca asya pūrvanipātaḥ bādhitaḥ iti kṛtvā kva anyatra utsahate
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_23: bhavitum anyat ataḥ madhyāt . evam eṣā vyavasthā prakḷptā . bhavet vyavasthā prakḷptā
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_24: . dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pūrvasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . dīrghaplutayoḥ api pūrvasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2167_25: . kā . hrasvasañjñā . kim kāraṇam . aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . siddham tu taparanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2168_0: udūkālaḥ iti . yadi evam drutāyām taparakaraṇe madhyamavilambitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2168_1: kālabhedāt . drutādiṣu ca uktam . kim utktam . siddham tu . avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2168_2: cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante iti . saḥ tarhi taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2168_3: kartavyaḥ . iha kālagrahaṇam kriyate . yāvat ca taparakaraṇam tāvat kālagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2169_0: ukālaḥ ūkālaḥ ū3kālaḥ iti . atha vā ekasañjñādhikāre ayam yogaḥ kartavyaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2169_1: ekā sañjñā bhavati yā parā anavakāśā ca iti evam hi dīrghaplutayoḥ pūrvasañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:2169_2: bhaviṣyati . atha vā svam rūpam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā iti ayam yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2169_3: . tatra yat etat aśabdasañjñā iti etat yayā vibhaktyā nirdiśyamānam arthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2170: aṇudit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ aśabdasañjñāyām iti . atha vā hrasvasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt dīrghaplutayoḥ pūrvasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idam prayojanam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2171_0: sañjñayā vidhāne niyamam vakṣyāmi iti . hrasvasañjñayā yat ucyate tat acaḥ sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2171_1: yathā syāt iti . syāt etat prayojanam yadi kiñcitkarāṇi hrasvaśāsanāni syuḥ . yataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2171_2: tu khalu yāvat ajgrahaṇam tāvat hrasvagrahaṇam ataḥ akiñcitkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2173_0: ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti vakṣyāmi iti . anucyamāne hi etasmin hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2173_1: ik bhavati iti vaktavyam syāt . hrasvaḥ napuṃsake prātipadikasya ecaḥ ik bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2173_2: iti . ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ ecaḥ ik bhavati iti . hrasvaḥ halādiḥ śeṣaḥ ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2173_3: ik bhavati iti . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2173_4: . laghīyaḥ ca triḥ hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ ik bhavati iti na punaḥ sañjñākaraṇam . triḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2173_5: hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ṣaṭ grahaṇāni . sañjñākaraṇe punaḥ aṣṭau . hrasvasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2173_6: vaktavyā . triḥ hrasvapradeśeṣu hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam hrasvaḥ hrasvaḥ hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2173_7: iti . ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti . saḥ ayam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam
GS24pmbhasuu:2173_8: yatnam ārabhate tasya etat prayojanam dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pūrvasañjñā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2175: 40-41 kim ayam alontyaśeṣaḥ āhosvit alontyāpavādaḥ . katham ca ayam taccheṣaḥ syāt katham vā tadapavādaḥ . yadi ekam vākyam tat ca idam ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:2176: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti acaḥ hrasvadīrghaplutāḥ antyasya iti tataḥ ayam taccheśaḥ . atha nānā vākyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2178_0: acaḥ hrasvadīrghaplutāḥ antyasya anantyasya ca iti tataḥ ayam tadapavādaḥ . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2178_1: atra viśeṣaḥ . hrasvādividhiḥ alaḥ antyasya iti cet vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2178_2: ajgrahaṇam . hrasvādividhiḥ alaḥ antyasya iti cet vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2178_3: ajgrahaṇam kartavyam . vacipracchyoḥ dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:2178_4: prāpnoti . śamādīnām dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na prāpnoti . hanigamyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2178_5: dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na prāpnoti . astu tarhi tadapavādaḥ . acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2182: atinau evam suvāk brāhmaṇakulam iti atra api prāpnoti . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2184: cīyate stūyate evam bhidyate atra api prāpnoti . nāmi dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2187: ṣaṇṇām . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nopadhyāyāḥ iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . prakṛtasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt. kim ca prakṛtam . nāmi iti . tena bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2188: ṣaṇṇām . anyate tanyate atra api prāpnoti . atha api evam niyamaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2189: nopadhāyāḥ nāmi eva iti evam api bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2190: anyate tanyate . ṣaṇṇām iti atra prāpnoti . atha api ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2191_0: nopadhāyāḥ eva nāmi nāmi eva nopadadhyāyāḥ iti evam api bhidyate suvāk brāhmaṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:2191_1: ita atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti yatra brūyāt acaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2191_2: etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī prāduḥ bhāvyate . tatra kāmacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2192: gṛhyamāṇena vā acam viśeṣayitum acā vā gṛhyamāṇaḥ . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ iha tāvat vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu gṛhyamāṇena acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2193: eṣām acaḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . iha idānīm napuṃsakahrasvākṛtsārvadhātukanāmidīrgheṣu acā gṛhyamāṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2194: napuṃsakasya hrasvaḥ bhavati acaḥ . ajantasya iti . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ dīrghaḥ acaḥ . ajantasya iti . nāmi dīrghaḥ bhavati acaḥ . ajantasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2198_0: saḥ iti . sañjñayā vidhāne niyamaḥ . sañjñayā ye vidhīyante teṣu niyamaḥ . kim vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2198_1: etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ac iti vartate . tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2199_0: acaḥ ac bhavati hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti evam bhāvyamanaḥ iti . atha pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2199_1: yoge ajgrahaṇe sati kim prayojanam . ajgrahaṇam saṃyogācsamudāyanivṛttyartham . ajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2199_2: kriyate saṃyognivṛttyartham acsamudāyanivṛttyartham ca . saṃyognivṛttyartham tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2200: pratakṣya prarakṣya . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk iti tuk mā bhūt iti . acsamudāyanivṛttyartham :
GS24pmbhasuu:2202: titaucchāyā . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti vibhāṣā mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2204_0: 43-45 kim ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:2204_1: halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti paribhāṣā na prakalpate . katham halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2204_2: nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . evam tarhi nivṛttam . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2204_3: . atha prathamānirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2204_4: . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi ete vyañjanasya api guṇāḥ lakṣyante . nanu ca pratyakṣam upalabhyante :
GS24pmbhasuu:2205_0: iṣe tvā ūrje tvā . na ete vyañjanasya guṇāḥ . acaḥ ete guṇāḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2205_1: api tadguṇam upalabhyate . tat yathā . dvayoḥ raktayoḥ vastrayoḥ madhye śuklam vastram
GS24pmbhasuu:2205_2: tadguṇam upalabhyate badarapiṭake riktakaḥ lohakaṃsaḥ tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2205_3: nu khalu etat acaḥ ete guṇāḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu vyañjanam api tadguṇam upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2205_4: iti . na punaḥ vyañjanasya ete guṇāḥ syuḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu ac api tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2205_5: iti . antareṇa api vyañjanam acaḥ eva ete guṇāḥ lakṣyante . na punaḥ antareṇa acam
GS24pmbhasuu:2205_6: vyañjanasya uccāraṇam api bhavati . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2206: svayam rājante svarāḥ . anvak bhavati vyañjanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2208_0: 45-46 uccanīcasya anavasthitatvāt sañjñāprasiddhiḥ . idam uccanīcam anavasthitapadarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2208_1: . tat eva hi kam cit prati uccaiḥ bhavati kam cit prati nīcaiḥ . evam kam cit kaḥ cit adhīyānam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2209: kim uccaiḥ rorūyase . atha nīcaiḥ vartatām iti . tam eva tathā adhīyānam aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2210: kim antardantakena adhīṣe . uccaiḥ vartatām iti . evam uccanīcam anavasthitapadarthakam . tasya anavasthānāt sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . evam tarhi lakṣaṇam kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2211_0: āyāmaḥ dāruṇyam aṇutā khasya iti uccaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . āyāmaḥ gātrāṇām nigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2211_1: . dāruṇyam svarasya dāruṇatā rūkṣatā . aṇutā khasya kaṇṭhasya saṃvṛtatā . uccaiḥkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2211_2: śabdasya . atha nīcaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . anvavasargaḥ mārdavam urutā khasya iti nīcaiḥkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2211_3: śabdasya . anvavasargaḥ gātrāṇām śithilatā . mārdavam svarasya mṛdutā snigdhatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2211_4: urutā khasya mahattā kaṇṭhasya . iti nīcaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . etat api anaikāntikam

GS24pmbhasuu:2213_8: . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣpakāḥ eṣām te puṣpakāḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:2230: imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2231: kāryam devadattayajñadattau . svaritodāttārtham ca . svaritodāttārtham ca tatra eva kartavyam . na subrahmaṇyāyām svaritasya tu udāttaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2232: indra agaccha . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2233_0: subrahmaṇyom indra agaccha . svaritodāttāt ca asvaritārtham . svaritodāttāt ca asvaritārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2233_1: tatra eva kartavyam . indra agaccha harivaḥ agaccha . svaritaparasannatarārtham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2233_2: . svaritaparasannatarārtham ca tatra eva kartavyam . udāttasvaritaparasya sannataraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2234: maṇavaka jaṭilakādhyāpaka nyaṅ . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2235_0: maṇavaka jaṭilakābhirūpaka kva . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . devabrahmaṇoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2235_3: svaritatvam prāpnoti . na brūmaḥ devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttavacanam jñāpakam siddhaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2235_4: svaritaḥ iti . kim tarhi . param etat kāṇḍam iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:2257: devadattasya pita yajate . devadattasya pita yajate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2259: 56-57 devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttatvam eke . devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttatvam eke icchanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2262: 57-59 svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyavacanam . svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyam vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2263_0: agniveśyaḥ pacati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2263_1: . tena bahūnām aikaśrutyam syāt dvyekayoḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2263_2: tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2263_3: bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2264: avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit vacanena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti . tat yathā :

GS24pmbhasuu:2265_1: ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ cit māṃsārthī matsyān sakaṇṭakān
GS24pmbhasuu:2265_2: saśakalān āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati

GS24pmbhasuu:2267_1: vyavahitānām aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam anudāttasya ca :

GS24pmbhasuu:2268_1: . ṣaṭprabhṛtiṣu ekaśeṣaḥ parisamāpyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti dvyekayoḥ api bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2270_0: 59-62 apṛktasañjñāyām halgrahaṇam svādilope halaḥ agrahaṇārtham . apṛktasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2270_1: halgrahaṇam kartavyam . ekahal pratyayaḥ apṛktasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2270_2: prayojanam . svādilope halaḥ agrahaṇārtham . svādilope halaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2271_0: halṅyābbhyaḥ dīrghāt sutisi apṛktam hal iti apṛktasya iti eva siddham . aṇiñoḥ lugartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2271_1: algrahaṇam . aṇiñoḥ lugartham algrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . aṇiñoḥ luki
GS24pmbhasuu:2272: ṇyakṣatriyārṣañitaḥ yūni luk aṇiñoḥ iti apṛktasya iti eva siddham . aṇiñoḥ lugartham iti cet ṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ . aṇiñoḥ lugartham iti cet ṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2273_0: phāṇṭāhṛteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ pḥāṇṭāhṛtaḥ iti . ṇavacanasāmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2273_1: . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet phagnivṛttyartham vacanam . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet phagnivṛttyartham etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2274_0: phak ataḥ mā bhūt iti . pailādiṣu vacanāt siddham . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt pailādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2274_1: eva pāṭham kurvīta . tatra pāṭhāt anyeṣām api phakaḥ nivṛttiḥ bhavati . evam siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2274_2: sati yat ayam ṇam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na asya luk bhavati iti . tāni etāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2274_3: trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . apṛktasañjñāyām halgrahaṇam kartavyam . svādilope halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2274_4: grahaṇam na kartavyam . aṇiñoḥ luki grahaṇam kartavyam . algrahaṇe api vai kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2274_5: tāni eva trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . apṛktasañjñāyām algrahaṇam kartavyam . svādilope
GS24pmbhasuu:2274_6: halaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . aṇiñoḥ luki grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . apṛktagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2274_7: kartavyam . tatra na asti lāghavakṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2275: algrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati darviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2276_0: jāgṛviḥ . al eva yaḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2276_1: gaṃsyate . algrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi yaḥ al ca anyaḥ ca tatra syāt algrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2276_2: syāt . halgrahaṇe api kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati darviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2276_3: jāgṛviḥ . hal eva yaḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2276_4: gaṃsyate . halgrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi yaḥ hal ca anyaḥ ca tatra syāt halgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2276_5: anarthakam syāt . asti anyat halgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . halantasya yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2276_6: alantasya mā bhūt iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat algrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2276_7: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra varṇagrahaṇe jātigrahaṇam bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2276_8: etasya jñāpane prayojanam . dambheḥ halgrahaṇasya jātivācakatvāt siddham iti uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2278_0: 62-63 tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsaikārthatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2278_1: . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsasya ekārthatvāt sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2278_2: aprasiddhiḥ . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ nāma anekārthāśrayam ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2278_3: . siddham tu padasāmānādhikaraṇyāt . siddham etat . katham . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇapadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2278_4: karmadhārayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:2278_5: eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsaikārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2278_6: aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tatpuruṣaḥ asti prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2278_7: aikasvaryam ekavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam ;
GS24pmbhasuu:2279: tatpuruṣārthāni padāni tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tat yaḥ tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya iha grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2281_0: 63-64 prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2281_1: .prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2281_2: aprasiddhiḥ . na hi kaṣṭādīnām samāse prathamām paśyāmaḥ . siddham tu samāsavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2281_3: vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . samāsavidhāne prathamānirdiṣṭam upasarjanasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:2281_4: bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā tādarthyāt tācchabdyam . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2281_5: vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhavati. samāsārtham śāstram samāsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2283: 64-67 yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ tataḥ anyatra api upasarjanasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ kriyate tataḥ anyatra api tasya upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_0: rajñaḥ kumārīm rājakumārīm śritaḥ . śritādisamāse dvitīyāntam prathamānirdiṣṭam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_1: tasya ṣaṣṭhīsamāse api upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti . siddham tu yasya vidhau tam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_2: iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . yasya vidhau yat prathamānirdiṣṭam tam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_3: tat upasarjanasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_4: . upasarjanam iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_5: etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_6: anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . apradhānam upasarjanam iti . pradhānam upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_7: iti ca sambandhiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2285: yam prati yat apradhānam tam prati tat upasarjanasñjñam bhavati iti . atha yatra dve ṣaṣṭhyante kasmāt tatra pradhānasya upasarjanasañjñā na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2286_0: rājñaḥ puruṣasya rājapuruṣasya iti . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ upasarjanatve uktam . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2286_1: . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ iti . evam na ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2286_2: akṛtam bhavet upsarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ iti kṛtvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2286_3: na bhaviṣyati . yadi api tāvat etat upasarjanakāryam parihṛtam idam aparam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2286_4: . rājñaḥ kumāryāḥ rājakumāryāḥ . gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2286_5: . uktam vā . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśabdārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2288: 67-68 dvitīyādīnām api anena upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra apūrvanipāte iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2289: pūrvanipāte na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2290_0: yat anyat pūrvanipātāt iti . pūrvanipāte avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:2290_1: bhaviṣyati . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . tena bhaviṣyati . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā
GS24pmbhasuu:2290_2: yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2292: 68 ekavibhaktau aṣaṣṭhyantavacanam . ekavibhaktau aṣaṣṭhyantānām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2293: ardham pippalyāḥ ardhapippalī iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśardārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam . ātideśikasya śravaṇam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2295: 68 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam dviguprāptāpannālampūrvopasargāḥ ktārthe . dviguḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2297: prāptaḥ jivikām prāptajīvikaḥ . āpannaḥ jīvikām āpannajīvikaḥ . alampūrva :
GS24pmbhasuu:2302: varṇānām ca mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . vanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2303_0: dhanam iti nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ prasajyeta . adhātuḥ iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2303_1: . ahan vṛtram iti . adhātuḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati ahan vṛtram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2303_2: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dhātoḥ prātipadikasañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam supaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2303_3: dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti dhātugrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . pratiṣiddhārtham etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2304: api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti . apratyayaḥ iti kimartham . kāṇḍe kuḍye . apratyayaḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati kāṇḍe kuḍye* iti . kṛttaddhitagrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2305: kṛttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2307: 71-77 arthavati anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . arthavati prātipadikasañjñāyām anekasya api padasya prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2308_0: daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṭ apūpāḥ kuṇḍam ajājinam palalapiṇḍaḥ adhorukam etat kumāryāḥ sphaiyakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2308_1: pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavārthavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2308_2: samudāyārthavattvam yathā loke . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2308_3: samudāyāḥ api arthavantaḥ bhavanti yathā loke . tat yathā loke āḍhyam idam nagaram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2309_0: gomat idam nagaram iti ucyate na ca tatra sarve āḍhyāḥ bhavanti sarve vā gomantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2309_1: . yathā loke iti ucyate loke ca avayavāḥ eva arthavantaḥ na samudāyaḥ . ātaḥ ca avayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2309_2: eva arthavantaḥ na samudāyaḥ . yasya hi tat dravyam bhavati saḥ tena kāryam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2309_3: yasya ca gāvaḥ santi saḥ tāsām kṣīram ghṛtam ca upabhuṅkte . anyaiḥ etat draṣṭum
GS24pmbhasuu:2309_4: api aśakyam . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2311: gomat idam iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2312: iha tāvat āḍhyam idam nagaram iti akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2313_0: āḍhyāḥ asmin santi iti tat idam āḍhyam iti . gomat idam iti matvantāt matvarthīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2313_1: lupyate . evam api vākyapratiṣedhaḥ arthavattvāt . vākyasya prātipadikasñjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2314_0: devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām . devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām iti . kim kāraṇam . arthavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2314_1: . arthavat hi etat vākyam bhavati . na vai padārthāt anyasya arthasya upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2314_2: bhavati vākye . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2314_3: . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet evam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2315_0: padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ bhavati vākye . iha devadatta iti ukte kartā nirdiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2315_1: karma kriyāguṇau ca anirdiṣṭau . gām iti ukte karma nirdiṣṭam kartā kriyāguṇau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2315_2: anirdiṣṭau . abhyāja iti ukte kriyā nirdiṣṭā kartṛkarmaṇī guṇaḥ ca anirdiṣṭaḥ . śuklām
GS24pmbhasuu:2315_3: iti ukte guṇaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ kartṛkarmaṇī kriyā ca anirdiṣṭā . iha idānīm devadatta gām
GS24pmbhasuu:2315_4: abhyāja śuklām iti ukte sarvam nirdiṣṭam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2316_0: devadattaḥ eva kartā na anyaḥ . gauḥ eva karma na anyat . abhyājiḥ eva kriyā na anyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2316_1: . śuklām eva na kṛṣṇām iti . eteṣām padānām sāmānye vartamānānām yadviśeṣe avasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2316_2: saḥ vākyārthaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2317: samāsaḥ eva arthavatām samudāyāyānām prātipadikasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2319_0: uccakaiḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra prātipadikasañjñayā prārthyate . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2319_1: yathā syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva atra aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2319_2: evam luk api na bhaviṣyati . tatra yā eva antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ tasyāḥ eva śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2319_3: bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . bahupaṭavaḥ iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2319_4: bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2320_0: citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham iti . tasyām punaḥ luptāyam yā anyā vibhaktiḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2320_1: tasyāḥ prakṛtyanekadeśatvāt antodāttatvam na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2320_2: jñāpayati bhavati prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā iti yat ayam aprayayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2320_3: iti pratiṣedham śāsti . saḥ ca tadantapratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ tarhi jñāpakārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2320_4: vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca ayam prāptyarthaḥ api vaktavyaḥ . na arthaḥ prāptyarthena . kṛttaddhitagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2321_0: kṛttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati na anyasya pratyayāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2321_1: iti . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2321_2: vā prātipadikasañjñā vaktavyā . ubhayam na vaktavyam . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2321_3: ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . kathañjātīyakānām samāsaḥ . subantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2321_4: . suptiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā ārabhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2322: jahi karmaṇā bahulam ābhīkṣṇye kartāram ca abhidadhāti iti . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2324: etasya eva suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti . tiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . tiṅsamudāyasya api prātipadikasañjñā ārabhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2325: ākhyātam ākhyātena kriyāsātatye iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2326: etasya eva tiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2328_0: 77-79 arthavattā na upapadyate kevalena avacanāt . arthavattā na upapadyate vṛkṣaśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2328_1: . kim kāraṇam . kevalena avacanāt . na kevalena vṛkṣaśabdena arthaḥ gamyate . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:2328_2: tarhi . sapratyayakena . na vā pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasya aprayogaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2328_3: vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pratyayena nityasambandhāt . nityasambandhau etau arthau
GS24pmbhasuu:2328_4: prakṛtiḥ pratyayaḥ iti . pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasya aprayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2328_5: . anyat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ anyat ācaṣṭe . āmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārān ācaṣṭe . arthavattā na
GS24pmbhasuu:2328_6: upapadyate kevalena avacanāt iti bhavān asmābhiḥ coditaḥ kevalasya aprayoge hetum
GS24pmbhasuu:2328_7: āha . evam ca kila nāma kṛtvā codyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2329_0: samudāyasya arthe prayogāt avayavānām aprasiddhiḥ iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2329_1: . siddham etat . katham . anvayāt vyatirekāt ca . kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2329_2: . iha vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2330: vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ sakārāntaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2331: mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān ekatvam ca . vṛkṣau iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī :
GS24pmbhasuu:2333: aukāraḥ upajāyate vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ anvayī . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī :
GS24pmbhasuu:2334: ekatvam hīyate dvitvam upajāyate mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān anvayī . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2335_0: yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2335_1: asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2335_2: anvayī. viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2337: kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2338: akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na sādhīyaḥ arthavattā siddhā bhavati . na brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2339_0: ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na punaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2339_1: pratyayaḥ eva vā . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa viśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:2339_2: prakaraṇam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu niyogataḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2339_3: kasmin cid arthe pratītiḥ upajāyate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2339_4: cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:2341_0: 79-80 kim punaḥ ime varṇāḥ arthavantaḥ āhosvit anarthakāḥ . varṇasya arthavadanarthakatve
GS24pmbhasuu:2341_1: uktam . kim uktam . arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām ekavarṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2341_2: arthadarśanāt . varṇavyatyaye ca arthāntaragamanāt . varṇānupalabdhau ca anarthagateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2341_3: . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt subabhāvaḥ varṇāt . anarthakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2341_4: tu prativarṇam arthānupalabdheḥ . varṇavyatyayāpāyopajanavikāreṣu arthadarśanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_0: saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti . tasya parihāraḥ . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti cet dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_1: hiatadarthena guṇena guṇinaḥ arthabhāvaḥ . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti cet dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_2: hi punaḥ atadarthena guṇena guṇinaḥ arthabhāvaḥ . tat yathā . ekaḥ tantuḥ tvaktrāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_3: asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca kambalaḥ samarthaḥ . ekaḥ taṇḍulaḥ kṣutpratighāte asamarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_4: tatsamudāyaḥ ca vardhatikam samarthaḥ . ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_5: ca rajjuḥ samarthā bhavati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_6: arthamātrā . bhavati hi kim cit prati ekaḥ tantuḥ tvaktrāṇe samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca taṇḍulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_7: kṣutpratighāte samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane samarthaḥ . ime punaḥ varṇāḥ atyantāya
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_8: eva anarthakāḥ . yathā tarhi rathāṅgāni vihṛtāni pratyekam vrajikriyām prati asamarthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2342_9: bhavanti tatsamudāyaḥ ca rathaḥ samarthaḥ evam eṣām varṇānām samudāyāḥ arthavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2344_0: 81-82 nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2344_1: vaktavyā . khañjati nikhañjati lambate pralambate . kim punaḥ atra prātipadikasañjñayā
GS24pmbhasuu:2346_0: padasya padāt iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . satyām api prātipadikasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2346_1: svādyutpattiḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na hi prātipadikasañjñāyām eva svādyutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2346_2: pratibaddhā . kim tarhi . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante na ca eṣām ekatvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2346_3: santi . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa utpadyante . utpannānām niyamaḥ kriyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2346_4: vā prakṛtārthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2346_5: ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam na ekasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2346_6: eva artheṣu bahuvacanam na ekasmin na dvayoḥ iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2346_7: anarthakānām api eteṣām bhavati arthavatkṛtam iti yat ayam adhiparī* anarthakau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2349: yat anyat pratyayāt āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2350: pratyayaḥ na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ antavattvāt . apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2351: kāṇḍe kuḍye . kim kāraṇam . antavattvāt . tibatipoḥ ekādeśaḥ atipaḥ antavat syāt . asti anyat tipaḥ iti kṛtvā prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2352: pratyayaḥ na iti . na pratyayaḥ iti cet ūṅekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . na pratyayaḥ iti cet ūṅekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti :

GS24pmbhasuu:2444_4: idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra ekavacanādeśe uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2444_5: kim uktam . vrīhibhyaḥ āgataḥ iti atra gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2444_6: doṣaḥ . arthātideśāt siddham . arthātideśaḥ ayam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya vacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2445_0: ucyate vacanam . bahūnām arthānām vacanam bahuvacanam iti . yāvat brūyāt ekaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2445_1: bahuvat bhavati iti tāvat ekasmin bahuvacanam iti . saṅkhyāprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2445_2: saṅkhyāprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekaḥ vrīhiḥ sampannaḥ subhikṣam karoti . asmadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2445_3: nāmayuvapratyayayoḥ ca . asmadaḥ nāmaprayoge yuvapratyayaprayoge ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nāmaprayoge :
GS24pmbhasuu:2446: aham devadattaḥ bravīmi . aham yajñadattaḥ bravīmi . yuvapratyayaprayoge :
GS24pmbhasuu:2447: ahaṃ gārgyāyaṇaḥ bravīmi . aham vātsyāyanaḥ bravīmi . yuvagrahaṇena nārthaḥ . asmadaḥ nāmapratyayaprayoge na iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2448: aham gārgyaḥ bravīmi . aham vātsyaḥ bravīmi . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2449: asmadaḥ saviśeṣaṇasya prayoge na iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2450_0: aham paṭuḥ bravīmi . aham paṇḍitaḥ bravīmi . aśiṣyam vā bahuvat pṛthakttvābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2450_1: . aśiṣyaḥ vā bahuvadbhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pṛthaktvābhidhānāt . pṛthaktvena hi dravyāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2450_2: abhidhīyante . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam . kim ucyate pṛthaktvābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2451_0: jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam iti . jātiśabdena hi dravyābhidhānam . jātiśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:2451_1: hi dravyam api abhidhīyate jātiḥ api . katham punaḥ jñāyate jātiśabdena dravyam api
GS24pmbhasuu:2451_2: abhidhīyate iti . evam hi kaḥ cit mahati gomaṇḍale gopālakam āsīnam pṛcchati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2452: asti atra kām cid gām paśyasi iti . saḥ paśyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2453_0: paśyati ca ayam gāḥ pṛcchati ca kām cid atra gām paśyasi iti . nūnam asya dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2453_1: vivakṣitam iti . tat yadā dravyābhidhānam tadā bahuvacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā sāmānyābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2455: 109-110 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham aham bravīmi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2457: vayam brūmaḥ . imāni indriyāṇi kadā cit svātantryeṇa vivakṣitāni bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2458_0: idam me akṣi suṣṭhu paśyati . ayam me karṇaḥ suṣṭhu śṛṇoti iti . kadā cit pāratantryeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2458_1: anena akṣṇā suṣṭhu paśyāmi . anena karṇena suṣṭhu śṛṇomi iti . tat yadā svātantryeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2458_2: vivakṣā tadā bahuvacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā pāratantryeṇa tadā ekavacanadvivacane bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2460: 110 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham udite pūrve phalgunyau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2463_0: uditāḥ pūrvāḥ proṣṭhapadāḥ . phalgunīsampīpagate candramasi phalgunīśabdaḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:2463_1: . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam . yadā tayoḥ eva abhidhānam tadā dvivacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2465: 110 imau api yogau śakyau avaktum . katham . punarvasuviśākhayoḥ supām sulukpūrvasavarṇa iti siddham . punarvasuviśākhayoḥ supām sulukpūrvasavarṇa iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2466_0: (P_1,2.63) KA_I,231.14-232.7 Ro_110-113 tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ iti kimartham . kṛttikārohiṇyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2466_1: . nakṣatra iti kimartham . tiṣyaḥ ca māṇavakaḥ punarvasū maṇavakau tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2466_2: . atha nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatragrahaṇam kimartham . ayam tiṣyapunarvasuśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2466_3: asti eva jyotiṣi vartate . asti ca kālavācī . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2467_0: bahavaḥ tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ atikrāntāḥ . katareṇa tiṣyeṇa gataḥ iti . tat yaḥ jyotiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:2467_1: vartate tasya idam grahaṇam . atha vā nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatragrahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2468: videśastham api tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ kāryam tat api nakṣatrasya eva yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2469: tiṣyapuṣyayoḥ nakṣatrāṇi yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti nakṣatragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . atha vā atha vā nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatra grahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_0: puṣyapunarvasū sidhyapunarvasū . atha dvandve iti kimartham . yaḥ tiṣyaḥ tau punarvasū
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_1: yeṣām te ime tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ unmugdhāḥ . bahuvacanasya iti kimartham . uditam tiṣyapunarvasū
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_2: . katham ca atra ekavacanam . jātidvandvaḥ ekavat bhavati iti . aprāṇinām iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_3: prāpnoti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat bahuvacanagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2472_0: sarvaḥ dvandvaḥ vibhāṣā ekavat bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bābhravaśālaṅkāyanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2472_1: bābhravaśālaṅkāyanāḥ iti etat siddham bhavati . atha vā na atra bhavantaḥ prāṇināḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2474: 114-116 rūpagrahaṇam kimartham . samānānām ekaśeṣa ekavibhaktau iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva sarvam samānam śabdaḥ arthaḥ ca tatra eva syāt : vṛkṣāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2475: plakṣāḥ iti . iha na syāt : akṣāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2477_0: māṣāḥ iti . rūpagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . rūpam nimittatvena āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2477_1: śrutau ca rūpagrahaṇam . atha ekagrahaṇam kimartham . sarūpāṇām śeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2477_2: iti iyati ucyamāne dvibahvoḥ api śeṣaḥ prasajyeta . ekagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:2477_3: doṣaḥ bhavati . atha śeṣagrahaṇam kimartham . sarūpāṇām ekaḥ ekavibhaktau iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2477_4: ucyamāne ādeśaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . aśvaḥ ca asvaḥ ca aśvau :
GS24pmbhasuu:2478: āntaryataḥ dvyudāttavataḥ sthāninaḥ dvyudāttavān ādeśaḥ prasajyeta . lopyalopitā ca na prakalpeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . gargāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_0: urvāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_1: . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt. :
GS24pmbhasuu:2482: kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . ekavibhaktau iti kimartham . payaḥ payaḥ jarayati . vāsaḥ vāsaḥ chādayati . brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_0: 117-119 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_1: abhidhānam . pratyartham śabdāḥ abhiniviśante . kim idam pratyartham iti . artham
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_2: artham prati pratyartham . pratyartham śābdaniveśāt etasmāt kāraṇāt na ekena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_3: anekasya arthasya abhidhānam prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra anekārthābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_4: anekaśabdatvam . tatra anekārthābhidhāne anekaśabdatvam prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_5: api anekasya abhidhānam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_6: . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . kim idam pratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_7: śabdāḥ abhiniveśante iti etam dṛṣṭāntam āsthāya sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2484_8: apratyartham śabdāḥ abhiniviśante iti etam dṛṣṭāntam āsthāya virūpāṇām anekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2485_0: laghīyasī sarūpanivṛttirḥ garīyasī virūpapratipattiḥ iti . tat ca na . laghīyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:2485_1: virūpapratipattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yatra hi bahūnām sarūpāṇām ekaḥ śiṣyate tatra avarataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2485_2: dvayoḥ sarūpayoḥ nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā syāt . evam api etasmin sati kim cit ācāryaḥ sukaratarakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_0: 119-133 kim punaḥ ayam ekavibhaktau ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati . ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_1: iti cet na abhāvād vibhakteḥ . ekavibhaktau iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . abhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_2: vibhakteḥ . na hi samudāyāt parā vibhaktiḥ asti . kim kāraṇam . aprātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_3: . nanu ca arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati . niyamāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_4: . arthavatsamudayānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_5: vibhaktiparāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . pṛthak sarveṣām iti cet ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_6: tadāśrayatvāt . pṛthak sarveṣām iti cet ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2487_7: . kim ucyate ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ iti yāvatā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2488_0: na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā na kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . tadāśrayatvāt prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2488_1: . yatra hi prakṛtinimittā pratyayanivṛttiḥ tatra apratyayikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2488_2: bhavati agnicit somasut iti yathā . yatra ca pratyayanimittā prakṛtinivṛttiḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2489: iyān iti yathā . astu saṃyogāntalopena siddham . kutaḥ nu khalu etat parayoḥ vṛkṣaśabdayoḥ nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ pūrvayoḥ iti . tatra etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2490_0: pūrvanivṛttav api satyām saṃyogādilopena siddham iti . na sidhyati . tatra avarataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2490_1: dvayoḥ sakārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta. yatra ca saṃyogāntalopaḥ na asti tatra ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:2490_2: sidhyati . kva ca saṃyogāntalopaḥ na asti . dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ . yadi punaḥ samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:2490_3: ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2490_4: tarhi samāsagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2490_5: . tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ nakṣatradvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanam nityam iti . samāse iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2490_6: cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ . samāse iti cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . svara :
GS24pmbhasuu:2491: aśvaḥ ca aśvaḥ ca aśvau. samāsāntodāttatve kṛte ekaśeṣaḥ prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2492: samāsāntodāttattvam kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samāsāntodāttatvam . samāsāntodāttatve ca doṣaḥ bhavati . svara . samāsānta :
GS24pmbhasuu:2493: ṛk ca ṛk ca ṛcau . samāsānte kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2494_0: samāsāntaḥ kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samāsāntaḥ . samāsānte
GS24pmbhasuu:2494_1: ca doṣaḥ bhavati . aṅgāśraye ca ekaśeṣavacanam . aṅgāśraye ca kārye ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2494_2: . svasā ca svasārau ca svasāraḥ . aṅgāśraye kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2495_0: aṅgāśrayam kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṅgāśrayam . tiṅsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:2495_1: tiṅsamāsavacanam . tiṅsamāse tiṅsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekam tiṅgrahaṇam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2495_2: samāse tiṅsamāsaḥ iti eva siddham . na anarthakam . tiṅsamāse prakṛte tiṅsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2495_3: vaktavyaḥ . tiṅvidhipratiṣedhaḥ ca . tiṅ ca kaḥ cit vidheyaḥ kaḥ cit pratiṣedhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2496_0: taḥśabdaḥ vidheyaḥ tiśabdaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . yadi punaḥ asamāse ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . asamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:2496_1: vacanalopaḥ . yadi asamāse vacanalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca utpatatā eva vacanalopam
GS24pmbhasuu:2496_2: coditāḥ smaḥ . dvivacanabahuvacanavidhim dvandvapratiṣedham ca vakṣyati tadartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2498: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca . dvandvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2500_0: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . cārthe dvandvaḥ iti dvandvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2500_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2500_2: kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2500_3: ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . vibhaktyantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2500_4: ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām eva tu nivṛttiḥ bhavati . ekavibhaktyantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2500_5: iti tu pṛthagvibhaktipratiṣedhārtham . ekavibhaktyantānām iti tu vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2501: brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_0: na vā arthavipratiṣedhāt yugapadvacanābhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . arthavipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_1: . vipratiṣiddhau etau arthau kartā saṃpradānam iti aśakyau yugapat nirdeṣṭum . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_2: vipratiṣiddhatvāt yugapadvacanam na bhaviṣyati . anekārthāśrayaḥ ca punaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_3: . anekam artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate . tasmāt na ekaśabdatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_4: . tasmāt ekaśabdatvam na bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2503_0: kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2503_1: prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2503_2: . prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sarūpatvāt . prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_0: mātā ca janayitrī mātārau ca dhānyasya mātṛmātāraḥ . kim kāraṇam . sarūpatvāt . sarūpāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_1: hi etāni prātipadikāni . kim ucyate prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_2: vaktavyaḥ iti na punaḥ yasya api vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ tena api mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_3: vaktavyaḥ syāt . tasya api hi etāni kva cit vibhaktyantāni sarūpāṇi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2505_0: mātṛbhyām ca mātṛbhyāṃ ca iti . atha matam etat vibhaktyantānām sārūpye bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2505_1: eva ekaśeṣeṇa iti prātipadikānām eva ekaśeṣe doṣaḥ bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā codyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2505_3: striyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . haritasya strī hariṇī hariṇasya api hariṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2506: hariṇī ca hariṇī ca hariṇyau . śyetasya strī śyenī śyenasya api śyenī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2507: śyenī ca śyenī ca śyenyau . rohitasya strī rohiṇī rohiṇasya api rohiṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2508_0: rohiṇī ca rohiṇī ca rohiṇyau . na vā padasya arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2508_1: kim kāraṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate vibhaktyantam ca padam
GS24pmbhasuu:2508_2: . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:2508_3: . tasmin ca laukike prayoge sarūpāṇi etāni . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2509_0: na vā padasya arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ eva asti prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2509_1: iti . kim kārāṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate vibhaktyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:2509_2: ca padam . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:2509_3: . tasmin ca laukike prayoge prātipadikānām prayogaḥ na asti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2510_0: prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2510_1: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2510_2: iti . katham . vibhaktiḥ sārūpyeṇa āśrīyate . anaimittikaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2510_3: yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . kva . yatra vā tatra vā iti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2511_0: vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2511_1: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etat api etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2511_2: iti . katham . na idam pāribhāṣikyāḥ vibhakteḥ grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2512: vibhāgaḥ vibhaktiḥ iti . ekavibhāge yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca uktaṃ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2513_0: kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2513_1: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥiti . sahavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2513_2: ekaśeṣaḥ . yugapadvivakṣāyām ekaśeṣeṇa bhavitavyam . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2515: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . na etat sahavivakṣāyām bhavati . atha api nidarśayitum buddhiḥ evam nidarśayitavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2517_0: vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . yat api ucyate dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2517_1: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam sāvakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2517_2: ekaśeṣaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ iti . na tiṅantāni ekaśeṣārambham prayojayanti
