GS24pmbhasuu:2517_3: . kim kāṛaṇam . yathājātīyakānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti tathājātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2517_4: ekaśeṣaḥ . na ca tiṅantānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2517_5: . ekā hi kriyā . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2518: tarhi ekā kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na sidhyanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2519_0: pacataḥ pacanti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi . kim tarhi . sādhanāpekṣāṇi . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2519_1: astu ekavibhaktau iti . nanu ca uktam ekavibhaktau iti cet na abhāvāt vibhakteḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2520_0: arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati iti . nanu ca uktam niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2520_1: na prāpnoti arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2520_2: tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . kathañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2522: 133-136 sarvatra apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2523: bhikṣāṇām samūhaḥ bhaikṣam iti . sarvatra iti ucyate prātipadikāṇām ca ekaśeṣe siddham . apatyādiṣu iti ucyate bahavaḥ ca apatyādayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2524_0: gargasya apatyam bahavaḥ gargāḥ . ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2524_1: na prāpnoti . nanu ca yathā eva bahavaḥ yañaḥ evam prakṛtayaḥ api bahvyaḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2524_2: na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : gargāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2527: urvāḥ iti . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2528: na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2529_0: kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2529_1: na ca etat laukikam gotram . atha vā punaḥ astu ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2530_0: asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti iti . siddham tu samānārthānām ekaśeṣavacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2530_1: etat . katham . samānārthānām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi samānārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2532: māṣāḥ iti . nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām . nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekārthānām api virūpāṇām . ekārthānām api virūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2533_0: vakradaṇḍaḥ ca kuṭiladaṇḍaḥ ca vakradaṇḍau kuṭiladaṇḍāu iti vā . svarabhinnānām yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2533_1: uttarasvaravidhiḥ . svarabhinnānām yasya uttarasvaravidhiḥ tasya ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2538_0: dvau ca dvau ca iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt anyapadārthatvāt ca anekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2538_1: . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na hi ekau iti anena arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2538_2: gamyate . anyapadārthatvāt ca saṅkhyāyāḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . ekaḥ ca ekaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2538_3: iti asya dvau iti arthaḥ . dvau ca dvau ca iti asya catvāraḥ iti arthaḥ . na etau
GS24pmbhasuu:2538_4: staḥ parihārau . yat tāvat ucyate saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt iti . arthāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:2538_5: api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . gārgyaḥ ca gārgyāyaṇaḥ ca gārgyau . na ca ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2538_6: vṛddhayuvānau iti bhavati ca ekaśeṣaḥ . yat api ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2539: anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . anyapadārthe api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2540: viṃśatiḥ ca viṃśatiḥ ca viṃśatī iti . tayoḥ catvāriṃśat iti arthaḥ . evam tarhi na imau pṛthak parihārau . ekaparihāraḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2541_0: saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . yatra hi arthāsampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2541_1: eva vā anyapadārthatā eva vā bhavati tatra ekaśeṣaḥ gārgyau viṃśatī iti yathā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2541_2: vā na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . yadi tarhi na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ samudāyaśabdāḥ tarhi bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2541_3: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . ekavacanam prāpnoti . ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā yūtham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2543_0: vanam iti . santu tarhi ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . kiṅkṛtam sārūpyam . anyonyakṛtam sārūpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2543_1: . santi punaḥ ke cit anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ . santi iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:2543_2: tad yathā mātā pitā bhrātā iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2543_3: api vartante . iha punaḥ ekena api apāye na bhavati catvāraḥ iti . anyat idānīm etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2543_4: ucyate sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante iti . yat tu bhavān asmān
GS24pmbhasuu:2543_5: codayati santi punaḥ ke cit anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtḥ bhāvaḥ iti tatra ete
GS24pmbhasuu:2543_6: asmābhiḥ upanyastāḥ . tatra etat bhavān āha sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api
GS24pmbhasuu:2543_7: vartante iti . etat ca vārttam . ekaikaḥ na udyantum bhāram śaknoti yat katham tatra /
GS24pmbhasuu:2544: ekaikaḥ kartā syāt sarve vā syuḥ katham yuktam //
GS24pmbhasuu:2545: kāraṇam udyamanam cet na udyacchati ca antareṇa tat tulyam /
GS24pmbhasuu:2546: tasmāt pṛthak pṛthak te kartāraḥ savyapekṣāḥ tu //
GS24pmbhasuu:2548: 140 prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ sarūpatvāt . prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2551: pacati ca pacasi ca pacāmi ca pacāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asarūpatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_1: aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt . ekaḥ ayam avaśiṣyate . tena anena tadarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_2: bhavitavyam . kimarthena . yadarthaḥ ekaḥ . kimarthaḥ ca ekaḥ . ekaḥ ekārthaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_3: aikārthyam . na ayam ekārthaḥ . kim tarhi . dvyarthaḥ bahvarthaḥ ca . na aikārthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_4: iti cet ārambhānarthakyam . na aikārthyam iti cet ekaśeṣārambhaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_5: . iha hi śabdasya svābhāvikī vā anekārthatā syāt vācanikī vā . tat yadi tāvat svābhāvikī
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_6: aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ ekena uktatvāt . aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_7: tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2554_0: ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate saḥ ca dvyarthaḥ bhavati bahvarthaḥ ca iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2554_1: siddham ekaśeṣaḥ iti eva . katham punaḥ ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā
GS24pmbhasuu:2554_2: bahvarthatā vā śakyā labdhum . tat ca ekaśeṣakṛtam . na hi antareṇa tadvācinaḥ śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2554_3: prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati . paśyāmaḥ ca punaḥ antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2554_4: śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati iti agnicit somasut iti yathā . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2555_0: lopakṛtam etat yena atra antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2555_1: gatiḥ bhavatiti . evam iha api ekaśeṣakṛtam etat yena atra ekaḥ ayam avaśiṣyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2555_2: anena dvyarthatā bahvarthatā vā bhavati . ucyeta tarhi na tu gamyeta . yaḥ hi gām
GS24pmbhasuu:2555_3: aśvaḥ iti brūyāt aśvam vā gauḥ iti na jātu cit sampratyayaḥ syāt . tena anekārthābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2555_4: yatnam kurvatā avaśyam lokaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ anugantavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2556_0: keṣu artheṣu laukikāḥ kān śabdān prayuñjate iti . loke ca ekasmin vṛkṣaḥ iti prayuñjate
GS24pmbhasuu:2556_1: dvayoḥ vṛkṣau iti bahuṣu vṛkṣāḥ iti . yadi tarhi lokaḥ avaśyam śabdeṣu pramāṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2556_2: ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate . atha kimartham lopaḥ ārabhyate . pratyayalakṣaṇam ācāryaḥ prārthayamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2556_3: lopam ārabhate . ekaśeṣārambhe punaḥ asya na kim cit prayojanam asti . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2557_0: pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya abhidhānam iti . yadi ca ekena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:2557_1: anekasya arthasya abhidhānam syāt na pratyartham śabdaniveśaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt . pratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2557_2: śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasya abhidhānāt apratyartham iti cet tat api pratyartham eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2557_3: . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasyābhidhānāt apratyartham iti cet evam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2558_0: yat api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati tat api pratyartham eva . yat api hi arthau
GS24pmbhasuu:2558_1: arthau prati tat api pratyartham eva . yat api hi arthān arthān prati tat api pratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2558_2: eva . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām arthānām abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2558_3: tāvatām śabdānām prayogaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2558_4: nyāyyaḥ iti cet ekena api anekasya abhidhānam . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2559: eṣaḥ api nyāyyaḥ eva yat api ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati . yadi tarhi ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati plakṣanyagrodhau :
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_0: ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_1: prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_2: aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_3: . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa nyagrodhārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_4: iti kṛtvā nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate . katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_5: api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati iti . sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_6: na virūpāṇām . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_7: na punaḥ virūpāṇām . abhidhānam punaḥ svābhāvikam . svābhāvikam abhidhānam . ubhayadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2561: virūpāṇām api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2562: dyavā ha kṣamā . dyavā cit asmai pṛthivī namete iti . virūpāṇām kila nāma ekena anekasya abhidhānam syāt kim punaḥ sarūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2564: 144-150 ākṛtyabhidhānāt vā ekam vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ . ākṛtyabhidhānāt vā ekam śabdam vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_0: ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_1: iti . prakhyāviśeṣāt . na hi gauḥ iti ukte viśeṣaḥ prakhyāyate śuklā nīlā kapilā
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_2: kapotikā iti . yadi api tāvat prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_3: sā abhidhīyate iti . avyapavargagateḥ ca . avyapavargagateḥ ca manyāmahe ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_4: iti . na hi gauḥ iti ukte vyapavargaḥ gamyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti . jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_5: ca ekopadiṣṭam . jñāyate khalu api ekopadiṣṭam . gauḥ asya kadā cit upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_6: . saḥ tam anyasmin deśe anyasmin kāle anyasyām ca vayovasthāyām dṛṣṭvā jānāti ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2565_7: gauḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ prakhyāviśeṣāt iti ataḥ . tasya eva upodbalakam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2566: prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam iti . dharmaśāstram ca tathā . evam ca kṛtvā dharmaśāstram pravṛttam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2567_0: brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ . surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram
GS24pmbhasuu:2567_1: ca na pīyate . yadi dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam brāhmaṇam ahatvā ekām ca surām apītvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2567_2: anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . kaḥ punaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ avyapavargagateḥ ca iti ataḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_0: avyapavargagateḥ ca dharmaśāstram ca tathā iti . asti ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_1: yugapat . asti khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate . kim . ādityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_2: . tad yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_3: . na ekaḥ draṣṭā ādityam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhate . evam tarhi itīndravat
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_4: viṣayaḥ . tat yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ yugapat sarvatra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_5: evam ākṛtiḥ api yugapat sarvatra bhaviṣyati . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_6: anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate iti. na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_7: iti cet tathā ekaśeṣe . yaḥ hi manyate na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapad upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_8: iti ekaśeṣe tasya doṣaḥ syāt . ekaśeṣe api na ekaḥ vṛkṣaśabdaḥ anekam artham yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_9: abhidadhīta . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate iti . dravyābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_10: hi ākṛtyasampratyayaḥ . dravyābhidhāne sati ākṛteḥ asampratyayaḥ syāt . tatra kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_11: doṣaḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ prāpnoti . asarvadravyagatau
GS24pmbhasuu:2568_12: kaḥ doṣaḥ . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2569_0: ekaḥ śāstroktam kurvīta aparaḥ aśāstroktam . aśāstrokte ca kriyamāṇe viguṇam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:2569_1: bhavati . viguṇe ca karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . nanu ca yasya api ākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2569_2: api yadi anavayavena codyate na ca anubadhyate viguṇam karma bhavati . viguṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2569_3: karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . ekā ākṛtiḥ iti ca pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2569_4: upādāne prayojanam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2569_5: tarhi anavayavena codyate pratyekam ca parisamāpyate yathā ādityaḥ . nanu ca yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2569_6: api dravyam padārthaḥ tasya api anavayavena codyate pratyekam ca parisamāpyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2569_7: ekaśeṣaḥ tvayā vaktavyaḥ . tvayā api tarhi dvivacanabahuvacanāni sādhyāni . codanāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2569_8: ca ekasya upādhivṛtteḥ . codanāyām ca ekasya upādhivṛtteḥ manyāmahe ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2570_0: ekam nirupya dvitīyas tṛtīyaḥ ca nirupyate . yadi ca dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:2570_1: nirupya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca nirvapaṇam na prakalpeta . kaḥ punaḥ etayoḥ jāticodanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2572: 150-152 dravyābhidhānam vyāḍiḥ . dravyābhidhānam vyāḍiḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2573: dravyam abhidhīyate iti . tathā ca liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ . evam ca kṛtvā liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2575: brāhmaṇau brāhmaṇāḥ iti . codanāsu ca tasya ārambhāt . codanāsu ca tasya ārambhāt manyāmahe dravyam abhidhīyate iti . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2576_0: ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni kriyante . na ca ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:2576_1: anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2576_2: . na hi ekaḥ devadattaḥ yugapat srughne bhavati mathurāyām ca . vināśe prādurbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:2576_3: ca sarvam tathā syāt . kim . vinaśyet ca prāduḥ ṣyāt ca . śvā mṛtaḥ iti śvā nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:2576_4: loke na pracaret . gauḥ jātaḥ iti sarvam gobhūtam anavakāśam syāt . asti ca vairūpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2577: gauḥ ca gauḥ ca khaṇḍaḥ muṇḍaḥ iti . tathā ca vigrahaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā vigrahaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2578: gauḥ ca gauḥ ca iti . vyartheṣu ca muktasaṃśayam . vyartheṣu ca muktasaṃśayam bhavati . ākṛtau api padārthe ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : akṣāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_0: 153-159 liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇasya anityatvāt . liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_1: kutaḥ . guṇasya anityatvāt . anityāḥ guṇāḥ apāyinaḥ upāyinaḥ ca . kim ye ete śuklādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_2: . na iti āha . strīpuṃnapuṃsakāni sattvaguṇāḥ ekatvadvitvabahutvāni ca . kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_3: ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_4: cit puṃstvena kadācit napuṃsakatvena . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_5: tu na upapadyate . yadi hi kadā cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_6: cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ iti pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_7: uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_8: guṇavivakṣānityatvāt . liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti . kutaḥ . guṇavivakṣāyāḥ anityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_9: . anityā guṇavivakṣā . kadā cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_10: kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena kadā cit puṃstvena kadā cit napuṃsakatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_11: . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate . yadi kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_12: ākṛtiḥ ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_13: iti pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_14: iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . liṅgaparihāraḥ ca api na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_15: . āviṣṭaliṅgā jātiḥ yat liṅgam upādāya pravartate utpattiprabhṛti ā vināśāt tat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_16: na jahāti . tasmāt na vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śakyam laukikam liṅgam āsthātum . avaśyam kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_17: cit svakṛtāntaḥ āstheyaḥ . kaḥ asau svakṛtāntaḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam . saṃstyānaprasavau
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_18: liṅgam āstheyau . kim idam saṃstyānaprasavau iti . saṃstyāne styāyateḥ ḍraṭ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2582: strī . sūteḥ sap prasave pumān . nanu ca loke api styāyateḥ eva strī sūteḥ ca pumān . adhikaraṇasādhanā loke strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:2583: styāyati asyām garbhaḥ iti . kartṛsādhanaḥ ca pumān :
GS24pmbhasuu:2584: sūte pumān iti . iha punaḥ ubhayam bhāvasādhanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2585_0: styānam pravṛttiḥ ca . kasya punaḥ styānam strī pravṛttiḥ vā pumān . guṇānām . keṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:2585_1: . śabdasparśarūparasagandhānām . sarvāḥ ca punaḥ mūrtayaḥ evamātmikāḥ saṃstyānaprasavaguṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2585_2: śabdasparśarūparasagandhavatyaḥ . yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ tatra avarataḥ trayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2586_0: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rūpam iti . rasagandhau na sarvatra . pravṛttiḥ khalu api nityā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2586_1: na hi iha kaḥ cit api svasmin ātmani muhūrtam api avatiṣṭhate . vardhate yāvat anena
GS24pmbhasuu:2586_2: vardhitavyam apacayena vā yujyate . tat ca ubhayam sarvatra . yadi ubhayam sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2586_3: kutaḥ vyavasthā . vivakṣātaḥ. saṃstyānavivakṣāyām strī prasavavivakṣāyām pumān ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2586_4: api avivakṣāyām napuṃsakam . tatra liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇavivakṣānityatvāt iti liṅgaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2586_5: upapannaḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate . vacanaparihāraḥ ca api upapannaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2587: atha yasya dravyam padārthaḥ katham tasya ekavacanadvivacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti iti . evam saḥ vakṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2588: ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . yadi tasya api vācanikāni na svābhāvikāni aham api evam vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_0: ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . na hi ākṛtipadārthikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_1: dravyam na padārthaḥ dvavyapadārthikasya vā ākṛtiḥ na padārthaḥ . ubhayoḥ ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_2: padārthaḥ . kasya cit tu kim cit pradhānabhūtam kim cit guṇabhūtam . ākṛtipadārthikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_3: ākṛtiḥ pradhānabhūtā dravyam guṇabhūtam . dravyapadārthikasya dravyam pradhānabhūtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_4: ākṛtiḥ guṇabhūtā . guṇavacanavat vā . guṇavacanavat vā liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_5: . tat yathā guṇavacanānām śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_0: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_1: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritā
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_2: ākṛtiḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat ākṛteḥ api bhaviṣyati . adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_3: . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite dravye
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_0: ārambhaṇādīni bhaviṣyanti . na ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat iti ādityavat
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_1: viṣayaḥ . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate iti ādityavat
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_2: viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_3: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā anekādhikaraṇastham ādityam yugapat upalabhate
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_4: . evam tarhi itīndravat viṣayaḥ . tad yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_5: yugapat sarvatra bhavati evam ākṛtiḥ yugapat sarvatra bhaviṣyati . avināśaḥ anāśritatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_6: . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ . anāśritatvāt . anāśritā ākṛtiḥ dravyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_7: kim ucyate anāśritatvāt iti yat idānīm eva uktam adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_8: evam tarhi avināśaḥ anaikātmyāt . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ . anaikātmyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_9: . anekaḥ ātmā ākṛteḥ dravyasya ca . tat yathā vṛkṣasthaḥ avatānaḥ vṛkṣe chinne api
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_10: na vinaśyati . vairūpyavigrahau dravyabhedāt . vairūpyavigrahau api dravyabhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_11: bhaviṣyataḥ . vyartheṣu ca sāmānyāt siddham . vibhinnārtheṣu ca sāmānyāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_12: sarvam . aśnoteḥ akṣaḥ . padyateḥ pādaḥ . mimīteḥ māṣaḥ . tatra kriyāsāmānyāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2593_13: . aparaḥ tu āha . purākalpe etat āsīt ṣoḍaśa māṣāḥ kārṣāpaṇam ṣoḍaśaphalāḥca māṣaśambaṭyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2598: uṣṭraḥ ca karabhaḥ ca iti . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2601: strīgrahaṇe strīpratyayagrahaṇam vā syāt stryarthagrahaṇam vā strīśabdagrahaṇam vā iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pratyayagrahaṇam vā śabdagrahaṇam vā gārgī ca gārgyāyaṇau ca gargāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2602: kena yaśabdaḥ na śrūyeta . astriyām iti hi luk ucyate . iha ca gārgī ca gārgyāyaṇau ca gargān paśya :
GS24pmbhasuu:2603: tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti natvam na prāpnoti . atha arthagrahaṇam na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu
GS24pmbhasuu:2608: uṣṭrī ca karabhaḥ ca iti . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2611: haṃsaḥ ca varaṭā ca kacchapaḥ ca ḍulī ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2612: rśyaḥ ca rohit ca iti . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2614_0: 162 kimartham idam ucyate na pumān striyā iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . tallakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2614_1: cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2614_2: viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat imam yogam
GS24pmbhasuu:2615: yatra ūrdhvam prakṛteḥ tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . haṃsaḥ ca varaṭā ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2617_0: rśyaḥ ca rohit ca iti atra ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati . pūrvayoḥ yogayoḥ bhūyān parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2617_1: . yāvat brūyāt gotram yūnā iti tāvat vṛddhaḥ yūnā iti . pūrvasūtre gotrasya vṛddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2619_0: 163-165 asarūpāṇām yuvasthavirastrīpuṃsānām viśeṣasya avivakṣitatvāt sāmānyasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2619_1: vivakṣitatvāt siddham . asarūpāṇām yuvasthavirastrīpuṃsānām viśeṣaḥ ca avivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2619_2: sāmānyam ca vivakṣitam . viśeṣasya avivakṣitatvāt sāmānyasya ca vivakṣitatvāt sarūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2619_3: ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti eva siddham . pumān striyā iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2620_0: brāhmaṇavatsā ca brāhmaṇīvatsaḥ ca iti . brāhmaṇavatsābrāhmaṇīvatsayoḥ vibhaktiparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2620_2: viśeṣavācakatvāt ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . yatra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2620_3: tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . na atra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2620_4: yatra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iha na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2621: kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . na hi atra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam . katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_0: śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti āhosvit arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_1: cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_2: eva viśeṣaḥ iti siddham kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . idam tu na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2623: gomān ca gomatī ca gomantau . atha vijñāyate arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti siddham gomān ca gomatī ca gomantau . idam tu na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2624_0: kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . ubhayathā api paṭuḥ ca paṭvī ca paṭū* iti etat na
GS24pmbhasuu:2624_1: sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2624_2: iti na api arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti . katham tarhi . śabdārthau
GS24pmbhasuu:2624_3: yā strī tatsadbhāvena ca tallakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate . evam ca kṛtvā iha api prāptiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_0: brāhmaṇavatsā ca brāhmaṇīvatsaḥ ca iti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_1: na vyapadiśati . kim . tat iti anuvartate . tat iti anena prakṛtau strīpuṃsau pratinirdiśyete
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_2: . kau ca prakṛtau . pradhāne . pradhānam yā śabdastrī pradhānam yā arthastrī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2627: 166-167 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham śuklaḥ ca kambalaḥ śuklam ca vastram tat idam śuklam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2629: śuklaḥ ca kambalaḥ śuklā ca bṛhatikā śuklam ca vastram tat idam śuklam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2630_0: tāni imani śuklāni . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt śeṣaḥ . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2630_1: śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim ca pradhānam . napuṃsakam . katham punaḥ jñāyate napuṃsakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2630_2: pradhānam iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:2631_0: anirjñāte arthe guṇasandehe ca napuṃsakaliṅgam prayujyate . kim jātam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2631_1: . dvayam ca eva hi jāyate strī vā pumān vā . tathā vidūre avyaktam ārūpam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2631_2: vaktāraḥ bhavanti mahiṣīrūpam iva brāhmaṇīrūpam iva . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2631_3: napuṃsakasya śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2632_0: ekavat ca asya anyatarasyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ākṛtivācitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2632_1: ekavacanam . ākṛtivācitvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā dravyābhidhānam tadā dvivacanabahuvacane bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_0: 168-169 kimartham idam ucyate na pumān striyā iti eva siddham . bhrātṛputrapitṛśvaśurāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_1: kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ . bhrātṛputrapitṛśvaśurāṇām kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_2: bhavati . bhrātṛputrapitṛśvaśurāṇām kāraṇād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ iti cet tulyakāraṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_3: siddham . yadi tāvat bibharti iti bhrātā svasari api etat bhavati . tathā yadi punāti
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_4: prīṇāti iti vā putraḥ duhitari api etat bhavati . tathā yadi pāti pālayati iti vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_5: pitā mātari api etat bhavati . tathā yadi āśu āptavyaḥ śvaśuraḥ śvaśrvām api etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_6: bhavati . darśanam vai hetuḥ . na hi svasari bhrātṛśabdaḥ dṛśyate . darśanam hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_7: iti cet tulyam . darśanam hetuḥ iti cet tulyam etat bhavati . svasari api bhrātṛśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_8: dṛśyatām . tulyam hi kāraṇam . na vai eṣaḥ loke sampratyayaḥ . na hi loke bhrātā
GS24pmbhasuu:2635_9: ānīyatām iti ukte svasā ānīyate . tadviṣayam ca . tadviṣayam ca etat draṣṭavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2636_0: svasari bhrātṛtvam . kiṃviṣayam . ekaśeṣaviṣayam . yuktam punaḥ yat niyataviṣayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2636_1: śabdāḥ syuḥ . bāḍham yuktam . anyatra api tadviṣayadarśanāt . anyatra api tadviṣayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2637_0: samāne rakte varṇe gauḥ lohitaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ śoṇaḥ iti . samāne ca kāle varṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2637_1: gauḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ hemaḥ iti . samāne ca śukle varṇe gauḥ śvetaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ karkaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2639_0: 169-170 tyadāditaḥ śeṣe punnapuṃsakataḥ liṅgavacanāni . tyadāditaḥ śeṣe punnapuṃsakataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2639_1: liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . sā ca devadattaḥ ca tau sā ca kuṇḍe ca tāni . advandvatatpuruṣaviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2639_2: . advandvatatpuruṣaviśeṣaṇānām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . saḥ ca kukkuṭaḥ sā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2639_3: mayūrī kukkuṭamayūryau te . ardham pippalyāḥ tat ardhapippalī ca sā ardhapippalyau te .
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_0: 170-171 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . tyadādīnām sāmānyārthatvāt . tyadādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_1: sāmānyam arthaḥ . ātaḥ ca sāmānyam . devadatte api hi saḥ iti etat bhavati yajñadatte
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_2: api . tyadādīnām sāmānyārthatvāt śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2642: parasya śeṣam vakṣyāmi iti . parasya ca ubhayavācitvāt . ubhayavāci param . pūrvaśeṣadarśanāt ca . pūrvasya khalu api śeṣaḥ dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2643: saḥ ca yaḥ ca tau ānaya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2644: yau ānaya iti . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_0: dvandvaḥ mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ ca dvandvābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_1: siddham . sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ ca dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_2: dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti ucyate śūdrābhīram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2647: tṛṇolapam iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat śūdrābhīram iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2649: gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . striyaḥ eva avaśiṣyante . tṛṇolapam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2650_0: apām ulapam iti nāmadheyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sāmānyena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2650_1: viśeṣasya prayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati . sāmānyena uktatvāt tasya arthasya viśeṣasya prayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2650_2: na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_0: tam brāhmaṇam ānaya gārgyam iti . bhavati yadā niyogataḥ tasya eva ānayanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_1: . evam tarhi yena eva khalu api hetunā etat vākyam bhavati tam brāhmaṇam ānaya gārgyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_2: iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ dvandvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:2653: 172 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham gāvaḥ imāḥ caranti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2654: ajāḥ imāḥ caranti . gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . striyaḥ eva avaśiṣyante . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2655: grāmyeṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2657: śūkarāḥ ime iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati agrāmyāṇām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye grahītum aśakyāḥ . kutaḥ eva vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2658: paśuṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2660: vṛṣalāḥ ime . kaḥ punaḥ arhati apaśūnām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2661: saṅgheṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2662: etau gāvaḥ carataḥ . kaḥ punaḥ arhati nirjñāte arthe anyathā prayoktum . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2663: ataruṇeṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2665: barkarāḥ ime iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati taruṇānām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . anekaśapheṣu iti vaktavyam iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2668: 173-178 kutaḥ ayam vakāraḥ . yadi tāvat saṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kriyate bhvādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . atha asaṃhitayā bhū-ādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_0: bhūvādīnām vakāraḥ ayam maṅgalārthaḥ prayujyate . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ śāstraughasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_1: maṅgalārtham vakāram āgamam prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni maṅgalamadhyāni maṅgalāntāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_2: hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣāṇi ca . adhyetāraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_3: siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham . yadi tāvat paṭhyante na
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_4: arthaḥ ādigrahaṇena . anyatra api hi ayam paṭhan ādigrahaṇam na karoti . kva anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_5: . mṛḍamṛdagudhakuṣakliśavadavasaḥ ktvā iti . atha na paṭhyante natarām arthaḥ ādigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_6: . na hi apaṭhitāḥ śakyāḥ ādigrahaṇena viśeṣayitum . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat ādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_7: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti ca pāṭhaḥ bāhyaḥ ca sūtrāt iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_8: prayojanam . pāṭhena dhātusañjñā iti etat upapannam bhavati . pāṭhena dhātusañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_9: samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . pāṭhena dhātusañjñāyām samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_10: . yā iti dhātuḥ yā iti ābantaḥ . vā iti dhātuḥ vā iti nipātaḥ . nu iti dhātuḥ nu
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_11: iti pratyayaḥ ca nipātaḥ ca . div iti dhātuḥ div iti prātipadikam . kim ca syāt yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_12: eteṣām api dhātusañjñā syāt . dhātoḥ iti tavyādīnām utpattiḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_13: doṣaḥ . sādhane tavyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2669_14: . sādhanābhāvāt satyām api dhātusañjñāyām tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2671_0: ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anāpaḥ iti evam saḥ . asya tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2671_1: vāśabdasya nipātasya adhātuḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . aprātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2671_2: svādyutpattiḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam coditam
GS24pmbhasuu:2672: nipātaḥ prātipadikam iti eva . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2674_0: aci śnudhātubhruvām yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iti uvaṅādeśaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2674_1: jñāpayati na pratyayasya uvaṅādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam tatra śnugrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2674_2: . asya tarhi divśabdasya adhātuḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2674_3: . aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2674_4: utpadyante divśabdāt svādayaḥ iti yat ayam divaḥ sau auttvam śāsti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2674_5: jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . divśabdaḥ yat prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_0: akṣadyūḥ iti . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam ca na sidhyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_1: tarhi ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_2: api ananubandhakaḥ divśabdaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā sānubandhakasya grahaṇam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_3: . parimāṇagrahaṇam ca . parimāṇagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iyān avadhiḥ dhātusañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_4: bhavati iti vaktavyam kutaḥ hi etat bhūśabdaḥ dhātusañjñaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ bhvedhśabdaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2677_0: 179-185 yadi punaḥ kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta . kā punaḥ kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2677_1: . īhā . kā punaḥ īhā . ceṣṭā . kā punaḥ ceṣṭā . vyāpāraḥ . sarvathā bhavān śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:2677_2: eva śabdān ācaṣṭe . na kim cid arthajātam nidarśayati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2678_0: evañjātīyikā kriyā iti . kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā . aśakyā kriyā piṇḍībhūtā
GS24pmbhasuu:2678_1: nidarśayitum yathā garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ . sā asau anumānagamyā . kaḥ asau anumānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2678_2: . iha sarveṣu sādhaneṣu sannihiteṣu kadā cit pacati iti etat bhavati kadācit na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2678_3: . yasmin sādhane sannihite pacati iti etat bhavati sā nūnam kriyā . atha vā yayā
GS24pmbhasuu:2678_4: devadattaḥ iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati sā nūnam kriyā . katham punaḥ jñāyate kriyāvacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2678_5: pacādayaḥ iti . yat eṣām karotinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2679_0: kim karoti . pacati . kim kariṣyati . pakṣyati . kim akārṣīt . apākṣīt iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2679_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pacati prapacati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam prāpnoti . saṅghātena
GS24pmbhasuu:2679_3: arthagateḥ . saṅghātena hi arthaḥ gamyate saprakṛtikena sapratyayakena sopasargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2679_4: ca . astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam . astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2679_5: . yathā hi bhavatā karotinā pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam nidarśitam na tathā astyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2679_6: nidarśyate . na hi bhavati kim karoti asti iti . pratyayārthasya avyatirekāt prakṛtyantareṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2679_7: . pratyayārthasya avyatirekāt prakṛtyantareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti . pacati paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2680_0: prakṛtyarthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca . pratyayārthaḥ saḥ eva . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2680_1: . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti . paktā pacanam pākaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2681_0: pratyayārthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca bhavati . prakṛtyarthaḥ saḥ eva. katham punaḥ jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2681_1: ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām . anvayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2681_2: vyatirekāt ca . kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā . iha pacati iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2682: pacśabdaḥ cakārāntaḥ atiśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2683: viklittiḥ kartṛtvam ekatvam ca . paṭhati iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī :
GS24pmbhasuu:2684: pacśabdaḥ hīyate paṭhśabdaḥ upajāyate atiśabdaḥ anvayī . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī :
GS24pmbhasuu:2685: viklittiḥ hīyate paṭhikriyā upajāyate kartṛtvam ca ekatvam ca anvayī . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2686_0: yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2686_1: asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2686_2: anvayī . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2688: kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2689: akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na sādhīyaḥ arthavattā siddhā bhavati . na api brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2690_0: ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na punaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2690_1: pratyayaḥ eva vā . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa prakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2690_2: viśeṣam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ pacati iti ukte svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2690_3: kasmin cit viśeṣe pacatiśabdaḥ vartate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2690_4: na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe . kriyāviśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2690_5: upasargaḥ . pacati iti kriyā gamyate . tām praḥ viśinaṣṭi . yadi api tāvat atra etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2690_6: śakyate vaktum yatra dhātuḥ upasargam vyabhicarati yatra na khalu tam vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:2691: adhīte iti . yadi api atra dhātuḥ upasargam na vyabhicarati upasargaḥ tu dhātum vyabhicarati . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2692: yaḥ eva asya adheḥ anyatra arthaḥ sa iha api iti . kaḥ punaḥ anyatra adheḥ arthaḥ . adhiḥ uparibhāve vartate . iha tarhi vyaktam arthāntaram gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2693_0: tiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhate iti . tiṣṭhati iti vrajikriyāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ pratiṣṭhate iti vrajikriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2693_1: gamyate . te manyāmahe upasargakṛtam etat yena atra vrajikriyā gamyate . praḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2693_2: dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ ādikarmaṇi vartate . na ca idam na asti bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2694: vapiḥ prakiraṇe ḍṛṣṭaḥ chedane api vartate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2695: keśaśmaśru vapati iti . īḍiḥ stuticodanāyācñāsu dṛṣṭaḥ preraṇe api vartate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2696: agniḥ vai itaḥ vṛṣṭim īṭṭe marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti iti . karotiḥ abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe api vartate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2698: kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca api vartate : kaṭe kuru ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2700: aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate . evam iha api tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyām āha tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyāyāḥ nivṛttim . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2703: 185-192 yadi punaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti evam lakṣaṇam kriyeta . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhāvavacanāḥ pacādayaḥ iti . yat eṣām bhavatinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2706: bhavati apākṣīt iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhāvaḥ . bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ iti . yadi bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti : bhedaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2707_0: chedaḥ . anyaḥ hi bhāvaḥ anyaḥ hi abhāvaḥ . ātaḥ ca anyaḥ bhāvaḥ anyaḥ abhāvaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2707_1: . yaḥ hi yasya bhāvam icchati saḥ na tasya abhāvam yasya ca abhāvam na tasya bhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2707_2: . pacādīnām ca dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti . yathā hi bhavatā kriyāvacane dhātau karotinā
GS24pmbhasuu:2707_3: pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam nidarśitam na tathā bhāvavacane dhātau nidarśyate . karotiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2707_4: pacācīnām sarvān kālān sarvān puruṣān sarvāṇi ca vacanāni anuvartate . bhavatiḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2707_5: vartamānakālam ca eva ekatvam ca . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2710: bhavati apākṣīt iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2711: pacādayaḥ kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā yatra khalu sā eva kriyā tatra katham :
GS24pmbhasuu:2713_0: syāt api syāt iti . atra api anyatvam asti . kutaḥ . kālabhedāt sādhanabhedāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2713_1: . ekasya atra bhavateḥ bhavatiḥ sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2713_2: sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . yāvatā atra api anyatvam asti pacādayaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2713_3: kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2714: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ iti . kim kṛtam bhavati . vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā bhavati . bhavet vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā syāt prātipadikānām api prāpnoti : vṛkṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2715: plakṣaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . etāni api hi bhavanti . evam tarhi karmasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2716: bhāvyate yaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ iti . kriyā ca eva hi bhāvyate svabhāvasiddham tu dravyam . evam api bhavet keṣām cit na syāt yāni na bhāvyante . ye tu ete sambandhiśabdāḥ teṣām prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2717: mātā pitā bhrātā iti . sarvathā vayam prātipadikaparyudāsāt na mucyāmahe . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2718: bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ iti . yāvatā paṭhiṣyati pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2719_0: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena
GS24pmbhasuu:2719_1: eva abhihitam sūtreṇa bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti . katham . na idam ādigrahaṇam . vadeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2720: bhuvam vadanti iti bhūvādayaḥ iti . bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ . bhāvavacane dhātau tadarthasya pratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2721_0: śiśye iti . kim ca syāt . aśiti iti āttvam prasajyeta . tat hi dhātoḥ vihitam . itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2721_1: ca pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ . itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati . kā
GS24pmbhasuu:2721_2: itaretarāśrayatā . pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ . utpanne hi pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:2721_3: bhāvavacanatvam gamyate saḥ ca tāvat bhāvavacanāt utpannaḥ . tat etat itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2721_4: bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt anāśritya
GS24pmbhasuu:2721_5: bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ . siddham etat . katham . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2721_6: anāśritya bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ utpadyate . prathamabhāvagrahaṇam ca . prathamabhāvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2721_7: ca kartavyam . prathamam yaḥ bhāvam āha iti . kutaḥ punaḥ prāthamyam . kim śabdataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2721_8: āhosvit arthataḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi śabdataḥ sanādīnām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2722: putrīyati vastrīyati iti . atha arthataḥ siddhā sanādīnām dhātusañjñā saḥ eva tu doṣaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2723: bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na eva arthataḥ na eva śabdataḥ . kim tarhi . abhidhānataḥ . sumadhyame abhidhāne yaḥ prathamam bhāvam āha.
GS24pmbhasuu:2725: 193-196 iha ye eva bhāvavacane dhātau doṣāḥ te eva kriyāvacane api . tatra te eva parihārāḥ . tatra idam aparihṛtam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2726_0: astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam iti . tasya parihāraḥ . kām punaḥ kriyām bhavān matvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2726_1: āha astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti iti . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām
GS24pmbhasuu:2726_2: pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na brūmaḥ kārakāṇi kriyā iti . kim tarhi . kārakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2726_3: pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā . anyathā ca kārakāṇi śuṣkaudane pravartante anyathā ca māṃsaudane
GS24pmbhasuu:2726_4: . yadi evam siddhā astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā . anyathā hi kārakāṇi astau
GS24pmbhasuu:2726_5: pravartante anyathā hi mriyatau . ṣaṭ bhāvavikārāḥ iti ha sma āha bhagavān vārṣyāyaṇiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2727_0: jāyate asti vipariṇamate vardhate apakṣīyate vinaśyati iti . sarvathā sthitaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2727_1: atra dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti . bāhyaḥ hi ebhyaḥ tiṣṭhatiḥ . evam tarhi kriyāyāḥ kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2727_2: nivartikā bhavati dravyam dravyasya nivartakam . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati
GS24pmbhasuu:2727_3: . kimavasthaḥ devadattasya vyādhiḥ iti . saḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2730_0: sthitaḥ iti . sthitaḥ iti ukte vardhateḥ ca apakṣīyateḥ ca nivṛttiḥ bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2730_1: vā na antareṇa kriyām bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante . astyādibhiḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:2730_2: bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante . atha vā na anyat prṣṭena anyat ākhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2730_3: . tena na bhaviṣyati kim karoti asti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2732_0: 196-198 atha yadi eva kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ atha api bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2732_1: kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2732_2: gatam iti āha . katham . ayam ādiśabdaḥ asti eva vyavasthāyām vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2734: devadattādayaḥ ānīyantām iti . te utthāpya ānīyante . asti prakāre vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_0: devadattādayaḥ āḍhyāḥ abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ pakṣavantaḥ . devadattaprakārāḥ iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_1: . pratyekam ca ādiśabdaḥ parisamāpyate . bhvādayaḥ iti ca vādayaḥ iti ca . tat yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_2: tāvat kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ vyavasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_3: vartate vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre . bhū iti evamādayaḥ vā iti evamprakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_4: iti . yadā tu bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_5: saḥ vyavasthāyām bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre . vā iti evamādayaḥ bhū iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_6: evamprakārāḥ iti . yadi tarhi lakṣaṇam kriyate na idānīm pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_7: ca . kim prayojanam . bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ . bhūvādipāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_9: āṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ ca . ke punaḥ āṇapayatyādayaḥ . āṇapayati vaṭṭati vaḍḍhati
GS24pmbhasuu:2735_10: iti . svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca . svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2736_0: svarān anubandhān ca jñāsyāmi iti . na hi antareṇa pātham svarāḥ anubandhāḥ vā śakyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2736_1: vijñātum . ye tu ete nyāyyavikaraṇāḥ udāttāḥ ananubandhakāḥ paṭhyante eteṣām pāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2736_2: śakyaḥ akartum . eteṣām api avaśyam āṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2736_3: na kartavyaḥ . śiṣṭaprayogāt āṇapayatyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . saḥ ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2736_4: śiṣṭaprayogaḥ upāsyaḥ ye api paṭhyante teṣām api viparyāsanivṛttyarthaḥ . loke hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2736_5: kṛṣyarthe kasim prayuñjate dṛśyarthe ca diśim .
GS24pmbhasuu:2738: 198-199 upadeśe iti kimartham . abhre āṃ apaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2739: uddeśe yaḥ anunāsikaḥ tasya mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ uddeśopadeśayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . pratyakṣam ākhyānam upadeśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2740: guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam upadeśaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2741: agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakhthani karṇe vā gṛhītvā upadiśati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2742: ayam gauḥ iti . saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2743: upadiṣṭaḥ me gauḥ iti . guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2745: devadattam me bhavān uddiśatu iti . saḥ ihasthaḥ pāṭaliputrastham devadattam uddiśati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2746: aṅgadī kuṇḍalī kirīṭī vyūḍhoraskaḥ vṛttabāhuḥ lohitākṣaḥ tuṅganāsaḥ citrābharaṇaḥ īdṛśaḥ devadattaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2749: 199-202 itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2750: abhre āṃ apaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2751_0: upādīyate evañjātīyakasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:2751_1: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . kim ucyate anupādīyamāne viśeṣe iti . katham na nāma upādīyate yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2751_2: upadeśe iti ucyate . lakṣaṇena hi upadeśaḥ . saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . pratyakṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:2751_3: ākhyānam uddeśaḥ guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam uddeśaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2753: anuvākam me bhavān uddiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2754: iṣetvakam adhīṣva . śannodevīyam adhīṣva iti . saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2755: uddiṣṭaḥ me anuvākaḥ . tam adhyeṣye iti . guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2757: grāmantaram gamiṣyāmi . panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2759: amuṣmin hastavāmaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2760_0: upadiṣṭaḥ me panthāḥ iti . evam etau saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . evam tarhi itkāryābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2760_1: itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam syāt . akāryam lopaḥ . iha hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2760_2: śabdasya dvyarthaḥ upadeśaḥ . kāryārthaḥ vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā . kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:2760_3: ca iha na asti . kārye ca asati yadi śravaṇam api na syāt upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_0: anantaralakṣaṇāyām itsañjñāyām satyām āditaḥ ca iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_1: tu upadeśane anunāsikavacanāt . siddham etat katham . upadeśane yaḥ anunāsikaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_2: itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ upadeśanam . śāstram . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_3: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_4: aviśeṣāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśaḥ iti ghañ ayam karaṇasādhanaḥ . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_5: . paratvāt lyuṭ prāpnoti . na brūmaḥ akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_6: . halaḥ ca iti . tatra api sañjñāyām iti vartate . na ca eṣā sañjñā . prāyavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_7: asañjñāyām api bhaviṣyati . prāyavacanāt sañjñāyām eva syāt vā na vā . na hi upādheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_8: upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam . yadi na upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_9: vā viśeṣaṇam kalyāṇyādīnām inaṅ kulaṭāyāḥ vā inaṅ vibhāṣā na prāpnoti . inaṅ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2762_10: atra pradhānam . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:2763_0: vākinādīnām kuk ca putrāt anyatarasyām iti kuk vibhāṣā na prāpnoti . atra api kuk
GS24pmbhasuu:2763_1: eva pradhānam . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . evam na ca idam akṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2763_2: bhavati na upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2763_3: bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā ghañ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi kṛtyalyuṭaḥ bahulam iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_0: 202-203 halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ sarvāntyatvāt . halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_1: halaḥ itsañjñā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sarvāntyatvāt . sarvaḥ hi hal tam tam avadhim
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_2: prati antyaḥ bhavati . siddham tu vyavasitāntyatvāt . siddham etat . katham . vyavasitāntyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_3: . vyavasitāntyaḥ hal itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ vyavasitāḥ . dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātāgamādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_4: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam halantye
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_5: sarvprasaṅgaḥ sarvāntyatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āha ayam hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_6: iti . sarvaḥ ca hal tam tam avadhim prati antyaḥ bhavati . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2766: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ antyaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ vyavasitāntyaḥ . atha vā sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate . na ca anyat kim cit apekṣyam asti . te vyavasitam eva apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_1: ajñāpitatvāt halgrahaṇāprasiddhiḥ . hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati iti ucyate . lakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_2: eva tāvat itsañjñā na prāpnoti . siddham tu lakāranirdeśāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_3: . lakāranirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati lakāraḥ ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_4: . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt vā . atha vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . hal ca hal ca hal . hal antyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_5: itsañjñam bhavati iti . atha vā ḷkārasya eva idam guṇabhūtasya grahaṇam . tatra upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_6: ac anunāsika it iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_7: lakārasya itsañjñā iti yat ayam ṇalam litam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2770_1: vaktavyaḥ . udaśvit śakrṭ iti . akṛttaddhitāntasya iti kimartham . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2770_2: aupagavaḥ kāpaṭavaḥ . idarthābhāvāt siddham . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjña na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2770_3: . idam asti itkāryam titsvaritam iti svaritatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti . pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2771_0: rājā takṣā . ñniti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . ñniti iti ucyate . tatra vyapavargābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2771_1: na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi svaḥ . upottamam riti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . svaritakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2771_2: na bhaviṣyati . nyaṅsvarau svritau iti . iha tarhi antaḥ . uttamaśabdaḥ triprabhṛtiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2771_3: vartate . na ca atra triprabhṛtayaḥ santi . iha tarhi sanutaḥ . upottamam riti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2771_4: eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . antodāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ ca nipātasvaraḥ ritsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2771_5: bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . etat ca atra yuktam yat itkāryābhāvāt itsañjñā na syāt . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2771_6: itkāryam bhavati bhavati tatra itsañjñā . tat yathā āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ agastikuṇḍinac .
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_0: 207-209 vibhaktau tavargapratiṣedhaḥ ataddhite . vibhaktau tavargapratiṣedhaḥ ataddhite
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_1: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kimaḥ at kve prepsan dīpyase kva ardhamāsāḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_2: tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpāyati na vibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_3: taddhite pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam idamaḥ thamuḥ iti makārasye itsañjñāparitrāṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_4: ukāram anubandham karoti . yadi etat jñāpyate idānīm iti atra api prāpnoti . itkāryābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_5: atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti acām antyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_6: paraḥ yathā syāt . iśbhāve kṛte na asti viśeṣaḥ mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti vā paratve
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_7: pratyayaḥ paraḥ iti vā . saḥ eva tāvat iśbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_8: diśaḥ pratyayeṣu iti ucyate . kaḥ punaḥ arhati iśbhāvam prāg diśaḥ pratyayeṣu vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_9: . kim tarhi . prāk diśaḥ artheṣu iśbhāvaḥ kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ advyādibhyaḥ pratyayotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_10: . evam tarhi tadaḥ api ayam vaktavyaḥ . tadaḥ ca mit acaḥ antyāt paratvena na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_11: . nanu ca atra api atve kṛte na asti viśeṣaḥ mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti vā paratve
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_12: pratyayaḥ paraḥ iti vā . tat hi attvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . vibhaktau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2773_13: ucyate . evam tarhi yakārāntaḥ dānīm kariṣyate . kim yakāraḥ na śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2775_0: 209 cuñcupcaṇapoḥ cakārapratiṣedhaḥ . cuñcupcaṇapoḥ cakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2775_1: . keśacuñcuḥ keśacaṇaḥ . itkāryābhāvāt siddham . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2775_2: . idam asti itkāryam citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . pitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2775_3: idānīm kimartham syāt . pitkaraṇam kimartham iti cet paryāyārtham . pitkaraṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2775_4: iti cet paryāyārtham etat syāt . evam tarhi yakārādī cuñcupcaṇapau . kim yakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_0: arautsīt . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham . rephasya atra halantyam iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_1: ikārasya upadeśe ac anunāsikaḥ iti . avayavagrahaṇāt iti cet ididvidhiprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_2: avayavagrahaṇāt iti cet ididvidhiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti . bhettā chettā . iditaḥ num
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_3: dhātoḥ iti num prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ ayam ididvidhiḥ kumbhīdhānyanyāyena vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_4: . tat yathā . kumbhīdhānyaḥ śrotriyaḥ iti ucyate . yasya kumbhyām eva dhānyam saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_5: kumbhīdhānyaḥ . yasya punaḥ kumbhyām ca anyatra ca na asau kumbhīdhānyaḥ . na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_6: ididvidhiḥ kumbhīdhānyanyāyena śakyaḥ vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . ṭunadi nandathuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_7: iti . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate ikāraḥ it yasya saḥ ayam idit tasya iditaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_8: . katham tarhi . ikāraḥ eva it idit ididantasya iti . atha vā ṝkārasya eva idam irtvabhūtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_9: grahaṇam . tatra upadeśe ac anunāsikaḥ it iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_10: jñāpayati na evañjātīyakānām ididvidhiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam iritaḥ kān cit numanuṣaktān
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_11: paṭhati . ubundir niśāmane . skandir gatiśoṣaṇayoḥ . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2779_12: irśabdasya itsañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam iritaḥ vā iti āha . atha vā ante iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2781_0: 211-212 tasyagrahaṇam kimartham . itsañjñakaḥ pratinirdiśyate . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2781_1: . prakṛtam it iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . upadeśe ac anunāsikaḥ it iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:2781_2: prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2781_3: . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2781_4: . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2781_5: . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2781_6: . evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat arthāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2781_7: idam tarhi prayojanam . ye anekālaḥ itsañjñāḥ teṣām lopaḥ sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2781_8: atha kriyamāṇe api ca tasyagrahaṇe katham iva lopaḥ sarvādeśaḥ labhyaḥ . labhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_0: 212-214 itaḥ lope ṇalktvāniṣṭhāsu upasaṅkhyānam itpratiṣedhāt . itaḥ lope ṇalktvāniṣṭhāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṇal . aham papaca . ktvā . devitvā sevitvā . niṣṭhā . śayitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_2: śayitavān . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . itpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra itsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_3: . ṇal uttamaḥ ṇit vā bhavati . ktvā seṭ na kit bhavati . niṣṭhā seṭ na kit bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_4: iti . siddham tu ṇalādīnām grahaṇapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . ṇalādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_5: grahaṇāni pratiṣidhante . ṇal uttamaḥ vā ṇidgrahaṇena gṛhyate . ktvā seṭ na kidgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_6: gṛhyate . niṣṭhā seṭ na kidgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti . nirdiṣṭalopāt vā . nirdiṣṭalopāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_7: vā siddham eva . atha vā nirdiṣṭasya ayam lopaḥ kriyate . tasmāt siddham etat . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_8: tusmānām pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra tusmānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt tasmin yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_9: yasmin vṛkṣāḥ plakṣāḥ acinavam asunavam akaravam . na vā uccāraṇasāmarthyāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_10: vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . uccāraṇasāmarthyāt atra lopaḥ na bhaviṣyati . anubandhalope
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_11: bhāvābhāvayoḥ vipratiṣedhāt aprasiddhiḥ . anubandhalope bhāvābhāvayoḥ virodhāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_12: . na jñāyate kena abhiprāyeṇa prasajati kena nivṛttim karoti iti . siddham tu apavādanyāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_13: . siddham etat . katham . apavādanyāyena . kim punaḥ iha tathā yathā utsargāpavādau
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_14: . bhāvaḥ hi kāryāṛthaḥ nanyārthaḥ lopaḥ . kāryam kariṣyāmi iti anubandhaḥ āsajyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2783_15: kāryād anyan mā bhūt iti lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_0: 214-217 atha yasya anubandhaḥ āsajyate kim saḥ tasya ekāntaḥ bhavati āhosvit anekāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_1: . ekāntaḥ tatra upalabdheḥ . ekāntaḥ iti āha . kutaḥ . tatra upalabdheḥ . tatrasthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_2: hi asau upalabhyate . tat yathā vṛkṣasthā śākhā vṛkṣaikāntā upalabhyate . tatra asarūpasarvādeśadāppratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_3: pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ anākārāntatvāt . tatra asarūpavidhau doṣaḥ bhavati . karmaṇi aṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_4: ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti . kaṇviṣaye aṇ api prāpnoti . sarvādeśe ca doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_5: . divaḥ aut sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti . dāppratiṣedhe pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . adābdaipau
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_6: iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . anākārāntatvāt . nanu ca āttve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_7: bhaviṣyati . tat hi āttvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anejantatvāt . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_8: anekāntaḥ . anekānte vṛttiviśeṣaḥ . yadi anekāntaḥ vṛttiviśeṣaḥ na sidhyati . kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_9: ṇiti iti kāryāṇi na sidhyanti . kim hi saḥ tasya it bhavati yena itkṛtam syāt . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_10: tarhi anantaraḥ . anantaraḥ iti cet pūrvaparayoḥ itkṛtaprasaṅgaḥ . anantaraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_11: cet pūrvaparayoḥ itkṛtam prāpnoti . vuñchaṇ . siddham tu vyavasitapāṭhāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_12: etat . katham . vyavasitapāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . vuñ chaṇ . saḥ ca avaśyam vyavasitapāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_13: kartavyaḥ . itarathā hi ekānte api sandehaḥ . akriyamāṇe vyavasitapāṭhe ekānte api
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_14: sandehaḥ syāt . tatra na jñāyate kim ayam pūrvasya bhavati āhosvit parasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_15: sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_16: na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . pūrvasya iti vyākhyāsyamaḥ . vṛttāt vā . vṛttāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_17: punaḥ siddham etat . vṛddhimantam ādyudāttam dṛṣṭvā ñit iti vyavaseyam . antodāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_18: dṛṣṭvā kit iti . yuktam punaḥ yat vṛttinimittakaḥ anubandhaḥ syāt na anubandhanimittakena
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_19: nāma vṛttena bhavitavyam . vṛttinimittakaḥ eva anubandhaḥ . vṛttijñaḥ hi ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_20: anubandhān āsajati . ubhayam idam anubandheṣu uktam ekāntāḥ anekāntāḥ iti . kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_21: nyāyyam . ekāntāḥ iti nyāyyam . kutaḥ etat . atra hi hetuḥ vyapadiṣṭaḥ . yat ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_22: sahetukam tat nyāyyam . nanu ca uktam tatra asarūpasarvādeśadāppratiṣedhe pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_23: anākārāntatvāt iti . asarūpavidhau tāvat na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_24: anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam bhavati iti yat ayam dadātidadhātyoḥ vibhāṣā iti vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_25: śam śāsti . yat api uktam sarvādeśe iti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_26: anekāltvam bhavati iti yat ayam śit sarvasya iti āha . yat api uktam dāppratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_27: pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_28: anejantatvam bhavati iti yat ayam udīcām māṅaḥ vyatīhāre iti meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2787_0: 218 kim iha udāharaṇam . ikaḥ yaṇ aci . dadhi atra madhu atra . na etat asti . sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2787_1: antaratamena api etat siddham . kutaḥ āntaryam . tālusthānasya tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2787_2: oṣṭhasthānaḥ bhaviṣyati iti . idam tarhi . tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2787_3: ca etat api sthāne antaratamena eva siddham . kutaḥ āntaryam . ekārthasya ekārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2787_4: dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ bhaviṣyati iti . idam tarhi tūdīśalātruavarmatīkūcavārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2789_0: 218-220 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . sañjñāsamāsanirdeśāt sarvaprasaṅgaḥ anudeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2789_1: yathāsaṅkhyavacanam niyamārtham . sañjñayā samāsaiḥ ca nirdeśāḥ kriyante . sañjñayā
GS24pmbhasuu:2789_2: tāvat . parasmaipadānām ṇalatususthalathusaṇalvamāḥ iti . samāsaiḥ . tūdīśalāturavarmatīkūcavārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2789_3: ḍhakchaṇḍhañyakaḥ iti . sañjñāsamāsanirdeśāt sarvaprasaṅgaḥ anudeśasya yathāsaṅkhyavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2789_4: niyamārtham . sarvasya uddeśasya sarvaḥ anudeśaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca samasaṅkhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2789_5: yathā syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti tatra yathāsaṅkhyavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2789_6: niyamārtham . evamartham idam ucyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sañjñayā samāsaiḥ ca nirdeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2789_8: samāsaiḥ ca nirdeśāḥ kriyantepṛthak vibhaktīḥ sañjñinaḥ ca mā uccicīram iti . prakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2789_9: ca sarvasampratyayārthaḥ . prakaraṇe ca sarveṣām sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt . vidaḥ laṭaḥ vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_0: 220-227 kim punaḥ śabdataḥ sāmye saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ bhavati āhosvit arthataḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_1: ca atra viśeṣaḥ . saṅkhyāsāmyam śabdataḥ cet ṇalādayaḥ parasmaipadānām ḍāraurasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_2: prathamasya ayavāyāvaḥ ecaḥ iti anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . parasmaipadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_3: ṇalatususthalathusaṇalvamāḥ iti ṇalādayaḥ bahavaḥ parasmaipadānām iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_4: . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya . ḍāraurasaḥ bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_5: prathamasya iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . ecaḥ ayavāyāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_6: . ayavāyāvaḥ bahavaḥ ecaḥ iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_7: . astu tarhi arthataḥ . arthataḥ cet lṛluṭornandyarīhaṇasindhutakṣaśilādiṣu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_9: dvau lṛluṭoḥ iti asya trayaḥ arthāḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . nandigrahipacādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_10: lyuṇinyacaḥ . nandyādayaḥ bahavaḥ lyuṇinyacaḥ trayaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_11: na prāpnoti . arīhaṇādayaḥ bahavaḥ vuñādayaḥ saptadaśa . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_12: na prāpnoti . sindhutakṣaśilādibhyaḥ aṇañau . sindhutakṣaśilādayaḥ bahavaḥ aṇañau
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_15: ca na sidhyati . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam . anudāttaṅitau dvau ātmanepadam iti asya
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_16: dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . niṣṭhā . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_17: pūrvasya ca daḥ iti . rephadakārau dvau niṣṭhā iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_18: prāpnoti . sārvadhātukadvigrahaṇeṣu ca doṣaḥ bhavati . śnasoḥ allopaḥ śnamastī dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_19: sārvadhātukam iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . eṅaḥ pūrvatve
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_20: pratiṣedhaḥ . eṅaḥ pūrvatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . eṅaḥ padāntāt ati ṅasiṅasoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_21: . ṅasiṅasau dvau eṅ iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_22: tarhi śabdataḥ . nanu ca uktam saṅkhyāsāmyam śabdataḥ cet ṇalādayaḥ parasmaipadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_23: ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya ayavāyāvaḥ ecaḥ iti anirdeśaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_24: antaratamaḥ iti anena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ āntaryam . ekārthasya ekārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_25: dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ . saṃvṛtāvarṇasya saṃvṛtāvarṇaḥ vivṛtāvarṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_26: vivṛtāvarṇaḥ . atiprasaṅgaḥ guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe kṅiti . atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_27: kṅiti . guṇavṛddhī dve kṅitau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_28: . gakāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . tat gakāragrahaṇam api kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_29: kriyate nyāse eva . kakāre gakāraḥ cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . giti kiti ṅiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_30: udi kūle rujivahoḥ . udikūle dve rujivahau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_31: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na udiḥ upapadam . kim tarhi . viśeṣaṇam rujivahoḥ . utpūrvābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_32: rujivahibhyām kūle upapade iti . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_33: doṣaḥ bhavati . vidibhidicchideḥ kurac . vidibhidicchidayaḥ trayaḥ tacchīlādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_34: trayaḥ . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_35: doṣaḥ bhavati . nirabhyoḥ pūlvoḥ . nirabhī dvau pūlvau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2791_36: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iṣyate ca atra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ : niṣpāvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2792_0: abhilāvaḥ iti . evam tarhi akartari ca kārake bhāve ca iti dvau pūlvau ca dvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2792_1: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ave tṝstroḥ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ . tṝstrau dvau karaṇādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2792_2: dve . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ca bhūkṛñoḥ . kartṛkarmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:2792_3: dve bhūkṛñau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . anavakḷptyamarṣayoḥ akiṃvṛtte
GS24pmbhasuu:2792_4: api . anavakḷptyamarṣau dvau kiṃvṛttākiṃvṛtte dve . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2792_5: . kṛbhvoḥ ktvāṇamulau . kṛbhvau dvau ktvāṇamulau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2792_6: . adhīyānaviduṣoḥ chandobrāhmaṇāni . chandobrāhmaṇāni iti dve adhīte veda iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_0: ca dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ropadhetoḥ pathidūtayoḥ . ropadhetoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_1: prācām tat gacchati pathidūtayoḥ . ropadhetau dvau pathidūtau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_2: prāpnoti . tatra bhavataḥ tasya vyākhyānaḥ kratuyajñebhyaḥ . tatra bhavatastasyavyākhyānau
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_3: dvau kratuyajñau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . saṅghādiṣu añprabhṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_4: ṣaṅghādiṣu añprabhṛtayaḥ saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ghoṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_5: atra kartavyam . veśoyaśāadeḥ bhagāt yalkhau . veśoyaśāadī dvau yalkhau dvau . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_6: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ṅasiṅasoḥ khyatyāt parasya . ṅasiṅasau dvau khyatyau
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_7: dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na vā samānayogavacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_8: . kim kāraṇam . samānayogavacanāt . samānayoge saṅkhyātānudeśam vakṣyāmi . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_9: doṣaḥ vidaḥ laṭaḥ vā . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ vidaḥ laṭaḥ vā iti saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_10: na prāpnoti . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_11: na prāpnoti . khalagorathāt initrakaṭyacaḥ ca . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . sindhvapakarābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_12: kan aṇañau ca . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca ādeśāḥ . yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_13: ca ādeśāḥ saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . tasmāt yasmin pakṣe alpīyāṃsaḥ doṣāḥ tām
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_14: āsthāya pratividheyam doṣeṣu . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . yathāsaṅkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_15: svaritena . tataḥ adhikāraḥ . adhikāraḥ ca bhavati svaritena iti . evam api svaritam
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_16: dṛṣṭvā sandehaḥ syāt . na jñāyate kim ayam samasaṅkhyārthaḥ āhosvit adhikārārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_17: iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2793_18: viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti samasaṅkhyārthaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_0: 228-229 kimartham idam ucyate . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ . adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_1: kriyate pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti . kim idam pratiyogam iti . yogam yogam
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_2: prati pratiyogam . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam mā kārṣam iti . kim gatam etat iyatā
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_3: sūtreṇa . gatam iti āha . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke adhikṛtaḥ asau grāme adhikṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_4: asau nagare iti ucyate yaḥ yatra vyāpāram gacchati . śabdena ca api adhikṛtena kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_5: anyaḥ vyāpāraḥ śakyaḥ avagantum anyat ataḥ yoge yoge upasthānāt . na vā nirdiśyamānādhikṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_6: yathā loke . na vā etat prayojanam . kim kāraṇam . nirdiśyamānādhikṛtatvāt yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_7: loke . nirdiśyamānam adhikṛtam gamyate . tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām yajñadattāya
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_8: viṣṇumitrāya iti . gauḥ iti gamyate . evam iha api padarujaviśaspṛśaḥ ghañ sṛ sthire
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_9: bhāve . ghañ iti gamyate . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā . anyanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_10: tu loke nivartakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām yajñadattāya kambalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_11: viṣṇumitrāya ca iti . kambalaḥ gonivartakaḥ bhavati . evam iha api abhividhau bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_12: inuṇ ghañaḥ nivartakaḥ syāt . tasmāt paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_0: 229-230 adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu . adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu bhavati . na jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_1: kiyantam avadhim adhikāraḥ anuvartate iti . adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham tu . adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_2: eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . adhikāraparimāṇam jñāsyāmi iti . katham punaḥ svaritena
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_3: adhikāraḥ iti anena adhikāraparimāṇam śakyam vijñātum . evam vakṣyāmi svarite na
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_4: adhikāraḥ iti . svaritam dṛṣṭvā adhikāraḥ na bhavati iti . kena idānīm adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_5: bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ . na adhikāraḥ iti cet uktam . kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_6: tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā iti . adhikārārtham eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_7: . nanu ca uktam adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu iti . yāvatithaḥ al anubandhaḥ tāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_8: yogān iti vacanāt siddham . yāvatithaḥ al anubadhyate tāvataḥ yogān adhikāraḥ anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_9: iti vaktavyam . atha idānīm yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ alaḥ bhūyasaḥ ca yogān adhikāraḥ anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_10: katham tatra kartavyam . bhūyasi prāgvacanam . bhūyasi prāgvacanam kartavyam . prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_11: amutaḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sandehamātram etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_12: . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_13: alakṣaṇam iti . prāk amutaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_14: idānīm adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ . nanu ca uktam na adhikāraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_15: cet uktam . kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā . sandehamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_16: etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_17: na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . inuṇ ghañ iti sandehe ghañ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2799: 230-232 na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ yathā vijñāyeta ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2802_0: gostriyoḥ upasarjanam iti atra goṭāṅgrahaṇam coditam . tat na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2802_1: strīgrahaṇam svarayiṣyate . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti striyām iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2802_2: prakṛtya ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām grahaṇam vijñāsyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2802_3: bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . adhikam kāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2803: apādānam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra prāpya nivṛttiḥ . tena iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2804_0: grāmāt āgacchati . nagarāt āgacchati . sāṅkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2804_1: iti atra na syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2804_2: . tathā adhikaraṇam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra kṛtsnaḥ ādhārātmā vyāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2805_0: tileṣu tailam . dadhni sarpiḥ iti . gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ . kūpe gargakulam iti atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:2805_1: syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati . adhikam kāryam . adhikaḥ kāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2806_0: pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ na paṭhitavyāḥ bhavanti . guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num
GS24pmbhasuu:2806_1: pūrvavipratiṣiddham numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ nuṭ iti . numnuṭau svarayiṣyete . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2806_2: svaritena adhikaḥ kāraḥ bhavati iti numnuṭau bhaviṣyataḥ . katham punaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2806_3: iti anena pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ śakya na paṭhitum . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke adhikam
GS24pmbhasuu:2806_4: ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam durbalaḥ san balavadbhiḥ saha bhāram vahati
GS24pmbhasuu:2806_5: . evam iha api adhikam ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam pūrvaḥ san param bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:2806_6: . adhikāragatiḥ stryarthā viśeṣāya adhikam kāryam . atha yaḥ anyaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_0: 233 vikaraṇebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinutaḥ sunutaḥ lunītaḥ punītaḥ . ṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_1: iti ātmanepadam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate ṅakāraḥ it asya saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_2: ayam ṅit ṅitaḥ iti . katham tarhi . ṅakāraḥ eva it ṅit ṅitaḥ . atha vā upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_3: vartate . atha vā uktam etat siddham tu pūrvasya kāryātideśāt iti . sarvathā caṅaṅbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_4: prāpnoti . evam tarhi dhātoḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_5: . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam pañcamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_6: bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_7: iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_8: iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_9: ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat arthāt pañcamīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_0: 233-237 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . ātmanepadavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate niyamārthaḥ ayam iti na punaḥ vidhyarthaḥ api syāt . lavidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_2: vihitam . lavidhānāt hi ātmanepadam parasmaipadam ca vihitam . asti prayojanam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_3: . kim tarhi iti . vikaraṇaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_4: . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām niyamaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt vikaraṇāḥ . nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_5: khalu api vikaraṇāḥ . kṛte api niyame prāpnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti . nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_6: paratvāt ca vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_7: doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ niyamaḥ . sāvakāśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_8: liṅliṭau ca . yadi punaḥ iyam paribhāṣā vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kāryakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_9: sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . lasya tibādayaḥ bhavanti iti upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_10: idam bhavati anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_11: itaretarāśrayam bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . abhinirvṛttānām lasya sthāne tibādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_12: ātmanepadaparasmaipadasañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca tibādayaḥ bhāvyante . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_13: itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi kāryāṇi ca na prakalpante . parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_14: tāvat na itaretarāśrayam bhavati . parasmaipadānukramaṇam na kariṣyate . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_15: kartavyam anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ iti evamartham . nanu ca etat api ātmanepadānukramaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_16: eva kariṣye . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhipraye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_17: . anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ na iti . ātmanepadeṣu ca api na itaretarāśrayam bhavati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2810_18: . bhāvinī sañjñā vijñāsyate sūtraśāṭakavat . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2811: kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2812_0: asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2812_1: na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham. bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā
GS24pmbhasuu:2812_2: . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api saḥ lasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2812_3: sthāne kartavyaḥ lyasya abhinirvṛttasya ātmanepadam iti eṣā sañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2812_4: vā punaḥ astu niyamaḥ . nanu ca utkam vikaraṇaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2812_5: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vikaraṇebhyaḥ niyamaḥ balīyān iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:2812_6: ayam vikaraṇavidhau ātmanepadaparasmaipadāni āśrayati . puṣādidyutādḷrditaḥ parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2812_7: ātmanepadeṣu anyatarasyām iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . abhinirvṛttāni hi lasya sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2812_8: ātmanepadāni parasmaipadāni ca . yat tarhi anupasargāt vā iti vibhāṣām śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2816: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ eva ātmanepadam bhavati iti . āhosvit prakṛtyarthaniyamaḥ :
