GS24pmbhasuu:2818_0: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam eva . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame śeṣavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_1: parasmaipadasya anivṛttatvāt . tatra pratyayaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam parasmaipadaniyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_2: . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . kim kāraṇam . parasmaipadasya anivṛttatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_3: pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ prakṛtyarthau aniyatau . tatra parasmaipadam prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_4: kartavyam parasmaipadaniyamārtham . śeṣāt eva parasmaipadam bhavati na anyataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_5: . kyaṣaḥ ātmanepadavacanam tasya anyatra niyamāt . kyaṣaḥ ātmanepadam vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_6: lohitāyati lohitāyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tasya anyatra niyamāt . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_7: hi anyatra niyamyate . ucyate ca na ca prāpnoti . tat vacanāt bhaviṣyati . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_9: pratyayānām abhāvaḥ . anudāttaṅitaḥ tṛjādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_10: tṛjādayaḥ ucyante ca . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . sāvakāśāḥ tṛjādayaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_11: . parasmaipadinaḥ avakāśaḥ . tatra api niyamāt na prāpnuvanti . tavyādayaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_12: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ niyamāt na prāpnuvanti . tavyādayaḥ api anavakāśāḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_13: . ciṇ tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ niyamāt na prāpnoti . ciṇ api vacanāt bhaviṣyati . ghañ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_14: tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ niyamāt na prāpnoti . tatra api prakṛtam karmagrahaṇam . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_15: prakṛtam . aṇ karmaṇi ca iti . tat vai tatra upapadaviśeṣaṇam abhidheyaviśeṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_16: ca iha arthaḥ . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_17: anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati . yat tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_18: ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_19: bhavati ṭat yathā . śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_20: ca śālayaḥ ca bhāvyante . yad api ucyate na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_21: anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_22: etat evam syāt . śabdaḥ tu khalu yena yena viśeṣeṇa abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_23: bhavati . śeṣavacanam ca . śeṣagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_24: iti . kim prayojanam . śeṣaniyamārtham . prakṛtarthau niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_25: . te śeṣe api prāpnuvanti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_26: eva na anyat iti . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣaye parasmaipadapratiṣedhārtham . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_27: ca ātmanepadaviṣaye parasmaipadapratiṣedhārtham dvitīyam śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_28: śeṣāt śeṣe iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayam eva iti . katarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_29: pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthaniyame . prakṛtyarthaniyame tāvat na doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthau
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_30: niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tatra na arthaḥ kartṛgrahaṇena kartṛgrahaṇāt ca doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_31: . pratyayaniyame tarhi ayam doṣaḥ . pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ . prakṛtyarthau aniyatau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_32: tatra kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam bhāvakarmaṇoḥ nivṛttyartham . kartṛgrahaṇāt ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_33: doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . prakṛtayarthau
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_34: niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi parasmaipadam bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_35: bhaviṣyati . yatra parasmaipadam ca anyat ca prāpnoti tatra parasmaipadam eva bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_36: iti . tat tarhi pratyayaniyame dvitīyam śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_37: kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam . tataḥ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ kartari . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_38: ca ātmanepadam bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ karkmavyatihāre . kartari iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_39: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti nivṛttam . yathā eva tarhi karmaṇi kartari bhavati evam bhāve api
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_40: kartari prāpnoti . eti jīvantam ānandaḥ . na asya kim cit rujati iti . dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_41: kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam . tataḥ bhāve . tataḥ karmaṇi . karmaṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_42: ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca ātmanepadam bhavati . karmaṇi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2818_43: anuvartate . bhāve iti nivṛttam . tataḥ karmavyatihāre . kartari iti eva . karmaṇi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2819_0: nivṛttam . evam api śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ iti evamartham . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2819_1: mā bhūt anukriyate svayam eva . parākriyate svayam eva . nanu ca etat api yogavibhāgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2819_2: eva siddham . na sidhyati . anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā yogavibhāgena śakyā bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2819_3: kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . parā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:2819_4: . tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:2819_5: satī bādhitum . evam tarhi kartari karmavyatihāre iti atra kartṛgrahaṇam pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2819_6: . tat prakṛtam uttaratra anuvartiṣyate . śeṣāt kartari kartari iti . kimartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2819_7: kartari kartari iti . kartā eva yaḥ kartā tatra yathā syāt . kartā ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2819_8: kartā tatra mā bhūt iti . tataḥ anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ . kartari kartari iti eva .

GS24pmbhasuu:2821_1: devadattasya dhānyam vyatilunanti iti iha ca na syāt vyatilunate vyatipunate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_2: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kriyām hi loke karma iti upacaranti . kām
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_3: kriyām kariṣyasi . kim karma kariṣyasi iti . evam api kartavyam . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_4: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_5: karma iti ucyate . katham ca kriyā nāma kriyepsitatamā syāt . kriyā api kriyepsitatamā
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_6: bhavati . kayā kriyayā . sampaśyatikriyayā prārthayatikriyayā adhyavasyatikriyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_7: vā . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati salḥ buddhyā tāvat kam cit artham
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_8: sampaśyati . sandṛṣṭe prārthanā prārthite adhyavasāyaḥ adhyavasāye ārambhaḥ ārambhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_9: nirvṛttiḥ nirvṛttau phalāvaptiḥ . evam kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . evam api ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_10: kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ ubhayagatiḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt kriyāvyatihāre iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_11: na vaktavyam . iha kartari vyatihāre iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:2821_12: yat karmagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam kriyāvyatihāre yathā syāt karmavyatihāre mā bhūt iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:2823_5: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . vyatigamyante grāmāḥ vyatihanyante dasyavaḥ iti . na vā

GS24pmbhasuu:2823_7: . anantaram yat ātmanepadavidhānam tasya pratiṣedhāt . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_8: vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_9: ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_10: uttarārtham tarhi kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate tatra eva śeṣāt

GS24pmbhasuu:2850_0: 257-258 vyaktavācām iti kimartham . varatanu sampravadanti kukkuṭāḥ . vyaktavācām
GS24pmbhasuu:2850_1: iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . ete api hi vyaktavācaḥ . ātaḥ ca vyaktavācaḥ kukkuṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:2850_2: udite ucyate kukkuṭaḥ vadati iti . evam tarhi vyaktavācām iti ucyate . sarve eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2850_3: hi vyaktavācaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate . sādhīyaḥ ye vyaktavācaḥ iti . ke
GS24pmbhasuu:2850_4: ca sādhīyaḥ . yeṣām vāci akārādayaḥ varṇāḥ vyajyante . na ca eteṣām vāci akārādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2850_5: varṇāḥ vyajyante . eteṣām api vāci akārādayaḥ varṇāḥ vyajyante . ātaḥ ca vyajyante
GS24pmbhasuu:2850_6: evam hi āhuḥ kukkuṭāḥ kukkuṭ iti . na evam te āhuḥ . anukaraṇam etat teṣām . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2850_7: vā na evam vijñāyate vyaktā vāk yeṣām te ime vyaktavācaḥ iti . katham tarhi . vyaktā
GS24pmbhasuu:2850_8: vāci varṇāḥ yeṣām te ime vyaktavācaḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:2854_1: . tṛtīyāyuktāt iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . atra api hi tṛtīyayā yogaḥ . evam

GS24pmbhasuu:2857_4: bhaviṣyati ātmanepadam ca . sahayukte tṛtīyā syāt vyatihāre taṅaḥ vidhiḥ . sahayukte

GS24pmbhasuu:2859_1: tadā bhavitavyam . yadi evam svīkaraṇe iti prāpnoti . vicitrāḥ taddhitavṛttayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_0: 260-261 anoḥ jñaḥ pratiṣedhe sakarmakavacanam . anoḥ jñaḥ pratiṣedhe sakarmakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_1: kartavyam . iha ma bhūt . auṣadhasya anujijñāsate iti . na vā akarmakasya uttareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_2: vidhānāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . akarmakasya uttareṇa vidhānāt . akarmakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_3: janāteḥ uttareṇa yogena ātmanepadam vidhīyate pūrvavat sanaḥ iti . pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_4: ca . pūrvasya ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ ca sakarmakārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_5: jñāyate pūrvaysa ayam pratiṣedhaḥ iti . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_6: vā iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate sakarmakārthaḥ ārambhaḥ iti . akarmakāt jānāteḥ sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_7: ātmanepadavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā sakarmakārthaḥ vijñāyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:2863_5: vijñāyate . kaḥ punaḥ arhati etau dvau yogau uktvā śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_6: . kim tarhi . aviśeṣeṇa sarvam ātmanepadaprakaraṇam anukramya śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_7: iti ucyate . evam api parasmaipadāśrayaḥ bhavati . katham . idam tāvad ayam praṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_8: . yadi idam na ucyeta kim iha syāt iti . parasmaipadam iti āha . parasmaipadam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_9: cet parasmaipadāśrayaḥ bhavati . siddham tu laḍādīnām ātmanepadavacanam . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_10: etat . katham . śadeḥ laḍādīnām ātmanepadam bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_11: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_12: ātmanepadābhāvaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śitaḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_13: . śitaḥ yaḥ śadiḥ . kaḥ ca śitaḥ śadiḥ . prakṛtiḥ . śadeḥ śitprakṛteḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_14: vā āha ayam śadeḥ śitaḥ iti na ca śadiḥ śit asti . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ śadeḥ śidviṣayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_15: iti . atha vā yadi api tāvat etat anyatra bhavati vikaraṇebhyaḥ niyamaḥ balīyān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2863_16: iha etat na asti . vikaraṇaḥ hi iha āśrīyate śitaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2865_0: 263-268 upasargapūrvaniyame aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam . upasargapūrvasya niyame aḍvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:2865_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nyaviśata vyakrīṇīta . kim punaḥ kāraṇāt na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2865_2: aṭā vyavahitatvāt . nanu ca ayam aṭ dhātubhaktaḥ dhātugrahaṇena grahīṣyate . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2865_3: . aṅgasya hi aṭ ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca aṅgam . saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ na śakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2865_4: dhātugrahaṇena grahītum . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_0: aṭ kriyatām vikaraṇaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṭ āgamaḥ . nityāḥ vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_1: . kṛte api aṭi prāpnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti . aṭ api nityaḥ . kṛteṣu api vikaraṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_2: prāpnoti akṛteṣu api prāpnoti . anityaḥ aṭ . anyasya kṛteṣu vikaraṇeṣu prāpnoti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_3: akṛteṣu . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi idam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_4: sampradhāryam . aṭ kriyatām lādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṭ āgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_5: . nityaḥ lādeśaḥ . kṛte api aṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt lādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_6: ātmanepade eva aḍāgamaḥ bhaviṣyati . nityatvāt lādeśasya ātmanepade aṭ āgamaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_7: cet aṭaḥ nityanimittatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . nityatvāt lādeśasya ātmanepade eva aḍāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_8: iti cet evam ucyate . aṭ api nityanimittaḥ . kṛte api ladeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_9: . aṭaḥ nityanimittatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_10: kartavyam . na kartavyam . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi lādeśaḥ . na etat vivadāmahe antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2866_11: na antaraṅgaḥ iti . astu ayam nityaḥ antaraṅgaḥ ca . atra khalu lādeśe kṛte trīṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_0: vikaraṇāḥ aṭ āgamaḥ niyamaḥ iti . tat yadi sarvataḥ niyamaḥ labhyeta kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_1: tat tu na labhyam . atha api vikaraṇāt aṭ iti aṭ labhyeta evam api kṛtam syāt . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_2: tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . āṅgāt pūrvam vikaraṇāḥ eṣitavyāḥ tarataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_0: taranti iti evamartham . aḍāḍbhyām api anyat āṅgam pūrvam eṣitavyam upārcchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_1: evamartham . tatra hi āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ṛcchibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca ṛcchibhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_2: kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ āṭ iti kṛtvā punaḥ āṭ bhaviṣyati . punaḥ ṛcchibhāvaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_3: āṭ iti cakrakam avyavasthā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate āṅgāt pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_4: vikaraṇāḥ eṣitavyāḥ tarataḥ taranti iti evamartham iti . bhavet siddham yatra vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_5: nityāḥ āṅgam anityam tatra āṅgāt pūrvam vikaraṇāḥ syuḥ . yatra tu khalu ubhayam nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_6: paratvāt tatra āṅgam tāvat bhavati . yat api ucyate aḍāḍbhyām api anyat āṅgam pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_7: eṣitavyam upārcchati iti evamartham iti . astu atra āṭ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ṛcchibhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_8: kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ āṭ iti kṛtvā punaḥ āṭ bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_9: ṛcchibhāvaḥ punaḥ āṭ iti cakrakam avyavasthā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . cakrakeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_10: iṣṭataḥ vyavasthā . atha vā neḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_11: neḥ yaḥ viśiḥ . kaḥ ca neḥ viśiḥ . viśeṣyaḥ . vyavahitaḥ ca api śakyate viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_12: . atha vā niḥ api padam viśiḥ api padam .padavidhiḥ ca samarthāmām . vyavahite api
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_0: 268-269 kim idam pūrvagrahaṇam sanapekṣam . prāk sanaḥ yebhyaḥ ātmanepadm uktam tebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_1: sanantebhyaḥ api bhavati iti . āhosvit yogāpekṣam . prāk etasmāt yogāt yebhyaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_2: uktam tebhyaḥ sanantebhyaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi sanapekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_3: nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati . pūrvavat sanaḥ na jñāyate kimantāt bhavitavyam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_4: yogāpekṣam uttaratra vidhiḥ na prakalpate . bubhukṣate upayuyukṣate iti . yathā icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_5: tathā astu . astu tāvat sanapekṣam . nanu ca uktam nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_6: nimittam ca viśeṣitam . katham . sanam eva atra nimittatvena apekṣiṣyāmahe . pūrvavat
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_7: sanaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati . kutaḥ sanaḥ iti . atha vā punaḥ astu yogāpekṣam . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_8: ca uktam uttaratra vidhiḥ na prakalpate . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . uttaratra
GS24pmbhasuu:2870_9: api pūrvavat sanaḥ iti eva anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2872_0: 269-271 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti śadimriyatyartham . śadimriyatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2872_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadam mā bhūt iti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2872_2: hi tābhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ . itarathā hi anucyamāne asmin tābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2872_3: sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . śiśitsati mumūrṣati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2872_4: punaḥ pūrvavat sanaḥ iti anena śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2872_5: śakyaḥ vijñātum . vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_0: uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_1: . evam iha api pūrvavat bhavati na bhavati iti . na bhavati iti vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_2: . yathā pūrvayogayoḥ sanantābhyām ātmanepadam na bhavati evam iha api śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_3: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam na bhavati iti . yadi tarhi śadimriyatyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_4: vidhiḥ na prakalpate . āsisiṣate śiśayiṣate . atha vidhyarthaḥ śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_5: ātmanepadam prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat pratiṣedhārthaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_6: ca uktam vidhiḥ na prakalpate iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . etat eva jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_7: sanantāt ātmanepadam bhavati iti yat ayam śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_8: pratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā punaḥ astu vidhyarthaḥ . nanu ca uktam śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_9: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . prakṛtam sanaḥ na iti anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_10: . kva prakṛtam . jñāśrusmṛdṛśām sanaḥ na anoḥ jñaḥ . sakarmakāt sanaḥ na . pratyāṅbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_11: śruvaḥ sanaḥ na . śadeḥ śitaḥ sanaḥ na . mriyateḥ luṅliṅoḥ ca sanaḥ na iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_12: idānīm pūrvavat sanaḥ iti sanaḥ iti vartate na iti nivṛttam . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_13: adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati iti . na eva vā punaḥ atra śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_14: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . śadeḥ śitaḥ iti ucyate na ca śadiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_15: eva ātmanepadasya nimittam . kim tarhi . śit api nimittam . atha api śadiḥ eva śitparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_16: tu nimittam . na ca ayam sanparaḥ śitparaḥ bhavati . yatra tarhi śit na āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_17: mriyateḥ luṅliṅoḥ ca iti . atra api na mriyatiḥ eva ātmanepadasya nimittam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2873_18: tarhi . luṅliṅau api nimittam . atha api mriyatiḥ eva luṅliṅparaḥ tu nimittam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_0: 271-272 kim punaḥ pūrvasya yat ātmanepadadarśanam tat sanantasya api atidiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_1: evam bhavitum arhati . pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_2: cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ . pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_3: iti cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ . gupādīnām na prāpnoti . jugupsate mīmāṃsate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_4: na hi etebhyaḥ prāk sanaḥ ātmanepadam na api parasmaipadam paśyāmaḥ . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_5: pūrvasya liṅgātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . pūrvasya yat ātmanepadaliṅgam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_6: sanantasya api atidiśyate . kṛñādiṣu tu liṅgapratiṣedhaḥ . kṛñādiṣu tu liṅgapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_7: vaktavyaḥ . anucikīrṣati parācikīrṣati iti . astu tarhi prāk sanaḥ yebhyaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_8: dṛṣṭam tebhyaḥ sanantebhyaḥ api bahvati iti . nanu ca uktam pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_9: sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ iti cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_10: bhaviṣyati . atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_11: goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_12: liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati jugupsayati mīmāṃsāyati iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_13: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avayave kṛtam liṅgam kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_14: samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na vyabhicarati . sanam ca na vyabhicarati . ṇicam punaḥ vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:2875_15: . tat yathā goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ eva viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_0: 273 pratyayagrahaṇam ṇijartham . pratyayasya grahaṇam kartavyam . pūrvavat pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_1: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ṇijartham . ṇijantāt api yathā syāt iti . ākusmayate
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_2: vikusmayate hṛṇīyate mahīyate iti. tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra hetumaṇṇicaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_3: . tatra hetumaṇṇicaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āsayati śāyayati . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_4: . yathānyāsam eva astu . katham ākusmayate vikusmayate hṛṇīyate mahīyate iti. anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_5: bhaviṣyati . atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_6: goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_7: liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati hṛṇīyayati mahīyayati atra api prāpnoti . avayave
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_8: kṛtam liṅgam kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_9: vyabhicarati . yakam ca na vyabhicarati . ṇicam tu vyabhicarati . tat yathā goḥ sakthani
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_10: karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ eva viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_0: 274 kṛñgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . īhāmāsa īhāmāsatuḥ īhāmāsuḥ . katham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_1: atra asteḥ anuprayogaḥ bhavati . pratyāhāragrahaṇam tatra vijñāyate . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_2: jñāyate tatra pratyāhāragrahaṇam iti . iha kṛñgrahaṇāt . iha kasmāt pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_3: na bhavati . iha eva kṛñgrahaṇāt . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . udumbhām cakāra udubjām
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_4: cakāra . nanu ca āmpratyayavat iti ucyate na ca atra āmpratyayāt ātmanepadam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_5: . na brūmaḥ anena iti . kim tarhi . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_6: bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . āmpratyayavat eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_7: . yadi niyamārtham vidhiḥ na prakalpate . īhām cakre ūhām cakre iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_8: . katham pūrvavat iti vartate . āmpratyayavat pūrvavat ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2881: 275 svarādyupasṛṣṭāt iti vaktavyam . udyuṅkte anuyuṅkte . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:2882: svarādyantopasṛṣṭāt iti vaktayam . prayuṅkte niyuṅkte niniyuṅkte .
GS24pmbhasuu:2884: 275 kimartham videśasthasya grahaṇam kriyate na samaḥ gamādiṣu eva ucyeta . samaḥ kṣṇuvaḥ sakarmakārtham . sakarmakārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . akarmakāt iti hi tatra anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2886_0: 275 anavanakauṭilyayoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . prabhujati vāsasī nibhujati
GS24pmbhasuu:2886_1: jānuśirasī iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yasya bhujeḥ avanam anavanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2886_2: ca arthaḥ tasya grahaṇam . na ca asya bhujeḥ avanam anavanam ca arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2888_0: 276-284 ṇeḥ ātmanepadavidhāne aṇyantasya karmaṇaḥ tatra upalabdhiḥ .ṇeḥ ātmanepadavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2888_1: aṇyantasya yat karma yadā ṇyante tat eva karma bhavati tadā ātmanepadam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2888_2: vaktavyam . itarathā hi sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi sarvatra prasaṅgaḥ syāt . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:2889: ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ . ārohamāṇaḥ hastīsthalam ārohayati manuṣyān . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2890_0: ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ . ārohamāṇaḥ hastīsthalam ārohayati manuṣyān iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2890_1: vakṣyāmi . ṇeḥ ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ aṇau yat karma ṇau cet . aṇyante yat karma
GS24pmbhasuu:2890_2: ṇau yadi tat eva karma bhavati . tataḥ saḥ kartā . kartā cet saḥ bhavati ṇau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2890_3: . yadi evam karmakāryam bhavati . tatra karmakartṛtvāt siddham . karmakartṛtvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2890_4: iti cet yakciṇoḥ nivṛttyartham vacanam . karmakartṛtvāt siddham iti cet yakciṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2890_5: nivṛttyartham idam vaktavyam . karmāpadiṣṭau yakciṇau mā bhūtām iti . na vā yakciṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2890_6: pratiṣedhāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyete
GS24pmbhasuu:2890_7: atra yakciṇau . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam iti . yaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2890_8: na hetumaṇṇic tadartham idam vaktavyam . tasya karmāpadiṣṭau yakciṇau mā bhūtām iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2891: utpucchayate puccham svayam eva . udapuppucchata puccham svayam eva . atra api yathā bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti tathā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena :
GS24pmbhasuu:2892_0: yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe ṇiśrigranthibrūñātmanepadākarmakāṇām upsaṅkhyānam iti . saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2892_1: avaśyam pratiṣedhaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ . itarathā hi yatra niyamaḥ tataḥ anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2892_2: . anucyamāne hi etasmin yatra niyamaḥ tataḥ anyatra tena yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2892_3: syāt . gaṇayati gaṇam gopālakaḥ . gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . ātmanepadasya ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2893_0: gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . ātmanepadapratiṣedhārtham tu . ātmanepadapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2893_1: idam vaktavyam . gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . iṣyate eva atra ātmanepadam . kim iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2893_2: eva āhosvit prāpnoti api . iṣyate ca prāpnoti ca . katham . aṇau it kasya idam ṇeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2893_3: grahaṇam . yamāt ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā vā vidyate . na ca etasmāt ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_0: anādhyāne iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . smarati vanagulmasya kokilaḥ . smarayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_1: enam vanagulmaḥ svayam eva . etat api na asti prayojanam . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_2: karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇām bhavanti kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_3: siddhe sati yat anādhyāne iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_4: ātmanepadam iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . paśyanti bhṛtyāḥ rājānam . darśayate
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_5: bhṛtyān rājā . darśayate bhṛtyaiḥ rājā . atra ātmanepadam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_0: 285 ātmanaḥ karmatve pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanaḥ karmatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_1: ātmānam . ghātayati ātmā iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vā ṇyante anyasya kartṛtvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_2: . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṇyante anyasya kartṛtvāt . anyat atra aṇyante karma
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_3: anyaḥ ṇyantasya kartā . katham . dvau ātmanau antarātmā śarīrātmā ca . antarātmā
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_4: tat karma karoti yena śarīrātmā sukhaduḥkhe anubhavati . śarīrātmā tat karma karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_0: 286-290 svaritañitaḥ iti kimartham . yāti vāti drāti psāti . svaritañitaḥ iti śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_1: akartum . kasmāt na bhavati yāti vāti drāti psāti iti . kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_2: iti ucyate sarveṣām ca kartrabhiprāyam kriyāphalam asti . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . yeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_3: kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam asti tebhyaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_4: iti . na ca eteṣām kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam asti . tathājātīyakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_5: khalu ācāryeṇa svaritañitaḥ paṭhitāḥ yeṣām kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_6: asti . atha abhiprāyagrahaṇam kimartham . svaritañitaḥ kartrāye kriyāphale iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_7: ucyamāne yam eva samprati eti kriyāphalam tatra eva syāt . lūñ lunīte pūñ punīte
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_8: . iha na syāt . yaj yajate vap vapate . abhiprayagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_9: bhavati . abhiḥ ābhimukhye vartate pra ādikarmaṇi . tena yam ca abhipraiti yam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_10: abhipraiṣyati yam ca abhiprāgāt tatra sarvatra ābhimukhyamātre siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_11: kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale iti kimartham . pacanti bhaktakārāḥ . kurvanti karmakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_12: . yajanti yājakāḥ . kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_13: api hi kriyāphalam kartāram abhipraiti . yājakāḥ yajanti gāḥ lapsyāmahe iti . karmakarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_14: kurvanti pādikam ahaḥ lapsyāmahe iti . evam tarhi kartrabhipraye kriyāphale iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_15: sarvatra ca kartāram kriyāphalam abhipraiti . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate . sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_16: yatra kartāram kriyāphalam abhipraiti iti . na ca antareṇa yajim yajiphalam vapim
GS24pmbhasuu:2898_17: va vapiphalam labhante . yājakāḥ punaḥ antareṇa api yajim gāḥ labhante bhṛtakāḥ ca pādikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_0: 291-292 śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe pratiṣedhaḥ . śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_1: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayam eva . chidyate rajjuḥ svayam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_2: . evam tarhi śeṣe iti vakṣyāmi . saptamyā cet prakṛteḥ . saptamyā cet prakṛteḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_3: vaktavyaḥ . āste śete cyavante plavante . siddham tu ubhayanirdeśāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_4: . katham . ubhayanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . śeṣāt śeṣe iti vaktavyam . kartṛgrahaṇam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_5: kimartham syāt . kartṛgrahaṇam anuparādyartham . anuparādyartham etat syāt . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_6: mā bhūt . anukriyate svayam eva . parākriyate svayam eva iti . sidhyati . sutram
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_7: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_8: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kartari karmavyatihāre iti atra kartṛgrahaṇam pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_9: . tat prakṛtam iha anuvartiṣyate . śeṣāt kartari kartari iti . kim idam kartari kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:2900_10: iti . kartā eva yaḥ kartā tatra yathā syāt . kartā ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ kartā tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_0: 292-293 kimartham idam ucyate . parasmaipadapratiṣedhāt kṛñādiṣu vidhānam . parasmaipadapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_1: kṛñādiṣu parasmaipadam vidhīyate . pratiṣidhyate tatra parasmaipadam svaritañitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_2: kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_3: iti . tatra ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣiddhatvāt . tatra ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_4: vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apratiṣiddhatvāt . na hi ātmanepadam pratiṣidhyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_5: tarhi . parasmaipadam anena vidhīyate . na vā dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_6: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . yat ayam dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_7: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na parasmaipadaviṣaye ātmanepadam bhavati iti . ātmanepadaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_8: vā pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanepadaniyame vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_9: kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati kartari . anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ na iti . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_10: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatra ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_11: apratiṣiddhatvāt iti . parihṛtam etat na vā dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . atha vā idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_12: tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_13: iti parasmaipadam kasmāt na bhavati . ātmanepadena bādhyate . yathā eva tarhi ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:2902_14: parasmaipadam bādhyate evam parasmaipadena ātmanepadam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2904: 294 budhādiṣu ye akarmakāḥ teṣām grahaṇam kimartham . sakarmakārtham acittavatkartṛkārtham vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2906: 294-295 aṇau akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadavacanam . aṇau akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadam vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2907_0: cetayamāṇam prayojayati cetayati iti . yadi tarhi atra api iṣyate aṇigrahaṇam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:2907_1: kimartham syāt . akarmakagrahaṇam aṇyantaviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . atha akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2907_2: aṇigrahaṇam kasya akarmakgrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . ṇeḥ iti vartate . ṇyantaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2907_3: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2908: cetayamānam prayojayati cetayati iti . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2909_0: āsayati śāyayati iti . siddham tu atasmin ṇau iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2909_1: . atasmin ṇau yaḥ akarmakaḥ tatra iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2909_2: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam aṇav akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2909_3: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṇau iti kasya idam ṇeḥ grahaṇam . yasmāṇ ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:2909_4: vā vidyate . na ca etasmāṇ ṇeaḥ prāk karma kartā vā vidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2911: 295-296 pādiṣu dheṭaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . pādiṣu dheṭaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dhāpayate śiśumeka samīcī .
GS24pmbhasuu:2913_0: 296. kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . syasanoḥ iti etat anukṛṣyate . yadi tarhi na antareṇa cakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:2913_1: anuṅrttiḥ bhavati dyudbhyaḥ luṅi iti atra api cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ vibhāṣā iti anukarṣaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2913_2: . atha idānīm antareṇa api cakāram anuvṛttiḥ bhavati iha api na arthaḥ cakāreṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_0: 297-298 kimartham idam ucyate . anyatra sañjñāsamāveśānniyamārtham vacanam . anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_1: sañjñāsamāveśaḥ bhavati . kvānyatra . loke vyākaraṇe ca . loke tāvat . indraḥ śakraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_2: puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ . kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekasya dravyasya bahvyaḥ sañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_3: bhavanti . vyākaraṇe api kartavyam hartavyam iti atra pratyayakṛtkṛtyasañjñānām samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_4: bhavati . pāñcālaḥ vaidehaḥ vaidarbhaḥ iti atra pratyayataddhitatadrājasañjñānāṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_5: samāveśaḥ bhavati . anyatra sañjñāsamāveśāt etasmāt kāraṇāt ā kaḍārāt api sañjñānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_6: samāveśaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekā eva sañjñā syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_7: sidhyati iti niyamārtham vacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_0: 298-308 katham tvetatsūtram paṭhitavyam . kim ā kaḍārāt ekā sañjñā iti āhosvit prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_1: kaḍārāt param kāryam iti . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam sandehaḥ . ubhayathā hi ācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2918: kecit ā kaḍārāt ekā sañjñā iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_0: kecit prāk kaḍārāt param kāryam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_1: tadvacanam . tatra ekasañjñādhikāre tat vaktavyam . kim . ekā sañjñā bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_2: . nanu ca yasya api paraṅkāryatvam tena api paragrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham mama
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_3: bhaviṣyati . vipratiṣedhe ca iti . mama api tarhi ekagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_4: . sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti . sañjñādhikāraḥ ca ayam . tatra kim anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_5: śakyam vijñātum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . tatra etāvat vācyam . ā kaḍārāt ekā . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_6: . ekā sañjñā bhavati iti . aṅgasañjñayā bhapadasañjñayoḥ asamāveśaḥ . aṇgasañjñayā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_7: bhapadasañjñayoḥ samāveśaḥ na prāpnoti . sārpiṣkaḥ bārhiṣkaḥ yājuṣkaḥ dhānuṣkaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_8: bābhravyaḥ māṇḍavya iti . anavakāśe bhapadasañjñe aṅgasañjñāṃ bādheyātām . paravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_9: hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_10: tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrve tasya bhapadasañjñe parā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_11: aṅgasañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . yasmātpratyayavidhiḥ tadādi suptiṅantaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_12: padam naḥ kye siti ca . svādiṣu asarvanāmasthāne yaci bham . tasya ante pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_13: aṅgamiti . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāc ca bhapadasañjñe paraṅkāryatvāt ca aṅgasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_14: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api aṅgasañjñāpūrvike bhapadasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_15: . katham .anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta. ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_16: yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . karmadhārayatve tatpuruṣagrahaṇam . karmadhārayatve tatpuruṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_17: kartavyam . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti . ekasañjñādhikāraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_18: coditam . akriyamāṇe hi anavakāśā karmadhārayasañjñā tatpuruṣasañjñām bādheta . paravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_19: hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_20: tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya karmadhārayasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_21: parā tatpuruṣasañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . pūrvakālaikasarvajaratpurāṇanavakevalāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_22: samānādhikaraṇena karmadhārayaḥ iti . evam sarvam karmadhārayaprakaraṇam anukramya
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_23: tasya ante śritādiḥ tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ca karmadhārayasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_24: paraṅkāryatvāt ca tatpuruṣasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_25: tasya api tatpuruṣasañjñāpūrvikā karmadhārayasañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_26: . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . tatpuruṣatve
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_27: dvigucagrahaṇam . tatpuruṣatve dvigucagrahaṇam kartavyam . tatpuruṣaḥ dviguḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_28: cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre anavakāśā dvigusañjñā tatpuruṣasañjñām bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_29: . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_30: niyamānupappateḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya dvigusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_31: parā tatpuruṣasañjñā. katham . evaṃ sa vakṣyati . taddhitārthottarapadasamāhāre ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_32: saṅkhyāpūrvaḥ dviguḥ iti . evam sarvam dviguprakaraṇam anukramya tasya ante śritādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_33: tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ca dvigusañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca tatpuruṣasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_34: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api tatpuruṣasañjñāpūrvikā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_35: dvigusañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_36: na asti yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . gatidivaḥkarmahetumatsu cagrahaṇam . gatidivaḥkarmahetumatsu
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_37: cagrahaṇam kartavyam . upasargāḥ kriyāyoge gatiśca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_38: hi cakāre anavakāśaḥ pasargasañjñā gatisañjñām bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_39: ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_40: bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya upasargasañjñā parā gatisañjñā . atra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_41: ca upasargasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca gatisañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_42: tasya upasargasañjñāpūrvikā gatisañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_43: . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . gatisañjñā api anavakāśā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_44: sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . sāvakāśā gatisañjñā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ūryādīni avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_45: prādīnāṃ yā gatisañjñā sā anavakāśā . gati . divaḥ karma . sādhakatamam karaṇam divaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_46: karma ca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre anavakāśā karmasañjñā karaṇasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_47: bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_48: niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya karmasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_49: parā karaṇasañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . divaḥ sādhakatamam karma . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_50: karaṇam . karaṇasañjñām ca bhavati sādhakatamam . diva iti nivṛttam . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2919_51: ca karmasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca karaṇasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_0: katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_1: yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . divaḥ karma . hetumat . svatantraḥ kartā tatprayojako hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_2: ca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre anavakāśā hetusañjñā kartṛsañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_3: bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_4: niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayorbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya hetusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_5: parā kartṛsañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . svatantraḥ prayojakaḥ hetuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_6: tataḥ kartā . kartṛsañjñaḥ ca bhavati svatantraḥ . prayojakaḥ iti nivṛttam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_7: ārambhasāmarthyāt ca hetusañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca kartṛsañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_8: yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api kartṛsañjñāpūrvikā hetusañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_9: kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_10: . gurulaghusañjñe nadīghisañjñe . gurulaghusañjñe nadīghisañjñe bādheyātām . gārgibandhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_11: vātsībandhuḥ vaitram viviniyya . paravacane hi niyamānupatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_12: . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_13: . katham . pūrve tasya nadīghisañjñe pare gurulaghusañjñe . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_14: ca nadīghisañjñe paraṅkāryatvāt ca gurulaghusañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ . nanu ca yasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_15: ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api nadīghisaṃghisañjñāpūrvike gurulaghusañjñe . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_16: anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_17: sambhavaḥ . parasmaipadasañjñām puruṣasañjñā . parasmaipadasañjñām puruṣasañjñā bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_18: . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_19: niyamānupapatteḥ tasyobhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya puruṣasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_20: parā parasmaipadasañjñā . katham . evaṃ sa vakṣyati . tiṅaḥ trīṇi trīṇi prathamamadhyottamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_21: iti . evam sarvam puruṣaniyamam anukramya tasya ante laḥ parasmaipadam iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_22: ārambhasāmārthyāt ca puruṣasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca parasmaipadasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_23: . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikaraḥ tasya api parasmaipadasañjñāpūrvikā puruṣasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_24: . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta. ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti

GS24pmbhasuu:2920_26: sāvakāśā parasmaipadasañjñā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . śatṛkvasū avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_0: 308-313 paravacane siti padaṃ bham . paravacane siti padam bhasañjñamapi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_1: . ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ . prajam vindāma ṛtvijayām . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca padasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_2: paraṅkāryatvāt ca bhasañjñā prāpnoti . gatibuddhyādīnām ṇyantānām karma kartṛsañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_3: . gatibuddhyādīāṃ ṇyantānām karma kartṛsañjñam api prāpnoti . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_4: karmasañjñā padasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca kartṛsañjñā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_5: jñāpayati na karmasañjñāyām kartṛsañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam hṛkroḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_6: iti antarasyāṅgrahaṇam karoti . śeṣavacanam ca ghisañjñānivṛttyartham . śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_7: ca kartavyam . śeṣaḥ ghi asakhi iti . kim prayojanam . ghisāñjñānivṛttyartham . nadīsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_8: ghisañjñā mā bhūt iti . śakaṭyai paddhatyai buddhayai dhenvai . itarathā hi paraṅkāryatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_9: ca ghisañjñā ārambhasāmarthyāt ca ṅiti hrasvaḥ ca iti nadīsañjñā . na vā asambhavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_10: . na vā asambhavāt . na vā kartavyam . nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_11: . asambhavāt . kaḥ asau asambhavaḥ . hrasvalakṣaṇā hi nadīsañjñā ghisañjñāyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_12: guṇaḥ . hrasvalakṣaṇā hi nadīsañjñā ghisañjñāyām ca guṇena bhavitavyam . tatra vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_13: nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñābhāvaḥ . tatra vacanaprāmāṇyāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_14: bhaviṣyati . kim kāraṇam . āśrayābhāvāt . āśrayābhāvāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñānivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_15: iti cet yaṇādeśābhāvaḥ . āśrayābhāvāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñānivṛttiḥ iti cet evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_16: ucyate yaṇādeśaḥ api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nadyāśrayatvāt yaṇādeśasya hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_17: nadīsañjñābhāvaḥ . nadyāśrayaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ . yadā nadīsañjñayā ghisañjñā bādhitā tata
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_18: uttarakālam yaṇādeśena bhavitavyam . nadyāśrayatvāt yaṇādeśasya hrasvasya nadīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_19: bhaviṣyati . bahuvrīhyartham tu . bahvrīhipratiṣedhārtham tu śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_20: . śeṣaḥ bavuvrīhiḥ iti . kiṃ prayojanam . prayojanamavyayībhāvopamānadvigukṛllopeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_21: . avyayībhāve . unmattagaṅgam lohitagaṅgam . upamāne . śastrīśyāmā kumudaśyenī .
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_22: dvigu . pañcagavam daśagavam . kṛllope . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ . tatra śeṣavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_23: doṣaḥ saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇañsamāseṣu bahuvrīhipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra śeṣavacanāt doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_24: bhavati . saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇañsamāseṣu bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_25: . dvīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ trīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ . samānādhikaraṇa . vīrpuruṣakaḥ grāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_26: nañsamāse . abrāhmaṇakaḥ deśaḥ avṛṣalakaḥ deśaḥ . kṛllope ca śeṣavacanāt prādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_27: na bahuvrīhiḥ . kṛllope ca śeṣavacanāt prādibhiḥ na prāpnoti . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_28: prapatitapalāśaḥ prapalāśakaḥ iti . atha ekasañjñādhikāre katham sidhyati . ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_29: vipratiṣedhād bahuvrīhiḥ . ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_30: ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ iti cet ktārthe pratiṣedhaḥ . ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_31: vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ iti cet ktārthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_32: . tatpuruṣaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatpuruṣaḥ iti cet anyatra ktārthāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_33: . tatpuruṣaḥ iti cet anyatra ktārthāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_34: pratitatpalāśaḥ prapalāśakaḥ iti . siddham tu prādīnām ktārthe tatpuruṣavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2922_35: siddhametat . katham . prādīnām ktārthe tatpuruṣaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_0: 313-317 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam hrasvasañjñām dīrghaplutau
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_1: . hrasvasañjñām dīrghaplutasañjñe bādhete . tiṅsārvadhātukam liṅliṭoḥ ārdhadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_2: . tiṅaḥ sārvadhātukasañjñām liṅliṭoḥārdhadhātusañjñā bādhate . apatyam vṛddham yuvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_3: . apatyam vṛddham yavusañjñā bādhate . ghim nadī . ghisañjñām nadīsañjñā bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_4: . laghu guru . laghusañjñām gurusañjñā bādhate . padam bham . padasañjñām bhasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_5: bādhate . apādādnam uttarāṇi dhanuṣā vidhyati kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte gām dogdhi dhanuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_6: vidhyati iti . apādānasañjñām uttarāṇi kārakāṇi bādhante . kva . dhanuṣā vidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_7: . kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte . gām dogdhi . dhanuḥ vidhyati . dhanuṣā vidhyati iti apāyayuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_8: ca dhruvamapāye apādānam iti apādānasañjñā prāpnoti sādhakatamam karaṇam iti ca karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_9: . karaṇasañjñā parā sā bhavati . kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte iti atra apāyuktatvāt ca dhruvamapāye
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_10: apādānamiti apādānasañjñā prāpnoti ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam iti ca adhikaraṇasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_11: adhikaraṇasañjñā parā sā bhavati . gām dogdhi iti atra apāyuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_12: prāpnoti karturīpsitatamam karma . iti ca karmasañjñā . karmasañjñā parā sā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_13: . dhanuḥ vidhyati iti atra apāyayuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā prāpnoti svatantraḥ kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_14: iti ca . kartṛsañjñā parā sā bhavati . krudhadruhoḥ upsṛṣṭayoḥ karma saṃpradānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_15: . krudhadruhoḥ upsṛṣṭayoḥ karmasañjñā saṃpradānasañjñām bādhate . karaṇam parāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_16: sādhu asiḥ chinatti . karaṇasañjñām parāṇi āṇi bādhante . kva . dhanuḥ vidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_17: asiḥ chinatti iti . adhikaraṇam karma geham praviśati . adhikaraṇasañjñām karmasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_18: bādhate . kva . geham praviśati iti . adhikaraṇam kartā sthālī pacati . adhikaraṇasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_19: karmasañjñā bādhate . kva . sthālī pacati iti . adhyupasṛṣṭam karma . adhyupasṛṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_20: karma adhikaraṇasañjñām bādhate . gatyupasargasañjñe karmapravacanīyasañjñā . gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_22: ātmanepadasañjñā bādhate . samāsasañjñāḥ ca . samāsasañjñāḥ ca yāḥ yāḥ parāḥ anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2924_23: ca tāḥ tāḥ pūrvāḥ sāvakāśāḥ ca bādhante .
GS24pmbhasuu:2926_0: 317-319 arthavat prātipadikam . arthavat prātipadikasañjñam bhavati . guṇavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2926_1: ca . guṇavacanasañjñam ca bhavati arthavat . samāsakṛttaddhitāvyayasarvanāma asarvaliṅgā jātiḥ . 41 //
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_0: samāsasañjñā ca vaktavyā . kṛt . kṛtsañjñā ca vaktavyā . taddhita . taddhitasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_1: ca vaktavyā . avyaya . avyayasañjñā ca vaktavyā . sarvanāma . sarvanāmasañjñā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_2: vaktavyā . asarvaliṅgā jātiḥ iti etat ca vaktavyam . saṅkhyā . saṅkhyāsañjñā ca vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_3: . ḍu ca . ḍusañjñā ca vaktavyā . kā punaḥ ḍusañjñā . ṣaṭsañjñā . ekadravyopaniveśinī
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_4: sañjñā . ekadravyopaniveśinī sañjñā iti etat ca vaktavyam . kimartham idamucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_5: . yathānyāse eva bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sañjñāḥ kriyante . santi ca eva atra kāḥ cit apūrvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_6: sañjñāḥ . api ca etena ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭānām bādhanam yathā syāt . guṇavacanasañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_7: ca etābhiḥ bādhanam yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2930_0: 319-325 vipratiṣedhaḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . vipratipūrvāt siddheḥ karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:2930_1: karmavyatihāre ghañ . itaretarapratiṣedhaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . anyonyapratiṣedhaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2930_2: . kaḥ punaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvau prasaṅgau anyārthau ekasmin saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2930_3: dvau prasaṇgau yadā anyārthau bhavataḥ ekasmin ca yugapat prāptnutaḥ saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2930_4: . kva punaḥ anyārthau kva ca ekasmin yugapat prāpnutaḥ . vṛkṣābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_0: vṛkṣeṣu iti anyārthau vṛkṣebhyaḥ iti atra yugapat prāpnutaḥ . kim ca syāt . ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_2: ca parasyāḥ ca prāpteḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ . idam vipratiṣiddham yat ucyate ekasmin yugapadasambhavātpūrvaparaprāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_3: ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ iti . katham hi ekasmin ca nāma yugapadasambhavaḥ syāt pūrvasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_4: ca parasyāḥca prāpteḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ ca syāt . na etat vipratiṣiddham . yat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_5: ekasmin yugapadasambhavāt iti kāryayoḥ yugapadasambhavaḥ śāstrayoḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_6: . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti . tat yathā tṛjādayaḥ paryāyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_7: bhavanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tṛjādayaḥ paryāyeṇa bhavanti . anavayaprasaṅgāt pratipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_8: vidheḥ ca . anavayavena prasajyante pratipadam ca vidhīyante . apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_9: tulyabalatvāt . apratipattiḥ vā punaḥ ubhayoḥ śāstrayoḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . tulyabalatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_10: . tulyabale hi ubhe śāstre . tat yathā . dvayoḥ tulyabalayoḥ ekaḥ preṣyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_11: . saḥ tayoḥ paryāyeṇa kāryam karoti . yadā tam ubhau yugapat preṣayataḥ nānādikṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_12: ca kārye bhavataḥ tadā yadi asau avirodhārthī bhavati tataḥ ubhayoḥ na karoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_13: punaḥ kāraṇam ubhayoḥ na karoti . yaugapadyāsambhavāt . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_14: . tatra pratipattyartham vacanam . tatra pratipattyartham idam vaktavyam . tavyadādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_15: tu aprasiddhiḥ . tavyadādīnām tu kāryasya aprasiddhiḥ . na hi kim cit tavyadādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_16: niyamakāri śāstram ārabhyate yena tavyadādayaḥ syuḥ . yaḥ ca bhavatā hetuḥ vyapadiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_17: apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti tulyaḥ sa tavyadādiṣu . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_18: anavakāśāḥ tavyadādayaḥ ucyante ca . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . yaḥ ca bhavatā hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_19: vyapadiṣṭaḥ tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti iti tulyaḥ sa tavyadādiṣu . etāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_20: iha sūtram vipratiṣedhe param iti . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ sakṛdgatau virpratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_21: yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . punaḥ ca paṭhiṣyati punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_22: iti . kim punaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . iha bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_23: dvau hetū vyapadiṣṭau . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti iti ca apratipattiḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_24: ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti ca . tat yadā tāvat eṣaḥ hetuḥ tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_25: prāpnoti iti tadā vipratiṣeḍhe param iti anena kim kriyate . niyamaḥ . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_26: param eva bhavati iti . tadā etat upapannam bhavati sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_27: tat bādhitam eva iti . yadā tu eṣaḥ hetuḥ apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_28: tadā vipratiṣedhe param iti anena kim kriyate . dvāram . vipratiṣedhe param tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_29: bhavati tasmin krṭe yadi pūrvam api prāpnoti tat api bhavati . tadā etat upapannam
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_30: bhavati punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt siddham iti . vipratiṣedhe param iti uktvā aṅgādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_31: pūrvam iti vaktavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ na paṭhitavyāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_33: nuṭ iti . katham ye paravipratiṣedhāḥ . ittvottvābhyām guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_34: iti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . katham ye pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_35: vipratiṣedhe param iti eva siddham . katham . paraśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_36: vyavasthāyām vartate . tat yathā pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . paraputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_37: parabhāryā . anyaputraḥ anyabhāryā iti gamyate . asti prādhānye vartate . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2931_38: param iyaṃ brāhmāṇī asmin kuṭumbe . pradhānam iti gamyate . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2932: iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . tat yathā . param dhāma gataḥ iti . iṣṭam dhāma iti gamyate . tat yaḥ iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2934_0: 325-335 antaraṅgam ca . antaraṅgam ca balīyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2934_1: . prayojanam yaṇekādeśettvottvāni guṇavṛddhidvirvacanāllopasvarebhyaḥ . guṇāt yaṇādeśaḥ : syonaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_0: syonā . guṇaḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . paratvāt guṇaḥ syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ bhavatyantaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_1: . vṛddheḥ yaṇādeśaḥ . dyaukāmiḥ syaukāmiḥ . vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_2: vṛddhiḥ syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . dvirvacanāt yaṇādeśaḥ . dudyūṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_3: susyūṣati . dvirvacanam ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . nityatvāt dvirvacanam syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_4: bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . allopasya ca yaṇādeśasya ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . svarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_5: yaṇādeśaḥ . dyaukāmiḥ syaukāmiḥ . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . paratvāt svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_6: syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . guṇāt ekādeśaḥ . kādraveyaḥ mantram apaśyat
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_7: . guṇaḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt guṇaḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_8: . vṛddheḥ ekādeśaḥ . vaikṣmāṇiḥ sausthitiḥ . vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_9: vṛddhiḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . dvirvacanāt ekādeśaḥ . jñāyā odanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_10: jñaudanaḥ . jñaudanam icchati jñaudanīyati . jñaudanīyateḥ san jujñaudanīyiṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_11: dvirvacanam ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . nityatvāt dvirvacanam syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_12: antaraṅgataḥ . allopāt ekādeśaḥ . śunā śune . allopaḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_13: allopaḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_14: atra viśeṣaḥ allopena vā nivṛttau satyām pūrvatvena vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . allopena
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_15: nivṛttau satyām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_16: . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_17: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_18: . śunaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na lākṣaṇikasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . yena
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_19: kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya pratiṣedhaḥ . yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_20: na asti . bahhuśunī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2935_21: . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_0: kumārī iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati nodāttanivṛttisvaraḥ śuni avatarati
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_1: iti yat ayam śvanśabdam gaurādiṣu paṭhati . antodāttārtham yatnam karoti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_2: hi syān ṅīpā eva . svarāt ekādekādeśaḥ . sautthitiḥ vaikṣmāṇiḥ . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_3: ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvātsvaraḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . guṇasya ca ittvottvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_4: ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . vṛddheḥ ittvottve . staurṇiḥ paurtiḥ . vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_5: ittvottve ca . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ syāt . ittvottve bhavataḥ antaraṅgataḥ . dvirvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_6: ittvottve . ātestīryate āpopūryate . dvirvacanam ca prāpnoti ittvottve ca . nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_7: dvirvacanam syāt . ittvottve bhavataḥ antaraṅgataḥ . allopasya ca ittvottvayoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_8: na asti sampradhāraṇā . svare nāsti viśeṣaḥ . iṇṅiśīnām āt guṇaḥ savarṇadīrghatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_9: . iṇṅiśīnām āt guṇaḥ savarṇadīrghatvāt prayojanam . ayaje indram avape indram . vṛkṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_10: indram plakṣe indram . ye indram te indram . āt guṇaḥ ca prāpnoti savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_11: ca . paratvāt savaraṇadīrghatvam syāt . āt guṇaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . na vā savarṇadīrghatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_12: anavakāśatvāt . na vā etat antaraṅgeṇa api sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . savarṇadīrghatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_13: anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśam savarṇadīrghatvam āt guṇam bādheta . na etat antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_14: asti anavakāśam param iti . iha api syonaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2937_0: syonā iti śakyam vaktum na vā paratvāt guṇasya iti . ūṅāpoḥ ekādeśaḥ ītvalopābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2937_1: . ūṅāpoḥ ekādeśaḥ ītvalopābhyām bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . ītvāt ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2937_2: . khaṭvīyati mālīyati . ītvam ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt ītvam syāt . ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2937_3: bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . lopāt ekādeśaḥ . kāmaṇḍaleyaḥ bhādrabāheyaḥ . lopaḥ ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2937_4: ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt lopaḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2937_5: ītvalopābhyām iti ucyate na lopetvābhyāmiti eva ucyeta . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2937_6: iti . āpaḥ api ekādeśaḥ lope prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_2: . veñ vānīyam śo śānīyam glai glānīyam mlai mlānīyam glācchattram clācchatram . āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_3: ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ syuḥ . āttvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_4: . napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam ca prayojanam . atiri atra atinu atra atiricchattram
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_5: atinucchatram ārāśastri idam dhānāśaṣkuli idam niṣkauśāmbi idam nirvārāṇasi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_7: ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ syuḥ . napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_10: . yaṇādeśāt . agnicit atra somasut atra . ekādeśāt . agnicit idam somasut udakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_11: . guṇāt . agnicite somasute . vṛddheḥ . praṛcchakaḥ prārcchakaḥ . auttvāt . agniciti
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_12: somasuti . dīrghatvāt . jagadbhyām janagadbhyām . ītvāt . jagatyati janagatyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_13: mumaḥ . agnicinmanyaḥ somasunmanyaḥ . etvāt . jagadbhyaḥ janagadbhyaḥ . rīvidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_14: . sukṛtyati pāpakrṭyati . anaṅānaṅbhyām ca iti vaktavyam . sukṛt sukṛtdduṣkrṭau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_15: tuk ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ syuḥ . tuk bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_16: . iyaṅādeśaḥ guṇāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ guṇāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . dhiyati riyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_17: . iyaṅādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti guṇaḥ ca . paratvāt guṇaḥ syāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṇgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_18: . uvaṅādeśaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . prādudruvat prāsusruvat . śveḥ samprasāraṇapūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_19: yaṇādeśāt . śveḥ samprasāraṇapūrvatvam yaṇādeśāt bhavati antaraṇgataḥ prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_20: . śuśuvatuḥ śuśuvuḥ . pūrvatvam ca prāpnoti yaṇādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt yaṇādeśaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_21: . pūrvatvam bhavati antaraṇgataḥ . hvaḥ ākāralopāt . hvaḥ ākāralopāt pūrvatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_22: antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . juhuvatuḥ juhuvuḥ . pūrvatvam ca prāpnoti ākāralopaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_23: paratvāt ākāralopaḥ syāt . pūrvatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . svaraḥ lopāt . svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_24: lopāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . aupagavī saudāmanī . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_25: ca . paratvāt lopaḥ syāt . svaraḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . pratyayavidhiḥ ekādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_26: . pratyayavidhiḥ ekādeśāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . agniḥ indraḥ vāyuḥ udakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2938_27: . pratyayavidhiḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt ekādeśaḥ syāt . /
GS24pmbhasuu:2939_0: pratyayavidhiḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . yaṇādeśāt ca iti vaktavyam . agniḥ atra vāyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2939_1: atra . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2939_2: . pacatu atra paṭhtu atra . lādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeśaḥ ca .paratvāt yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2939_3: syāt . lādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . tatpuruṣāntodāttatvam pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2939_5: pūrvaśālāpriyaḥ aparaśālāpriyaḥ ṭatpuruṣāntodāttatvam ca prāpnoti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2939_6: ca . paratvāt pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam syāt . tatpuruṣāntodāttatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2939_7: . etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_0: 335-339 yadi santi prayojanāni iti eṣā paribhāṣā kriyate nanu ca iyam api kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_1: asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . kim prayojanam . pacāvedam pacāmedam
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_2: . asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya guṇasya antaraṇgalakṣaṇam aitvam mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_3: ubhe tarhi kartavye . na iti āha . anayā eva siddham . iha api syonaḥ syonā iti asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_4: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya guṇasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ yaṇādeśo bhaviṣyati . yadi asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_5: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti ucyate akṣadyūḥ hiraṇyadyūḥ asiddhatvāt asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_6: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya ūṭhaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_7: . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi na ajānantarye
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_8: bahiṣṭvaprakḷptiḥ iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_9: jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhaḥ iti āha . iyam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_10: paribhāṣā kartavyā asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇamantaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . eṣā ca na kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_11: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam vāhaḥ ūṭh iti ūṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_12: śāsti . tasya doṣaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ vṛddhisvarau ekādeśāt . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_13: doṣaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ vṛddhisvarau ekādeśāt antaraṅgataḥ abhinirvṛttāt na prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_14: . pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ aparaiṣukāmaśamaḥ guḍodakam tilodakam . udake akevale iti pūrvottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_15: vyapavargābhāvāt na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati pūrvottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_16: tāvat kāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti yat ayam na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_17: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . indre dvau acau . tatra ekaḥ yasya īti ca iti lopena
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_18: hriyate aparaḥ ekādeśena . tataḥ anackaḥ indraḥ sampannaḥ . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vṛddheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_19: . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ pūrvapadottarapadyoḥ tāvatkāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_20: na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . yaṇādeśāt iyuvau . yaṇādeśāt iyuvau antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_21: abhinirvṛttāt na prāpnutaḥ . vaiyākaraṇaḥ sauvaśvaḥ iti . lakṣaṇam hi bhavati yvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_22: vṛddhiprasaṅge iyuvau bhavataḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśau iyuvau . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_23: ucyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam aci ti ucyate . iha mā bhūtām . aitikāyanaḥ aupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_24: iti . stām atra iyuvau lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi lopaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_25: asti . praiyamedhaḥ praiyamgavaḥ iti . usi pararūpāt ca . usi pararūpāt ca antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_26: abhinirvṛttāt iyādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . paceyuḥ yajeyuḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_27: yā iti etasya iy bhavati iti . katham tarhi . yās iti etasya iy bhavati iti . luk
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_28: lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ . lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ luk balīyān iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_29: . lopāt . gomān priyaḥ asya gomatpriyaḥ yavamatpriyaḥ . gomān iva ācarati gomatyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_30: yavamatyate . yaṇādeśāt . grāmaṇyaḥ kulam grāmaṇikulam senānyaḥ kulam senānikulam
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_31: . ayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ . gave hitam gohitam rāyaḥ kulam raikulam nāvaḥ kulam naukulam
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_32: vṛkādbhayam vṛkabhayam . luk ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_33: syuḥ . luk balīyān iti vaktavyam luk yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2943_0: 340-344 yū iti kimartham . khaṭvā mālā . kim ca syāt . khaṭvābandhuḥ mālābandhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2943_1: . nadī bandhuni iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . iha ca bahukhaṭvakaḥ iti nadyṛtaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2943_2: iti nityaḥ kap prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na āpaḥ nadīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2943_3: bhavati iti yat ayam ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ iti pṛthak ābgrahaṇam karoti . iha tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2943_4: mātre mātuḥ iti āṭ nadyāḥ iti āṭ prasajyeta . kim punaḥ idam dīrghayoḥ grahaṇam āhosvid
GS24pmbhasuu:2943_5: hrasvayoḥ . kim cātaḥ . yadi dīrghayoḥ grahaṇam yū iti nirdeśaḥ na upapadyate . dīrghāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2943_6: hi pūrvasavarṇaḥ pratiṣidhyate . uttaratra ca viśeṣaṇam na prakalpeta yū hrasvau
GS24pmbhasuu:2943_7: iti . yadi yū na hrasvau . atha hrasvau na yū . yū hrasvau ceti vipratiṣiddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2943_8: atha hrasvayoḥ he śakaṭe atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avaśyam atra vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2944_0: he śakaṭi he śakaṭe iti . iha tarhi śakaṭibandhuḥ iti nadī bandhuni iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2944_1: prasajyeta . iha ca bahuśakaṭiḥ iti nadyṛtaḥ ceti nityaḥ kap prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2944_2: doṣaḥ . ṅiti hrasvaḥ ca iti ayam niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . ṅiti eva yū hrasvau nadīsañjñau
GS24pmbhasuu:2944_3: bhavataḥ na nyatra iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2944_4: . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . nityā nadīsañjñā prāptā sā vibhāṣā vidheyā . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2944_5: apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2944_6: ayam nityaḥ yogaḥ syāt prakalpeta niyamaḥ . bāḍham prakalpeta . nityaḥ tarthi bhaviṣyati /
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_0: tat katham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti . yū stryākhyau nadī na iyaṅuvaṅsthānau
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_1: astrī vāmi . tataḥ ṅiti . ṅiti ca iyaṅuvaṅsthānau yū vā astrī nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_2: . tataḥ hrasvau . hrasvau ca yū stryākhyau ṅiti nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ . iyaṅuvaṅsthānau
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_3: vā na iti ca nivṛttam . yadi evam śakaṭaye atra guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_4: kariṣyate . śeṣagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . katham . idam asti . yū stryākhyau nadī na

GS24pmbhasuu:2945_6: na bhavataḥ . tataḥ hrasvau . hrasvau ca yū stryākhyau ṅiti nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_7: . tataḥ hrasvau . hrasvau ca yū stryākhyau ṅiti nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ . iyaṅuvaṅsthānau
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_8: vā na iti ca nivṛttam . tataḥ ghi . ghisañjñau ca bhavataḥ stryākhyau yū hrasvau
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_9: ṅiti . tataḥ asakhi . sakhivarjitau ca yū hrasvau ghisañjñau bhavataḥ . stryākhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_10: ṅiti iti ca nivṛttam . yadi tarhi śeṣagrahaṇam na kriyate na arthaḥ ekena api yogavibhāgena
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_11: . aviśeṣeṇa nadīsañjñā utsargaḥ . tasyāḥ hrasvayoḥ ghisañjñā bādhikā . tasyām nityāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_12: prāptāyām ṅiti vibhāṣā ārabhyate . atha vā punaḥ astu dīrghayoḥ . nanu ca uktam nirdeśaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2945_14: . chandasi iti ucyate na ca idam chandaḥ . chandovat sūtrāṇi bhavanti iti . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_15: ucyate uttaratra viśeṣeṇam na prakalpeta yū hrasvau iti . yadi yū na hrasvau atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_16: hrasvau na yū . yū hrasvau iti vipratiṣiddham iti . na etat vipratiṣiddham . āha
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_17: ayam yū hrasvau iti . yadi yū na hrasvau . atha hrasvau na yū . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_18: yvoḥ yau hrasvau iti . kau ca yvoḥ hrasvau . savarṇau . atha stryākhyau iti kaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_19: śabdaḥ . striyam ācakṣāte stryākhyau . yadi evam stryākhyāyau iti prāpnoti . anupasarge
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_20: hi kaḥ vidhīyate . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati yasmin daśa sahasrāṇi putre jāte
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_21: gavām dadau . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ priyākhyebhyaḥ saḥ ayam uñchena jīvati . chandovat kavayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2945_22: kurvanti . na hi eṣā iṣṭiḥ . evam tarhi karmasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2946: striyām ākhyāyete stryākhyau . yadi karmasādhanaḥ kṛtstriyāḥ dhātustriyāḥ ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2947_0: . tantryai lakṣmyai śriyai bhruvai . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . striyām ākhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2947_1: anayoḥ stryākhyau . evam api kṛtstriyāḥ dhātustriyāḥ ca na sidhyati . tantryai lakṣmyai
GS24pmbhasuu:2947_2: śriyai bhruvai . evam tarhi vic bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu kaḥ eva . striyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2947_3: ācakṣāte stryākhyau iti . nanu ca uktam stryākhyāyau iti prāpnoti . anupasarge hi

GS24pmbhasuu:2949_7: nadīsañjñā bhaviṣyati . avayavastrīviṣayatvāt siddham iti cet iyaṅuvaṅsthānapratiṣedhe

GS24pmbhasuu:2949_10: . ādhyai pradhyai brāhmaṇyai . kim kāraṇam . avayavasya iyaṅuvaṅsthānatvāt . avayavaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2949_13: idam grahaṇam . na ca etasya aṅgasya iyuvau bhavataḥ . hrasveyuvsthānapravṛttau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2949_14: strīvacane . hrasvau ca iyuvsthānau ca pravṛttau ca prāk ca pravṛtteḥ strīvacanau
GS24pmbhasuu:2949_15: eva nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . śakaṭyai atiśakaṭyai brāmaṇāṇyai . kva mā
GS24pmbhasuu:2949_16: bhūt . śakaṭaye atiśakaṭaye brāhmaṇāya . dhenvai atidhenvai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2949_17: . dhenave atidhenave brāhmaṇāya . śriyai atiśriyai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt . śriye
GS24pmbhasuu:2949_18: atiśriye brāhmaṇāya . bhruvai atibhruvai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt . bhruve atibhruve

GS24pmbhasuu:2957_0: 351-356 yasmāt iti vyapadeśāya . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . yasmāt vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_1: tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti iyati ucyamāne strī iyatī strīyati iti atra api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_2: . pratyayagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_3: . yasmāt pratyayaḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti iyati ucyamāne dadhi adhunā madhu adhunā
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_4: atrāpi prasajyeta . vidhigrahaṇeṇa punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . tat etat pratyayagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_5: vidhigrahaṇena ca samuditena kriyate sanniyogaḥ . yasmāt yaḥ pratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_6: tadādi tasmin aṅgasañjñam bhavati iti . atha tadādigrahaṇam kimartham . aṅgasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_7: tadādivacanam syādinumartham . aṅgasañjñāyām tadādigrahaṇam kriyate syādyartham numartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_8: ca . syādyartham tāvat . kariṣyāvaḥ kariṣyāmaḥ . numartham . kuṇḍāni vanāni . mitsuṭoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2957_10: chinatti abhinat acchinat . suḍvataḥ . sañcarakastu sañcaskaruḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_11: na sidhyati . suṭaḥ bahiraṅgatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ suṭ . antaraṅgaḥ guṇaḥ . asiddham

GS24pmbhasuu:2957_15: na arthaḥ . idam tu na sidhyati sañcakaratuḥ sañcaskaruḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_16: . iha tasya vā grahaṇam bhavati tadādeḥ vā na cedam tat na api tadādi . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_17: tadādyādivacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tadādyādi aṅgasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2957_18: . kim idam tadādyādi iti . tasya ādiḥ tadādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2958: tadādiḥ ādiḥ yasya tadidam tadādyādi iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2961_0: evam tadādyādi tadādi iti . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā siddham . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2961_1: siddham etat . tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate. tad yathā . gaṅgā yamunā devadattā
GS24pmbhasuu:2961_2: iti . anekā nadī gaṅgām yamunām ca praviṣṭā gaṅgāyamunāgrahaṇena gṛhyate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2961_3: devadattāsthaḥ garbhaḥ devadattāgrahaṇena gṛhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . iha ke cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2961_4: śabdāḥ aktaparimāṇānām arthānām vācakāḥ bhavanti ye ete saṅkhyāśabdāḥ parimāṇaśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2962: ekena api apāye na bhavanti . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2963: naivā adhike bhavanti na ca nyūne . ke cit yāvat eva tat bhavati tāvat eva āhuḥ ye ete jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ ca . tailam ghṛtam iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2964: khāryām api bhavanti droṇe api . śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2965_0: himavati api bhavati vaṭakaṇikāmātre api dravye . aṅgasañjñā ca api aktaparimāṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2965_1: kriyate . sā kena adhikasya syāt . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tadekadeśabhūtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2965_2: tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti yat ayam na idamadasoḥ akoḥ iti sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:2965_3: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . idamadasoḥ kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgo yat sakakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2965_4: syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti tataḥ sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
