GS24pmbhasuu:2973_3: ca samāsaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . samāsa . taddhitavidhi . sāṅkūṭinam vyāvakrośī . samghātāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2973_4: taddhitopattiḥ siddhā bhavati . taddhitavidhi . svara . dūrāt āgataḥ dūrādāgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2973_5: iti . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . kṛdgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2973_6: gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2973_7: kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣa iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:2973_8: ayam gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti anantaragrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_0: 361-362 antagrahaṇam kimartham na suptiṅ padam iti eva ucyate . kena idānīm tadantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_1: bhaviṣyati . tadantavidhinā . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . padasañjñāyām antavacanam anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_3: kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra sañjñāvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_4: pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . taraptamau
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_5: ghaḥ . taraptamabantasya ghasañjñā na bhavati . kim ca syāt . kumārī gauritarā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_6: ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . yadi etat jñāpyate sanādyantāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_7: dhātavaḥ iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛttaddhitasamāsāḥ ca iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_8: . idam tṛtīyam jñāpakārtham . dve tāvat kriyete nyāse eva . yat api ucyate kṛttaddhitasamāsāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_9: ca iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . arthavat iti vartate kṛttaddhāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:2975_10: ca eva arthavat na kevalāḥ kṛtaḥ taddhitāḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2977: 363 kimartham idam ucyate na subantam padam iti eva siddham . niyamārthaḥ ayamārambhaḥ . nāntameva kye padasañjñam bhavati na anyat . kva mā bhūt . vācyati srucyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_0: 363-364 asarvanāmasthāne iti ucyate . tatra te rājā takṣā asarvanāmasthāne iti padasañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_1: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_2: na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam yat anyat sarvanāmasthānāt iti . sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_3: avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena citprāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_4: vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . antarasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_5: vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_6: ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_7: atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . svādiṣu pūrvam padasañjñam bhavati . tataḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_8: ayacipūrvam padasañjñam bhavati . tato bham . bhasañjñam ca bhavati yajādau asarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_9: iti . yadi tarhi sau api padam bhavati ecaḥ plutavikāre padāntagrahaṇam coditam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_10: mā bhūt bhadram karoṣi gauḥ iti tasmin kriyamāṇe api prāpnoti . vākyapadayoḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_11: iti evam tat . bhuvadvadbhyaḥ dhārayadbhyaḥ etayoḥ padasañjñā vaktavyā . bhuvadvadbhyaḥ dhārayadvadbhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2981_0: 365-366 bhasañjñāyām uttarapadalope ṣaṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . bhasañjñāyām uttarapadalope
GS24pmbhasuu:2981_1: ṣaṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anukampitaḥ ṣaḍaḍguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ . siddham acaḥ sthānivattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2981_2: . siddham etat . katham . acaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt bhasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:2981_3: tarhi prāpnoti . vāgāśīrdattaḥ vācikaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2982: siddham ekākṣarapūrvapadānām uttarapadalopavacanāt iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti ṣaḍaḍguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2983_0: ṣaṣaḥ ṭhājādivacanāt siddham iti . nabhoṅgiromanuṣām vati upasamkhyānam . nabhoṅgiromanuṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:2983_1: vati upasamkhyānam kartavyam . nabhasvat aṅgirasvat manuṣvat . vṛṣaṇ vasvaśvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2983_2: . vṛṣaṇ iti etasya vasvaśayoḥ bhasañjñā vaktavyā . vṛṣaṇvasuḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya yat śiraḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya mene .
GS24pmbhasuu:2985_0: 366-367 arthagrahaṇam kimartham na tasau matau iti eva ucyeta . tasau matau iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2985_1: ucyamāne ihaiva syāt payasvān yaśasvān . iha na syāt payasvī yaśasvī . arthagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2985_2: punaḥ kriyamāṇe matupi ca siddham bhavati yaḥ ca nyaḥ tena samānārthaḥ tasmin ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2985_3: . yadi arthagrahaṇam kriyate payasvān yaśasvān atra na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2985_4: hi matup matvarthe vartate . matup api matvarthe vartate . tat yathā devadattaśālāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2985_5: brāhmaṇā ānīyantām iti ukte yadi devadattaḥ pi brāhmaṇaḥ bhavati saḥ api ānīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2987: 367 ubhayasañjñānyapi iti vaktavyam . saḥ suṣṭhubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_0: 368-372 bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti ucyate . keṣu bahuṣu . artheṣu . yadi evam vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_1: plakṣaḥ atra api prāpnoti . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ mūlam skandhaḥ phalam palāśam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_2: evam tarhi ekavacanam dvivacanam bahuvacanamiti śabdasañjñāḥ etāḥ . yeṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_3: svādayaḥ vidhīyante teṣu bahuṣu . keṣu ca artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante . karmādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_4: . na vai karmādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ . ke tarhi . ekatvādayaḥ . ekatvādiṣu api vai
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_5: vibhakyartheṣu avaśyam karmādayaḥ nimittatvena upādeyāḥ . karmaṇaḥ ekatve karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_6: dvitve karmaṇaḥ bahutve iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2989_7: bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:2991: tat eke manyante iti paratvāt ekavacanam prāpnoti . bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ paraḥ kariṣyate . sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_0: bahuḥ sūpaḥ iti paratvāt bahuvacanam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_1: na hi antareṇa bhāvaprayayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ iti tan na . antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_2: api bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . katham . iha kadā cit guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_3: bhavati . tat yathā paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti . kadā cit ca guṇinā guṇaḥ vypadiśyate . paṭhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_4: śuklaḥ iti . tat yadā tāvat guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_5: guṇaguṇinoḥ . tadā na antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_6: tu guṇinā guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate paṭasya śuklaḥ iti svapradhānaḥ tadā guṇaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_7: tadā dravye ṣaṣṭhī . tadā antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guaṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_8: . na ca iha vayam ekatvādibhiḥ karmādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . kim tarhi . karmādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_9: ekatvādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . ekasmin ekavacanam . kasyaikasmin . karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_10: . dvayoḥ dvivacanam . kayoḥ dvayoḥ . karmaṇoḥ . bahuṣu bahuvacanam . keṣām bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_11: . karmaṇām iti . katham bahuṣu bahuvacanamiti . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ nānādhikaraṇavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_12: yaḥ bahuśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam na vaipulyavācinaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_13: . yat uktam bahuḥ odanaḥ bahuḥ sūpaḥ iti paratvāt bahuvacanam prāpnoti iti sa doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_14: na bhavati . yat apyucyate iti eke manyante tat eke manyanta iti paratvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_15: prāpnoti iti na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva samkhyāvācī . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_16: yathā ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā ekāgnayaḥ ekahalāni ekākibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_17: kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2993_18: tāḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2995_0: 372-375 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . suptiṅām aviśeṣavidhānāt dṛṣtaviprayogatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2995_1: ca niyamārtham vacanam . supaḥ aviśeṣeṇa prātipadikamātrāt vidhīyante . tiṅaḥ aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2995_2: dhātumātrāt vidhīyante . tatra etat syāt yadi apyaviśeṣeṇa vidhīyante na eva viprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2995_3: lakṣyate iti . dṛṣṭaviprayogatvāt ca . dṛśyate khalu api viprayogaḥ . tadyathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_0: pādāḥ me sukumārāḥ iti . suptiṅoḥ aviśeṣavidhānāt dṛṣṭaviprayogatvāt ca vyatikaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_1: prāpnoti . iṣyate ca avyatikaraḥ syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_2: niyamārtham vacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . atha etasmin niyamārthe sati kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3000: bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam iti . āhosvit arthaniyamaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3003_0: bahuṣu bahuvacanam eva iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3003_1: padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt . tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām padasañjñā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3003_2: . uccaiḥ nīcaiḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . asubantatvāt . arthaniyame siddham . arthaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:3003_3: siddham bhavati . astu arthaniyamaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu pratyayaniyamaḥ . nanu ca uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3004_0: tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3004_1: . supām karmādayaḥ api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3004_2: karmādayaḥ ca . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3004_3: . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3004_4: . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3004_5: naikasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na dvayoḥ na ekasmin iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3004_6: jñāpayati utpadyante avyayebhyaḥ svādayaḥ iti yat ayam avyayāt āpsupaḥ iti avyayāt lukam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_0: 376-379 kim idam kārake iti . sañjñānirdeśaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_1: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . iha hi vyākaraṇe ye vā ete loke pratītapadārthakāḥ śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_2: taiḥ nirdeśāḥ kriyante paśuḥ apatyam devatā iti yāḥ vā etāḥ kṛtrimāḥ ṭighughabhasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_3: tābhiḥ . na ca ayam loke dhruvādīnām pratītapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ na khalu api kṛtrimā
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_4: sañjñā anyatra avidhānāt . sañjñādhikāraḥ ca ayam . tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_5: anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . kārake iti sañjñānirdeśaḥ cetsañjñinaḥ api nirdeśaḥ . kārake
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_6: iti sañjñānirdeśaḥ cetsañjñinaḥ api nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . sādhakam nirvartakam kārakasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_7: bhavati iti vaktavyam . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ grāmasya samīpāt āgacchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_8: akārakasya . itarathā hi aniṣṭam prasajyeta . akārakasya api apādādanasañjñā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_9: . kva . grāmasya samīpāt āgacchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra grāmaḥ apāyayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_10: . kim tarhi . samīpam . yadā ca grāmaḥ apāyayuktaḥ bhavati bhavati tadā apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_11: . tat yathā grāmāt āgacchati iti . karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_12: panthānam pṛcchati iti . karmasañjñā ca prāpnoti akathitasya. kva . brāhmaṇasya putram
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_13: panthānam pṛcchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam akathitaśabdaḥ asti eva saṅkīrtite
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_14: vartate . tat yathā kaḥ cit kam cit sañcakṣya āha asau atra akathitaḥ . asaṃkīrtitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_15: iti gamyate . asti aprādhānye vartate . tat yathā akathitaḥ asau grāme akathitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_16: asau nagare iti ucyate yaḥ yatra apradhānaḥ bhavati . tat yadā aprādhānye akathitśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_17: vartate tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_18: pṛcchati iti . apādānam ca vṛkṣasya parṇam patati iti . apādānasañjñā ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_19: . kva . vṛkṣasya parṇam patati . kuḍyasya piṇḍaḥ patati iti . nā vā apāyasyāvivakṣitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_20: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apāyasya avivakṣitatvāt . na atra apāyaḥ vivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_21: . kim tarhi . sambandhaḥ . yadā ca apāyaḥ vivakṣitaḥ bhavati bhavati tadā apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_22: . tat yathā . vṛkṣāt parṇam patati iti . sambandhastu tadā na vivakṣitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_23: . na jñāyate kaṅkasya vā kurarasya vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_0: 379-386 ayam tarhi doṣaḥ karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ ca akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_1: pṛcchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kārakaḥ iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_2: yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākāraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_3: karaṇe etatprayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . karoti iti kārakam iti . anvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_4: iti cet akartari kartṛśabdānupapattiḥ . anvartham iti cet akartari kartṛśabdaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_5: upapadyate . karaṇam kārakam adhikaraṇam kārakam iti . siddham tu pratikārakam kriyābhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_6: pacādīnām karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛbhāvaḥ . siddhaḥ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_7: . kutaḥ . pratikārakam kriyābhedāt pacādīnām . pacādīnām hi pratikārakam kriyā bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_8: . kim idam pratikārakam iti . kārakam kārakam prati pratikārakam . kaḥ asau pratikārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_11: devadattaḥ pacati iti ucyate . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ pradhānakartuḥ pākaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_12: . etat pradhānakartuḥ kartṛtvam . droṇam pacati āḍhakam pacati ti sambhavanakriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_13: dhāraṇakriyā ca adhikaraṇasya pākaḥ . droṇam pacati āḍhakam pacati iti sambhavanakriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_14: dhāraṇakriyām ca kurvatī sthālī pacati iti ucatye . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_15: dhikaraṇasya pākaḥ . etat adhikaraṇasya kartṛtvam . edhāḥ pakṣyanti ā viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_16: iti jvalvanakriyā karaṇasya pākaḥ . edhāḥ pakṣyanti ā viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti iti kurvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_17: kāṣṭhāni pacanti iti ucyante . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ karaṇasya pākaḥ .etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_18: karaṇasya kartṛtvam . udyamananipātanāni kartuḥ chidikriyā . udyamananipātanāni kurvan
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_19: devadattaḥ chinatti iti ucyate . tatra tadā chidiḥ vartate . eṣaḥ pradhānakartuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_20: chedaḥ . etat pradhānakartuḥ kartṛtvam . yat tat na tṛṇena tatparaśoḥ chedanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_21: yat tat samāne udyamane nipātane ca paraśunā chidyate na tṛṇena tat paraśoḥ chedanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_22: . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . itarathā hi asitṛṇayoḥ chedane aviśeṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_23: yaḥ hi manyata udyamananipātanāt eva etat bhavati chinatti iti asitṛṇayoḥ chedane
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_24: na tasya viśeṣaḥ syāt . yat asinā chidyate tṛṇena api tat chidyeta . apādānādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_25: tu aprasiddhiḥ . apādānādīnām kartṛtvasya aprasiddhiḥ . yathā hi bhavatā karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_26: kartṛtvam nirdarśitam na tathā apādānādīnām kartṛtvam nidarśyate . na vā svatantraparatantratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_27: tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_28: svatantraparatantratvāt . sarvatra eva atra svātantryam pāratantryam ca vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_29: . tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam . tayoḥ svātantryapāratantryayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_30: . vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . balāhakāt vidyotate . balāhake vidyotate
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_31: . balāhakaḥ vidyotate iti . kim tarhi ucyate apādānādīnām tu aprasiddhiḥ iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_32: tarhi na brūmaḥ apādānādīnām kartṛtvasya aprasiddhiḥ iti . paryāptam karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_33: kartṛtvam nidarśitam apādānīnām kartṛtvanirdarśanāya . paryāptaḥ hyekaḥ pulākaḥ sthālyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_34: nirdarśanāya . kim tarhi . sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . yāvatā sarvatra eva atra svātantryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_35: vidyate pāratantryam ca tatra paratvāt kartṛsañjñā eva prāpnoti . atra api na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_36: svatantryaparatantratvāt tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_37: yathā punaḥ idam sthālyāḥ svātantryam nidarśitam sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_38: kurvatī sthālī svatantrā iti kva idānīm paratantrā syāt . yat tat prakṣālanam parivartanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_39: vā . na vai evamartham sthālī upādiyate prakṣālanam parivartanam ca kariṣyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_40: . katham tarhi . sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca kariṣyati iti . tatra ca sau svatantrā
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_41: . kva idānīm paratantrā . evam tarhi sthālīsthe yatne kathyamāne sthālī svatantrā
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_42: kartṛsthe yatne kathyamāne paratantrā . nanu ca bhoḥ kartṛsthe api vai yatne kathyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_43: sthālī sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca karoti . tatra asau svatantrā . kva idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_44: paratantrā . evam tarhi pradhānena samavāye sthālī paratantrā vyavāye svatantrā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_45: tat yathā amātyādīnām rājñā saha samavāye pāratantryam vyavāye svātantryam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_46: punaḥ pradhānam . kartā .katham punaḥ jñāyate kartā pradhānam iti . yat sarveṣu sādhaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3008_47: samnihiteṣu kartā pravartayitā bhavati . nanu ca bhoḥ pradhānena api vai samavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:3009_0: . na hi kārakam iti anena adhikaraṇatvam uktam adhikaraṇamiti vā kārakatvam . ubhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3009_1: ca anyonyaviśeṣakau bhavataḥ . katham . ekadravyasamavāyitvāt . tat yathā gārgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3009_2: devadattaḥ iti . na hi gārgyaḥ iti anena devadattatvam uktam devadattaḥ iti anena
GS24pmbhasuu:3009_3: vā gārgyatvam . ubhau ca anyonyaviśeṣakau bhavataḥ ekadravyasamavāyitvāt . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3009_4: sāmānyabhūtā kriyā vartate tasyāḥ nirvartakam kārakam . atha vā yāvat brūyāt kriyāyāmiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3009_5: tāvat kārake iti . evam ca kṛtvā nirdeśaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati kārake iti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_0: 387-392 dhruvam iti kimartham . grāmāt āgacchati śakaṭena . na etat asti . karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_1: atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi grāmāt āgacchan kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_2: iti . atra api adhikaraṇasañjñā bādhikā bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi vṛkṣasya parṇam patati
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_3: . kuḍyasya piṇḍaḥ patiti iti . jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām upasamkhyānam . jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_4: upasamkhyānam kartavyam . jugupsā . adharmāt jugupsate. adharmāt bībhatsate . virāma /
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_0: dharmāt viramati. dharmāt nivartate . pramāda . dharmāt pramādyati . dharmāt muhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_1: . iha ca upasamkhyānam kartavyam . sāmkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_2: . tat tarhi idam vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat adharmāt jugupsate adharmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_3: bībhatsate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati duḥkhaḥ adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_4: na anena kṛtyam asti iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvamapāye apādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_5: iti eva siddham . iha ca dharmāt viramati dharmāt nivartate iti dharmāt pramādyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_6: dharmāt muhyati iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ sambhinnabuddhiḥ bhavati saḥ paśyati na idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_7: kim cit dharmaḥ nāma na enam kariṣyāmi iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_8: dhruvamapāye apādānam iti eva siddham . iha ca sāmkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_9: iti . yaḥ taiḥ sāmyam gatavān bhavati saḥ etatprayuṅkte . gatiyukteṣu apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_10: na papadyate adhruvatvāt . gatiyukteṣu apādānasañjñā na upapadyate . aśvāt trastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_11: patitaḥ . rathāt pravītāt patitaḥ . sārthāt gacchataḥ hīnaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . adhruvatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_12: . na vā adhrauvyasya avivikṣitatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . adhrauvyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_13: avivakṣitatvāt . na atra adhrauvyam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . dhrauvyam . iha tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_14: aśvāt trastāt patitaḥ iti . yat tadaśve aśvatvam āśugāmitvam tat dhruvam tat ca vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_15: . rathāt pravītāt patitaḥ iti yat tat rathe rathatvam ramante asmin rathaḥ iti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_16: dhruvam tat ca vivakṣitam . sārthāt gacchataḥ hīnaḥ iti yat tatsārthe sārthatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_17: sahārthībhāvaḥ tat dhruvam tat ca vivakṣiktam . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_18: vaktum ye tu ete atyantagatiyuktāḥ tatra katham . dhāvataḥ patitaḥ . tvaramāṇāt patitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_19: iti . atra api na vā adhrauvyasya avivakṣitatvāt iti eva siddham . katham punaḥ sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_20: nāma avivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā alomikā eḍakā . anudarā
GS24pmbhasuu:3012_21: kanya iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3014_0: 392-393 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham vṛkebhyaḥ bibheti dasyubhyaḥ bibheti caurebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3014_1: trāyate dasyubhyaḥ trāyate iti . iha tāvat vṛkebhyaḥ bibheti dasyubhyaḥ bibheti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3014_2: . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati yadi mām vṛkāḥ paśyanti dhruvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3014_3: me mṛtyuḥ iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3014_4: eva siddham . iha caurebhyaḥ trāyate dasyubhyaḥ trāyate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī
GS24pmbhasuu:3014_5: bhavati saḥ paśyati yadi imam paśyanti dhruvam asya vadhabandhaparikleśāḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3014_6: buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3016_0: 393 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham adhyayanāt parājayate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3016_1: prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati duḥkham adhyayanam durdharam ca guravaḥ ca durupacārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3016_2: iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_0: 393-395 kim udāharaṇam . māṣebhyaḥ gāḥ vārayati . bhaved yasya māṣāḥ na gāvaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_1: māṣāḥ īpsitāḥ syuḥ . yasya tu khalu gāvaḥ na māṣāḥ katham tasya māṣāḥ īpsitāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_2: . tasya api māṣāḥ eva īpsitāḥ . ātaḥ ca īpsitāḥ yavebhyḥ gāḥ vārayati . iha kūpāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_3: andham vārayati iti kūpe apādānasañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi tasya kūpaḥ īpsitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_4: kaḥ tarhi . andhaḥ . tasya api kūpaḥ eva īpsitaḥ . paśyati ayam andhaḥ kūpam mā prāpat
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_5: iti . atha vā yathā eva asya anyatra apaśyataḥ īpsā evam kūpe api . iha agneḥ māṇavakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_6: vārayati iti māṇavake apādānasañjñā prāpnoti . karmasañjñātra bādhikā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_7: . agnau api tarhi bādhikā syāt . tasmāt vaktavyam karmaṇaḥ yat īpsitam iti īpsitepsitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_8: iti vā . vāraṇartheṣu karmagrahaṇānarthakyam kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_9: . vāraṇārtheṣu karmagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_10: iti vacanāt . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti eva siddham . ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_11: . katham māṣebhyaḥ gāḥ vārayati iti . paśyati ayam yadi imāḥ gāvaḥ tatra gacchanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_12: dhruvam sasyavināśaḥ sasyavināśe adharmaḥ ca eva rājabhayam ca . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya
GS24pmbhasuu:3018_13: nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3020_0: 396 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham upādhyāyāt antardhatte iti . paśyati ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3020_1: yadi mām upādhyāyaḥ paśyati dhruvam preṣaṇam upālambhaḥ vā iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya
GS24pmbhasuu:3020_2: nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3022_0: 396-398 upayoge iti kimartham . naṭasya śṛṇoti . granthikasya śṛṇoti . upayoge iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3022_1: ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api hi upayogaḥ . ātaḥ ca upayogaḥ yat ārambhakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3023: granthikasya śroṣyāmaḥ iti . evam tarhi upayoge iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca upayogaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_0: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ upayogaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ granthārthayoḥ . atha vā upayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_1: kaḥ bhavitum arhati . yaḥ niyamapūrvakaḥ . tat yathā upayuktāḥ māṇavakāḥ iti ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_2: ye ete niyamapūrvakam adhītavantaḥ bhavanti . kim punaḥ ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_3: āhosvit akārakam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam iti cet akathitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_4: karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam iti cet akathitvāt karmasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_5: . astu tarhi akārakam . akārakam iti cet upayogavacanānarthakyam . yadi akārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_6: upayogavacanam anarthakam . astu tarhi kārakam . nanu ca uktam ākhyātā anupayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_7: kārakam iti cet akathitatvāt karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_8: tatra kriyate . duhiyācirudhipracchibhikṣiciñām iti . ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_9: . katham upādhyāyāt adhīte iti . apakrāmati tasmāt tadadhyayanam . yadi apakrāmati
GS24pmbhasuu:3024_10: kim na atyantāya apakrāmati . sattatatvāt . atha vā jyotirvat jñānāni bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_0: 399 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham gomayāt vṛścikaḥ jāyate . golomāvilomabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_1: durvāḥ jāyante iti . apakrāmanti tāḥ tebhyaḥ . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati
GS24pmbhasuu:3026_2: . santatatvāt . atha vā anyāḥ canyāḥ ca prādurbhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3028_0: 399 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham himavataḥ gaṅgā prabhavati iti . apakrāmanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3028_1: tāḥ tasmāt āpaḥ . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati . santatatvāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_0: 400-401 karmagrahaṇam kimartham . yam abhipraiti saḥ sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_1: karmaṇaḥ eva sampradānasañjñā prasajyeta . karmagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_2: bhavati . karma nimittatvena āśrīyate . atha yamsagrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇā abhipraiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_3: sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne abhiprayataḥ eva sampradānasañjñā prasajyeta . yamsagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_4: punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . yamsagrahaṇāt abhiprayataḥ sampradānasañjñā nirbhajyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_5: . atha abhipragrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇā yam eti sa sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_6: yam eva sampratyeti tatra eva syāt . upādhyāyāya gām dadāti iti . iha na syāt . upādhyāyāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_7: gām adāt . upādhyāyāya gām dāsyati iti . abhipragrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_8: bhavati . abhiḥ ābhimukhye vartate praśabdaḥ ādikarmaṇi . tena yam ca abhipraiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3030_9: yam ca abhipraiṣyati yam ca abhiprāgād ābhimukhyamātre sarvatra siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_0: 401-403 kriyāgrahaṇam api kartavyam . iha api yathā syāt . śrāddhāya nigarhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_1: yuddhāya sannahyate . patye śete iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_2: . kriyām hi loke karma iti upacaranti . kām kriyām kariṣyasi . kim karma kariṣyasi
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_3: iti . evam api kartavyam . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_4: api kṛtrimam karma . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti ucyate katham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_5: nāma kriyayā kriyā īpsitatamā syāt . kriyā api kriyayā īpsitatamā bhavati . kayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_6: kriyayā . sandarśanakriyayā vā prārthayatikriyayā vā adhyavasyatikriyayā vā . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_7: yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ buddhyā tāvat kamcidartham sampaśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_8: sandṛṣṭe prārthanā prārthanāyām adhavasāyaḥ adhyavasāye ārambhaḥ ārambhe nirvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_9: nirvṛttau phalāvāptiḥ . evam kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . evam api karmaṇaḥ karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_10: vaktavyā sampradānasya ca karmasañjñā . paśunā rudram yajate . paśum rudrāya dadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_11: iti arthaḥ . agnau kila paśuḥ prakṣipyate tat rudrāya pahriyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_0: 403-404 kimete ekārthāḥ āhosvit nānārthāḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ekārthāḥ kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_1: pṛthak nirdiśyante . atha nānārthāḥ katham kupinā śakyante viśeṣayitum . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_2: nānārthāḥ kupau tu eṣām sāmānyam asti . na hi akupitaḥ krudhyate na vā akupitaḥ druhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_3: na vā akupitaḥ īrṣyati na vā akupitaḥ asūyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_0: 404-406 tamagrahaṇam kimartham na sādhakam karaṇam iti eva ucyeta ṣādhakam karaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_1: iti iyati ucyamāne sarveṣām kārakāṇām karaṇasañjñā prasajyeta . sarvāṇi hi kārakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_2: sādhakāni . tamagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_3: . pūrvāḥ tāvat sañjñāḥ apavādatvāt bādhikāḥ bhaviṣyanti parāḥ paratvāt ca anavakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_4: ca . iha tarhi dhanuṣā vidhyati apāyayuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā sādhakatvāt ca karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_5: prāpnoti . tamagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi lokataḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_6: siddham . tat yathā . loke abhirūpāya udakamāneyam abhirūpāya kanyā deyā iti na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_7: anabhirūpe pravṛttiḥ asti . tatra abhirūpatamāya iti gamyate . evam iha api sādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_8: karaṇam iti ucyate sarvāṇi ca kārakāṇi sādhakāni na ca asādhake pravṛttiḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_9: tatra sādhakatamam iti vijñāsyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tamagrahaṇam karoti

GS24pmbhasuu:3070_3: . siddham etat . katham . kālakarmakāḥ akarmakavat bhavanti iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3070_4: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . akarmakāṇām iti ucyate na ca ke cit kadā cit kālabhāvādhvabhiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3070_7: api akarmakaḥ . atha vā yat karma bhavati na ca bhavati tena karmakāṇām . na ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3070_8: karma kva cit api na bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:3096_0: 449-450 katham idam vijñāyate . iteḥ param itiparam na itiparam anitiparam iti āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:3096_1: itiḥ paro yasmāt tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3096_2: vijñāyata iteḥ param itiparam na itiparam anitiparam iti khāṭ iti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3096_3: iti atra prāpnoti . atha itiḥ paro yasmāt tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3096_4: śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ iti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat iti atra prāpnoti . astu tāvat itiḥ paro yasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3096_5: tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti . nanu ca uktam śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3096_6: niraṣṭhīvat iti atra prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:3096_8: iti . gatyākṛtiḥ pratinirdiśyate . iha api tarhi anukaraṇākṛtiḥ nirdiśyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:3098_1: . anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparatvapratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . kim prayojanam . aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3098_2: . aniṣṭhaśabdatā mā bhūt iti . idam vicārayiṣyati teprāgdhātuvacanam prayoganiyamārtham

GS24pmbhasuu:3110_1: prayoganiyamārtham iti cet anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparapratiṣedhaḥ aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3110_3: vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ . aniṣṭaśabatā mā bhūt iti

GS24pmbhasuu:3110_5: . sañjñāniyame siddham . sañjñāniyame siddham etat bhavati . astu tarhi sañjñāniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_6: . ubhayoḥ anarthakam vacanam aniṣṭādarśanāt . ubhayoḥ api pakṣayoḥ vacanamanarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_7: . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭādarśanāt . na hi kaḥ citprapacati iti prayoktavye pacatipra
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_8: iti prayuṅkte . yadi ca aniṣṭam dṛśyeta tataḥ yatnārham syāt . upasarjanasannipāte

GS24pmbhasuu:3110_10: vaktavyam . ṛṣabham kūlamudrujam ṛṣabham kūlamudvaham . atra gateḥ prāk dhātoḥ prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_11: yathā syāt . yadi upasarjanasannipāte pūrvaparavyavasthārtham idam ucyate sukaṭamkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_12: vīraṇān i iti atra gateḥ prāk dhātoḥ prayogaḥ prāpnoti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_13: na atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam īṣadduḥsuṣu kṛcchrākṛcchārtheṣu khal
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_14: iti khakāram anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . khitkaraṇe etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_15: khiti iti mum yathā syāt iti . yadi ca atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ syāt khitkaraṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_16: syāt . astu atra mum . anavyayasya iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_17: na atra gateḥ prāk dhatoḥ prayogaḥ bhavati iti tataḥ khakāram anubandham karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_18: na etat asti jñāpakam . yadi api atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ syāt syātevātra mumāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3110_19: . katham . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3110_21: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na eṣaḥ udiḥ upapadam . kim tarhi . viśeṣaṇam . udi kūle rujivahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3112_0: 456-457 kimartham mahatī sañjñā kriyate . anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3112_1: proktavantaḥ karmapravacanīyāḥ iti . ke punaḥ karma proktavantaḥ . ye samprati kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3112_2: na āhuḥ . ke ca samprati kriyām na āhuḥ . ye aprayujyamānasya kriyām āhuḥ te karmapravacanīyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3114: 458-460 kimartham idam ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . kim ca syāt . śākalyasya samhitām anu prāvarṣat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3115: gatiḥ gatau iti nighātaḥ prasajyeta . yadi evam veḥ api karmapravacanīyasañjñā vaktavyā . veḥ api nighātaḥ na iṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_0: prādeśam prādeśam viparilikhati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . na atra veḥ likhim prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_1: . kim tarhi . aprayujyamānam . prādeśam prādeśam vimāya parilikhati iti . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_2: anoḥ api karmapravacanīyasañjñayā na arthaḥ . anoḥ api hi na vṛṣim prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_3: . kim tarhi aprayujyamānam . śākalyena sukṛtām samhitām anuviśamya devaḥ prāvarṣat
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_4: . idam tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_6: . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyakṛtatvāt . sāmānyena eva atra karmapravacanīyasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_7: lakṣaṇetthambhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāsu pratiparyanavaḥ iti . hetvartham tu vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_8: hetvartham idam vaktavyam . hetuḥ śākalyasya samhitā varṣasya na lakṣaṇam . kim vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_9: etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . lakṣaṇam hi nāma saḥ bhavati yena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_10: punaḥ lakṣyate na yaḥ sakṛdapi nimittatvāya kalpate . sakṛt ca asau śākalyena sukṛtām
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_11: samhitām anuśimya devaḥ prāvarṣat . saḥ tarhi tathā . nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ anuḥ hetau
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_12: iti . atha idānīm lakṣaṇena hetuḥ api vyāptaḥ na arthaḥ anena . lakṣaṇena hetuḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_13: vyāptaḥ . na hi avaśyam tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_14: tarhi . yat sakṛt api nimittvāya kalpate tat api lakṣaṇam bhavati . tat yathā api
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_15: bhavān kamaṇḍulapāṇim chātram adrakṣīt iti . sakṛt āsau kamaṇḍalupāṇiḥ chātraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_16: tasya tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati . tat eva tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_17: dvitīyā iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . siddhā atra dvitīyā karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3116_18: iti eva . na sidhyati . paratvāt hetutvāśrayā tṛtīyā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3118_0: 461 āṅ maryādābhividhyoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt ākumāram yaśaḥ pāṇineḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3118_1: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . maryādāvacane iti eva siddham . eṣā asya yaśasaḥ maryādā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3120_0: 461-462 kasya lakṣaṇadayaḥ arthāḥ nirdiśyante . vṛkṣādīnām . kimartham punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3120_1: ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3120_2: etat asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3120_3: vṛkṣādīn prati kriyāyogaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3120_4: dvitīyā iti . vṛkṣam prati vidyotate . vṛkṣamanu vidyotate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_0: 462-464 kimartham adhiparyoḥ anarthakayoḥ karmapravacanīyasañjñā ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_1: yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_2: tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ anarthakau ca imau . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_3: pañcamī yathā syāt pañcamī apāṅparibhiḥ iti . kutaḥ paryāgamyata iti . siddhā atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_4: pañcamī apādāne iti eva . ātaḥ ca apādānapañcamī eṣā . yatra api adhiśabdena yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_5: pañcamī na vidhīyate tatra api śrūyate . kutaḥ adhyāgamyata iti . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_6: sati yat anarthakayoḥ gatyupasargasañjñābādhikām karmapravacanīyasañjñām śāsti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_7: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anarthakānām api eṣām bhavati arthavatkṛtam iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_8: prayojanam . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_9: . atha vā na eva imau anarthakau . kim tarhi anarthakau iti ucyate . anarthāntarvācinau
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_10: anarthakau . dhātunā uktām kriyām āhatuḥ . tad aviśiṣṭam bhavati yathā śaṅkhe payaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_11: . yadi evam dhātunā uktatvāt tasyārthasya upasargaprayogo na prāpnoti uktārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3122_12: aprayogaḥ iti . uktārthānāmapi prayogaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā apūpau dvau ānaya . brāhmaṇau dvau anaya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_0: 464-465 iha kasmāt na bhavati . sarpiṣaḥ api syāt . gomūtrasya api syāt . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_1: syāt . dvitīyā api prasajyeta karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_2: na ime apyarthāḥ nirdiśyante . kim tarhi . parapadārthāḥ ime nirdiśyante . eteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_3: artheṣu yat padam vartate tat prati apiḥ karmapravacanīyasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_4: vā yat atra karmapravacanīyayuktam na adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . binduḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_5: bindoḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī iti prathamā bhaviṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3126_0: 466 adhirīśvaravacane uktam . kim uktam . yasya ca īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3126_1: cet avacanāt siddham . prathamānupapattiḥ tu . svavacanāt siddham iti . adhiḥ svam
GS24pmbhasuu:3128_1: kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . puruṣabādhitatvāt . iha vacane hi sañjñābādhanam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3128_2: hi kriyamāṇe anavakāśā puruṣasañjñā parasmaipadasañjñām bādheta . parasmaipadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3128_3: api anavakāśā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . sāvakāśā parasamaipadasañjñā . kaḥ vakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3128_4: . śatṛkkvasū avakāśaḥ . sici vṛddhau tu parasmaipadagrahaṇam jñāpakam puruṣābādhakatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3128_5: . yat ayam sici vṛddhiḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti parasmaipadagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3128_6: ācāryaḥ na puruṣasañjñā parasmaipadasañjñām bādhate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_1: ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam . ātmanepadānām ca prathamamadhyamottamasañjñāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_2: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_3: akriyamāṇe hi ātmanepadagrahaṇe tisraḥ sañjñāḥ ṣaṭ sañjñinaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_4: na prāpnoti . kriyamāṇe api ca ātmanepadagrahaṇe ānupūrvyavacanam ca . ānupūrvyavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_5: ca kartavyam . akriyamaṇe hi kasya cit eva trikasya prathamasañjñā syāt kasya cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_6: eva madhyamasañjñā kasya cit eva uttamasañjñā . na vaikaśeṣanirdeśāt . yat tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_7: ucyate ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam samasaṅkhyārtham iti . tat na kartavyam . sañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_8: api ṣat eva nirdiśyante . katham . ekaśeṣanirdesāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_9: etasmin ekaśeṣanirdeśe sati kim ayam kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ . prathamaḥ ca prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_10: ca prathamau madhyamaḥ ca madhyamaḥ ca madhyamau uttamaḥ ca uttamaḥ ca uttamau prathamau
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_11: ca madhyamau ca uttamau ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ iti . āhosvit kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_12: . prathamau ca madhyamaḥ ca uttamaḥ ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ . prathamamadhyamotttamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_13: ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi kṛtaikeśeṣāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_14: dvandvaḥ prathamamadhyamayoḥ prathamasañjñā prāpnoti . uttamaprathamayoḥ madhyamasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_15: prāpnoti . madhyamottamayoḥ uttamasañjñā prāpnoti . atha kṛtadvandvānāmekaśeṣo na
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_16: doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . kim punaḥ atra nyāyyam . ubhayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_17: āha . ubhayam hi dṛśyate . tat yathā . bahu śaktikiṭakam bahūni śaktikiṭakāni bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_18: sthālīpiṭharam bahūni sthālīpiṭharāṇi . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe api ātmanepadagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_19: ānurpūrvyavacanam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . lokataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_20: loke vihavyasya dvābhyām dvābhyām agniḥ upstheyaḥ iti . na ca ucyate ānupūrvyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3132_0: 470-471 trīṇi trīṇi iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate aṣṭhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3132_1: ā vibhaktau iti ātvam na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3132_2: pratyayayoḥ eva grahaṇam prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3132_3: iti . nanu ca uktam aṣṭhana ā vibhaktau iti ātvam na prāpnoti iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3132_4: . atha vā punaḥ astu nivṛttam . nanu ca uktam prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3132_5: pratyayayoḥ eva grahaṇam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aci iti anuvartate . na cājādī
GS24pmbhasuu:3132_6: prathamau pratyayau staḥ . nanu ca evam vijñāyate ajādī yau prathamau ajādīnām vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3132_7: yau prathamau iti . yat tarhi tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ pumsi iti anukrāntam pūrvasavarṇadīrgham
GS24pmbhasuu:3132_8: pratinirdiśati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti . atha vā vacanagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_0: 471-476 kimartham idam ucyate . yuṣmadasmaccheṣavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . atha etasmin niyamārthe vijñāyamāne kim ayam upapadaniyamaḥ yuṣmadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_2: madhyamaḥ eva asmadi uttamaḥ eva āhosvit puruṣaniyamaḥ yuṣmadi eva madhyamaḥ asmadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_3: eva uttamaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi puruṣaniyamaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣe prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_4: iti . kim kāraṇam . madhyamottamau niyatau yuṣmadasmadī aniyate . tatra prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_5: api prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam prathamaniyamārtham . śeṣe eva prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_6: bhavati na anyatra iti . atha api upapadaniyamaḥ evam api śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_7: śeṣe prathamaḥ iti . yuṣmadasmadī niyate madhyamottamau aniyatau tau śeṣe api prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_8: . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣaniyamārtham . śeṣe prathamaḥ eva bhavati na anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_9: iti . upapadaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . yuṣmadasmadī niyate madhyamottamau
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_10: aniyatau tau śeṣe api prāpnutaḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi prathamaḥ bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_11: bhaviṣyati . yatra prathamaḥ ca anyaḥ ca prāpnoti tatra prathamaḥ bhavati iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_12: yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt . tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_13: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tvam ca devadattaḥ ca pacathaḥ . aham ca devadattaḥ ca pacāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_14: . kim kāraṇam . śeṣatvāt . śeṣe prathamaḥ iti prathamaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_15: pratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . yuṣmadasmadoḥ pratiṣedhāt . śeṣe prathamḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_16: na iti vaktavyam . yuṣmadi madhyamāt asmadi uttamaḥ pratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_17: asmadi uttamaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_18: tvam pacasi . asmadi uttamaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ aham pacāmi . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_19: tvam ca aham ca pacāvaḥ . asmadi uttamaḥ iti etat bhavati virpratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_20: vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktvayaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tyadādīnām yat yat param tat tat śiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_21: iti evam asmadaḥ śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva siddham . anekaśeṣabhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_22: tu . anekaśeṣabhāvārtham tu saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yadā ca ekaśeṣaḥ na . kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_23: ca ekaśeṣaḥ na . sahavivakṣāyām ekaśeṣaḥ . yadā na sahavivakṣā tada ekaśeṣaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_24: . na vā yuṣmadasmadoḥ anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api anekaśeṣabhāvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_25: . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_26: api yuṣmadasmadadhikaraṇānām api ekaśeṣena na bhavitavyam . tvam ca aham ca pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_27: pacāmi ca iti . kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvadarśanam anumānam uttaratra anekaśeṣabhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_28: . kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvam dṛśyate . tat yathā pacasi pacāmi ca tvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_29: aham ca iti . tat anumānam uttarayoḥ api kriyayoḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_30: ca kṛtvā saḥ pi adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_31: śeṣatvāt iti . tatra api hi evam bhavitavyam tvam ca devadattaḥ ca pacasi pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_32: ca . aham ca devadattaḥ ca pacāmi pacati ca iti . yat tāvat ucyate na vā yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_33: anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api anekaśeṣabhāvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ iti . dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_34: hi yuṣmadasmadoḥ cānekaśeṣaḥ tadadhikaraṇānām ca ekaśeṣaḥ . tat yathā tvam ca aham
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_35: ca vṛttrahan ubhau samprayujyāvahai iti . yat api ucyate kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvadarśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_36: anumānam uttaratra anekaśeṣabhāvasya iti . kriyāpṛthaktve khalu api dravyaikaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_37: bhavati iti dṛśyate . tat yathā akṣāḥ bhajyantām bhakṣyantām dīvyantām iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_38: ca kṛtvā saḥ api doṣo bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_39: śeṣatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parihṛtam etat siddham tu yuṣmadasmadoḥ pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_40: iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . śeṣe prathamaḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_41: na hi śeṣaḥ ca anyaḥ ca śeṣagrahaṇena gṛhyate . bhavet prathamaḥ na syān . madhyamottamau
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_42: api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau ucyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_43: na ca yuṣmadasmadī anyaḥ ca yuṣmadasmadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . yat atra yuṣmat yat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_44: asmat tattadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhaviṣyataḥ . yathā eva tarhi yat atra yuṣmat
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_45: yat ca smat tadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhavataḥ evam yaḥ atra śeṣaḥ tadāśrayaḥ prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_46: prāpnoti . evam tarhi śeṣe upapade prathamaḥ vidhīyate . upoccāri padam upapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_47: . yat ca atra upoccāri na saḥ śeṣaḥ yaḥ ca śeṣaḥ na tat upoccāri . bhavet prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_48: na syāt . madhyamottamau api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_49: madhyamottamau ucyete . upoccāri padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na te yuṣmadasmadī
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_50: ye ca yuṣmadasmadī na tat upoccāri . evam tarhi śeṣeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇye prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_51: vidhīyate . na ca atra śeṣeṇa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . bhavet prathamaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_52: madhyamottamau api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadbhyām sāmānādhikaraṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_53: madhyamottamau ucyete na ca atra yuṣmadasmadbhyām eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_54: tyadādīni sarvaiḥ nityam iti evam atra yuṣmadasmadoḥ śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra yuṣmadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_55: madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3136: . sthānini api iti prathamaḥ prāpnoti . tyadādīnām khalu api yat yat param tat tat śiṣyate iti yadā bhavataḥ śeṣaḥ tadā prathamaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3139: 477-478 yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva ucyate. tau iha na prāpnutaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3140: paramatvam pacasi . paramāham pacāmi iti . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi tadantavidhinā prāpnutaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3141: atitvam pacati . atyaham pacati iti . ye ca api ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ tatra ca madhyamottamau na prāpnutaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3142_0: tvattaraḥ pacasi mattaraḥ pacāmi iti . tvadrūpaḥ pacasi madrūpaḥ pacāmi iti . tvatkalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3142_1: pacasi . matkalpaḥ pacāmi iti. evam tarhi yuṣmadvati asmadvati iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3143_0: atitvam pacati . atyaham pacati iti . evam tarhi yuṣmadi sādhane asmadi sādhane iti

GS24pmbhasuu:3145_0: 478-484 paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ samhitā cet adrutāyām asaṃhitam . paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃhitā
GS24pmbhasuu:3145_1: cet adrutāyām vṛttau saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti . drutāyām eva hi paraḥ sannikarṣo
GS24pmbhasuu:3145_2: varṇānām na adrutāyām . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ varṇānām drutamadhyamavilimbitāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:3145_3: vṛttiṣu . kiṅkṛtaḥ tarthi viśeṣaḥ . varṇakālabhūyastvam tu . varṇānām tu kālabhūyastvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3145_4: . tat yathā . hastimaśakayoḥ tulyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ prāṇibhūyastvam tu . yadi evam drutāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3145_5: taparakaraṇe madhyamavilimbitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kālabhedāt . drutāyām taparakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3145_6: madhyamavilimbitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . kālabhedāt . ye drutāyām

GS24pmbhasuu:3145_8: vilimbitāyām . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt

GS24pmbhasuu:3146_1: saṃhā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate . hrādāvirāme sparśāghoṣasaṃyoge asannidhānāt asaṃhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3146_2: . hrādāvirāme sparśānām aghoṣāṇām saṃyoge asamnidhānāt saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:3146_7: . atha vā paurvāparyam akālavyapetam saṃhitā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate. paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3146_8: akālavyapetam saṃhitā cet pūrvāparābhāvāt asaṃhitam . paurvāparyam akālavyapetam
GS24pmbhasuu:3146_9: saṃhitā cet pūrvāparābhāvāt saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi varṇānām paurvāparyam

GS24pmbhasuu:3146_11: . ekaikavarṇavartinī vāk . na dvau yugapat uccārayati . gauḥ iti yāvat gakāre vāk
GS24pmbhasuu:3146_12: vartate na aukāre na visarjanīye . yāvat aukāre na gakāre na visarjanīye . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3146_13: visarjanīye na gakāre na aukāre . uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt . uccaritapradhvaṃsinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3146_14: khalu api varṇāḥ . uccaritaḥ pradhvastaḥ . atha aparaḥ prayujyate . na varṇaḥ varṇasya

GS24pmbhasuu:3153_0: 491-496 vidhiḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . vipūrvāt dhāñaḥ karmasādhanaḥ ikāraḥ . vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_1: vidhiḥ iti . kim punaḥ vidhīyate . samāsaḥ vibhaktividhānam parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_2: kim punaḥ ayam adhikāraḥ āhosvit paribhāṣā . kaḥ punaḥ adhikāraparibhāṣayoḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_3: . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_4: punaḥ ekadeśasthā satī sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati pradīpavat . tat yathā pradīpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_5: suprajvalitaḥ ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . kaḥ punaḥ atra prayatnaviśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_6: . adhikāre sati svarayitavyam paribhāṣāyām punaḥ satyām sarvam apekṣyam . tathā idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_7: aparam dvaitam bhavati . ekārthībhāvaḥ vā sāmarthyam syāt vyapekṣā vā iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_8: ekārthībhāve sāmarthye adhikāre ca sati samāsaḥ ekaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati bibhaktividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_9: parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca asaṅgṛhītaḥ . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye adhikāre ca sati bibhaktividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_10: parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca saṅgṛhītaḥ samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . anyatra khalu api samarthagrahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_11: yuktagrahaṇāni ca kartavyāni bhavanti . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye na cavāhāhaivayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_12: iti . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye paribhāṣāyām ca satyām yāvān vyākaraṇe padagandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_13: asti saḥ sarvaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . tatra ekārthībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_14: sāmarthyam paribhāṣā ca iti evam sūtram abhinnatarakam bhavati . evam api kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_15: akartavyam samarthagrahaṇam kriyate kva cit ca kartavyam na kriyate . akartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_16: tāvat kriyate samarthānām prathamāt vā iti . kartavyam ca na kriyate karmaṇi aṇ samarthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_17: iti . nanu ca gamyate tatra sāmarthyam . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ iti . satyam gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3153_18: utpanne tu pratyaye . saḥ eva tāvat samarthāt utpādyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3155_0: 496-504 atha samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . vakṣyati dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ samasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3155_1: . kaṣṭaśritaḥ narakaśritaḥ iti . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . paśya devadatta kaṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3155_2: . śritaḥ viṣṇumitraḥ gurukulam . tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena guṇavacanena . śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3155_3: kirikāṇaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . tiṣṭha tvam śaṅkulayā . khaṇḍaḥ dhāvati
GS24pmbhasuu:3155_4: musalena . caturthī tadarthārthabalihitasukharakṣitaiḥ . gohitam aśrahitam . samarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3155_5: kimartham . sukham gobhyaḥ . hitam devadattāya . pañcamī bhayena . vṛkabhayam dasyubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3155_6: corabhayam . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . gaccha tvam mā vṛkebhyaḥ . bhayam devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3157: brāhmaṇakambalaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . bhāryā rājñaḥ . puruṣaḥ devadattasya . saptamī śauṇḍaiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3159_0: strīśauṇḍaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . kuśalaḥ devadattaḥ akṣeṣu . śauṇḍaḥ pibati
GS24pmbhasuu:3159_1: pānāgāre . atha kriyamāṇe api samarthagrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati mahat kaṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3159_2: śritaḥ iti . na vā bhavati mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ iti . bhavati yadā etat vākyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3161: mahākaṣṭam śritaḥ mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_0: mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā ca prapnoti . tadā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_1: . kasya kasmāt na bhavati . kim dvayoḥ āhosvit bahūnām . bahūnām kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_2: . sup supā iti vartate . nanu ca bhoḥ ākṛtau śāstrāṇi pravartante . tat yathā prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_3: iti vartamāne anyasmāt ca anyasmāt ca prātipadikāt utpattiḥ bhavati . satyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_4: . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam parisamāpyate . yāvati etat parisamāpyate prātipadikāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_5: tāvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . pratyekam ca etat parisamāpyate na samudāye . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_6: iha api yāvati etat parisamāpyate sup supā iti tāvataḥ samāsena bhavitavyam . dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_7: dvayoḥ ca etat parisamāpyate na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_8: . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yadi sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_9: bhavati iti ucyate rājapuruṣaḥ abhirūpaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ darśanīyaḥ atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_10: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānam atra sāpekṣam . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:3162_11: samāsaḥ . yatra tarhi apradhānam sāpekṣam bhavati tatra te vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3165: devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyapekṣā atra ṣaṣṭḥī sarvam gurukulam apekṣate . yatra tarhi na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī tatra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3166: kim odanaḥ śālīnām . saktvāḍhakam āpaṇīyānām . kutaḥ bhavān pāṭaliputrakaḥ . iha ca api :
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_0: yadi eṣā samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī syāt na etat niyogataḥ gamyeta devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_1: tasya yaḥ putraḥ iti . kim tarhi . anyasya api guruputraḥ devadattasya kim cit iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_2: eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyeta . yataḥ tu niyogataḥ devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ tasya yaḥ putraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_3: iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyate ataḥ manyāmahe na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī iti . anyatra khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_4: api samarthagrahaṇe sāpekṣasya api kāryam bhavati . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_5: . brāhamaṇasya sarpiḥ karoti iti . tasmāt na aeta śakyak vaktum sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_6: bhavati iti . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . saviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_7: vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti vaktavyam . yadi saviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_8: vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti ucyate devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_9: guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . agurukulaputrādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_10: iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_11: na prayujyate agurukulaputrādīnām iti . na vaktavyam . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_12: . agamakatvāt . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam samāsena ca . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_13: vākyena gamyate mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti na jātu cit samāsena asau gamyate mahat kaṣṭaśritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_14: iti . etasmāt hetoḥ brūmaḥ agamakatvāt iti . na brūmaḥ apaśabdaḥ syāt iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3170_15: gamakaḥ bhavati bhavati tatra vṛttiḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3173_0: devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . yadi agamakatvam hetuḥ na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3173_1: . iha api bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ devadattasya iti yaḥ arthaḥ vākyena gamyate na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:3173_2: jātu cit samāsena asau gamyate bhārya rājapuruṣaḥ devadattasya iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3174_0: tarhi prayojanam . asti asamarthasamāsaḥ nañsamāsaḥ gamakaḥ . tasya sādhutvam mā
GS24pmbhasuu:3174_1: bhūt . akiñcit kurvāṇam amāṣam haramāṇam agādhāt utsṛṣṭam iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3174_2: prayojanam . avaśyam kasya cit nañsamāsasya gamakasya sādhutvam vaktavyam . asūryampaśyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3174_3: mukhāni apunargeyāḥ ślokāḥ aśrāddhabhojī alavaṇabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ . suṭ anapuṃsakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3174_4: etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . etasya eva asamarthasamāsasya nañsamāsasya gamakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3174_5: sādhutvam bhavati na anyasya iti . tasmān na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_0: 505-516 atha kriyamāṇe api samarthagrahaṇe samartham iti ucyate kim samartham nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_1: . pṛthagarthānām ekārthībhāvaḥ samarthavacanam . pṛthagarthānām padānam ekārthībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_2: samartham iti ucyate . vākye pṛthagarthāni rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse punaḥ ekārthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_3: rājapuruṣaḥ iti . kim ucyate pṛthagarthāni iti yāvatā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ ānīyatām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_4: ukte rājapuruṣaḥ iti ca saḥ eva . na api brūmaḥ anyasya ānayanam bhavati iti . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_5: tarhi ekārthībhāvakṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . subalopaḥ vyavadhānam yatheṣṭam anyatareṇa abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_6: svaraḥ . supaḥ alopaḥ bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse punaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_7: . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . vyavadhānam ca bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ ṛddhasya puruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_8: samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . yatheṣṭam anyatareṇa abhisambandhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_9: vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_10: dvau svarau bhavataḥ vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ . samāse punaḥ ekaḥ eva . rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_11: iti . na ete ekārthībhāvakṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ . kim tarhi . vācanikāni etāni . āha hi bhagavān
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_12: supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ upasarjanam pūrvam samāsasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_13: . ime tarhi ekārthībhāvkṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ vyaktābhidānam lkupasarjanaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_14: cayogaḥ iti . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñoḥ puruṣaḥ rājñām
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_15: puruṣaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_16: . kim kāraṇam . yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt . aṅga hi bhavān tam uccārayatu
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_17: gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdakṛtena nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_18: arthena bhavitavyam . arthakṛtena nāma śabdena bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_19: . artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti . avaśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_20: etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3176_21: viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti iha tasya viśeṣaḥ gamyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_0: apsucaraḥ goṣucaraḥ varṣāsujaḥ iti . vyaktābhidhānam bhavati vākye . brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_1: kambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . samāse punaḥ avyaktam . brāhmaṇakambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . sandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_2: bhavati sambuddhiḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ vā iti . eṣaḥ api aviśeṣaḥ . bhavati hi kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_3: cit vākye avyaktam tat ca samāse vyaktam . vākye tāvat avyaktam . ardham paśoḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_4: iti . sandehaḥ bhavati paśuguṇasya vā devadattasya yat ardham artha vā yaḥ asau sañjñībhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_5: paśuḥ nāma tasya yat ardham iti . tat ca samāse vyaktam bhavati . ardhhapaśuḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_6: iti . upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati vākye . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse na
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_7: bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . eṣaḥ api adoṣaḥ . samāse api upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_8: . tat yathā devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_9: iti . cayogaḥ bhavati vākye . svacayogaḥ svāmicayogaḥ ca . svacayogaḥ rājñaḥ gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_10: ca aśvaḥ ca puruṣaḥ ca iti . samāse na bhavati . rājñaḥ gavāśvapuruṣāḥ iti . svāmicayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_11: devadattasya ca yajñadattasya ca viṣṇumitrasya ca gauḥ iti . samāse na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_12: devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrāṇām gauḥ iti . atha etasmin ekārthībhāvkṛte viśeṣe kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_13: svābhāvikam śabdaiḥ arthābhidhānam āhosvit vācanikam . svābhāvikam iti āha . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_14: etat . arthānādeśāt . na hi arthāḥ ādiśyante . katham punaḥ arthān ādiśan evam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_15: na arthāḥ ādiśyante it . yat āha bhavān anekam anyapadārthe cārthe dvandvaḥ apatye
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_16: rakte nirvṛtte iti . na etāni arthādeśanāni . svabhāvataḥ eteṣām śabdānām eteṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_17: abhiniviṣṭānām nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . tat yathā . kūpe hastadakṣiṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_18: panthāḥ . abhre candramasam paśya iti . svabhāvataḥ tatrasthasya pathaḥ candramasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_19: ca nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . evam iha api cārthe yaḥ saḥ dvandvasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_20: anyapadārthaḥ yaḥ saḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti . kim puna kāraṇam na ādiśyante . tat ca laghvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_21: . laghvartham hi arthāḥ na ādiśyante . avaśyam hi anena arthān ādiśatā kena cit śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_22: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt . tasya ca tāvat kena kṛtaḥ yena asau kriyate . atha tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_23: kena cit kṛtaḥ tasya kena kṛtaḥ iti anavasthā . asambhavaḥ khalu api ādeśaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_24: . kaḥ hi nāma samarthaḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām arthān ādeṣṭum . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_25: etat mantavyam pratyayārthe nirdiṣṭe prakṛtyarthaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ iti . bhavati hi guṇābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3177_26: guṇinaḥ sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_0: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmanyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_1: viśeṣam prakaraṇam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_2: ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cit eva viśeṣe vṛkṣaśabdaḥ vartate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_3: sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_4: pratyayārthe vartate . apravṛttiḥ khalu api arthādeśanasya . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ yeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_5: arthāḥ na vijñāyante . jarbharī turpharītū . antareṇa khalu api śabdaprayogam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_6: arthāḥ gamyante akṣinikocaiḥ pāṇivihāraiḥ ca . na khalu api nirjñātasya arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_7: anvyākhyane kim cit prayojanam asti . yaḥ hi brūyāt purastāt ādityaḥ udeti paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_8: astam eti madhuraḥ guḍaḥ kaṭukam śṛṅgaveram iti kim tena kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3180_0: 516 vāvacanānarthakyam ca svabhāvasiddhatvāt . vāvacanānarthakyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3180_1: svabhāvasiddhatvāt . iha dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvataḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3180_2: etat bhavati vākyam ca samāsaḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye samāse prapte
GS24pmbhasuu:3180_3: vāvacanena kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3180_4: bhāvābhāvau iṣyete . tasmāt na arthaḥ vā vacanena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_0: 517-525 atha ye vṛttim vartayanti kim te āhuḥ . parārthābhidhānam vṛttiḥ iti āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_1: . atha teṣām evam bruvatām kim jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ āhosvit ajahatsvārthā . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_2: ataḥ . yadi jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_3: prāpnoti aupagavam ānaya iti ukte apatyamātrasya . atha ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_4: vidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti . kā punaḥ vṛttiḥ nyāyyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_5: . jahatsvārthā . yuktam punaḥ yat jahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . bāḍham yuktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_6: evam hi dṛśyate loke . puruṣaḥ ayam parakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_7: tat yathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti . evam yuktam yat rājā puruṣārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_8: vartamānaḥ svam artham jahyāt upaguḥ ca apartyārthe vartamānaḥ svam artham jahyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_9: . nanu ca uktam rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam prāpnoti aupagavam
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_10: ānaya iti ukte apatyamātrasya iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . jahat api asau svārtham na atyantāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_11: jahāti . yaḥ parārthavirodhī svārthaḥ tam jahāti . tat yathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_12: svam takṣakarma jahāti na hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni . na ca ayam arthaḥ parārthavirodhī
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_13: viśeṣaṇam nāma . tasmāt na hāsyati . atha vā anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_14: . ghṛtaghaṭaḥ tailaghaṭaḥ iti niṣikte ghṛte taile vā anvyayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_15: ghṛtaghaṭaḥ ayam tailaghaṭaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_16: ca arthamātrā . aṅga hi bhavān agnau niṣṭapya ghṛtaghaṭam tṛṇakūrcena prakṣālayatu
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_17: . na gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . yathā tarhi mallikāpuṭaḥ campakaputaḥ iti niṣkīrṇāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_18: api sumanaḥsu anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam mallikapuṭaḥ ayam campakapuṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3182_19: atha vā samarthādhikāraḥ ayam vṛttau kriyate . sāmartham nama bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_0: bhedasaṃsargau vā sāmarthyam iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā . iha rājñaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_1: ukte sarvam svam prasaktam puruṣaḥ iti ukte sarvaḥ svāmi prasaktaḥ . iha idānīm rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_2: iti ukte rājā puruṣam nivartayati anyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ puruṣaḥ api rājānam anyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_3: svebhyaḥ . evam etasmin ubhayataḥ vyavacchinne yadi jahāti kāmam jahātu . na jātu
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_4: cit puruṣamātrasya ānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_5: . yuktam punaḥ yat ajahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . bāḍham yuktam . evam hi dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_6: loke . bhikṣukaḥ ayam dvitīyām bhikṣām āsādya pūrvām na jahāti sañcayāya pravartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_7: . nanu ca uktam ubhayoḥ vidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_8: iti . kasyāḥ punaḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti . prathāmāyāḥ . na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_9: . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tarhi . na ṣaṣṭhīsamarthaḥ puruṣaḥ . prathamāyāḥ eva tarhi prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_10: nanu ca uktam na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā iti . abhinihitaḥ saḥ saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_11: prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamāyāḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_12: prāpnoti . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt na avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ . saṅghātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_13: ekatvam arthaḥ . tena avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . parasparavyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_14: sāmarthyem eke . parasparavyapekṣā sāmarthyem eke icchanti . kā punaḥ śabdayoḥ vyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_15: . na brūmaḥ śabdayoḥ iti . kim tarhi . arthayoḥ . iha rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti ukte rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_16: puruṣam apekṣate mama ayam iti . puruṣaḥ api rājānam apekṣate aham asya iti . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3183_17: abhisambandhasya ṣaṣṭhī vācikā bhavati . tathā kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti kriyākārakayoḥ abhisambandhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_0: 525-531 atha yadi eva ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam atha api vyapekṣā sāmarthyam kim gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_1: etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_2: āha . katham . samaḥ ayam arthaśabdena saha samāsaḥ . sam ca upasargaḥ . upasargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_3: ca punaḥ evamātmakāḥ yatra kaḥ cit kriyāvācī śabdaḥ prayujyate tatra kriyāviśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_4: āhuḥ . na ca iha kaḥ cit kriyāvācī śabdaḥ prayujyate yena samaḥ sāmarthyam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_5: tatra prayogāt etat gantavyam nūnam atra kaḥ cit prayogārhaḥ śabdaḥ na prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_6: yena samaḥ sāmarthyam iti . tat yathā . dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ atra iti gamyate triviṣṭabdhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_7: ca dṛṣṭvā parivrājakaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asau prayogārhaḥ śabdaḥ . ucyate . saṅgatārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_8: samartham saṃsṛṣṭārtham samartham samprekṣitam artham samartham sambaddhārtham samartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_9: iti . tat yadā tāvat ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate saṅgatārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_10: saṃsṛṣṭārthaḥ samarthaḥ iti . tat yathā saṅgatam ghṛtam saṅgatam tailam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_11: . ekībhūtam iti gamyate . yadā vyapekṣā sāmarthyam tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate samprekṣitārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_12: samarthaḥ sambaddhārthaḥ samarthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ iha badhnātyarthaḥ . sambaddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_13: iti ucyate yaḥ rajjvā ayasā vā kīle vyatiṣiktaḥ bhavati . na avaśyam badhnātiḥ vyatiṣaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_14: eva vartate . kim tarhi . ahānau api vartate . tat yathā sambaddhau imau damyau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_15: ucyete yau anyonyam na jahītaḥ . atha vā bhavati ca evañjātīyakeṣu badhnātiḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_16: . tat yathā . asti naḥ gargaiḥ sambandhaḥ . asti naḥ vatsaiḥ sambandhaḥ . saṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_17: iti arthaḥ . atha etasmin vyapekṣāyām sāmarthye yaḥ asau ekārthībhāvkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_18: sa vaktavyaḥ . tatra nānākārakāt nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśepratiṣedhaḥ . tatra etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_19: vyapekṣāyām sāmarthye nānākārakāt nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_20: vaktavyaḥ . nighātaḥ . ayam daṇḍaḥ . hara anena . asti daṇḍasya harateḥ ca vyapekṣā

GS24pmbhasuu:3185_22: odanam paca mama bhaviṣyati . asti odanasya yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca vyapekṣā iti kṛtvā vāmnāvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3185_23: prāpnuvanti . teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim ucyate nānākārakāt iti yadā tena

GS24pmbhasuu:3185_30: . pracaye samāsapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rājñaḥ gauḥ ca aśvaḥ ca puruṣaḥ ca rājagavāśvapuruṣāḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3185_32: samarthatarāṇi . yāni dvandvabhāvīni . kutaḥ etat . eṣām hi āśutarā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:3186_1: dvandvabhāvīni . kutaḥ etat . etāni samānavibhaktīni anyavibhaktiḥ rājā . bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:3186_3: vā punaḥ siddham etat . samudāyena rājñaḥ sāmarthyam bhavati na avayavena . aparaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3186_5: bhavati . kutaḥ etat . samudāyasāmarthyāt eva . asmin pakṣe vā iti etat asamarthitam

GS24pmbhasuu:3189_0: ākhyātam saviśeṣaṇam iti eva . sarvāṇi hi etāni kriyāviśeṣaṇāni . ekatiṅ . ekatiṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_1: vākyasañjñam bhavati vaktavyam . brūhi brūhi . samānavākye nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_2: . samānavākye iti prakṛtya nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ vaktavyāḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_3: nānāvākye mā bhūvan nighātādayaḥ iti . ayam daṇḍaḥ . hara anena . odanam paca . tava
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_4: bhaviṣyati . odanam paca . mama bhaviṣyati . yoge pratiṣedhaḥ cādibhiḥ . cādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_5: yoge pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . grāmaḥ tava ca svam mama ca svam . kimartham icam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3189_6: . yathānyāsam eva cādibhiḥ yoge pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . idam adya apūrvam kriyate vākyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_0: sarvam etat vikalpate iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe cādibhiḥ yoge yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_1: eva bhavati iti . samarthanighāte hi samānādhikaraṇayuktayukteṣu upasaṅkhyānam asamarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_2: . samarthanighāte hi samānādhikaraṇayuktayukteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam syāt . samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_3: . paṭave te dāsyāmi . mrdave te dāsyāmi . samānādhikaraṇe . yuktayukte . nadyāḥ tiṣṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_4: kūle . vṛkṣasya lambate śākhā . śālīnām te odanam dadāmi . śālīnām me odanam dadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_5: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asamarthatvāt . rājagavīkṣīre dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_6: dviṣaṣṭhībhāvāt . rājagavīkṣīre dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dviṣaṣṭhībhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_7: . dve hi atra ṣaṣṭhyau . rājñaḥ goḥ kṣīram iti . kim ucyate dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_8: yāvatā sup saha supā iti vartate . dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_9: subantayoḥ samāsaprasaṅgaḥ dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti . katham tarhi . dviprakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_10: samāsasya prasaṅgaḥ dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti . rājagokṣīram iti api prāpnoti na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_11: evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca yadā etat vākyam bhavati goḥ kṣīram gokṣīram rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_12: gokṣīram rājagokṣīram iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati rājñaḥ goḥ kṣīram iti tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_13: na bhavitavyam tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā kasmāt na bhavati . siddham tu rājaviśiṣṭāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_14: goḥ kṣīreṇa sāmarthyāt . siddham etat . katham . rājaviśiṣṭāyāḥ goḥ kṣīreṇa saha
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_15: samāsaḥ bhavati na kevalāyāḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_16: . yathā eva ayam gavi yatate na kṣīramātreṇa santoṣam karoti evam rājani api yatate
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_17: . rājñaḥ yā gauḥ tasyāḥ yat kṣīram iti . na eva vā punaḥ atra goḥ rājānam apekṣamāṇāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_18: kṣīreṇa saha samāsaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_19: sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . katham tarhi goḥ kṣīram apekṣamāṇāyāḥ rājñā saha
GS24pmbhasuu:3190_20: samāsaḥ bhavati . pradhānam atra tada gauḥ bhavati . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_0: 537-540 atha kimartham padavidhau samarthādhikāraḥ kriyate . padavidhau samarthavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_1: varṇāśraye śāstre ānantaryavijñānāt. padavidhau samarthādhikāraḥ kriyate varṇāśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_2: śāstre ānantaryamātre kāryam yathā vijñāyeta . tiṣṭhatu dadhi aśāna tvam śākena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_3: tiṣṭhatu kumārī chatram hara devadatta iti . samarthādhikārasya vidheyasāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_4: nirdeśānarthakyam . samarthādhikāraḥ ayam vidheyena samānādhikaraṇaḥ . kim ca vidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_5: . samāsaḥ . yāvat brūyāt samarthaḥ samāsaḥ iti tāvat samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_6: rājapuruṣaḥ iti etasyām avasthāyām samarthādhikāreṇa kim cit api śakyam pravartayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_7: nivartayitum vā . samarthādhikārasya vidheyasāmānādhikaraṇyāt nirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_8: . siddham tu samarthānām iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . samarthānām padānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_9: vidhiḥ iti vaktavyam . evam api dvyekayoḥ na prāpnoti . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt vā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_10: vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam. samarthasya ca samarthayoḥ ca samarthānām ca samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_11: iti . evam api ṣaṭprabhṛtīnām eva prāpnoti . ṣaṭprabhṛtiṣu hi ekaśeṣaḥ parisamāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_12: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti dvyekayoḥ api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3192_13: . evam api vivibhaktīnām na prāpnoti . samarthāt samarthe padāt pade iti . evam tarhi
