GS24pmbhasuu:3202_1: kartavyam . vīraḥ pūruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asamarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_2: . katham asamarthatvam . dravyam padārthaḥ iti cet. yadi dravyam padārthaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_3: tadā sāmarthyam . atha hi guṇaḥ padārthaḥ bhavati tadā sāmarthyam . anyaḥ hi vīratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_4: guṇaḥ anyaḥ hi puruṣatvam . na anyatvam asti iti iyatā sāmarthyam bhavati . anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_5: hi devadattaḥ gobhyaḥ aśvebhyaḥ ca na ca tasya etāvatā sāmartham bhavati . kaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_6: viśeṣaḥ yat guṇe padārthe sāmarthyam syāt dravye ca na syāt . eṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ . ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_7: tayoḥ adhikaraṇam anyaḥ ca vīratvam guṇaḥ anyaḥ puruṣatvam . dravyapadārthikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_8: api tarhi guṇabhedāt sāmarthyam bhaviṣyati . aśakyaḥ dravyapadārthikena dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_9: guṇakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ pratijñātum . nanu ca abhyantaraḥ asau bhavati . yadi api abhyantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_10: na tu gamyate . na hi guḍaḥ iti ukte madhuratvam gamyate śṛṅgaveram iti vā kaṭukatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_11: . guṇapadārthikena api tarhi aśakyaḥ guṇasya dravyakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ pratijñātum . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_12: guṇapadārthikaḥ pratijānīte dravyapadārthikaḥ api kasmāt na pratijānīte . evam anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3202_13: sāmarthyam syāt vā na vā . kva ca tāvat idam syāt samānādhikaraṇena iti . yatra sarvam samāman :
GS24pmbhasuu:3203_0: indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ . kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . na evañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3203_1: samāsena bhavitavyam pratyayena vā utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3203_2: . artham pratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3203_3: dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3203_4: tarhi idānīm idam bhavati bhṛtyabharaṇīyaḥ iti . na etau samānārthau . ekaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3204_0: śakyaḥ bhartum bhṛtyaḥ . arhati bhṛtim bharaṇīyaḥ . bhṛtyaḥ bharaṇīyaḥ bhṛtyabharaṇīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3204_1: iti . yadi tarhi yatra kim cit samānam kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ tatra bhavitavyam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3204_2: tarhi prāpnoti . darśanīyāyāḥ mātā darśanīyamātā iti . atra api kim cit samānam kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3204_3: cit viśeṣaḥ . kim punaḥ tat . sadbhāvānyabhāvau . na kva cit sadbhāvānyabhāvau na
GS24pmbhasuu:3204_4: staḥ ucyate ca samānādhikaraṇena iti . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_0: yatra sādhīyaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam . kva ca sādhīyaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam . yatra sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_1: samānam sadbhāvānyabhāvau dravyam ca. atha vā samānādhikaraṇena iti tat samānam āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_2: yat samānam bhavati na ca bhavati . na ca etat samānam kva cit api na bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_3: vā yāvat brūyāt samānadravyeṇa iti tāvat samānādhikaraṇena iti . dravyam hi loke
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_4: adhikaraṇam iti ucyate . tat yathā . ekasmin dravye vyuditam . ekasmin adhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_5: vyuditam iti . tathā vyākaraṇe vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇavāci iti adravyavāci
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_6: iti gamyate . evam api idam avaśyam kartavyam samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_7: iti . kim prayojanam . sarpiḥ kālakam yajuḥ pītakam iti evamartham . yadi samānādhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_8: asamarthavat bhavati iti ucyate sarpiḥ pīyate yajuḥ kriyate iti atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_9: . adhātvabhihitam iti evam tat . evam ca kṛtvā samānādhikaraṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_10: . vīraḥ pūruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam asamarthatvāt . na vā vacanaprāmāṇyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_11: na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . vacanaprāmāṇyāt . vacanaprāmāṇyāt atra samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_12: . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam . samānamadhyamadhyamavīrāḥ ca iti . luptākhyāteṣu ca . luptākhyāteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_13: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ . luptākhyāteṣu ca . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_14: vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam . kugatiprādayaḥ ca iti . asti anyat etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_15: vacane prayojanam . kim . surājā atirājā iti . na brūmaḥ vṛttisūtravacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_16: iti . kim tarhi . vārttikavacanaprāmāṇyāt iti . siddham tu kvāṅksvatidurgativacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_17: prādayaḥ ktārthe iti . tadarthagateḥ vā . tadarthagateḥ vā punaḥ siddham etat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_18: idam tadarthagateḥ iti . tasya arthaḥ tadarthaḥ tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ tadarthagateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_19: iti . yasya arthasya kauśāmbyā sāmarthyam saḥ nisā ucyate . atha vā saḥ arthaḥ tadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3205_20: tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ tadarthagateḥ iti . yaḥ arthaḥ kauśāmbyā samarthaḥ saḥ nisā ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3207_0: 547-554 atha yatra bahūnām samāsaprasaṅgaḥ kim tatra dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3207_1: āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . samāsaḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ cet dvandve anekagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3207_2: . samāsaḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ cet dvandve anekagrahaṇam kartavyam . carthe dvandvaḥ . anekam

GS24pmbhasuu:3207_5: dvitvābhāvāt . dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . bahuṣu dvitvābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3207_6: . na bahuṣu dvitvam asti . na avaśyam evam vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3208: plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca khadiraḥ ca palāśaḥ ca iti . kim tarhi evam vighrahaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_0: plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca plakṣanyagrodhau khadiraḥ ca palāśaḥ ca khadirapalāśau plakṣanyagrodhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_1: ca khadirapalāśau plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ iti . hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_2: na sidhyanti . hotāpotāneṣṭodgātāraḥ iti prāpnoti . na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_3: ca yadā evam vigrahaḥ kriyate hotā ca potā ca hotāpotārau neṣṭā ca udgātā ca neṣṭodgātārau
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_4: hotāpotārau ca neṣṭodgātārau ca hotāpotāneṣṭodgātāraḥ iti . hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_5: tu na sidhyanti . samāsāntapratiṣedhaḥ ca . samāsāntasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_6: . vāktvaksrugdṛṣadam iti . vāktvacasrugdṛṣadam iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_7: api pareṇa pareṇa saha samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . sruk ca dṛṣadam ca srugdṛṣadam tvak ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_8: srugdṛṣadam ca tvaksrugdṛṣadam vāk ca tvaksrugdṛṣadam ca vāktvaksrugdṛṣadam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_9: hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ evam tarhi sidhyanti . iha ca susukṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājivāsanā
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_10: samantaśitirandhreṇa dvayoḥ vṛttau na sidhyati . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_11: bahuvrīhau anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa bahuvrīhau anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_12: kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra svarasamāsāntapuṃvadbhāveṣu doṣaḥ . tatra svarasamāsāntapuṃvadbhāveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_13: doṣaḥ bhavati . svara . pūrvaśālāpriyaḥ aparaśālāpriyaḥ . svara . samāsānta . pañcagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_14: . samāsānta . puṃvadbhāva . khādiretaraśamyam rauravetarśamyam . na vā avayavatatpuruṣatvāt.
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_15: na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . avayavatatpuruṣatvāt . avayavaḥ atra tatpuruṣasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_16: tadāśrayau samāsāntapuṃvadbhāvau bhaviṣyataḥ . svaraḥ katham . tasya antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_17: vipratiṣedhāt . antodāttatvam kriyatām pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaraḥ iti antodāttatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_18: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param iti ucyate . pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_19: ca antodāttatvam param pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam . na paravipratiṣedham brūmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_20: kim tarhi . antaraṅgavipratiṣedham . nimittisvarabalīyastvāt vā . atha vā nimittasvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_21: nimittisvaraḥ balīyān iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_22: nimittam tatpuruṣaḥ nimittī . tat tarhi vaktavyam nimittasvarāt nimittisvaraḥ balīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_23: iti . na vaktavyam . ekaśitipātsvaravacanam tu jñāpakam nimittisvarabalīyastvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_24: . yat ayam yuktārohyādiṣu ekaśitipacchabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ nimittasvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_25: nimittisvaraḥ balīyān iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati yuktārohyādiṣu ekaśitipacchabdam paṭhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_26: . evam kila nāma paṭhyate ekaḥ śitiḥ ekaśitiḥ ekaḥ śitiḥ pādaḥ yasya iti . tat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_27: na . evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . ekaḥ śitiḥ eṣu te ime ekaśitayaḥ ekaśitayaḥ pādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_28: yasya iti . atha api evam vigrahaḥ kriyate ekaḥ śitiḥ ekaśitiḥ ekaḥ śitiḥ pādaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_29: iti evam api na arthaḥ pāṭhena . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_30: . asya tarhi bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣañjñā prāpnoti susukṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājivāsanā
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_31: samantaśitirandhreṇa iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tasya antodāttatvam vipratiṣedhāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_32: antodāttatvam syāt vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na idam bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_33: lakṣaṇam ārabhyate . kim tarhi . yasya bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣasya tat lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_34: asti tasya antodāttatvam bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . nanu ca asya api asti kim viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_35: viśeṣyeṇa bahulam iti. bahulavacanāt na bhaviṣyati . asya tarhi bahuvrīhyavayavasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_0: iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tasya antodāttatvam vipratiṣedhāt iti antodāttatvam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_1: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_2: na igantaḥ adhikaśatavarṣaḥ iti . iha ca api adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ iti samāsantaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_3: . ḍacprakaraṇe saṅkhyāyāḥ tatpuruṣasya upasaṅkhyānam nistriṃśādyartham iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_4: doṣaḥ . avyayādeḥ iti evam tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam avyayādeḥ iti evam tat . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_5: bhūt gotriṃśat gocatvāriṃśat iti . bahuvrīhisañjñā tarhi prāpnoti. saṅkhyayā avyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_6: saṅkhyeye iti . na saṅkhyām saṅkhyeye vartayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_7: adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇām asya iti . yathā tarhi saḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate tathā pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_8: prāpnoti . katham ca saḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_9: iva abhidhāyitvāt iti . pratyākhyāte tasmin yoge saṅkhyām saṅkhyeye vartayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_10: . tatra evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇi asya iti . sarvatha vayam adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_11: na mucyāmahe . katham . yāvatā saḥ ca yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate ayam ca vigrahaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_12: adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇām asya iti . yat tu tat uktam adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_13: iti saḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . katham . yāvatā saḥ ca yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate ayam ca vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3210_14: asti adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇi asya iti . adhikaśatavarṣaḥ tu na sidhyati . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_0: 555-561 sup iti kimartham . karoṣi aṭan . na etat asti . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_1: . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . idam tarhi . pīḍye
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_2: pīḍyamāna . idam ca api udāharaṇam karoṣi aṭan . nanu ca uktam asāmarthyāt atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_3: bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_4: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . adhātvabhihitam iti evam tat . āmantritasya parāṅgvadbhāve ṣaṣṭhyāmantritakārakavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_5: . āmantritasya parāṅgvadbhāve ṣaṣṭhyantam āmantritakārakam ca parasya aṅgavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_6: iti vaktavyam . ṣaṣthyantam tāvat . madrāṇām rājan magadhānām rājan . āmantritakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_7: . kuṇḍena aṭan . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ parāṅgavadbhāve sati asati vā . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_8: . paraśunā vṛścan . tannimittagrahaṇam vā . tannimittagrahaṇam vā kartavyam. āmantritanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_9: parasya aṅgavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyam anyatarat vaktavyam . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_10: hi subantamātraprasaṅgaḥ . anucyamāne hi etasmin subantramātrasya parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_11: prāpnoti . asya api prasajyeta . kṣtreṇa agne svāyuḥ saṃrabhasya mitreṇa agne mitradheye
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_12: yatasva . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . tannimittagrahaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_13: bhavati . goṣu svāmin aśveṣu svāmin . etat hi na eva ṣaṣthyantam na api āmantritakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_14: . subantasya parāṅgavadbhāve samānādhikaraṇasya upasaṅkhyanam ananantaratvāt . subantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_15: parāṅgavadbhāve samānādhikaraṇasya upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . tīkṣṇayā sūcyā sīvyan
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_16: tīkṣṇena paraśunā vṛścan . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananantaratvāt . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_17: ca parasya parāṅgavadbhāve kṛte pūrvasya api bhaviṣyati . svare avadhāraṇāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_18: svare avadhāraṇāt ca na sidhyati . svare avadhāraṇam kriyate na ānantarye . param
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_19: api chandasi . param api chandasi pūrvasya aṅgavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . ā te pitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_20: marutām sumnam etu . prati tvā duhitaḥ divaḥ . vṛṇīṣva duhitaḥ divaḥ . avyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_21: ca . avyayānām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . uccaiḥ adhīyāna nīcaiḥ adhīyāna . anavyayībhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_22: . anavyayībhāvasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . upāgni adhīyāna pratyagni adhīyāna
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_23: . atha kimartham svare avadhāraṇam kriyate . svare avadhāraṇam subalopārtham . svare
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_24: avadhāraṇam kriyate sublaḥ mā bhūt iti . paraśunā vṛścan . na vā subantaikāntatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_25: . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . subantaikāntatvāt . subantaikāntaḥ parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_26: bhavati . prātipadikaikāntaḥ tu sublope . prātipadikaikāntaḥ tu bhavati sublope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_27: . pratyayalakṣaṇena subantaikāntatā syāt . tasmāt svare avadhāraṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_28: subalopārtham . prātipadikasthāyāḥ supaḥ luk ucyate . tasmāt svaragrahaṇena na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_29: . idam tarhi prayojanam ṣatvaṇatve mā bhūtām iti . kūpe siñcan carma naman iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_30: etat api na asti prayojanam . iha tāvat kūpe siñcan iti svāśrayam padāditvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_31: . carma naman iti pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām agaḥ iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_32: ca samāse etat bhavati pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti . na iti āha . aviśeṣeṇa etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_33: . pūrvam padam pūrvapadam uttaram padam uttarapadam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_0: 561-565 prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacanam sañjñānivṛttyartham . prāgvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_1: samāsasañjñāyāḥ anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane anavakāśāḥ avyayībhāvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_2: sañjñāḥ samāsasañjñām bādheran . tāḥ mā bādhiṣata iti prāgvacanam kriyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_3: kriyamāṇe api prāgvacane yāvatā anavakāśāḥ avyayībhāvādayaḥ sañjñāḥ kasmāt eva na
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_4: bādhante . kriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane satyām samāsasañjñāyām etāḥ avayavasañjñāḥ ārabhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_5: . tatra vacanasamāveśaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsasañjñā api anavakāśā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_6: . sāvakāśā samāsasañjñā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . vispaṣṭādīni avakāśaḥ . vispaṣṭam paṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_7: vispaṣṭapaṭuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ asti avakāśaḥ . eṣā hi ācāryasya śailī lakṣyate yena
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_8: eva avayavakāryam bhavati tena eva samudāyakāryam api bhavati . yena eva avayavakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_9: svaraḥ tena eva samudākāryam api samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . vispaṣṭādīni guṇavacaneṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_10: . idam tarhi kākatālīyam ajākṛpāṇīyam . atra api yena eva avayavakāryam pratyayotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_11: kriyate tena eva samudākāryam samāsasañjñā bhaviṣyati . samāsāt ca tadviṣayāt . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_12: tarhi punārājaḥ punargavaḥ . atra api avaśyam tatpuruṣasañjñā vaktavya tatpuruṣāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_13: samāsāntaḥ yathā syāt . idam tarhi . punarādheyam . atra api avaśyam gatisañjñā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_14: gatikārakopapadāt kṛt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . idam tarhi punarutsyūtam vāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_15: deyam . atra api avaśyam gatisañjñā vaktavyā gatiḥ gatau iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_16: . yadi tat na asti punaścanasau chandasi iti. sati tasmin tena eva siddham . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_17: api ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_0: 565-569 sahavacanam kimartham . sahavacanam pṛthak asamāsārtham . sahagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_1: sahabhūtayoḥ samāsañjñā yathā syāt ekaikasya mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . yadi ekaikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_2: samāsañjñā syāt iha ṛkpādaḥ iti samāsāntaḥ prasajyeta . iha ca rājāśvaḥ iti dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_3: svarau syātām . katham ca kṛtvā ekaikasya sañjñā prāpnoti . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_4: dṛṣṭā . tat yathā vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_5: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_6: ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_7: yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate iha api sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_8: pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam guṇavṛddhisañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ sahagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_9: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat sahagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yogāṅgam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_10: vijñāyeta . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . saha sup samasyate . kena saha
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_11: . samarthena. anuvyācalat anuprāviśat . tataḥ supā . supā ca saha sup samasyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_12: adhikāraḥ ca lakṣaṇam ca . yasya samāsasya anyat lakṣaṇam na asti idam tasya lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_13: bhaviṣyati . punarutsyūtam vāsaḥ deyam punarniṣkṛtaḥ rathaḥ iti . ivena vibhaktyalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_14: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam ca . ivena saha samāsaḥ vibhaktyalopaḥ pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3218_0: 569 kimartham mahatī sañjñā kriyate . anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñayeta . anavyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3218_1: avyayam bhavati iti avyayībhāvaḥ . avyayībhāvaḥ ca samāsaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3220: 569-570 iha kasmāt na bhavati . sumadrāḥ sumagadhāḥ saputraḥ sacchātraḥ iti . samṛddhau sākalye iti ca prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha kaḥ cit samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3225_0: anyapadārthapradhānaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ dvandvaḥ . na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3225_1: gamyate . atha vā na ime samāsārthāḥ nirdiśyante . kim tarhi . avyayārthāḥ nirdiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3225_2: ime . eteṣu artheṣu yat avyayam vartate tat subantena samasyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3227: 570-572 asādṛśye iti kimartham . yathā devadattaḥ tathā yajñadattaḥ iti . asādṛśye iti ucyate . tatra idam na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3228_0: yathāśakti yathābalam iti . kim kāraṇam . yathā iti ayam prakāravacane thāl saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3228_1: sādṛśye vartate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam yathāśabdaḥ asti eva avyutpannam prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:3228_2: vīpsāvācī . asti prakāravacane thāl . tat yat avyutpannam prātipadikam vīpsāvāci
GS24pmbhasuu:3228_3: tasya idam grahaṇam . atha yaḥ prakāravacane thāl tasya grahaṇam kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3228_4: . pūrveṇa prāpnoti sādṛśyasampatti iti . pratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3230: 572 sup iti vartamāne punaḥ subgrahaṇam kimartham . avyayam iti evam tat abhūt submātre yathā syāt . māṣaprati sūpaprati odanaprati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_0: 573-574 akṣādayaḥ tṛtīyāntāḥ pūrvoktasya yathā na tat . akṣādayaḥ tṛtīyāntāḥ pariṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_1: saha samasyante iti vaktavyam . pūrvoktasya yathā na tat . ayathājātīyake dyotye
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_2: . akṣeṇa na tathā vṛttam yathā pūrvam iti akṣapari śalākāpari . ekatve akṣaśalākayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_3: . akṣaśalākayoḥ ca ekavacanāntayoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . akṣābhyām vṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_4: akṣaiḥ vṛttam . kitavavyavahāre ca . kitavavyavahāre iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3232_5: . akṣeṇa idam na vṛttam śakaṭena yathā pūrvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3234_0: 574-575 yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . vibhāṣā iti ayam adhikāraḥ. tataḥ apaparibahirañcavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3234_1: pañcamyā iti . pañcamīgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . subantena iti vartate etaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3234_2: ca karmapravacanīyaiḥ yoge pañcamī vidhīyate . tatra antareṇa api pañcamīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3234_3: pañcamyantena eva samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . bahiḥśabdena yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:3234_4: pañcamī na vidhīyate . tatra api yathā syāt iti . bahirgrāmāt . atha kriyamāṇe api

GS24pmbhasuu:3272_14: pāṇivihāraiḥ ca . tadvācinām śabdānām lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_0: 598-603 kim caturthyantasya tadarthamātreṇa samāsaḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_1: . caturthī tadarthamātreṇa cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . caturthī tadarthamātreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_2: cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ sarvasya caturthyantasya tadarthamātreṇa saha samāsaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_3: . anena api prāpnoti . randhanāya sthālī avahananāya ulūkhalam iti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_4: . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya caturthyantasya tadarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_5: saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti . anupādīyamane viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . balirakṣitābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_6: ca anarthakam vacanam . balirakṣitābhyām ca samāsavacanam anarthakam . yaḥ hi mahārājāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_7: baliḥ mahārājārthaḥ saḥ bhavati . tatra tadarthaḥ iti eva siddham . yadi punaḥ vikṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_8: caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_9: iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_10: kartavyam . aśvaghāsaḥ śvaśrūsuram hastividhā iti . arthena nityasamāsavacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_11: arthśabdena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . brāhmaṇārtham kṣatriyārtham . kim vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_12: prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti ataḥ arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na iti āha sarvathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_13: arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ vigrahaḥ mā bhūt iti . sarvaliṅgatā ca . sarvaliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_14: ca vaktavyā . brāhmaṇārtham payaḥ brāhmaṇārthaḥ sūpaḥ brāhmaṇārthā yavāgūḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_15: kim arthena nityasamāsaḥ ucyate iti ataḥ sarvaliṅgatā vaktavyā . na iti āha . sarvathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_16: sarvaliṅgatā vaktavyā . kim kāraṇam . arthaśabdaḥ ayam puṃliṅgaḥ uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_17: ca tatpuruṣaḥ . tena puṃliṅgasya eva samāsasya abhidhānam syāt strīnapuṃsakaliṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_18: na syāt . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti vaktavyam . aśvaghāsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_19: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_20: . na vaktavyam . yat tāvat ucyate vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_21: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāyapati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_22: balirakiṣitagrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām samāse balirakṣitagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_23: arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . yadi ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_24: na tadarthamātreṇa tataḥ balirakiṣitagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati . yat api ucyate aśvaghāsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_25: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . aśvaghāsādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_26: . yat hi yadartham bhavati ayam api tatra abhisambandhaḥ bhavati asya idam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_27: tat yathā guroḥ idam gurvartham iti . nanu ca svarabhedaḥ bhavati . caturthīsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_28: sati pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena bhavitavyam ṣaṣṭhīsamāse punaḥ antodāttatvena ṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_29: asti bhedaḥ . caturthīsamāse api sati antodāttatvena eva bhavitavyam . katham . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_30: jñāpayati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtisvarā bhavati na caturthīmātram iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_31: caturthī tadarthe arthe kte ca iti arthagrahaṇam ktagrahaṇam ca karoti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_32: jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām arthagrahaṇena ktagrahaṇena ca arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_33: prakṛtisvaratvam . yadi ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā bhavati na caturthīmātram
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_34: tataḥ arthagrahaṇam ktagrahaṇam ca arthavat bhavati .yat api ucyate arthena nityasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_35: vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . sarthappratyayaḥ kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_36: ca eva hi kadā cit vigrahaḥ bhavati . api ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati . yadi sarthappratayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_37: kriyate itsañjñā na prāpnoti . atha api katham cit itsañjñā syāt evam api śryartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_38: bhvartham iti aṅgasya iti iyaṅuvaṅau syātām . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ bhavaiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_39: kim kṛtam bhavati . bhavati vai kaḥ cit asvapadavigrahaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . tat yathā śobhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_40: mukham asyāḥ sumukhī iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi mahadartham iti āttvakapau prasajyetām
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_41: . evam tarhi tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_42: . na ca eva kadā cit ādeśena vigrahaḥ bhavati . api ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_43: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . caturthī subantena
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_44: saha samasyate . tataḥ tadarthārtha . tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_45: bhavati . iha api tarhi samāsaḥ prāpnoti chātrāya rucitam chātrāya svaditam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_46: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tādarthye ya caturthī sā samasyate na caturthīmātram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_47: yat ayam hitasukhagrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_48: hitasukhagrahaṇena arthaḥ tathājātīyakānam samāsaḥ . yadi ca tādarthye yā caturthī
GS24pmbhasuu:3274_49: sā samasyate na caturthīmātram tataḥ hitasukhagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_0: iha api tarhi tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . yūpāya dāru
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_1: yūpadāru rathadāru . vāvacanam vidhāsyate . iha api tarhi vibhāṣā prāprnoti . brāhmaṇāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_2: kṣatriyārtham iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ yaḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_3: tatra tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati anyatra nityaḥ iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_4: ayam balihitagrahaṇam karoti . evam tarhi udakārthaḥ vīvadhaḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt udabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_5: prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ sarvaliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_6: ca . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha brāhmaṇebhyaḥ iti kā eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_7: caturthī . tādarthye iti āha . yadi tādarthye caturthī arthaśabdasya prayogeṇa na
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_8: bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . samāsaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti . vacanāt samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_9: bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā iti . na vaktavyā . liṅgam aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3277_0: 604 atyalpam idam ucyate bhayena iti . bhayabhītabhītibhībhiḥ iti vaktavyam . vṛkāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3277_1: bhayam vṛkabhayam vṛkāt bhītaḥ vṛkabhītaḥ vṛkāt bhītiḥ vṛkabhītiḥ vṛkāt bhīḥ vṛkabhīḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_0: 604 śauṇḍādibhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . akṣadhūrtaḥ strīdhūrtaḥ akṣakitavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3281_1: strīkitavaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahuvacananirdeśāt śauṇḍādibhiḥ iti vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3283_0: 605 dhvāṅkṣeṇa iti arthagrahaṇam . dhvāṅkṣeṇa iti arthagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3283_1: yathā syāt . tīrthakākaḥ iti . kṣepe iti ucyate . kaḥ iha kṣepaḥ nāma . yathā tīrthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3283_2: kākāḥ na ciram sthātāraḥ bhavanti evam yaḥ gurukulāni gatvā na ciram tiṣṭhati sa
GS24pmbhasuu:3285_0: 605 kṛtyaiḥ niyoge yadgrahaṇam . kṛtyaiḥ niyoge iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3285_1: . pūrvāḥṇegeyam sāma prātaḥ adhyeyaḥ anuvākaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3285_2: . ṛṇe iti eva siddham . iha yat yasya niyogataḥ kāryam ṛṇam tasya tat bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3285_3: ṛṇe iti eva siddham . yagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pūrvāhṇe dātavyā bhikṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3287_0: 605 kim udāharaṇam . avataptenakulasthitam te etat . kṣepe iti ucyate . kaḥ iha kṣepaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3287_1: nāma . yathā avatapte nakulāḥ na ciram sthātāraḥ bhavanti evam kāryāṇi ārabhya yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3287_2: na ciram tiṣṭhati sa ucyate avataptenakulasthitam te etat iti . kṣepe saptamyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:3287_3: ktāntena saha samasyate iti ucyate . tatra sagatikena sanakulena ca samāsaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3287_4: . kṣepe gatikārakapūrve uktam . kim uktam . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3289: 606 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . evakārārthaḥ . pātresamitādayaḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . paramam pātresamitāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3291: 606-607 iha kasmāt avyayībhāvaḥ na bhavati . ekā nadī ekanadī . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyā iti prāpnoti . iha kaḥ cit samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3297_0: ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ dvandvaḥ. na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam gamyate . athavā
GS24pmbhasuu:3297_1: avyayībhāvaḥ kriyatām bahuvrīhiḥ iti . bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:3297_2: ekasañjñādhikāre siddham paraṅkāryatve tu na sidhyati . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca avyayībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3297_3: prāpnoti paraṅkāryatvāt ca bahuvrīhiḥ . paraṅkāryatve ca na doṣaḥ . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3297_4: samāhāre avyayībhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ ca avaśyam vaktavyaḥ . sarvam ekanadītare .
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_0: 607-609 samāhāraḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . samāṅpūrvāt harateḥ sarmasādhane ghañ . samāhriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_1: samāhāraḥ iti . yadi karmasādhanaḥ pañca kumāryaḥ samahṛtāḥ pañcakumāri daśakumāri
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_2: gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam na prāpnoti dviguḥ ekavacanam iti etat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_3: vaktavyam . evam tarhi bhāvasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāharaṇam samāhāraḥ . atha bhāvasādhane
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_4: sati kim abhidhīyate . yat tat auttarādharyam . kaḥ punaḥ gavām samāhāraḥ . yat tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_5: arjanam krayaṇam bhiṣaṇam aparaharaṇam vā . yadi evam vikṣipteṣu pūleṣu goṣu carantīṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_6: na sidhyati . evam tarhi samabhyāśīkaraṇam samāhāraḥ . evam api pañcagrāmī ṣaṇṇagarī
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_7: tripurī iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . sam ekatvavācī āṅ ābhimukhye vartate haratiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_8: deśāntaraprāpaṇe . na avaśyam haratiḥ deśāntaraprāpaṇe eva vartate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_9: sādṛśye api vartate . tat yathā mātuḥ anuharati pituḥ anuharati . atha vā pañcagrāmī
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_10: ṣaṇṇagarī tripurī iti na eva idam iyati eva avatiṣṭhate . avaśyam asau tataḥ kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_11: cit ākāṅkṣati kriyām vā guṇam vā . yat ākāṅkṣata tat ekam sa ca samāhāraḥ . ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_12: tarhi bhāvasādhane sati doṣaḥ . pañcapūlī ānīyatām iti bhāvānayane codite dravyānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_13: na prāpoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha gauḥ anubandhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_14: ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti katham ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_15: kriyante . asambhavāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_16: dravye ārambhaṇādīni kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva . asambhavāt bhāvānayanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3299_17: dravyānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā avyatirekāt dravyākṛtyoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_0: 609-612 kim punaḥ dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_1: . dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . dvigusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_2: pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . kā etaretarāśrayatā . dvigunimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_3: pratyayottarapade pratyayottarapadanimittā ca dvigusañjñā . tat etat itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_4: . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . evam tarhi arthe it vakṣyāmi . arthe cet taddhitānutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_5: bahuvrīhivat . arthe cet taddhitotpattiḥ na prāpnoti . pāñcanāpitiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3303_0: traimāturaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dvigunā uktatvāt bahuvrīhivat . tat yathā citraguḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3303_1: bahuvrīhiṇoktatvāt matvarthasya matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati . evam tarhi samāsataddhitavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3303_2: iti vakṣyāmi . samāsataddhitavidhau iti cet anyatra samāsasañjñābhāvaḥ . samāsataddhitavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3303_3: iti cet anyatra samāsasañjñā na prāpnoti . kva anyatra . svare . pañcāratniḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3304_0: daśāratniḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3304_1: ca iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti vacanāt . pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3304_2: dvigusañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3304_3: cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . itaretarāśrayamātram etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3304_4: coditam sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi ekatvena parihṛtāni siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3304_5: iti . na idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ . na hi sañjñā nityā . evam tarhi bhāvinī
GS24pmbhasuu:3305: kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_0: asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_1: na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_2: . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_3: dviguḥ bhavati yasya abhinirvṛttasya pratyaya uttarapadam iti ca ete sañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_4: . atha vā punaḥ astu arthe iti . nanu ca uktam arthe cet taddhitānutpattiḥ bahuvrīhivat
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_5: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na avaśyam arthaśabdaḥ abhidheye eva vartate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_6: syādarthe api vartate . tat yathā . dārārtham ghaṭāmahe . dhanārtham bhikṣāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_7: dārāḥ naḥ syuḥ . dhanāni naḥ syuḥ iti . evam iha api taddhitārthe dviguḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_8: taddhitaḥ syāt iti . dvigoḥ vā lugvacanam jñāpakam taddhitotpatteḥ . atha vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3306_9: ayam dvigoḥ luk anapatye iti dvigoḥ uttarasya taddhitasya lukam śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_1: . samāhāraḥ samūhaḥ iti aviśiṣtau etau arthau . samāhārasamūhayoḥ aviśeṣāt samāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_2: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . taddhitārthe kṛtatvāt . taddhitārthe dviguḥ iti evam atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_3: dviguḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi taddhitārthe dviguḥ iti evam atra dviguḥ bhavati taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_4: prāpnoti . utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti . kāni . pañcapūlī
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_5: daśapūlī . aparimāṇabistācitakambalebhyaḥ na taddhitaluki iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_6: . pañcagavam daśagavam . goḥ ataddhitaluki it ṭac na prapnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_7: dvigoḥ ṅīp bhavati iti uktvā samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_8: samāhāre eva na anyatra iti . goḥ akāraḥ dvigoḥ samāhāre . aviśeṣeṇa goḥ ṭac bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_9: iti uktvā dvigoḥ samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . samāhāre eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_10: na anyatra iti . abhidhānārtham tu . abhidhānārtham tu samāhāragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_11: . samāhāreṇa abhidhānam yathā syāt taddhitārthena mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_12: prasajyeta . utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti . sarvāṇi parihṛtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_13: . na sarvāṇi parihṛtāni . pañcakumāri daśakumāri . lik taddhitaluki iti ṅīpaḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_15: uttarapade nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vāgdṛṣadapriyaḥ chatropānahapriyaḥ pañcagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_16: daśagavapriyaḥ . kim prayojanam . samudāyavṛttau avayavānām mā kadā cit avṛttiḥ bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_17: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_18: ca . yadā vṛttipakṣaḥ tadā sarveṣām eva vṛttiḥ . yadā tu avṛttiḥ tadā sarveṣām avṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_19: . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsavacanam . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_20: vaktavyaḥ . dvimāsajātaḥ trimāsajātaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . sup supā
GS24pmbhasuu:3308_21: iti vartate . evam tarhi idam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3310_0: dvimāsam jātasya iti . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . dvimāsajātaḥ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3310_1: dvimāsajātaḥ iti ca iṣyate . dvyāhnajātaḥ ca na sidhyati . dvyahajāta iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3310_2: na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca yadā samāhāre dviguḥ . dvyahnajātaḥ tu na
GS24pmbhasuu:3310_3: sidhyati . kim ucyate parimāṇinā iti na punaḥ anyatra api . pañcagavapriyaḥ daśagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3310_4: . anyatra samudāyabahuvrīhitvāt uttarapadaprasiddhiḥ . anyatra samudāyabaḥ huvrīhisañjñḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3310_5: . anyatra samudāyabahuvrīhitvāt uttarapadam prasiddham . uttarapade prasiddhe uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:3310_6: iti dviguḥ bhaviṣyati . sarvatra matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu dvigusañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3310_7: matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . pañcakhaṭvā daśakhaṭvā . dvigoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3310_8: iti īkāraḥ mā bhūt . pañcaguḥ daśaguḥ . goḥ ataddhitaluki iti ṭac mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_0: 617-618 kim anantare yoge saṅkhyāpūrvaḥ saḥ dvigusañjñaḥ āhosvit pūrvamātre . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_1: ca ataḥ . yadi anantare yoge ekaśāṭī dvigoḥ iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . atha pūrvamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_2: akabhikṣā atra api prāpnoti . astu anantare . kamam ekaśāṭī . īkārāntena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_3: bhaviṣyati . ekā śāṭī ekaśāṭī . iha tarhi ekāpūpī dvigoḥ iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_4: astu tarhi pūrvamātre. katham ekabhikṣā . ṭābantena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . ekā bhikṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_5: ekabhikṣā . iha tarhi saptarṣayaḥ igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_6: anantare . katham ekāpūpī . samāhāre iti eva siddham . kaḥ punaḥ atra samāhāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_7: yat taddānam sambhramaḥ vā . iha tarhi pañcahotāraḥ daśahotāraḥ igante dvigau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_8: eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prapnoti . astu tarhi pūrvamātre . katham saptarṣayaḥ . antodāttaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_9: tricakrādīnām chandasi iti evam etat siddham . atha vā punaḥ astu anantare . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3312_10: pañcahotāraḥ daśahotāraḥ . ādyudāttaprakaraṇe divodāsādīnām chandasi iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3314: 619 kim udāharaṇm . vaiyākaraṇakhasūciḥ . kim vyākaraṇam kutsitam āhosvit vaiyākaraṇaḥ . vaiyākaraṇaḥ kutsitaḥ . tasmin kutsite tatstham api kutsitam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_0: 619-627 upamānāni iti ucyate . kāni punaḥ upamānāni . kim yat eva upamānam tat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_1: upameyam āhosvit anyat upamānam anyat upameyam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi yat eva upamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_2: tat eva upameyam kaḥ iha upamārthaḥ gauḥ iva gauḥ iti . atha anyat eva upamānam anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_3: upameyam kaḥ iha upamārthaḥ gauḥ iva aśvaḥ iti . evam tarhi yatra kim cit sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_4: kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ tatra upamānopameye bhavataḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_5: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . mānam hi nāma anirjñātajñānārtham upādīyate anirjñātam artham
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_6: jñāsyāmi iti . tat samīpe yat na atyantāya mimīte tat upamānam . gauḥ iva gavayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_7: iti . gauḥ nirjñātaḥ gavayaḥ anirjñātaḥ . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā yasya gavayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_8: nirjñātaḥ syāt gauḥ anirjñātaḥ tena kartavyam syāt gavayaḥ iva gauḥ iti. bāḍham kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_9: . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam . śastrīśyāmā . kva punaḥ ayam śyāmāśabdaḥ vartate . śatryām
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_10: iti āha . kena idānīm devadattā abhidhīyate . samāsena. yadi evam śastrīśyāmo devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_11: iti na sidhyati . upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi upasarjanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_12: api evañjātīyakāni bhavanti tittirikalmāṣī kumbhakapālalohinī anupasarjanalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_13: īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi śastryām eva śastrīśabdaḥ vartate devadattāyām śyāmāśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_14: . evam api guṇaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . bahavaḥ śastryām guṇāḥ tīkṣṇā sūkṣmā pṛthuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_15: iti . anirdiśyamānasya api guṇasya bhavati loke sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā candramukhī
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_16: devadattā iti . bahavaḥ candre guṇāḥ yā ca asau priyadarśanatā sā gamyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_17: api samānādhikaraṇena iti vartate . vyadhikaraṇatvāt samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . kim hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_18: vacanāt na bhavati . yadi api tāvat vacanāt samāsaḥ syāt iha tu khalu mṛgī iva capalā
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_19: mṛgacapalā samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi tasyām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_20: ubhayam vartate . etat ca atra yuktam yat tasyām eva ubhayam vartate iti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_21: hi bahu apekṣyam syāt . yadi tāvat evam vigrahaḥ kriyate śastrī iva śyāmā devadattā
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_22: iti śastryām śyāmā iti etat apekṣyam . atha api evam vigrahaḥ kriyate yathā sāstrīśyāmā
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_23: tadvat iyam devadattā iti evam api devadattāyām śyāmā iti apekṣyam syāt . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_24: guṇaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . bahavaḥ śastryām guṇāḥ tīkṣṇā sūkṣmā pṛthuḥ iti . anirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_25: api guṇasya bhavati loke sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā candramukhī devadattā iti . bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_26: candre guṇāḥ yā ca asau priyadarśanatā sā gamyate . upamānasamāse guṇavacanasya viśeṣabhāktvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_28: aprasiddhiḥ syāt . śastrīśyāmā . śyāmāśabdaḥ ayam śastrīśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_29: viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate . tatra sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_30: śyāmatvasyo uhhayatra bhāvāt tadvācaktvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyavacanaprasiddhiḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_31: vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . śyāmatvasyo uhhayatra bhāvāt . ubhayatra eva śyāmatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_32: asti śastryām devadattāyām ca . tadvācaktvāt ca śabdasya . sāmānyavacanaprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_33: tadvācakaḥ ca atra śyāmāśabdaḥ prayujyate . kimvācakaḥ . ubhayavācakaḥ . śyāmatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_34: ubhayatra bhāvāt tadvācakatvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyavacanam prasiddham . sāmānyavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_35: prasiddhe sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . na ca avaśyam saḥ eva sāmānyavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_36: yaḥ bahūnām sāmānyam āha. dvayoḥ api sāmānyam āha saḥ api sāmānyavacanaḥ eva . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_37: vā sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti ucyate . sarvaḥ ca śabdaḥ anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316_38: viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ prāk abhisambandhāt sāmānyavacanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_0: 627-628 sāmānyāprayoge iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva śūraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_1: . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva balavān . sāmānyāprayoge iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_2: na bhavati puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva śūraḥ . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva balavān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_3: . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_4: siddhe sati yat sāmānyāprayoge iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_5: vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_6: abhirūpaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ darśanīyaḥ atra vṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_0: 628-632 viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjanāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_1: . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjansya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_2: . kṛṣṇatilāḥ iti kṛṣṇaśabdaḥ ayam tilaśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ viśeṣaṇavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_3: sampadyate . tathā tilaśabdaḥ kṛṣṇaśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ viśeṣaṇavacanaḥ sampadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_4: . tat ubhayam viśeṣaṇam bhavati ubhayam ca viśeṣyam . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_5: ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjansya aprasiddhiḥ . na vā anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_6: tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya upasarjanaprasiddhiḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_7: . anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt . anyatarat atra pradhānam . tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_8: . tadviśeṣakam ca aparam . anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_9: upasarjanasañjñā bhaviṣyati . yadā asya tilāḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitāḥ bhavanti kṛṣṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_10: viśeṣaṇatvena tadā tilāḥ pradhānam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_11: yasya kṛṣṇāḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitāḥ bhavanti tilāḥ viśeṣaṇatvena tena kartavyam tilakṛṣṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_12: iti . na kartavyam . na hi ayam dvandvaḥ tilāḥ ca kṛṣṇāḥ ca iti . na khalu api ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_13: tilānām kṛṣṇāḥ iti . kim tarhi . dvau imau pradhānaśabdau ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyete
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_14: . na ca dvayoḥ pradhānaśabdayoḥ ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyamānayoḥ kim cit api
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_15: prayojanam asti . tatra prayogāt etat gantavyam . nūnam atra anyatarat pradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_16: tadviśeṣakam ca aparam iti . tatra tu etāvān sandehaḥ kim pradhānam kim viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_17: iti . saḥ ca api kva sandehaḥ . yatra ubhau guṇaśabdau . tat yathā kuñjakhañjakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_18: khañjakubjakaḥ iti . yatra hi anyatarat dravyam anyataraḥ guṇaḥ tatra yat dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_19: tat pradhānam . tat yathā śuklam ālabheta kṛṣṇam ālabheta iti na piṣṭapiṇḍīm ālabhya
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_20: kṛtī bhavati . avaśyam tadguṇam dravyam ākāṅkṣati . katham tarhi imau dvau pradhānaśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:3320_21: ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyete vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśipā iti . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3322_0: 633-634 atha kimartham uttaratra evamādi anukramaṇam kriyate na viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3322_1: bahulam iti eva siddham . bahulavacanasya akṛtsnatvāt uttaratrānukramaṇasāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3322_2: . akṛtsnam bahulavacanam iti uttaratra anukramaṇam kriyate . yadi akṛtsnam yat anena
GS24pmbhasuu:3322_3: kṛtam akṛtam tat . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ akṛtsnam iti . kṛtsnam ca kārakam ca sādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3322_4: ca nirvartakam ca . yat ca anena kṛtam suktṛtam tat . kimartham tarhi evamādi anukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3322_5: kriyate . udāharaṇabhūyastvāt . te khalu api vidhayaḥ suparigṛhītāḥ bhavanti yeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3322_6: lakṣaṇam prapañcaḥ ca . kevalam lakṣaṇam kevalaḥ prapañcaḥ vā na tathā kārakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3322_7: . avaśyam khalu asmābhiḥ idam vaktavyam bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:3322_8: iti . sarvavedapāṛiṣadam hi idam śāstram . tatra na ekaḥ panthāḥ śakyaḥ āsthātum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3324_0: 635 śreṇyādayaḥ paṭhyante . kṛtādiḥ ākṛtigaṇaḥ . śreṇyādiṣu cvyarthavacanam . śreṇyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3324_1: cvyarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . aśreṇayaḥ śreṇayaḥ kṛtāḥ śreṇikṛtāḥ . yadā hi śreṇayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3324_2: eva kim cit kriyante tadā mā bhūt . anyatra ayam cvyarthagrahaṇeṣu cvyantasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:3324_3: śāsti . tat iha na tathā . kim kāraṇam . anyatra pūrvam cvyantakāryam param cvyarthakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3324_4: . iha punaḥ pūrvam cyvarthakāryam param cvyantakāryam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_1: . iha mā būt . siddham ca abhuktam ca iti . anañ iti ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_2: mā bhūt . kartavyam akṛtam iti . nuḍiḍadhikena ca . nuḍiḍadhikena ca samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_3: . iha api yathā syāt . aśitānaśitena jīvati . kliṣṭākliśitena jīvati . kim ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_4: samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam iti yadā nañviśiṣṭena iti ucyate . na ca atra nañkṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_5: eva viśeṣaḥ . kim tarhi . prakṛtikṛtaḥ api . ayam viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ asti eva avadhāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_6: vartate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattau āḍhyau abhirūpau darśanīyau pakṣavantau
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_7: devadattaḥ tu yajñadattāt svādhyāyena viśiṣṭaḥ . svādhyāyena eva iti gamyate . anye
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_8: guṇāḥ samāḥ bhavanti . asti ādhikye vartate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattau āḍhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_9: abhirūpau darśanīyau pakṣavantau devadattaḥ tu yajñadattāt svādhyāyena viśiṣṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_10: svādhyāyena adhikaḥ anye guṇāḥ avivakṣitāḥ bhavanti . tat yadā tāvat avadhāraṇe viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_11: tadā na eva arthaḥ samānaprakṛtigrahaṇena . na iha bhaviṣyati . siddham ca abhuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_12: ca iti . na api anañ iti pratiṣedhena . na iha bhaviṣyati kartavyam akṛtam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_13: nuḍiḍadhikena api tu tadā samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . yadā ādhikye viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ tadā samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_14: kartavyam . iha mā bhūt ṣiddham ca abhuktam ca iti . anañ iti ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_15: . iha mā bhūt . kartavyam akṛtam iti . nuḍiḍadhikena api tu samāsadḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_16: . tatra ādhikye viśiṣṭagrahaṇam matvā samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam codyate . avadhāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_17: nañā cet nuḍiḍviśiṣṭena na prakalpeta . atha cet adhikavivakṣā kāryam tulyaprakṛtikena
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_18: iti . kṛtāpakṛtādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . kṛtāpakṛtādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . kṛtāpakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_19: bhuktavibhuktam pītavipītam . siddham tu ktena visamāptau anañ . siddham etat . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_20: ktāntena kriyāvisamāptau anañ ktāntam samasyate iti vaktavyam . gatapratyāgatādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3326_21: ca upasaṅkhyānam . gatapratyāgatādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gatapratyāgatam
GS24pmbhasuu:3328_0: 639 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . samānādhikaraṇena iti vartate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yad vyadhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3328_1: samāsaḥ syāt . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yathājātīyakam uktam uttarapadam tathājātīyakena
GS24pmbhasuu:3328_2: pūrvapadena samasyate iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3328_3: api grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_0: kṛṣṇaḥ sāraṅgaḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . varṇena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ etapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_1: varṇagrahaṇam . varṇena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ etapratiṣedhe varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_2: pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati . anete varṇaḥ iti vaktavyam . atha dvitīyena varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_3: etaviśeṣaṇena arthaḥ . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi avarṇa etaśabdaḥ asti . nanu ca ayam asti : ā* itaḥ etaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_0: lohitetaḥ iti . na arthaḥ evamarthena varṇagrahaṇena . yadi tāvat ayam kartari ktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_1: tṛtīyā karmaṇi iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . atha api kartari paratvāt kṛtsvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_2: bhavitavyam . atha samānādhikaraṇaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe dviḥ varṇagrahaṇam . samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_3: dviḥ varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . varṇaḥ varṇeṣu anete iti vaktavyam . ekam varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_4: kartavyam iha mā bhūt . paramaśuklaḥ paramakṛṣṇaḥ iti . dvitīyam varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_5: iha mā bhūt . kṛṣṇatilāḥ iti . ekam varṇagrahaṇam anakrthakam . anyataratra kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_6: na bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadikoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . evam sati . tāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_7: etāni trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve svaravidhau ca ekam . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_8: api tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ tasya api tāni eva trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_9: svaravidhau ca ekam . sāmānyena mama tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_10: guṇavacanena iti . avaśyam varṇena pratipadam samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ yatra tena na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_11: tadartham . kva ca tena na sidhyati . śukababhruḥ haritababhruḥ iti . tathā ca sati
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_12: tāni eva trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve svaravidhau ca ekam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_13: samānādhikaraṇaḥ sāmānyena siddhaḥ syāt . bāḍham siddhaḥ . katham . viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_14: bahulam iti . evam api dve varṇagrahaṇe kartavye svaravidhau eva pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3335_15: abhāvāt . tasmāt samānādhikaraṇaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ jyāyān .
GS24pmbhasuu:3337_1: samānādhikaraṇādhikāre pradhānopasarjanānām param param bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3337_2: pradhānānām pradhānam upasarjanānām upasarjanam . pradhānānām tāvat pradhānam . vṛdārakanāgakuñjaraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3337_3: pūjyamānam iti asya avakāśaḥ govṛndārakaḥ aśvavṛndārakaḥ . poṭāyuvatīnām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3337_4: ibhyayuvatiḥ āḍhyayuvatiḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . nāgayuvatiḥ vṛndārakayuvatiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3337_5: pradhānānām param bhavati vipratiṣedhena . upasarjanānām param upasarjanam . sanmahatparamotkṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3337_6: iti asya avakāśaḥ sadgavaḥ sadaśvaḥ . kṛtyatulyākhyā ajātyā iti asya avakāśaḥ tulyaśvetaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3338_0: tulyasat tulyamahān . upasarjanānām param upasarjanam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3338_1: bahuvrīhiḥ . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . samānādhikaraṇasamāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3338_2: avakāśaḥ vīraḥ puruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . bahuvrīheḥ avakāśaḥ kaṇṭhekālaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_0: vīrapuruṣakaḥ grāmaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_1: sarvadhanādyarthaḥ . kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ bhavati bahuvrīheḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_2: sarvadhanādyarthaḥ . sarvadhanī sarvabījī sarvakeśī naṭaḥ gaurakharavat vanam gauramṛgavat
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_3: vanam kṛṣṇasarpavān valmīkaḥ lohitaśālimān grāmaḥ . kim prayojanam . karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_4: matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_5: matvarthasya . yadi uktatvam hetuḥ karmadhārayeṇa api uktatvāt na prāpnoti . na khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_6: api sañjñāśrayaḥ matvarthīyaḥ . kim tarhi . arthāśrayaḥ . saḥ yathā eva bahuvrīhiṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:3339_7: uktatvāt na bhavati evam karmadhārayeṇa api uktatvāt na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi idam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_0: sarvāṇi dhanāni sarvadhanāni sarvadhanāni asya saniti sarvadhanī . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_1: . nityam evam sati karmadhārayaḥ syāt . tatra yat uktam kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_2: etat ayuktam . evam tarhi bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kāryavat buddhim kṛtvā paṭhanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_3: kāryāḥ śabdāḥ iti . tadvat idam paṭhitam samānādhikaraṇasamādāt bahuvrīhiḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_4: kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ sarvadhanādyarthaḥ iti . yad ucyate samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_5: bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena iti na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ karmadhārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_6: . kā antaraṅgatā . svapadārthe karmadhārayaḥ anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ . astu . vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_7: karmadhārayaḥ . yadā na karmadhārayaḥ tadā bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_8: atra kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ bhavati karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_9: prāpnoti . sarvaḥ ca ayam evamarthaḥ yatnaḥ karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_10: abhidhānam mā bhūt iti . evam tarhi na idam tasya yogasya udāharaṇam vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_11: param iti . kim tarhi . iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt bahuvrīhiḥ iṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_12: kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ sarvadhanādyarthaḥ iti . yadi iṣṭiḥ paṭhitā na arthaḥ anena
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_13: . iha hi sarve manuṣyāḥ alpena yatnena mahataḥ arthān ākāṅkṣanti . ekena māṣeṇa śatasahasram
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_14: . ekena kuddālakena khārīsahasram . tatra karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_15: astu bahuvrīhiṇā iti bahuvrīhiṇā bhaviṣyati laghutvāt . katham sarvadhanī sarvabījī
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_16: sarvakeśī naṭaḥ iti . iniprakaraṇe sarvādeḥ inim vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_17: ṭhanaḥ bādhanārtham . katham gaurakharavat vanam gauramṛgavat vanam kṛṣṇasarpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_18: valmīkaḥ lohitaśālimān grāmaḥ . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . jātyā atra abhisambandhaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_19: . kṛṣṇasarpaḥ nāma sarpajātiḥ sā asmin valmīke asti . yadā hi antareṇa jātim tadvatām
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_20: abhisambandhaḥ kriyate kṛṣṇasarpaḥ valmīkaḥ iti evam tadā bhaviṣyati . pūrvapadātiśaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_21: ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . pūrvapadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_22: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . ātiśāyikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_23: avakāśaḥ paṭutaraḥ paṭutamaḥ . bahuvrīheḥ avakāśaḥ citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_24: prāpnoti sūkṣmavastrataraḥ tīkṣṇśṛṅgataraḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_25: na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . virpatiṣedhe param iti ucyate . pūrvaḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_26: paraḥ ātiśāyikaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3340_27: . evam api ayuktaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ ātiśāiyikaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . ṅyāpprātipadikāt ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_0: subantānām bahuvrīhiḥ . ātiśāyikaḥ api na antaraṅgaḥ . katham . samarthāt taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_1: utpadyate sāmarthyam ca subantenta . evam api antaraṅgaḥ . katham . svapadārthe ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_2: anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ . evam api na antaraṅgaḥ . katham . spardhāyām ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_3: bhavati . na ca antareṇa pratiyoginam spardhā bhavati . na eva vā atra ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_4: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam. sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_5: iti . yāvatā vastrāṇi tadvantam apekṣante tadvantam ca apekṣya vastrāṇām vastraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_6: yugapat spardhā bhavati . nanu ca ayam ātiśāyikaḥ evamātmakaḥ satyām vyapekṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_7: vidhīyate . satyam evamātmakaḥ yām ca na anatareṇa vyapekṣām pravṛttiḥ tasyam satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_8: bhavitavyam . kām ca na antareṇa vyapekṣām ātiśāyikasya pravṛttiḥ . yā hi pratiyoginam
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_9: prati vyapekṣā . yā hi tadvantam prati na tasyām bhavitavyam . bahuvrīhiḥ api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_10: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt eva . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_11: bhavati iti . yāvatā vastrāṇi vastrāntarāṇi apekṣante tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_12: evam tarhi na idam tasya yogasya udāharaṇam vipratiṣedhe param iti . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3341_13: iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā . pūrvapadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ iṣṭaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3342: sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ iti . yadi iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā na arthaḥ anena . katham yā eṣā yuktiḥ uktā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_0: yāvatā vastrāṇi vastrāntarāṇi apekṣante tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ iti . yadā hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_1: vastrāṇām vastraiḥ yugapat spardhām tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ kriyate niṣpratidvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3343_2: tadā bahuvrīhiḥ . bahuvrīheḥ ātiśāyikaḥ . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_0: sūkṣmataravastraḥ iti . bhavati . yadā antareṇa tadvantam vastrāṇām vastraiḥ yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_1: spardhā niṣpratidvandvaḥ tadā ātiśāyikaḥ . katham punaḥ anyasya prakarṣeṇa anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_2: prakarṣaḥ syāt . na eva anyasya prakarṣeṇa anyasya prakarṣeṇa bhavitavyam . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_3: eva ayam dravyeṣu yatate vastrāṇi me syuḥ iti evam guṇeṣu api yatate sūkṣmatarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_4: me syuḥ iti . na atra ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . guṇavacanāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_5: . na ca samāsaḥ guṇavacanaḥ . samāsaḥ api guṇavacanaḥ . katham . ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_6: . atha jahatsvārthāyām tu doṣaḥ eva . jahatsvāṛthāyām api na doṣaḥ . bhavati bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_7: tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat yathā . śuklavāsasam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_8: iti . tatguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . uttarapadārthātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_9: bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ . uttarapadārthātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_10: . kim prayojanam . bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ . bahvāḍhyataraḥ bahusukumārataraḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_11: punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ bahuvrīheḥ vā ātiśāyikaḥ syāt ātiśāyikāntena vā bahuvrīhiḥ . svarakapoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_12: viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ syāt bahvāḍyataraḥ evam svaraḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_13: bahvāḍhyataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . bahvāḍhyakataraḥ iti ca prāpnoti bahvāḍhyatarakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_14: iti ca iṣyate . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre śākapārthivādīnām upasaṅkhyānam uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_15: ca . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre śākapārthivādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_16: ca vaktavyaḥ . śākabhojī pārthivaḥ śākapārthivaḥ . kutapavāsaḥ sauśrutaḥ kutapasauśrutraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_17: . ajāpaṇyaḥ taulvaliḥ ajātaulvaliḥ . yaṣṭipradhānaḥ maudgalyaḥ yaṣṭimaudgalyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3346: 653 catuṣpāt jātiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kālākṣīgarbhiṇī svastimatī garbhiṇī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3348: 654 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . evakārārthaḥ . mayūravyaṃsakādayaḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . paramaḥ mayūravyaṃsakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3352: nagarārdhaḥ iti . ardhaśabdasya napuṃsakaliṅgasya idam grahaṇam puṃliṅgaḥ ca ayam ardhaśabdaḥ . kva punaḥ ayam napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ kva puṃliṅgaḥ . samapravibhāge napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3353: avayavavācī puṃliṅgaḥ . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3354: ardham pippalīnām iti . na vā bhavati ardhapippalyaḥ iti . bhavati yadā khaṇḍasamuccayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3355_0: ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalyaḥ iti . yada tu etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3355_1: vākyam bhavati ardham pippalīnām iti tadā na bhavitavyam . tadā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3355_2: . ekādkhikaraṇe iti vartate . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3356: ardharāśiḥ iti . bhavati . ekam etat adhikaraṇam yaḥ asau rāśiḥ nāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_0: 657-660 anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam kimartham . anyatarasyām samāsaḥ yathā syāt . samāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_1: mukte vākyam api yathā syāt . dvitīyam bhikṣāyāḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_2: prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekadeśisamāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_3: mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ api yathā syāt . bhikṣādvitīyam iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_4: . ayam api vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ api . tau ubhau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_5: paṭhati . dvitīyādīnām vibhāṣāprakaraṇe vibhāṣāvacanam jñāpakam avayavavidhāne sāmānyavidhānābhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_6: . dvitīyādīnām vibhāṣāprakaraṇe vibhāṣāvacanam kriyate jñāpārtham . kim jñāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_7: . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . avayavavidhau sāmānyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_8: jñāpane prayojanam . bhinatti chinatti . śnami kṛte śap na bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_9: prayojanam . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_10: . na kartavyam .prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_11: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . rudhādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_12: ṣaṣthīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_13: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_14: ca anuvartate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yatra utsargāpavādam vibhāṣā tatra apavādena
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_15: mukte utsargaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīp
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_16: . prāṅmukhī prāṅmukhā pratyaṅmukhī pratyaṅmukhā . ṅīpa mukte ṅīṣ na bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_17: etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam ṅībvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_18: hi anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayāt ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . ardhapippalī
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_19: ardhakośātakī . ekadeśisamāsena mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ na bhavati . unmattagaṅgam lohitagaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_20: . avyayībhāvena mukte bahuvrīhiḥ na bhavati . dākṣiḥ plākṣiḥ . iñā mukte aṇ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_21: . yadi etat jñāpyate upagoḥ apatyam aupagavaḥ . taddhitena mukte upagvapatyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_22: na sidhyati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . dve hi atra vibhāṣā . daivayajñiśaucivṛkṣisātyamugrikāṇṭheviddhibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_23: anyatarasyām iti samarthānām prathamāt vā iti ca . tatra ekaya vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_24: aparaya vṛttiviṣaye vibhāṣapavādaḥ . kriyamāṇe api vai anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_25: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pūraṇena iti pratiṣedhāt . na etat pūraṇāntam . anā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_26: paryavapannam . etat api pūraṇāntam eva . katha. pūraṇam nāma arthaḥ tam āha tīyaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3358_27: . ataḥ pūraṇam . yaḥ asau pūraṇāntāt svārthe bhāge an saḥ api pūraṇam eva . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3360_0: 660 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . anukaraṣaṇārthaḥ . anyatarasyām iti etat anukṛṣyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3360_1: prayojanam . anyatarasyām samāsaḥ yathā syāt . samāsena mukte vākyam api yatha syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3360_2: . jīvikām prāptaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3360_3: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . dvitīyāsamāsaḥ api yatha syāt . jīvikāprāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3360_4: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam. ayam api ucyate dvitīyāsamāsaḥ api . tat ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3360_5: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi na ayam anukarṣaṇārthaḥ cakāraḥ . kim tarhi . atvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3360_6: anena vidhīyate . prāptāpanne dvitīyāntena saha samasyete atvam ca bhavati prāptapannayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3360_7: iti . prāptā jīvikām prāptajīvikā āpannā jīvikām āpannajivikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_0: 661-662 kimpradhānaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . yadi uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_1: sadharmaṇā anena anyaiḥ uttarapadārthapradhānaiḥ bhavitavyam . anyeṣu ca uttarapadārthapradhāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3362_2: yā eva asau antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ tasyāḥ samāse api śravaṇam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3363_0: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ iti . iha punaḥ vākye ṣaṣṭhī samāse prathamā . kena etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3363_1: evam bhavati . yaḥ asau māsajātayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ saḥ samāse nivartate . abhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3363_2: saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:3363_3: iti prathamā bhavati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3364: māsajātasya iti . bhavati . bāhyam artham apekṣya ṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_0: 662-666 kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ . kālasya yena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_1: saḥ aparimāṇī . tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_2: hi jātasya māsaḥ parimāṇam . kasya tarhi . triṃśadrātrasya . tat yathā . droṇaḥ badarāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_3: devadattasya iti . na devadattasya droṇaḥ parimāṇam . kasya tarhi . badarāṇām . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_4: tu kālaparimāṇam yasya sa kālaḥ tena . siddham etat . katham . kālaparimāṇam yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_5: sa kālaḥ tena samasyate iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_6: eva astu . nanu ca uktam kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_7: kam punaḥ kālam matvā bhavān āha kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_8: iti . yena mūrtīnām upacayāḥ ca apacayāḥ ca lakṣyante tam kālam āhuḥ . tasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_9: kayā cit kriyayā yuktasya ahaḥ iti ca bhavati rātriḥ iti ca . kayā kriyayā . ādityagatyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_10: . tayā eva asakṛt āvṛttayā māsaḥ iti bhavati saṃvatsaraḥ iti ca . yadi evam jātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_11: māsaḥ parimāṇam . ekavacanadvigoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . ekavacanāntānām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_12: . iha mā bhūt . māsau jātasya māsāḥ jātasya iti . dvigoḥ ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3368: trimāsajātaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . ekavacane tāvat uktam anabhidhānāt iti . dvigoḥ kim uktam . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsavacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3370_0: 666-677 kimpradhānaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . yadi uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3370_1: abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇamātrasya ānayanam prāpnoti . anyapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3371: avarṣā hemantaḥ iti hemantasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api prāpnoti . pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . yadi pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ avyayasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_0: avyayam hi asya pūrvapadam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pāṭhena avyayasañjñā kriyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_1: ca nañsamāsaḥ tatra paṭhyate . yadi api nañsamāsaḥ na paṭhyate nañ tu paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_2: pāṭhena api avyayasañjñāyām satyām abhideheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . yaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_3: iha arthaḥ abhidhīyate na tasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti . na idam vācanikam
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_4: aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā va . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā:
GS24pmbhasuu:3373_0: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3373_1: kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3373_2: iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum . yat nañaḥ prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:3373_3: samāsāt liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ na asti samāse ca bhavati svābhāvikam etat . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3373_4: vā āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṅavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_0: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_1: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_2: bhavati samāsaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_3: punaḥ astu uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . nanu ca uktam abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3376_4: ānayanam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3377_0: atha iha rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam kasmāt na bhavati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3377_1: atra viśeṣaḥ . rājā viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate . tena viśiṣṭasya ānayanam bhavati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3377_2: api tarhi nañ viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate . tena nañviśiṣṭasya ānayanam bhaviṣyati . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3377_3: punaḥ asau . nivṛttapadārthakaḥ . yadā punaḥ asya padārthaḥ nivartate kim svābhāvikī
GS24pmbhasuu:3377_4: nivṛttiḥ āhosvit vācanikī . kim ca ataḥ . yadi svābhāvikī kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_0: nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārtham nivartayati iti . evam tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_1: ca uktam kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti iti . nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārtham nivartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_2: katham . kīlapratikīlavat . tat yathā kīlaḥ āhanyamānaḥ pratikīlam nirhanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_3: etat nañaḥ māhātmyam syāt na jātu cit rājānaḥ hastyaśvam bibhṛyuḥ . na iti eva rājānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_4: brūyuḥ . evam tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ . nanu ca uktam kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_5: iti . nañnimittā tu upalabdhiḥ . tat yathā samandhakāre dravyāṇām samavasthitānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_6: pradīpnimittam darśanam na ca teṣām pradīpaḥ nirvartakaḥ bhavati . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_7: nivṛttapadārthakaḥ kimartham brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate . evam yathā vijñayeta asya
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_8: padārthaḥ nivartate iti . na iti hi ukte sandehaḥ syāt kasya padārthaḥ nivartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_9: iti . tatra asandehārtham brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate . evam vā etat . atha vā sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_10: ete śabdāḥ guṇasamudāyeṣu vartante brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ iti . tapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_11: śrutam ca yoniḥ ca iti etad brāhmaṇakārakam . tapaḥśtrutābhyām yaḥ hīnaḥ jātibrāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_12: eva saḥ . tathā gauraḥ śucyācāraḥ piṅgalaḥ kapilakeśaḥ iti etān api abhyantarān brāhmaṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_13: guṇān kurvanti . samudāyeṣu ca vṛttāḥ śabdāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante. tad yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_14: pūrve pañcālāḥ uttare pañcālāḥ tailam bhuktam ghṛtaṃ bhuktam śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kapilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_15: kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam samudāye brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartate jātihīne
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_16: guṇahīne ca . guṇahīne tāvat. abrāhmaṇaḥ ayam yaḥ tiṣṭhan mūtrayati . abrāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3378_17: ayaṃ yaḥ gacchan bhakṣayati . jātihīne sandehāt durupadeśāt ca brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ vartate . sandehāt tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3379_0: gauram śucyācāraṃ piṅgalam kapilakeśam dṛṣṭvā adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3379_1: paścāt upalabhate na ayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ abrāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tatra sandehāt ca brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3379_2: vartate jātikṛtā ca arthasya nivṛttiḥ . durupadeśāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_0: durupadiṣṭam asya bhavati amuṣmin avakāśe brāhmaṇaḥ tam ānaya iti . sa tatra gatvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3380_1: yam paśyati tam adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tataḥ paścāt upalabhate na ayaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:3381_0: . tatra durupadeśāt ca brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ vartate jātikṛtā ca arthasya nivṛttiḥ . ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3381_1: ca sandehāt durupadeśāt vā . na hi ayam kālam māṣarāśivarṇam āpaṇe āsīnam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3381_2: adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . nirjñātam tasya bhavati . idam khalu api bhūyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3381_3: uttarapadārthaprādhānye sati saṅgṛhītam bhavati . kim . anekam iti . kim atra saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:3381_4: . ekavacanam . katham punaḥ ekasya pratiṣedhena anekasya sampratyayaḥ syāt . prasajya
GS24pmbhasuu:3381_5: ayam kriyāguṇau tataḥ paścāt nivṛttim karoti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3382: āsaya śāyaya bhojaya anekam iti . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra kriyāguṇau prasajyete yatra khalu na prasajyete tatra katham :
GS24pmbhasuu:3383_0: anekaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . bhavati ca evañjātīyakānām api ekasya pratiṣedhena bahūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3383_1: sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā na naḥ ekam priyam na naḥ ekam sukham iti . iha abrāhmaṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3383_2: abrāhmaṇatā paratvāt tvatalau prāpnutaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3383_3: abrāhmaṇatvam iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . abrāhmaṇatvam iti ca iṣyate . nañsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:3383_4: bhāvavacane uktam . kim uktam . tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ pūrvapratiṣiddham svarsiddhyartham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3385: 677 īṣat guṇavacanena .īṣat guṇavacanena iti vaktavyam . akṛtā iti ucyamāne iha ca prasajyeta . īṣat gārgyaḥ iti . iha ca na syāt . īṣatkaḍāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_0: 678-680 kṛdyogā ca . kṛdyogā ca ṣaṣṭhī samasyate iti vaktavyam . idhmapravraścanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_1: palāśaśātanaḥ . kimartham idam ucyate . pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_2: vakṣyati . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . kā punaḥ ṣaṣṭhīpratipadavidhānā kā kṛdyogā
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_3: . sarvā ṣaṣṭhī pratipadavidhānā śeṣalakṣaṇām varjayitvā . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_4: yā ṣaṣṭhī sā kṛdyogā . tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ . tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ ṣaṣthīguṇaiḥ ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_5: samasyate iti vaktavyam . brāhmaṇavarṇaḥ candanagandhaḥ paṭahaśabdaḥ nadhīghoṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_6: . na tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ . na tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ghṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_7: tīvraḥ candanasya mṛduḥ iti . kimartham idam ucyate . guṇena iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_8: . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam guṇena na iti ucyate na punaḥ guṇavacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_9: iti ucyate . na evam śakyam . iha hi na syāt . kākasya kārṣṇyam kaṇṭakasya taikṣṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_10: balākāyāḥ śauklyam iti . etat eva tasmin yoge udāharaṇam . yat vai brāhmaṇasya śuklāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_11: vṛṣalasya kṛṣṇāḥ iti asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_12: asamartham bhavati iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate dantāḥ . tasmāt guṇena na iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_13: . guṇena na iti ucyamāne tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ iti vaktavyam . tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3387_14: iti ucyamāne na tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3389: 681 pratipadavidhānā ca . pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sarpiṣaḥ jñānam madhunaḥ jñānam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_0: 681-684 guṇe kim udāharaṇam . brāhmaṇasya śuklāḥ vṛṣalasya kṛṣṇāḥ iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_1: prayojanam . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_2: bhavati iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate dantāḥ . idam tarhi kākasya kārṣṇyam kaṇṭakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_3: taikṣṇyam balākāyāḥ śauklyam iti . idam api udāharaṇam brāhmaṇasya śuklāḥ vṛṣalasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_4: kṛṣṇāḥ iti . nanu ca uktam . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_5: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate dantāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_6: . bhavati vai kasya cit arthāt prakaraṇāt vā apekṣyam nirjñātam tadā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_7: . sati kim udāharaṇam . brahmaṇasya pakṣyan brāhmaṇasya pakṣyamāṇaḥ . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_8: . pratiṣidhyate atra ṣaṣṭhī laprayoge na iti . yā ca śrūyate eṣā bāhyam artham apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_9: bhavati . tatra asmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_10: bhavati iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate odanaḥ . idam tarhi caurasya dviṣan vṛṣalasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_11: dviṣan . nanu ca atra api pratiṣidhyate . vakṣyati etat dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vāvacanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_12: . avyaye kim udāharaṇam . brāhmaṇasya uccaiḥ vṛṣalasya nīcaiḥ iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_13: . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_14: iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate āsanam . idan tarhi brāhmaṇasya kṛṭvā vṛṣalasya kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_15: iti . etat api na asti . pratiṣidhyate tatra ṣaṣṭhī avyayaprayoge na iti . yā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_16: śrūyate eṣā bāhyam artham apekṣya bhavati . tatra asmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_17: asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate kaṭaḥ . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_18: tarhi . purā sūryasya udetoḥ ādheyaḥ . purā vatsānām apākartoḥ . nanu ca atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_19: pratiṣidhyate avyayam iti kṛtvā . vakṣyati etat . avyayapratiṣedhe tosunkasunoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_20: iti . samānādhikaraṇe kim udāharaṇam . rājñaḥ pāṭaliputrakasya śukasya mārāvidasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_21: pāṇineḥ sūtrakārasya . na etat asti . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_22: . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . idam tarhi . sarpiṣaḥ pīyamānaḥ yajuṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_23: kriyamāṇasya iti . nanu ca atra api asāmarthyāt eva na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3391_24: . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . adhātvabhihitam iti evam tat .
GS24pmbhasuu:3393_0: 684-686 katham idam vijñāyate karmaṇi yā ṣaṣṭhī sā na samasyate iti āhosvit karmaṇi

GS24pmbhasuu:3393_3: . karmaṇi iti ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ cet akartari kṛtā samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . idhmapravraścanaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3393_7: apratiṣedhaḥ . ktanirdeśe asamarthatvāt apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3393_8: . samāsaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3393_9: bhavati iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate odanaḥ . pratiṣedhyam iti cet kartari api pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3393_10: .atha evam sati pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyaḥ iti dṛśyate kartari api pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3393_11: syāt . brāhmaṇasya gataḥ brāhmaṇasya yātaḥ iti . pūjāyām ca pratiṣedhānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3393_12: . pūjāyām ca pratiṣedhaḥ anarthaḥ . rājñām pūjitaḥ . karmaṇi iti eva siddham . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3393_13: ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3393_14: yā ṣaṣṭhī tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ ityarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3393_15: ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . kamaṇi ca . karmaṇi iti evam yā ṣaṣṭhī iti .
