GS24pmbhasuu:3397_11: . ākaḍāraḥ āpiṅgalaḥ . kuḥ pāpārthe . kuḥ pāpārtheiti vaktavyam . kubrāhmaṇaḥ kuvṛṣalaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3397_13: vaktavyam . pragataḥ ācāryaḥ prācāryaḥ prāntevāsī prapitāmahaḥ . atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3397_14: dvitīyayā . atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyayā samasyante iti vaktavyam . atikrāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3397_15: khaṭvām atikhaṭvaḥ atimālaḥ . avādayaḥ kruṣṭādyarthe tṛtīyayā . avādayaḥ kruṣṭādyarthe

GS24pmbhasuu:3397_18: . pariglānaḥ adhyayanāya paryadhayanaḥ . nirādayaḥ krāntādyarthe pañcamyā . nirādayaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3397_20: nirvārāṇasiḥ . avyayam pravṛddhādibhiḥ . avyayam pravṛddhādibhiḥ samasyate iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3397_21: . punaḥprvavṛddham barhiḥ bhavati punarṇavam punaḥsukham . ivena vibhaktyantalopaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3399_0: 690-696 atiṅ iti kimartham . kārakaḥ vrajati . hārakaḥ vrajati . atiṅ iti śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_1: akartum . kasmāt na bhavati . kārakaḥ vrajati . hārakaḥ vrajati iti . sup supā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_2: vartate . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . upapadam atiṅ iti tadarthapratiṣedhaḥ . upapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_3: atiṅ iti tadarthasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kasya . tiṅarthasya . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_4: tiṅarthaḥ . kriyā . kriyāpratiṣedhaḥ vā . atha vā vyaktam eva idam paṭhitavyam upapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_5: akriyayā iti . atha akriyayā iti kim pratyudāhriyate . kārakaḥ gataḥ hārakaḥ gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_6: . na etat kriyāvāci . kim tarhi. dravyavāci . idam tarhi kārakasya gatiḥ kārakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_7: vrajyā . etat api dravyvāci . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_8: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat atiṅ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_9: yogayoḥ nivṛttam sup supā iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . gatikārakopapadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_10: kṛdbhiḥ samāsaḥ bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati . yadi etat jñāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_11: kena idānīm samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . samarthena . yadi evam dhātūpasargayoḥ api samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_12: prāpnoti . pūrvam dhātuḥ upasargeṇa yujyate paścāt sādhanena iti . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_13: pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa . sādhanam hi kriyām nirvartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_14: . tām upasargaḥ viśinaṣṭi . abhinirvṛttasya ca arthasya upasargeṇa viśeṣaḥ śakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_15: vaktum . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāt upasargasamāsaḥ vipratiṣedhena . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāt upasargasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_16: vipratiṣedhena . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsasya avakāśaḥ rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ . upapadasamāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_17: avakāśaḥ stamberamaḥ karṇejapaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_18: . upapadasamāsaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsābhāvād upapadasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_19: . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . na vā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsābhāvād upapadasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_20: bhaviṣyati . katham . gatikārakopadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavanacam prāk subutpatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_21: iti vacanāt . atha vā vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ . yadā na ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ tadā upapadasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_22: bhaviṣyati . anena eva yathā syāt tena mā bhūt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ tena vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_23: syāt anena vā . upapadasamāsaḥ nityasamāsaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ punaḥ vibhāṣā . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_24: nityam yaḥ samāsaḥ saḥ nityasamāsaḥ . yasya vigrahaḥ na asti . na iti āha . nityādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_25: yaḥ samāsaḥ saḥ nityasamāsaḥ . na evam śakyam . avyayībhāvasya hi anityasamāsatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_26: prasajyeta . tasmāt nityaḥ samāsaḥ nityasamāsaḥ . yasya vigrahaḥ na asti .

GS24pmbhasuu:3403_1: asti iti āha . khaśayam brāhmaṇakulam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3403_2: atra samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . amā eva yat tulyavidhānam upapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3403_3: tatra eva yathā syāt . amā ca anyena ca yat tulyavidhānam upapadam tatra mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3403_4: iti . agre bhojam agre bhuktvā . agrādiṣu aprāptavidheḥ samāsapratiṣedham codayiṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:3405_1: śeṣavacanam padataḥ cet na abhāvāt . śeṣavacanam padataḥ cet tat na . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3405_2: . abhāvāt . na hi santi tāni padāni yeṣām padānām anuktaḥ samāsaḥ . arthataḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3405_3: śeṣagrahaṇam . yeṣu artheṣu anuktaḥ samāsaḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ . arthataḥ cet aviśiṣṭam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3405_4: arthataḥ cet aviśiṣṭam etat bhavati . kutaḥ . padataḥ . na hi santi te arthāḥ yeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3405_5: anuktaḥ samāsaḥ . trikataḥ tarhi śeṣagrahaṇam . yasya trikasya anuktaḥ samāsaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_0: 699-704 padagrahaṇam kimartham. anekam anyārthe iti iyati ucyamāne vakyārthe api
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_1: bahuvrīhiḥ syāt . yathā me mātā tathā me pitā susnātam bhoḥ iti . padagrahaṇe punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_2: kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha anyagrahaṇam kimartham . anekam padārthe iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_3: ucyamāne svapadārthe api bahurvīhiḥ syāt . rājapuruṣaḥ takṣapuruṣaḥ iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_4: asti prayojanam . tatpuruṣaḥ svapadārthe bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . bhavet ekasañjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_5: siddham . paraṅkāryatve tu na sidhyati . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca tatpuruṣaḥ paraṅkāryatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_6: ca bahuvrīhiḥ prāpnoti . paraṅkāryatve ca na doṣaḥ . śeṣaḥ iti vartate . śeṣatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_7: na bhaviṣyati . śeṣavacane uktam . kim uktam . tatra śeṣavacanāt doṣaḥ saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇanañsamāseṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_8: bahuvrīhipratiṣedhaḥ iti . atha ekasaṅjñādhikāre na arthaḥ anyagrahaṇena . ekasaṅjñādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_9: ca kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi anyagrahaṇe yathā eva tatpuruṣaḥ svapadārthe bahuvrīhim
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_10: bādhate evam anyapadārthe api bādheta . atha anekagrahaṇam kimartham. anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_11: iti iyati ucyamāne ekasya api padasya bahuvrīhiḥ syāt . sarpiṣaḥ api syāt . madhunaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_12: api syāt . gomūtrasya api syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . sup supā iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_13: idam tarhi prayojanam . bahūnām api samāsaḥ yathā syāt . susūkṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājinavāsasā
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_14: . uttarārtham ca anekagrahaṇam kartavyam cārthe dvandvaḥ anekam iti . iha api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_15: syāt . plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_16: jñāpayati bahūnām api samāsaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam uttarapade dvigum śāsti . tatpuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_17: api tarhi bahūnām prāpnoti . grahaṇena tatpuruṣaḥ ucyate . tena bahūnām na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_18: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . anekavacanam upasarjanārtham . anekagrahaṇam kriyate upasarjanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_19: . prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasarjanam iti anekasya supaḥ upasarjanasañjñā yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_20: syāt . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ iti . na vā ekavibhaktitvāt . na vā etat api prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_21: asti . kim kāraṇam . ekavibhaktitvāt . ekavibhakti ca apūrvnipāte iti upasarjanasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_22: bhaviṣyati . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ iti . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citraguḥ tiṣṭhati . citrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_23: yasya gāvaḥ citragum paśya . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citraguṇā kṛtam . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_24: citragave dehi . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragoḥ ānaya . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_25: svam . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragau nidhehi . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ he citrago iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_26: yadi tarhi yataḥ kutaḥ cit eva kim cit padam adhyāhṛtya ekavibhaktyā yogaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_27: etat api ekavibhaktiyuktam bhavati iha api prāpnoti . rājakumārī takṣakumārī . rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_28: yā kumārī rājakumārī tiṣṭhati . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumārīm paśya . rājñaḥ yā kumārī
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_29: rājakumāryā kṛtam . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryai dehi . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_30: ānaya . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryāḥ svam . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryām nidhehi
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_31: . rājñaḥ yā kumārī he rājakumāri iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_32: gaṃsyate . ekagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi hi yat ekavibhaktiyuktam ca anekavibhaktiyuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3407_33: ca tatra syāt ekagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . vibhaktiyuktam ca apūrvanipāte iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_1: anuprayogasya anupapattiḥ . citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . abhihitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_2: . citraguśabdena abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ na prāpnoti . na vā anabhihitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_3: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anabhihitatvāt . citraguśabdena anabhihitaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_4: arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham anabhihitaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_5: padārthābhidhāne anuprayogānupapattiḥ abhihitatvāt iti . sāmānyābhidhāne hi viśeṣānabhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_6: . sāmānye hi abhidhīyamāne viśeṣaḥ anabhhitaḥ bhavati . tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_7: viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . citraguḥ . kaḥ . devadattaḥ iti. bhavet siddham yadā sāmānye
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_8: vṛttiḥ . yadā tu khalu viśeṣe vṛttiḥ tadā na sidhyati . citrā gāvaḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_9: citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti . tat api siddham . katham . na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_10: vākyam ca samāsaḥ ca . yadā vākyam tadā na samāsaḥ . yadā samāsaḥ tadā na vakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_11: . yadā samāsaḥ tadā sāmānye vṛttiḥ . tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_12: . citraguḥ . kaḥ . devadattaḥ iti. sāmānyasya eva tarhi anuprayogaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_13: citragu tat . citragu kim cit . citragu sarvam iti . sāmānyam api yathā viśeṣaḥ tadvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_14: . citragu iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt . sarvam vā viśvam vā iti . tatra avaśyam sandehanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_15: viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . atha vā vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidīyate . etat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_16: atra yuktam yat vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidhīyate . tatra hi sarvapaścāt padam vartate asya
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_18: adravyasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām upacāraḥ anupapannaḥ . bahuyavam bahuyavā bahuyavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3410_1: dravyasya ye liṅgasaṅkhye tābhyām vibhaktyarthasya upacāraḥ anupapannaḥ . bahuyavam
GS24pmbhasuu:3410_2: bahuyavāḥ bahuyavaḥ bahuyavau bahuhavāḥ iti . katham hi anyasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3410_3: anyasya upacāraḥ syāt . siddham tu yathā guṇavacaneṣu . siddham etat. katham . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_0: guṇavacanānām śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti iti . tat yathā śuklam vastram
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_1: śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_2: śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_3: api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ vibhaktyarthaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_4: api bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidhīyate kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ katham abhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_5: bhavati sadravyaḥ saliṅgaḥ sasaṅkhyaḥ ca . arthagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . iha anekam anyapade
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_6: iti iyatā siddham . katham punaḥ pade nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . śabdaḥ hi eṣaḥ . śabde asambhavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_7: arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat arthagrahaṇam karoti tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_8: etat prayojanam kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ yathā abhidhīyeta sadravyaḥ saliṅgaḥ sasaṅkhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_9: ca iti . yadi tarhi kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ abhidhīyate laiṅgāḥ sāṅkhyāḥ ca vidhayaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_10: sidhyanti . uktam vā . kim uktam . liṅgeṣu tāvat . siddham tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_11: svārthe ṭābādayaḥ iti . sāṅkhyeṣu api uktam karmādīnām anuktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_12: sāṅkhyāḥ bhaviṣyanti . prathamā tarhi na prāpnoti . samayāt bhaviṣyati . yadi sāmayikī
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_13: na niyogataḥ anyāḥ kasmāt na bhavanti . karmādīnām abhāvāt . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_14: . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . evam api vyatikaraḥ . ekasmin api
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_15: dvivacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ dvayoḥ api ekavacanabahuvacane bahuṣu api ekavacanadvivacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_16: . arthataḥ vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . atha vā saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā . saṅkhyeam
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_17: anyā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra prathamā na syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam syāt . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_18: vakṣyati etat . tatra vacanagrahaṇasya prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_19: yathā syāt iti . evam api ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . vyabhicarati eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3412_0: ayam samāsaḥ liṅgasaṅkhye . ṣaṣthyartham punaḥ na vyabhicarati . abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3412_1: antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:3412_2: bhaviṣyati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3413: citragoḥ devadattasya . bhavati . bāhyam artham apekṣya ṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_1: bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . vyadhikaraṇānām mā bhūt iti . pañcabhiḥ bhuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_2: asya iti . avyayānām ca . avyayānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . uccairmukhaḥ nīcairmukhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_4: ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kaṇṭhesthaḥ kālaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_5: kaṇṭhekālaḥ uṣṭramukham iva mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ kharamukhaḥ . samudāyavikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_6: ca . samudāyaṣaṣṭhyāḥ vikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_7: vaktavyaḥ . keśānām samāhāraḥ cūḍā asya keśacūḍaḥ suvarṇasya vikāraḥ alaṅkāraḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_8: suvarṇālaṅkāraḥ . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya vā . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_9: uttarapadasya ca vā lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇaḥ prapatitapalāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_10: prapalāśaḥ . nañaḥ astyarthānām . nañaḥ astyarthānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_11: ca vā lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . avidyamānaputraḥ aputraḥ avidyamānabhāryaḥ abhāryaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_12: tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā anabhidhānāt asamānādhikaraṇe sañjñābhāvaḥ . na vā vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3416_0: pañcabhiḥ bhuktam asya iti . anabhidhānāt . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3416_1: . kriyamāṇe api vai parigaṇane yatra abhidhānam na asti na bhavati tatra bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3416_2: . tat yathā pañca bhuktavantaḥ asya iti . atha etasmin sati anabhidhāne yadi vṛttiparigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3416_3: kriyate vartiparigaṇanam api kartavyam . tat katham kartavyam . arthaniyame matvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3416_4: . arthaniyame matvarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . matvarthe yaḥ saḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3417: kaṣṭam śritam anena iti . tathā ca uttarasya vacanārthaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā uttarasya yogasya vacanārthaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3418: yat vṛttisūtre iti . saṅkhyāvyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_0: yat vārttike iti . karmavacanena aprathmāyāḥ . karmavacanena aprathmāyāḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_1: vaktavyaḥ . ūḍhaḥ rathaḥ anena ūḍharathaḥ anaḍvān upahṛtaḥ paśuḥ rudrāya upahṛtapaśuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_2: rudraḥ uddhṛtaḥ odanaḥ sthālyāḥ uddhṛtaudanā sthālī . yadi karmavacanena iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_3: kartṛvacanena katham . prāptam udakam grāmam prāptodakaḥ grāmaḥ āgatāḥ atithayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_4: grāmam āgatātithiḥ grāmaḥ . kartṛvacanena api . kartṛvacanena api iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_5: aprathamāyāḥ iti kimartham . vṛṣṭe deve gataḥ . aprathamāyāḥ iti ucyamāne iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_6: na bhavati . vṛṣṭe deve gatam paśya iti . bahiraṅgā atra aprathamā . subadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_7: astikṣīrādivacanam . subadhikāre astikṣīrādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . astikṣīrā
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_8: brāhmaṇī . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā avyayatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_9: . avyayatvāt . avyayaḥ ayam astiśabdaḥ . na eṣaḥ asteḥ laṭ . katham avyayatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_10: upasargavibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasñjñā . nipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3421_0: 714-719 atha kiṃsabrahmacārī iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti aha . kaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:3421_1: vigrahaḥ . ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti . yadi evam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3421_2: . na hi anyat pṛṣṭena anyat ākhyāyate . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3422_0: keṣām sabrahmacārī kiṃsbrahmacārī iti . prativacanam ca eva na upapadyate svare ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3422_1: doṣaḥ bhavati . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3422_2: ca iṣyate . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ sabrahmacārī kiṃsabrahmacārī
GS24pmbhasuu:3422_3: iti . bhavet prativacanam upapannam svare tu doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3422_4: kariṣyate . kaḥ sabrahmacārī tava kiṃsabrahmacārī tvam iti . atha vā punaḥ astu evam vigrahaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3423_0: ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti . nanu ca uktam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3423_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . agnaukaravāṇinyāyena bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . kaḥ cit kam cit āha
GS24pmbhasuu:3423_2: . agnau karavāṇi iti . kuru iti kartari anujñāte karma api anujñātam bhavati . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_0: agnau kariṣyate iti . kriyatām iti karmaṇi anujñāte kartā api anujñātaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_1: yathā eva khalu api ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti kaṭhāḥ iti ukte sambandhāt etat gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_2: . nūnam saḥ api kaṭha iti . evam kaṭhaḥ iti ukte sambandhāt etat gantavyam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_3: nūnam te api kaṭhāḥ iti . na khalu api te śakyāḥ samāsena pratinirdeṣṭum . upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_4: he te bhavanti . atha arthatṛtīyāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_5: asya vigrahaḥ . ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . kaḥ samāsārthaḥ . samāsārthaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_6: . anyapadārthaḥ hi nāma saḥ bhavati . yeṣām padānām samāsaḥ tataḥ anyasya padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_7: arthaḥ anyapadārthaḥ . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . ardham tṛtīyam anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_8: iti . evam api kaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate . kim hi tayoḥ ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_9: bhavati . astu tari evam vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . nanu ca uktam samāsārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_10: na upapadyate iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avayavena vigrahaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsārthaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_11: avayavena vigrahaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsārthaḥ asidvitīyaḥ anusasāra pāṇḍavam . saṅkarṣaṇadvitīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_12: balam kṛṣṇasya vardhatām iti. dvayoḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_13: ardham tṛtīyam anayoḥ . nanu ca uktam . ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_14: doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha devadattasya bhrātā iti kaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_15: . tatra etat syāt . ekasmāt prādurbhāvaḥ iti . etat ca vārtam . tat yathā . sārthikanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_16: ekapratiśraye uṣitānām prātaḥ utthāya pratiṣṭhamānānām na kaḥ cit parasparam sambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_17: bhavati . evañjātīyakam bhrātṛtvam nāma . atra cet yuktaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ dṛśyate iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_18: api yuktaḥ dṛśyatām . iha tarhi ardhatṛtīyāḥ ānīyantām iti ukte ardhasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_19: na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_20: anusasāra pāṇḍavam . saṅkarṣaṇadvitīyasya balam kṛṣṇasya vardhatām iti. dvayoḥ dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_21: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tīyantaḥ śabdaḥ asti eva pūraṇam . asti sahāyavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_22: . tat yaḥ sahāyavācī tasya idam grahaṇam . asidvitīyaḥ asisahāyaḥ iti gamyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_23: api ardhatṛtīyāḥ iti ekasmin ekavacanam iti ekavacanam prāpnoti . ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_24: bhavanti . tat yathā śatam yūtham vanam iti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_25: tṛtīyam anayoḥ iti . nanu ca uktam ardhatṛtīyāḥ ānīyantām iti ukte ardhasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_26: na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_27: yathā . śuklavāsasam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_28: tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . atha vā punaḥ astu ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_29: iti . nanu ca uktam ekavacanam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_30: . saṅkhyeyam anayā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra ekavacanam syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_31: syāt . iha tarhi ardhatṛtīyāḥ droṇāḥ iti ayam droṇaśabdaḥ samudāye pravṛttaḥ avayave
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_32: na upapadyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyeṣu api śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante.
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_33: tad yathā . pūrve pañcālāḥ uttare pañcālāḥ tailam bhuktam ghṛtaṃ bhuktam śuklaḥ nīlaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_34: kapilaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam samudāye droṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartati
GS24pmbhasuu:3424_35: . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā yadā dvau droṇau ardhārḍhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3425_0: ca kartavyam ardhatṛtīyāḥ droṇāḥ iti . na kartavyam . samudāyeṣu api hi śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3425_1: avayaveṣu api vartante. keṣu avayaveṣu . yaḥ avayavaḥ tam samudāyam na vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:3425_2: . kam ca samudāyam na vyabhicarati . ardhdroṇaḥ droṇam . ardhāḍhakam punaḥ vyabhicarati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3427_0: 719-724 dvitrāḥ tricaturāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3427_1: . dvau vā trayaḥ vā iti . bhavet yadā bahūnām ānayanam tadā bahuvacanam upapannam
GS24pmbhasuu:3427_2: yadā tu khalu dvau ānīyete tadā na sidhyati . tadā api sidhyati . katham . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3428: anirjñāte arthe bahuvacanam prayoktavyam iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3429: kati bhavataḥ putrāḥ . kati bhavataḥ bhāryāḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_0: dvau vā iti ukte trayaḥ vā iti gamyate . trayaḥ vā iti ukte dvau vā iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_1: sā eṣā pañcādhiṣṭhānā vāk . atra yuktam bahuvacanam . atha dvidaśāḥ tridaśāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_2: kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ . dviḥ daśa dviśaśāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_3: . saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyāprasiddhiḥ . saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_4: iti aprasiddhiḥ . na hi sujantā saṅkhyā asti . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_5: . dvau daśatau dvidaśāḥ iti . evam api atkārāntatvāt saṅkhyā iti aprasiddhiḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_6: hi atkārāntā saṅkhyā asti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ dviḥ daśa dviśaśāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_7: nanu ca uktam saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyā iti aprasiddhiḥ iti . na vā asujantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_8: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . asujantatvāt . sujantā iti ucyate . na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_9: sujantam paśyāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vākye suc dṛśyate samāse tu na dṛśyate . sujabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_10: ahihitārthatvāt samāse . samāse sucaḥ abhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ahihitārthatvāt . abhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_11: sujarthaḥ samāsena iti kṛtvā samāse suc na bhaviṣyati .kim ca bhoḥ sujarthe iti samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_12: ucyate . na khalu sujarthe iti ucyate gamyate tu sujarthaḥ . katham . yāvatā saṅkhyeyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_13: yaḥ saṅkhyayā saṅkhyāyate saḥ ca kriyābhyāvṛttyarthaḥ . saḥ ca uktaḥ samāsena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_14: kṛtvā samāse suc na bhaviṣyati . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ saṅkhyeyavābhidhyāyitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_15: . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . saṅkhyeyavābhidhyāyitvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_16: saṅkhyeyam vārthaḥ ca abhidīyate . tatra anyapadārthe iti eva siddham . bhavet siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_17: adhikaviṃśāḥ adhikatriṃśāḥ iti yatra etat vicāryate . viśatyādayaḥ daśadarthe vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_18: syuḥ parimāṇini vā iti . idam tu na sidhyati adhikadaśāḥ iti yatra niyogataḥ saṅkhyeye
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_19: eva vartate . atha upadaśāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_20: vigrahaḥ . daśānām samīpe upadaśāḥ iti . kasya punaḥ sāmīpyam arthaḥ . upasya . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_21: evam na anyapadārthaḥ bhavati . tatra prathānirdiṣṭam saṅkhyāgrahaṇam śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_22: . matvarthe vā pūrvasya vidhānāt . atha vā matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3430_23: ārambhaḥ . kababhāvārtham vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_1: ca aśiṣyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . antarālapradhānābhidhānāt . diksamāse sahayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_2: ca antarālam pradhānam ca abhidhīyate . tatra anyapadārthe iti eva siddham . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_3: evam dakṣiṇapūrvā dik samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . adya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_4: iyam sā eva dakṣiṇā sā eva pūrvā iti kṛtvā samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_5: bhavati . na sidhyati . bhāṣitapuṃskasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . na ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_6: . nanu ca bhoḥ dakṣiṇaśabdaḥ pūrvaśabdaḥ ca puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_7: bhāṣitapuṃskam . ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . dakṣiṇā pūrvā iti dikśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_8: . dakṣiṇaḥ pūrvaḥ iti vyavasthāśabdau . yadi punaḥ dikśabdāḥ api vyavasthāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_9: syuḥ . katham yāni digapadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi . yadā diśaḥ vyavasthām vakṣyanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_10: tari yaḥ yaḥ diśi vartate saḥ saḥ dikśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_11: dik śobhanā dik iti . atha matam etat diśi dṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ digdiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_12: diśam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati . puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_13: tu prāpnoti . evam tarhi sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_14: iti evamartham . evam ca kṛtvā dik diksamāsasahayogayoḥ ca antarālapradhānābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_15: iti eva . nanu ca uktam dakṣiṇapūrvā dik samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_16: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvena parihṛtam . matvarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_17: vā pūrvasya vidhānāt . atha vā matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3433_18: . kababhāvārtham vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:3435_2: iti eva siddham . na vā ekaśeṣapratiṣedhārtham . na vā aśiṣyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekaśeṣapratiṣedhārtham

GS24pmbhasuu:3435_5: anyeṣām api dṛśyate iti dīrghatvam na prayojanam bhavati . matvarthe vā pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3435_6: vidhānāt . atha va matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kababhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3435_7: vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3437_0: 729-730 cārthe iti ucyate caḥ ca avyayam . tena samāsasya avyayasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3437_1: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pāṭhena avyayasañjñā kriyate . na ca samāsaḥ tatra paṭhyate . pāṭhena
GS24pmbhasuu:3437_2: api avyayasañjñāyām satyām abhideheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3437_3: abhidhīyate na tasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti . na idam vācanikam aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3437_4: va . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3438_0: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3438_1: kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3438_2: iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum . yat prāk samāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3438_3: cārthasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ na asti samāse ca bhavati svābhāvikam etat . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3438_4: vā āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3440_0: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3440_1: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3440_2: bhavati samāsaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati . atha iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3440_3: kasmāt na bhavati . yājñikaḥ ca ayam vaiyākaraṇaḥ ca . kaṭhaḥ ca ayam bahvṛcaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3440_4: . aukthikaḥ ca ayam mīmāṃsakaḥ ca iti . śeṣaḥ iti vartate . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3440_5: . yadi śeṣaḥ iti vartate upāsnātam sthūlasiktam tūṣṇīṅgaṅgam mahāhradam droṇam cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3440_6: aśakaḥ gantum mā tvā tāptām kṛtākṛte iti etat na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3442_0: 731-741 cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . cārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3442_1: dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭam prāpnoti . ahaḥ ahaḥ nayamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3442_2: gām aśvam puruṣam paśum vaivasvataḥ na tṛpyati surāyāḥ iva durmadī indraḥ tvaṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:3442_3: varuṇaḥ vāyuḥ ādityaḥ iti . siddham tu yugapadadhikaraṇavacane dvandvavacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3442_4: etat . katham . yugapadadhikaraṇavacane dvandvaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . tatra puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3442_5: . tatra etasmin lakṣaṇe puṃvadbhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paṭvīmṛdvyau . samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3442_6: puṃvadbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . vipratiṣiddheṣu ca anupapattiḥ . vipratiṣiddheṣu yugapadadhikaraṇavacatāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3442_7: anupapattiḥ . śītoṣṇe sukhaduḥkhe jananamaraṇe . kim kāraṇam . sukhapratighātena
GS24pmbhasuu:3442_8: hi duḥkham duḥkapratighātena ca sukham . yat tāvat ucyate tatra puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_0: atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . darśanīyāyāḥ mātā darśanīyāmātā iti . atha matam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_1: prāk samāsāt yatra sāmānādhikaraṇyam tatra puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhavati iti iha api na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_2: bhavati . yad api ucyate vipratiṣiddheṣu ca anupapattiḥ iti . sarve eva hi śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_3: vipratiṣiddhāḥ . iha api plakṣanyagrodhau iti plakṣaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ plakṣārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_4: sampratyāyayati nyagrodhārtham nivartayati . nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ nyagrodhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_5: sampratyāyayati plakṣārtham nivartayati . atra cet yuktā yugapat adhikaraṇvacanatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_6: dṛśyate iha api yuktā dṛśyatām . evam api śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_7: . śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam prāpnoti . ataḥ kim . yugapatadhikaraṇavacanatāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_8: anupapattiḥ . plakṣanyagrodhau plakṣanyagrodhāḥ iti . yatha eva hi śabdānām paurvāparyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3443_9: tadvat arthānām api bhavitavyam . śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3444_0: plakṣanyagrodhau plakṣanyagrodhāḥ iti . plakṣaśabdaḥ sārthakaḥ nivṛttaḥ nyagrodhaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3444_1: upasthitaḥ ekārthaḥ tasya ekārthatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . vigrahe tu yugapadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3444_2: jñāpakam yugapadvacanasya . vigrahe khalu api yugapadvacanatā dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_0: dyavā ha kṣamā . dyavā cit asmai pṛthivī namete iti . kim etat . yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_1: upodbalakam . vigrahe kila nāma yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatā syāt kim punaḥ samāse .
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_2: samudāyāt siddham . samudāyāt siddham etat . kim etat samudāyāt siddham iti . dvivacanabahuvacanaprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_3: iti coditam . tasya ayam parihāraḥ . samudāyāt siddham iti cet na ekārthatvāt samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_4: . samudāyāt siddham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt samudāyasya . ekārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_5: hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā śatam yūtham vanam iti . na aikārthyam . na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_6: ekārthaḥ . kim tarhi . dvyarthaḥ bahvarthaḥ ca . plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ nyagrodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_7: api dvyarthaḥ . yadi tarhi plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api dvyarthaḥ tayoḥ anekārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_8: bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_9: . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti cet na bahutvābhāvāt . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_10: bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . bahutvābhāvāt . na atra bahutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_11: asti . kim ucyate bahutvābhāvāt iti yāvatā idānīm eva uktam plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_12: nyagrodhaḥ api dvyarthaḥ iti . yābhyām eva atra ekaḥ dvyarthaḥ tābhyām eva aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_13: api . yadi evam anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ . anyavācakena śabdena anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_14: vacanam na upapadyate . anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ iti cet plakṣasya nyagrodhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_15: nyagrodhasya plakṣatvāt svaśabdena abhidhānam . anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_16: iti cet ucyate tat na . kim kāraṇam . plakṣasya nyagrodhatvāt nyagrodhasya plakṣatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_17: svaśabdena abhidhānam . plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_18: plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ syāt yāvatā kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445_19: . kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ iti cet tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham . kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3446_0: tat na tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham . tulyam hi kāraṇam . yadi tāvat prakṣarati iti plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3446_1: syān nyagrodhe api etat bhavati . tathā yadi nyak rohati iti nyagrodhaḥ plakṣe api
GS24pmbhasuu:3446_2: etat bhavati . darśanam vai hetuḥ na ca nyagrodhe plakṣaśabdaḥ dṛśyate . darśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3446_3: hetuḥ iti cet tulyam . darśanam hetuḥ iti cet tulyam etat bhavati . plakṣe api nyagrodhaśabdaḥ dṛśyatām . tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_0: hi kāraṇam . na vai loke eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati . na hi plakṣaḥ ānīyatām iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_1: nyragrodhaḥ ānīyate . tadviṣayam ca . tadviṣayam ca etat draṣṭavyam plakṣasya nyagrodhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_2: . kiṃviṣayam . dvandvaviṣayam . yuktam punaḥ yat niyataviṣayāḥ nāma śabdāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_3: bāḍham yuktam . anyatra api tadviṣayadarśanāt . anyatra api hi niyataviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_0: samāne rakte varṇe gauḥ lohitaḥ iti bhavati āsvaḥ śoṇaḥ iti . samāne ca kāle varṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_1: gauḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ hemaḥ iti . samāne ca śukle varṇe gauḥ śvetaḥ iti bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_2: aśvaḥ karkaḥ iti . yadi tarhi plakṣaḥ api nyagraodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_3: uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_4: na upapadyate . plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . ekena uktatvāt aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_5: prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_6: ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . anuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_7: plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa nyagrodhārthaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_8: nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate . katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_9: nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ iti . sahabhūtau etau anyonyasya artham āhatuḥ na pṛthagbhūtau
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_10: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sahabhūtau etau anyonyasya artham āhatuḥ na pṛthagbhūtau . abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_11: punaḥ svābhāvikam . svābhāvikam abhidhānam . atha vā iha kau cit prāthamakalpikau
GS24pmbhasuu:3448_12: plakṣanyagrodhau kau cit kriyayā vā guṇena va plakṣaḥ iva ayam plakṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3449: nyagrodhaḥ iva ayam nyagrodhaḥ iti . tatra plakṣau iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_0: kim imau plakṣau āhosvit plakṣanyagrodhau iti . tatra asandehārtham nyagrodhaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_1: prayujyate . iyam yugapadadhikaraṇavacanata nāma duḥkhā ca durupapādā ca . yat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_2: api asyā nibandhanam uktam dyāvā ha kṣāmā iti tat api chāndasam . tatra supām supaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_3: bhavanti iti eva siddham . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_4: cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_5: doṣaḥ . iha ce dvandve iti iyatā siddham . katham punaḥ ce nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_6: hi eṣaḥ . śabde asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_7: arthagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam evam yathā vijñāyeta cena kṛtaḥ artaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_8: cārthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ cena kṛtaḥ arthaḥ . samuccayaḥ anvācayaḥ itaretarayogaḥ samāhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_9: iti . samuccayaḥ . plakṣaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat nyagrodhaḥ ca iti . anvācayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_10: . plakṣaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat sāpaekṣaḥ ayam prayujyate iti . itaretarayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_11: . plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhasahāyaḥ nyagrodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_12: api plakṣasahāyaḥ iti . samāhāre api kriyate plakṣanyagrodham iti . tatra ayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_13: arthaḥ dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati . samāhārasya ekatvāt eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_0: 742-743 ekādaśa dvādaśa iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ . ekādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_1: daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ samāsaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_2: . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanam prāpnoti . ekaviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_3: dvāviṃśatiḥ . siddham tu adhikāntā saṅkhya saṅkhyayā samānādhikaraṇādhikāre adhikalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_4: ca . siddham etat . katham . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre vaktavyam adhikāntā saṅkhya saṅkhyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_5: saha samasyate adhikaśabdasya ca lopaḥ bhavati iti . ekādhikā viṃśatiḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_6: dvyadhikā viṃśatiḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ . yadi samānādhikaraṇaḥ svaraḥ na sidhyati . yat hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_7: tat saṅkhyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti dvandve iti tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_8: dvandve iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt śatasahasram iti . astu tarhi dvandvaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_9: ca uktam ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti. na
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_10: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvaḥ dvandvaḥ vibhāṣā ekavat bhavati . yadā tarhi ekavacanam tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3452_11: napuṃsakaliṅgam prāpnoti . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:3454_0: 743-744 kimartham idam ucyate . upasarjanasya pūrvavacanam paraprayoganivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3454_1: . upasarjanasya pūrvavacanam kriyate paraprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti . na vā aniṣṭadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3454_2: . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭadarśanāt . na hi kim cit aniṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3454_3: dṛśyate . na hi kaḥ cit rājapuruṣaḥ iti prayoktavye puruṣarājaḥ iti prayuṅkte . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3454_4: ca aniṣṭam drśyete tataḥ yatnārtham syāt . atha yatra dve ṣaṣṭhyante bhavataḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3454_5: tatra pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhavati . rājñaḥ puruṣasya rājapuruṣasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3454_6: ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:3454_7: arthābhedāt pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3454_8: upasarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ iti kṛtvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_0: 744-746 kim ayam tantram taranirdeśaḥ āhosvit atantram . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tantram
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_1: dvayoḥ niyamaḥ bahuṣu aniyamaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śaṅkhadundubhivīṅānām iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_2: . dundubhiśabdasya api pūrvnipātaḥ prāpnoti . atha atantram mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_3: pṛthak nadanti saṃsadi. prāsāde dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti etat na sidhyati . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_4: icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat tantram . nanu ca uktam dvayoḥ niyamaḥ bahuṣu aniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_5: iti . tatra śaṅkhadundubhivīṅānām iti na sidhyati . dundubhiśabdasya api pūrvnipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_6: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat alpāctaram iti tat alpāc iti vakṣyāmi . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_7: vā punaḥ astu atantram . nanu ca uktam mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ pṛthak nadanti saṃsadi.
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_8: prāsāde dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti etat na sidhyati iti . atantre taranirdeśe śaṅkhatūṇavayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_9: mṛdaṅgena samāsaḥ . atantre taranirdeśe śaṅkhatūṇavayoḥ mṛdaṅgena samāsaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_10: . śaṅkhaḥ ca tūṇavaḥ ca śaṇkhatūṇavau . mṛdaṅgaḥ ca śaṇkhatūṇavau ca mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_11: . rāmaḥ ca keśavaḥ ca rāmakeśavau dhanapatiḥ ca rāmakeśavau ca dhanapatirāmakeśavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_12: teṣām dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti . atha yatra bahūnām pūrvanipātaprasaṅgaḥ kim tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_13: ekasya niyamaḥ bhavati ahosvit aviśeṣeṇa . anekaprāptau ekasya niyamaḥ aniyamaḥ śeṣeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3456_14: . anekaprāptau ekasya niyamaḥ aniyamaḥ śeṣeṣu . paṭumṛduśuklāḥ paṭuśuklamṛdavaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3458_0: 746-747 ṛtunakṣatrāṇām ānupūrvyeṇa samānākṣarāṇām . ṛtunakṣatrāṇām ānupūrvyeṇa samānākṣarāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3458_1: pūrvanipātaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śiśiravasantau udagayanasthau kṛttikārohiṇyaḥ . abhyarhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3458_2: . abhyarhitam pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . mātāpitarau śraddhāmedhe . laghvakṣaram
GS24pmbhasuu:3458_3: . laghvakṣaram pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . kuśakāśam śaraśīryam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3459_0: sarvatra eva abhyarhitam pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . laghvakṣarāt api iti . śraddhātapasī
GS24pmbhasuu:3459_1: dīkṣātapasī . varṇānām ānupūrvyeṇa . varṇānām ānupūrvyeṇa pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3459_2: vaktavyam . brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrāḥ . bhrātuḥ ca jyāyasaḥ . bhrātuḥ ca jyāyasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3459_3: pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yudhiṣṭhirārjunau . saṅkhyāyāḥ alpīyasaḥ . saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3459_4: alpīyasaḥ pūrvanipātaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekādaśa dvādaśa . dharmādiṣu ubhayam . dharmādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3459_5: ubhayam pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . dharmārthau arthadharmau kāmārthau arthakāmau
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . viśvadevaḥ viśvayasāḥ dviputraḥ dvibhāryaḥ . atha yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_2: saṅkhyāsarvanāmnoḥ eva bahurvīhiḥ kasya tatra pūrvanipātena bhavitavyam . paratvāt saṅkhyāyāḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3462_0: dvyanyāya tryanyāya . vā priyasya . vā priyasya pūrvanipātaḥ vaktavyaḥ . priyaguḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3462_1: guḍapriyaḥ . saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte gaḍvādibhyaḥ paravacanam . saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte
GS24pmbhasuu:3462_2: gaḍvādibhyaḥ parā saptamībhavati iti vaktavyam . gaḍukaṇṭhaḥ gaḍuśirāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_0: 748-749 niṣṭhāyāḥ pūrvanipāte jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ paravacanam . niṣṭhāyāḥ pūrvanipāte
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_1: jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ parā niṣṭhā bhavati iti vaktavyam . śārṅgajagdhī palāṇḍubhakṣitī
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_2: māsajātā saṃvatsarajātā sukhajātā duḥkhajātā . na vā uttarapadasya antodāttavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_3: jñāpakam parabhāvasya . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . uttarapadasya antodāttavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_4: jñāpakam parabhāvasya . yat ayam jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ parasyāḥ niṣṭhāyāḥ uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_5: antodāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ parā atra niṣṭhā bhavati iti . pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_6: tu pūrvanipātaprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ . pratiṣedhe tu pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_7: prāpnoti . akṛtamitapratipannāḥ iti . tasmāt rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_8: kartavyaḥ . atra api pratiṣedhavacanam jñāpakam parā niṣṭhā bhavati iti . praharaṇārthebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_9: ca . praharaṇārthebhyaḥ ca pare niṣṭhāsaptamyau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . asyudyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_10: musalodyataḥ asipāṇiḥ daṇḍapāṇiḥ . dvandve ghi ajādyantam vipratiṣedhena . dvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_11: ghi iti asmāt ajādyantam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . dvandve ghi iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_12: paṭuguptau . ajādyadantam iti asya avakāśaḥ uṣṭrakharau . iha ubhayam prāpnoti indrāgnī
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_13: . ajādyadantam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ubhābhyām alpāctaram . ubhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_14: alpāctaram iti etat bhavati . dvandve ghi iti asya avakāśaḥ paṭuguptau . alpāctaram
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_15: iti asya avakāśaḥ vāgdṛṣadau . iha ubhayam prāpnoti vāgagnī . alpāctaram iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_16: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ajādyadantam iti asya avakāśaḥ uṣṭrakharau . alpāctaram
GS24pmbhasuu:3464_17: iti asya avakāśaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti vāgindrau . alpāctaram iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3466_0: 750 kaḍārādayaḥ iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . gaḍulaśāṇḍilyaḥ śāṇḍilyagaḍulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3466_1: khaṇḍavātsyaḥ vatsyakaṇḍaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahuvacananirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_0: 751-762 anabhihite iti ucyate . kim idam anabhihitam nāma . uktam nirdiṣṭam abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_1: iti anarthāntaram . yāvat brūyāt anukte anirdiṣṭe iti tāvat anabhihite iti . anabhihitavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_2: anarthakam anyatra api vihitasya abhāvāt abhihite . anabhihitavacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_3: . kim kāraṇam . anyatra api vihitasya abhāvāt abhihite . anyatra api abhihite vihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_4: na bhavati . kva anyatra . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt matvarthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_5: matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati . gargāḥ vatsāḥ vidāḥ urvāḥ . yañañbhyām uktatvāt apatyārthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_6: nyāyyotpattiḥ na bhavati . saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadamiti . samāsena uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_7: dvirvacanam na bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate citraguḥ śabalguḥ bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_8: matvarthasya matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati iti . astinā sāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_9: . na ca atra astinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam . yat api ucyate gargāḥ vatsāḥ vidāḥ urvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_10: yañañbhyām uktatvāt apatyārthasya nyāyyotpattiḥ na bhavati iti . samarthānām prathamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_11: vā iti vartate . na ca etat samarthānām prathamam . kiṃ tarhi . dvitīyam arthamupasaṃkrāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_12: . yat api ucyate saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadam iti samāsena uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_13: na bhavati iti . yat atra vīpsāyuktam na adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . parvaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3468_14: parvaṇi sapta parṇāni asya . paṅktau paṅktau aṣṭau padāni iti . śnambahujakakṣu tarhi . śnam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3469: bhinatti chinatti . śnamā uktatvāt kartṛtvasya kartari śap na bhavati . bahuc : bahukṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3470: bahubhinnam iti . bahucā uktatvāt īṣadasmāpteḥ kalpabādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . akac : uccakaiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_0: nīcakaiḥ iti . akacā uktatvāt kutsādīnām kādayaḥ na bhavanti . nanu ca śnambahujakacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_1: apavādāḥ te apavādatvāt bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . śnambahujakakṣu nānādeśatvāt utsargāpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_2: . samānadeśaiḥ apavādaiḥ utsargāṇām bādhanam bhavati . nānādeśatvāt na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_3: kim punaḥ iha akartavyaḥ anabhihitādhikāraḥ kriyate āhosvit anyatra kartavyaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_4: kriyate . iha akartavyaḥ kriyate . eṣaḥ eva hi nyāyyaḥ pakṣaḥ yat abhihite vihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_5: na syāt . anabhitaḥ tu vibhaktyarthaḥ tasmāt anabhihitavacanam . anabhihitaḥ tu vibhaktyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_6: . kaḥ punaḥ vibhaktyarthaḥ . ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ teṣu anabhihiteṣu karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_7: bhihitāḥ vibhaktīnām utpattau nimittatvāya mā bhūvan iti . tasmāt anabhihitavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_8: . tasmāt anabhihitādhikāraḥ kriyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_9: iti . abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ . yaḥ hi manyate karmādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ teṣu abhihiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_10: sāmarthyāt me vibhaktīnām utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati iti prathamā tasya na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_11: kva . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ .kiṃ kāraṇam . prātipadikena uktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_12: kva cit prātipadikena anuktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ ucyate ca prathamā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_13: . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya te ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_14: iti . prathamā te na prāpnoti . kva . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_15: . tiṅā uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti . anabhihitādhikāram ca tvam karoṣi parigaṇanam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_16: na kva cit tiṅā ekatvādīnām anabhidhānam ucyate ca prathamā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3471_17: . nanu ca iha anabhidhānam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . atra api abhidhānam asti . katham . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_0: astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_1: . asti iti gamyate . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya te karmādayaḥ vibhaktyārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_2: abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ iti . prathamā te prāpnoti . kva . kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_3: śobhanam darśanīyam iti . kaṭaśabdāt utpadyamānayā dvitīyayā abhihitam karma iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_4: kṛtvā bhīṣādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na prāpnoti . kā tarhi prāpnoti . prathamā . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_5: . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti . karoteḥ utpadyamānena ktena abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_0: karma iti kṛtvā bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na bhavati . kā tarhi . prathamā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_1: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi mama anabhihitādhikāraḥ asti na api parigaṇanam . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_2: me vibhaktīnām utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti ca sāmarthyam . kim . karmaviśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_3: . atha vā kaṭaḥ api karma bhīṣmādayaḥ api . tatra karmaṇi iti eva siddham . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_4: vā kaṭaḥ eva karma tat sāmānādhikaraṇyāt bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_5: khalvapi viśeṣaḥ kaṭaṃ karoti bhīṣmamudāram śobhanam darśanīyam iti ca kṛtaḥ kaṭo
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_6: bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti ca . karoteḥ utpadyamānaḥ ktaḥ anavayavena
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_7: sarvam karma abhidhatte . kaṭaśabdāt punaḥ utpadyamānayā dvitīyayā yat kaṭastham
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_8: karma tat śakyamabhidhātum na hi karmaviśeṣaḥ . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_9: te ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ iti . prathamā te na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_10: . kva . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikena uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_11: . karmādiṣu api vai vibhaktyartheṣu avaśyam ekatvādayaḥ nimittatvena upādeyāḥ . karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_12: evatve karmaṇaḥ dvitve karmaṇaḥ bahutve iti . na ca ekatvādīnām ekatvādayaḥ santi
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_13: . atha santi mama api santi . teṣu anabhihiteṣu prathamā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ubhayavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_14: hyete . dravyam ca āhuḥ guṇam ca . yatsthaḥ asau guṇaḥ tasya anuktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_15: iti kṛtvā prathamā bhaviṣyati . atha vā saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā . saṃkhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_16: anayā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra prathamā na syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_17: vā vakṣyati tatra vacanagrahaṇasya prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_18: syāt iti . atha vā samayāt bhaviṣyati . yadi sāmayakī na niyogataḥ anyāḥ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_19: bhavanti . karmādīnām abhāvāt . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_20: na bhaviṣyati . evam api vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti . ekasmin api dvivacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3473_21: . dvayoḥ api ekavavacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ . bahuṣu api ekavacanadvivacane prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_1: parisaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tiṅ . kriyate kaṭaḥ . kṛt . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ . taddhita . aupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_2: kāpaṭavaḥ . samāsa . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . utsarge hi prātipadikasāmānādhikaraṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_3: vibhaktivacanam . utsarge hi prātipadikasāmānādhikaraṇye vibhaktiḥ vaktavyā . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_4: . kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram śobhanam darśanīyam iti . kaṭaśabdāt utpadyamānayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_5: dvitīyayā abhihitam karma iti kṛtvā bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na prāpnoti . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_6: syāt . ṣaṣṭhī . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . anyāḥ api na prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_7: . kim kāraṇam . karmādīn āmabhāvāt . samayaśca kṛtaḥ ne kevalā prakṛtiḥ proktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_8: na kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . na cānyā utpadyamānā etam abhisambandham utsahante vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_9: iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . atha vā kaṭaḥ api karma bhīṣmādayaḥ api . tatra karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3475_10: iti eva siddham . atha vā kaṭaḥ eva karma . tatsāmānādhikaraṇyāt bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3477: 764-767 dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ kārake anyatareṇa abhihite vibhaktyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ . dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ kārake anyatareṇa abhihite vibhaktiḥ na prāpnoti . kva . prāsāde āste ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_0: śayane āste iti . kim kāraṇam . sadipratyayena abhihitam adhikaraṇam iti kṛtvā saptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_1: na prāpnoti . na vā anyatareṇa anabhidhānāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyatareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_2: anabhidhānāt . anyatareṇa atra anabhidhānam . sadipratyayena bhidhānam āsipratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_3: anabhidhānam . yataḥ anabhidhānam tadāśrayā saptamī bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ na khalu etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_4: sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca anabhihitāśrayā saptamī bhaviṣyati na punaḥ abhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_5: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . anabhihite hi vidhānam . anabhihite hi saptamī vidhīyate na abhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_6: pratiṣedhaḥ . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_7: yatra tu khalu sā eva kriyā tatra katham . āsane āste . śayane śete iti . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_8: anyatvam asti . kutaḥ . kālabhedāt sādhanabhedāt ca . ekasya atra āseḥ āsiḥ sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_9: sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_10: kim punaḥ dravyam sādhanam āhosvit guṇaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi dravyam sādhanam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_11: etat anyat bhavati abhihitāt . atha hi guṇaḥ sādhanam bhavati etat anyat abhihitāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_12: . anyaḥ hi sadiguṇaḥ anyaḥ ca āsiguṇaḥ . kiṃ punaḥ sādhanam nyāyyam . guṇaḥ iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_13: . katham jñāyate . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kva devadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_14: ācaṣṭe . asau vṛkṣe iti . katarasmin . yaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . saḥ vṛkṣaḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_15: bhūtvā anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ kartā sampadyate . dravye punaḥ sādhane
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_16: sati yat karma karma eva syāt yat karaṇam karaṇam eva yat adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_1: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prathamāvidhānasya anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśā prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_2: . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati. sāvakāśā prathamā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . akārakam . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_3: iti . avakāśaḥ akārakam iti cet na astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_4: api asti . avakāśaḥ akārakam iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_5: aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti gamyate . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate. vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_6: vā prathamābhāvaḥ. atha vā dvitīyādayaḥ kriyantām prathamā vā iti prathamā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_7: vipratiṣedhena . dvitīyādīnām avakāśaḥ kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram śobhanamdarśanīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_8: iti . prathamāyāḥ avakāśaḥ akārakam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_9: kaṭaḥ bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti . prathamā bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_10: . na sidhyati . paratvāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_11: . kṛtprayoge tu param vidhānam ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tatpratiṣedhārtham . kṛtprayoge tu paratvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_12: tṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . tatpratiṣedhārtham anabhihitādhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kartavyaḥ kaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3480_13: iti . saḥ katham kartavyaḥ . yadi ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ . atha hi karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3482: 769-770 samayānikaṣāhāyogeṣu upasaṅkhyānam . samayānikaṣāhāyogeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . samayā grāmam nikaṣā grāmam . hāyoge . hā devadattam . hā yajñadattam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3483_2: paritaḥ grāmam . samayā grāmam . nikaṣā grāmam . adhi adhi grāmam . dhik jālmam dhik
GS24pmbhasuu:3483_3: vṛṣalam . aparaḥ āha . ubhasarvatasoḥ kāryā dhiguparyādiṣu triṣu dvitīyā āmreḍitānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3483_4: tataḥ anyatra api dṛśyate . ubhaya sarva iti etābhyām tasantābhyām dvitīyā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3483_5: . ubhayataḥ grāmam sarvataḥ grāmam . dhigyoge . dhik jālmam dhik vṛṣalam . uparyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3483_6: triṣu āmreḍitānteṣu dvitīyā vaktavyā . upari upari grāmam . adhi adhi grāmam . adhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3483_7: adhaḥ grāmam . tataḥ anyatra api dṛśyate . na devadattam pratibhāti kim cit . bubhukṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_0: 771-772 kimartham idam ucyate . tṛtīyā yathā syāt . atha dvitīyā siddhā . siddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_1: karmaṇi iti eva . tṛtīyā api siddhā . katham . supām supaḥ bhavanti iti eva . asati
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_2: etasmin supām supaḥ bhavanti iti tṛtīyārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . yavāgvā agnihotraṃ juhoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_3: . evam tarhi tṛtīyā api siddhā . katham . kartṛkaraṇayoḥ iti eva . ayam agnihotraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_4: asti eva jyotiṣi vartate . tadyathā . agnihotram prajvalayati iti . asti haviṣi vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_5: . tat yathā . agnihotram juhoti iti . juhotiḥ ca asti eva prakṣepaṇe vartate asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_6: prīṇātyarthe vartate . tat yathā tāvat yavāgūśabdāt tṛtīyā tadā agnihotraśabdaḥ jyotiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_7: vartate juhotiḥ ca prīṇātyarthe . tat yathā . yavāgvā agnihotram juhoti . agniṃ prīṇāti
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_8: . yadā yavāgūśabdāt dvitīyā tadā agnihotraśabdaḥ haviṣi vartate juhotiḥ ca prakṣepaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3485_9: . tat yathā . yavāgūm agnihotram juhoti . yavāgūm haviḥ agnau prakṣipati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3487_0: 772-774 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kim te bābhravaśālaṅkāyanānām antareṇa gatena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3487_1: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . atha vā yadi api tāvat ayam antareṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3487_2: dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ nipātaḥ ca anipātaḥ ca ayaṃ tu khalu antarāśabdaḥ adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ nipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3487_3: eva . tasya asya kaḥ anyaḥ dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ nipātāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3487_4: tat yathā . asya goḥ dvitīyena arthaḥ iti gauḥ eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gadarbhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3487_6: vaktavyam . apradhāne dvīiyā bhavati iti vaktavyam . antarā tvām ca mām ca kamaṇḍaluḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3487_7: iti . kamaṇḍaloḥ dvitīyā mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ etābhyām kamaṇḍaloḥ yogaḥ . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3487_8: tat tvām ca mām ca antarā tat kamaṇḍaloḥ sthānam . tatt arhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3487_9: . kamaṇḍaloḥ dvitīyā kasmāt na bhavati . upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_0: 774-777 atyantasaṃyoge karmavat lādyartham . atyantasaṃyoge kālādhvānau karmavat
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_1: bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . lādyartham . lādibhiḥ abhidhānam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_2: syāt . āsyate māsaḥ . śayyate krośaḥ . atha vatkaraṇam kimartham . svāśrayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_3: yathā syāt . āsyate māsam . śayyate krośam . akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati iti bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_4: laḥ yathā syāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prākṛtameva etat karma yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_5: kaṭam karoti śakaṭam karoti iti . evam manyate . yatra kaḥ citkriyākṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_6: upajāyate tat nyāyyam karma iti . na ca iha kaḥ cit kriyākṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ upajāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_7: . na evam śakyam . iha api na syāt . ādityam paśyati . himavantam śṛṇoti . grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_8: gacchati . tasmāt prākṛtameva etat karma yathā kaṭam karoti śakaṭam karoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_9: yadi tarhi prākṛtam eva etat karma akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati iti bhāve laḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_10: prāpnoti. āsyate māsam devadattena iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . akarmakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_11: iti ucyate na ca ke cit kālabhāvādhvabhiḥ akarmakāḥ . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_12: ye akarmakāḥ iti . atha vā yena karmaṇā sakarmakāḥ ca akarmakāḥ ca bhavanti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_13: akarmakāṇām . na ca etena karmaṇā kaḥ cid api akarmakaḥ . atha vā yat karma bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_14: na ca bhavati tena karmakāṇām . na ca etat karma kva cit api na bhavati . na tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_15: idānīm idam sūtram vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . yatra akriyayā atyantasaṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3489_16: tadartham . krośam kuṭilā nadī . krośam ramaṇīyā vanarājiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3491: 777 kriyāparvarge iti vaktavyam . sādhanāpavarge mā bhūt . māsam adhītaḥ anuvāko na ca anena gṛhītaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3493: 777-778 kriyāmadhye iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . adya devadattaḥ bhuktvā dvyahāt bhoktā dvyahe bhoktā . kārakamadhye iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3494_0: ihasthaḥ ayam iṣvāsaḥ krośāt lakṣyam vidhyati krośe lakṣyam vidhyati . yam ca vidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3494_1: yataḥ ca vidhyati ubhayoḥ tanmadhyam bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3494_2: . na antareṇa sādhanam kriyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ bhavati . kriyāmadhyam cet kārakamadhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3494_3: api bhavati tatra kārakamadhye iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_0: 778-779 karmapravacanīyayukte pratyādibhiḥ ca lakṣaṇādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam saptamīpañcamyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_1: pratiṣedhārtham . karmapravacanīyayukte pratyādibhiḥ ca lakṣaṇādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_2: kartavyam . vṛkṣam prati vidyotate vidyut . vṛkṣam pari . vṛkṣamanu . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_3: mātaram prati . mātaram pari . mātaram anu . kim prayojanam . saptamīpañcamyoḥ pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_4: . saptamīpañcamyau mā bhūtām iti . sādhunipuṇābhyām arcāyām saptamī iti saptamī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_5: pañcamī apāṅparibhiḥ iti pañcamī . tatra ayam api arthaḥ aprateḥ iti na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_6: bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . uktaṃ vā . kim uktam . ekatra tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_7: uktam aprateḥ iti . itaratra api yadi api tāvat ayam pariḥ dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ varjane ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_8: avarjane ca ayaṃ khalu apaśabdaḥ adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ varjanārthaḥ eva . tasya kaḥ anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_9: dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ varjanārthāt . tat yathā . asya goḥ dvitīyena
GS24pmbhasuu:3496_10: arthaḥ iti gauḥ eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gadarbhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3498_0: 779-782 katham idam vijñāyate . yasya ca aiśvaryam īśvaratā īśvarabhāvaḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3498_1: iti . āhosvit yasya svasya īśvaraḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3498_2: viśeṣaḥ . yasya ca īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ cet avacanāt siddham . yasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3498_3: īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ cet antareṇa vacanam siddham . adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3498_4: . ādhṛtāḥ te tasmin bhavanti . satyam evam etat . nityam parigrahītavyam parigrahītradhīnam
GS24pmbhasuu:3498_5: bhavati . prathamānupapattiḥ tu . prathamā na upapadyate . kutaḥ . pañcālebhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3498_6: kā tarhi syāt . ṣaṣṭhīsaptamyau . svāmīśvarādhipati iti . na tatra adhiśabdaḥ paṭhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3498_7: . yadi api na paṭhyate adhiḥ īśvaravācī . na tatra paryāyavacanānām grahaṇam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3498_8: jñāyate . yat ayam kasya cit paryāyavacanasya grahaṇam karoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_0: adhipatidāyāda iti . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_1: . dvitīyā tarhi prāpnoti karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . saptamyā uktatvāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_2: abhisambandhasya dvitīyā na bhaviṣyati . bhavet yaḥ adheḥ brahamadattasya ca abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_3: saḥ saptamyā uktaḥ syāt . yaḥ tu khalu adheḥ pañcālānām ca abhisambandhaḥ tatra dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_4: prāpnoti . svavacanāt siddham . astu yasya svasya īśvaraḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_5: iti . evam api antareṇa vacanam siddham . adhi brahmadattaḥ pañcāleṣu . ādhṛtaḥ sa
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_6: teṣu bhavati . satyam evam etat . nityam parigrahītā parigrahītavyādhīnaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_7: . prathamānupapattiḥ tu . prathamā na upapadyate . kutaḥ . brahmadattāt . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_8: syāt . ṣaṣṭhīsaptamyau . svāmīśvarādhipati iti . na tatra adhiśabdaḥ paṭhyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_9: api na paṭhyate adhiḥ īśvaravācī . na tatra paryāyavacanānām grahaṇam . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_10: . yat ayam kasya cit paryāyavacanasya grahaṇam karoti . adhipatidāyāda iti . ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_11: tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . dvitīyā tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_12: karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . saptamyā uktatvāt tasya abhisambandhasya dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_13: na bhaviṣyati . bhavet yaḥ dheḥ pañcālānām ca abhisambandhaḥ saḥ saptamyā uktaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_14: yaḥ tu khalu adheḥ brahmadattasya ca abhisaṃbandhaḥ tatra dvitīyā prāpnoti . evaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_15: tarhi svavacanāt siddham . adhiḥ svam prati karmapravacanīyasaṃjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_16: . evam api yadā brahmadatte adhikaraṇe saptamī tadā pañcālebhyaḥ dvitīyā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3499_17: karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīya iti . upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī iti

GS24pmbhasuu:3501_1: . panthānam gacchati . vīvadham gacchat i iti . āsthitapratiṣedhaḥ ca . āsthitapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3501_2: ca ayam vaktavyaḥ . yaḥ hi utpathena panthānam gacchati pathe gacchati iti eva tatra

GS24pmbhasuu:3537_9: utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt prakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3537_10: apavādaḥ vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya . anyasyā vibhakteḥ vacanāt cakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3537_11: anukarṣaṇārthasya akaraṇāt prakṛtāyaḥ pañcamyāḥ dvitīyāṣaṣṭhyau bādhike bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3537_12: yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā vakṣyati etat . anuvartante
GS24pmbhasuu:3537_13: ca nāma vidhayaḥ . na ca anuvartanāt eva bhavanti . kim tarhi . yatnāt bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3539_1: pañcamīvidhāne tadyuktātpañcamyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dūrād grāmasya . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3539_2: tatra api darśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ . na vā tatra api darśanāt pañcamyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3539_3: anarthakaḥ . tatra api pañcamī dṛśyate . dūrāt āvasathāt mūtram dūrāt pādāvasecanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3539_4: dūrāt ca bhāvyam dasyubhyaḥ dūrāt ca kupitāt guroḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:3541_1: inviṣayasya karmaṇi upsaṅkhyānam vaktavyam . adhītī vyākaraṇe . parigaṇitī yājñikye

GS24pmbhasuu:3541_4: ca kārakatve saptamī vaktavyā . ṛddheṣu bhuñjāneṣu daridrāḥ āsate . brāhmaṇeṣu taratsu
GS24pmbhasuu:3541_5: vṛṣalāḥ āsate . akārakārhāṇām cākārakatve . akārakārhāṇām cākārakatve saptamī vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3541_6: . mūrkheṣu āsīneṣu vṛddhāḥ bhuñjate . vṛṣaleṣu āsīneṣu brāhmaṇāḥ taranti . tadviparyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:3541_7: ca . tadviparyāse ca saptamī vaktavyā . ṛddheṣu āsīneṣu mūrkhāḥ bhuñjate . brāhmaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3541_8: āsīneṣu vṛṣalāḥ taranti . nimittāt karmasaṃyoge . nimittātkarmasaṃyoge saptamī vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3541_9: . carmaṇi dvīpinam hanti . dantayoḥ hanti kuñjaram . keṣeṣu camarīm hanti . sīmni puṣkalakaḥ hataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_0: 806-807 bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne abhāvalakṣaṇe upasaṅkhyānam . bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_1: abhāvalakṣaṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . agniṣu hūyamāneṣu prasthitaḥ huteṣu āgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_2: . goṣu duhyamānāsu prasthitaḥ dugdhāsu āgataḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_3: hi nāma tat bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . sakṛt ca asau katham cit agniṣu hūyamāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_4: prasthitaḥ huteṣu āgataḥ goṣu duhyamānāsu prasthitaḥ dugdhāsu āgataḥ . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_5: bhāvapravṛttau yasya bhāvārambhavacanāt . siddhametat . katham . yasya bhāvapravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_6: dvitīyaḥ bhāvaḥ ārabhyate tatra saptamī vaktavyā . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_7: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne abhāvalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_8: upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na khalu avaśyam tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati yena
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_9: punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . sakṛt api yat nimittatvāya kalpate tat api lakṣaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_10: . tat yathā . api bhavān kamaṇḍalupāṇim chātram adrākṣīt iti . sakṛt asau kamaṇḍalupāṇiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3543_11: dṛṣṭaḥ chātraḥ . tasya tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3545_0: 807 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kṛṣṇā gavām sampannakṣīratamā iti . vibhakte iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3545_1: . na ca etat vibhaktam . vibhaktametat . gobhyaḥ kṛṣṇā vibhajyate . vibhaktam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3545_2: yat nityam tatra bhavitavyam . na ca etat nityam vibhaktam . kim vaktavyam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:3545_3: na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . vibhaktagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi hi yat vibhaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3545_4: ca avibhaktam ca tatra syāt vibhāktagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3547: 808 apratyādibhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ mātaram pari . mātaram anu .
GS24pmbhasuu:3549: 808 prasitaḥ iti ucyate kaḥ prasitaḥ nāma . yaḥ tatra nityam pratibaddhaḥ . kutaḥ etat . sinotiḥ ayam badhnātyarthe vartate . baddhaḥ iva asau tatra bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3551: 808 iha kasmāt na bhavati . adya puṣyaḥ . adya maghā iti . adhikaraṇe iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_0: 809-814 prātipadikagrahaṇam kimartham . uccaiḥ nīcaiḥ iti āpi yathā syāt . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_1: atra prathamayā prārthyate . padatvam . na etat asti .ṣaṣṭhyā atra padatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam . grāmaḥ ucaiḥ te svam . grāmaḥ uccaiḥ tava svam . sapūrvāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_3: prathamāyāḥ vibhāṣā iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ yathā syāt . atha liṅgagrahaṇam kimartham . strī
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_4: pumān napuṃsakam iti ata api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . eṣaḥ eva atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_5: prātipadikārthaḥ . idam tarhi . kumārī vṛkṣaḥ kuṇḍam iti . atha parimāṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_6: kimartham . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti atra api yathā syāt . atha vacanagrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_7: . iha samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_8: . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_9: dṛṣṭānte yatra etāni samuditāni bhavanti tatra eva syāt . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_10: . iha na syāt . kumārī vṛkṣaḥ kuṇḍam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . pratyekam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_11: vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_12: tarhi prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā syāt . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_13: . atha mātragrahaṇam kimartham . etanmātre eva prathamā yathā syāt karmādiviśiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_14: mā bhūt iti . kaṭam karoti . na etat asti prayojanam . karmādiṣu dvitīyādyāḥ vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_15: tāḥ karmādiviśiṣṭe bādhikāḥ bhaviṣyanti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na karmādiviśiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_16: prathamā bhavati iti yat ayam sambodhane prathamām śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_17: . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . sā āmantritam iti vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_18: yat tarhi yogavibhāgam karoti . itarathā hi sambodhane āmantritam iti eva brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_19: . idam tarhi ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā syāt . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3553_20: vacanagrahaṇasya api etat prayojanam uktam . anyatarat śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_2: padasāmānādhikaraṇye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vīraḥ puruṣaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_3: na sidhyati . adhikatvāt . vyatiriktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ iti kṛtvā prathamā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_4: . katham vyatiriktiḥ . puruṣe vīratvam . na vā vākyārthatvāt . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_5: kim kāraṇam . vākyārthatvāt . yat atra ādhikyam vākyārthaḥ saḥ . atha vā abhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_6: prathamā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariyṣyate . abhihitalakṣaṇāyām anabhihite prathamāvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_7: . abhihitalakṣaṇāyāmanabhihite prathamā vidheyā . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . uktam vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_8: kim uktam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_9: plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate . abhihitānabhihite prathamābhāvaḥ . abhihitānabhhite
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_10: prathamā prāpnoti . kva . prāsāde āste . śayane āste . sadipratyayena abhihitam adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_11: iti kṛtvā prathamā prāpnoti . evam tarhi tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe prathamā iti etat lakṣaṇaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_12: kariṣyate . tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe iti cet tiṅaḥ aprayoge prathamāvidhiḥ . tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_13: iti cet tiṅaḥ aprayoge prathamā vidheyā . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣa iti . uktam pūrveṇa . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_14: uktam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_15: plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate . śatṛśānacoḥ ca nimittabhāvāt tiṅaḥ abhāvaḥ tayoḥ apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_16: . śatṛśānacoḥ ca nimittabhāvāt tiṅaḥ abhāvaḥ . kva . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_17: . kim kāraṇam . tayoḥ apavādatvāt . śatṛśānacau tiṅapavādau . tau ca atra bādhakau
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_18: . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_19: utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_20: atra kadā cit tiṅādeśo bhavati . apavādau tāvat śatṛśānacau pratīkṣate . pākṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_21: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katarasmin pakṣe . śatṛśānacoḥ dvaitam bhavati . aprathamā vā vidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_22: āśrīyate prathamā vā pratiṣedhena iti . vibhaktiniyame ca api dvaitam bhavati . vibhaktiniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_23: vā syāt arthaniyamaḥ vā iti . tat yadā tāvat arthaniyamaḥ aprathamā ca vidhinā āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_24: tadā eṣa doṣaḥ bhavati . yadā hi vibhaktiniyamaḥ yadi eva aprathamā vidhinā āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3555_25: atha api prathamā pratiṣedhena na tadā doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_0: 819-825 śeṣe iti ucyate. kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . karmādibhyaḥ ye anye arthāḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_1: yadi evam śeṣaḥ na prakalpate . na hi karmādibhyaḥ anye arthāḥ santi . iha tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_2: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti rājā kartā puruṣaḥ sampradānam . vṛkṣasya śākhā iti vṛkṣaḥ śākhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_3: adhikaraṇam . tathā yat etat svam nāma caturbhiḥ etat prakāraiḥ bhavati krayaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_4: apaharaṇāt yāñcāyāḥ vinimayāt iti . atra ca sarvatra karmādayaḥ santi. evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_5: karmādīnām avivakṣā śeṣaḥ . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avāvivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_6: bhavati . tat yathā . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_7: . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam . pratyayāvadhāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_8: śeṣavacanam . pratyayāvadhāraṇāt śeṣavacanam kartavyam . pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_9: aniyatāḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam ṣaṣṭhīniyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_10: śeṣe eva ṣaṣṭhī bhavati na anyatra iti . arthāvadhāraṇāt vā . atha vā arthāḥ niyatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_11: pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ te śeṣe api prāpnuvanti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣaniyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_12: . śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī eva bhavati na anyā iti . arthaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_13: katham . arthāḥ niyatāḥ pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhī bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_14: tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . yatra ṣaṣṭhī ca anyā ca prāpnoti ṣaṣṭhī eva tatra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_15: iti . ṣaṣṭhī śeṣe iti cet viśeṣyasya pratiṣedhaḥ . ṣaṣṭhī śeṣe iti cet viśeṣyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_16: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti atra rājā viśeṣaṇam puruṣaḥ viśeṣyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_17: tatra prātipadikārthaḥ vyatiriktaḥ iti kṛtvā prathamā na prāpnoti . tatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_18: syāt . tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tatra prathamāvidhiḥ . tatra ṣaṣṭhīm pratiṣidhya
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_19: prathamā vidheyā . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . uktam pūrveṇa . kimuktam . na vā vākyārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_20: iti . yadatrādikhyam vākyārthaḥ saḥ . kutaḥ nu khalu etat puruṣe yat ādikhyam saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_21: vākyārthaḥ iti na punaḥ rājani yat ādhikyam saḥ vākyārthaḥ syāt . antareṇa api puruṣaśabdaprayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_22: rājani saḥ arthaḥ gamyate . na punaḥ antareṇa rājaśabdaprayogam puruṣe saḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_23: gamyate . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . rājaśabdāt hi bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_24: ṣaṣṭhīm uccārayati. aṅga hi bhavān puruṣaśabdāt api uccārayatu gaṃsyate saḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_25: . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdakṛtena nāma arthena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3557_26: . arthakṛtena nāma śabdena bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām :
GS24pmbhasuu:3558: artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra antareṇa api puruṣaśabdaprayogam rājani saḥ arthaḥ gamyate . kim punaḥ tat . svāmitvam . kiṅkṛtam punaḥ tat . svakṛtam . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_0: prātipadikārthānām kriyākṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ upajāyante tatkṛtāḥ ca ākhyāḥ prādurbhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_1: karma karaṇam apādānaṃ sampradānam adhikaraṇam iti . tāḥ ca punaḥ vibhaktīnām utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_2: kadā cit nimittatvena upādīyante kadā cit na . kadā ca vibhaktīnām utpattau nimittatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_3: upādīyante . yadā vyabhicaranti prātipadikārtham . yadā hi na vyabhicaranti ākhyābhūtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_4: eva tadā bhavanti karma karaṇam apādānam sampradānam adhikaraṇam iti . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_5: tarhi rājani svakṛtam svāmitvam tatra ṣaṣṭhī evam puruṣe api svāmikṛtam svatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_6: tatra ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . rājaśabdāt utpadyamānayā ṣaṣṭhyā abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_7: kṛtvā puruṣaśabdāt ṣaṣṭhī na bhaviṣyati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati puruṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_8: rājā iti . bhavati . rājaśabdāt tu tadā prathamā . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3560: rājñaḥ puruṣasya iti . bhavati . bāhyam artham abhisamīkṣya .
GS24pmbhasuu:3562_0: 826-827 karmādiṣu akarmakavadvacanam . karmādiṣu akarmakavadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3562_1: prayojanam . akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati . bhāve laḥ yathā syāt . mātuḥ smaryate
GS24pmbhasuu:3562_2: . pituḥ smaryate . atha vatkaraṇam kimartham . svāśrayam api yathā syāt . mātā smaryate
GS24pmbhasuu:3562_3: . pitā smaryate iti . karmābhidhāne hi liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . karmābhidhāne hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:3562_4: liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ syāt . mātuḥ smṛtam . mātroḥ smṛtam . māṭṝṇām smṛtam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3562_5: . mātuḥ yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat smṛtaśabdasya api prāpnoti . ṣaṣṭhīprasaṇgaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3562_6: . ṣaṣṭhī ca prāpnoti . kutaḥ . smṛtaśabdāt . mātuḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3563_0: ṣaṣṭhīprasaṅgaḥ ca . ṣaṣṭhī ca prasaṅktavyā . kutaḥ . mātṛśabdāt . smṛtaśabdena bhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3563_1: karma iti kṛtvā ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . avivakṣite

GS24pmbhasuu:3599_1: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante ṭatra kṛtyaiḥ abhihitatvāt karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3599_2: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . bhavyādīnām karmaṇaḥ anabhidhānāt kṛtyānām kartṛgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3599_3: . bhavyādīnām karma kṛtyaiḥ anabhitam . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . bhavyādīnam karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3599_4: anabhidhānāt kṛtyānām kartṛgrahaṇam kriyate . kim ucyate bhavyādīnām karma kṛtyaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3599_5: anabhitam iti . na iha api anabhihitaṃ bhavati . ākraṣṭavyā grāṃam śākhā iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3599_6: tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . kṛtyānām . kṛtyānām prayoge ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3599_7: . kim udāharaṇam . grāmam ākraṣṭavyā śākhā . tataḥ kartari vā iti . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3599_8: prāpnoti . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām iti . ubhayaprāptau iti vartate . nanu ca ubhayaprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3599_9: eṣā . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām iti ca geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti ca bhavati . ubhayaprāptiḥ
