GS24pmbhasuu:3601_0: 843 - 846 kimartham idam ucyate . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpatteḥ saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3601_1: ca dvigoḥ ekavacanavidhānam . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpattiḥ bhavati . kim idam pratyadhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3601_2: iti . adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇam prati pratyadhikaraṇam . saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3601_3: . saṅkhyayā bahvarthayā ca asya sāmānādhikaraṇyam . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3601_4: saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti . iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3601_5: ca ekavacanam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti dvigoḥ ekavacanavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3601_6: . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra anuprayogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3601_7: ekavacanābhāvaḥ advigutvāt . tatra anuprayogasya ekavacanam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_0: pañcapūlī iyam iti . kim kāraṇam . advigutvāt . dvigoḥ ekavacanm iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_1: ca atra anuprayogaḥ dvigusañjñaḥ . siddham tu dvigvarthasya ekavadvacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_2: etat . katham . dvigvarthaḥ ekavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_3: na vaktavyam . na idam pāṛibhāṣikasya vacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_4: . ucyate vacanam . ekasya arthasya vacanam ekavacanam . ekaśeṣapratiṣedhaḥ ca . ekaśeṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_5: ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_6: vā anyasya anekatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyasya anekatvāt . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_7: dvigoḥ anekatvam . kasya tarhi . dvigvarthasamudāyasya . samāhāragrahaṇam ca taddhitārthapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_8: . samāhāragrahaṇam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam . taddhitārthapratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_9: taddhitārthe yaḥ dviguḥ tasya mā bhūt iti . pañcakapālau pañcakapālāḥ iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_10: ayam pañcakapālaśabdaḥ pratyekam parisamāpyate āhosvit samudāye vartate . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_11: ataḥ . yadi pratyekam parisamāpyate purastāt eva coditam parihṛtam ca. atha samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_12: vartate . na vā samāhāraikatvāt . na vā etat samāhāraikatvāt api sidhyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3602_13: tarhi pratyekam parisamāpyate . purastāt eva coditam parihṛtam ca. aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3603: na vā samāhāraikatvāt . na vā yogārambheṇa eva arthaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāhāraikatvāt . ekaḥ ayam samāhāraḥ nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:3605_4: dvandvaḥ ca prāṇyaṅgānām . tataḥ tūryāṅgāṇām . tataḥ senāṅgānām iti . saḥ tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3605_5: kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . pratyekam aṅgaśabdaḥ parisamāpyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:3681_0: 882-893 tadrājādīnām luki samāsabahutve pratiṣedhaḥ . tadrājādīnām luki samāsabahutve
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . priyaḥ āṅgaḥ eṣām te ime priyāṅgāḥ . priyaḥ vāṅgaḥ eṣām te ime priyavāṅgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_2: iti . kim ucyate samāsabahutve pratiṣedhaḥ iti yāvatā tena eva cet kṛtam bahutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_3: iti ucyate na ca atra tena eva kṛtam bahutvam . bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kriyamāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_4: api codayanti . tat vā kartavyam tena eva cet bahutvam iti samāsabahutve vā pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_5: vaktavyaḥ iti . abahutve ca lugvacanam . abahutve ca luk vaktavyaḥ . atikrāntaḥ aṅgān
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_6: atyaṅgaḥ . bahuvacane parataḥ yaḥ tadrājaḥ iti evam kṛtvā codyate . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_7: punaḥ idam na bahuvacane iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . bahuvacane iti ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_8: ca atra bahuvacanam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . na lumatā tasmin iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_9: pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . na lumatā āṅgasya iti vakṣyāmi . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_10: . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . pañcabhiḥ gārgībhiḥ krītaḥ paṭaḥ pañcagārgyaḥ daśagārgyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_11: . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam . dvandve abahuṣu luk vaktavyaḥ . gargavatsavājāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_12: . iha ca luk vaktavyaḥ . gargebhyaḥ āgatam gargarūpyam gargamayam iti . iha ca atrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_13: iti udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu pratyayārthabahutve lugvacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_14: etat . katham . pratyayārthabahutve luk vaktavyaḥ . yadi pratyayārthabahutve luk
GS24pmbhasuu:3681_15: ucyate astriyām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_0: vāṅgyaḥ striyaḥ iti . yasya punaḥ bahuvacane parataḥ luk ucyate tasya īkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_1: na bhaviṣyati . yasya api bahuvacane parataḥ luk ucyate tena api astriyām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_2: āmbaṣṭhyāḥ striyaḥ sauvīryāḥ striyaḥ iti evamartham . atra api cāpā vyavadhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_3: ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavhadānam . ekādeśaḥ pūvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_4: vyavadhānam eva . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam . dvandve abahuṣu luk vaktavyaḥ . gargavatsavājāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_5: iti . gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk . gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_6: bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ . bidānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_7: māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau . kimartham idam na aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_8: . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_9: . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_10: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_11: baidayoḥ vā bidāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_12: mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_13: śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na vā sarveṣām dvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_14: bahvarthatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sarveṣām dvandve bahvarthatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_15: sarvāṇi dvandve bahvarthāni . katham . yugapat adhikaraṇavivakṣāyām dvandvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_16: . tataḥ ayam āha yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk . yadi sarvāṇi dvandve bahvarthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_17: aham api idam acodyam codye . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam iti . mama api sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_18: bahuvacanam param bhavati . luke kṛte na prāpnoti . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_19: tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . na lumatā āṅgasya iti vakṣyāmi . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_20: ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . pañcabhiḥ gārgībhiḥ krītaḥ paṭaḥ pañcagārgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_21: daśagārgyaḥ iti . iṣtam eva etat saṅgṛhītam . pañcagargaḥ daśagargaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_22: . tathā idam aparam acodyam codye . gargarūpyam gargamayam . atra api bahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_23: iti eva siddham katham . samarthāt taddhitaḥ utpadyate . sāmarthyam ca subantena
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_24: . tataḥ ayam āha yasya prtayayārthabahutve luk . yadi samarthāt taddhitaḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_25: aham api idam acodyam codye . gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_26: dvyekayoḥ aluk iti . katham . yasya api bahuvacane parataḥ luk tena api atra aluk
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_27: vaktavyaḥ . tasya api hi atra bahuvacanam param bhavati . na vaktavyaḥ . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_28: evam aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca uktam pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3683_29: . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_0: vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā idam api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_1: . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti vakṣyāmi . yadi aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_2: hali na iti ucyate bidānām apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ atra api aluk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_3: . astu . punaḥ asya yuvabahutve vartamānasya luk bhaviṣyati . punaḥ aluk kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_4: bhavati . samarthānām prathamasya gotrapratyayāntasya aluk ucyate na ca tat samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_5: prathamam gotrapratyayāntam . kim tarhi . dvitīyam artham upasaṅkrāntam . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_6: ca etat evam vijñeyam atribharadvājikā vasiṣṭhakaśyapikā bhṛgvaṅgirasikā kutsakuśikā
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_7: iti evamartham . gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam vā kriyate . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_8: . etasya eva dvitīyam artham upasaṅkrāntasya aluk bhavati na anyasya iti . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_9: ucyate ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ iti . mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_10: evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yatbahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_11: evam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_12: kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya grahaṇam . na ca etat laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_13: gotram . yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk samāsabahutve tena pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_14: eva cet kṛtam bahutvam iti vā vaktavyam . yasya pratyayārthabahutve luk tena astriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_15: iti vaktavyam . yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk tasya ayam adhikaḥ doṣaḥ atraḥ iti udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_16: prāpnoti . tasmāt pratyayārthabahutve luk iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ jyāyān . atha iha katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_17: bhavitavyam . gārgī ca bātsyaḥ ca iti . yadi tāvat astri vidhinā āśrīyate asti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_18: astrī iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam lukā . atha strī pratiṣedhena āśrīyate asti atra strī
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_19: iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena . kim punaḥ atra arthasatattvam . devāḥ etat jñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_20: arhanti . atha yaḥ lopyalopinām samāsaḥ tatra katham bhavitavyam . ubhayam hi dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_21: . śaradvat śunakadarbhāt bhruguvat sāgrāyaṇeṣu na udāttasvaritodayam agārgyakāśyapagālavānām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_0: 893 yañādīnām ekadvayoḥ vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam . yañādīnām ekadvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_1: vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gārgyasya kulam gārgyakulam gargakulam

GS24pmbhasuu:3688_3: anarthakam . na hi aprāñcaḥ bharatāḥ santi . evam tarhi samuccayaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3688_4: bharatagrahaṇam anarthakam . na hi anyatra bharatā santi iti . na anarthakam. jñāpakārtham

GS24pmbhasuu:3695_1: kartavyam . agastikauṇḍinac iti etau prakṛtyādeśau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3695_2: . lukpratiṣedhe vṛddhyartham . lukpratiṣedhe vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . pratyayāntanipātane
GS24pmbhasuu:3695_3: hi vṛddhyabhāvaḥ . pratyayāntanipātane hi sati vṛddhyabhāvaḥ syāt . āgastīyāḥ kauṇḍinyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3695_4: iti . yadi prakrṭinipātanam kriyate kena idānīm pratyayasya lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3695_5: pratyayalopaḥ . adhikārāt pratyayalopaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat tarhi prakṛtinipātanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3695_6: . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ bahuṣu luk bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:3695_8: evam api pratyayāntayoḥ eva prāpnoti . pratyayāntāt hi bhavān ṣaṣṭhīm uccārayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3695_9: . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā hi paribhāṣitam pratyayasya lukślulupaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3695_10: bhavanti iti pratyayasya eva bhaviṣyati . avaśiṣṭasya ādeśau bhaviṣyataḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:3699_1: . iṇaḥ yaḥ gāśabdaḥ pibateḥ yaḥ pāśabdaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . agāsīt naṭaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:3701_1: yau tathāsau iti vaktavyam . ekavacanagrahaṇam vā . atha vā ekavacane ye tathāsī
GS24pmbhasuu:3701_2: iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyam anyatarat kartavyam . avacane hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3701_3: anucyamāne hi etasmin aniṣṭam prasajyeta . ataniṣṭa yūpam . asaniṣṭa yūpam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3701_4: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yadi api tāvat ayam taśabdaḥ dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ asti

GS24pmbhasuu:3701_6: adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ ātmanepadam ekavacanam eva . tasya asya kaḥ anyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum
GS24pmbhasuu:3701_7: arhati anyat ataḥ ātmanepadāt ekavacanāt ca . tat yathā asyas goḥ dvitīyena arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3701_8: iti . gauḥ eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:3718_5: siddham . ātmanepadānām ca ḍāraurasaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . tat ca samasaṅkhyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_6: . tat ca avaśyam ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātanudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_7: yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi ātmanepadagrahaṇe śaṭ sthāninaḥ trayaḥ ādeśāḥ . vaiṣamyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_8: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . pūrvavipratiṣedhārthena tāvat na arthaḥ ātmanepadagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_9: . idam iha sampradhāryam . ḍāraurasaḥ kriyantām ṭeḥ etvam iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_10: . paratvāt etvam . nityāḥ ḍāraurasaḥ . kṛte api etve prapnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_11: . ṭeḥ etvam api nityam . kṛteṣu api ḍāraurassu prāpnoti akṛteṣu api prāpnoti . anityam
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_12: etvam . anyasya kṛteṣu ḍāraurassu prāpnoti anyasya akṛteṣu . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_13: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ḍāraurasaḥ api anityāḥ . anyasya kṛte etve prāpnuvanti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_14: akṛte . śabdāntarasya prāpnuvantaḥ anityā bhavanti . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt etvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_15: . etve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt ḍāraurasaḥ bhaviṣyanti . samasaṅkhyārthena ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_16: na arthaḥ ātmanepadagrahaṇena . sthāne antaramena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ āntaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_17: . arthataḥ . ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_18: atha vā ādeśāḥ api ṣaṭ eva nirdiśyante . katham . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_19: ayam . atha etasmin ekaśeṣanirdeśe sati kim ayam kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ . ḍā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_20: ḍā ca ḍā rau ca rau ca rau raḥ ca raḥ ca raḥ. ḍā ca rau ca raḥ ca ḍāraurasaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_21: . āhosvit kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ . ḍā ca rau ca raḥ ca ḍāraurasaḥ . ḍāraurasaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_22: ḍāraurasaḥ ca ḍāraurasaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ aniṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_23: samasaṅkhyaḥ prāpnoti ekavacanadvivacanayoḥ ḍā prāpnoti . bahuvacanaikavacanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_24: rau prāpnoti dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ ca raḥ prāpnoti . atha kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_25: na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . ubhayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_26: āha . ubhayam hi dṛśyate . bahu śaktikiṭakam bahūni śaktikiṭakāni bahu sthālīpiṭharam
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_27: bahūni sthālīpiṭharāni . ḍāraurasaḥ kṛte ṭeḥ e yathāt dvitvam prasāraṇe samasṅkhyena
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_28: na artha asti . siddham sthāne arthataḥ antarāḥ . āntaryataḥ vyavasthā . trayaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3718_29: ime bhavantu sarveṣām . ṭeḥ etvam ca paratvāt kṛte api tasmin ime santu .
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_0: 907-911 ḍāvikārasya śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . ḍāvikāraḥ śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_1: . sarvādeśārtham . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_2: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antasya prasajyeta . nighātaprasaṅgaḥ tu . nighātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_3: tu prapnoti . śvaḥ kartā . tāseḥ param lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_4: svaraḥ prāpnoti . yat tāvat ucyate ḍāvikārasya śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3720_5: alaḥ antyavikārāt . siddham etat . katham .alaḥ antyavikārāt . astu ayam alaḥ antyasya . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_0: kartā . ḍiti ṭeḥ lopāt lopaḥ . ḍiti ṭeḥ lopena lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . abhatvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_1: . ḍitkaraṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati . anittvāt vā . atha vā anittvāt etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_2: kim idam anittvāt iti . antyasya ayam sthāne bhavan na pratyayaḥ syāt . asatyām pratyayasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_3: itsañjñā na . asatyām itsañjñāyām lopaḥ na . asati lope anekāl . yada anekāl tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_4: sarvādeśaḥ . yadā sarvādeśaḥ tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ tadā itsañjñā . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_5: itsañjñā tadā lopaḥ . praśliṣṭanirdeśāt vā . atha vā praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . ḍā
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_6: ā ḍā . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadā tarhi ayam antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_7: sthāne bhavati tadā tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam na prāpnoti . tiṅgrahaṇam ekadeśavikṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_8: ananyatvāt . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_9: svaraḥ katham . svare vipratiṣedhāt siddham . ḍāraurasaḥ kriyantām anudāttatvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_10: kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt anudāttatvam . nityāḥ ḍāraurasaḥ . kṛte api anudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_11: prapnuvanti akṛte api prapnuvanti . anudāttatvam api nityam . kṛteṣu kṛteṣu api ḍāraurassu
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_12: prāpnoti akṛteṣu api prāpnoti . anityam anudāttatvam . anyasya kṛteṣu ḍāraurassu
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_13: prāpnoti anyasya akṛteṣu . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ḍāraurasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_14: api anityāḥ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte anudāttatve prāpnuvanti anyathāsvarasya akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_15: . svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvantaḥ anityāḥ bhavanti . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_16: . anudāttatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñātāt ḍāraurasaḥ . ṭilope udāttanivṛttisvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_17: siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgatvāt ḍāraurasaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_18: ḍāraurassu kṛteṣu anudāttatvam kriyatām ṭilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_19: ṭilopena bhavitavyam . evam tarhi svare vipratiṣedhāt siddham . nyāyyaḥ eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_20: svare vipratiṣedhaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam . anudāttatvam kriyatām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_21: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt anudāttatvam . anudāttatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_22: udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ bhaviṣyati . tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yat pit vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_23: yat apit vacanam tatra na sidhyati . tatra api siddham . katham idam adya lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_24: pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_25: apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_26: abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat kadā cit pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . apavādam lasārvadhātukanudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_27: pratīkṣate . tatra anudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti . yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_28: asau avidyamānodāttatve anudātte udāttaḥ lupyate . pratyayasvarāpavādaḥ lasārvadhātukānudāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_29: . tena tatra na prasaktaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ kadā cit . pratyayasvaraḥ tu tāseḥ vṛttisanniyogaśiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3721_30: . tena ca api asau udāttaḥ lopsyate . tathā na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_0: 3-12 adhikāreṇa iyam pratyayasañjñā kriyate . sā prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_1: . tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prakṛti . guptijkibhyaḥ san . upapada . stambakarṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_2: ramajapoḥ . upādhi . harateḥ dṛtināthayoḥ paśau . eteṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_3: kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api pratyayasañjñā syāt . paratvam ādyudāttatvam aṅgasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_4: iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pratyayādhikāre prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_5: apratiṣedhaḥ . adhikāreṇa api pratyayasañjñāyām satyām prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_6: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . pratyayasañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . nimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_7: nimittikāryārthatvāt anyatra api . nimittāni hi nimittikāryārthāni bhavanti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_8: punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . prakṛtyupapaopādhayaḥ nimittam pratyayaḥ nimittī
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_9: . anyatra api ca eṣaḥ nyāyaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ . kva anyatra . loke . tat yathā . bahuṣu āsīneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_10: kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . katamaḥ devadattaḥ . kataraḥ yajñadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_11: ācaṣṭe . yaḥ aśve yaḥ pīṭhe iti ukte nimittasya nimittikāryārthatvāt adhyavasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_12: ayam devadattaḥ ayam yajñdatta iti . na idānīm aśvasya pīṭhasya vā devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_13: sañjñā bhavati . kim punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . nirjñātaḥ arthaḥ nimittam anirjñātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_14: nimittī . iha ca pratyayaḥ anirjñātaḥ prakṛtyupapadopādhayaḥ nirjñātāḥ . kva . dhātūpadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_15: prātipadikopadeśe ca . te nirjñātāḥ nimittatvena upādīyante . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_16: vā siddham . atha vā pradhāne kāryasampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim ca pradhānam . pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_17: . tat yathā . bahuṣu yātsu kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kaḥ yāti iti . saḥ āha rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_18: iti . rājā iti ukte pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt yaḥ pṛcchati yaḥ ca ācaṣṭe ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_19: sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kiṅkṛtam punaḥ prādhānyam . arthakṛtam . yathā punaḥ loke
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_20: arthakṛtam prādhānyam śabdasya idānīm kiṅkṛtam prādhānyam . śabdasya apūrvopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_21: prādhānyam . yasya apūrvopadeśaḥ saḥ pradhānam . prakṛtyupapadopādhayaḥ ca upadiṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_22: . kva . dhātūpadeśe prātipadikopadeśe ca . yadi eva nimittasya nimittikāryārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_23: atha api pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām na bhavati vikārāgamānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_24: tu prāpnoti . hanaḥ ta ca . trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . eteṣām hi apūrvopadeśāt prādhānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_25: . nimittinaḥ ca ete . vikārāgameṣu ca paravijñānāt . vikārāgameṣu ca paravijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_26: pratyayasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . pratyayaḥ paraḥ bahvati iti ucyate . na ca vikārāgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_27: pare sambhavanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samāne apūrvopadeśe pratyayaḥ paraḥ vikārāgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_28: na pare . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ca tadyuktatvāt . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣtam vikārāgamayuktam pañcamīnirdṣṭāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_29: ca pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ tu . pratyayavidhiḥ tu na upapapdyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_30: . kva . yatra vikārāgamāḥ vidhīyante . hanaḥ ta ca . tarpujatunoḥ ṣuk . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_31: kāraṇam na sidhyati . vikārāgamayuktatvāt apañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt ca . tasmāt tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_32: pañcamīnirdeśāt siddham . tasmāt tatra pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_33: iha tāvat hanaḥ te iti . dhātoḥ iti vartate. iha trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_34: iti vartate . yadi evam hanaḥ ta ca dhātoḥ kyap bhavati iti dhātumātrāt kyap prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_35: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dhātumātrāt kyap bhavati iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_36: etistuśasvṛdṛjuṣaḥ kyap iti parigaṇanam karoti . atha vā hantim eva atra dhātugrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_37: abhisambhantsyāmaḥ . hanaḥ taḥ bhavati . dhātoḥ kyap bhavati . kasmāt . hanteḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_38: . arthāśrayatvāt vā . atha vā arthāśrayaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ . yaḥ tam artham sampratyāyayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_39: saḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_40: iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_41: hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_42: yathā vijñāyeta . pratyāyayiti iti pratyayaḥ . yadi pratyāyayiti iti pratyayaḥ avikādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_43: pratyayasañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi te kim cit pratyāyayanti . evam tarhi pratyāyyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_44: pratyayaḥ iti . evam api sanādīnām na prāpnoti . evam tari ubhayasādhanaḥ ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_0: karmasādhanaḥ ca . evam api kutaḥ etat samāne apūrvopadeśe trāpuṣam jātuṣam iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_1: akāraḥ tam artham sampratyāyayati na punaḥ ṣakāraḥ iti . anyatra api akāreṇa tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3724_2: arthasya vacanāt manyāmahe akāraḥ tam artham sampratyāyayatina ṣakāraḥ iti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:3726: 12-19 kimartham idam ucyate . paraḥ yathā syāt . pūrvaḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati pūrvam āha tam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3727: vibhāṣā supaḥ bahuc purastāt tu iti . madhye tarhi mā bhūt iti . madhye api yam icchati āha tam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_0: avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti . yaḥ idānīm anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ saḥ antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_1: vacanam paraḥ eva bhaviṣyati iti nā arthaḥ paravacanena . evam api yeṣām eva pratyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_2: deśaḥ niyamyate te eva niyatadeśāḥ syuḥ . yaḥ idānīm aniyatadeśaḥ saḥ kadā cit pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_3: kadā cit paraḥ kadā cit madhye syāt . tat yathā mātuḥ vatsaḥ kadā cit agrataḥ kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_4: cit pṛṣṭhataḥ kadā cit pārśvataḥ bhavati . paraḥ eva yathā syāt iti evamartham paravacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_5: . paravacanam anarthakam pañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt parasya . paragrahaṇam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_6: kim kāraṇam . pañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt parasya kāryam ucyate . tat yathā dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_7: apaḥ īt . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sataḥ tatra parasya kāryam ucyate . iha idānīm kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_8: sataḥ parasya kāryam bhavitum arhati . iha api sataḥ eva. katham . paratvam svābhāvikam
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_9: . atha vācanike paratve sati arthaḥ syāt paragrahaṇena . vācanike ca na arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_10: etat hi tasya parasya kāryam yat asau paraḥ syāt . atha vā yat asya parasya sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_11: sañjñā syāt . yatra tarhi pañcamī na asti tadartham ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kva ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_12: pañcamī na asti . yatra vikārāgamāḥ śiṣyante . kva ca vikārāgamāḥ śiṣyante . hanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_13: ta ca . trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . vikārāgameṣu ca uktam . kim uktam . pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_14: tu . tasmāt tatra pañcamīnirdeśāt siddham iti . atyantāparadṛṣṭānām vā parabhūtalopārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_15: . atyantāparadṛṣṭānām tarhi parabhūtalopārtham paragrahaṇam kartavyam . ye ete atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_16: kvibādayaḥ lupyante teṣām parabhūtānām lopaḥ yathā syāt . aparabhūtānām mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_17: kim punaḥ atyantāparadṛṣṭānām parabhūtalopavacane prayojanam . kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_18: yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_19: parabhūtāḥ lupyante iti yat ayam teṣu kādīn anubandhān āsajati . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_20: . anubandhāsañjane etat prayojanam kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi yathā syuḥ iti . yadi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_21: atra atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ parabhūtāḥ lupyantetataḥ anubandhāsañjanam arthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_22: . prayoganiyamārtham vā . prayoganiyamārtham tarhi paragrahaṇam kartavyam . parabhūtānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_23: prayogaḥ yathā syāt . aparabhūtānām mā bhūt iti . asti punaḥ kim cit aniṣṭam yadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_24: niyamaḥ syāt . asti iti āha . prakṛteḥ arthābhidhāne pratyayādarśanāt . prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_25: arthābhidhāne apratyayikāḥ dṛśyante . kva saḥ devadattaḥ kva saḥ yajñdattaḥ babhruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_26: maṇḍuḥ lamakaḥ iti . bābhravyaḥ māṇḍavyaḥ lāmakāyanaḥ iti prayoktavye babhruḥ maṇḍuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_27: lamakaḥ iti prayujyate . dvayasajādīnām ca kevaladṛṣṭatvāt . dvayasajādīnām ca kevalānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_28: prayogaḥ dṛśyate . kim asya dvayasam . kim asya mātram . kā adya tithī iti . dvayasajādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_29: vai vṛttijasadṛśāḥ avṛttijāḥ yathā bahuḥ tathā . vāvacane ca anutpattyartham . vāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_30: ca anutpattyartham paragrahaṇam kartavyam . vā vacanena anutpattiḥ yathā syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_31: kriyamāṇe api vai paragrahaṇe katham iva vāvacanena anutpattiḥ labhyā . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_32: paragrahaṇe vāvacanena vā paraḥ iti etat abhisambadhyate . akriyamāṇe punaḥ paragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_33: vāvacanena kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_34: bhāvābhāvau iṣyete . vāvacane ca uktam . kim uktam . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_35: nityatvāt sanaḥ iti . prayoganiyamārtham eva tarhi paragrahaṇam kartavyam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_36: etasmin prayoganiyame sati kim ayam pratyayahiyamaḥ . prakṛtiparaḥ eva pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_37: prayoktavyaḥ aprakṛtiparaḥ na iti . āhosvit prakṛtiniyamaḥ . pratyayaparā eva prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_38: prayoktavyā apratyayā na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame prkṛtiniyamābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_39: . tatra pratyayaniyame sati prkṛtiniyamaḥ na prāpnoti . apratyayikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_40: prāpnoti . kva saḥ devadattaḥ kva saḥ yajñdattaḥ babhruḥ maṇḍuḥ lamakaḥ iti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_41: tarhi prakṛtiniyamaḥ . prakṛtiniyame pratyayāniyamaḥ . prakṛtiniyame sati pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_42: niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . kim asya dvayasam . kim asya mātram . kā adya tithī iti . aprakṛtikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_43: pratyayasya prayogaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu ubhayaniyamāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_44: . ubhayaniyamāt . ubhayaniyamaḥ ayam . prakṛtiparaḥ eva pratyayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ pratyayaparā
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_45: eva ca prakṛtiḥ iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3728_46: paragrahaṇasāmarthyāt . antareṇa api paragrahaṇam syāt ayam paraḥ . paraḥ eva yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_0: 20-21 kimartham idam ucyate . ādyudāttaḥ yathā syāt . antodāttaḥ mā bhūt iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_1: etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati antodāttam karoti tatra cakāram anubandham āha
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_2: ca citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ iti . madhyodāttaḥ tarhi mā bhūt iti . madyodāttam yam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_3: tatra repham anubandham karoti āha ca upottamam riti iti . anudāttaḥ tarhi mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_4: iti . anudāttam api yam icchati tatra pakāram anubandham karoti āha ca anudāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_5: suppitau iti . svaritaḥ tarhi mā bhūt iti . svaritam api yam icchati karoti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_6: takāram anubandham āha ca tit svaritam iti . yaḥ idānīm ataḥ anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_7: saḥ antareṇa api vacanam ādyudāttaḥ eva bhaviṣyati iti na arthaḥ ādyudāttavacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_8: . evam api yeṣām eva pratyayānām svaraḥ niyamyate te eva niyatasvarāḥ syuḥ . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_9: idānīm aniyatasvaraḥ saḥ kadā cit ādyudāttaḥ kadā cit antodāttaḥ kadā cit madhyodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_10: kadā cit anudāttaḥ kacā cit svaritaḥ syāt . ādyudāttaḥ eva yathā syāt iti evam artham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3733_0: 21-27 atha kimartham pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatvam ucyate anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3733_1: ca na yatra eva anyaḥ svaraḥ tatra eva ayam ucyeta . ñniti ādiḥ nityam pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3733_2: ca . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam suppitau ca iti . tatra ayam api arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3733_3: dviḥ ādyudāttagrahaṇam dviḥ ca anudāttagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_0: ādyudāttatvasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyoge prayojanam yasya sañjñākaraṇam tasya ādyudāttārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_1: . ādyudāttatvasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogakaraṇe etat prayojanam yasya sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_2: tasya ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . asanniyoge hi yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_3: ca anudāttatvam . akriyamāṇe hi pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_4: yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam prasajyeta tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_5: ca anudāttatvam . atha kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve anudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_6: ca kasmāt eva tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam na bhavati tadantasya ca anudāttatvam . utpannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_7: pratyayaḥ pratyayāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati na utpadyamānaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_8: ghaṭaḥ kṛtaḥ ghaṭāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati na kriyamāṇaḥ . na vā prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_9: ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakam tadādeḥ agrahaṇasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_10: yat ayam ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti prakṛteḥ ādyudāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_11: na tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam bhavati iti . tadantasya tarhi anudāttatvam prāpnoti . prakṛtisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_12: ca vidhānasāmarthyāt pratyayasvarābhāvaḥ . yat ayam dhātoḥ antaḥ prātipadikasya antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_13: iti prakṛteḥ antodāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na tadantasya anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_14: bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yatra hi anudāttaḥpratyayaḥ prakṛtisvaraḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_15: prayojayati . āgamānudāttārtham vā . āgamānudāttārtham tarhi pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_16: ādyudāttatvam ucyate . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_17: yathā syuḥ iti . na vā āgamasya anudāttavacanāt . na vā etat api prayojanam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_18: . kim kāraṇam . āgamasya anudāttavacanāt . āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_19: . ke punaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttatvam prayojayanti . iṭ . lavitā . iṭ tāvat na prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_20: . idam iha sampradhāryam . iṭ kriyatām ādyudāttatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_21: iḍāgamaḥ . nityam ādyudāttatvam . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . iṭ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_22: nityaḥ . kṛte api ādyudāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ iṭ . anyathāsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_23: kṛte ādyudāttatve prapnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte . svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_24: anityaḥ bhavati . ādyudāttatvam api anityam . anyasya kṛte iṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_25: . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_26: iḍāgamaḥ . antaraṅgam tarhi ādyudāttatvam . kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_27: ucyate . utpanne pratyaye prakṛtipratyayau āśritya aṅgasya iḍāgamaḥ . ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_28: api na antaraṅgam yāvatā pratyaye āśrīyamāṇe prakṛtiḥ api āśritā bhavati . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_29: eva ādyudāttatvam . katham . idānīm eva hi uktam na pratyayasvaravidhau tadādividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_30: bhavati iti . sīyuṭ tarhi prayojayati . avacane hi sīyuḍādeḥ ādyudāttatvam . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_31: hi āgamānudāttatve kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve sīyuḍādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_32: liṅaḥ ādyudāttatvam prasajyeta . laviṣīya paviṣīya . tat tarhi vaktavyam āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_33: bhavanti iti . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_34: iti yat ayam yāsuṭ parasamaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti āha . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3734_35: vakṣyati etat . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum :
GS24pmbhasuu:3735_0: yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:3735_1: siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3735_2: bhavanti iti . śakyam idam labdhum . yadi eva vacanāt atha api jñāpakāt āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3735_3: bhavanti . āgamaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . āgamāḥ avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:3735_4: bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi . yadi āgamāḥ avidyamānavat bhavanti iti ucyate lavitā avādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3735_5: na prāpnoti . svaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . evam api lavitā udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3735_6: iti svaritaḥ na prāpnoti . ṣāṣṭhike svare iti vakṣyāmi . evam api śikṣitaḥ niṣṭhā
GS24pmbhasuu:3735_7: ca dvyac anāt it eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . pratyayasvaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3735_8: vaktavyam avidyamānavat bhavanti iti . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati āgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3736_0: yat ayam yāsuṭ parasamaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti āha . na etat asti jñāpakam . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3736_1: etat . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3736_2: yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:3736_3: siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:3736_4: bhavanti iti . ādyudāttasya vā lopārtham . ādyudāttasya tarhi lopārtham pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:3736_5: ādyudāttatvam ucyate . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_0: sraughnī māthurī . atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ pratyaysvaram bādheta . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_1: . na vā etat prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_2: lopaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . avaśyam ca eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_3: āśrayitavyā . avacane hi ñinnitkitsu atiprasaṅgaḥ . anāśrīyamāṇāyām asyām paribhāṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_4: kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatveñinnitkitsu atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_5: . autsī kaṃsikī ātreyī iti . atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ ñinnitkitsvarān bādheta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_6: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ñinnitkitsvarāḥ pratyaysvarāpavādāḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ bhiniviśate
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_7: . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_8: tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . na tāvat atra kadā cit pratyayādyudāttatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_9: . apavādān ñinnitkitsvarān pratīkṣate . kaṃsikyām bhūyān apahāraḥ . anyasya atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_10: udāttatvam anyasya lopaḥ . ādeḥ udāttatvam antyasya lopaḥ . idam tarhi ātreyī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_11: . atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ kitsvaram bādheta . tasmāt eṣā paribhāṣā āśrayitavyā . etasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3737_12: ca satyām śakyam pratyayasanniyogena ādyudāttatvam avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_0: 27-30 pratyayādyudāttatvāt dhātoḥ antaḥ . pratyayādyudāttatvāt dhātoḥ antaḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_1: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . pratyayādyudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_2: . samatvam simatvam . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttaḥ pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_3: pacati paṭhati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . gopāyati dhapāyati . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_4: bhavati vipratiṣedhena. pitsvarāt titsvaraḥ ṭāpi . pitsvarāt titsvaraḥ ṭāpi bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_5: vipratiṣedhena . pitsvarasya avakāśaḥ . pacati paṭhati . titsvarasya avakāśaḥ . kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_6: hāryam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kāryā hāryā . titsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_7: citsvaraḥ cāpi pitsvarāt . citsvaraḥ cāpi pitsvarāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_8: avakāśaḥ . calanaḥ copanaḥ . pitsvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āmbaṣṭhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_9: sauvīryā . citsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā ādyutāttasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_10: . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . ādyutāttasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_11: . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte satiśiṣṭatvāt dhātusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_12: . ayam ca api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ pitsvarasya titsvarasya ca . kim kāraṇam . ṭāpi
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_13: svaritenaikādeśaḥ . ṭāpi svaritena ekādeśaḥ bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam . svaritatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_14: kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt svaritatvam . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_15: . kṛte api svaritatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . . svaritatvam api nityam . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_16: api ekādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam svaritatvam . anyasya kṛte ekādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_17: anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ekādeśaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_18: anityaḥ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte svaritatve prāpnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte . svarabhinnasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_19: ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_20: . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ padasya svaritatvam . svaritatvam api antaraṅgam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_21: . vakṣyati etat . padagrahaṇam parimāṇārtham iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_22: svaritatvam . svaritatve kṛte āntaryataḥ svaridānudāttayoḥ svaritaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_23: ayam ca api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ pitsvarasya citsvarasya ca . kim kāraṇam . cāpi
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_0: 30-31 gupādiṣu anubandhakaraṇam kimartham . gupādiṣu anubandhakaraṇam ātmanepadārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_1: . gupādiṣu anubandhāḥ kriyante ātmanepadam yathā syāt . kriyamāṇeṣu api anubandheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_2: ātmanepadam na eva prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sanā vyavahitatvāt . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_3: evam bhaviṣyati . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti ucyate . na ce etebhyaḥ prāk sanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_4: na api parasmaipadam paśyāmaḥ . evam tarhi anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_5: atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā goḥ sakthani
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_6: karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_7: viśeṣakam bhavati jugupsayati mīmāṃsayati iti atra api prāpnoti . avayave kṛtam liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_8: kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_9: . sanam ca na vhabhicarati . ṇicam punaḥ vyabhicarati . tat yathā tat yathā goḥ sakthani

GS24pmbhasuu:3743_0: 31-32 abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_1: prāpnoti . mīmāṃsate . nanu ce ittve kṛte dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ utpattisanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_2: dīrghatvam ucyamānam ittvam pratīkṣate . atha katham abhyāsam pratīkṣate . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_3: abhyāsam pratīkṣate . ittvam punaḥ na pratīkṣate . na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_4: utsargābādhakatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_5: utsargābādhakatvāt . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādāḥ utsargān na bādhante iti evam dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_6: ucyamānam ittvam na bādhiṣyate . atha vā mānbadhadānśanbhyaḥ ī ca abhyāsasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_7: vakṣyāmi . evam api halādiśeṣāpavādaḥ īkāraḥ prāpnoti . ī ca acaḥ iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_8: atha vā mānbadhadānśanbhyaḥ dīrghaḥ ca itaḥ abhyāsasya iti vakṣyāmi . sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_9: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_10: dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya utsargābādhakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_11: iti . atha vā na evam vijñāyate dīrghaḥ ca abhyāsasya iti . katham tarhi . dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3743_12: ca ābhyāsasya iti . kim idam ābhyāsasya iti . abhyāsavikāraḥ ābhyāsaḥ tasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_0: 33-39 dhātoḥ iti kimartham . prakartum aicchat prācikīrṣat . sopasargāt mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_1: karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_2: anarthakam . karmaṇaḥ samānakartṛkāt icchāyām vā sambhavati iti eva dhātoḥ utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_3: bhaviṣyati . soparsargam vai karma . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti . sopasargam karma iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_4: cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargam karma . sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_5: upasargaḥ . anupasargam hi karma . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam anupasargam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_6: iti . sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_7: hi manyate sopasargam karma iti kriyamāṇe api tasya dhātugrahaṇe sanaḥ avidhiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_8: . kim kāraṇam . akarmatvāt . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_9: subantāt ca aprasaṅgaḥ kyajādīnām apavādatvāt . subantāt ca sanaḥ aprasaṅgaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_10: kāraṇam . kyajādīnām apavādatvāt . subantāt kyajādayaḥ vidhīyante . te apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_11: bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . anabhidhānāt vā . atha vā anabhidhānāt subantāt utpattiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_12: bhaviṣyati . na hi subantāt utpadyamānena sanā icchāyā abhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_13: tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . iyam tāvat agatikā gatiḥ yat ucyate anabhidhānāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_14: . yat api ucyate subantāt ca aprasaṅgaḥ kyajādīnām apavādatvāt iti . bhavet kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3745_15: cit aprasaṅgaḥ syāt ātmecchāyām . parecchāyām tu prāpnoti :

GS24pmbhasuu:3746_1: . kim . samānakartṛkāt iti ucyate . na ca subantasya samānaḥ kartā asti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3746_2: bhavet kasmāt cit aprasaṅgaḥ yasya kartā na asti . iha tu prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3747: āsitum icchati śayitum icchati . icchāyām arthe san vidhīyate icchārtheṣu ca tumun . tatra tumunā uktatatvāt tasya arthasya san na bhaviṣyati . evam api iha prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_0: āsanam icchati śayanam icchati iti . iha yaḥ viśeṣaḥ upādhiḥ vā upādīyate dyotye
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_1: tasmin tena bhavitavyam . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ gamyate āsitum icchati śayitum icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_2: svayam tām kriyām kartum icchati iti na asau iha gamyate āsanam icchati śayanam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_3: iti . anyasya api āsanam icchati iti eṣaḥ api arthaḥ gamyate . avaśyam ca etat evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_4: vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate adyotye tasmin tena bhavitavyam iti kriyamāṇe api tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_0: saṅgatam icchati devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti . karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_1: ca icchābhidhāne pratyayavidhānāt . karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_2: kāraṇam . icchābhidhāne pratyayavidhānāt . icchāyām abhidheyāyām san vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_3: akarmaṇaḥ hi asamānakartṛkāt vā anabhidhānam . icchāyām abhidheyāyām san vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_4: . na ca akarmaṇaḥ asamānakartṛkāt vā utpadyamānena sanā icchāyā abhidhānam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_5: anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . aṅgaparimāṇārtham tu . aṅgaparimāṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_6: tarhi anyatarat kartavyam karmagrahaṇam dhātugrahaṇam vā . aṅgaparimāṇam jñāsyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_7: iti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . dhātugrahaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . aṅgaparimāṇam ca eva vijñātam
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_8: bhavati . api ca dhātoḥ vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñaḥ bhavati iti sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_9: ārdhadhātukasañjñā siddhā bhavati . yat ca api etat uktam karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_10: dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargam
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_11: karma sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt iti svapakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_12: anena varṇitaḥ . yuktam iha draṣṭavyam kim nyāyyam karma iti . etat ca atra yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_13: yat sopasargam karma syāt . nanu ca uktam sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_14: api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . karmaṇaḥ iti na eṣā dhātusamānādhikaraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_15: pañcamī . karmaṇaḥ dhātoḥ iti . kim tarhi . avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . karmaṇaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_16: dhātuḥ avayavaḥ . yadi avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhīkevalāt utpattiḥ na prāpnoti . cikīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_17: jihīrṣati iti . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena karmaṇaḥ dhātuḥ avayaḥ bhavati . kāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_18: tarhi anena eva hetunā kyac api kartavyaḥ . mahāntam putram icchati . karmaṇaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_19: subantam avayayaḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . asāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_20: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3749_21: vāvacanam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3750_0: hi dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvataḥ ca etat bhavati vākyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3750_1: pratyayaḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye pratyaye prāpte vāvacanena kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3750_2: anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ bhāvābhāvau iṣyete
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_0: 39-42 tumunantāt vā tasya ca lugvacanam . tumunantāt vā san vaktavyaḥ tasya ca tumunaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_1: luk vaktavyaḥ . kartum icchati cikīrṣati . liṅuttamāt vā . liṅuttamāt vā san vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_2: tasya ca liṅaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ . kuryām iti icchati cikīrṣati . āśaṅkāyām acetaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_3: upasaṅkhyānam . āśaṅkāyām acetaneṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aśmā luluṭhiṣate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_4: kūlam pipatiṣati iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . evam manyate . cetanāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_5: etat bhavati icchā iti . kūlam ca acetanam . acetanagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . āśaṅkāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_6: iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . śvā mumūrṣati . na vā tulyakāraṇatvāt icchayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_7: hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . tulyakāraṇatvāt . tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_8: hi kāraṇam cetanāvati devadatte kūle ca acetane . kim kāraṇam . icchayāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_9: upalabdhiḥ . icchayāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ bhavati . yaḥ api asu kaṭam cikīrṣuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_10: bhavati na asau āghoṣayati . kaṭam kariṣyāmi iti . kim tarhi . sannaddham rajjukīlakpūlapāṇim
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_11: dṛṣṭvā tataḥ icchā gamyate . kūlasya api pipatiṣataḥ loṣṭāḥ śīryante bhidā jāyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_12: deśāt deśāntaram upasaṅkrāmati . śvānaḥ khalu api mumūrṣavaḥ ekāntaśīlāḥ śūnākṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_13: ca bhavanti . upamānāt vā siddham . upamānāt vā siddham etat . katham . luluṭhiṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_14: iva luluṭhiṣate . pipatiṣati iva pipatiṣati . na tiṅantena upamānam asti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_15: icchā iva icchā . sarvasya vā cetanāvattvāt . atha vā sarvam cetanāvat . evam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_16: āha . kaṃsakāḥ sarpanti . śirīṣaḥ adhaḥ svapiti . suvarcalā ādityam anu paryeti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3752_17: āskanda kapilaka iti ukte tṛṇam āskandati . ayaskāntam ayaḥ saṅkrāmati . ṛṣiḥ paṭhati śrṇota grāvāṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3754_0: 42-45 ime iṣavaḥ bahavaḥ paṭhyante . tatra na jñāyate kasya ayam arthe san vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3754_1: iti . iṣeḥ chatvabhāvinaḥ . yadi evam kartum anvicchati kartum anveṣaṇā atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:3754_2: prāpnoti . evam tarhi yasya striyām icchā iti etat rūpam nipātyate . kasya ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3754_3: nipātyate . kāntikarmaṇaḥ . atha iha grāmam gantum icchati iti kasya kim karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:3754_4: iṣeḥ ubhe karmaṇī . yadi evam grāmam gantum icchati grāmāya gantum icchati iti gatyarthakarmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3754_5: dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ . evam tarhi gameḥ grāmaḥ karma iṣeḥ gamiḥ karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:3754_6: evam api iṣyate grāmaḥ gantum iti parasādhane utpadyamānena lena grāmasya abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3754_7: na prāpnoti . evam tarhi gameḥ grāmaḥ karma iṣeḥ ubhe karmaṇī . atha sanantāt sanā bhavitavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3755_0: cikīrṣitum icchati jihīrṣitum icchati iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3755_1: śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3755_2: tasya arthasya aparasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3756_0: eṣitum icchati eṣiṣiṣati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ekasya atra iṣeḥ iṣiḥ sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3756_1: vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3756_2: iha api tarhi ekasya iṣeḥ karotiviṣiṣṭaḥ iṣiḥ sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3756_3: . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . yena eva khalu api hetunā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3756_4: vākyam bhavati cikīrṣitum icchati jihīrṣitum icchati iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3756_5: prāpnoti . tasmāt sanantāt sanaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tam ca api bruvatā iṣisanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3756_6: iti vaktavyam . bhavati hi jugupsiṣate mīmāṃsiṣate iti . śaiṣikāt matubarthīyāt śaiṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3756_7: matubarthikaḥ sarūpaḥ pratyayaḥ na iṣṭaḥ . sanantāt na san iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_0: 45-48 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_1: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_2: anubandhena . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_3: arthaḥ . asya cvau kyaci ca iti . kye ca iti ucyamāne api kākaḥ śyenāyate atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_4: prasayjeta . na etat asti . tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya grahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_5: iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ tarhi . kva ca sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_6: arthaḥ . naḥ kye iti . atha ātmangrahaṇam kimartham . ātmecchāyām yathā syāt . parecchāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_7: mā bhūt iti . rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . kriyamāṇe api ātmagrahaṇe parecchāyām prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_8: . kim kāraṇam . ātmanaḥ iti iyam kartari ṣaṣṭhī . icchā iti akāraḥ bhāve . saḥ yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_9: eva ātmanaḥ icchā atha api parasya ātmecchā eva asau bhavati . na ātmagrahaṇena icchā
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_10: abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . subantam abhisambadhyate . ātmanaḥ yat subantam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_11: . yadi ātmagrahaṇam kriyate chandasi parecchāyām na prāpnoti . ma tvā vṛkāḥ aghāyavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3758_12: vidan . tasmāt na arthaḥ ātmagrahaṇena . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_0: rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_1: bhavati iti . chandasi api tarhi na prāpnoti . ma tvā vṛkāḥ aghāyavaḥ vidan . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_2: atra viśeṣaḥ . antareṇa api atra tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_3: punaḥ antareṇa api atra tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . te ca eva vṛkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_4: evamātmakaḥ hiṃsrāḥ . kaḥ ca ātmanaḥ agham eṣitum arhati . ataḥ antareṇa api atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_5: tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . yathā eva tarhi chandasi aghaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_6: parecchāyām khyac bhavati evam bhāṣāyām api prāpnoti . agham icchati iti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_7: ātmagrahaṇam kartavyam . chandasi katham . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_8: aghaśabdāt parecchāyām kyac iti yat ayam aśvāghasyāt iti kyaci pratkṛte ītvabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_9: ākāram śāsti . atha subgrahaṇam kimartham . subantāt utpattiḥ yatha syāt . prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_10: mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_11: prātipadikāt vā ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . subantāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_12: . prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā na prāpnoti . nanu ca prātipadikāt utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_13: satyām padasañjñā siddhā . katham . ārabhyate naḥ kye iti . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_14: subantāt utpattau satyām niyamārtham . tat eva prātipadikāt utpattau satyām vidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_15: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ yatha syāt . dhātoḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_16: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . dhātoḥ san vidhīyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_17: . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ ca san . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . parecchā
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_18: . na parecchāyām sanā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . samānakartṛkāt iti ucyate . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_19: ca iha ātmagrahaṇam tāvat tatra samānakartṛkagrahaṇam . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_20: utpattiḥ yatha syāt . vākyāt māt bhūt iti . mahāntam putram icchati iti . na vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_21: mahāputrīyati iti . bhavati yadā etat vākyam bhavati . mahān putraḥ mahāputraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_22: mahāputram icchati mahāputrīyati iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati mahāntam putram
GS24pmbhasuu:3759_23: icchati iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_0: 48-50 atha kriyamāṇe api subgrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . subantam hi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_1: vākyam . na etat subantam . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_2: iti . atha yat atra subantam tasmāt utpattiḥ kasmāt na bhavati . samānādhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_3: sarvatra avṛttiḥ ayogāt ekena . samānādhikaraṇānām sarvatra eva vṛttiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_4: . kva sarvatra . samāsavidhau pratyayavidhau . samāsavidhau tāvat . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_5: puruṣaḥ . mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . pratyayavidhau . ṛddhasya upagoḥ apatyam . mahāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_6: putram icchati . iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samānādhikaraṇānām sarvatra vṛttiḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_7: . ayogāt ekena . na hi ekena padena yogaḥ bhavati . iha tāvat ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_8: iti ṣaṣṭhyantena subantena sāmarthye sati samāsaḥ vidhīyate . yat ca atra ṣaṣthyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_9: na tasya subantena sāmarthyam . yasya ca sāmarthyam na tat ṣaṣṭhyantam . vākyam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_10: . ṛddhasya upagoḥ apatyam iti ca . ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt apatyena yoge pratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_11: . yat ca atra ṣaṣṭḥīsamartham na tasya apatatyena yogaḥ yasya ca aptatyena yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_12: na tat ṣaṣṭhyantam . vākyam tat . samānādhikaraṇānām iti ucyate . atha vyadhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_13: katham . rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . evam tarhi idam paṭhitavyam . saviśeṣaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_14: sarvatra avṛttiḥ ayogāt ekena . dvitīyānupapattiḥ tu . dvitīyā tu na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_15: mahāntam putram icchati iti . kim kāraṇam . na putraḥ iṣikarma . yadi putraḥ na iṣikarma
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_16: na ca avaśyam dvitīyā eva . kim tarhi . sarvāḥ dvitīyādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . mahatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_17: putreṇa kṛtam . mahate putrāya dehi . mahaḥ putrāt ānaya . mahataḥ putrasya svam
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_18: . mahati putre nidhehi . tasmāt na evam śakyam vaktum na putraḥ iṣikarma iti . putra
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_19: eva iṣikarma . tatsāmānādhikaraṇyāt dvitīyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_20: na bhavati . saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_21: . yadi saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti ucyate muṇḍayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_22: māṇavakam iti atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . amuṇḍādīnām iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_23: saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate amuṇḍādīnām iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_24: vaktavyam . vṛttiḥ kasmāt na bhavati mahāntam putram icchati iti . agamakatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_25: iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam pratyayāntena ca . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ vākyena
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_26: gamyate mahāntam putram icchati iti na asau jātu cit pratyayāntena gamyate mahāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_27: putrīyati iti . etasmāt hetoḥ brūmaḥ agamakatvāt iti . na brūmaḥ apaśabdaḥ syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3761_28: . yatra ca gamakatvam bhavati tatra vṛttiḥ . tat yathā muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_0: 50-55 atha asya kyajantasya kāni sādhanāni bhavanti . bhāvaḥ kartā ca . atha karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_1: . na asti karma . nanu ca ayam iṣiḥ sakarmakaḥ yasya ayam arthe kyac vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_2: abhihitam tat karma antarbhūtam dhātvarthaḥ sampannaḥ . na ca idānīm anyat karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_3: asti yena sakarmakaḥ syāt . katham tarhi ayam sakarmakaḥ bhavati aputram putram iva
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_4: ācarati putrīyati māṇavakam iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . dve hi atra karmaṇī upamānakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_5: upameyakarma ca . upamānakarma antarbhūtam . upameyena karmaṇā sakarmakaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_6: . tat yathā . api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti atra dvau kartārau upamānakartā ca upameyakartā
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_7: ca. upamānakartā antarbhūtaḥ . upemeyakartrā sakrtṛkaḥ bhavati . ayam tarhi katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_8: sakarmakaḥ bhavati . muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atra api dve karmaṇī sāmānyakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_9: viśeṣakarma ca . sāmānyakarma antarbhūtam . viśeṣakarmaṇā sakarmakaḥ bhavati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_10: ca vṛttyā eva atra na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_11: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra ubhau karotiyuktau muṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_12: māṇavakaḥ ca . na hi māṇavakaḥ kriyate . yadā ca ubhau karotiyuktau bhavataḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_13: tadā vṛttiḥ . tat yathā balīvardam karoti muṇḍam ca enam karoti iti . kāmam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_14: anena eva hetunā kyac api kartavyaḥ māṇavakam muṇḍam icchati iti . na ubhau iṣiyuktau
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_15: iti . na kartavyaḥ . ubhau atra iṣiyuktau muṇḍaḥ māṇavakaḥ ca . katham . na hi asau
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_16: mauṇḍyamātreṇa santoṣam karoti . māṇavakastham asau mauṇḍyam icchati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_17: na prāpnoti muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atra api hi ubhau karotiyukta muṇḍaḥ māṇavakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_18: ca . na hi asau mauṇḍyamātreṇa santoṣam karoti . māṇavakastham asu mauṇḍyam nirvartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_19: . evam tarhi muṇḍādayaḥ guaṇavacanāḥ . guṇavacanāḥ ca sāpekṣāḥ . vacanāt sāpekṣāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_20: api vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā dhātavaḥ eva muṇḍādayaḥ . na na eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_21: kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate . atha vā na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati vākyam ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_22: ca . yadā vākyam na tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ sāmānyena tadā vṛttiḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_23: avśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . muṇḍayati . kam . māṇavakam iti . muṇḍaviśiṣṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_24: vā karotina tam āptum icchati . atha vā uktam etat . na atra vyāpāraḥ anugantavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_25: iti . gamaktvāt iha vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atha iha kyacā
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_26: bhavitavyam . iṣṭaḥ putraḥ . iṣyate putraḥ iti . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3763_27: it . kim kāraṇam . svaśabdena uktatvāt iti . apare āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3764_0: bhavitavyam iti . kim kāraṇam . dhātvarthe ayam kyac vidhīyate . saḥ ca dhātvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3764_1: kena cit eva śabdena nirdeṣṭavyaḥ iti . ihabhavantaḥ tu āhuḥ na bhavitavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3764_2: kim kāraṇam . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam pratyayāntena ca . yaḥ ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3764_3: arthaḥ vākyena gamyate iṣṭaḥ putraḥ iṣyate putraḥ iti na asau jātu cit pratyayāntena gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3766_0: 55-56 kyaci māntāvyayapratiṣedhaḥ . kyaci māntāvyayānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3766_1: māt bhūt . idam icchati . kim icchati . uccaiḥ icchati . nīcaiḥ icchati . gosamānākṣaranāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3766_2: iti eke . gām icchati gavyati . samānākṣarāt . dadhīyati madhati kartrīyati hartrīyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_0: 56-57 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_1: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātusvareṇa api etat siddham . kakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_2: tarhi itsañjñāparitrāṇārthaḥ āditaḥ cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . kāmyacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_3: citkaraṇānarthakyam kasya idarthābhāvāt . kāmyacaḥ citkaraṇam anarthakam . kakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_4: tarhi itsañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . idarthābhāvāt . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_5: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam . akāryam lopaḥ . iha hi śabdasya kāryārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_6: vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā . karyam ca iha na asti . kārye asati yadi śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_7: api na syāt upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt . idam tarhi itkāryam . agnicitkamyati . kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_8: iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_9: aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_10: . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . idam tarhi . upayaṭkāmyati . kiti iti samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_11: yathā syāt .. etat api na asti prayojanam . yajādibhiḥ atra kitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_12: . yajādīnām yaḥ kit iti . kaḥ ca yajādīnām kit . yajādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_13: api katham cit itkāryam syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva dvicakārakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_14: nirdeśaḥ . supaḥ ātmanaḥ kyac ckāmyat ca iti . atha vā chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_15: chandasi bhavati . na ca atra samprasāraṇam dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3769: (P_3,1.10) KA_II,20.17-19 Ro_III.57 adhikaraṇāt ca . adhikaraṇāt ca iti vaktavyam . prāsādayati kuṭyām kuṭīyati prāsāde iti atra api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_0: 58 salopasanniyogena ayam kyaṅ vidhīyate . tena yatra eva salopaḥ tatra eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_1: . payāyate . iha na syāt . api kākaḥ śyenāyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānśiṣṭaḥ kyaṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_2: . anvācayaśiṣṭaḥ salopaḥ . yatra ca sakāram paśyasi iti . tat yatha . kaḥ cit uktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_3: grāme bhikṣām cara devadattam ca ānaya iti . saḥ grāme bhikṣām carati . yadi devadattam
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_4: paśyati tam api ānayati . salopaḥ vā . salopaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . payāyate payasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_5: . ojopsarasoḥ nityam . ojopsarasoḥ nityam salopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_6: jaghāna . apsarāyate . apraḥ āha salopaḥ apsarasaḥ eva . payasyate iti eva bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_7: iti . katham ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim jaghana iti . chāndasaḥ prayogaḥ . chandasi ca dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_0: 58-59 ācāre galbhaklībahoḍebhyaḥ kvip vā . ācāre galbhaklībahoḍebhyaḥ kvip vā vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_1: . avagalbhate avagalbhāyate . klība . viklībate viklībāyate . klība . hoḍa . vihoḍate
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_2: vihoḍāyate . kim prayojanam . kriyāvacanatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_3: . dhātavaḥ eva galbhādayaḥ . na ca eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_4: . idam tarhi prayojanam . avagalbhā viklībā vihoḍā . a pratyayāt iti akāraḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_5: syāt . mā bhūt evam . guroḥ ca halaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . avagalbhām
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_6: cakre . viklībām cakre . vihoḍām cakre . kāspratyayāt ām amantre iti ām yathā syāt . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3774_0: sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ ācāre kvip vaktavyaḥ aśvati gardabhati iti evamartham . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3774_1: tarhi idānīm galbhādyanukramaṇam kartavyam . kartavyam ca . kim prayojanam . ātmanepadārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3774_2: anubandhān āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . galbha klība hoḍa .
GS24pmbhasuu:3776_0: 60 halaḥ lopasanniyogena ayam kyaṅ vidhīyate . tena yatra eva halaḥ lopaḥ tatra eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3776_1: prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānaśiṣṭaḥ kyaṅ . anvācayaśiṣṭaḥ halaḥ lopaḥ . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_1: . iha mā bhūt . kva divā bhṛśāḥ bhavanti iti . cvipratiṣedhānarthakyam ca bhavatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_2: kyaṅvacanāt . cvipratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bhavatyarthe kyaṅvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_3: . bhavatyarthe hi kyaṅ vidhīyate . bhavatiyoge cvividhānam . bhavatinā yoge cviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_4: vidhīyate . tatra cvinā uktatvāt tasya arthasya kyaṅ na bhaviṣyati . ḍājantāt api
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_5: tarhi na prāpnoti . paṭapaṭāyate . ḍāc api hi bhavatinā yoge vidhīyate . bhavatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_6: kyaṣ . ḍāci vacanaprāmāṇyāt . ḍāci vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyati . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_7: . lohitādiḍājbhyaḥ kyaṣ iti . iha kim cit akriyamāṇam codyate kim cit kriyamāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_8: pratyākhyāyate . saḥ sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_9: iha kasmāt na bhavati kva divā bhṛśāḥ bhavanti iti . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_10: tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam va yat kim cit iha dṛśyate tatra anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_11: tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_12: brāhmaṇasadṛśaḥ ānīyate . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api acveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3778_13: iti cvipratiṣedhāt anyasmin acvyante cvisadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca ataḥ anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3780: 61-64 iha kāḥ cit prakṛtayaḥ sopasargāḥ paṭhyante : abhimanas ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_0: abhibhavatau subhavatau udbhavatau durbhavatau iti . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam vā . abhimanasśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_1: sumanasśabdāt unmanasśabdāt durmanasśabdāt iti . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayatum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_2: nanu tena asandigdhena prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam bhavitavyam yāvatā prāk prakṛteḥ paṭhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_3: . yadi hi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam syāt prāk bhavateḥ paṭhyeran . na ime śakyāḥ prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_4: bhavateḥ paṭhitum . evam viśiṣṭe hi pratyayāṛthe bhṛśādimātrāt utpattiḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_5: . tasmāt na evam śakyam kartum . na cet evam jāyate vicāraṇā . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_6: . bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam iti cet svare doṣaḥ . bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_7: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam iti cet svare doṣaḥ bhavati . abhimanāyate . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_8: nighātaḥ prasajyate . astu tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam . sopasargāt iti cet aṭi doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3785_9: . sopasargāt iti cet aṭi doṣaḥ bhavati . svamanayata iti . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3786: aṭi doṣaḥ bhavati iti . aḍlyavdvirvacaneṣu iti vaktavyam . aṭi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_0: abhimimanāyiṣate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avaśyam saṅgrāmayateḥ sopasargāt utpattiḥ vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_1: asaṅgrāmayata śūraḥ iti evamartham . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . saṅgrāmayateḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_2: sopasargāt na anyasmāt sopasargāt iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate svaraḥ na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_3: evam tarhi bhṛśādiṣu upasargasya parāṅgavadbhāvam vakṣyāmi . yadi parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_4: ucyate aḍlyavdvirvacanāni na sidhyanti . svaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_5: astu pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_6: iti cet svare doṣaḥ iti . svare parāṅgavadbhāvena parihṛtam . ayam tarhi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_7: sati doṣaḥ . kyaṅā uktatvāt tasya arthasya upasargasya prayogaḥ na prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_8: kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . tat yathā . api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti kyaṅā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_9: ācārārthasya āṅaḥ prayogaḥ na bhavati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ekena atra viśiṣṭe pratyayārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_10: pratyayaḥ utpadyate iha punaḥ anekena . tatra manāyate iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt abhibhavatau
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_11: subhavatau durbhavatau iti . tatra asandehārtham upasargaḥ prayujyate . yatra tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3789_12: ekena . utpucchayate . atra api anekena . pucchāt udasane pucchāt vyasane pucchāt paryasane iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_0: 64-66 kimarthaḥ kakāraḥ . kṅiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_1: . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_2: ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . lohitādīni prātipadikāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_3: . sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ tarhi . kva sāmānyagrahaṇena arthaḥ . naḥ kye iti . na ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_4: nāntāt vidhīyate . iha tarhi . yasya halaḥ kyasya vibhāṣā iti . na ayam halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_5: vidhīyate . iha tarhi . āpatyayasya ca taddhite anāti kyacvyoḥ ca iti . na ayam āpatyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_6: vidhīyate . iha tarhi . kyāt chandasi iti . yāt chandasi iti etāvat vaktavyam caraṇyūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_7: turaṇyuḥ bhuraṇyuḥ iti evamartham . idam tarhi prayojanam . yat tat akṛtyakāre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_8: dīrghatvam tatra kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate . tat iha api yathā syāt . lohitāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_9: kim punaḥ kāraṇam tatra kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate . iha mā bhūt . uruyā dhṛṣṇuyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_10: . yadi kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate itryam iti pituḥ rīṅbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . rīṅbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_11: kṅidgrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate katham asūyā vasūyā ca yamāmahe . asūyateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_12: asūyā vasūyateḥ vasūyā . atha vā chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ ca chandasi bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_13: iti . yadi chāndasatvam hetuḥ na arthaḥ kṅidgrahaṇena anuvartamānena . kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_14: bhavati uruyā dhṛṣṇuyā iti . chāndasatvāt . atha vā astu atra dīrghatvam . chāndasam
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_15: hrasvatvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā upagāyantu mām patnayaḥ garbhiṇayaḥ yuvatayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_16: . atha kimarthaḥ ṣakāraḥ . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . vā kyaṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_17: iti . vā yāt iti hi ucyamāne ataḥ api prasajyeta . na etat asi prayojanam . parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_18: iti ucyate . na ca ataḥ parasmaipadam na api ātmanepadam paśyāmaḥ . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_19: tarhi bhaviṣyati . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . kyāt chandasi iti . yāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3791_20: chandasi iti evam vaktavyam caraṇyūḥ turaṇyuḥ bhuraṇyuḥ iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3793_0: 66 lohitaḍājbhyaḥ kyaṣvacanam . lohitaḍājbhyaḥ kyaṣ vaktavyaḥ . lohitāyati lohitāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3793_1: paṭapaṭāyati paṭapaṭāyate . atha anyāni lohitādīni . bhṛśādiṣu itarāṇi . bhṛśādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3793_2: itarāṇi paṭhitavyāni . kim prayojanam . ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3795: 67-68 kaṣṭāya iti kim nipātyate . kaṣṭaśabdāt caturthīsamarthāt kramaṇe anārjave kyṅ nipātyate . kaṣṭāya karmaṇe krāmati kaṣṭāyate . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3796_1: kaṇvacikīrṣāyām iti vaktavyam . sattrāyate . sattra. kakaṣa. kakṣāyate . kaṣṭa .
GS24pmbhasuu:3796_2: kaṣṭāyate . kaṣṭa . gahana . gahanāyate . aparaḥ āha:
GS24pmbhasuu:3797_0: . sattrādibhyaḥ caturthyantebhyaḥ kramaṇe anārjave kyaṅ vaktavyaḥ . etāni eva udāharaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3797_1: . sattrādibhyaḥ iti kimartham . kuṭilāya krāmati anuvākāya . caturthyantebhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3797_2: kimartham . ajaḥ kaṣṭam krāmati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na etat pratyayāntanipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3797_3: . kim tarhi . tādarthye eṣā caturthī . kaṣṭāya yat prātipadikam . kaṣṭārthe yat prātipadikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3799_0: 68 romanthe iti ucyate . kaḥ romanthaḥ nāma . udgīrṇasya vā avagīrṇasya vā manthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3799_1: romanthaḥ iti . yadi evam hanucalane iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kīṭaḥ romatham
GS24pmbhasuu:3799_2: vartayati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati . kīṭaḥ romatham
GS24pmbhasuu:3799_3: vartayati iti . anabhidhānāt . tapasaḥ parasmaipadam ca . tapasaḥ parasmaipadam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3799_4: iti vaktavyam . tapaḥ carati tapasyati . katham tapasyate lokajigīṣuḥ agneḥ . chāndasatvāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3803_1: aṭṭāyate . śīkā . śīkāyate . koṭā . koṭāyate . poṭā . poṭāyate . soṭā . soṭāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3803_2: . pruṣṭā . pruṣṭayate . pluṣṭā . pluṣṭāyate . sudinadurdinābhyām ca . sudinadurdinābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3803_3: ca iti vaktavyam . sudināyate . durdināyate . nīhārāt ca . nīhārāt ca iti vaktavyam . nīhārāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_0: 69 kartṛvedanāyām iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . sukham vedayate prasādhakaḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_1: . kartṛvedanāyām iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . kartuḥ iti iyam kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_2: ṣaṣṭhī . vedanāyām iti ca anaḥ bhāve . saḥ yadi eva ātmanaḥ vedayate atha api parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3805_3: kartṛvedanā eva asau bhavati . na kartṛgrahaṇena vedanā abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3807_0: 70 namasaḥ kyaci dvitīyānupapattiḥ . namasaḥ kyaci dvitīyā na upapadyate . namasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3807_1: devān . kim kāraṇam . namaḥśabdena yoge caturthī vidhīyate . sā prāpnoti . prakṛtyantaratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3807_2: siddham . namaḥśabdena yoge caturthī vidhīyate namasyatiśabdaḥ ca ayam . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3807_3: namasyatiśabde namaḥśabdaḥ asti . tena yoge prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3807_4: namaḥsābdasya grahaṇam . na ca namasyatiśabde namaḥśabdaḥ arthavān . atha vā upapadavibhakteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_1: namasaḥ pūjāyām . varivasaḥ paricaryāyām . citraṅaḥ āścarye . bhāṇḍāt samācayane
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_2: . cīvarāt arjane paridhāne vā . pucchāt udasane vysasane ca iti . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_3: . kriyāvacanatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3809_4: kriyāvacanāḥ kyajādayaḥ iti yat ayam sanādyantāḥ dhātavaḥ iti dhātusañjñām śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_0: dhātoḥ iti tavyadādīnām utpattiḥ yathā syāt . yadi ca atra kriyāvacanatā na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_1: dhātusañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . satyām api dhātusañjñāyām tavyadādayaḥ na syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_2: . kim kāraṇam . sādhane tāvyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_3: sādhanābhāvaḥ . sādhanābhāvāt satyām api dhātusañjñāyām tavyadādayaḥ na syuḥ . paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_4: tu ācāryaḥ kriyāvacanāḥ kyajādayaḥ iti tataḥ sanādyantāḥ dhātavaḥ iti dhātusañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_5: śāsti . nanu ca idam prayojanam syāt . parasādhane utpattim vakṣyāmi iti . na parasādhane
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_6: utpattyā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . sādhanam iti sambandhiśabdaḥ ayam . sambandhiśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_7: ca punaḥ evamātmakāḥ yat uta sambandhinam ākṣipanti . tat yathā . mātari vartitatvyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3811: pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_0: sambandhāt ca etat gamyate yā yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api sambandhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_1: etat gantavyam yasya dhātoḥ yat sādhanam iti . atha vā dhātavaḥ eva kyajādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_2: na ca eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante . kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate . kaḥ khalu api pacādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_3: kriyāvacanatve yatnam karoti . yena eva khalu api hetunā pacādayaḥ kriyāvacanāḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_4: eva kyajādayaḥ api . evamartham ācāryaḥ citrayati . kva cit arthān ādiśati kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_5: na . evam api arthādeśanam kartavyam . katham ime abudhāḥ budhyeran iti . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_6: śakyam ādeśanam akartum . katham . karaṇe iti vartate . karaṇam ca karoteḥ karotiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_0: 72-74 imau halikalī staḥ ikārāntau . asti halaśabdaḥ kalaśabdaḥ ca akārāntaḥ . kayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_1: idam grahaṇam . yau ikārāntau tayoḥ atvam nipātyate . kim prayojanam . halikalyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_2: atvanipātanam sanvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham . halikalyoḥ atvanipātanam kriyate sanvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_3: mā bhūt iti . ajahalat acakalat . na etat asti prayojanam . ikāralope kṛte aglopinām
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_4: na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ . tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_5: . idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām aglopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_6: vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām api prāpnoti . anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_7: lopaḥ . anyasya kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti anyasya akṛtāyām . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_8: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . vṛddhiḥ api anityā . anyasya kṛte lope prāpnoti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_9: akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_10: vṛddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ . tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . atve punaḥ sati vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_11: kriyatām lopaḥ iti yadi api paratvāt vṛddhiḥ vṛddhau kṛtāyām api ak eva lupyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3814_12: tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate halikalyoḥ atvanipātanam sanvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3815_0: (P_3,1.22.1) KA_II,28.13-18 Ro_III.74-75 samabhihāraḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . samabhipūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3815_1: harateḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ ghañ . samabhiharaṇam samabhihāraḥ . tat yatha puṣpābhihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3815_2: phalābhihāraḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahvyaḥ hi tāḥ sumanasaḥ . tatra yuktaḥ samabhihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3815_3: . iha punaḥ ekā kriyā . yadi api ekā sāmānyakriyā avayavakriyāḥ tu bahvyaḥ adhiśrayaṇodakāsecanataṇḍulāvapanaidhkopakarṣaṇkriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3815_4: . tāḥ kaḥ cit kārtsnyena karoti kaḥ cit akārtsnyena . yaḥ kārtsnyena karoti saḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3815_5: pāpacyate iti . punaḥ punaḥ vā pacati pāpacyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3817_0: 75-76 atha dhātugrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt prāṭati bhṛśam iti . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:3817_1: paṭhati . yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇe uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam karmagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3817_2: sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya
