GS24pmbhasuu:3817_3: anupasargam karma . sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3817_4: iti . evam iha api kriyāsamabhihāragrahaṇāt yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . sopasargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3817_5: kriyāsamabhihāraḥ iti cet kriyāsamabhihāraviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargaḥ kriyāsamabhihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3817_6: . sopasargasya hi kriyāsamahibhāratve dhātvadhikāre api yaṅaḥ avidhānam akriyāsamabhihāratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3817_7: iti . atha ekājjhalādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3818_0: jāgarti bhṛśam . īkṣate bhṛśam . ekājjhalādigrahaṇe ca . ekājjhalādigrahaṇe ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3818_1: . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇānarthakyam ca icchābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3818_2: pratyayavidhānāt . akarmaṇaḥ hi asamānakartṛkāt vā anabhidhānam iti . iha api ekājjhalādigrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3818_3: kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅvacanāt anekācaḥ ahalādeḥ hi anabhidhānam iti . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3818_4: anabhidānam āśrayitavyam . kriyamāṇe api hi ekājjhalādigrahaṇe yatra ekācaḥ halādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3818_5: ca utpadyamānena yaṅā arthasya abhidhānam na bhavati na bhavati tatra utpattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3818_6: tat yathā . bhṛśam śobhate . bhṛśam rocate . yatra ca anekācaḥ ahalādeḥ vo utpadyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:3818_7: yaṅā arthasya abhidhānam bhavati bhavati tatra utpattiḥ . tat yathā . aṭāṭyate arāryate
GS24pmbhasuu:3820: 76-77 ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prorṇonūyate . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3821_1: . sūcisūtrimūtryaṭyartyaśyūrṇotīnām grahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . yaṅvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3821_2: anekājahalādyartham . sosūcyate sosūtryate momūtryate aṭāṭyate arāryate aśāśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3821_3: prorṇonūyate . vācyaḥ ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvaḥ yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam . āmaḥ ca pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3823_0: 77-78 kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅaḥ vipratiṣedhena loḍvidhānam . kriyāsamabhihāre loṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3823_1: yaṅaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ dhātuḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3824: lolūyate . loṭaḥ avakāśaḥ dhātuḥ yaḥ anekāc ahalādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate dhātusambandhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3825_0: saḥ bhavān jāgṛhi jāgṛhi iti eva ayam jāgarti . saḥ bhavān īhasva īhasva iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3825_1: ayam īhate . dhātuḥ yaḥ ekāc halādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate dhātusambandhaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3826: saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti . loṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3827_0: saḥ bhavān lolūyasva lolūyasva iti eva ayam lolūyate . bhavati ca . na vā nānārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3827_1: . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ hi lavidhānam kriyāviśeṣe svārthe yaṅ . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:3827_2: . kim kāraṇam . nānārthatvāt . kā nānārthatā . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ hi lavidhānam . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3827_3: hi loṭ vidhīyate . kriyāviśeṣe svārthe yaṅ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt yaṅā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3827_4: . na tarhi idam idānīm bhavati . saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3827_5: ca . vibhāṣā yaṅ . yadā na yaṅ tadā loṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3829_0: 78-79 uttarayoḥ vigraheṇa viśeṣāsampratyayāt nityagrahaṇānarthakyam . uttarayoḥ yogayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3829_1: vigraheṇa viśeṣāsampratyayāt nityagrahaṇānarthakyam . na hi kuṭilam krāmati iti caṅkramyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3829_2: iti gamyate . athe etebhyaḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅā bhavitavyam . kriyāsamabhihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3829_3: ca na etebhyaḥ . kriyāsamabhihāre ca na etebhyaḥ yaṅā bhavitavyam . bhṛśam japati
GS24pmbhasuu:3829_4: brāhmaṇaḥ . bhṛśam samidaḥ dahati iti eva.
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_0: 79-80 satyāpa iti kim nipātyate . satyasya kṛñi āpuk ca . satyasya kṛñi āpuk ca nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_1: ṇic ca . satyam karoti satyāpayati . atyalpam idam ucyate . ṇividau arthavedasatyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_2: apuk ca . ṇividau arthavedasatyānām apuk ca iti vaktavyam . arthāpayati vedāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_3: satyāpayati . yadi āpuk kriyate ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi puk kariṣyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_4: api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi āk kariṣyate . evam api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_5: tarhi ak kariṣyate . evam api anākārāntatvāt puk na prāpnoti . evam tarhi apuṭ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_6: . atha vā punaḥ astu āpuk eva . nanu ca uktam . ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti iti . āpugvacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_7: na bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu puk eva . nanu ca uktam evam api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_8: iti . pugvacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu āk eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_9: evam api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti iti . āgvacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_0: 80-86 katham idam vijñāyate . hetumati abhidheye ṇic bhavati iti . āhosvit hetumati
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_1: yaḥ dhātuḥ vartate iti . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nanu anena asandigdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_2: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam yāvatā hetumati iti ucyate . yadi hi prakṛtarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_3: syāt hetumataḥ iti evam brūyāt . na etat asti . bhavanti iha hi viṣayasaptamyaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_4: . tat yathā . pramāṇe yat prātipadikam vartate striyām yat prātipadikam vartate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_5: . evam iha api hetumati abhidheye ṇic bhavati hetumati yaḥ dhātuḥ vartate iti jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_6: vicāraṇā . ata uttaram paṭhati . hetumati iti kārakopādānam pratyayārthaparigrahārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_7: yathā tanūkaraṇe takṣaḥ . hetumati iti kārakam upādīyate . kim prayojanam . pratyayārthaparigrahārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_8: . evam sati pratyayārthaḥ suparigṛhītaḥ bhavati . yathā tanūkaraṇe takṣaḥ iti tanūkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_9: upādīyate . yadi tarhi tadvat prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam bhavati . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_10: hi tat tatra vijñāyate . tanūkaraṇakriyāyām takṣaḥ iti . astu prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_11: . kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha hi uktaḥ karoti preṣitaḥ karoti iti ṇic prāpnoti . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_12: punaḥ sati na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaśabdena uktatvāt na bhaviṣyati . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_13: api sati na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yatra na antareṇa śabdam arthasya gatiḥ bhavati tatra śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_14: prayujyate . yatra hi antareṇa api śabdam arthasya gatiḥ bhavati na tatra śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_15: prayujyate . iha tarhi pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti ubhayoḥ kartroḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_16: lena abhidhānam prāpnoti . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe punaḥ sati na doṣaḥ . pradhānakartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_17: lādayaḥ bhavanti iti pradhānakartā lena abhidhīyate . yaḥ ca apradhānam siddha tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_18: kartari iti eva tṛtīyā . iha ca gamitaḥ grāmam devadattaḥ yajñadattanea iti avyatiriktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_19: gatyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā gatyarthānām kartari iti kartari ktaḥ prāpnoti . iha ca vyatibhedayante
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_20: vyaticchedayante iti avyatiriktaḥ hiṃsārthaḥ iti kṛtvā na gatihiṃsārthebhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_21: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam . yadi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_22: pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti prayojye kartari karmasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_23: . bhavati hi tasya tasmin īpsā . iha ca grāmam gamayati grāmāya gamayati iti vyatiriktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_24: gatyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ . iha ca edhodakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_25: upaskārayati iti vyatiriktaḥ karotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā kṛñaḥ pratiyatne iti ṣaṣṭhī na
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_26: prāpnoti . iha ca bhedikā devadattasya yajñadattasya kāṣṭhānām iti prayojye kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_27: ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . iha ca abhiṣāvayati pariṣāvayati iti vyatiriktaḥ sunotyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_28: iti kṛtvā upasargāt sunotyādīnām iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_29: ucyate pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti prayojye kartari karmasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_30: iti . gatibuddhipratyavasānārthaśabdakarmākarmakāṇām aṇi iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_31: . eteṣām eva aṇyantānām yaḥ kartā saḥ ṇau karmasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyeṣām iti . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_32: api ucyate iha ca grāmam gamayati grāmāya gamayati iti vyatiriktaḥ gatyarthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_33: kṛtvā gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ iti . na asau evam preṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_34: gaccha grāmam iti . katham tarhi . sādhanaviśiṣṭām asau kriyām preṣyate . grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_35: gaccha . grāmāya gaccha iti . yat api ucyate iha ca edhodakasya upaskārayati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_36: vyatiriktaḥ karotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā kṛñaḥ pratiyatne iti ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_37: na asau evam preṣyate upaskuruṣva edhodakasya iti . katham tarhi . sādhanaviśiṣṭām
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_38: asau kriyām preṣyate . edhodakasya upaskuruṣva iti . yat api ucyate iha ca bhedikā
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_39: devadattasya yajñadattasya kāṣṭhānām iti prayojye kartari ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_40: . uktam tatra kṛdgrahaṇasya prayojanam kartṛbhūtapūrvamātre api ṣaṣṭhī yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3833_41: iti . yat api ucyate iha ca abhiṣāvayati pariṣāvayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3834_0: iti vyatiriktaḥ sunotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā upasargāt sunotyādīnām iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3834_1: iti . na asau evam preṣyate sunu abhi iti . katham tarhi upasargaviśiṣṭām asau kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3834_2: preṣyate . abhiṣunu iti . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nanu anena asandigdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:3834_3: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam yāvatā vyaktam arthāntaram gamyate pacati pācayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3834_4: iti ca . bāḍham yuktam . iha paceḥ kaḥ pradhānārthaḥ . yā asau taṇḍulānām viklittiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3834_5: . atha idānīm tadabhisandhipūrvakam preṣaṇam adhyeṣaṇam vā . yuktam yat sarvam pacyarthaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3836_0: 87-88 hetunirdeśaḥ ca nimittamātram bikṣādiṣu darśanāt . hetunirdeśaḥ ca nimittamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:3836_1: draṣṭavyam . yāvat brūyāt nimittam kāraṇam iti tāvt hetuḥ iti . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3836_2: bikṣādiṣu darśanāt . bhikṣādiṣu hi ṇic dṛśyate . bhikṣāḥ vāsayanti .kāriṣaḥ agniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3836_3: adhyāpayati iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam pāribhāṣike hetau na sidhyati . evam manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3836_4: . cetanāvataḥ etat bhavati preṣaṇam adhyeṣaṇam ca iti . bhikṣāḥ ca acetanāḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3836_5: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na avaśyam saḥ eva vāsam prayojayati yaḥ āha uṣyatām iti . tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3836_6: yaḥ tatsamarthāni ācarati saḥ api vāsam prayojayati . bhikṣāḥ ca api pracurāḥ vyañjanavatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3836_7: labhyamānāḥ vāsam prayojayanti . tathā kārīṣaḥ agniḥ nirvāte ekānte suprajvalitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_0: 88-89 iha kaḥ cit kam cit āha . pṛcchatu mā bhavān . anuyuṅktām mā bhavān iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_1: ṇic kasmāt na bhavati . akartṛtvāt . na hi asau samprati pṛcchati . tūṣṇīm āste .
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_2: kim ca bhoḥ vartamānakālāyāḥ eva kriyāyāḥ kartrā bhavitavyam na bhūtabhaviṣyatkālāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_3: . bhūtabhaviṣyatkālāyāḥ api bhavitavyam . abhisambandhaḥ tatra kriyate . imām kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_4: akārṣīt . imām kriyām kariṣyati iti . iha punaḥ na kaḥ cit abhisambandhaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_5: na ca asau samprati pṛcchati . tūṣṇīm āste . yadi tarhi kartā na asti katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_6: kartṛpratyayena loṭā abhidhīyate . atham katham asmin apṛcchati ayam pracchiḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_7: . abhisambandhaḥ tatra kriyate . imām kriyām kuru iti . kartrā api tarhi abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_8: kriyate . katham . kartā ca asyāḥ kriyāyāḥ bhava iti . evam na ca kartā kartṛpratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_9: ca loṭā abhidhīyate . atha api katham cit kartā syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . loṭā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_10: preṣaṇasya ṇic na bhaviṣyati . vidhīyante hi eteṣu artheṣu praiṣādiṣu loḍādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_11: yatra ca dvitīyaḥ prayojyaḥ arthaḥ bhavati bhavati tatra ṇic . tat yathā āsaya śāyaya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_0: 89-90 kṛṣyādiṣu ca anutpattiḥ . kṛṣyādiṣu ca anutpattiḥ vaktavyā . ekānte tūṣṇīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_1: āsīnaḥ ucyate pañcabhiḥ halaiḥ kṛṣati iti . tatra bhavitavyam . pañcabhiḥ halaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_2: karṣayati iti . kṛṣyādiṣu ca anutpattiḥ nānākriyāṇām kṛṣyarthatvāt . kṛṣyādiṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_3: anutpattiḥ siddhā . kutaḥ . nānākriyāṇām kṛṣyarthatvāt . nānākriyāḥ kṛṣeḥ arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_4: . na avaśyam kṛṣiḥ vilekhane eva vartate . kim tarhi. pratividhāne api vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_5: yat asau bhaktabījabalīvardaiḥ pratividhānam karoti saḥ kṛṣyarthaḥ . ātaḥ ca pratividhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_6: vartate . yadahaḥ eva asau na pratividhatte tadahaḥ tat karma na pravartate . yajyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_7: ca aviparyāsaḥ . yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . puṣyamitraḥ yajate . yājakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_8: yājayanti iti . tatra bhavitavyam . puṣyamitraḥ yājayate . yājakāḥ yajanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_9: yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ nānākriyāṇām yajyarthatvāt . yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_10: . kutaḥ . nānākriyāṇām yajyarthatvāt . nānākriyāḥ yajeḥ arthāḥ . na avaśyam yajiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_11: haviṣprakṣepaṇe eva vartate . kim tarhi . tyāge api vartate . aho yajate iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3840_12: yaḥ suṣṭhu tyāgam karoti . tam ca puṣyamitraḥ karoti . yājakāḥ prayojayanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_0: 91-92 tat karoti iti upasaṅkhyānam sūtrayatyādyartham . tat karoti iti upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_1: kartavyam . kim prayojanam . sūtrayatyādyartham . sūtram karoti . sūtrayati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_2: vyākaraṇasya sūtram karoti . vyākaraṇam sūtrayati iti . vākye ṣaṣṭhī utpanne ca pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_3: dvitīyā . kena etat evam bhavati . yaḥ asau sūtravyākaraṇayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_4: utpanne pratyaye nivartate . asti ca karoteḥ vyākaraṇena sāmarthyam iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_0: 92-97 ākhyānāt kṛtaḥ tat ācaṣṭe iti kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat ca kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_1: . ākhyānāt kṛdantāt tat ācaṣṭe iti etasmin arthe kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_2: ca kārakam bhavati iti vaktavyam . kaṃsavadham ācaṣṭe kaṃsam ghātayati . balibandham
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_3: ācaṣṭe balim bandhayati . ākhyānāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ . ākhyānaśabdāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_4: vaktavyaḥ . ākhyānam ācaṣṭe . kim punaḥ yāni etāni sañjñābhūtāni ākhyānāni tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_5: utpattyā bhavitavyam āhosvit kriyānvākhyānamātrāt . kim ca ataḥ . yadi sañjñābhūtebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_6: iha na prāpnoti . rājāgamanam ācaṣṭe ṛajānam āgamayati . atha kriyānvākhyānamātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_7: na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . dṛśyarthānām ca pravṛttau . dṛśyarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_8: ca pravṛttau kṛdantāt ṇic vaktayaḥ tat ācaṣṭe iti etasmin arthe kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_9: prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti . mṛgaramaṇam ācaṣṭe mṛgān ramayati iti . dṛśyarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_10: iti kimartham . yadā hi grāme mṛgaramaṇam ācaṣṭe mṛgaramaṇam ācaṣṭe iti eva tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_11: bhavati iti . āṅlopaḥ ca kālātyantasaṃyoge maryādāyām . kālātyantasaṃyoge maryādayām
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_12: kṛdantāt ṇic vaktayaḥ tat ācaṣṭe iti etasmin arthe āṅlopaḥ ca kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_13: prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti . ārātrimvivāsam ācaṣṭe rātrim vivāsayati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_14: citrīkaraṇe prāpi . citrīkaraṇe prāpyarthe kṛdantāt ṇic vaktayaḥ kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_15: prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti . ujjayinyāḥ prasthitaḥ māhiṣmatyām suryodgamanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_16: sambhāvayate sūryam udgamayati . nakṣatrayoge jñi . nakṣatrayoge jānātyarthe kṛdantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_17: ṇic vaktayaḥ kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti . puṣyayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_18: jānāti puṣyeṇa yojayati . maghābhiḥ yojayati . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā sāmānyakṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_19: hetutaḥ hi aviśiṣṭam . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyakṛtatvāt . sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_20: eva atra ṇic bhaviṣyati . hetumati iti . kim kāraṇam . hetutaḥ hi aviśiṣṭam . hetutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_21: hi aviśiṣṭam bhavati . tulyā hi hetutā devadatte ca āditye ca . na sidhyati . svatantraprayojakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_22: hetusañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca asau ādityam prayojayati . svatantraprayojakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_23: aprayojakaḥ iti cet muktasaṃśayena tulyam . yam bhavān svatrantraprayojakam muktasaṃśayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_24: nyāyyam manyate pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti tena etat tulyam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_25: . pravṛttiḥ hi ubhayatra anapekṣya . pravṛttiḥ hi ubhayatra anapekṣya eva kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_26: bhavati devadatte ca āditye ca . na iha kaḥ cit paraḥ anugrahītavyaḥ iti pravartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_27: . sarve ime svabhūtyartham pravartante . ye tāvat ete guruśuśrūṣavaḥ te api svabhūtyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_28: eva pravartante pāralaukikam ca naḥ bhaviṣyati iha ca naḥ prītaḥ guruḥ adhyāpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_29: iti . tathā yat etat dāsakarmakaram nāma ete api svabhūtyartham eva pravartantebhaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_30: celam ca lapsyāmahe paribhāṣāḥ ca na naḥ bhaviṣyanti iti . tathā ye ete śilpinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_31: nāme te api svabhūtyartham eva pravartante vetanam ca lapsyāmahe mitrāṇi ca naḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_32: iti . evam eteṣu sarveṣu svabhūtyartham pravartamāneṣu kurvataḥ prayojakaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_33: tulyam . yadi kaḥ cit kurvataḥ prayojakaḥ nāma bhavati tena etat tulyam . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_34: sarve ime svabhūtyartham pravartantekaḥ prayojyārthaḥ . yat abhiprāyeṣu sajjante
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_35: . īdṛśau vadhrau kuru . īdṛśau paṭukau kuru . ādityaḥ ca asya abhiprāye sajjate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_36: eṣaḥ tasya abhiprāyaḥ . ujjayinyāḥ prasthitaḥ māhiṣmatyām suryodgamanam sambhāvayeya
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_37: iti . tam ca asya abhiprāyam ādityaḥ nirvartayati . bhavet iha vartamānakālatā yuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_38: . ujjayinyāḥ prasthitaḥ māhiṣmatyām suryodgamanam sambhāvayate sūryam udgamayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_39: iti . tatrasthasya hi tasya ādityaḥ udeti . iha tu katham vartamānakālatām kaṃsam
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_40: ghātayati balim bandhayati iti cirahate kaṃse cirabaddhe ca balau . atra api yuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_41: . katham . ye tāvat ete śobhikāḥ nāma ete pratyakṣam kaṃsam ghātayanti pratyakṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_42: ca balim bandhayanti iti . citreṣu katham . citreṣu api udgūrṇāḥ nipatitāḥ ca prahārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_43: dṛśyante kaṃsakarṣaṇyaḥ ca . granthikeṣu katham yatra śabdagaḍumātram lakṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3844_44: te api hi teṣām utpattiprabhṛti ā vināśāt ṛddhīḥ vyācakṣāṇāḥ sataḥ buddhiviṣayān
GS24pmbhasuu:3845_0: prakāśayanti . ātaḥ ca sataḥ vyāmiśrāḥ hi dṛśyante . ke cit kaṃsabhaktāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3845_1: ke cit vāsudevabhaktāḥ . varṇānyatvam khalu api puṣyanti . ke cit raktamukhāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3845_2: ke cit kālamukhāḥ . traikālyam khalu api loke lakṣyate . gaccha hanyate kaṃsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3845_3: gaccha ghāniṣyate kaṃsaḥ . kim gatena hataḥ kaṃsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_0: 97-101 kimarthaḥ kakāraḥ . kṅiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_1: . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_2: ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . kaṇḍvādīni hi prātipadikāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_3: . kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam . kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . avacane hi nityapratyayatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_4: . akriyamāṇe hi vāvacane nityaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_5: dhātuvidhitukpratiṣedhaḥ . tatra dhātuvidheḥ tukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_6: . kaṇḍvau kaṇḍvaḥ . aci śnudhātubhruvām yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iti uvaṅadeśaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_7: . iha ca kaṇḍvā kaṇḍve na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . tuk ca pratiṣedhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_8: . valguḥ mantuḥ iti . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk prāpnoti . hrasvayalopau ca vaktavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_9: . hrasvayalopau ca vaktavyau syātām . valguḥ mantuḥ iti . kimartham idam na hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_10: eva ayam . antaraṅgatvāt akṛdyakāre iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . yalopaḥ . yalopaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_11: vaktavyaḥ . kaṇḍūḥ valguḥ mantuḥ iti . kimartham idam na vali iti eva siddham . vali
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_12: iti ucyate . na ca atra valim paśyāmaḥ . nanu cal kvip valādiḥ . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_13: na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . kviblopaḥ kriyatām vali lopaḥ iti . kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_14: kartavyam . paratvāt kviblopaḥ . nityaḥ khalu api kviblopaḥ . kṛte api yalope prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_15: akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt paratvāt ca kvilope kṛte valādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_16: . evam tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_17: atha kriyamāṇe api vāvacane yadā yagantāt kvip tadā ete doṣāḥ kasmāt na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_18: . na etebhyaḥ tadā kvip drakṣyate . kim kāraṇam . anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_19: . na ca etebhyaḥ tadā kvip dṛśyate . yathā eva tarhi kriyamāṇe vāvacane anyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_20: api dṛśyate iti evam atra kvip na bhavati evam akriyamāṇe api na bhaviṣyati . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_21: etebhyaḥ tadā kvip eṣitavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . etāni rūpāṇi yathā syuḥ iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_22: tarhi vāvacanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ubhayam kaṇḍvādīni dhātavaḥ ca prātipadikāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3847_23: ca . ātaḥ ca ubhayam . kaṇḍūyati iti kriyām kurvāṇe prayujyate asti me kaṇḍūḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3848: dhātuprakaraṇāt dhātuḥ kasya āsañjanāt api . āha ca ayam imam dīrgham . manye dhātuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_0: 101-104 kimarthaḥ ayam ṇakāraḥ . vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_1: api vai ṇakāre vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhāt . ṇitkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_2: bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ṇiṅi ṇitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vṛddhipratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_3: . ṇiṅi ṇitkaraṇam sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ ṇakāraḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_4: arthaḥ . ṇeḥ aniṭi iti . ṇiṅi ṇitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_5: . ṅitkaraṇam api tarhi sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_6: . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . atra eva . śakyaḥ atra sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_7: anyaḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktum . tatra ṅakārānurodhāt vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . avaśayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_8: atra ātmanepadārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktavyaḥ ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_9: . evam ubhayoḥ sāvakaśayoḥ pratiṣedhabalīyastvāt pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_10: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na kameḥ vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam na kamyamicamām
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_11: iti mitsañjñāyā pratiṣedham śāsti . mitpratiṣedhasya ca arthavattvāt . mitpratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_12: ca arthavattvāt pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . arthavān mitpratiṣedhaḥ . kaḥ arthaḥ . ṇiṅantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_13: ṇici yā vṛddhiḥ tasyāḥ hrasvatvam mā bhūt iti . nanu etasyāḥ api kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_14: bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . uktam etat kṅiti pratiṣedhe tannimittagrahaṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_15: . evam tarhi na ṇiṅantasya ṇici yā vṛddhiḥ tasyāḥ hrasvatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_16: . ṇiṅā vyavahitatvāt . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_17: eva . ṇiṅi eva tarhi mā bhūt iti . ṇiṅi ca na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_18: antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . na eva vā punaḥ ṇiṅantasya ṇici vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_19: . ṇiṅā vyavahitatvāt . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_20: eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . yat tat ciṇṇamuloḥ dīrghaḥ anyatarasyām iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_21: tat kameḥ ṇiṅi mā bhūt iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tatra dīrghaḥ anyatarasyām iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_22: . na hrasvaḥ anyatarasyām iti eva ucyeta . yathāprāptam ca api kameḥ hrasvatvam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_23: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . hrasvagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3850_24: . kva prakṛtam . mitām hrasvaḥ iti . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_0: aśami aśāmi śamam śamam śāmam śāmam . vṛddhyā siddham . na sidhyati . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_1: . na udāttopadeśasya māntasya anācameḥ iti vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ciṇkṛtoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_2: saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ṇici . idam tarhi . ajani ajāni janam janam jānam jānam . janivadhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_3: ca iti vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . saḥ api ciṇkṛtoḥ eva . ṇijvyavahiteṣu tarhi yaṅlope
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_4: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam syāt . śamayantam prayojitavān aśami aśāmi śamam śamam
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_5: śāmam śāmam . śaṃśamayateḥ aśaṃsami aśaṃśāmi śaṃśamam śaṃśamam śaṃśāmam śaṃśāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_6: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ciṇṇamulpare ṇau mitām aṅgānām hrasvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_7: iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra ṇiḥ ciṇṇamulparaḥ na tasmin mit aṅgam yasmin ca mit aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_8: na asau ṇiḥ ṇamulparaḥ . ṇilope kṛte ciṇṇamulparaḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt na ciṇṇamulparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_9: . atha dīrghaḥ anyatarasyām iti ucyamāne yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ katham eva etat sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_10: . etat idānīm dīrghagrahaṇasya prayojanam . dīrghavidhim prati ajādeśaḥ na sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_11: iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadā khalu api āyādayaḥ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_12: vā bhavanti tadā ṇici ṇiṅ na bhavati . tadartham ca mitpratiṣedhaḥ syāt . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3851_13: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam . taddhitakāmyoḥ ikprakaraṇāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_0: 104-107 katham idam vijñāyate . āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_1: āyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhavati . āhosvit āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_2: vā āyādīnām utpattiḥ bhavati iti . kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇā āhosvit anyatarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_3: pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti āha . katham . yadā tāvat āyādibhyaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_4: ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti tadā aviśeṣeṇa sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_5: āyādiprakaraṇam anukramya āyādayaḥ ārdhadhātuke vā iti ucyate . yadā api āyādiprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_6: yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām utpattiḥ bhavati iti tadā ekam vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_7: tat ca idam ca . gupūdhūpavicchipaṇipanibhyaḥ āyaḥ ārdhadhātuke vā . ṛteḥ īyaṅ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_8: vā . kameḥ ṇiṅ ārdhadhātuke vā iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_9: āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam iti ca ubhayathā aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . āyādibhyaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_10: ārdhadhātukam āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam iti ca ubhayathā aniṣṭam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_11: yadi vijñāyate āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_12: bhavati iti guptiḥ jugopa iti ca iṣṭam na sidhyati idam ca aniṣṭam prāpnoti . gopām
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_13: cakāra gopā iti ca . idam tāvat iṣṭam siddham bhavati . gopāyām cakāra gopāya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_14: . atha vijñāyate āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_15: bhavati iti guptiḥ jugopa iti ca iṣṭam siddham bhavati . idam ca aniṣṭam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_16: . gopāyām cakāra gopāya iti . idam tu iṣṭam na sidhyati . gopayām cakāra gopāya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_17: . idam tāvat iṣṭam sidhyati . gopayām cakāra iti . katham . astu atra āyādiprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_18: yat ārdhadhātukam liṭ . tasmin avasthite vā āyādayaḥ . ām madhye patiṣyati yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_19: vikaraṇāḥ tadvat . idam tarhi iṣṭam na sidhyati gopāyā iti . siddham tu sārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_20: nityavacanāt anāśritya vāvidhānam . siddham etat . katham. aviśeṣeṇa āyādīnām vāvidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_21: uktvā sārvadhātuke nityam iti vakṣyāmi . syādibalīyastvam tu vipratiṣedhena tulyanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_22: . syādibhiḥ tu āyādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . tulyanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_23: . tulyam nimittam syādīnām āyādīnām ca . syādīnām avakāśaḥ kariṣyati hariṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_24: āyādīnām avakāśaḥ gopāyati dhūpāyati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . gopāyiṣyati dhūpāyiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_25: iti . paratvāt syādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . na vā āyādividhānasya anavakāśatvāt . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_26: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . āyādividhānasya anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśāḥ āyādayaḥ ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_27: ca . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . nanu ca idānīm eva avakāśaḥ prakḷptaḥ gopāyati dhūpāyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_28: iti . atra api śap syādiḥ bhavati . yadi api atra api bhavati na tu atra asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_29: sati vā śapi asati vā . anyat idānīm etat ucyate na asti viśeṣaḥ iti . yat tu tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_30: uktam āyādīnām syādibhiḥ avyāptaḥ avakāśaḥ it sa na asti avakāśaḥ . avaśyam khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:3853_31: api atra śap syādiḥ eṣitavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . gopāyantī dhūpāyantī iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3854_0: śapśyanoḥ nityam iti num yathā syāt iti . yadi tarhi anavakāśāḥ āyādayaḥ āyādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3854_1: syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . yathā punaḥ ayam sūtrebhedena parihāraḥ yadi punaḥ śapi
GS24pmbhasuu:3854_2: nityam iti ucyeta . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3854_3: ca uktam āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam iti ca ubhayathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3854_4: aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātuke iti na eṣā parasaptamī . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3854_5: . viṣayasaptamī . ārdhadhātukaviṣaye iti . tatra ārdhadhātukaviṣaye āyādiprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3854_6: āyādiṣu kṛteṣu yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3856_0: 107-109 antagrahaṇam kimartham na sanādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kena idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3856_1: tadantānām bhaviṣyati . tadantavidhinā . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . sanādiṣu antagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3856_2: uktam . kim uktam . padasañjñāyām antagrahaṇam anyatra sañjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3856_3: tadantavidhipratiṣedhārtham iti . idam ca api pratyayagrahaṇam . ayam ca api sañjñāvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3856_4: . kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate na bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3856_5: . pāṭhena dhātusañjñā kriyate na ca ime tatra paṭhyante . katham tarhi anyeṣām apaṭhyamānānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_0: asteḥ bhūḥ . bruvaḥ vaciḥ . cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ iti . yadi api ete tatra na paṭhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_1: prakṛtayaḥ tu eṣām tatra paṭhyante . tatra sthānivadbhāvāt siddham . ime api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_2: yadi api tatra na paṭhyante yeṣām tu arthāḥ ādiśyante te tatra paṭhyante . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_3: sthānivadbhāvāt siddham . na sidhyati . ādeśaḥ sthānivat bhavati iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_4: ca ime ādeśāḥ . ime api ādeśāḥ . katham . ādiśyate yaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ . ime ca api ādiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_5: . evam api ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ sthānivat bhavanti iti ucyate . na ce ime ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_6: ādeśāḥ . ṣaṣṭhīgrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate apavāde utsargakṛtam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_7: . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti ke api aṇkṛtam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_8: jñāpayati na apavāde utsargakṛtam bhavati iti yat ayam śyanādīn kān cit śitaḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3859: 109-111 ime vikaraṇāḥ paṭhyante . tatra na jñāyate kaḥ utsargaḥ kaḥ apavādaḥ iti . tatra vaktyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_0: ayam utsargaḥ ayam apavādaḥ iti . ime brūmaḥ . yak utsargaḥ . apavādaḥ śabdādiḥ syādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_1: ca . yadi evam apavādavipratiṣedhāt śabādibādhanam . apavādvipratiṣedhāt śabādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_2: syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . śabādīnām avakāśaḥ pacati yajati . syādīnām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_3: pakṣyate yakṣyate . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pakṣyati yakṣyati . paratvāt śabādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_4: prāpnuvanti . apavādaḥ nāma anekalakṣaṇaprasaṅgaḥ . apavādaḥ nāma bhavati yatra anekalakṣaṇaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_5: . tatra bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yak vidhīyate kartari śap . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_6: yakam kartari śabādayaḥ bādheran . evam tarhi yakśapau utsargau . apavādāḥ śyanādaya
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_7: syādayaḥ ca . apavādavipratiṣedhāt śyanādibādhanam . apavādvipratiṣedhāt śyanādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_8: syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . śyanādīnām avakāśaḥ dīvyati sīvyati . syādīnām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_9: pakṣyati yakṣyati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . deviṣyati seviṣyati . paratvāt śyanādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_10: prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . śap ca syādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_11: bādhyate . tatra divādibhyaḥ syādiviṣaye śap eva na asti kutaḥ śyanādayaḥ . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_12: śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_13: śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . divādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_14: iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_15: iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_16: na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ . prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . atha vā anuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_17: kariṣyate . sārvadhātuke yak syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_18: śap syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . divādibhyaḥ śyan syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860_19: cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . atha vā antaraṅgāḥ syādayaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . lāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_0: 111-112 siP utsargaḥ chandasi . sip utsargaḥ chandasi kartavyaḥ . sanādyante neṣatvādyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_1: . sanādyante ca kartavyaḥ . kim prajojanam . neṣatvādyarthaḥ . indraḥ naḥ tena neṣatu
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_2: . gā vaḥ neṣṭāt . prakṛtyantaratvāt siddham . prakṛtyantaratvāt siddham etat . prkṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_3: neṣatiḥ . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti darśanāt . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_0: 112-114 atha kimarthaḥ pakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . anudāttau suppitau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_1: yathā syāt . pitkaraṇānarthakyam ca anackatvāt . pitkaraṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_2: . anackatvāt . anackaḥ ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena pakāreṇa anubandhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_3: iṭi kṛte sāckaḥ bhaviṣyati . iṭaḥ anudāttārtham iti cet āgamānudāttatvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_4: . āgamānudāttatvena iṭaḥ anudāttatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi sap ayam kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_5: . kim prayojanam . yat eva yāsiṣīṣṭhāḥ . ekājlakṣaṇaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_6: kva ayam akāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate . lopaḥ asya bhaviṣyati ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_7: iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate na arthaḥ svarārthena pakāreṇa anubandhena . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_8: kartavyaḥ eva . kim prayojanam . anudāttasya lopaḥ yathā syāt . udāttasya mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_9: iti . kim ca syāt . udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . siP bahulam chandasi ṇit . sip
GS24pmbhasuu:3864_10: bahulam chandasi ṇit vaktavyaḥ . savitā dharmam dāviṣat . pra ṇaḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat .
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_0: 114-115 kāsgrahaṇe cakāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kāsgrahaṇe cakāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_1: . cakāsām cakāra . na kartavyam . cakāspratayayāt iti vakṣyāmi . cakāsgrahaṇe kāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_2: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kāsām cakre . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_3: . nanu ca uktam kāsgrahaṇe cakāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . cakāsśabde
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_4: kāsśabdaḥ asti . tatra kāspratyayāt iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_5: arthavataḥ kāsśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca cakāsśabde kāsśabdaḥ arthavān . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3866_6: kāsi anekācaḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . culumpādyartham . culumpām cakāra daridrām cakāra .
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_0: 115-119 gurumataḥ āmvidhāne liṇnimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ . gurumataḥ āmvidhāne liṇnimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_1: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iyeṣa uvoṣa . guṇe kṛte ijādeḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_2: ām prāpnoti . gurumadvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . gurumadvacanam kimartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_3: cet ṇali uttame yajādipratiṣedhāṛtham . gurumadvacanam kimartham iti cet ṇali uttame
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_4: yajādīnām mā bhūt iti . iyaja aham uvapa aham . upadeśavacanāt siddham . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_5: gurumataḥ iti vaktavyam . yadi upadeśagrahaṇam kriyate uccheḥ ām vaktavyaḥ . vyucchām
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_6: cakāra iti . ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ uccheḥ āmbhāvasya . yat ayam anṛcchaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_7: pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tugnimittā yasya gurumattā bhavati tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_8: ām iti . sa tarhi jñāpakārthaḥ ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca avaśyam prāptyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_9: api vaktavyaḥ . na arthaḥ prāptyarthena . ṛcchatyṝtām iti ṛccheḥ liṭi guṇavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_10: jñāpakam na ṛccheḥ liṭi ām bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . artyartham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_11: syāt . katham punaḥ ṛccheḥ liṭi guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ artyarthaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_12: . ṛcchiḥ liṭi na asti iti kṛtvā prakṛtyartham vijñāyate . tat yathā . tiṣṭhateḥ it
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_13: jighrateḥ vā iti caṅi tiṣṭhatijighratī na staḥ iti kṛtvā prakṛtyartham vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_14: . kim punaḥ arteḥ guṇavacane prayojanam . āratuḥ āruḥ etat rūpam yathā syāt . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_15: punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . dvirvacane kṛte savarṇadīrghatve ca yadi tāvat dhātugrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_16: grahaṇam ṝkārāntānām liṭi guṇaḥ bhavati iti guṇe kṛte raparate aratuḥ aruḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_17: rūpam prasajyeta . atha abhyāsagrahaṇena grahaṇam uḥ attvam raparatvam halādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_18: ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ atuḥ uḥ iti vacanam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_19: śrūyeta . guṇa punaḥ sati guṇe kṛte raparatve ca dvirvacanam ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_20: . tataḥ siddham bhavati yathā āṭatuḥ āṭuḥ iti . kim punaḥ savarṇadīrghatvam tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_21: bhavati na punaḥ uḥ attvam . paratvāt uḥ attvena bhavitavyam . antaraṅgatvāt . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_22: savarṇadīrghatvam . bahiraṅgam uḥ attvam . kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_23: . aṅgasya uḥ attvam . uḥ attvam api antaraṅgam . katham . vakṣyati etat . prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_24: aṅgādhikāraḥ iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt uḥ attvam . uḥ attve kṛte raparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_25: halādiśeṣaḥ ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam parasya rūpasya yaṇādeśaḥ . siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_26: āratuḥ āruḥ iti . atha api katham cit arteḥ liṭi guṇena arthaḥ syāt . evam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_27: doṣaḥ . ṛcchatyṝtām iti ṛkāraḥ api nirdiśyate . katham . ayam . ṛcchati ṛ ṛtām ṛcchatyṝtām
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_28: iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . cakratuḥ cakruḥ iti . saṃyogādigrahaṇam niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_29: bhaviṣyati . saṃyogādeḥ eva akevalasya na anyasya akevalasya iti . tat etat antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_30: arteḥ liṭi guṇavacanam rūpam siddham antareṇa ca ṛcchigrahaṇam arteḥ liṭi guṇaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_31: . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ uccheḥ vā ām vaktavyaḥ . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_32: na vaktavyam . upadeśagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati iyeṣa uvoṣa . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3868_33: vā .kim uktam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3870_0: 119-120 ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prorṇunāva
GS24pmbhasuu:3870_1: . na vaktavyam . vācyaḥ ūrṇoḥ ṇuvadbhāvaḥ . yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam . āmaḥ ca pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3870_2: . ekācaḥ ca iḍupagrahāt . atha vā ukāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . katham . avibhaktikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3870_3: nirdeśaḥ . anṛccha u anṛccho dayāyāsaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_0: 120 videḥ ām kit . videḥ ām kit vaktavyaḥ . vidām cakāra . na vaktavyaḥ . vidiḥ akārāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_1: . yadi akārāntaḥ vetti iti guṇaḥ na sidhyati . liṭsanniyogena . evam api viveda iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_2: na sidhyati . evam tarhi āmsanniyogena . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti . videḥ ām kit nipātanāt vā aguṇatvam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3874: 120-121 śluvadatideśe kim prayojanam . śluvadatideśe prayojanam dvitvettve . bibharām cakāra .
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_0: 121-124 kimartham idam ucyate . anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_1: . āmantam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_2: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam astibhūpratiṣedhārtham . kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_3: kriyate astibhūpratiṣedhārtham . astibhuvoḥ anuprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti . ātmanepadavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_4: ca . ātmanepadavidhyartham ca kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . ātmanepadam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_5: syāt . ucyamāne api etasmin avaśyam ātmanepadārthaḥ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . astibhūpratiṣedhārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_6: ca api na arthaḥ . iṣṭaḥ sarvānuprayogaḥ . sarveṣām eva kṛbhvastīnām anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_7: iṣyate . kim iṣyate eva āhosvit prāpnoti api . iṣyate ca prāpnoti ca . katham . kṛñ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_8: iti na etat dhātugrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_9: . kṛbhvastiyoge iti ataḥ prabhṛti ā kṛñaḥ ñakārāt . sarvānuprayogaḥ iti cet aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_10: arthābhāvāt . sarvānuprayogaḥ iti cet aśiṣyam kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_11: . arthābhāvāt . āmantam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_12: anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . kṛbhvastīnām eva anuprayogaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_13: syāt pacādīnām mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . arthābhāvāt ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_14: . arthābhāvāt ca anyasya siddham . kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavācinaḥ . kriyāviśeṣavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_15: pacādayaḥ . na ca sāmānyavācinoḥ eva viśeṣavācinoḥ eva va prayogaḥ bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_16: viśeṣavācinaḥ utpattiḥ . sāmānyavācinaḥ anuprayokṣyante . liṭparārtham vā . liṭparārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_17: tarhi kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . liṭparasya eva anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . anyaparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_18: mā bhūt iti . kimparasya punaḥ prāpnoti . laṭparasya . na laṭparasya anuprayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_19: bhūtakālaḥ viśeṣitaḥ syāt . niṣṭhāparasya tarhi . naniṣṭhāparasya anuprayogeṇa puruṣopagrahau
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_20: viśeiṣitau syātām . luṅparasya tarhi . na luṅparasya anuprayogeṇa anadyatanaḥ bhūtakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_21: viśeṣitaḥ syāt . laṅparasya tarhi . na laṅparasya anuprayogeṇa anadyatanaḥ parokṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_22: kālaḥ viśeṣitaḥ syāt . ayam tarhi bhūte parokṣe anadyatane laṅ vidhīyate . haśaśvatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_23: laṅ ca iti . tatparasya mā bhūt iti . atat api na asti prayojanam . ekasyāḥ ākṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_24: caritaḥ prayogaḥ dvitīyasyāḥ tṛtīyasyāḥ ca na bhavati . tat yathā goṣu svāmi aśveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_25: ca iti . na ca bhavati goṣu ca aśvānām ca svāmī iti . arthasamāpteḥ vā anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_26: na syāt . arthasamāpteḥ tarhi anuprayogaḥ na syāt . āmantena parisamāptaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_27: iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . idānīm eva uktam āmantam
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_28: avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_29: . viparyāsanivṛttyartham vā . viparyāsanivṛttyartham tarhi kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_30: kriyate . īhām cakre . cakre īhām iti mā bhūt . vyavahitnivṛttyartham ca . vyavahitnivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_31: ca kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . anv eva ca anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . īhām cakre
GS24pmbhasuu:3876_32: . vyavahitasya mā bhūt . īhām devadattaḥ cakre iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_0: 125-130 kva ayam cliḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate . sijādayaḥ ādeśāḥ ucyante . yad
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_1: na kva cit śrūyate kimarthaḥ tarhi cluḥ utsargaḥ kriyate . na sic utsargaḥ eva kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_2: . tasya ksādayaḥ apavādāḥ bhaviṣyanti . ata uttaram paṭhati . clyutsargaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_3: . cliḥ utsargaḥ kriyate sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena arthaḥ . mantra
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_4: ghasahvaraṇaśavṛdahādvṛckṛgamijanibhyaḥ leḥ iti . tatra avarataḥ trayāṇām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_5: kartavyam syāt . caṅaṅoḥ sicaḥ ca . ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane clisampratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_6: . ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane clisampratyayārthaḥ cliḥ utsargaḥ kriyate . cleḥ aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_7: ksaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . ghasḷbhāve ca . ghasḷbhāve ca clav eva kṛte lṛditaḥ iti aṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_8: siddhaḥ bhavati . atha citkaraṇam kimartham . cleḥ citkaraṇam viśeṣaṇāṛtham . cleḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_9: citkaraṇam kriyate viśeṣaṇārtham . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . cleḥ sic iti . leḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_10: sic iti ucyamāne liṅliṭoḥ api prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . luṅi iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_11: . na ca luṅi liṅliṭau bhavataḥ . atha iditkaraṇam kimartham . iditkaraṇam sāmānyagrahaṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_12: . iditkaraṇam kriyate ca sāmānyagrahaṇārtham . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_13: mantre ghasahvaraṇaśavṛdahādvṛckṛgamijanibhyaḥ leḥ iti āmaḥ iti ca . ikāre ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_14: sāmānyagrahaṇārthe kriyamāṇe avaśyam sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_15: . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ cakāreṇa . atra eva . yat tāvat ucyate clyutsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_16: sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ iti . kriyamāṇe api vai clyutsarge tāni eva trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_17: . clu luṅi cleḥ sic leḥ iti . yat etat leḥ iti tat parārtham bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_18: . yat etat gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ sicaḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti atra sicaḥ grahaṇam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_19: leḥ iti vakṣyāmi . yadi leḥ iti ucyate dheṭaḥ cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti . adadhat adhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_20: adhāsīt . adadhāt iti api prāpnoti . na caṅaḥ luki dvirvacanena bhavitavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_21: kāraṇam . caṅi iti ucyate . na ca atra caṅam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_22: tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . bahuvacane tarhi cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_23: adadhan adhuḥ adhāsiṣuḥ . adhān iti api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ātaḥ iti jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_24: bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . sijgrahaṇam tatra anuvartate . sijgrahaṇam nivartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3878_25: . yadi nivartate abhūvan iti pratyayalakṣaṇena jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi luk

GS24pmbhasuu:3907_2: tatra yuktam bahuvacanam ekaśeṣaḥ ca . tiṅabhihite ca api tadā bhāve asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_0: āsiṣyate . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya tiṅabhihitasya ca . kṛdabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_1: bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati . kim idam dravyavat iti . dravyam kriyayā samavāyam gacchati
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_2: . kam samavāyam . dravyam kriyābhinirvṛttau sādhanatvam upaiti . tadvat ca asya bhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_3: kṛdabhihitasya bhavati . pākaḥ vartate iti . kriyāvat na bhavati . kim idam kriyāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_4: iti . kriyā kriyayā samavāyam na gacchati . pacati paṭhati iti . tadvac ca asya kṛtabhihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_5: na bhavati . pākaḥ vartate iti . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya tiṅabhihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_6: ca . tiṅabhihitena bhāvena kālapuruṣopagrahāḥ abhivyajyante . kṛdabhihitena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_7: na vyajyante . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya tiṅabhihitasya ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_8: tiṅabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ kartrā samprayujyate. kṛdabhihitaḥ punaḥ na samprayujyate . yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3908_9: kim cit sāmānyam kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ yuktam yat ayam api viśeṣaḥ syāt liṅgakṛtaḥ saṅkhyākṛtaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_0: 146-149 idam vicāryate . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ vā syuḥ vikaraṇārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_1: vā iti . katham ca sārvadhātukārthaḥ syuḥ katham vā vikaraṇārthāḥ . bhāvakarmavācini
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_2: sārvadhātuke yak bhavati kartṛvācini śarvadhātuke śap bhavati iti sārvadhātukārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_3: . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yag bhavati sārvadhātuke kartari śap bhavati sārvadhātuke iti vikaraṇārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_4: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ cet ekadvibahuṣu niyamānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_5: atadarthatvāt . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ cet ekadvibahuṣu niyamasya anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_6: . kim kāraṇam . atadarthatvāt . na hi tadānīm ekatvādayaḥ eva vibhaktyarthāḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_7: tarhi bhāvakarmakartāraḥ api . santu tarhi vikaraṇārthāḥ . vikaraṇārthāḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_8: kṛtā abhihite vikaraṇābhāvaḥ . vikaraṇārthāḥ iti cet kṛtā abhihite vikaraṇaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_9: . dhārayaḥ pārayaḥ iti . kim ucyate kṛtā abhihite . na lena api abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_10: . aśakyam lena abhidhānam āśrayitum . pakṣāntaram idam āsthitam bhāvakarmakartāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_11: sārvadhātukārthāḥ vā syuḥ vikaraṇārthāḥ vā iti . yadi ca lena api abhidhānam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_12: na idam pakṣāntaram syāt . katham aśakyam yadā bhavān eva āha laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_13: ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . evam vakṣyāmi . laḥ karmaṇaḥ bhāvāt ca akarmakebhyaḥ . yasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_14: tarhi le vikaraṇāḥ na śrūyante kaḥ tatra bhāvakarmakartṝn abhidhāsyati . kva ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_15: śrūyante . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ ca . atra api ukte kartṛtve luk bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_16: . yasmin tarhi le vikaraṇāḥ na eva utpadyante kaḥ tatra bhāvakarmakartṝn abhidhāsyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_17: . kva ca na eva utpadyante . liṅliṭoḥ . tasmāt na etat śakyam vaktum . na lena abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_18: bhavati iti . bhavati cet abhihite vikaraṇābhāvaḥ eva . evam tarhi idam syāt . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_19: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ laḥ tadā kartari vikaraṇāḥ . yadā kartari laḥ tadā bhāvakarmaṇoḥ vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3910_20: . idam asya yadi eva svābhāvikam atha api vācanikam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3911_0: prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārtham saha brūtaḥ iti . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat ekasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3911_1: prakṛteḥ dvayoḥ nānārthayoḥ yugapat anusahāyībhāvaḥ syāt . evam ca kṛtvā ekapakṣībhūtam idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:3912_0: sārvadhātukārthāḥ eva iti . nanu ca uktam bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3912_1: ekadvibahuṣu niyamānupapattiḥ atadarthatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . supām karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3912_2: api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ karmādayaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3912_3: . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3912_4: vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3912_5: eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam naikasmin na bahuṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:3912_6: bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na dvayoḥ na ekasmin iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_0: 149-153 bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yagvidhāne karmakartari upasaṅkhyānam . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yagvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_1: karmakartari upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pacyate svayam eva . paṭhyate svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_2: kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . vipratiṣedhāt hi śapaḥ balīyastvam . vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_3: hi śapaḥ balīyastvam prāpnoti . śapaḥ avakāśaḥ . pacati paṭhati . yakaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_4: . pacyate odanaḥ devadattena . paṭhyate vidyā devadattena . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_5: . pacyate svayam eva . paṭhyate svayam eva . paratvāt śap prāpnoti . yogavibhāgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_6: siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ciṇ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . sārvadhātuke yak bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_7: . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca yak bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . yathā eva tarhi karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_8: kartari yak bhavati evam bhāve kartari prāpnoti . eti jīvantam ānandaḥ . na asya
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_9: kim cit rujati rogaḥ iti . dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ciṇ bhāve . tataḥ karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_10: . karmaṇi ca ciṇ bhavati . tataḥ sārvadhātuke yak bhavati bhāve ca karmaṇi ca . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_11: kartari . kartari ca yak bhavati . karmaṇi iti anuvartate . bhāve iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_12: tataḥ śap . śap ca bhavati . kartari iti eva . karmaṇi iti api nivṛttam . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_13: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vipratiṣedhāt hi śyanaḥ balīyastvam prāpnoti . śyanaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_14: . dīvyati sīvyati . yakaḥ avakāśaḥ . pacyate odanaḥ devadattena . paṭhyate vidyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_15: devadattena . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dīvyate svayam eva . sīvyate svayam eva . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_16: śyan prāpnoti . nanu ca etat api yogavibhāgāt eva siddham . na sidhyati . anantarā
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_17: yā praptiḥ sā yogavibhāgena śakyā bādhitum . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_18: pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . parā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā . tayā prāpnoti . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_19: parām prāptim bādheta . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum . evam tarhi śabādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_20: śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . śap ca syādibhiḥ bādhyate . tatra divādibhyaḥ yagviṣaye śap
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_21: eva na asti kutaḥ śyanādayaḥ . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_22: . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_23: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . divādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_24: ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_25: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ . prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_26: ca anuvartate . atha vā bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti anuvṛttyā eva siddhe sati anivṛttiḥ yakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_27: bhāvāya .iha sārvadhātuke yak iti antareṇa bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti anuvṛttim siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_28: saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti anuvartayati tasya etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_29: . karmakartari api yathā syāt . kartari iti ca yogavibhāgaḥ śyanaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhāvacanāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_30: . kartari iti yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ śyanaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedham mā vocam iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_31: vā karmavadbhāvavacanasāmarthyāt yak bhaviṣyati . asti anyat karmavadbhāvavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_32: prayojanam . kim . ātmanepadam yathā syāt . vacanāt ātmanepadam bhaviṣyati . ciṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_33: tarhi yathā syāt . ciṇ api vacanāt bhaviṣyati . ciṇvadbhāvaḥ tarhi yathā syāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_34: ekam prayojanam yogārambham prayojayati . tatra karmavadbhāvavacanasāmarthyāt yak
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_35: bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati karmakartari yak iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3914_36: na duhasnnunamām yakciṇau iti yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3916_0: 153 anupasargāt iti kimartham . āyasyati prayasyati . anupasargāt iti śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:3916_1: . katham āyasyati prayasyati . saṃyasaḥ ca iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . sampūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_0: 153-154 kimarthaḥ śakāraḥ . sārvadhātukāṛthaḥ . śit sārvadhātukam iti sārvadhātukasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_1: . sārvadhātukam apit iti ṅittvam . ṅiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . bhinatti
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_2: chinatti iti . na etat asti prayojanam . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_3: ucyate yasmāt ca pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgasañjñam bhavati . yasmāt ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_4: pratyayavidhiḥ na tat pratyaye parataḥ . yat ca pratyaye parataḥ na tasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_5: . idam tarhi prayojanam . ārdhadhātukasañjñā mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . valādilakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_6: iṭ prasajyeta . etat api na asti prayojanam . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya aṅgasya iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_7: ucyate . yasmāt ca pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgasañjñam bhavati . yasmāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_8: atra pratyayavidhiḥ na tat pratyaye parataḥ . yat ca pratyaye parataḥ na tasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_9: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . śnami śitkaraṇam pvādihrasvārtham . śnami śitkaraṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_10: pvādīnām śiti hrasvatvam yathā syāt . pṛṇasi mṛṇasi iti . na vā dhātvanyatvāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_11: vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . dhātvanyatvāt . dhātvantaram pṛṇimṛṇī . yatra bhūmyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_12: vṛṇase . na eṣaḥ śnam . śnaḥ etat hrasvatvam . yadi śnaḥ hrasvatvam svaraḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_13: . vṛṇase . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_14: . tasmāt śnam eṣaḥ . yadi śnam snasoḥ allopaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . upadhāyāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_15: vartate . anupadhātvāt na bhaviṣyati . na saḥ śakhyaḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vijñātum . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_16: hi doṣaḥ syāt . aṅktaḥ añjanti . tasmāt śnaḥ eva hrasvatvam . svaraḥ katham . bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_17: pit sārvadhātukam chandasi . sārvadhātukasya bhalulam chandasi pittvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_18: . pitaḥ ca apittvam dṛśyate apitaḥ ca pittvam . pitaḥ tāvat apittvam . mātaram pramiṇīmi
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_19: janitrīm . apitaḥ pittvam . śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ . tat tarhi hrasvatvam vaktavyam . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_20: chandasi hrasvatvam vaktavyam upagāyantu mām patnayaḥ garbhiṇayaḥ yuvatayaḥ iti evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_21: . viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . śnāt nalopaḥ iti . nāt nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_22: iti ucyamāne yajñānām yatnānām iti atra api prasajyeta . dīrghatve kṛte na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_23: . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām nalopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_24: paratvāt na lopaḥ syāt . tasmāt śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api śakāre iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3918_25: kasmāt na bhavati . viśnānām praśnānām iti . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_0: 155-156 atha kimartham karoteḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate na tanādibhyaḥ iti eva ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_1: . anyāni tanotyādikāryāṇi mā bhūvan iti . kāni . anunāsikalopādīni . daivaraktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_2: kiṃsukāḥ . anunāsikābhāvāt eva anunāsikalopaḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi tanādikāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_3: mā bhūt tanādibhyaḥ tathāsoḥ iti . nanu ca bhavati eva atra hrasvāt aṅgāt iti . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_4: eva yathā syāt . anena mā bhūt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ tena vā sati anena vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_5: tena sati sijlopasya asiddhatvāt ciṇvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . anena punaḥ sati
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_6: ciṇvadbhāvaḥ na syāt . anena api sati ciṇvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . vibhāṣā luk
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_7: . yadā na luk tadā tena lopaḥ . tatra sijlopasya asiddhatvāt ciṇvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_8: bhavati . tanāditvāt kṛñaḥ siddham sijlope ca na duṣyati . ciṇvadbhāve atra doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_0: 156-157 kva ayam akāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate . lopaḥ asya bhavati ataḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_1: ārdhadhātuke iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate kimartham atvam ucyate na lopaḥ eva ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_2: . na evam śakyam . lope hi sati guṇaḥ prasajyeta . nanu ca lope api sati na dhātulope
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_3: ārdhadhātuke iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . ārdhadhātukanimitte lope saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_4: . na ca eṣaḥ ārdhadhātukanimittaḥ lopaḥ . api ca pratyākhyāyate saḥ yogaḥ . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_5: pratyākhyāte guṇaḥ syāt eva . tasmāt atvam vaktavyam . atha kimartham numanuṣaktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_6: grahaṇam kriyate na dhivikṛvyoḥ iti eva ucyate . dhivikṛvyoḥ iti ucyamāne atve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_7: aniṣṭe deśe num prasajyeta . idam iha sampradhāryam . atvam kriyatām num iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_8: atra kartavyam . paratvāt numāgamaḥ . antaraṅgam atvam . kā antaraṅgatā . pratyayotpattisanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_9: atvam ucyate . utpannepratyaye prakṛtipratyayau āśritya aṅgasya numāgamaḥ . num api
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_10: antaraṅgaḥ . katham . vakṣyati etat numvidhau upadeśivadvacanam pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3922_11: iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt numāgamaḥ . tasmāt dhivikṛvyoḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_0: 157-160 kimarthaḥ śakāraḥ . śit sārvadhātukam iti sārvadhātukasañjñā sārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_1: apit iti ṅittvam ṅiti iti pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . kuṣāṇa puṣāṇa iti . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_2: paṭhati . śnāvikārasya śitkaraṇānarthakyam sthānivatvāt . śnāvikārasya śitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_3: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . sthānivatvāt . śitaḥ ayam ādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt śit bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_4: . arthavat tu jñāpakam sārvadhātukādeśe anubandhāsthānivattvasya . arthavat tu śnāvikārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_5: śitkaraṇam . kaḥ arthaḥ . jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ sārvadhātukādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_6: anubandhāḥ na sthānivat bhavanti iti . kim etasya jñapane prayojanam . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_7: hitātaṅoḥ apittvam . heḥ pittvam na pratiṣedhyam . pitaḥ ayam ādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_8: pit syāt . sārvadhātukādeśe anubandhāḥ na sthānivat bhavanti iti na ayam pit bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_9: . tātaṅi ca ṅakāraḥ na uccāryaḥ bhavati . pitaḥ ayam ādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt pit syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3924_10: . sārvadhātukādeśe anubandhāḥ na sthānivat bhavanti iti na ayam pit bhaviṣyati .
