GS24pmbhasuu:3944_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . cukuṣe pādaḥ svayam eva . rarañje vastram svayam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_3: . koṣiṣīṣṭa pādaḥ svayam eva . raṅkṣīṣṭa vastram svayam eva . kriyamāṇe api sārvadhātukagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_4: iha prāpnoti . kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ pādāḥ . śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . koṣiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_5: pādaḥ svayam eva . raṅkṣyate vastram svayam eva . akoṣi pādaḥ svayam eva . arañji
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_6: vastram svayam eva . yat tāvat ucyate sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_7: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . sārvadhātuke yak iti . yadi tat anuvartate pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_8: yoge kim samuccayaḥ . le ca sārvadhātuke ca iti . āhosvit lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_9: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ kati iha bhindānāḥ kuśūlāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_10: . atha lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam liṅliṭoḥ na sidhyati . bibhide kuśūlaḥ svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_11: eva . bhitsīṣṭa kuśūlaḥ svayam eva iti . astu lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_12: nanu ca uktam liṅliṭoḥ na sidhyati iti . liṅliḍgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_13: kva prakṛtam . kās pratyayāt ām amantre liṭi liṅi āśiṣi āṅ iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_14: api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ pādāḥ iti prāpnoti . atra api laviśiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_15: sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartate . yat api ucyate śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_16: . yakpratiṣedhasambandhena śyanaṃ vakṣyāmi . na duhasnunamām yakciṇau . tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_17: prācām yakciṇau na bhavataḥ . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca iti . yathā eva tarhi yakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_18: viṣaye śyan bhavati evam ciṇaḥ api viṣaye prāpnoti . akoṣi pādaḥ svayam eva . arañji
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_19: vastram svayam eva iti . evam tarhi dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . na duhasnunamām
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_20: ciṇ bhavati . tataḥ yak . yak ca na bhavati duhasnunamām . tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ prācām
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_21: yak na bhavati . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca . atha vā anuvṛttiḥ kariṣyate . syatāsī
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_22: lṛluṭoḥ . cli luṅi . cleḥ sic bhavati . kartari śap syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_23: sic bhavati . kuṣirajoḥ prācām śyan parasmaipadam ca syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3944_24: sic bhavati iti . atha vā antaraṅgāḥ syādayaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . lakārāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_0: 179-183 ā kutaḥ ayam dhātvadhikāraḥ . kim prāk lādeśāt āhosvit ā tṛtīyādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_1: . dhātuvadhikāraḥ prāk lādeśāt . prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . lādeśe hi vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_2: aprasiddhiḥ . anuvartamāne hi lādeśe dhātvadhikāre vyavahitavtā aprasiddhiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_3: . kim ca syāt . ādye yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ . ādye yoge vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_4: tiṅaḥ na syuḥ . pacati paṭhati . idam iha sampradhāryam . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām āḍeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_5: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ādeśāḥ . nityāḥ vikaraṇāḥ . kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_6: akṛteṣu api prāpnuvanti . nityatvāt vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_7: na prāpnuvanti . anavakāśaḥ tarhi ādeśāḥ . sāvakāśāḥ ādeśāḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ye ete
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_8: lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ ca liṅliṭau ca . na syāt etvam ṭeḥ ṭitām yat vidhatte .
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_9: yat ca ṭitsañjñānām etvam vidhatte tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt na syāt . eśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_10: śittvam . ekāraḥ ca śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_11: yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ iti takārasya etve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_12: dvayoḥ ekārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . nivṛtte punaḥ lādeśe dhātvadhikāre alaḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_13: vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti ekārasya ekārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_14: api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat ca loṭaḥ vidhatte . tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_15: na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . loṭaḥ laṅvat eḥ uḥ seḥ hi apit ca vā chandasi iti . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_16: ca api uktam laṅliṅoḥ tat ca na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . nityam ṅitaḥ itaḥ ca tasthasthamipām
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_17: tāmtamtāmaḥ liṅaḥ sīyuṭ yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti . tasmāt prāk lādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_18: dhātvadhikāraḥ . yadi prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ akāraḥ śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_19: . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . anuvartamāne punaḥ lādeśe dhātvadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_20: tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ iti thakārasya atve kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_21: rūpam syāt . peca yūyam . cakra yūyam iti . nanu ca nivṛtte api lādeśe dhātvadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_22: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti akārasya akārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_23: kṛtvā antareṇa api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat akārasya akāravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_24: prayojanam . kim . vakṣyati etat tat akārasya akāravacanam samasaṅkhyārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_25: ārdhadhātukasañjñāyām dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam dhātoḥ parasya ārdhadhātukasañjñā yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_0: vṛkṣtvam vṛkṣatā iti . tasmāt lādeśe dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartyaḥ . nanu ca uktam ādye
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_1: yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ānupūrvyāt siddham etat . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_2: akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu vikaraṇāḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātuke vikaraṇāḥ ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_3: . na ca akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu sārvadhātukatvam bhavati . ye tarhi na etasmin viśeṣe vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_4: . ke punaḥ te . syādayaḥ . tatra api vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ vihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_5: lasya iti . yadi evam vindati iti ṇalādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . dhātunā atra vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_6: vidinā ca ānataryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya lasya videḥ anantarasya iti . iha tarhi ajakṣiṣyan
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_7: ajāgairṣyan iti abhyastāt jheḥ jus bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . atra api dhātunā
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_8: vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ abhyastena ānantaryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya abhastāt anantarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_9: iti . ātaḥ iti atra katham viśeṣayiṣyasi . yadi tāvat dhātugrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_10: ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam alunan iti atra api prāpnoti . atha ākāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_11: vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam apiban iti atra api prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_12: tarhi dhātugrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3947_13: alunan iti atra api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3948_0: kāraṇam . ītvena bādhyate . na atra ītvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antibhāvena bādhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3948_1: . na atra antibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . jusbhāvena bādhyate . na atra jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3948_2: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . lopena bādhyate . lopaḥ ītvena ītvam antibhāvena antibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3948_3: jusbhāvena jusbhāvaḥ lopena iti cakrakam avyavasthā prasajyeta . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3948_4: . na hi avyavasthākāriṇā śāstreṇa bhavitavyam . śāstreṇa nāma vyavasthākāriṇā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3948_5: . na ca atra halādinā muhūrtam api śakyam avasthātum . tāvati eva antibhāvena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3948_6: . antibhāve kṛte lopaḥ . lopena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate eśaḥ śittvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_0: 183-185 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_1: prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . dhātoḥ tavyādayaḥ yathā syuḥ . prātipadikāt mā
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_2: bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . sādhane tāvyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_3: kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvaḥ . sādhanābhāvāt asati api dhātvadhikāre prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_4: tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti . svapādiṣu . svapādiṣu tarhi prayojanam . svapiti . supati
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_5: iti mā bhūt . aṅgasañjñā ca . aṅgasañjñā ca prayojanam . yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_6: pratyaye aṅgam iti dhātoḥ aṅgasañjñā siddhā bhavati . kṛtsañjñā ca . kṛtsañjñā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_7: prayojanam . dhātuvihitasya pratyayasya kṛtsañjñā siddhā bhavati . upapadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_8: ca. upapadasañjñā ca prayojanam . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre saptamīnirdiṣṭam upapadasñjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_9: bhavati iti upapadasañjñā siddhā bhavati . kṛdupapadasañjñe tāvan na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_10: adhikārāt api ete siddhe . svapādiṣu tarhi aṅgasañjñā ca prayojanam . dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_11: anarthakam yaṅvidhau dhātvadhikārāt . dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . yaṅvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_12: dhātvadhikārāt . yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇam prakṛtam anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam anuvartyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_13: . anadhikāre hi aṅgasañjñābhāvaḥ . anadhikāre hi sati aṅgasañjñāyāḥ abhāvaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_14: . kariṣyati hariṣyati iti . yad tat anuvartate cūrṇacurādibhyaḥ ṇic bhavati dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_15: ca iti dhātumātrāt ṇic prāpnoti . hetumadvacanam tu jñāpakam anyatrābhāvasya . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_16: ayam hetumati ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt ṇic bhavati iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_17: tarhi kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati dhātoḥ ca iti dhātumātrāt yak prāpnoti . kaṇḍvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_18: ca vyapadeśivadvacanāt . yat ayam kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati iti āha tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3950_19: ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt yak bhavati iti . atha vā kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ dhātugrahaṇena abhisambhantsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3952: 185-186 sthagrahaṇam kimartham . tatra upapadam saptamī iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva saptamī śrūyate tatra eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3953_0: stamberamaḥ karṇejapaḥ . yatra vā etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . saptamyām janeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3953_1: ḍaḥ iti . iha na syāt . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ . sthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3953_2: ca saptamī śrūyate ya ca na śrūyate yatra ca etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3953_3: ca anyena saptamīsthamātre siddham bhavati . atha tatragrahaṇam kimartham . tatragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3953_4: viṣayārtham . viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre yat saptamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3953_5: tat upapadasañjñam bhavati iti upapadasañjñā siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_1: . samartham upapadam pratyayasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . āhara kumbham . karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_2: kaṭam iti . kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe mahāntam kumbham karoti iti atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_3: prāpnoti . na vā bhavitavyam mahākumbhakāraḥ iti . bhavaitavyam yadā etat vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_4: bhavati . mahān kumbhaḥ mahākumbhaḥ mahākumbham karoti iti mahākumbhakāraḥ . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_5: tu etat vākyam bhavati mahāntam kumbham karoti iti tadā na bhavitavyam . tadā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_6: prāpnoti . tadā mā bhūt iti . yat tāvat ucyate samarthagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_7: kartavyam . dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātoḥ karmaṇi aṇ bhavati . tatra sambandhāt etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_8: gantavyam . yasya dhātoḥ yat karma iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_9: mahāntam kumbham karoti iti atra api prāpnoti iti . upapadam iti mahatīiham sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_10: kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3955_11: . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:3956_0: upoccāri padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na tat padam yat ca padam na tat upoccāri
GS24pmbhasuu:3956_1: . yāvatā ca idānīm padagandhaḥ asti padavidhiḥ ayam bhavati . padavidhiḥ ca samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3956_2: bhavati . tatra asāmārthyān na bhaviṣyati . atha cvyante upapade kim aṇā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3956_3: . akumbham kumbham karoti kumbhīkaroti mṛdam iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3956_4: prakṛtivivakṣāyām cviḥ vidhīyate . tat sāpekṣam . sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3957_0: icchāmi aham kāśakaṭīkāram iti . iṣṭam eva etat gonardīyasya . nimittopādanam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3957_1: . nimittopādanam ca kartavyam . nimittam upapadam pratyayasya iti vaktavyam . anupādāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3957_2: hi anupapade pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi nimittopādāne anupapade api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3957_3: . nirdeśaḥ idānīm kimarthaḥ syāt . nirdeśaḥ sañjñākaraṇārthaḥ . yadā upapade pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3957_4: tadā upapadasañjñām vakṣyāmi iti . tat tarhi nimittopādanam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3957_5: . tatravacanam upapadasanniyogārtham . tatravacanam kriyate . tat upapadasanniyogārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3957_6: bhaviṣyati . karmaṇi aṇ vidhīyate tatra cet pratyayaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3957_7: tatragrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam . kim . tatragrahaṇam viṣayārtham iti . adhikārāt api etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_0: 190-192 atiṅ iti kimartham . pacati karoti . atiṅ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_1: bhavati pacati karoti iti . dhātoḥ parasya kṛtsañjñā . prāk ca lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_2: . evam api sthānivadbhāvāt kṛtsañjña prāpnoti . yathā atiṅ iti ucyamāne yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_3: katham eva etat sidhyati . pratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt . atha vā tiṅbhāvinaḥ lakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_4: kṛtsañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ . kim ca syāt yati atra kṛtsañjñā syāt . kṛtprātipadikam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_5: prātipadikasañjñā syāt . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_6: . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante . te ca atra tiṅoktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_7: uktārthatvāt na bhaviṣyanti . ṭābādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . striyām ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_8: vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya strītvena yogaḥ asti . aṇādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_9: iti . apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya apatyādibhiḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_10: asti . atha api katham cit yogaḥ syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_11: na tiṅantāt aṇādayaḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam kva cit taddhitavidhau tiṅgrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_12: . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau tiṅaḥ ca iti . iha tarhi pacati paṭhati iti . hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_13: piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . dhātoḥ iti vartate . evam api cikīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_14: iti atra prāpnoti . atra api śapā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3959_15: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_0: 192-193 katham idam vijñāyate . striyām abhidheyāyām vā asrūpaḥ na bhavati iti āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_1: strīpratyayeṣu iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi striyām abhidheyāyām iti lavyā lavitavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_2: atra vā asarūpaḥ na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate strīpratyayeṣu iti vyāvakrośī vayatikruṣṭiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_3: iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate striyām abhidheyāyām na api strīpratyayeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_4: iti . katham tarhi strīgrahaṇam svarayiṣyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_5: iti striyām iti adhikṛtya ye pratayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3963_0: 193-198 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . asarūpasya vāvacanam utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3963_1: anivṛttyartham . asarūpasya vāvacanam kriyate utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3963_2: yathā syāt . tavyattavyānīyaraḥ utsargāḥ . teṣām ajantāt yat apavādaḥ . ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_0: cetavyam iti api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ajantāt yat vidhīyate . halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_1: ṇyat vidhīyate . etāvantaḥ ca dhātavaḥ yat uta ajantāḥ halantāḥ ca . ucyante ca tavyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_2: . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . evam tarhi ṇvultṛcau utsargau . tayoḥ pacādibhyaḥ ac apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_3: . pacati iti pacaḥ . paktā pācakaḥ iti api yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_4: . vakṣyati etat . ac api sarvadhātubhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . evam tarhi ṇvultṛjacaḥ utsargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_5: teṣām igupadhāt kaḥ apavādaḥ . vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ . vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_6: syāt . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_7: . tatra utpattiḥ vibhāṣā prāpnoti yathā taddhite . astu . yadā vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_8: iti etat na tadā vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti etat bhaviṣyati . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_9: syāt . tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . yathā taddhite iti ucyate . tadditeṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_10: sarvam eva utsargāpavādam vibhāṣā . utpadyate vā na vā . siddham tu asarūpasya bādhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_11: vāvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . asarūpasya bādhakasya vāvacanāt . asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_12: vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_13: eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_14: . asti kāraṇam yena taddhite vibhāṣā utpattiḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtiḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_15: prakṛtyarthe vartate . anyena śabdena pratyayārthaḥ abhidhīyate . iha punaḥ na kevalā
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_16: prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate na ca anyaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tam artham abhidadhīta
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_17: iti kṛtvā anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha vā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ . na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_18: na ca kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . etasmāt samayāt anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_19: yaḥ eva tasya samayasya kartā saḥ eva idam api āha . yadi asau tatra pramāṇam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_20: api pramāṇam bhavitum arhati . pramāṇam asau tatra ca iha ca . sāmarthyam tu iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_21: draṣṭavyam prayoge . na ca anutpattau sāmarthyam asti . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_22: . katham tarhi taddhiteṣu anutpattau sāmarthyam bhavati . anyena pratyayena sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_23: . kena . ṣaṣṭhyā . atha vā rūpavattām āśritya vāvidhiḥ ucyate . na ca anutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_24: rūpavatī . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_25: na punaḥ utsargaḥ iti . na ca eva asti viśeṣaḥ yat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā syāt utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_26: vā . api ca sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate vā asarūpaḥ iti . na ca utsargavelāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_27: kim cit apekṣyam asti . apavādavelāyām punaḥ utsargaḥ apekṣyate . tena yaḥ rūpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_28: anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ punaḥ asau . apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_29: . yadi yaḥ rūpavān anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_30: kvibādiṣu samāveśaḥ na prāpnoti . grāmaṇīḥ grāmaṇāyaḥ iti . na hi ete rūpavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_31: . ete api rūpavantaḥ . kasyām avasthāyām . upadeśāvasthāyām . yadi evam anubandhabhinneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_32: vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ . anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣā prāpnoti . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_33: kaḥ iti kaviṣaye aṇ api prāpnoti . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_34: . katham . anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . atha vā prayoge asarūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_35: vāvidhiḥ nyāyyaḥ . prayoge cet lādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ . prayoge cet lādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_36: vaktavyaḥ . hyaḥ apacat iti atra luṅ api prāpnoti . śvaḥ paktā iti atra lṛṭ api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_37: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na lādeśeṣu vā asarūpaḥ bhavati iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_38: ayam haśaśvatoḥ laṅ ca iti āha . atha vā prayoge asarūpāṇām vāvidhau na sarvam iṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_39: saṅgṛhītam iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_40: ca ete sarūpāḥ . nanu ca uktam anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_41: etat . katham . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . atha ekānte doṣaḥ eva . ekānte
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_42: ca na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam bhavati iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3965_0: vibhāṣā śam śāsti . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3965_1: nāma anubandhabhinnaḥ vā bhavati rūpānyatvena vā . tena anena avaśyam kim cit tyājyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3965_2: kim cit tu saṅgrahītavyam . tat yat anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam tat na āśrayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3965_3: yat tu rūpānyatvena asārūpyam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3965_4: bhavati iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca asarūpaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3966_0: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ asarūpaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ prayoge ca prāk ca prayogāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3966_1: vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca evam kaḥ cit api sarūpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3967: kvat cit ye asarūpāḥ . anubandhabhinnāḥ ca prayoge sarūpāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_0: 199-200 atha katham idam vijñāyate astriyām iti . kim striyām na bhavati āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_1: prāk striyāḥ bhavati iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . striyām pratiṣedhe ktalyuṭtumunkhalartheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_2: vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ . striyām pratiṣedhe ktalyuṭtumunkhalartheṣu vibhāṣā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_3: kta . hasitam chātrasys śobhanam . ghañ api prāpnoti . lyuṭ . hasanam chātrasys śobhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_4: . ghañ api prāpnoti . tumun . icchati bhoktum . liṅloṭau api prāpnutaḥ . khalarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_5: . īṣatpānaḥ somaḥ bhavatā . khal api prāpnoti . evam tarhi striyāḥ prāk iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_6: . striyāḥ prāk iti cet ktvāyām vāvacanam . striyāḥ prāk iti cet ktvāyām vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_7: kartavyam . āsitvā bhuṅkte . āsyate bhoktum iti api yathā syāt . kālādiṣu tumuni
GS24pmbhasuu:3969_8: . kālādiṣu tumuni vāvacanam kartavyam . kālaḥ bhoktum . kālaḥ bhojanasya iti api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3971_0: 200 arhe tṛjvidhānam . arhe tṛc vidheyaḥ . ime arhe kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante . te viśeṣavihitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3971_1: sāmānyavihitam tṛcam bādheran . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3971_2: tṛc . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ kartari tṛcam bādheran . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3971_3: arhe kṛtyatṛjvidhānam . arhe kṛtyatṛcaḥ vidheyāḥ . ayam arhe liṅ vidhīyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_0: 200 kṛtyasañjñāyām prāṅṇvulvacanam . kṛtyasañjñāyām prāk ṇvulaḥ iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_1: prayojanam . ṇvulaḥ kṛtyasañjñā mā bhūt . arhe kṛtyatrjvacanam tu jñāpakam prāṅṇvulavanānarthyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_2: . yat ayam arhe kṛtyatṛcaḥ ca iti tṛjgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ prāk ṇvulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3973_3: kṛtyasañjñā bhavati iti . evam api ṇvulaḥ kṛtyasañjñā prāpnoti . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3975_0: 201 kelimaraḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kelimaraḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pacelimāḥ māṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3975_1: . paktavyāḥ . bhidelimāḥ saralāḥ . bhettavyāḥ . vaseḥ tavyat kartari ṇit ca . vaseḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3975_2: tavyat kartari vaktavyaḥ . ṇit ca asau bhavati iti vaktavyam . vasati iti vāstavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3975_3: . taddhitaḥ vā . taddhitaḥ vā punaḥ eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . vāstuni bhavaḥ vāstavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3977_0: 202-203 ajgrahaṇam kimartham . ajantāt yathā syāt . halantāt mā bhūt iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3977_1: asti prayojanam . halantāt ṇyat vidhīyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3977_2: ṇyat yatam bādhate evam tavyādīn api bādheta . ajgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe ajantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3977_3: yat vidhīyate halantāt ṇyat . etāvantaḥ ca dhātavaḥ yat uta ajantāḥ halantāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3977_4: ucyante ca tavyādayaḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . na etat asti prayojanam . vāsarūpeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3977_5: tavyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . idam tarhi prayojanam . ajantabhūtapūrvamātrāt api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3977_6: syāt . lavyam pavyam . ārdhadhātukasāmānye guṇe kṛte yi pratyayasāmānye ca vāntādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:3977_7: kṛte halantāt iti ṇyat prāpnoti . tathā ditsyam dhitsyam . ārdhadhātukasāmānye akāralope
GS24pmbhasuu:3977_8: kṛte halantāt iti ṇyat prāpnoti . ajgrahaṇasāmarthyāt yat eva bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3979: 202-203 yati jāteḥ upasaṅkhyānam . yati jāteḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . janyam vatsena . atyalpam idam ucyate . takiśasicatiyatijanīnām upasaṅkhyānam iti vaktavyam . taki takyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3982_0: janyam . hanaḥ vā vadha ca . hanaḥ vā yat vaktavyaḥ vadha iti ayam ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3982_1: . vadhyaḥ ghātyaḥ . taddhitaḥ vā . taddhitaḥ vā punaḥ eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . vadham arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:3982_2: vadhyaḥ . yadi taddhitaḥ samāsaḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_0: musalavadhyaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ sati sādhanam kṛtā iti vā pādahārakādyartham iti samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_1: siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi punaḥ asivadhaśabdāt utpattiḥ syāt . asivadham arhati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3984_2: . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . asivadhyaḥ evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . asivadhyaḥ iti ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3986: 203 anupasargāt careḥ āṅi ca agurau . anupasargāt careḥ iti atra āṅi ca agurau iti vaktavyam . ācaryaḥ deśaḥ . agurau iti kimartham . ācāryaḥ upanayamānaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3988: 203 svāmini antodāttatvam ca . svāmini antodāttatvam ca vaktavyam . āryaḥ svāmī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3990_0: 204-205 saṅgatam iti kim pratyudāhriyate . ajaraḥ kambalaḥ . ajaritā kambalaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3990_1: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam kartṛsādhanaḥ pratyudāhriyate . na bhāvasādhanaḥ pratyudāhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3990_2: . evam tarhi ajaryam kartari . ajaryam kartari iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3990_3: . na vaktavyam . gatyarthānām ktaḥ kartari vidhīyate . tena yogāt ajaryam kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3990_4: bhaviṣyati . gatyarthānām vai ktaḥ karmaṇi api vidhīyate . tena yogāt ajaryam karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3990_5: api prāpnoti . jīryatiḥ akarmakaḥ . bhāve tarhi prāpnoti . saṅgatagrahaṇam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3990_6: kimartham syāt . kartṛviśeṣaṇam saṅgatagrahaṇam . saṅgatam cet kartṛ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3990_7: . tat yathā hṛṣeḥ lomasu iti lomāni cet kartṝṇi bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3991_0: (P_3,1.106) KA_II,83.18-84.2 vadaḥ supi anupasargagrahaṇam . vadaḥ supi anupasargagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3991_1: kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pravādyam apavādyam iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3991_2: . anupasarge iti vartate . evam tarhi anvācaṣṭe anupasarge iti vartate . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3991_3: anvākhyeyam adhikārāḥ anuvartante iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta adhikārāḥ anuvarteran iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3993_0: 205-206 bhāvagrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇi mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3993_1: bhavatiḥ ayam akarmaḥ . akarmakāḥ api vai dhātavaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3993_2: . tena anubhavyam āmantraṇam iti atra api prāpnoti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3993_3: . anupasarge iti vartate . uttarārtham tarhi bhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . hanaḥ ta ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3993_4: bhāve yathā syāt . śvahatyā vartate . kva mā bhūt . śvaghātyaḥ vṛṣālaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3995_0: 206 hanaḥ taḥ cit striyām chandasi . hanaḥ taḥ ca iti atra cit striyām chandasi vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3995_1: . tām bhrūṇahatyām nigṛhya anucaraṇam . asyai tvām bhrūṇahatyāyai caturtham pratigṛhāṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3995_2: . striyām iti kimartham . āghnate dasyuhatyāya . chandasi iti kimartham . dasyuhatyā śvahatyā vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_0: 206-207 kyap iti vartamāne punaḥ kyabgrahaṇam kimartham . kyap eva yathā syāt . anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_1: yat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ṇyat . oḥ āvaśyake ṇyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_2: stoteḥ kyap pūrvavipratiṣiddham iti vakṣyati . saḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_3: bhavati . atha vā hanaḥ taḥ cit striyām chandasi coditaḥ . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_4: . kyabvidhau vṛñgrahaṇam . kyabvidhau vṛñgrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . vāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_5: ṛtvijaḥ iti . añjeḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam sañjñāyām . sañjñāyām añjeḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_6: kartavyam . ājyam . yadi kyap vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt ṇyat eṣaḥ . yadi ṇyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_7: upadhālopaḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt kyap eṣaḥ . nanu ca uktam vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_8: . āṅpūrvasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi evam avagrahaḥ prāpnoti . na lakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3997_9: padakārāḥ anuvartyāḥ . padkāraiḥ nāma lakṣaṇam anuvartyam . yathālakṣaṇam padam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3999: 207-208 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na i ca khanaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4000_0: kheyam . ādguṇena siddham . na sidhyati . ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ iti ekādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4000_1: asiddhatvāt tuk prasajyeta . na etat asti . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4000_2: ca eṣaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ . tasmāt i ca khanaḥ iti eva vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4002_0: 208-210 asañjñāyām iti kimartham . bhāryā . bhṛñaḥ sañjñāpratiṣedhe striyām apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4002_1: anyena vihitatvāt . bhṛñaḥ sañjñāpratiṣedhe striyām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4002_2: apratiṣedhaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyena vihitatvāt . anyena lakṣaṇena striyām kyap vidhīyate

GS24pmbhasuu:4002_4: syāt . pratiṣedhaḥ kimarthaḥ iti cet astrīsañjñāpratiṣedhārthaḥ . pratiṣedhaḥ kimarthaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4002_7: vaktavyaḥ . sañjñāyām samajaniṣadanipatamanavidaṣuñśīṅbhṛñiṇaḥ tataḥ na striyām bhṛñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4002_8: iti . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhṛñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4002_9: sañjñāpratiṣedhe striyām apratiṣedhaḥ anyena vihitatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāve

GS24pmbhasuu:4002_11: teṣu na evam vijñāyate sañjñāyām abhidheyāyām iti . kim tarhi . pratyayāntena cet

GS24pmbhasuu:4011: 212-213 niṣṭarkya iti kim nipātyate . niṣṭarkye kṛteḥ ādyantaviparyayaḥ chandasi kṛtādyarthaḥ . yathā kṛteḥ tarkuḥ kaseḥ sikatāḥ hiṃseḥ siṃhaḥ . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4012_0: niṣṭarkye vyatyayam vidyāt nisaḥ ṣatvam nipātanāt . ṇyat āyādeśaḥ iti etau upacāyye
GS24pmbhasuu:4012_1: nipātitau . niṣṭarkyam cinvīta paśukāmaḥ . ṇyat ekasmāt caturbhyaḥ kyaP caturbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4012_2: yataḥ vidhiḥ . ṇyat ekasmāt yaśabdaḥ ca dvau kyapau ṇyadvidhiḥ catuḥ . ṇyat ekasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4012_3: . niṣṭarkyaḥ . caturbhyaḥ kyap . devahūyaḥ praṇīyaḥ unnīyaḥ ucchiṣyaḥ . caturbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4012_4: ca yataḥ vidhiḥ . maryaḥ staryā dhvaryaḥ khanyaḥ . ṇyat ekasmāt . khānyaḥ . yaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4012_5: ca . devayajyā . dvau kyapau . āpṛcchyaḥ pratiṣīvyaḥ . ṇyadvidhiḥ catuḥ . brahmavādyaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4016_1: . āvaśyake upapade iti cet dyotye upasaṅkhyānam . āvaśyake upapade iti cet dyotye

GS24pmbhasuu:4018_1: kyap bhavati pūrvavipratiṣdhena . oḥ āvaśyake ṇyat bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ . avaśyalāvyam

GS24pmbhasuu:4027_0: ṛhaloḥ ṇyat iti . vahyartham tarhi nipātanam kartavyam . vaheḥ ṇyat yathā syāt .

GS24pmbhasuu:4052_3: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vedādhyāyaḥ carcāpāraḥ śamanīpāraḥ . yatra ca niyuktaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4056_10: saḥ eva . kuḍyalepe ubhayam prāpnoti . karmopadaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4056_11: yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . anupapadaḥ tṛtīyaḥ . ṇvultṛjacaḥ . teṣām kaḥ . kasya kaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:4132_2: . brahmādiṣu eva hanteḥ kvip yathā syāt . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha .upapadaviśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:4132_3: etasmin ca viśeṣe . atha brahmādiṣu hanteḥ ṇininā bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:4139_0: 256-257 niṣṭhāyām itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . niṣṭhāyām itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4139_1: . kā itaretarāśrayatā . satoḥ ktaktavatvoḥ sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca ktaktavatū
GS24pmbhasuu:4139_2: bhāvyete . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:4139_3: . dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam . dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam kartavyam . ktaktavtū bhūte
GS24pmbhasuu:4139_4: . ktaktavatū niṣṭhā iti . yadi punaḥ iha eva niṣṭhāsañjñā api ucyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:4140_0: ktaktavtū bhūte . tataḥ niṣṭhā . niṣṭhāsañjñau ca ktaktavtū bhavataḥ iti . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:4140_1: bhavati . dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . evam api tau iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4140_2: syāt . vakṣyati hi etat . tau sat iti vacanam asaṃsargārtham iti . asaṃsaktayoḥ bhūtena
GS24pmbhasuu:4140_3: kālena niṣṭhāsañjñā yathā syāt . ñimidā minnaḥ ñikṣvidā kṣvinnaḥ . yadi punaḥ adṛṣṭaśrutau
GS24pmbhasuu:4140_4: eva ktaktavatū gṛhītvā niṣṭhāsañjñā ucyeta . na evam śakyam . dṛṣṭaśrutayoḥ na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4140_5: . ñimidā minnaḥ . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4140_6: itaretarāśrayam vā bhavati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . itaretarāśrayamātram etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4140_7: sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi ekatvena parihṛtāni siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4140_8: idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ . na hi sañjñā nityā . evam tarhi bhāvinī sañjñā

GS24pmbhasuu:4169_1: adyatane iti vaktavyam . kim ayam smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ aviśeṣeṇa bhūtamātre bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_2: . tatra vaktavyam smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca adyatane na bhavataḥ iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_3: smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa bhūtamātre bhavataḥ iti . tatra smādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_4: na sma purā adyatane iti vaktavyam . kim ca ataḥ . smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_5: kim kṛtam bhavati na sma purā adyatane iti bruvatā kātyāyanena iha . smādividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_6: purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa bhavati kim vārttikakāraḥ pratiṣedhena karoti na sma purā
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_7: adyatane iti . anuvṛttiḥ anadyatanasya lāt sme iti tatra na asti nañkāryam . laṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_8: sme iti atra anadyatane iti etat anuvartiṣyate . aparokṣānadyatanaḥ nanau ca nanvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_9: ca nivṛttau na purā adyatane iti bhavet etat vācyam . tatra etāvat vaktavyam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_10: na purā adyatane iti . tatra ca api laṅgrahaṇam . tatra ca api laṅgrahaṇam jñapakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_11: na purālakṣaṇaḥ adyatane bhavati iti . atha buddhiḥ aviśeṣād sma purā hetū . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_12: buddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa sma purā hetū iti . tatra ca api śrṇu bhūyaḥ . aparokṣe ce iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_13: eṣaḥ prāk purisaṃśabdanāt avinivṛttaḥ sarvatra anadyatanaḥ . tathā sati nañā kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_14: iha kāryam . smādau aparokṣe ca iti akāryam iti śakyam etat api viddhi . śakyam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_15: nivartayitum parokṣe iti lāt sme iti atra . syāt eṣā tava buddhiḥ . smalakṣaṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_16: evam eva siddham iti . laṭ sme iti bhavet na arthaḥ . tasmāt kāryam parārtham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:4169_17: . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca anadyatane bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4171_0: 278 nanau pṛṣṭaprativacane iti aśiṣyam kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . nanau pṛṣṭaprativacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4171_1: iti aśiṣyaḥ laṭ . kim kāraṇam . kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . kriyāyāḥ atra asamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4171_2: vivakṣitā . eṣaḥ nāma nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra kriyāyāḥ asamāptiḥ bhavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4171_3: tatra vartamāne laṭ iti eva siddham . yadi vartamāne laṭ iti eva laṭ bhavati śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:4172: nanu mām kurvantam paśya . nanu mām kurvāṇam paśya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_0: 278-279 haśaśvadbhyām purā . haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_1: . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot . iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_2: cakāra . purālakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . rathena ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā ayāsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_3: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . rathena ha śaśvat purā yāti . rathena ha śaśvat purā ayāsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_4: . purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . smaḥ sarvebhyaḥ vipratiṣedhena . smalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_5: sarvebhyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇāt ca . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_6: avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot . iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat cakāra . purālakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_7: avakāśaḥ . rathena ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā ayāsīt . smalakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_8: . dharmeṇa sma kuravaḥ yudhyante . iha sarvam prāpnoti . na ha sma vai purā śaśvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4174_9: aparaśuvṛkṇam dahati . smalakṣaṇaḥ laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_0: 279-285 pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā bhavantī avartamānatvāt . pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_1: bhavantī . iha adhīmahe . iha vasāmaḥ . iha puṣyamitram yājayāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_2: na sidhyati . avartamānatvāt . nityapravṛtte ca kālāvibhāgāt . nityapravṛtte ca śāsitavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_3: bhavantī . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sravanti nadyaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_4: . kālāvibhāgāt . iha bhūtabhaviṣyatpratidvandvaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ . na ca atra bhūtabhaviṣyantau
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_5: kālau staḥ . nyāyyā tu ārambhānapavargāt . nyāyyā tu eṣā vartamānakālatā . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_6: . ārambhānapavargāt . ārambhaḥ atra anapavṛktaḥ . eṣaḥ nām nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_7: yatra ārambhaḥ anapavṛktaḥ . asti ca muktasaṃśaye virāmaḥ . yam khalu api bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_8: muktasaṃśayam vartamānam kālam nyāyyam manyate bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti tena etat tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_9: . saḥ api hi avaśyam bhuñjānaḥ hasati vā jalpati vā pānīyam vā pibati . yadi atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_10: yuktā vartamānakālatā dṛśyate iha api yuktā dṛśyatām . santi ca kālavibhāgāḥ . santi
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_11: khalu api kālavibhāgāḥ . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ . tasthuḥ parvatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_12: . kim śakyante ete śabdāḥ prayoktum iti ataḥ santi kālavibhāgāḥ . na avaśyam prayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_13: eva . iha bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānānām rājñām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāḥ tiṣṭhateḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_14: . iha tāvat tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ iti . samprati ye rājānaḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāsu vartamānāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_15: . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ iti . itaḥ uttaram ye rājānaḥ bhaviṣyanti teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4176_16: tāsu bhaviṣyantīṣu . tasthuḥ parvatāḥ iti . ye rājānaḥ babhūvuḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4177: na asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . api ca atra ślokān udāharanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_0: na vartate cakram . iṣuḥ na pātyate . na syandante saritaḥ sāgarāya . kūṭasthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_1: lokaḥ na viceṣṭā asti . yaḥ hi evam paśyati saḥ api anandhaḥ . mīmāṃsakaḥ manyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_2: yuvā medhāvisammataḥ kākam sma iha anupṛcchati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4179_0: kim te patitalakṣaṇam . anāgate na patasi atikrānte ca kāka na . yadi samprati patasi
GS24pmbhasuu:4179_1: sarvaḥ lokaḥ patati ayam . himavān api gacchati . anāgatam atikrāntam vartamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4179_2: iti trayam . sarvatra gatiḥ na asti . gacchati iti kim ucyate . kriyāpravṛttau yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4179_3: hetuḥ tadartham yat viceṣṭitam tat samīkṣya prayuñjīta gacchati iti avicārayan .
GS24pmbhasuu:4179_4: apraḥ āha . asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . ādityagativat na upalabhyate . api ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4179_5: ślokam udāharanti . bisasya vālāḥ iva dahyamānāḥ na lakṣyate vikṛtiḥ sannipāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:4179_6: asti iti tām vedayante tribhabhāvāḥ . sūkṣmaḥ hi bhāvaḥ anumitena gamyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_0: 286-288 lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena ayogāt adeśānupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . lasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_1: aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena ayogāt adeśayoḥ nupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . tat yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_2: api lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena yogaḥ na bhavati . kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_3: odanam devadattaḥ iti . yogaḥ iti cet anyatra api yogaḥ syāt . atha matam etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_4: yogaḥ iti anyatra api yogaḥ syāt . kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat odanam devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_5: iti . na kva cit yogaḥ iti kṛtvā ataḥ sarvatra yogena bhavitavyam kva cit ayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_6: iti kṛtvā sarvatra ayogena . tat yathā . samānam īhamānānām ca adhīyānānām ca ke
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_7: cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm kaḥ cit arthavān iti ataḥ sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_8: śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ iti sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_9: kartum . yat loṭaḥ aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena yogaḥ bhavati laṅaḥ na svābhāvikam
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_10: etat . atha vā ādeśe sāmānādhikaraṇyam dṛṣṭvā anumānāt gantavyam prakṛteḥ api sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_11: bhavati iti . tat yathā dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ atra iti gamyate triviṣṭabdhakam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_12: parivrājakaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . pratyakṣaḥ tena agnidhūmayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_13: kṛtaḥ bhavati triviṣṭabdhakaparivrājakayoḥ ca . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_14: agniḥ atra parivrājakaḥ atra iti . bhavati vai pratyakṣāt api anumānabalīyastvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_15: . tat yathā alātacakram pratyakṣam dṛśyate anumānāt ca gamyate na etat asti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_16: kasya cit khalu api sakṛt kṛtaḥ abhisambandhaḥ atyantāya kṛtaḥ bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4181_17: vṛkṣaparṇayoḥ ayam vṛkṣaḥ idam parṇam iti . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_0: prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_1: iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_2: iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kaurvataḥ pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_3: pacadbhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ .prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_5: ādeśayoḥ anupapattiḥ . kurvatī ca asau bhaktiḥ ca kurvadbhaktiḥ pacabhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_6: pacamānabhaktiḥ iti . ye ca api ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ tatra ca śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_7: na prāpnutaḥ . kurvattaraḥ pacattaraḥ kurvāṇataraḥ pacamānataraḥ kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_8: kurvāṇarūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ kurvāṇakalpaḥ pacamānakalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_9: iti . siddham tu pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_10: ca śatṛśānacau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_11: . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . ādeśanimittaḥ pratyayaḥ pratyayanimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_12: ca ādeśaḥ . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na praklpante
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_13: . uttarapadasya ca subantanimittatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . uttarapadasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_14: subantanimittatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . uttarapadanimittaḥ sup subantanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_15: ca uttarapadam . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na praklpante
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_16: . na vā lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_17: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam . lakāraḥ kṛt kṛt prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_18: iti prātipadikasañjñā . tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . prātipadikāśrayā svādyutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_19: bhaviṣyati . tiṅādeśāt subutpattiḥ . tiṅādeśaḥ kriyatām subutpattiḥ iti paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_20: subutpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . tasmāt uttarapadaprasiddhiḥ . tasmāt uttarapadam prasiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_21: . uttarapade prasiddhe uttarapade iti śatṛśānacau bhaviṣyataḥ . iha api tarhi tiṅādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_22: subutpattiḥ syāt pacati paṭhati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . nityaḥ atra tiṅādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_23: utpanne api supi prāpnoti anutpanne api prāpnoti . nityatvāt tiṅādeśe kṛte subutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_24: na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi nityatvāt tiṅādeśaḥ syāt kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_25: pacamānabhaktiḥ iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . śatṛśānacau tiṅapavādau tau ca nimittavantau
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_26: . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_27: utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . na tāvat atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_28: kadā cit tiṅ bhavati . apavādau śatṛśānacau pratīkṣate . tat etat kva siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_29: . yatra sāmānyāt utpattiḥ . yatra hi viśeṣāt ataḥ iñ iti itaretarāśrayam eva tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_30: bhavati . vīkṣamāṇasya apatyam vaikṣamāṇiḥ iti . iha ca śatṛśānacau prāpnutaḥ . pacatitarām
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_31: jalpatitarām pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam pacatikalpam jalpatikalpam pacati paṭhati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_32: . tat etat katham kṛtvā siddham bhavati . śatṛśānacau yadi laṭaḥ vā . yadi śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_33: yadi laṭaḥ vā bhavataḥ vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca . tena iha ca bhaviṣyataḥ kaurvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_34: pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ kurvattaraḥ pacattaraḥ pacamānataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_35: kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ pacamānakalpaḥ pacan
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_36: paṭhan iti ca laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau . iha ca na bhaviṣyataḥ pacatitarām jalpatitarām
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_37: pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam pacatikalpam jalpatikalpam pacati paṭhati iti ca laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_38: . tat tarhi vāvacanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_39: . nanvoḥ vibhāṣā iti . yadi tat anuvartate vartamāne laṭa iti laṭ api vibhāṣā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4186_40: . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . nanvoḥ vibhāṣā . puri luṅ ca asme vibhāṣā . vartamāne laṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:4187_0: puri luṅ ca asme vibhāṣā . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau vibhāṣā . puri luṅ ca asme iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:4187_1: . na tarhi idānīm aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4187_2: . nityāṛtham . aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe nityau yathā syātām . kva tarhi idānīm vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4187_3: . prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe . pacan pacati pacamānaḥ pacate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_0: 292-294 lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ guṇe upasaṅkhyānam . lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ guṇe upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_1: kartavyam . tiṣṭhan mūtrayati . gacchan bhakṣayati . kartuḥ ca lakṣaṇayoḥ paryāyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_2: acayoge . kartuḥ ca lakṣaṇayoḥ paryāyeṇa acayoge upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . yaḥ adhīyānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_3: āste saḥ devadatttaḥ . yaḥ āsīnaḥ adhīte saḥ devadattaḥ . acayoge iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_4: yaḥ āste ca adhīte ca saḥ caitraḥ . tattvānvākhyāne ca . tattvānvākhyāne ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_5: kartavyam . śayānā vardhate dūrvā . āsīnam vardhate bisam iti . sadādayaḥ ca bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_6: . sadādayaḥ ca bahulam iti vaktavyam . san brāhmaṇaḥ asti brāhmaṇaḥ . vidyate brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_7: vidyamānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti . iṅjuhotyoḥ vāvacanam . iṅjuhotyoḥ vā iti vaktavyam . adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_8: adhīyānaḥ . juhoti juhvat . māṅi ākrośe . māṅi ākrośe iti vaktavyam . mā pacan .
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_9: mā pacamānaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_10: siddham . iha tāvat tiṣṭhan mūtrayati iti . tiṣṭhatikriyā mūtrayatikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_11: . gacchan bhakṣayati iti . gacchatikriyā bhakṣayatikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . yaḥ adhīyānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_12: āste saḥ devadatttaḥ iti . adhyayanakriyā āsanakriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . yaḥ āsīnaḥ adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_13: saḥ devadattaḥ iti . āsikriyā adhyayanakriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4189_14: . acayoge iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . yaḥ āste ca adhīte ca saḥ caitraḥ iti

GS24pmbhasuu:4220_1: ḍuprakaraṇe mitadrvādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . dhātuvidhitukpratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4220_2: . dhātuvidheḥ tukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . mitradruḥ mitadrū mitadravaḥ . aci
GS24pmbhasuu:4220_3: śnudhātubhruvām iti uvaṅādeśaḥ mā bhūt . iha ca mitadrvā mitadrve na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4220_4: pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt . tugvidhiḥ . mitadruḥ . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4222_0: 308 śīlitaḥ rakṣitaḥ kṣāntaḥ ākruṣṭaḥ juṣṭaḥ iti api ruṣṭaḥ ca ruṣitaḥ ca ubhau abhivyāhṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4222_1: iti api hṛṣṭatuṣṭau tathā kāntaḥ tathā ubhau saṃyotodyatau . kaṣṭam bhaviṣyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4222_2: āhuḥ . amṛtāḥ pūrvavat smṛtāḥ . na mriyante amṛtāḥ . (3.3.1)
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_0: KA_II,138.2 - 22 Ro_III.309-312 bahulavacanam kimartham . bāhulakam prakṛteḥ tanudṛṣṭeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_1: . tanvībhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante . na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante . prāyasamuccayād
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_2: api teṣām . prāyeṇa khalu api te samuccitāḥ na sarve samuccitāḥ . kāryasaśeṣavidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_3: ca tat uktam . kāryāṇi khalu api saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_4: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tanvībhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_5: . kim ca kāraṇam prāyeṇa samuccitāḥ na sarve samuccitāḥ . kim ca kāraṇam kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_6: saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni . naigamarūḍibhavam hi susādhu
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_7: . naigamāḥ ca rūḍhibhavāḥ ca auṇādikāḥ susādhavaḥ katham syuḥ . nāma ca dhātujam
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_8: āha nirukte . nāma khalu api dhātujam . evam āhuḥ nairuktāḥ . vyākaraṇe śakaṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_9: ca tokam . vaiyākaraṇānām ca śākaṭāyanaḥ āha dhātujam nāma iti . atha yasya viśeṣapadārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_10: na samuttitaḥ katham tatra bhavitavyam . yat na viśeṣapadārthasamuttam pratyayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_11: prakṛteḥ ca tat ūhyam . prakṛtim dṛṣṭvā pratyayaḥ ūhitavyaḥ pratyayam ca dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4223_12: ūhitavyā . sañjñāsu dhāturūpāṇi pratyayāḥ ca tataḥ pare kāryāt vidyāt anubandham
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_0: 312-313 bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam . bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_1: kartavyam . śvaḥ grāmam gamī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lṛṭā ayam nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_2: kṛiyate . lṛṭ ca anadyatane luṭā bādhyate . tena lṛṭaḥ eva viṣaye ete pratyayāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_3: . luṭaḥ viṣaye na syuḥ . itaretarāśrayam ca . itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_4: . bhaviṣyatkālena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . nirdeśottarakālam ca bhbhaviṣyatkālatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_5: . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_6: . kim uktam . ekam tāvat uktam na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_7: vidhānam iti . aparam api uktam avyayanirdeśāt siddham iti. avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_8: kariṣyate . avartamāne abhūte iti . saḥ tarhi avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_9: . na kartavyaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatiśabdaḥ na eṣā bhavateḥ lṛṭ . katham avyayatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_10: . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_11: iti avayayasañjñā . atha api bhavateḥ lṛṭ evam api avayayam eva . katham na vyeti
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_12: iti avyayam . kva punaḥ na vyeti . etau kālaviśeṣau bhūtavartamānau . svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_13: bhaviṣyati eva vartate . yadi tatri na vyeti iti avyayam . na vā tadvidhānasya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_14: abhāvāt . na vā bhaviṣyadādhikāreṇa arthaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tadvidhānasya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_15: abhāvāt . ye api ete itaḥ uttaram pratyayāḥ śiṣyante ete api etau kālaviśeṣau na
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_16: viyanti bhūtavartamānau . svabhāvataḥ eva te bhaviṣyati eva vartante . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:4225_17: paṭhati . bhaviṣyadadhikārasya prayojanam yāvat pacati purā pacati iti anapaśabdatvāya .
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_0: 314 yāvatpurādiṣu laḍvidhiḥ luṭaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . yāvatpurādiṣu laḍvidhiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_1: luṭaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena . yāvatpurānipātayoḥ laṭ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ . yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_2: bhuṅkte . purā bhuṅkte . luṭaḥ avakāśaḥ . śvaḥ kartā . śvaḥ adhyetā . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_3: prāpnoti . yāvat śvaḥ bhuṅkte . purā śvaḥ bhuṅkte . laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4227_4: saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . anadyatane luṭ iti atra yāvatpurānipātayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4229_0: 314 kimartham idam ucyate na lipsyamānasiddhiḥ api lipsā eva tatra kiṃvṛtte lipsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4229_1: iti eva siddham . akiṃvṛttārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dadāti saḥ svargam
GS24pmbhasuu:4229_2: lokam gacchati . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dāsyati saḥ svargam lokam gamiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_0: 314-316 kimartham kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām ṇvul vidhīyate na aviśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_1: ṇvul saḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyati . ṇvuli sakarmakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_2: coditam . akaramakārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . āsakaḥ vrajati . śāyakaḥ vrajati . pratyākhyātam
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_3: tat na vā dhātumātrāt darśanāt ṇvulaḥ iti . evam tarhi tṛjādiṣu vartamānakālopādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_4: coditam . avartamānakālārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . tat api pratyākhyātam na vā kālamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_5: darśanāt anyeṣām iti . idam tarhi prayojanam. akenoḥ bhaviṣyadādhamrṇyayoḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_6: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ uktaḥ . saḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . yaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_7: asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ yadā bhaviṣyati bhaviṣyati tadā asya pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_8: . evam tarhi bhaviṣyadadhikāravihitasya pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_0: aṅga yajatām . lapsyante asya yājakāḥ . ye enam yājayayiṣyanti iti . na eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatkālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_1: . kaḥ tarhi . bhūtakālaḥ . katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . dhātusambandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_2: pratyayāḥ iti . yaḥ tarhi na dhātusambandhaḥ . ime asya yājakāḥ . ime asya lāvakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_3: iti . eṣaḥ api bhūtakālaḥ . katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . sambandhāt . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_4: ca tāvat taiḥ ayājitaḥ bhavati . tasya ca tāvat taiḥ yavāḥ alūnāḥ bhavanti . ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_5: ca . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām tumun vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_6: saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta . etat api na asti prayojanam . bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_7: tumun vidhīyate kartari ṇvul . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāve vihitaḥ tumun kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_8: vihitam ṇvulam bādheta . lṛṭ tarhi bādheta . vāsarūpeṇa bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_9: paṭhati . ṇvulaḥ kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam tṛjādipratiṣedhārtham . ṇvulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_10: kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4232_11: ācāryaḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . ṇvul api tṛjādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_0: 316-317 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ ye vihitāḥ te kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_1: upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyanti . bhāvavacanānām yathāvihitānām pratipadavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_2: . bhāvavacanānām yathāvihitānām pratipadavidhyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . idānīm eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_3: uktam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . bhāvavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_4: ca api tṛjādayaḥ . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathāvihitāḥ iti tu vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_5: . kim prayojanam . iha yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_6: tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām yathā syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_7: vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha bhāve pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_8: bhavanti iti iyaṭa siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat vacanagrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_9: tasya etat prayojanam vācakāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_10: viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_11: upapde kriyārthāyām bhavanti tataḥ amī vācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4234_12: vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amīvācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_0: 317-318 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa karmaṇi aṇ vihitaḥ saḥ kriyāyām upapade
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_1: kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyati . aṇaḥ punarvacanam apavādaviṣaye anivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_2: . aṇaḥ punarvacanam kriyate apavādaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . godāyaḥ vrajati
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_3: . kambaladāyaḥ vrajati iti . kim ucyate apavādaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_4: punaḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhyartham syāt . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapde
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_5: kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . aṇ ca api tṛjādiḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_6: ubhayam anena kriyate . apavādaviṣaye cānivṛttiḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_7: . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . karmagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_8: . katham punaḥ antareṇa karmagrahaṇam karmaṇi aṇ labhyaḥ . vacanagrahaṇam prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_9: anuvartate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . aparyāyeṇa iti tu vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_10: kadā cit hi karmaṇi syāt kadā cit kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_11: . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . aṇ karmaṇi ca . kim ca anyat . kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_12: upapade kriyārthāyām iti . evam api pratyekam upapadasañjñā na prāpnoti . cena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4236_13: sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti pratyekam upapadasañjña bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_0: 318-319 śeṣavacanam kimartham . lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_1: lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyate kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham . pratipadavidhiḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_2: . aviśeṣeṇa vidhāne lṛṭaḥ abhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt . aviśeṣeṇa vidhāne lṛṭaḥ abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_3: syāt . kariṣyāmi iti vrajati . hariṣyāmi iti vrajati iti . kim kāraṇam . pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_4: . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_5: iti . lṛṭ ca api tṛjādiḥ . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . sādhīyaḥ tu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_6: śeṣagrahaṇena kriyārthopapadāt lṛṭ nirbhajyate . kim kāraṇam . akriyārthopapadatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_7: . śeṣe iti ucyate . śeṣaḥ ca kaḥ . yat anyat kriyāyāḥ kriyārthāyāḥ . evam tarhi lṛṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_8: śeṣavacanam kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham . lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyate kriyāyām pratipadavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_9: yathā syāt . lṛṭ śeṣe ca . kariṣyati hariṣyati iti . kva ca . kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_10: iti . saḥ tarhi cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha lṛṭ bhavati iti iyatā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_11: . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat śeṣagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yogāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_12: yathā upajāyeta . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . lṛṭ bhavati kriyāyām upapade
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_13: kriyārthāyām iti . tataḥ śeṣe . śeṣe ca lṛṭ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4240_1: nityam iti vaktavyam . pakṣyantam paśya . pakṣyamāṇam paśya . kva tarhi idānīm vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_0: 320 yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau bhavataḥ . śvaḥ agnīn ādhyāsyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_1: . śvaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇena . tataḥ luṭ . luṭ bhavati anadyatane . śvaḥ kartā . śvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_2: adhyetā . kena vihitasya anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsañjñau ucyete . etat eva jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_3: bhavati anadyatane lṛṭ iti yat ayam anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau śāsti . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_4: saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4244_1: iti vaktavyam . iyam nu kadā gantā yā evam pādau nidadhāti . ayam nu kadā adhyetā
GS24pmbhasuu:4244_2: yaḥ evam anabhiyuktaḥ iti . kālaprakarṣāt tu upamānam . kālaprakarṣāt tu upamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4244_3: . gantā iva iyam gantā . na iyam gamiṣyati . adhyetā iva ayam adhyetā . na vai tiṅantena
GS24pmbhasuu:4244_4: upamānam asti . evam tarhi anadyatane iva anadyatane iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4246: 321 spṛśaḥ upatāpe . spṛśaḥ upatāpe iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kambalasparśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4248: 321 vādhimatsyabaleṣu iti vaktavyam . atīsāraḥ vyādhiḥ . visāraḥ matsyaḥ . bale . śālasāraḥ khadirasāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_0: 323-324 bhāve sarvaliṅganirdeśaḥ . bhāve sarvaliṅganirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . bhūtau bhavane
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_1: bhāve iti . kim prayojanam . sarvaliṅge bhāṅe ete pratyayāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_2: punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . puṃliṅgena ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanena ca . ten
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_3: puṃliṅge eva ekavacane ca ete prratyayāḥ syuḥ . strīnapuṃsakayoḥ dvivacanabahuvacnayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_4: ca na syuḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva ca nāma nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_5: tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra puṃliṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_6: nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanena ca . avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit ca liṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_7: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam satuṣam sapalālam āharati
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_8: nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_9: cit māṃsārthī matsyān saśakalān sakaṇṭakān āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_10: tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt puṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_11: kriyate ekavacanāntena ca . na hi atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . kayā cit vibhaktyā kena
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_12: cit ca liṅgena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . atha vā kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavācinaḥ kriyāviśeṣavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_13: pacādayaḥ . yat ca atra pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati na tat bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_14: . yat ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati na tat pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati . kim ca pacateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_15: bhavatiḥ bhavati . sāmānyam . kim ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati . viśeṣaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_16: upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ mātulasya bhāgineyam gatvā āha . upādhyāyam bhavān abhivādayatām
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_17: iti . saḥ gatvā mātulam abhivādayate . tathā mātulasya bhāgineyaḥ upādhyāyasya śiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_18: gatvā āha . mātulam bhavān abhivādayatām iti . saḥ gatvā upādhyāyam abhivādayate
GS24pmbhasuu:4250_19: . evam iha api pacateḥ bhavatau yat tat nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4252_0: 325-327 kārakagrahaṇam kimartham . kārakagrahaṇam anādeśe svārthavijñānāt . kārakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4252_1: anādeśe svārthavijñānāt . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4252_2: . guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . evam ime api pratyayāḥ svārthe syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4252_3: svārthe mā bhūvan kārake yathā syuḥ iti evamartham idam ucyate . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4252_4: . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ svārthe bhāve ghañ iti . tena atriprasaktam iti kṛtvā niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4252_5: ayam vijñāyeta . akartari sañjñāyām eva iti . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit sañjñābhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4252_6: bhāvaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha : āvāhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_0: vivāhaḥ iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_1: asti vidheyam . akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām ghañ vidheyaḥ . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_2: astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . tat eva tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_3: svārthe mā bhūvan iti . nanu ca uktam vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ svārthe bhāve ghañ iti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_4: . anyaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ bāhyaḥ prakṛtyarthāt . anena idānīm ābhyantare bhāve syāt . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_5: punaḥ etayoḥ bhāvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . uktaḥ bhāvabhedaḥ bhāṣye . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_6: . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_7: asnyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñayate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . abrāhmaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_8: ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam puruṣam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_9: . evam iha api akartari iti kartṛpratiṣedhāt anyasmin akartari kartṛsadṛśe kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_10: vijñasyate . kim ca anyat akartṛ kartṛsadṛśam . kārakam . uttarārtham tarhi kārakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_11: kartavyam . parimāṇākhyāyām sarvebhyaḥ kārake yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . ekā tilocchritiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_12: . deve sṛtī iti . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye avacane hi strīpratyayānām api avādavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_13: iti vakṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_14: akartari iti eva anuvartiṣyate . sañjñāgrahaṇānarthakyam ca sarvatra ghañaḥ darśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_15: . sañjñāgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . sarvatra ghañaḥ darśanāt . asañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_16: api hi ghañ dṛśyate . kaḥ bhavatā dāyaḥ dattaḥ . kaḥ bhavatā lābhaḥ labdhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_17: yadi sañjñāgrahaṇam na kriyate atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ iti atra kāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_18: kaṭa iti prāpnoti . atiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet abhidhānalakṣaṇatvāt pratyayasya siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4253_19: . atiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . abhidhānalakṣaṇatvāt pratyayasya siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_0: 327-329 sarvagrahaṇam kimartham . sarvebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ghañ yathā syāt ajapoḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_1: viṣaye . ekaḥ taṇḍulaniścāyaḥ . dvau śūrpaniṣpāvau . sarvagrahaṇam anarthakam parimāṇākhyāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_2: iti siddhatvāt . sarvagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . parimāṇākhyāyam iti siddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_3: . parimāṇākhyāyam iti eva ghañ siddhaḥ ajapoḥ api viṣaye . na arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_4: . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . ekaḥ pākaḥ dvau pākau trayaḥ pākāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_5: iti . pūrveṇa api etat siddham . na sidhyati . sañjñāyām iti pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_6: eṣā sañjñā . pratyākhyāyate sañjñāgrahaṇam . atha api kriyate evam api na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_7: ajau api sañjñāyām eva . yathājātīyakaḥ utsargaḥ tathājātīyakena apavādena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_8: . uttarārtham tarhi . iṅaḥ ca sarvebhyaḥ api yathā syāt . nanu ca ayam iṅ ekaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_9: vaṇṭaraṇḍākalpaḥ . sarveṣu sādhaneṣu yathā syāt . upetya adhīyate tasmāt adhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_10: . adhīyate tasmin adhyāyaḥ . adhyāyanyāyāyodyāvasaṃhārāvāyāḥ ca iti etat nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_11: na kartavyam bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . kriyate nyāse eva . uttarāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_12: eva tarhi vaktavyam . karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām iti sarvebhyaḥ yathā syāt . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_13: api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . karmavyatihāre strīgrahaṇam vyatipākārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_14: . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhanārtham . vyāvacorīvyāvacarcyartham . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_15: doṣaḥ . siddham tu prakṛte strīgrahaṇe ṇajgrahaṇam ṇijgrahaṇam ca iti . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_16: tarhi abhividhau bhāve inuṇ sarvebhyaḥ yathā syāt . sāṃrāviṇam . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_17: prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_18: . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhārtham . na tu lyuṭ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . prakṛtyāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_19: yaḥ apavādaḥ tasya bādhanam yathā syāt . arthāśrayaḥ yaḥ apavādaḥ tasya bādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_20: mā bhūt . ekā tilocchritiḥ dve sṛtī iti . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye . avacane hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4255_21: strīpratyayānām api apavādavijñānam iti codayiṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4257_0: 329-330 ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye iti vaktavyam . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4257_1: hi strīpratyayānām api apavādavijñānam . anucyamāne hi etasmin strīpratyayānām api
GS24pmbhasuu:4257_2: apavādaḥ ayam vijñayeta . ekā tilocchritiḥ dve sṛtī iti . dārajārau kartari ṇiluk
GS24pmbhasuu:4257_3: ca . dārajārau kartari vaktavyau ṇiluk ca vaktavyaḥ . dārayanti iti dārāḥ . jarayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4257_4: iti jārāḥ . karaṇe vā . karaṇe vā vaktavyau . dīryate taiḥ dārāḥ . jīryanti taiḥ jārāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_0: 330 iṅaḥ ca iti apādāne striyām upasaṅkhyānam tadantāt ca vā ṅīṣ . iṅaḥ ca iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_1: apādāne striyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam tadantāt ca vā ṅīṣ vaktavyaḥ . upetya adhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_2: tasyāḥ uapādhyāyī upādhyāyā . śṝ vāyuvarṇanivṛteṣu . śṝ iti etasmāt vāyuvarṇanivṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_3: ghañ vaktavyaḥ . śāraḥ vāyuḥ . śāraḥ varṇaḥ . gauḥ iva akṛtanīśāraḥ prāyeṇa śiśire kṛśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4261_0: 331 sami muṣṭau iti anarthakam vacanam parimāṇākhyāyām iti siddhatvāt . sami muṣṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:4261_1: iti etat vacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . parimāṇākhyāyām iti siddhatvāt . parimāṇākhyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4261_2: iti eva siddham . aparimāṇārtham tu . aparimāṇārtham tu ayam ārambhaḥ . mallasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4261_3: saṅgrāhaḥ muṣṭikasya saṅgāhaḥ iti . udgrābhinigrābhau ca chandasi srugudyamananipātanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4261_4: . udgrābhaḥ nibrābhaḥ iti imau śabdau chandasi vaktavyau srugudyamananipātanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4261_5: . udgrābham ca nigrābham ca brahma devāḥ avīvṛdhan .
GS24pmbhasuu:4263_0: 331-332 strīgrahaṇam kimartham . karmavyatihāre strīgrahaṇam vyatipākārtham . karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4263_1: strīgrahaṇam kriyate vyatipākārtham . iha mā bhūt . vyatipākaḥ vartate iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4263_2: kimartham pṛthak grahaṇam . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhanārtham . pṛthak grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4263_3: kriyate bādhakabādhanārtham . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4263_4: . vyāvacorīvyāvacarcyartham . vyāvacorī vartate . vyāvacarcī vartate . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4263_5: doṣaḥ . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . vyatīkṣā vartate . vyatīhā vartate . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4263_6: tu prakṛte strīgrahaṇe ṇajgrahaṇam ṇijgrahaṇam ca . siddham etat . katham . prakṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:4263_7: eva strīgrahaṇe ayam yogaḥ kartavyaḥ . striyām ktin . tataḥ karmavyatihāre ṇac . tataḥ ṇicaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_0: 332-333 bhāvagrahaṇam kimartham . abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_1: . abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam kriyate napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham . napuṃsakaliṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:4265_2: ktādayaḥ mā bhūvan iti . atha kimartham pṛthak grahaṇam . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4266: ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . na tu lyuṭaḥ . lyuṭaḥ tu bādhanam na iṣyate . saṅkūṭanam iti eva bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4268: 333-334 ajvidhau bhayasya upasaṅkhyānam . ajvidhau bhayasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . bhayam . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4269: bhayasya iti . bhayādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4270_0: bhayam varṣam . kim prayojanam . napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham . napuṃsakaliṅge ktādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4270_1: mā bhūvan iti . kalpādibhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ . kalpādibhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4270_2: . kalpaḥ arthaḥ mantraḥ . javasavau chandasi . javasavau chandasi vaktavyau . ūrvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4270_3: astu me javaḥ . ayam me pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_0: 334-335 kimartham niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ ap vidhīyate na acā eva siddham . na hi asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_1: viśeṣaḥ niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ apaḥ vā acaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_2: . hastādāne ceḥ ghañ prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārtham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . abvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_3: niścigrahaṇam anarthakam steyasya ghañvidhau pratiṣedhāt . abvidhau niścigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_4: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . steyasya ghañvidhau pratiṣedhāt . steyasya ghañvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_5: pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . niṣpūrvaḥ cinotiḥ steye vartate . asteyārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_6: . niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ asteye yathā syāt . asteyārtham iti cet na aniṣṭatvāt . asteyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_7: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭatvāt . na niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ asteye ap iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_8: . kim tarhi ghañ eva iṣyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ apam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_9: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yat tat antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitṛkāṇām iti tat niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_10: na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . niścayaḥ . eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_0: 335 vaśiraṇyoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . vaśiraṇyoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . saḥ vaśam saindhavam
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_1: . dhanañjayaḥ raṇe raṇe . ghañarthe kavidhānam sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham . ghañarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_2: kaḥ vidheyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham . sthā . pratiṣṭhante
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_3: asmin dhānyāni iti prasthaḥ . prasthe himavataḥ śrṅge . sthā . snā . prasnānti tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_4: iti prasnaḥ . snā . pā . prapibanti asyām iti prapā . pā . vyadhi . āvidhyanti tena
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_5: āvidham . vyadhi . hani . vighnanti tasmin manāṃsi vighnaḥ . hani . yudhi . āyudhyante tena āyudham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_0: 336 kasmāt ayam kaḥ vidhīyate . hanteḥ iti āha . tat hantigrahaṇam kartavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_1: kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . hanaḥ ca vadhaḥ . tat vai anekena
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_2: nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . na etāni nipātanāni . hanteḥ ete
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_3: ādeśāḥ . yadi ādeśāḥ ghanasvaraḥ na sidhyati . ghanaḥ . santu tarhi nipātanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_4: nanu ca uktam tat vai anekena nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_5: . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . atha vā punaḥ santu ādeśāḥ . nanu ca uktam svaraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_6: sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . akārāntaḥ ādeśaḥ . atha yadā iṣīkayā stambaḥ hanyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4276_7: katham tatra bhavitavyam . ke cid tāvat āhuḥ . stambaghnā iti bhavitavyam . apare āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_0: stambahetiḥ iti bhavitavyam . ūtiyūtijūtisātihetikīrtayaḥ ca iti nipātanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4277_1: apare āhuḥ . stambahananīiti bhavitavyam iti . vakṣyati etat . ajabbhyām strīīkhalanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4279_0: 336-337 yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve
GS24pmbhasuu:4279_1: samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . praśnaḥ iti . evan tarhi āṅit kariṣyate . aṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:4279_2: guṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yadi aṅit guṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . viśnaḥ iti . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4279_3: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4279_4: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . praśne ca āsannakāle iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_0: 337 striyām ktin ābādibhyaḥ ca . striyām ktin iti atra ābādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_1: . āptiḥ rāddhiḥ dīptiḥ . niṣṭhāyām vā seṭaḥ akāravacanāt siddham . atha vā niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_2: seṭaḥ akāraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi niṣṭhāyām seṭaḥ akāraḥ bhavati iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_3: sraṃsā dhvaṃsā iti na sidhyati . srastiḥ dhvastiḥ iti prāpnoti . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_4: trayaḥ eva ābādayaḥ āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . kim ca ataḥ . yadi parigaṇanam bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_5: bhavati . atha udāharaṇamātram na asti bhedaḥ . srasti dhvastiḥ iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_0: 338 sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaprasaṅgaḥ . sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaḥ ktin prāpnoti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_1: yathā eva aṅam bādhate evam ṇvuliñau api bādheta . kām tvam sthāyikām asthāḥ . kām
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_2: sthāyim . siddham tu aṅvidhāne sthādipratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . aṅvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_3: eva sthādipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pratiṣiddhe tasmin ktin eva bhaviṣyati . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_4: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaprasaṅgaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4310_0: (P_3,3.127) KA_157.2-7 Ro_III,345-346 khal kartṛkaraṇayoḥ cvyarthayoḥ . khal kartṛkaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4310_1: cvyarthayoḥ iti vaktavyam . anāḍhyena bhavatā īṣadāḍhyena śakyam bhavitum īṣadāḍhyambhavam
