GS24pmbhasuu:4310_3: . kartṛkarmagrahaṇam ca upapadasañjñārtham draṣṭavyam . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4311: abhidheyayoḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:4314: 346 bhāṣāyām śāsiyudhidṛśidhṛṣibhyaḥ yuc . bhāṣāyām śāsiyudhidṛśidhṛṣibhyaḥ yuc vaktavyaḥ . duḥśāsanaḥ duryodhanaḥ durdarśanaḥ durdharṣaṇaḥ . mṛṣeḥ ca iti vaktavyam . durmarṣaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_0: 346-348 vatkaraṇam kimartham . vartamānasāmīpye vartmānāḥ vā iti iyati ucyamāne vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_1: ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ vartamānasāmīpye dhātumātrāt syuḥ . vatkaraṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_2: na doṣaḥ bhavati . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa vartamāne pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_3: vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa vartamānasāmīpye bhavanti tataḥ amīvartamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_4: kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amīvartamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_5: kṛtāḥ syuḥ . iha vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavat vā iti uktvā loṭ eva udāhriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_6: yadi punaḥ vā laṭ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . vartamānasāmīpye
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_8: śatrādyartham . śatrādyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi pacan . eṣaḥ asmi pacamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_9: iti . na etat asti prayojanam . laḍādeśau śatṛśānacau . tatra vā laṭ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_10: eva siddham . yau tarhi alaḍādeśau . eṣaḥ asmi pavamānaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi yajamānaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_11: yau ca api laḍādeśau tau api prayojayataḥ . vartamānavihitasya laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_12: ucyete . aviśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ ca ayam yogaḥ . śatrādyartham iti khalu api ucyate . bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4316_13: ca śatrādayaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi alaṅkariṣṇuḥ . eṣaḥ asmi prajaniṣṇuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4318_0: 347 āśaṃsā nāma bhaviṣyatkālā . āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadatideśe laṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4318_1: āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadatideśe laṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4318_2: anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apavādasya nimittābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4318_3: . na atra apavādasya nimittam asti . katham . anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . anadyatane
GS24pmbhasuu:4318_4: hi tau vidhīyete laṅliṭau . na ca atra anadyatanaḥ kālaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bhūtakālasāmānyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_0: 348-350 āśaṃsāsambhāvanayoḥ aviśeṣāt tadvidhānasya aprāptiḥ . āśaṃsā sambhāvanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_1: iti aviśiṣṭau etau arthau . āśaṃsāsambhāvanayoḥ aviśeṣāt tadvidhānasya aprāptiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_2: āśaṃsāyām ye vidhīyante te sambhāvane api prāpnuvanti . ye ca sambhāvane vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_3: te āśaṃsāyām api prāpnuvanti . kim tarhi ucyate aprāptiḥ iti . na sādhīyaḥ prāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_4: bhavati . iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . na sarve sarvatra iṣyante . na vā sambhāvanāvayavatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_5: āśaṃsāyāḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sambhāvanāvayavatvāt āśaṃsāyāḥ . sambhāvanāvayavātmikā
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_6: āśaṃsā . āśaṃsā nāma pradhāritaḥ arthaḥ abhinītaḥ ca anabhinītaḥ ca . sambhāvanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_7: nāma pradhāritaḥ arthaḥ abhinītaḥ eva. arthāsandehaḥ vā alamarthatvāt sambhāvanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_8: . atha vā arthāsandehaḥ eva punaḥ asya . kim kāraṇam . alamarthatvāt sambhāvanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_9: . sambhāvane ālamarthyam gamyate āsaṃśāyām punaḥ anālamarthyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_10: jñāpayati sambhāvane api anālamarthyam gamyate iti yat ayam sambhāvane alam iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:4320_11: . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate na vā sambhāvanāvayavatvāt āśaṃsāyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_0: 350 kṣipravacane lṛaḥ āśaṃsāvacane liṅ vipratiṣedhena . kṣipravacane lṛaḥ āśaṃsāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_1: liṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kṣipravacane lṛṭ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ . upādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_2: cet āgataḥ kṣipram adhyeṣyāmahe . āśaṃsāvacabe liṅ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ . upādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_3: cet āgataḥ āśaṃse yuktaḥ adhīyīya . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . upādhyāyaḥ cet āgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_4: āśaṃse kṣipram adhīyīya . liṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_0: 350-351 aniṣpanne niṣpannaśabdaḥ śiṣyaḥ aniṣpannatvāt . aniṣpanne niṣpannaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_1: śiṣyaḥ śāsitavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aniṣpannatvāt . devaḥ cet vṛṣṭaḥ niṣpannāḥ śālayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_2: . tatra bhavitavyam sampatsyante śālayaḥ iti . siddham tu bhaviṣyatpratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_3: siddham etat . katham . bhaviṣyatpratiṣedhāt . yat lokaḥ bhaviṣyadvācinaḥ śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_4: prayogam na mṛṣyati . kaḥ cit āha . devaḥ cet vṛṣṭaḥ sampatsyante śālayaḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_5: ucyate . mā evam vocaḥ . sampannāḥ śālayaḥ iti evam brūhi . hetubhūtakālasamprekṣitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_6: vā . hetubhūtakālasamprekṣitatvāt vā punaḥ siddham etat . hetubhūtakālam varṣam varṣākālā
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_7: ca kriyā . yadi tarhi niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ kim niṣpannakāryāṇi na kriyante . kāni . bhojanādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_8: . anyat idānīm etat ucyate kim niṣpannakāryāṇi na kriyante iti . yat tu tat niṣpannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_9: arthaḥ na niṣpannaḥ iti . saḥ niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ . avaśyam khalu api koṣṭhagateṣu api
GS24pmbhasuu:4324_10: śāliṣu avahananādīni pratīkṣyāṇi . evam iha api niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ . avaśyam tu jananādīni pratīkṣyāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_0: 351-352 astyarthānām bhavantyarthe sarvāḥ vibhaktayaḥ . astyarthānām bhavantyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_1: sarvāḥ vibhaktayaḥ . kūpaḥ asti . kūpaḥ bhaviṣyati . kūpaḥ bhavitā . kūpaḥ abhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_2: . kūpaḥ āsīt . kūpaḥ babhūva iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhavantyāḥ eṣaḥ arthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_3: . kartuḥ vidyamānatvāt . kartā atra vidyate . katham punaḥ jñāyate kartā atra vidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_4: iti . kūpaḥ anena kadā cit dṛṣṭaḥ . na ca asya kam cid api apāyam paśyati . saḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_5: tatra buddhyā nityām sattām adhyavasyati . kūpaḥ asti iti . siddham tu yathāsvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_6: kālasamuccāraṇāt . siddham etat . katham . yathāsvam etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_7: kāleṣu prayujyante iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate yathāsvam etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_8: kāleṣu prayujyante iti . avātvāt . yat na vā bhāṣyante . asiddhaviparyāsaḥ ca . asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_9: ca viparyāsaḥ . na hi kaḥ cit kūpaḥ asti iti prayoktavye kūpaḥ abhūt iti prayuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_10: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam . na vā bhāṣyante asiddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ . iha kim cit indriyakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_11: kim cit buddhikarma . indriyakarma samāsādanam buddhikarmavyavasāyaḥ . evam hi kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_12: cit pāṭaliputram jigamiṣuḥ āha . yaḥ ayam adhvā gantavyaḥ ā pāṭaliputrāt etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_13: kūpaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsādya atikramya uṣitvā kūpaḥ āsīt iti . samāsādya atikramya
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_14: uṣitvā vismṛtya kūpaḥ babhūva iti . tat yadā indriyakarma tadā etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4326_15: yadā hi buddhikarma tadā vartamānā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_0: 353-354 kimartham imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete na adyatanavat iti eva ucyeta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_1: anadyatanavatpratiṣedhe laṅluṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . na anadyatanavatpratiṣedhe laṅluṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_2: pratiṣedhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . adyatanavadvacane hi vidhānam . adyatanavadvacane hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_3: vidhiḥ iyam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra laḍvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . tatra laḍvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_4: prasajyeta . luṅlṛṭoḥ ca ayathākālam . luṅlṛṭoḥ ca ayathākālam prayogaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_5: . luṅaḥ api viṣaye lṛṭ syāt lṛṭaḥ ca viṣaye luṅ syāt . adya punaḥ ayam dvau pratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_6: uktvā tūṣṇīm āste . yathāprāptem eva adyatane bhaviṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4330_0: 354-355 kimartham idam ucyate na na anadyatanavat iti eva siddham . bhaviṣyati maryādāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4330_1: avarasmin iti akriyāprabandhārtham . akriyāprabandhārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4330_2: akriyāprabandhaḥ . na punaḥ kriyāprabandhārthaḥ api syāt . kriyāprabandhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4330_3: cet vacanānarthakyam . kriyāprabandhārtham iti cet vacanam anarthakam . siddham kriyāprabandhe

GS24pmbhasuu:4362_0: 362-365 katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate . nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti āhosvit nimantraṇādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_1: gamyamāneṣu iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti cet āmantrayai
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_2: nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt . nimantraṇādīīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_3: arthe iti cet āmantrayai nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_4: . prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt . prakṛtyā abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā pratyayaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_5: . dvivacanabahuvanāprasiddhiḥ ca ekārthatvāt . dvivacanabahuvanayoḥ ca a prasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_6: . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ nimantraṇam nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_7: eva prāpnoti . astu tarhi nimantraṇādiṣu gamyamāneṣu . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_8: bhavantam āmantrayate . devadattaḥ bhavantam nimantrayate iti . siddham tu dvitīyākāṅkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_9: prakṛte pratyayārthe pratyayavidhānāt . siddham etat . katham . dvitīyākāṅkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_10: dhātoḥ prakṛte pratyayārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . ke ca prakṛtāḥ arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_11: . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ . bhavet siddham prāpnotu bhavān āmantraṇam anubhavatu bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_12: amantraṇam iti yatra dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkyate . idam tu na sidhyati āmantrayai nimantrayai
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_13: iti . atra api dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkyate . kaḥ . nimantriḥ eva . āmantrayai āmantraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_14: nimantrayai nimantraṇam . katham punaḥ nimnatriḥ nimantraṇam ākāṅkṣet . dṛṣṭaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_15: bhāvena bhāvayogaḥ . tat yathā iṣiḥ iṣiṇā yujyate strītvam ca strītvena . yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_16: atra dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkṣyate asti tarhi nimantraṇādīnām arthe iti . nanu ca uktam nimantraṇādīīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_17: arthe iti cet āmantrayai nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_18: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yaḥ asau dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkṣyate saḥ eva mama pratyayārthaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_19: . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ dvivacanabahuvanāprasiddhiḥ ca ekārthatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_20: . supām karmādayaḥ api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_21: karmādayaḥ ca . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_22: . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4362_23: . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam

GS24pmbhasuu:4364_0: 365-366 kimartham praiṣādiṣu artheṣu kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante na aviśeṣeṇa vihitāḥ kṛtyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4364_1: te praiṣādiṣu bhaviṣyanti anyatra ca . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vidhānam niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4364_2: niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . praiṣādiṣu eva kṛtyāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4364_3: vacanam niyamārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vacanam niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4364_4: iti cet tat aniṣṭam prāpnoti . na hi praiṣādiṣu eva kṛtyāḥ iṣyante . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4364_5: aviśeṣeṇa iṣyante . busopendhyam tṛṇopendhyam ghanghātyam . vidhyartham tu striyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4364_6: prāk iti vacanāt . vidhyartham tu praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vacanam . ayam praiṣādiṣu loṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:4364_7: vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitān kṛtyān bādheta . vāsarūpeṇa kṛtyāḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4364_8: bhaviṣyanti . na syuḥ . kim kāraṇam . striyāḥ prāk iti vacanāt . prāk striyāḥ vā asarūpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4366_0: 366 prathamānteṣu iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . kāle bhuṅkte . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4366_1: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . praiṣādiṣu iti vartate . tat ca avaśyam praiṣādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4366_2: anuvartyam . prathamānteṣu iti hi ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta . kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_1: kartavyam hiḥ parasmaipadānām yathā syāt svaḥ ātmanepadānām iti . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_2: . lādeśapratiṣedhārtham . lādeśau hisvau mā bhūtām iti . kim ca syāt yadi lādeśau
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_3: hisvau syātām . tiṅantam padam iti padasañjñā na syāt . māt bhūt evam . subantam
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_4: padam iti padasañjñā bhaviṣyati . katham svādyutpattiḥ . lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_5: tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . lakāraḥ kṛt . tasya kṛttvāt kṛt prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_6: . prātipadikāśrayā svādyutpattiḥ api bhaviṣyati . yadi svādyutpattiḥ supām śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_7: prāpnoti . avyayāt iti subluk bhaviṣyati . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_8: ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam iti avyayasañjñā . iha tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_9: saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_10: . samasaṅkhyārtham ca . samasaṅkhyārtham ca hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_11: kartavyam hiḥ parasmaipadānām yathā syāt svaḥ ātmanepadānām . vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_12: iti . na vā tadhvamoḥ ādeśavacanam jñāpakam padādeśasya . na vā hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_13: kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . tadhvamoḥ ādeśavacanam jñāpakam padādeśasya . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_14: vā ca tadhvamoḥ iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ padādeśau hisvau iti . tatra padādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_15: pittvāṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra padādeśe pittvasya āṭaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_16: pittvasya tāvat . saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti . āṭaḥ khalu api .
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_17: saḥ aham lunīhi lunīhi iti evam lunāni . pittvasya tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . pitpratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_18: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . iha seḥ hi bhavati . tataḥ apit ca . apit ca bhavati yāvān
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_19: hiḥ nāma . āṭaḥ ca api na vaktavyaḥ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_0: āṭ kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt āḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_1: kṛte api āṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . āṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_2: akṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ āṭ . anyasya kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_3: prāpnoti . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ādeśaḥ api anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_4: . anyasya kṛte āṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_5: bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt āḍāgamaḥ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_6: . idam tarhi saḥ aham bhuṅkṣva bhuṅkṣva iti evam bhunajai iti śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_7: akāralopaḥ na prāpnoti . samasaṅkhyārthatvam ca api aparihṛtam eva. siddham tu loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_8: kriyāsamabhihāre dvirvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_9: kriyāsamabhihāre dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kena vihitasya kriyāsamabhihāre loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_10: dvirvacanam ucyate . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati kriyāsamabhihāre loṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_11: yat ayam kriyāsamabhihāre loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya dvirvacanam śāsti . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_12: nu khalu etat jñāpakāt atra loṭ bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ yaḥ eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_13: saḥ yadā kriyāsamabhihāre bhavati tadā asya dvirvacanam bhavati iti . loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_14: eva khalu api siddham syāt . imau ca anyau hisvau sarveṣām puruṣāṇām sarveṣām vacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_15: iṣyete . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4369_16: lādeśapratiṣedhārtham . samasaṅkhyārtham ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4370: . tataḥ loṭaḥ hisvau bhavataḥ . loṭ iti eva anuvartate . loṭaḥ yau hisvau iti . katham vā ca tadhvamoḥ iti . vā ca tadhvambhāvinaḥ loṭaḥ iti evam etat vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4372_0: 373 kimartham idam ucyate . anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . hisvāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:4372_1: avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4372_2: idam tarhi prayojanam . yathāvidhi iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4372_3: . samuccaye sāmānyavacanasya iti vakṣyati . tatra antareṇa vacanam yathāvidhi anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_0: 373-374 kimartham idam ucyate . anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_1: . hisvāntam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_2: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . sāmānyavacanasya iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api
GS24pmbhasuu:4374_3: na asti prayojanam . sāmānyavacanasya anuprayogaḥ astu viśeṣavacanasya iti sāmānyavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4376_1: narthakam . kim kāraṇam . liṅarthatvāt . liṅarthe leṭ iti eva siddham . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4376_2: liṅarthaḥ . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ . hetuhetumatoḥ liṅ iti . apare āhuḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4377: vaktavyaḥ eva etasmin viśeṣe liṅ . prayujyate hi loke yadi me bhavān idam kuryāt aham api te idam dadyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_0: 375 tumarthe iti ucyate . kaḥ tumarthaḥ . kartā . yadi evam na arthaḥ tumarthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_1: . yena eva khalu api hetunā kartari tumun bhavati tena eva hetunā sayādayaḥ api bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_2: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tumarthagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_3: kartuḥ tumunaḥ arthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asau . bhāvaḥ . kutaḥ nu khalu etat bhāve tumun
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_4: bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ karmādiṣu kārakeṣu iti . jñāpakāt ayam kartuḥ apakṛṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_5: na ca anyasmin arthe ādiśyate . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_6: bhaviṣyati tat yathā guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . saḥ asau svārthe bhavan
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_7: bhāve bhaviṣyati . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . avyayakṛtaḥ bhāve bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_0: (P_3,4.19) KA_171.19-172.4 Ro_III,375-376 kimartham meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_1: grahaṇam kriyate na udīcām meṅaḥ iti eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . udīcām
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_2: meṅaḥ iti vyatihāragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . tadviṣayaḥ hi saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_3: . vaytihāraviṣayaḥ eva mayatiḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_4: āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_5: bhavati iti .kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . tatra asarūpasarvādeśadāppratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_6: pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ anākārāntatvāt iti uktam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_7: punaḥ idam ucyate na samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle iti eva siddham . apūrvakālārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4380_8: ayam ārambhaḥ . pūrvam hi asau yācate paścāt apamayate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4383: pūrvam bhuṅkte paścāt vrajati . svaśabdena uktatvāt na bhavati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_0: pūrvam bhuktvā tataḥ vrajati iti . na etat kriyāpaurvakālyam . kim tarhi . kartṛpaurvakālyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4384_1: . pūrvam hi asau bhuktvā anyebhyaḥ bhoktṛbhyaḥ tataḥ paścāt vrajati anyebhyaḥ vrajitṛbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4385_0: āsyate bhoktum iti . kutaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . kim āseḥ āhosvit bhujeḥ . bhujeḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4385_1: na bhavati . apūrvakālatvāt . āseḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . yasmāt atra laṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4385_2: . etat atra praṣṭavyam . laṭ atra katham bhavati iti . laṭ ca atra vāsarūpeṇa bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_0: 377-378 samānakartṛkayoḥ iti bahuṣu aprāptiḥ . samānakartṛkayoḥ iti bahuṣu ktvā na
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_1: prāpnoti . snātvā bhuktvā pītvā vrajati iti . kim puna kāraṇam na sidhyati . dvivacananirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_2: . dvivacanena ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate . tena dvayoḥ eva paurvakālye syāt . bahūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_3: na syāt . siddham tu kriyāpradhanatvāt . siddham etat . katham . kriyāpradhanatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_4: . kriyāpradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_5: nāma nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_6: atra dvivacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit vacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_7: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam satuṣam sapalālam āharati
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_8: nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_9: cit māṃsārthī matsyān saśakalān sakaṇṭakān āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_10: tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt dvivacanena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_11: kriyate . na hi atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . evam api lokavijñānāt na sidhyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_12: . loke brāhmaṇānām pūrvam ānīyatām iti ukte sarvapūrvaḥ ānīyate . evam iha api sarvapūrvāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_13: kriyāyāḥ prāpnoti . anantyavacanāt tu siddham . samānakartṛkayoḥ anantyasya iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_14: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam samānakartṛkayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_15: iti bahuṣu aprāptiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat siddham tu kriyāpradhanatvāt iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_16: ca uktam evam api lokavijñānāt na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ sarveṣām atra vrajikriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_17: prati paurvakālyam . snātvā vrajati bhuktvā vrajati pītvā vrajati iti . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4387_18: prayogaḥ aniyataḥ bhavati . snātvā bhuktva pītvā vrajati . pītvā snātvā bhutvā vrajati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4389_0: 379 vyādāya svapiti iti upasaṅkhyānam apūrvakālatvāt . vyādāya svapiti iti upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4389_1: kartavyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . apūrvakālatvāt . pūrvam hi asau svapiti
GS24pmbhasuu:4389_2: paścāt vyādadāti . na vā svapnasya avakālatvāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4389_3: svapnasya avakālatvāt . avarakālaḥ svapnaḥ . avaśyam asau vyādāya muhurtam api svapiti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4391_0: 379-381 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:4391_1: . ābhīkṣṇye iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prāpte ābhīkṣṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:4391_2: aniṣṭā vibhāṣā prāpnoti anyatra ca iṣṭā na sidhyati . atha aprāpte . agrādiṣu aprāptavidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4391_3: samāsapratiṣedhaḥ . agrādiṣu aprāptavidheḥ samāsapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4391_4: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam etat amā eva avyayena iti atra evakārakaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4391_5: prajojanam . amā eva avyayena yat tulyavidhānam upapadam tatra samāsaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4391_6: . amā ca anyena ca yat tulyavidhānam upapadam tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4393_0: 381 kimartham svādumi makārāntatvam nipātyate na khamuñ prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4393_1: . svādumi māntanipātanam īkārābhāvārtham . svādumi māntanipātanam kriyate īkārābhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4393_2: . īkāraḥ mā bhūt iti . svādvīm kṛtvā yavāgūm bhuṅkte . svāduṅkāram yavāgūm bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:4393_3: . cvyantasya ca makārāntārtham . cvyantasya ca makārāntatvam nipātyate . asvādu svādu
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_0: 382-385 ā ca tumunaḥ samānādhikaraṇe . ā ca tumunaḥ pratyayāḥ samānādhikaraṇe vaktavyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_1: . kena . anuprayogeṇa . kim prayojanam . svāduṅkāram yavāgūḥ bhujyate devadattena
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_2: iti devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ṇamulā abhihitaḥ kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_3: iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena anabhihitaḥ kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_4: bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_5: iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā yavāgvām dvitīyā prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_6: kāraṇam . ṇamulā anabhihitam karma iti . yadi punaḥ ayam karmaṇi vijñāyeta ṇa evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_7: śakyam . iha hi svāduṅkāram yavāgūm bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti yavāgvām dvitīyā na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_8: . kim kāraṇam . ṇamulā abhihitam karma iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena anabhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_9: karma iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_10: ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_11: dvitīyā devadatte tṛtīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ṇamulā anabhihitaḥ kartā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_0: paktvā odanaḥ bhujyate devadattena iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_1: . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ktvayā abhihitaḥ kartā iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena anabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_2: kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_3: anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_4: tṛtīyā odane dvitīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ktvayā anabhihitam karma iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_5: punaḥ ayam karmaṇi vijñāyeta ṇa evam śakyam . iha hi paktvā odanam bhuṅkte devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_6: iti odane dvitīyā na syāt . kim kāraṇam . ktvayā abhihitam karma iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_7: anabhihitam karma iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā . yadi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_8: abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_9: bhaviṣyati dvitīyā devadatte tṛtīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ktvayā anabhihitaḥ kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_10: iti . atha anena tumuni arthaḥ . bhoktum odanaḥ pacyate devadattena . bāḍham arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_11: . devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . tumunā abhihitaḥ kartā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_12: . nanu ca pacipratyayena anabhihitaḥ kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_13: tṛtīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_14: vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā odane dvitīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . tumunā anabhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_15: karma iti . yadi punaḥ ayam karmaṇi vijñāyeta ṇa evam śakyam . iha hi bhoktum odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_16: pacati devadattaḥ iti odane dvitīyā na syāt . kim kāraṇam . tumunā abhihitam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_17: iti . nanu ca pacipratyayena anabhihitam karma iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_18: bhaviṣyati dvitīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_19: iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā devadatte tṛtīyā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_20: kim kāraṇam . tumunā anabhihitaḥ kartā iti . atha anena iha arthaḥ paktvā odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_21: grāmaḥ gamyate devadattena . bāḍham arthaḥ . devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_22: kāraṇam na syāt . ktvayā abhihitaḥ kartā iti . nanu ca gamipratyayena anabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4396_23: kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4397_0: sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4397_1: vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā yat uktam odane dvitīyā prāpnoti iti saḥ doṣaḥ na jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4397_2: . tat tarhi vaktavyam ā ca tumunaḥ samānādhikaraṇe iti . na vaktavyam . avyayakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4397_3: bhāve bhavanti iti bhāve bhaviṣyanti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4397_4: gaṃsyate . tumarthe iti vartate . tumarthaḥ ca kaḥ . bhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4399_0: 385 ūlopaścāsyānyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham goṣpadam vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4399_1: iti . prātiḥ pūraṇakarmā . tasmāt eṣaḥ kaḥ . yadi kaḥ vibhatīnām śravaṇam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4399_2: . śrūyante eva atra vibhaktayaḥ . tat yathā ekena goṣpadapreṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_0: 386 hanaḥ karaṇe anarthakam vacanam hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhānāt . hanaḥ karaṇe anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_1: vacanam . kim kāraṇam . hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhānāt . hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_2: . tena eva siddham . arthavat tu ahiṃsārthasya vidhānāt . arthavat tu hanteḥ ṇamulvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_3: . kaḥ arthaḥ . ahiṃsārthasya vidhānāt . ahiṃsārthānām ṇamul yathā syāt . asti punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_4: ayam kva cit hantiḥ ahiṃsārthaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha . pāṇyupaghātam
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_5: vedim hanti . nityasamāsārtham ca . nityasamāsārtham ca hiṃsārthāt api hanteḥ anena
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_6: vidhiḥ eṣitavyaḥ . katham punaḥ icchatā api hiṃsārthāt hanteḥ anena vidhiḥ labhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_7: . anena astu tena vā iti tena syāt vipratiṣedhena . hanteḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vārttikena
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_8: eva jñāpitaḥ . yat ayam nityasamāsārtham ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ hiṃsārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_9: api hanteḥ anena vidhiḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4403_0: 387 iha kasmāt na bhavati . grāme baddhaḥ iti . evam vakṣyāmi . adhikaraṇe bandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4403_1: sañjñāyām . tataḥ kartroḥ jīvapuruṣayoḥ naśivahoḥ iti . katham aṭṭālikābandham baddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4403_2: caṇḍālikābanadham baddhaḥ . upamāne karmaṇi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4405: 387 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . tiraści iti bhavitavyam . sautraḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4407_0: 387-388 arthagrahaṇam kimartham . nādhāpratyaye iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt dvidhākṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:4407_1: . iha na syāt dvaidhaṅkṛtya . arthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . nādhāpratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:4407_2: siddham bhavati yaḥ ca anyaḥ tena samānārthaḥ . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4407_3: mā bhūt hiruk kṛtvā pṛthak kṛtvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4409: 388 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . anūci iti bhavitavyam . sautraḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_0: 388-393 kimartham idam ucyate . kartari kṛdvacanam anādeśe svāṛthavijñānāt . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_1: kṛtaḥ bhavanti iti ucyate anādeśe svāṛthavijñānāt . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_2: bhavanti . tat yathā . guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . evam ime api pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_3: svārthe syuḥ . svārthe mā bhūvan kartari yathā syuḥ iti evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_4: na etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati svārthe āha tam . bhāve ghañ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_5: karmaṇi tarhi mā bhūvan iti . karmaṇi api yam icchati āha tam . dhaḥ karmaṇi ṣṭran
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_6: iti . karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ tarhi mā bhūvan iti . karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ api yam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_7: āha tam . lyuṭ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ bhavati iti . sampradānāpādānayoḥ tarhi mā bhūvan
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_8: iti . sampradānāpādānayoḥ api yam icchati āha tam . dāśagoghnau sampradāne bhīmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_9: apādāne iti . yaḥ idānīm anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ saḥ antareṇa vacanam kartari eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_10: . tat eva tarhi prayojanam svārthe mā bhūvan iti . nanu ca uktam yam icchati svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_11: āha tam . bhāve ghañ bhavati iti . anyaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ bāhyaḥ prakṛtyarthāt . anena
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_12: idānīm ābhyantare bhāve syuḥ . tatra mā bhūvan iti kartṛgrahaṇam . kaḥ punaḥ anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_13: bhāvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . uktaḥ bhāvabhedaḥ bhāṣye . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_14: . tatra khyunādipratiṣedhaḥ nānāvākyatvāt . tatra khyunādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_15: . khyunādayaḥ kartari mā bhūvan iti . nanu ca karaṇe khunādayaḥ vidhīyante . te kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_16: na bhaviṣyanti . tena ca karaṇe syuḥ anena ca kartari . nanu ca apavādatvāt khyunādayḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_17: bādhakāḥ syuḥ . na syuḥ . kim kāraṇam . nānāvākyatvāt . nānāvākyam tat ca idam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_18: . samānavākye apavādaiḥ utsargāhḥ bādhyante . nānāvākyatvāt bādhanam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_19: . tadvat ca kṛtyeṣu evakārakaraṇam . evam ca kṛtvā kṛtyeṣu evakāraḥ kriyate . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_20: eva kṛtyaktakhalarthāḥ iti bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . kim prayojanam . tat ca bhavyādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_21: . bhavyādiṣu samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . geyāni māṇavakena
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_22: sāmāni iti . ṛṣidevatayoḥ tu kṛdbhiḥ samāveśavacanam jñāpakam asamāveśasya . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_23: ayam kartari ca ṛṣidevatayoḥ iti siddhe sati samāveśe samāveśārtham cakāram śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_24: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na bhavati samāveśaḥ iti . kimartham tarhi kṛtyeṣu evakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_25: kriyate . evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe . evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe draṣṭavyam . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_26: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyā bhavanti bhavyādīnām kartari ca iti . kim prayojanam . tat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_27: bhavyādyartham . bhavyādiṣu samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām .
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_28: geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti . yat tāvat ucyate ṛṣidevatayoḥ tu kṛdbhiḥ samāveśavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_29: jñāpakam asamāveśasya iti . na etat jñāpakasādhyam apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ apavādaiḥ bādhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_30: iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyeran . nanu ca uktam nānāvākyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_31: bādhanam na prāpnoti iti . na videśastham iti kṛtvā nānāvākyam bhavati . videśastham
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_32: api sat ekavākyam bhavati . tat yathā dvitīye adhyāye luk ucyate . tasya caturthaṣaṣṭhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_33: aluk ucyate apavādaḥ . yat api ucyate evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe iti . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_34: anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . katham evakāraḥ cārthe vartate . saḥ eṣaḥ evakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_35: svārthe vartate . kim prayojanam . jñāpakārtham . etat jñāpayati acāryaḥ itaḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_36: samāveśaḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñapane prayojanam . tat ca bhavyādyartham . bhavyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_37: samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_38: . yadi etat jñapyate iha api samāveśaḥ prāpnoti dāśagoghnau sampradāne bhīmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_39: apādāne iti . atra api siddham bhavati . yat ayam ādikarmaṇi ktaḥ kartari ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_40: siddhe samāveśe samāveśam śāsti tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ prāk amutaḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4414: dhātoḥ paraḥ akāraḥ akaśabdaḥ vā niyogataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca bhavati pratyayasañjñaḥ ca iti . āhosvit sañjñāniyamaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4415_0: dhātoḥ paraḥ akāraḥ akaśabdaḥ vā svabhāvataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4415_1: pratyayasañjñaḥ ca iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4415_2: . tatra pratyayaniyame sati aniṣṭam prāpnoti . kāṣṭhabhit abrāhmaṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4416_0: balabhit abrāhmaṇaḥ . eṣaḥ api niyogataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca syāt pratyayasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4416_1: ca . sañjñāniyame siddham . sañjñāniyame sati siddham bhavati . yadi sañjñāniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4416_2: vibhaktādiṣu doṣaḥ . vibhaktāḥ bhrātaraḥ pītāḥ gāvaḥ iti na sidhyati . pratyayaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:4416_3: punaḥ sati parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ paraḥ ktaḥ niyogataḥ kartāram āha . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4416_4: imāḥ tatra parigaṇyante prakṛtayaḥ . vibhaktādiṣu ca aprāptiḥ prakṛteḥ pratyayaparavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4416_5: . vibhaktādiṣu ca pratyayaniyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . prakṛteḥ pratyayaparavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4416_6: . parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ paraḥ ktaḥ svabhāvataḥ kartāram āha . na ca imāḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4416_7: parigaṇyante . na tarhi idānīm ayam sādhuḥ bhavati . bhavati sādhuḥ na tu kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:4416_8: . katham tarhi idānīm atra kartṛtvam gamyate . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4417: vibhaktam eṣām asti vibhaktāḥ . pītam eṣām asti pitāḥ iti . atha vā uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . vibhaktadhanāḥ vibhaktāḥ . pītodakāḥ pitāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_0: 396-400 kimartham idam ucyate . laḥ eṣu sādhaneṣu yathā syāt kartari ca karmaṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_1: bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_2: vidhīyate śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam . etāvān ca laḥ yat uta parasmaipadam ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_3: ca . saḥ ca ayam evam vihitaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . lagrahaṇam sakarmakanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_4: . lagrahaṇam kriyate sakarmakanivṛttyartham . sakarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ mā bhūte iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_5: . yadi punaḥ tatra eva akarmakagrahaṇam kriyeta . tatra akarmakagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_6: . nanu ca iha api kriyate bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . parārtham etat bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_7: . tayoḥ eva kṛtyaktakhalarthāḥ bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ . yāvat iha lagrahaṇam tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_8: tatra akarmakagrahaṇam . iha vā lagrahaṇam kriyeta tatra vā akarmakagrahaṇam . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_9: nu atra viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . iha lagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_10: bhavati . tatra punaḥ akarmakagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari na prāpnoti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_11: api akarmakagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari siddhaḥ bhavati . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_12: iti ataḥ anyat yat ātmanepadānukramaṇam sarvam tat kartrartham . vipratiṣedhāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_13: ānaḥ kartari . vipratiṣedhāt vā ānaḥ kartari bhaviṣyati . tatra bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_14: etat astu kartari kṛt iti . kartari kṛt iti etat bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_15: tu . sarvebhyaḥ tu dhātubhyaḥ ānaḥ kartari prāpnoti . parasmaipadibhyaḥ api . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_16: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anudāttaṅitaḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_17: niyamārthaḥ vidhiḥ na prakalpate . āste śete iti . atha vidhyarthaḥ ānasya niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_18: na prāpnoti . āsīnaḥ śayānaḥ . tathā neḥ viśaḥ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yadi niyamāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_19: vidhiḥ na prakalpate . atha vidhyarthaḥ ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_20: . nanu ca uktam vidhiḥ na prakalpate iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_21: iti atra anudāttaṅitaḥ iti etat anuvartiṣyate . yadi anuvartate evam api anudāttaṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_22: eva bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam prāpnoti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_23: ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_24: bhavati anudāttaṅitaḥ iti eva . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti nivṛttam . tataḥ karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_25: . kartari iti eva anuvartate . anudāttaṅitaḥ iti api nivṛttam . yat api ucyate neḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_26: viśaḥ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yadi niyamārtham vidhiḥ na prakalpate . atha vidhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_27: ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti iti . astu vidhyartham . nanu ca uktam ānasya niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_28: na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva atra aprāptāḥ taṅaḥ bhavanti evam ānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_29: api bhaviṣyati . sarvatra aprasaṅgaḥ tu . sarveṣu tu sādhaneṣu ānaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_30: vipratiṣedhāt vā ānaḥ kartari iti bhāvakarmaṇoḥ na syāt . kartari eva syāt . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_31: punaḥ lagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe kartari kṛt iti etat astu laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_32: iti laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti etat bhaviṣyat vipratiṣedhena . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_33: tu . lādeśaḥ sarveṣu sādhaneṣu prāpnoti . śatṛkvasūca bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4419_34: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śeṣāt parasmaipadam kartari iti evam tau kartāram hriyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:4421: 400-402 lādeśe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt ḷādeśe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya lakārasya ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4422: lunāti labhate . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_0: evañjātīyakasya lakārasya ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_1: . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . arthavataḥ lakārasya grahaṇam na ca eṣaḥ artahvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_2: arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti cet na varṇagrahaṇeṣu . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_3: cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . varṇagrahaṇam idam . na ca etat varṇagrahaṇeṣu bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_4: arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti . tasmāt viśiṣtagrahaṇam . tasmāt viśiṣtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_5: lakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . dhātoḥ iti vartate . evam api śālā
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_6: mālā mallaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . evam api nandanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_7: atra prāpnoti . itsañjñā atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi bādheta . pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_8: paṭhati iti . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam liti
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_9: pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . liti iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_10: ca atra litam paśyāmaḥ . atha api katham cit vacanāt vā anuvartanāt vā itsañjñkānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_11: ādeśaḥ syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na lādeśe litkāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4423_12: iti yat ayam ṇalam litam karoti . atha api uṇādayaḥ vyutpādyante evam api no doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_0: 402 lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_1: . lādeśasya avakāśaḥ pacatu paṭhatu . varṇavidheḥ avakāśaḥ dadhyatra madhvatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_2: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pacatu atra . paṭhatu atra . lādeśaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4425_3: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_0: 403-404 ṭitaḥ etve ātmanepadeṣu ānapratiṣedhaḥ . ṭitaḥ etve ātmanepadeṣu ānapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_1: vaktavyaḥ . pacamānaḥ yajamānaḥ . ṭitaḥ iti etvam prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_2: . jñāpakam vā sānubandhakasya ādeśavacane itkāryābhāvasya iti . na etat asti uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_3: . evam kila tat uktam syāt yadi evam vijñāyeta . ṭit ātmanepadam ṭidātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_4: ṭidātmanepadānām iti . tat ca na . ṭitaḥ lakārasya yāni ātmanepadāni iti evam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_5: vijñāyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . ṭit ātmanepadam ṭidātmanepadam . ṭidātmanepadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_6: iti vijñāyamāne akurvi atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ ṭit . kaḥ tarhi . ṭhit . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_7: ca avaśyam ṭhit kartavyaḥ ādiḥ mā bhūt iti . katham iṭaḥ at iti . iṭhaḥ at iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_8: iti . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam paryavapādyasya mā bhūt . laviṣīṣṭa . iha tarhi iṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_9: ūrjam aham itaḥ ādi ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt ṭit eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_10: . ādiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . saptadaśa ādeśāḥ sthāneyogatvam prayojayanti . tān
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_11: ekaḥ na utsahate vihantum iti kṛtvā ādiḥ na bhaviṣyati . paryavapādyasya kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_12: bhavati . laviṣīṣṭa iti . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_13: tarhi uktam prākṛtānām ātmanepadānām etvam bhavati iti . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . tādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4427_14: . āne muk jñāpakam tu etve ṭittaṅām . iśisīricaḥ ḍārauraḥsu . ṭit aṭitaḥ . prakṛte tat . guṇe katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_0: 405-407 ṇalaḥ śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . ṇal śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sarvādeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_1: . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_2: bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta . uktam vā . kim uktam . anittvāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_3: ṇakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham . kaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ nyāyyaḥ . śakāram asi
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_4: coditaḥ . ṇakāram kariṣyāmi śakāram na kariṣyāmi iti . ṇakāraḥ atra kriyeta śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_5: vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . avaśyam atra ṇakāraḥ vṛddhyarthaḥ kartavyaḥ ṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_6: yathā syāt . na arthaḥ vṛddhyarthena ṇakāreṇa . ṇittve yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_7: asti gotaḥ ṇit . tataḥ al . al ca ṇit bhavati . tataḥ uttamaḥ vā iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_8: lakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham . kaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ nyāyyaḥ . śakāram asi
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_9: coditaḥ . lakāram kariṣyāmi śakāram na kariṣyāmi iti . lakāraḥ atra kriyeta śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_10: vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . avaśyam eva atra svarārthaḥ lakāraḥ kartavyaḥ liti pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_11: pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātusvare
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_12: kṛte dvirvacanam . tatra āntaryataḥ antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_13: punaḥ ayam antodāttaḥ syāt yadā ekāc . vyapadeśivadbhāvena . yathā eva tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_14: antodāttaḥ evam ādyudāttaḥ api . tatra āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_15: prasajyeta . satyam etat . na tu idam lakṣaṇam asti dhātoḥ ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_16: . idam punaḥ asti dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . saḥ asau lakṣaṇena antodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_17: . tatra āntaryataḥ antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . etat api ādeśe na
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_18: asti ādeśasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . prakṛtitaḥ anena svaraḥ labhyaḥ . prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_19: ca asya yathā eva antodāttā evam ādyudāttā api . dviḥprayoge ca api dvirvacane ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_20: antodāttatvam prasajyeta . anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_21: . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt svarārthaḥ lakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . lakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_0: 407-408 akārasya śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . akāraḥ śitkartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_1: . sarvādeśārtham . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_2: alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta . nanu ca akārasya akāravacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_3: prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_4: akārasya akāravacane prayojanam . kim . akāravacanam samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_5: yathā syāt . tasmāt śitkaraṇam . tasmāt śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_6: nyāse eva . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . a* a* a . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4433_1: vaktavyaḥ . yāntu vāntu . laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . utvavacanāt

GS24pmbhasuu:4451_5: tarati tvacā tarati iti . etat hi samartham dvyac . iha ca na syāt ghaṭena tarati
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_6: iti . etat hi samartham samartham advyac . asti punaḥ samarthaviśeṣaṇe sati kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_7: iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati āhosvit doṣāntam eva . asti iti āha . kim . sāmnā tarati
GS24pmbhasuu:4451_8: vemnā tarati iti . etat hi samartham api ṅyāpprātipadikam api .
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_0: 428-438 atha ṅyābgrahaṇam kimartham na prātipadikāt iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_1: . apratyayaḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . yadi eṣaḥ ṅyābgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_2: hetuḥ tyūgrahaṇam api kartavyam . tau api hi pratyayau . tigrahaṇe tāvat vārttam
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_3: . taddhitaḥ prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati . ūgrahaṇe ca api vārttam
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_4: . uvarṇāntāt ūṅ vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_5: bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ ūṅaḥ agrahaṇe hetuḥ ābgrahaṇam api na kartavyam . āp api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_6: akārāntāt vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_7: bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi anakārāntāt . kruñcā uṣṇihā devaviśā iti . atra api akārāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_8: vṛttiḥ lakṣyate . kruñcān ālabheta . uṣṇihakakubhau . devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_9: iti . iha tāvat uṣṇihakakubhau iti . āpaḥ eva etat auttarapadikam hrasvatvam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_10: khalu api devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca iti . na asti viśeṣaḥ akārāntāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_11: vyañjanāntāt vā iti . yat tāvat ucyate iha tāvat uṣṇihakakubhau iti . āpaḥ eva etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_12: auttarapadikam hrasvatvam iti . sañjñācchandasoḥ iti evam tat . na ca eṣā sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_13: na api idam chandaḥ . yat api ucyate iha khalu api devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_14: . na asti viśeṣaḥ akārāntāt utpattau satyām vyañjanāntāt vā iti . svare viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_15: yadi atra vyañjanāntāt utpattiḥ syāt devaviśam iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . devaviśam
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_16: iti ca iṣyate . tasmāt kaḥ eṣaḥ evamviṣayaḥ . idam tarhi pādaḥ anyatarasyām ṭāp ṛci
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_17: iti . ṛci iti ucyate . tatra chāndasatvāt bhaviṣyati . ṛci iti na idam chandaḥ vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_18: kāṭhakam kāpālakam amudakam paippalādakam vā . kim tarhi . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_19: etat . ṛk cet pratyayārthaḥ bhavati iti . etat api na asti prayojanam padaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_20: pādaśabdasamānārthaḥ akārāntaḥ chandasi dṛśyate . tasyāḥ saptākṣaram ekam padam eakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_21: pādaḥ iti arthaḥ . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi ḍāp ubhābhyām anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_22: iti . bahurājā bahurāje bahurājāḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇam anarthakam prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_23: api grahaṇāt . ṅyābgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_24: api grahaṇāt . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_25: kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā kriyate ābgrahaṇam vā . avaśyam eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_26: paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . kāni . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_28: suṭ iha eva syāt teṣām yeṣām . tāsām yāsām iti atra na syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_29: . avarṇāntāt ṭāp vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt suṭ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_30: . idam tarhi prayojanam . sarvanāmnaḥ tṛtīyā ca iha eva syāt bhavatā hetunā bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_31: hetoḥ iti . bhavatyā hetunā bhavatyāḥ hetoḥ iti atra na syāt . sarvanāma . svara
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_32: . kuśūlakūpakumbhaśālam bile iha eva syāt kuśūlabilam . kuśūlībilam iti atra na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_33: . svara . samāsa . dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ saha samasyate iha eva syāt kaṣṭam śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_34: kaṣṭaśritaḥ . kaṣṭam śritā kaṣṭaśritā iti atra na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_35: . śritaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_36: . idam tarhi . pūrvasadṛśa iti iha eva syāt pitrā sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ . pitrā sadṛśī
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_37: pitṛsadṛśī iti atra na syāt . samāsaḥ . taddhitavidhi . acittahiastidhenoḥ ṭhak iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_38: eva syāt hastinām samūhaḥ hāstikam . hastinīnām samūhaḥ hāstikam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_0: atra na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . puṃvadbhāvena etat siddham . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_1: . pramāṇe dvayasac yathā iha bhavati hastidvayasam hastimātram evam hastinīdvayasam
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_2: hastinīmātram iti api yathā syāt . taddhitavidhi . luk . na indsiddhabadhnātiṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_3: iha eva syāt sthaṇḍilaśāyī . sthaṇḍilaśāyinī iti atra na syāt . luk . aluk . śayavāsavāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_4: akālāt iha eva syāt grāmevāsī . grāmevāsinī iti atra na syāt . mānini ca vidhipratiṣedhāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_5: . mānini ca vidhipratiṣedhāṛtham prayojanam . vidhyartham tāvat . kyaṅmāninoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_6: iha eva syāt darśanīyamānī . darśanīyamāninī iti atra na syāt . pratiṣedhārtham api
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_7: . vakyāti śvāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini . tasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva syāt dīrghamukhamānī
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_8: . dīrghamukhamāninī iti atra na syāt . pratyayagrahaṇopacāreṣu ca . pratyayagrahaṇopacāreṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4454_9: ca prayojanam . tṛjakābhyām kartari iha eva syāt apām sraṣṭā . apām sraṣṭrī iti atra na syāt . upacāra :
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_0: ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbha itha eva syāt ayaskumbhaḥ . ayaskumbhī iti atra na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_1: etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . etasyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_2: satyām na arthaḥ ṅyābgrahaṇena . atiprasaṅgaḥ upapadavidhau . upapadavidhau atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_3: bhavati . dviṣatparayoḥ tāpeḥ yathā iha bhavati dviṣantapaḥ iti evam dviṣatītapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_4: iti atra api syāt . yañiñoḥ phaki . yañiñoḥ phaki atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_5: bhavati gārgyāyaṇaḥ dākṣāyaṇaḥ evam gārgeyaḥ dākṣeyaḥ iti atra api syāt . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_6: doṣaḥ . ḍhak atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsānteṣu ca . samāsānteṣu ca atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_7: bhavati . rājāhasakhibhyaḥ ṭat yathā iha bhavati madrarājaḥ kaśmīrarājaḥ evam madrarājñī
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_8: kaśmīrarājñī iti atra api syāt . na vā bhavati madrarājī iti . bhavati yadā samāsāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_9: īkāraḥ . liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇe tu īkārāntāt samāsāntaḥ prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_10: . puṃvadbhāvaḥ ṭilopaḥ ca . tatra madrajī iti etat rūpam syāt . madrarājñī iti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_11: iṣyate . mahadāttve priyādiṣu . mahadāttve priyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . āt mahataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_12: samānādhikaraṇajātīyayoḥ iti yathā iha bhavati mahān priyaḥ asya mahāpriyaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_13: mahatī priyā asya mahatīpriyaḥ iti atra api syāt . kim ucyate priyādiṣu iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_14: puṃvadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tu na pratiṣidhyate bhavitavyam eva tatra āttvena
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_15: . ñnitsvare . ñnitsvare atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ñniti ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_16: bhavati dākṣiḥ ahicumbukāyaniḥ evam dākṣī ahicumbukāyanī iti atra api syāt . rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_17: svare brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ . rājñaḥ svare brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_18: ca brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ iti yathā iha bhavati rājakumāraḥ rājabrāhmaṇaḥ evam rājakumārī
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_19: rājabrāhmaṇī iti atra api syāt . samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu ca . samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_20: ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bahoḥ nañvat uttarapadabhūmni yathā iha bhavati bahugomān
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_21: bahuyavamān evam bahugomatī bahuyavamatī iti atra api syāt . kim ucyate samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_22: iti . yat avayavagrahaṇam prayojanam eva tasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ . kumbhaśālam bile kuśūlībilam
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_23: iti yathā . vibhaktau ca uktam . kim uktam . na vā vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭāgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_24: iti . ete asyāḥ paribhāṣāḥ doṣāḥ etāni ca prayojanāni syuḥ . ete doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_25: vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā . na hi doṣāḥ santi iti paribhāṣā na kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_26: lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ na āśrīyante na ca mṛgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_27: santi iti yavā na upyante . na hi doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti iti . tasmāt yāni etasyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_28: paribhāṣayāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā kartavyā pratividheyam ca doṣeṣu . taddhitavidhānāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_29: tu . taddhitavidhānāṛtham tu ṅyābgrahaṇam kartavyam . ṅyābantāt taddhitotpattiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_30: syāt . kālitarā hariṇitarā khaṭvātarā mālātarā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4455_31: vipratiṣedhāt hi taddhitabalīyastvam . vipratiṣedhāt hi taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_0: tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ . tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . bahugomatkā bahuyavamatkā
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_1: . samāsāntāḥ api ṅyābantāt syuḥ . tyūṅoḥ ca grahaṇam . tyūṅoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_2: . yuvatikā brahmabandhukā iti . ūṅgrahaṇena tāvat na arthaḥ . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_3: ukārāntāt utpattau satyām ūṅantāt vā . idam tarhi yuvatitarā brahmabandhutarā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_4: . tadantasya ca pratyayārthena ayogāt taddhitānutpattiḥ . tadantasya ca ṅyābantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_5: pratyayārthena ayogāt taddhitotpattiḥ na prāpnoti . kālitarā hariṅitarā khaṭvātarā
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_6: mālātarā . kim kāraṇam . ṅyāpantam etat strīpradhānam . na ca strītvasya prakarṣāpakarṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_7: staḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi kim cit ucyate evañjātīyakāt utpattavyam evañjātīyakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_8: na iti . etāvat ucyate atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau tiṅaḥ ca iti . yasya ca prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_9: asti tasya prakarṣe pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti ca apradhānasya guṇasya prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_10: . iha khalu api śuklataraḥ kṛṣṇataraḥ iti dravyam pradhānam guṇasya ca prakarṣe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_11: utpadyate . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_12: ṭābādayaḥ iti . prātipadikaviśeṣaṇam strīgrahaṇam . svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_13: vijñayate striyām abhidheyāyām iti na api strīsamānādhikaraṇāt prātipadikāt . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_14: tarhi . yat striyām prātipadikam vartate tasmāt ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_15: . svārthe iti . nanu ca uktam tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ iti . samāsāntāḥ api svārthikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_16: . ubhayoḥ svārthikayoḥ paratvāt samāsāntāḥ bhaviṣyanti . katham kālikā iti . pratyayasthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_17: kāt pūrvsasya iti ittvam bhaviṣyati . katham hariṇikā iti . hariṇaśabdaḥ prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_18: asti . katham lohinikā iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_0: 439-452 striyām iti ucyate . kā strī nāma . lokatataḥ ete śabdāḥ prasiddhāḥ strīpumān
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_1: napuṃsakam iti . yat loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī ayam pumān idam napuṃsakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_2: iti sā strīsaḥ pumān tat napuṃsakam iti . kim punaḥ loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_3: strī ayam pumān idam napuṃsakam iti . liṅgam . kim punaḥ tat . stanakeśavatī strī
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_4: syāt . lomaśaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ . ubhayoḥ antaram yat ca tadabhāve napuṃsakam . liṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_5: strīpuṃsayoḥ jñāne bhrūkuṃse ṭāP prasajyate . liṅgāt strīpuṃsayoḥ jñāne bhrūkuṃse
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_6: ṭāp prāpnoti . yat hi loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī iti asti tat bhrūkuṃse
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_7: . natvam kharakuṭīḥ paśya . iha cañcāḥ paśya vadhrikāḥ paśya kharakuṭīḥ paśya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_8: tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti natvam prāpnoti . yat hi dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate ayam pumān
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_9: iti asti tat vadhrikādiṣu . khaṭvāvṛkṣau na sidhyataḥ . khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ ca liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_10: na sidhyati . yat hi loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī ayam pumān iti na tat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_11: asti . kim tarhi tayoḥ liṅgam nyāyyam . nāpuṃsakam bhavet tasmin . napuṃsakam khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_12: liṅgam nyāyyam . kim idam nāpuṃsakam iti . napuṃsake bhavam nāpuṃsakam . tadabhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_13: napuṃsakam . tadabhāve strīpuṃsaliṅgābhāve napuṃsakaliṅgam nyāyyam . asat tu mṛgatṛṣṇāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_14: . asat tu khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ liṅgam draṣṭavyam . katham punaḥ asat nāma liṅgam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_15: draṣṭum . mṛgatṛṣṇāvat . tat yathā mṛgāḥ tṛṣitāḥ apām dhārāḥ paśyanti . na ca tāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_16: santi . gandharvnagaram yathā . yathā gandharvanagarāṇi dūrataḥ dṛśyante upasṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_17: ca na upalabhyante tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ liṅgam draṣṭavyam . ādityagativat sat na
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_18: . atha va yathā ādityasya gatiḥ satī na upalabhyate tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_19: na upalabhyate . vastrāntarhitavat ca tat . yathā vastrāntarhitāni dravyāṇi na upalabhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_20: tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . vastrāntarhitāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_21: dravyāṇi vastrāpāye upalabhyante . khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ punaḥ ye api ete rathkārāḥ vāśīvṛkṣādanahastāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_22: mūlāt prabhṛti ā agrāt vṛkṣān takṣṇuvanti te api tayoḥ liṅgam na upalabhante . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_23: etat avasīyate khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate iti . ṣaḍbhiḥ prakāraiḥ satām
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_24: bhāvānām anupalabdhiḥ bhavati . sannikarṣāt ativiprakarṣāt mūrtyantaravyavadhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_25: tamasā āvṛtatvāt indriyadaurbalyāt atipramādāt iti . ataḥ atra kaḥ cit hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_26: yena khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate . kena etat avasīyate khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_27: sat liṅgam na upalabhyate iti . tayoḥ tu tatkṛtam dṛṣṭvā . strīkṛtam śabdam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_28: strī iti avasīyate puṃskṛtam dṛṣṭvā pumān iti . yathā ākāśena jyotiṣaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_29: ākāśam dṛṣṭva jyotiḥ atra iti gamyate . jyotirnimittam hi ākāśam . anyonysaṃśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_30: tu etat . anyonysaṃśrayam tu etat bhavati . strīkṛtaḥ śabdaḥ śabdakṛtam ca strītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_31: . etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . pratyakṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_32: virudhyate . pratyakṣeṇa khalu api saḥ virudhyate yaḥ āha khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_33: na upalabhyate iti . tatra svendriyavirodhaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . na ca nāma svendriyavirodhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_34: bhavitavyam . taṭe ca sarvaliṅgāni dṛṣṭvā kaḥ adhyavasāyati . taṭe ca khalu api sarvāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_35: liṅgāni dṛṣṭvā taṭaḥ taṭaī taṭam iti kaḥ adhyavasātum arhati iyam strīayam pumān
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_36: idam napuṃsakam iti . tasmāt na vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śakyam laukikam liṅgam āsthātum . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_37: ca kaḥ cit svakṛtāntaḥ āstheyaḥ . kaḥ asau svakṛtāntaḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4459_38: āstheyau svakṛtāntataḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam āstheyau . kim idam saṃstyānaprasavau
GS24pmbhasuu:4460: strī . sūteḥ sap prasave pumān iti . nanu ca loke api styāyateḥ eva strī sūteḥ ca pumān . adhikaraṇasādhanā loke strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:4461: styāyati asyām garbhaḥ iti . kartṛsādhanaḥ ca pumān :
GS24pmbhasuu:4462: sūte pumān iti . iha punaḥ ubhayam bhāvasādhanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:4463_0: styānam strī pravṛttiḥ ca pumān . kasya punaḥ styānam strī pravṛttiḥ vā pumān . guṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4463_1: . keṣām . śabsasparśarūparasagandhānām . sarvāḥ ca punaḥ mūrtayaḥ evamātmikāḥ saṃstyānaprasavaguṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4463_2: śabsasparśarūparasagandhavatyaḥ . yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ tatra avarataḥ trayaḥ śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4463_3: sparśaḥ rūpam iti . rasagandhau na sarvatra . pravṛttiḥ khalu api nityā . na hi iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4463_4: kaḥ cit svasmin ātmani muhūrtam api avatiṣṭhate . vardhate vā yāvat anena vardhitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4463_5: apāyena vā yujyate . tat ca ubhayam sarvatra . yadi ubhayam sarvatra kutaḥ vyavasthā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4464_0: vivakṣātaḥ . saṃstyānavivakṣāyām strī prasavavivakṣāyām pumān ubhayoḥ avivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4464_1: napūmsakam . tasya uktau lokataḥ nāma . tasya uktau ca vacane lokataḥ nāma etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4464_2: strī pumān napuṃsakam iti . guṇaḥ vā lupi yuktavat . vadhrikādiṣu bhūyān parihāraḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4466_18: punaḥ ṭābādiṣu satsu na atra strītvam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi bhedaḥ vivakṣitaḥ saṅkhyā . iha ca strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:4467_0: īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . na hi tena eva tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam asti . siddham tu striyāḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4467_2: . prātipadikaviśeṣaṇam strīgrahaṇam . svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ . na evam vijñāyate striyām

GS24pmbhasuu:4467_4: vartate tasmāt ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . atha vā punaḥ astu

GS24pmbhasuu:4467_7: iti liṅgānupapattiḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4467_8: iti . guṇavacanasya ca āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanabhāvāt . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4467_9: liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . tat yathā śuklam vastram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_0: śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_1: śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_2: api yat adaḥ dravyam śritam bhavati strītvam tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat strītvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_3: api bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate anekapratyayānupapattiḥ iti . bhāvasya ca bhāvayuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_4: . bhāvaḥ bhāvena yujyate . tat yatha iṣiḥ iṣiṇā nimantriḥ ca nimantriṇā . viṣamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_5: upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra anyatvam sādhanabhedāt kālabhedāt ca . uktam tatra ekasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_6: bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ aparasya ābhyantaram sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_7: ca pratyayaḥ iti . iha punaḥ ekam strītvam . atha ekam upalabhyate . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_8: yadi ekam upalabhyate dvitīyam api upalabhyatām . atha ekam api anumānagamyam dvtīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_9: api anumānāt gamyatām . kasya tāvat bhavān evam guṇam nyāyyam manyate strītvam nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_10: . dravyasya . dravye ca bhavataḥ kaḥ sampratyayaḥ . yadi tāvat guaṇasamudāyaḥ dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_11: kā gatiḥ ye ete bhāvāḥ kṛdabhihitāḥ taddhitābhihitāḥ ca . cikīrṣā gotā iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_12: matam etat kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti strītvam api strītvena abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4468_13: dravyavat bhaviṣyati . kva ca tāvat doṣaḥ syāt . dṛṣṭasya hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4469_0: doṣasya susukhaḥ parihāraḥ gārgyāyaṇī kārīṣagandhyā kālitarā iti . iha tāvat gārgyāyaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:4469_1: iti ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ṅīṣ bhaviṣyati . kārīṣagandhyā iti vacanāt cāp bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4469_2: . kālitarā iti na yāvat kālī tāvat kālitarā . kim tarhi . prakṛṣṭā kālī kālitarā
GS24pmbhasuu:4469_3: . yat śabdarūpam prakarṣe vartate tasya anuktam strītvam iti kṛtvā ṭāp bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4469_4: . yat api ucyate iha ca strī īkāraḥ na prāpnoti iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim

GS24pmbhasuu:4471_1: . khaṭvā mālā . kim kāraṇam . akārāntādarśanāt . na hi akārāntatā dṛśyate . nanu

GS24pmbhasuu:4473_1: iti kimartham . mahāśūdrī . jātiḥ . jātiḥ iti vaktavyam . yā hi mathatī śūdrā mahāśūdrā
GS24pmbhasuu:4473_2: sā bhavati . śūdrāśabdaḥ ajādiṣu paṭhyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat mahatpūrvāt syāt

GS24pmbhasuu:4473_5: iha tadantavidhiḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bhavatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4475_0: atimahatī : atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . jātiḥ iti ca vakṣyāmi . yadi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4475_1: jñāpyate pañcājī daśājī atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ajādibhiḥ striyam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4478: ugitaḥ prātipadikāt iti āhosvit ugitantāt prātipadikāt iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate ugitaḥ prātipadikāt iti siddham :
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_0: atimahatī iti na sidhyati . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_1: tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . atha vijñāyate ugitantāt prātipadikāt iti siddham atibhavatī
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_2: atimahatī . bhavatī mahatī iti na sidhyati . vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati . vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_3: aprātipadikena . ubhayathā ca nirgomatī niryavamatī iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_4: . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti . yathā icchasi tathā astu
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_5: . astu tāvat ugitaḥ prātipadikāt iti . katham atibhavatī atimahatī iti . tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_6: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_7: . na etat prātipadikagrahaṇam . prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ etat grahaṇam . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_8: punaḥ astu ugitantāt prātipadikāt iti . katham bhavatī mahatī iti . vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_9: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena iti . na etat prātipadikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_10: . prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ etat grahaṇam . yat api ucyate ubhayathā ca nirgomatī
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_11: niryavamatī iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_12: bhavati iti . na etat pratyayagrahaṇam . pratyayāpratyayayoḥ etat grahaṇam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4480_13: . varṇaḥ api ugit pratyayaḥ api ugit prātipadikam api ugit .

GS24pmbhasuu:4482_3: adhātoḥ siddham . añcatigrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . añcateḥ eva ugitaḥ dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_0: 464-466 iha kasmāt na bhavati . niḥśūnī atiyūnī iti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_1: iti . evam api maghonī atra prāpnoti . maghavanśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_2: vanaḥ na haśaḥ . vanaḥ ra ca iti atra haśantāt na bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_3: bhūt . sahayudhvā brāhmaṇī iti . yadi na haśaḥ iti ucyate śarvarī iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_4: . vihitaviśeṣaṇam haśgrahaṇam . haśantāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . evam api prertvarī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_5: na sidhyati . katham ca atra tugāgamaḥ . chāndasatvāt . ṅībrau api tarhi chāndasatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_6: eva bhaviṣyataḥ . bahulam chandasi ṅībrau vaktavyau . yajvarīḥ iṣaḥ yajvanīḥ iṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_7: . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam pratiṣiddhatvāt . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_8: kartavyam . bahudhīvarī bahupīvarī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_9: . anaḥ bahuvrīheḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . anaḥ bahuvrīhipratiṣedhe vā upadhālopinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_10: vāvacanam . anaḥ bahuvrīhipratiṣedhe vā upadhālopinaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . anyathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_11: kṛtvā coditam anyathā kṛtvā parihāraḥ . yathā upasaṅkhyānam coditam tathā nityābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_12: ṅībrābhyām bhavitavyam . yathā parihāraḥ tathā vibhāṣayā bhavitavyam . yathā upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_13: coditam evam api vibhāṣayā bhavitavyam . . na hi atra ṅīp durlabhaḥ . siddhaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_14: ṅīp anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti . ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ ucyamānaḥ anyena sati
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_15: na syāt iti evamartham upasaṅkhyānam codyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_16: ucyate . iha mā bhūt suparvā cāruparvā iti . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_17: na kartavyam . vakṣyati ḍāp ubhābhyām anyatarasyām iti atra anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4484_18: prayojanam . ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte ṅībrau api yathā syātām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_0: 466-468 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . ṅīp anantaraḥ tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . atha idānīm ṅīpi
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_1: pratiṣiddhe ṣaṭsañjñānām ante lupte ṭābutpattiḥ kasmāt na syāt . ataḥ iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_2: . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_3: asiddhaḥ na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . idam api tatra parigaṇyate . pratyāhārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_4: cāpā siddham . sup iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_5: . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . prathamaikavacanāt prabhṛti ā cāpaḥ pakārāt . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_6: pratyāhāragrahaṇam doṣaḥ tu ittve . ittve doṣaḥ bhavati . bahucarmikā . pratyayasthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_7: kāt pūrvasya ātaḥ iti ittvam na prāpnoti . tasmāt na ubhau . tasmāt ṣaṭsañjñakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_8: ubhau na bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . striyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_9: vartate . striyām yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_0: 468-469 kimartham ubhābhyām iti ucyate . ubhābhyām yogābhyām ḍāp yathā syāt manantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_1: anantāt ca bahuvrīheḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam ubhayam anuvartate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_2: anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam kimartham . anyatarasyām ḍāp yathā syāt . ḍāpā mukte pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_3: api yathā syāt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . iha ḍāp api ucyate pratiṣedhaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_4: . tau ubhau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_5: ṅīp api yathā syāt . siddhaḥ atra ṅīp anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_6: tat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . bāḍham śakyam . katham . iha ḍāp api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_7: pratiṣedhaḥ api ṅīp api . tat sarvam vacanāt bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_8: . akriyamāṇe hi tatra anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ ṅīp ḍāppratiṣedhau bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_9: ḍāppratiṣedhau api anavakāśau . tau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . sāvakāśau ḍāppratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_10: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . suparvā cāruparvā iti . tasmāt tat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_11: . idam tu khalu anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . idam api avaśyam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_12: . kim prayojanam . ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte ṅībrau yathā syātām iti . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4488_13: upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
