GS24pmbhasuu:4492_1: . na etat asti prayojanam . kurucaraśabdāt prayayaḥ vidhīyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_2: yat bahukurucaraśabdāt syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_3: prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . anupasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam prātipadikena tadantavidhipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_4: . anupasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikena tadantavidhipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_5: . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . jñāpakam tu pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_6: . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_7: jñāpane prayojanam . bhavatī atibhavatī mahatī atimahatī iti atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_8: bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . uktam etat varṇaḥ api ugit pratyayaḥ api ugit
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_9: prātipadikam api ugit iti . idam tarhi . bahudhīvarī bahupīvarī iti . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_10: asti prayojanam . atra api uktam ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_11: iti . idam tarhi atidhīvarī atipīvarī . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ vā āpiśalam adhīte iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_12: . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ vā punaḥ ayam draṣṭavyaḥ . pūrvasūtre apradhānasya upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_13: iti sañjñā kriyate . yāvat brūyāt pradhānāt utpattavyam apradhānāt na iti tāvat anupasarjanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_14: iti . kim prayojanam . āpiśalam adhīte iti . āpiśalam adhīte brāhmaṇī āpiśalā brāhmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_15: . aṇantāt iti īkāraḥ mā bhūt iti . atha anupasarjanāt iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_16: na bhavati . aṇantam hi etat anupasarjanam . na anupasarjanagrahaṇena aṇantam viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_17: . aṇantāt anupasarjanāt iti . kim tarhi . aṇ eva viśeṣyate . aṇ yaḥ anupasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_18: iti . jātiśabdebhyaḥ tu atiprasaṅgaḥ . jātiśabdebhyaḥ tu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . kuntī
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_19: gāndhārī . siddham tu jāteḥ anupasarjanatvāt . siddham etat . katham . anupasarjanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_20: iti ucyate . na ca jātiḥ upasarjanam . etat api na asti prayojanam . striyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_21: vartate . tena aṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . striyām yaḥ aṇ vihitaḥ iti . evam api kāśakṛtsninā
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_22: proktam māmāṃsā kāśakṛtsnīm kāśakṛtsnīm adhīte kāśakṛtsnā brāhmaṇī atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_23: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . adhetryām abhidheyāyām aṇaḥ īkāreṇa bhavitavyam . yaḥ ca atra adhetryām
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_24: abhidheyāyām aṇ uktaḥ luptaḥ saḥ yaḥ ca śrūyate utpannaḥ tasmāt īkāraḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_25: punaḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam tadantavidhiḥ yathā syāt . kumbhakārī
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_26: nagarakārī . atra hi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_27: iti avayavāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_28: iti saṅghātāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . kṛdgrahaṇe iti ucyate . na ca etat kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_29: . kṛdakṛdgrahaṇam etat . kṛt api ayam aṇ taddhitaḥ api . evam tarhi īkārāntena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_30: bhaviṣyati . yadi evam labhyeta kṛtam syāt tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_31: hi gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti samāsaḥ eva tāvat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_32: . samāse kṛte avayavāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . avayavāt utpattau kaḥ satyām doṣaḥ . kaumbhakāreyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_33: na sidhyati . avyayavasya vṛddhisvarau syātām . tasmāt anupasarjanādhikāraḥ . anupasarjanādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_34: jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne suparṇyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam . anupasarjanādhikāre jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne suparṇyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_35: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . suparṇī . na vā samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt jātivācakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_36: ca śabdasya sāmānyena ṅīṣvidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_37: . samāsaḥ atra anupasarjanam . saḥ ca jātivācakaḥ . samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_38: ca jātivācakatvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyena ṅīṣ bhaviṣyati jāteḥ astrīviṣayāt ayopadhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4492_39: iti . katham kṛtvā coditam katham kṛtvā parihāraḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti kṛtvā coditam
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_0: 478-479 ḍhagrahaṇe sānubandhakasya upasaṅkhyānam . ḍhagrahaṇe sānubandhakasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_1: kartavyam . kārikeyī hārikeyī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananubandhakagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_2: hi na sānubandhakasya . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_3: iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . tavyagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_4: tavyadgrahaṇam mā bhūt . divgrahaṇe divugrahaṇam mā bhūt . nanu ca iyam api kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_5: tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya ne iti . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_6: . yadgrahaṇe ṇyadgrahaṇam mā bhūt . aṅgrahaṇe caṅgrahaṇam mā bhūt . ajgrahaṇe ṇyajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_7: mā bhūt . tat dve ete paribhāṣe kartavye . na kartavye . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_8: bhavataḥ ete paribhāṣe yat ayam vāmadevāt ḍyaḍḍyau iti yayatau ḍitau karoti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_9: tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ananubandhakaḥ ḍhaśabdaḥ striyām na
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_10: asti iti kṛtvā sānubandhakasya grahaṇam vijñāsyate . nanu ca ayam asti śilāyāḥ ḍhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_11: iti . na eṣaḥ striyām vartate . ayam tarhi sabhāyāḥ ḍhaḥ chandasi iti . eṣaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4494_12: na striyām vartate . kim kāraṇam . tatra sādhuḥ iti vartate . katham strī nāma sabhāyām sādhvī syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4496_0: 479-480 añgrahaṇam anarthakam tadantāt hi ṅīnvidhānam . añgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4496_1: kāraṇam . tadantāt hi ṅīnvidhānam . tadantāt hi añantāt ṅīn vidhīyate . śārṅgaravādyañaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4496_2: ṅīn iti . na ca asti viśeṣaḥ añantāt ṅīnaḥ vā ṅīpaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4496_3: . na vā jātyadhikārāt . na vā anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . jātyadhikārāt . jāteḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4496_4: tatra anuvartate . ajātyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . autsī audapānī . tat ca avaśyam jātigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4496_5: anuvartyam . anadhikāre hi puṃyogāt ākhyāyām ṅīnprasaṅgaḥ . ananuvartamāne hi jātigrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4497_0: baidasya strī baidī . yadi tarhi asya nibandhanam asti idam eva kartavyam . tat na
GS24pmbhasuu:4497_1: kartavyam . tat api avaśyam kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi tasmin baidasya bhaginī baidī
GS24pmbhasuu:4497_2: paratvāt jātilakṣaṇaḥ ṅīṣ ṅīpam bādheta . ṅīni punaḥ sati paratvāt ṅīn ṅīṣam bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:4499: 480-481 khyunaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . khyunaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āḍhyaṅkaraṇī subhagaṅkaraṇī . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4500: khyunaḥ iti . nañsnañīkakhyuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam . nañsnañīkakhyuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nañ snañ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4506_0: 481 āpatyagrahaṇam kartavyam dvīpāt yañaḥ pratiṣedhārtham . iha mā bhūt dvaipyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4506_1: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate kañkvarapaḥ yañaḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4506_2: . katham tarhai kañkvarapaḥ ayañaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4508_0: 482 taddhitavacanam kimartham . taddhitavacanam ṣitaḥ prātipadikāt īkārārtham . taddhitavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4508_1: kriyate ṣitaḥ prātipadikāt īkāraḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4508_2: eva atra īkāraḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt aprātipadikāt īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4508_3: bhavati evam prātipadikāt iti asya anuvartanasāmārthyāt aṣitaḥ api prātipadikāt īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4508_4: syāt . asti anyat prātipadikānuvṛttau prayojanam . kim . uttarārtham . ataḥ iñ dākṣiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4510_0: 482-483 sarvatragrahaṇam kimartham . prācām eva syāt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4510_1: siddham prācām pūrveṇa . idam tarhi prayojanam sarveṣām yathā syāt . āvaṭyāyanī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4512_0: 482-483-484 lohitādiṣu śākalyasya upasaṅkhyānam . lohitādiṣu śākalyasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4512_1: kartavyam . śākalyāyanī . yadi punaḥ ayam śakalaśabdaḥ lohitādiṣu paṭhyeta . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4512_2: śakyam . iha hi śākalyasya chātrāḥ śākalāḥ kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ na syāt . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4512_3: tarhi . kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ . kaṇvaśabdāt śakalaśabdaḥ pūrvaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4512_4: katāt uttaraḥ iṣyate. kataśabdāt śakalaśabdaḥ uttaraḥ paṭhitavyaḥ . pūrvottarau tadantādī
GS24pmbhasuu:4512_5: . pūrvottarau gaṇau tadantādī draṣṭavyau . ye kaṇvādayaḥ te śakalādayaḥ . ye kataparyantāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4512_6: te śakalaparyantāḥ . kim prayojanam . ṣphāṇau tatra praoyjanam . tatra evam sati
GS24pmbhasuu:4512_7: ṣphāṇau siddhau bhavataḥ . kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ . katāt uttaraḥ iṣyate . pūrvottarau
GS24pmbhasuu:4514: 484 kauravyamāṇḍūkayoḥ āsureḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kauravyamāṇḍūkayoḥ āsureḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āsurāyaṇī . chaḥ ca . chaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . āsurīyaḥ kalpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_0: 484-486 vayasi acarame iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . vadhūṭī ciraṇṭī iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_1: kasmāt na bhavati . uttānaśayā lohitapādikā dvivarṣā trivarṣā iti . na etāni vayovācīni
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_2: . katham tarhi vayaḥ gamyate . sambandhāt . yadi tarhi yatra sambandhāt vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_3: tatra na bhavati iha api na prāpnoti . kumārī iti . atra api sambandhāt vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_4: . kaḥ asu sambandhaḥ . yaḥ asu puṃsā asamprayogaḥ . sambandhāt eva atra vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_5: . iha punaḥ sambandhasambandhāt . iha tāvat uttānaśayā iti . yadā kartṛtvam viśeṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_6: bhavati tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . yadi lohitapādikā iti . yadā bahuvrīhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_7: viśeṣitaḥ tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . dvivarṣā trivarṣā iti . yadā dviguarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_8: viśeṣitaḥ tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . yadi tarhi yatra sambandhāt eva vayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_9: gamyate tatra bhavati iha api tari prapnoti . kanyā iti . nipātanāt etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_10: . kim nipātanam. kanyāyāḥ kanīna ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4518_0: 486 imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete . tatra ekaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . evam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:4518_1: . parimāṇāntāt taddhitaluki ṅīp bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . parimāṇāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4518_2: eva taddhitaluki ṅīp bhavati na anyataḥ iti . tataḥ vistācitakambalyebhyaḥ na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_0: 486-488 ūdhasaḥ nakāraḥ liṅgādhikāre . ūdhasaḥ nakāraḥ liṅgādhikāre kartavyaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_1: mā bhūt . mahodhāḥ parjanyaḥ iti . na vā samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . na vā liṅgādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_2: nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . samāsāntādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_3: strīgrahaṇam kartavyam . itarathā hi kabvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi kabvidhiḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_4: . kasyām punaḥ avasthāyām kap prāpnoti . prāk ṅīṣutpatteḥ . prāk tāvat na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_5: . kim kāraṇam . na hi ṅīṣ vibhāṣā . lutkpanne tarhi ṅīṣi prāpnoti . utpanne ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_6: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti evam tat . na ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_7: nadyantānām bahuvrīhiḥ . prāk eva tarhi prāpnoti . nanu ca uktam na hi ṅīṣ vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_8: iti . yadi api na ṅīṣ vibhāṣā kap tu vibhāṣā . kapaḥ avakāśaḥ anyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_9: ayavakaḥ avrīhikaḥ . ṅīṣaḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā kap . yadā na kap saḥ avakāśaḥ . kuṇḍodhnī
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_10: ghaṭodhnī . kapprasaṅge lubhayam prāpnoti . paratvāt kap syāt . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_11: na vā samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . itarathā hi kabvidhiprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_0: 488-489 dāmahāyanāntāt saṅkhyādeḥ . dāmahāyanāntāt saṅkhyādeḥ iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_1: mā bhūt . uddāmā vaḍavā iti . tatpuruṣavijñānāt vā siddham . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_2: . tatpuruṣaḥ ca ayam . utkrāntā dāmnaḥ utdāmā . bhavet siddham yadā tatpuruṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_3: yadā tu khalu bahuvrīhiḥ tadā na sidhyati . utkrāntam dāma asyāḥ iti . nanu ca cetanāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_4: etat bhavati utkramaṇam vā apakramaṇam vā dāma ca acetanam . acetaneṣu api cetanāvatupacāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_5: dṛśyate . tat yathā . srastāni asyāḥ bandhanāni . srasyante asyāḥ bandhanāni iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_6: . tat tarhi saṅkhyādeḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_7: . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāvyayādeḥ ṅīp iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_8: avyayādeḥ api vartate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅkhyādeḥ iti anuvartate . avyayādeḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_9: nivṛttam . katham punaḥ ekayoganirdiṣṭayoḥ ekadeśaḥ anuvartate ekadeśaḥ na . ekayoganirdiṣṭānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_10: api ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ bhavati . tat yathā tasya pādamūle pīlvādikarṇādibhyaḥ kuṇabjāhacau
GS24pmbhasuu:4522_11: . pakṣāt tiḥ iti atra mūle iti anuvartate pāka iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4524_0: 489 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . dvau hāyanau asyāḥ śālāyāḥ . dvihāyanā trihāyanā
GS24pmbhasuu:4524_1: iti . hāyanaḥ vayasi smṛtaḥ . vayovācinaḥ hāyanaśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca eṣaḥ vayovācī
GS24pmbhasuu:4524_2: . atha ṇatvam kasmāt na bhavati . ṇatvam api vayovācinaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:4526: 489 māmakagrahaṇam kimartham na aṇantāt iti evam siddham . niyamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . māmakaśabdāt sañjñācchandasoḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . māmikā buddhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4528: 490 ajasādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . rātrim rātrim smariṣyantaḥ . rātrim rātrim ajānataḥ . sarvām rātrim saha uṣitvā . vṛttyām ekāntarātrim .
GS24pmbhasuu:4530_0: 490-491 antarvat pativat iti garbhabhartṛsaṃyoge . antarvat pativat iti garbhabhartṛsaṃyoge
GS24pmbhasuu:4530_1: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . prathate tvayā patimatī pṛthivī iti . atha antaḥśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4530_2: agarbhasaṃyoge kim pratyudāhriyate . antaḥ asyām śālāyām asti iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4530_3: vākyam eva pratyudāhriyate na punaḥ matup . astisāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4530_4: . na ca atra astisāmānādhikaraṇyam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . antarvatnī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4530_5: evam tarhi antarvatpativatoḥ tu matubvatve nipātanāt . antarvat iti matup nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4530_6: . vatvam siddham . pativat iti vatvam nipātyate . matup siddhaḥ . kim aviśeṣeṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:4530_7: na iti āha . garbhiṇyām jīvapatyām ca . etasmin viṣaye . vā ca chandasi nuk bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:4530_8: . vā ca chandasi nuk vaktavyaḥ . sā antarvatī devān upait . sā antarvatnī devān upait

GS24pmbhasuu:4538_1: . liṅgasannigoyena sarvatra āgamādeśānām vacane liṅgaluki tatkṛtam prāpnoti . pañcendrāṇyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4538_2: devatāḥ asya pañcendraḥ pañcāgniḥ daśāgniḥ . kim ucyate sarvatra iti . anyatra api

GS24pmbhasuu:4538_9: . strīprakaraṇagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . siddham tu āgamādeśānām aṅgataḥ vacanāt iti

GS24pmbhasuu:4538_13: ṣaṭkaḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . luki prakṛtipratyāpattivacanam iti eva jyāyaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4549_1: praṣṭhaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ striyām vartate . tasya idam iti anena abhisambandhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4549_2: yathā eva hi asau tatkṛtān snānodvartanapariṣekān labhate evam praṣṭhaśabdam api
GS24pmbhasuu:4549_3: labhate . yadi evam puṃyogāt ākhyāyām taddhitalugvacanam . puṃyogāt ākhyāyām taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4549_4: luk vaktavyaḥ . tasya idam iti prāpnoti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_0: prāṣthyaḥ imāḥ prācaryaḥ imāḥ iti . bhavati ca . vibhāṣā luk vaktavyaḥ . yadā luk
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_1: tadā praṣṭhī . yadā na luk tadā prāṣṭhī . yadi evam na arthaḥ lukā . vibhāṣā taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_2: . yadā taddhitotpattiḥ tadā prāṣṭhī . yadā na taddhitotpattiḥ tadā praṣṭhī . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_3: api luk vaktavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa taddhitasya lukam parārthe śabdaḥ vartate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_4: punaḥ tasyām eva praṣṭhaśabdaḥ varteta . katham punaḥ tasyām apratiṣṭhamānāyām praṣṭhaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_5: varteta . yathā eva hi asau akurvatī kim cit pāpam tatkṛtān vadhabandanaparikleśān
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_6: labhate evam praṣṭhaśabdam api labhate . subantasamāsavacanāt ca akārāntānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_7: . subantasamāsavacanāt ca akārāntatā na upapadyate . subantānām samāsaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_8: ṭāp . ṭapi utpanne samāsaḥ . sthāśabdaḥ samasyeta . tatra puṃyogāt ākhyāyām akārāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_9: iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu striyāḥ puṃśabdena abhidhānāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_10: . katham . striyāḥ puṃśabdena abhidhānāt . strī puṃśabdena abhidhīyate . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_11: uktam puṃyogāt ākhyāyām taddhitalugvacanam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_12: jñāpayati na ataḥ taddhitotpattiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam puṃyogāt ākhyāyām īkāram śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_13: . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . ye anīkārāḥ strīpratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_14: tadartham etat syāt . yat tarhi ākhyāgrahaṇam karoti . na hi taddhitāntam ākhyā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_15: . atha vā punaḥ astu tasya idam iti anena abhisambandhena . nanu ca uktam puṃyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_16: ākhyāyām taddhitalugvacanam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na avaśyam ayam eva abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_17: bhavati tasya idam iti . ayam api abhisambandhaḥ asti saḥ ayam iti . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_18: atasmin saḥ iti etat bhavati . caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ atasmin saḥ iti etat bhavati tātsthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4550_19: tāddharmyāt tatsāmīpyāt tatsāhacaryāt iti . tātsthyāt tāvat . mañcāḥ hasanti . giriḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4550_31: akārāntāt iti ṅīṣ na prāpnoti . samāsāntasya ṇatve . samāsāntasya ṇatve prayojanam

GS24pmbhasuu:4550_35: iti ṇatvam na prāpnoti . kṛdantāt taddhite vṛddhisvarau ca . kṛdantāt taddhite vṛddhisvarau ca prayojanam :

GS24pmbhasuu:4552_2: etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam upasthātum . na iti āha . iha hi mūlakena upadaṃśam bhuṅkte

GS24pmbhasuu:4553_1: svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi sāṅkuṭinam vyāvakrośī iti dve atra prātipadikasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:4553_2: avayavasya api samudāyasya api . tatra avayavasya yā prātipadikasañjñā tadāśrayāvayavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4553_3: utpattiḥ prasajyeta . avayavāt utpattau satyām kaḥ doṣaḥ . kaumbhakāreyaḥ na sidhyati

GS24pmbhasuu:4553_5: nu khalu sidhyati . avadātāyām tu ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ . avadātāyām tu ṅīp prāpnoti . avadātā

GS24pmbhasuu:4561_5: iti kimartham . ślakṣṇamukhā śālā . avikārajam iti kimartham . bahugaḍuḥ bahupaṭikā

GS24pmbhasuu:4563_1: anarthakam bahuvrīhyadhikārāt . upasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . bahuvrīhyadhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4563_2: . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . bahuvrīheḥ ca antodāttāt iti . bahvajartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4563_3: tarhi upasarjanagrahaṇam kartavyam . bahvacaḥ na iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tat bahvajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4563_4: upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . bahvacaḥ upasarjanāt na iti . atha akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4563_5: upasarjanagrahaṇe kasya bahvajgrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . bahurvīheḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4563_6: bahuvrīhiviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit abahvac bahuvrīhiḥ yadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_0: svaḍā svaḍī iti . bahvajartham iti cet svāṅgagrahaṇāt siddham . svāṅgagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_1: . tat bahvajgrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . svāṅgāt bahvacaḥ na iti . evam tarhi antodādāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_2: iti vartate . antodāttārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . antodāttārtham iti cet sahādikṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_3: siddham . yat ayam sahanañvidyamānapūrvāt ca iti pratṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_4: antodāttāt api bhavati iti . svāṅgasamudāyapratiṣedhārtham tu . svāṅgasamudāyapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_5: tarhi upasarjanagrahaṇam kartavyam . śvāṅgāt yathā syāt . svāṅgasamudāyāt mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_6: . kalyāṇapāṇipādā . atha kriyamāṇe api upasarjanagrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_7: . svāṅgam hi etat upasarjanam . na svāṅgasamudāyaḥ svāṅgagrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_8: janapadasamudāyaḥ janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate . kāśikosalīyā iti janapadatadavadhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_9: iti vuñ na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . asvāṅgapūrvapadāt iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_10: . tena svāṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param yat svāṅgam tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_11: iti . yat ca atra asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param na tadantaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ yadantaḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_12: na tat asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param svāṅgam . nanu ca tat pūrvasmin yoge bahuvrīhiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_13: . na iti āha . pūrvapadaviśeṣaṇam . na svāṅgam asvāṅgam pūrvam padam pūrvapadam asvāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_14: pūrvapadam asvāṅgapūrvapadam asvāṅgapūrvapadāt iti . yadi evam pūrvasmin yoge bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_15: aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . bahuvrīhiḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ktāt iti vartate . tena bahuvrīhim
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_16: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . asvāṅgāt pūrvapadāt param yat ktāntam tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_17: idam tarhi prayojanam . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate upasarjanamātrāt yathā syāt . niṣkeśī
GS24pmbhasuu:4566_0: 517 nāsikādīnām vibhāṣāyām pucchāt ca . nāsikādīnām vibhāṣāyām pucchāt ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4566_2: nityam iti vaktavyam . kabarapucchī maṇipucchī viṣapucchī śarapucchī . upamānāt pakṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4566_3: ca . upamānāt pakṣāt ca pucchāt ca iti vaktavyam . ulūkapakṣī śālā ulūkapakṣī senā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_1: . nāsikādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ sahanañvidyamānapūrvebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_2: . nāsikādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ avakāśaḥ kalyāṇanāsikī kalyāṇanāsikā . sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_3: pratiṣedhasya avakāśaḥ samukhā amukhā vidyamānmukhā iti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_4: sanāsikā anāsikā vidyamānanāsikā iti . sahanañvidyamānapūrvebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_5: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam vidhiḥ saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_6: ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam api vidhiḥ na mṛdūnām iva karpāsānām kṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_7: ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva bahvajlakṣaṇam saṃyogopadhalakṣaṇam ca pratiṣedham bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_8: evam sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇam api bādheta . kā tarhi gatiḥ . iha tāvat nāsikodara
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_9: iti bahvajlakṣaṇaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ca . purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_10: apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bhādante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā bahvajlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_12: ca iti saṃyogalakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ca . madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_13: apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā saṃyogalakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_0: 518-519 dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_1: . prāṅmukhī pratyaṅmukḥī . ṅībvidhāne hi anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayān ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ . ṅībvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_2: hi sati anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayān ṅīp prasajyeta . prāggulphā pratyaglalāṭā . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_3: ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran asaṃyogopadhāt bahvacaḥ na iti . yadi api ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_4: asaṃyogopadhāt bahvacaḥ na iti evam api dikpūrvapadāt ṅīpā mukte ṅīṣ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_5: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat yatrotsargāpavādam vibhāṣā tatra apavādena mukte utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_6: na bhavati iti . atha vā ṅīṣaḥ ādeśaḥ ṅīp kariṣyate . tat tarhi ṅīṣaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_7: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . anyataḥ ṅīṣ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_8: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . dikpūrvapadāt iti eṣā pañcamī ṅīṣ iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_9: ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4570_10: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate.
GS24pmbhasuu:4572: 519-521 jāteḥ iti ucyate . kā jātiḥ nāma . ākṛtigrahaṇā jātiḥ liṅgānām ca na sarvabhāk sakṛtākhyātanirgrāhyā gotram ca caraṇaiḥ saha . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4573_0: prādurbhāvavināśābhyām sattvasya yugapat guṇaiḥ asarvaliṅgām bahvarthām tām jātim
GS24pmbhasuu:4573_1: kavayaḥ viduḥ . gotram ca caraṇāni ca . kaḥ punaḥ etayoḥ jātilakṣaṇayoḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4573_2: yathā pūrvam jātilakṣaṇam tathā kumārībhāryaḥ iti bhavitavyam . yathā uttaram tathā

GS24pmbhasuu:4575_1: iti āhosvit kva cit yat astrīviṣayam iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate samānāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4575_2: ākṛtau yat astrīviṣayam iti droṇī kuṭī pātrī iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate kva
GS24pmbhasuu:4575_3: cit yat astrīviṣayam iti mālā balākā atra api prāpnoti . astu kva cit yat astrīviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4575_4: iti . katham mālā balākā iti . ajādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:4584_0: 524-525 kimarthaḥ ṅakāraḥ . viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . na ūṅdhātvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4584_1: iti . na ūdhātvoḥ iti ucyamāne yavāgvā yavāgvai iti atra api prasajyeta . atha dīrghoccāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4584_2: kimartham na ūṅ utaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:4586_0: dhīvabandhūḥ iti . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4586_1: iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . iha ca brahmabandhūchatram brahmabandhūcchatram ṣatvatukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4586_2: asiddhaḥ iti ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt nityaḥ tuk prasajyeta . iha ca brahmabandhūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4587: dhīvabandhūḥ nadyṛtaḥ kap iti kap prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate brahmabandhūḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_0: dhīvabandhūḥ iti gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta iti . ubhayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_1: āśraye na antādivat . yat api ucyate brahmabandhūchatram brahmabandhūcchatram ṣatvatukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_2: asiddhaḥ iti ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt nityaḥ tuk prasajyeta iti . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_3: asiddhaḥ na ca eṣaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ . yat api ucyate iha ca brahmabandhūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_4: dhīvabandhūḥ nadyṛtaḥ kap iti kap prasajyeta iti . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_5: evam tat na ca eṣaḥ nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . śeṣalakṣaṇaḥ tarhi kap prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:4590_1: iti vaktavyam . alābūḥ karkandhūḥ . aprāṇijāteḥ iti kimartham . kṛkavākuḥ . arajjvādīnām

GS24pmbhasuu:4600_2: . yadi na paṭhyate gaukṣīputraḥ iti samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:4600_3: . gaukṣyāputraḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_0: 527-528 anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_1: iti etasmāt ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ataḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_2: iti etasya avakāśaḥ bahurājñī bahutakṣṇī . ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_3: . vibhāṣā ṅīp . yadā na ṅīp saḥ avakāśaḥ . ṅīpprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . ūdhasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_4: ṅīṣ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_5: . anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti atra ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati iti etat anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_6: . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_7: . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ cāpaḥ avakāśaḥ udīcām . āvaṭyā . ṣphasya avakāśaḥ anyāni yañantāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_8: . gārgyāyaṇī vātsyāyanī . āvaṭyaśabdāt prācām ubhayam prāpnoti . āvaṭyāyanī . ṣphaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_9: bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . āvaṭyagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_10: . idam api siddham bhavati . śārkarākṣyāyaṇī pautimāṣyāyaṇī . yañgrahaṇena na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_11: . ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ iti eva . gaukakṣyaśabdaḥ krauḍyādiṣu paṭhyate . idam api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_12: gaukakṣyāyaṇī . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . evam vakṣyāmi . prācām ṣphaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_13: taddhitaḥ sarvatra . kva sarvatra . yatra ṣphaḥ ca anyaḥ ca prāpnoti ṣphaḥ eva tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4602_14: bhavati iti . tataḥ lohitāidkatantebhyaḥ sarvatra . kva sarvatra . prācām ca udīcām ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_0: 528-530 iha kasmāt na bhavati . dākṣī plākṣī iti . atiśāyikena ayam tamaśabdena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_1: kriyate . saḥ ca triprabhṛtiṣu vartate . triprabhṛtīnām abhāvāt . yadi evam prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_2: cet tamam kṛtvā dākṣyāḥ na upottamam guru āmvidhiḥ kena te na syāt prakarṣe yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_3: ayam tamaḥ . prakarṣe cet tamam kṛtvā dākṣyāḥ na upottamam guru iti ucyate āmvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_4: kena tava na syāt . avyayaghāt iti prāpnoti . prakarṣe yadi ayam tamaḥ . yadi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_5: tamaḥ prakarṣe vartate . udgatasya prakarṣaḥ ayam . gataśabdaḥ atra lupyate .udgatasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_6: ayam prakarṣaḥ . gataśabdasya atra lopaḥ bhavati . nāvyayārthaprakarṣaḥ asti . dhātvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_7: atra prakṛṣyate . nāvyayasya arthasya prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi . dhātvarthasya . udgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_8: apekṣate kim cit . trayāṇām dvau kila udgatau . anudgatam apekṣya udgataḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_9: bhavati . trayāṇām dvau kila udgatau . trayāṇām kila dvau udgatau bhavataḥ . catuṣprabhṛtikartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_10: vārāhyāyām na sidhyati . catuṣprabhṛtiṣu ṣyaṅ vaktavyaḥ vārāhyāyām na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_11: vārāhyāyām na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . catuṣprabhṛtīnām abhāvāt . bhidyate asya svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_12: tena vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na lakṣyate . bhidyate khalu asya svaraḥ tena ātiśāyikena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_13: uttamasya . vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na lakṣyate . vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na kva cit api lakṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4604_14: śabdāntaram idam vidhyāt dṛṣṭam abhyantaram triṣu . evam tarhi anyaḥ ayam ātiśāyikena
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_0: 530-538 kim punaḥ ayam aṇiñoḥ ādeśaḥ āhosvit aṇiñbhyām paraḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_1: . ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopavacanam . ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . audameghyāyāḥ chātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_2: audameghāḥ . dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ . dviḥ ca aṇ vidheyaḥ . audameghyāyāḥ chātrāḥ audameghāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_3: . audameghyānām saṅghaḥ audameghaḥ . iñaḥ iti aṇ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_4: . ādeśe nalopavacanam . yadi ādeśaḥ nalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . auḍulomyā śāralomyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_5: ye ca abhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . na vā ṣyaṅaḥ lopanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_6: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṣyaṅaḥ lopanimittatvāt . lopanimittaḥ ṣyaṅ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_7: akṛte lope ṣyaṅ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . gurūpottamayoḥ iti ucyate na ca akṛte lope
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_8: gurūpottamam bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu paraḥ . nanu ca uktam ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_9: dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate yalopavacanam iti adoṣaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_10: . kim kāraṇam . puṃvadbhāvāt yajādau taddhite . yajādau taddhite puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_11: bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_12: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau . saḥ ca siddhaḥ pratyayavidhau . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_13: idam uktam ādeśaḥ paraḥ iti ca . kim atra nyāyyam . adeśaḥ iti etat nyāyyam . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_14: etat . evam ca eva hi kṛtvā ācāryeṇa sūtram paṭhitam ṣaṣṭhyā ca nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_15: ataḥ eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nirdoṣaḥ . nanu ca parasmin api sati ye doṣāḥ te parihṛtāḥ . puṃvadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_16: yalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ . sa ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ aḍe bhavati . tatra audamegheyaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_17: . anubandhau tvayā kāryau . yasya ādeśaḥ anubandhau tena kartavyau . ekaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_18: aparaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . yaṅaḥ cāp iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_19: . atha sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena kva arthaḥ . atra eva . kim prayojanam . cāpartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_20: . cāp yathā syāt . tava katham cāp . ṭābvidhiḥ mama . ṭāpā mama siddham . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_21: mama api ṭāpā siddham . na sidhyati . aṇaḥ iti iñaḥ iti ca īkāraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_22: doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate aṇantāt akārāntāt iñantāt ikārāntāt iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_23: . aṇ yaḥ akāraḥ iñ yaḥ ikāraḥ iti . svarārthaḥ tarhi tvayā cāp vaktavyaḥ . ñniti
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_24: iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_25: iti . tava api tarhi ṣyaṅā uktatvāt strītvasya ṭāp na prāpnoti . ukte api hi bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_26: ete . ukte api hi strītve bhavanti ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svāṛthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_27: iti . mama api tarhi sānubandhakasya ādeśaḥ itkāryam na iti . tena ñit na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_28: . asthānivattve doṣaḥ te vṛddhiḥ atra na sidhyati . asthānivattve doṣaḥ . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_29: te na prāpnoti . auḍulomyā śāralomyā . na ca idānīm ardhajaratīyam labhyam vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_30: me bhaviṣyati svaraḥ na iti . tat yathā ardham jaratyāḥ kāmayate ardham na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_31: tvayā api atra viśeṣārtham kartavyam syāt viśeṣaṇam . tvayā api atra viśeṣārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_32: anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti . akriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_33: eva viśeṣaḥ atra sānubandhaḥ viśeṣavān . akriyā eva mama viśeṣaḥ sānubandhaḥ tu viśeṣavān
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_34: . pāśyāyām te katham na syāt . pāśyāputraḥ iti atra kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ me syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_35: viśeṣaṇam . ekaḥ mama viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ . tvayā punaḥ dvau kartavyau . atha ekasmin api
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_36: sati kaḥ kariṣyate . kim ca ataḥ . anyasmin sūtrabhedaḥ syāt . yadi etābhyām anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_37: kriyate sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . ṣiti liṅgam prasajyeta . atha ṣit kriyate ṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_38: iti īkāraḥ prāpnoti . ṅiti cekrīyite doṣaḥ . atha ṅit kriyate cekrīyite doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_39: . lolūyāputraḥ lolūyāpatiḥ iti . vyavadhānāt na duṣyati . akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_40: doṣaḥ bhavati . yaḥ anantaraḥ na dhātuḥ saḥ . dhātoḥ iti vartate yaḥ ca atra anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_41: na asau dhātuḥ . yaḥ dhātuḥ saḥ ananantaraḥ . yaḥ ca dhātuḥ sa asau anantaraḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_0: na cet ubhayataḥ sāmyam ubhayatra prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yaṅā dhātuḥ viśeṣyeta . yaṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_1: viśeṣyeta yadi iha dhātuḥ yaṅ dhātunā vā yadi tulyam etat . yadi eva yaṅā dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_2: viśeṣyate yadi atha api dhātunā yaṅ tulyam etat bhavati . ubhau pradhānam yadi na
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_3: atra doṣaḥ . atha ubhau pradhānam bhavataḥ na atra doṣaḥ bhavati . tathā prasāryeta
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_4: tu vākpatiḥ te . tathā sati vākpatiḥ vākputraḥ iti atra prasāraṇam prāpnoti . dhātuprakaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_5: iha na sthānam iti niścayaḥ . dhātuprakaraṇasya iha sthānam na asti iti kṛtvā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_6: niścayaḥ kriyate . avaśyam āttvārtham dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . gobhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_7: gobhiḥ naubhyām naubhiḥ . āttvārtham yadi kartavyam tatra eva tat kariṣyate . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_8: yat ejantam tasya ced āttvam iṣyate uddeśaḥ ṛūḍhiśabdānām . tena goḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_9: . evam tarhi upadeśe iti ucyate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4609_0: 538-540 kimartham idam ucyate . gotrāvayavāt agotrārtham . gotrāvayavāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4609_1: . agotrārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . gotrāvayavāt agotrārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam . gotrāvayavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4609_2: agotrārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam prāpnoti . iha api prāpnoti āhicchatrī kānyakubjī
GS24pmbhasuu:4609_3: . evam tarhi gotrāt eva gotrāvayavāt . gotrāt iti cet vacanānarthakyam . gotrāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4609_4: cet vacanam anarthakam . siddham gotre purveṇa eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . gurūpottamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4609_5: iti ucyate . agurūpottamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . agurūpottamāṛtham iti cet sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:4609_6: avayavatvāt sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . agurūpottamāṛtham iti cet sarveṣām avayavatvāt sarvatra prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4610_0: aṣṭāśītiḥ sahasrāṇi ūrdhvaretasām ṛṣīṇām babhūvuḥ . tatra agastyāṣṭamaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4610_1: prajanaḥ abhyupagataḥ . tatrabhavatām yat apatyam tāni gotrāṇi . ataḥ anye gotrāvayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4610_2: . tatra utpattiḥ prāpnoti . tat ca aniṣṭam . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4610_3: yebhyaḥ agurūpottamebhyaḥ iṣyate . siddham tu rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4610_4: etat . katham . rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānāt . rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4610_5: ke punaḥ rauḍhyādayaḥ . ye krauḍyādayaḥ . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti siddham tu kulākhyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4610_6: loke gotrābhimatābhyaḥ iti . siddham etat . katham . kulākhyāḥ loke gotrāvayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4610_7: iti ucyante . atha vā gotrāvayavaḥ kaḥ bhavatum arhati . gotrāt avayutaḥ . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4610_8: gotrāt avayutaḥ . yaḥ anantaraḥ . daivadattyā yājñadattyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4612: 541-543 samarthavacanam kimartham . samarthāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4613: upagoḥ apatyam . asamarthāt mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_0: kambalaḥ upagoḥ apatyam devadattasya iti . samarthavacanam anarthakam . na hi asamarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_1: arthābhidhānam . samarthavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . na hi asamarthena arthābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_2: . na hi asamarthāt utpadyamānena pratyayena arthābhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_3: utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha prathamavacanam kimartham . prathamavacanam prakṛtiviśeṣaṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_4: . prathamāt pratyayotpattiḥ yathā syāt . aprathamāt mā bhūt . upagoḥ apatyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_5: apatyaśabdāt . prathamavacanam anarthakam . na hi aprathamena arthābhidhānam . prathamavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_6: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . na hi aprathamena arthābhidhānam . na hi aprathamāt utpadyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_7: pratyayena arthābhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_8: vāvacanam kimartham . vākyam api yathāt syāt . upagoḥ apatyam iti . vāvacane ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_9: . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_10: . iha api vāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatra nityatvāt pratyayasya . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_11: dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ ca avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvtaḥ ca etat bhavati vākyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_12: vṛttiḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye pratyaye prāpte vāvacanen kim anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_13: śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ bhāvābhāvau iṣyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_14: tasmāt na arthaḥ vāvacanena . atha etat samarthagrahaṇam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_15: ca . kim prayojanam . samarthāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt . asamarthāt mā bhūt . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_16: samartham . arthābhidhāne yat samartham . kim punaḥ tat . kṛtavarṇānupūrvīkam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_17: . sautthitiḥ vaikṣamāṇiḥ iti . atha tat vāvacanam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4614_18: . kim prayojanam . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu śabdeṣu vākyasya anena sādhutvam anvākhyāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4616_0: 544-545 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na hi tatra kaḥ cit dīvyacchabdaḥ paṭhyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4616_1: tarhi . dīvyatiśabdaḥ . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . prāk dīvyateḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4616_2: tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ prāk dīvyateḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . dīvyatiśabde dīvyacchabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4616_3: asti . tasmāt eṣā pañcamī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vikṛtanirdeśaḥ kriyate . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:4617_0: ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . ekadeśavikrṭeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4617_1: upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na kartavyam bhavati . atha vā prākśabdaḥ ayam dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4617_2: . dikśabdaiḥ ca yoge pañcamī bhavati . tatra aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti śatā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4619_0: 545 atha prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacanam sakṛdvidhānārtham . prāgvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4619_1: sakṛdvidhānārtham . sakṛdvihitaḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ yathā syāt . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4619_2: mā kārṣam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . adhikārāt api etat siddham . adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4619_3: pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . adhikārāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4619_4: cet apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4619_5: . ataḥ iñ aṇ ca iti aṇ api prāpnoti . tasmāt prāgvacanam . tasmāt prāgvacanam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_0: 545-547 atha kriyamāṇe api prāgvacane katham idam vijñāyate . prāk dīvyataḥ yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_1: āhosvit prāk dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate prāk dīvyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_2: yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti . atha vijñāyate prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_3: dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt utpadyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_4: iñ aṇam bhādhate . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . prāk dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_5: . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam prādhānyena artham pratinirdiśati . itarathā bahvyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_6: prakṛtayaḥ paṭhyante . tataḥ yām kām cit evam nimittatvena upādadīta . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_7: astu prāk dīvyataḥ yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_8: . na vā kva cit vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kva cit vāvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_9: yat ayam vāvacanam karoti pīlāyāḥ vā udaśvitaḥ anyatarasyām iti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_10: na apavādaviṣaye aṇ bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate na arthaḥ prāgvacanena . adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_11: siddham . nanu ca uktam adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_12: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parihṛtam etat na vā kva cit vāvacanāt iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam iyān
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_13: avadhiḥ gṛhyate . na prāk ṭhakaḥ iti eva ucyeta . etat jñāpayati artheṣu ayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4621_14: iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prakṛtiviśeṣāt upadyamānaḥ iñ aṇam bādhate .

GS24pmbhasuu:4625_0: 549 ṇyādayaḥ arthaviśeṣalakṣaṇāt aṇapavādāt pūrvavipratiṣeddham . ṇyādayaḥ arthaviśeṣalakṣaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4625_1: aṇapavādāt bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ṇyādīnām avakāśaḥ . ditiḥ devatā asya daityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4625_2: . athaviśeṣalakṣaṇasya aṇapavādasya avakāśaḥ . duleḥ apatyam dauleyaḥ bāleyaḥ . iha

GS24pmbhasuu:4625_4: avakāśaḥ . acittahastidhenoḥ ṭhak . āpūpikam śāṣkulikam . ṇyādīnām avakāśaḥ . bārhaspatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4625_5: prājāpatyam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . vanaspatīnām samūhaḥ vānaspatyam . ṇyādayaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4630_0: pauṃsnam . puṃs iti sakārāntaḥ nakāraśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . na sidhyati . saṃyogāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_1: lopaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi na eva arthaḥ nañā na api snañā . añ prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_2: . saḥ anuvartiṣyate nakāraḥ ca āgamaḥ vaktavyaḥ . atha nakārāgame sati kim pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_3: kariṣyate āhosvit parādiḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pūrvāntaḥ straiṇāḥ bahuṣu lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_4: . straiṇānām saṅghaḥ saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām aṇ iti aṇ prāpnoti . atha parādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_5: pauṃsam saḥ eva doṣaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ prāpnoti . astu pūrvāntaḥ . katham straiṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_6: straiṇānām saṅghaḥ iti . ubhayatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam . na ca idam laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_7: gotram . īkāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam . straiṇī pauṃsī iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_8: bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti nañsnañīkakkhuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_9: iti . ṭilopaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . nugvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . bhavet iha nugvacanāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_10: syāt straiṇam iti . iha tu khalu paūmsam iti nugvacanāt eva prāpnoti . tasmāt nañsnañau vaktavyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_0: 552 atha imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt āhosvit prāk vateḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_1: nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe pratiṣedhaḥ . nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . strīvat puṃvat iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ima
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_3: nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam vatim bādheyātām
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_4: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . vateḥ prāk iti vakṣyāmi . vateḥ prāk iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_5: bhāve upasaṅkhyānam . vateḥ prāk iti cet bhāve upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_6: straiṇam pumbhāvaḥ pauṃsnam iti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_7: ca uktam nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_8: jñāpayati na vatyarthe nañsnañau bhavataḥ iti yat ayam striyāḥ puṃvat iti nirdeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:4632_9: karoti . evam api strīvat iti na sidhyati . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_0: (4.1.88.1) P II.239.2 - 8 R III.553 iha kasmāt na bhavati traividyaḥ pāñcanadaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_1: iti . iha tāvat traividyaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate tisraḥ vidyāḥ adhīte traividyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_2: iti . katham tarhi . tryavayavā vidyā trividyā . trividyām adhīte traividyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_3: . iha api pāñcanadaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate pañcasu nadīṣu bhavaḥ pāñcanadaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_4: katham tarhi . pañcānām nadīnām samāhāraḥ pañcanadam . pañcanade bhavaḥ pāñcanadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_5: iti . ṣāṭkulaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate ṣaṭsu kuleṣu bhavaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_6: . ṣaṇṇām kulam ṣaṭkulam ṣaṭkule bhavaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ iti . ajādigrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_0: 554-556 dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam . dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_1: . dvigunimittam yaḥ taddhitaḥ tasya luk bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . pañcakapālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_2: idam khaṇḍam pāñcakapālam iti . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_3: atannimittāt api iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_4: . pancakapālyām saṃskrtaḥ iti api vigṛhya pañcakapālaḥ iti eva yathā syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_5: kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe katham idam vijñāyate . tasya nimittam tannimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_6: tannimittāt iti āhosvit saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_7: kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate tasya nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt iti kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_8: api tannimittagrahaṇe atra prāpnoti pañcakapālasya idam khaṇḍam iti . atha vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_9: saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yatha na
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_10: doṣaḥ tathā astu . saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_11: . kutaḥ etat . yat ayam āha arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_12: tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . dvigoḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_13: . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī . dvigoḥ taddhitasya luk bhavati . kim ca dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_14: . yasmin dviguḥ iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_15: vaktavyam arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . etat ca na vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_16: asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam . pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālyām saṃskṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_17: pañcakapālaḥ daśakapālaḥ iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_18: aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_19: avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati . evam pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ iti vigṛhya pañcakapālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_20: iti bhaviṣyati . pañcakapālyām saṃskṛtaḥ iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . traiśabdyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_21: iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_0: 556-557 gotre aluk aci iti cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . gotre aluk aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_1: cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . kā itaretarāśrayatā . alugnimittaḥ ajādiḥ ajādinimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_2: ca aluk . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_3: tu lukaḥ chavidhānam . vipratiṣedhāt tu lukaḥ chaḥ bhaviṣyati . lukaḥ avakāśaḥ gargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_4: vatsāḥ bidāḥ urvāḥ . chasya avakāśaḥ śālīyaḥ mālīyaḥ gārgīyaḥ vātsīyaḥ . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_5: prāpnoti . gargāṇām chātrāḥ gārgīyāḥ vātsīyaḥ . chaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_6: eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . bhūmni ca luk prāptaḥ bāhye ca arthe vidhīyate ajādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_7: . bahiraṅgam antaraṅgāt . vipratiṣedhāt ayuktam syāt . bhūmni prāptasya lukaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_8: ajādau taddhite alukam śāsti etat bravīti kūrvan samānakālau aluk luk ca . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_9: bhūmni prāptasya lukaḥ ajādau taddhite alukam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samānakālau
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_10: etau aluglukau iti . yadi vā lukaḥ prasaṅge bhavati aluk chaḥ tathā prasiddhaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_11: . yadi vā lukaḥ prasaṅge bhavati aluk bhavati tathā asya chaḥ prasiddhaḥ asya . pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_12: hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . luk vā alukaḥ prasaṅgam pratīkṣate che
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_13: aluk asya tathā . luk vā punaḥ alukaḥ prasaṅgam yadi pratīkṣate tathā asya che aluk
GS24pmbhasuu:4637_14: siddhaḥ bhavati . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_0: 558-562 gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk . gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_1: bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ . bidānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_2: māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau . kimartham idam na aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_3: . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_4: . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_5: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_6: . baidayoḥ bidāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_7: bhūt evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yad bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_8: iti bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_9: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_10: dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_11: ucyate . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . nanu ca uktam varṇāśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_12: na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_13: bhavanti tathā ca idam api bhaviṣyati . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_14: vakṣyāmi . yadi aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti ucyate bidānām apatyam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_15: māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ atra api prāpnoti . astu . punaḥ asya yuvabahutve vartamānasya luk
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_16: bhaviṣyati . punaḥ aluk kasmāt na bhavati . samarthānām prathamasya gotrapratyayāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_17: aluk ucyate . na ca etat samarthānām prathamam gotrapratyayāntam . kim tarhi . dvitīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_18: artham upasaṅkrāntam . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam atribharavājikā vasiṣṭhakaśyapikā
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_19: bhṛgvaṅgirasikākutsakuśikikā iti evamartham . gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam vā niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_20: . atha vā gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . etasya eva dvitīyam artham
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_21: upasaṅkrāntasya aluk bhavati na anyasya iti . yat api ucyate ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_22: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_23: luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yad bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_24: yañantam yat bahuṣu iti bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_25: syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_26: grahaṇam na ca etat laukikam gotram . yadi añantam yad bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_27: iti evam ucyate bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau atra api prāpnoti . aluk
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_28: atra likam bādhiṣyati . aluki ca kṛte punaḥ lukaḥ nimittam na asti iti kṛtvā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_29: luk na bhaviṣyati . uktam vā . kim uktam . āpatyaḥ vā gotram . paramaprakṛteḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_30: āpatyaḥ . āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ . saḥ ca astriyām . ekagotragrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_31: ca . bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham iti . tatra bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_32: bidaśabdāt dvyekayoḥ utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . baidaḥ baidau . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4639_33: māṇavakāḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt bahuṣu utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . bidā iti aviravikanyāyena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4641_0: 562-563 yūni luk aci iti cet pratyayasya ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . yūni luk aci iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:4641_1: pratyayasya ayatheṣṭam prāpnoti . aniṣṭe pratyaye avasthite luk . aniṣṭapratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4641_2: śravaṇam prasjyeta . siddham tu aviśeṣeṇa lugvacanam hali ca pratiṣedhaḥ . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4641_3: etat . katham . aviśeṣeṇa lukam uktvā hali na iti vakṣyāmi . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4641_4: bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam yūni luk aci iti cet pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4641_5: ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ. aci iti na eṣā parasaptamī . kā tarhi . viṣayasaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:4641_6: . ajādau viṣaye iti . tatra aci viṣaye luke kṛte yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_0: 563-565 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam sauvīragotrebhyaḥ ṇaṭhakchāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_1: . ṇa . phāṇṭāhṛteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ phāṇṭāhṛtaḥ . phāṇṭahṛtasya yūnaḥ chātrāḥ phāṇṭāhṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_2: . ṇa . ṭhak . bhāgavitteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ bhāgavittikaḥ . bhāgavittikasya yūnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_3: chātrāḥ bhāgavittāḥ . ṭhak . tailāyaneḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ tailāyanīyaḥ . tailāyanīya
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_4: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ tailāyanīyāḥ . iñṇyau sarvatra . iñṇyau sarvatra prayojanam . aupagaveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_5: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ . vṛddhavadatideśe sati iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_6: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyākhyāyate asau atideśaḥ . katham yāni prayojanāni . tāni jñāpakena
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_7: siddhāni . yatkhacchāntāt tarhi iñaḥ prayojanam . yat . śvaśurasya apatyam śvaśuryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_8: . śvaśuryasya apatyam śvāśuriḥ . śvāśureḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ śvāśurāḥ . yat . kha . kulasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_9: apatyam kulīnaḥ . kulīnasya apatyam kaulīniḥ . kaulīneḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ kaulīnāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_10: kha . cha . svasuḥ apatyam svasrīyaḥ . svasrīyasya apatyam svāsrīyiḥ . svāsrīyeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_11: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ svāsrīyāḥ . etāni api hi na santi prayojanāni . atra api yūni śvaśuryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_12: kulīnaḥ svasrīyaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . uktam etat aṇiñoḥ luki abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_13: yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam iti . abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt iti ucyate . na ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_14: abrāhmaṇagotramātram . abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt iti na ayam paryudāsaḥ yat anyat brāhmaṇagotramātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_15: iti . kim tarhi prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ brāhmaṇagotramātrāt na iti . avaśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_16: etat evam vijñeyam māyuriḥ kāpotiḥ kāpiñjaliḥ iti evamartham . evam tarhi aṇṇyau
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_17: sarvatra prayojanam . aṇ . glucukāyaneḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ glaucukāyanaḥ . glaucukāyanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4643_18: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ glaucukāyanāḥ . ṇyaḥ ca kāpiñjalādyartham . kāpiñjaleḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4645_0: 565-569 prāgdīvyatodhikāre yūnaḥ vṛddhavadatideśaḥ . prāgdīvyatodhikāre yūnaḥ vṛddhavadatideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4645_1: kartavyaḥ . yuvā vṛddhavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . gārgyāyaṇānām samūhaḥ gārgyāṇakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4645_2: . gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāṇakam . gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ . gotrāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4645_3: vuñ yathā syāt . yadi vṛddhavadatideśaḥ kriyate aupagaveḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4645_4: iti iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat iti anena anutpattiḥ atidiśyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:4645_5: . katham punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat iti anena anutpattiḥ śakyā atideṣṭum . vatinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4645_6: ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4646_0: uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi
GS24pmbhasuu:4646_1: iti . evam iha api yuvā vṛddhavat bhavati vṛddhavat na bhavati iti evam vākyaśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:4646_2: samarthayiṣyāmahe . yatha gotre yuvapratyayaḥ na bhavati evam prāgdīvyatodhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4646_3: yūni api na bhavati iti . tat vaktavyam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi yūni

GS24pmbhasuu:4646_9: etat ucyate atha vā etarhi yūni luk iti etat na kariṣyate . katham tarhi phakphiñoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4748_1: . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . svaram varjayitvā . kim prayojanam . vāmarathyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4748_2: chātrāḥ vāmarathāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ yathā syāt . yadi kaṇvādivat iti ucyate

GS24pmbhasuu:4750_1: . tākṣṇaḥ . yadi punaḥ ayam takṣanśabdaḥ śivādiṣu paṭhyeta . śivādiḥ iti cet ṇyavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4750_2: . śivādiḥ iti cet ṇyaḥ vidheyaḥ . tākṣṇyaḥ iti . siddham tu udīcām vā ṇyavacanāt

GS24pmbhasuu:4752: 612-613 kim idam kausalyakārmāryayoḥ vikṛtayoḥ grahaṇam kriyate . evam vikṛtābhyām yathā syāt . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_0: kausalyakārmāryābhyām ca iti . phiñprakaraṇe dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣaṇām yuṭ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_1: . phiñprakaraṇe dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣaṇām yuṭ ca iti vaktavyam . dagu dāgavyāyaniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_2: kosala kausalyāyaniḥ karmāra karmāryāyaṇiḥ chāga chāgyāyaniḥ vṛṣa vārṣyāyaṇiḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_3: yuṭ kriyate yuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . yuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_4: kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ādeśaḥ . nityaḥ yuṭ . kṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_5: ādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . yuṭ api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte ādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_6: anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_7: yuṭ . kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena yuṭ ucyate . utpanne pratyaye prakṛtipratyayau
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_8: āśritya aṅgasya ādeśaḥ ucyate . ādeśaḥ api antaraṅgaḥ . katham . vakṣyati etat āyanādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_9: upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham iti . anavakāśaḥ tarhi yuṭ . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_10: kariṣyate . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate dāgavyāyaniḥ oḥ guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_11: parādiḥ eva . nanu ca uktam yuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_12: doṣaḥ . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya yuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ādiṣṭasya yuḍvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_13: . yuṭ ca ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4753_14: kariṣyate . yuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_0: 613-614 yadi punaḥ ayam kuṭ parādiḥ kriyeta . kuṭi pratyayādeḥ ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_1: . kuṭi sati pratyayādeḥ ādeśaḥ na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . anāditvāt . kuṭi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_2: anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte nalopavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_3: . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate nalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cārmikāyaṇiḥ vārmikāyaṇiḥ . nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_4: prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . parādau punaḥ sati nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_5: iti nalopaḥ sidhyati . astu tarhi parādiḥ eva . nanu ca uktam kuṭi sati anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_6: ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya kuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_7: ca ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_8: kariṣyate . kuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_9: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam pūrvānte
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_10: nalopavacanam iti . kriyate etat nyāse eva carmivarmiṇoḥ nalopaḥ ca iti . kāribhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_11: iñaḥ agotrāt phiñ vipratiṣedhena . kāribhyaḥ iñ bhavati iti etasmāt agotrāt phiñ
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_12: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kāribhyaḥ iñ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ āyaskāriḥ lauhakāriḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4755_13: . phiñaḥ avakāśaḥ tāpasāyaniḥ sāmmitikāyaniḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . nāpitāyaniḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4757_1: saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām it aṇ prāpnoti . astu tarhi parādiḥ . yadi parādiḥ mānuṣī
GS24pmbhasuu:4757_2: añantāt īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi pūrvāntaḥ eva . katham mānuṣāḥ mānuṣāṇām

GS24pmbhasuu:4759_1: . pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñāyām yasya apatyavivakṣā tasya pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñā

GS24pmbhasuu:4759_3: bhūt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . samarthānām prathamāt vā iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4759_4: . samarthānām prathamasya yat apatyam pautraprabhṛti iti vijñāyate . jīvadvaṃśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4759_5: ca kutsitam . jīvadvaṃśyam ca kutsitam gotrasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam . gārgyaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4761_0: 617-619 jīvati tu vaṃśye yuvā iti pautraprabhṛtyapekṣam ca . jīvati tu vaṃśye yuvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4761_1: iti pautraprabhṛtyapekṣam ca iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4761_2: pautraprabhṛti iti vartate . evam tarhi anvācaṣṭe pautraprabhṛti iti vartate iti

GS24pmbhasuu:4761_5: tarhi pautre yuvasañjñā prāpnoti . etat api pautraprabhṛti bhavati . na pautraprabhṛti

GS24pmbhasuu:4864_1: tadviṣayavacanam . anyatra abhidheyam anityam bhavati . pāṇinīyam iti vā bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:4864_5: etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra yathādhikāram tadviṣayaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra yathādhikāram
GS24pmbhasuu:4864_6: tadviṣayatā prāpnoti . adhīte veda iti vartate . tena adhyetṛveditroḥ eva tadviṣayatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4864_7: syāt . ye anye upacārāḥ tatra na syāt . yathā iha bhavati pāṇinīyam mahat suvihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4864_8: iti evam iha api syāt kaṭham mahat suvihitam iti . siddham tu proktādhikāre tadviṣayavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4864_9: . siddham etat . katham . proktādhikāre eva tadviṣayatā vaktavyā . tena proktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4864_10: chandobrāhmaṇāni adhyetṛveditroḥ eva iti . tat tarhi adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4864_11: . nanu ca iha api kriyate . parārtham etad bhavati tat adhīte tat veda iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4864_12: tarhi yāvat iha chandobrāhmaṇagrahaṇam tāvat atra adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4864_13: tatra api kriyate . parārtham tat bhaviṣyati . purāṇprokteṣu brāhmaṇakalpeṣu śaunakādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4864_14: chandasi iti . iha vā chandobrāhmaṇagrahaṇam kriyate tatra vā adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_1: . yājñavalkāni brāhmaṇāni . saulabhāni . kim proktādhikāre tadviṣayatā kriyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_2: ataḥ yājñavakkyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na iti āha . sarvathā yājñavakkyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_3: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iniḥ vā prokte tadviṣayaḥ . atha vā iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_4: bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ bhavati iti ucyate paiṅgī kalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_5: atra api prāpnoti . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam ca kalpe niyamārtham . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_6: ca kalpe niyamārtham draṣṭavyam . kāśyapakauśikābhyām eva iniḥ kalpe tadviṣayaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_7: na anyebhyaḥ iti . evam api chaṇādīnām tadviṣayatā na prāpnoti . taittirīyāḥ vāratantavīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_8: . yadi punaḥ chaṇādayaḥ prokte tadviṣayāḥ bhavanti iti ucyeta . evam api paiṅgī kalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_9: atra api prāpnoti . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam ca kalpe niyamārtham iti eva . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_10: autsargikāṇām tadviṣayatā na prāpnoti . krauḍāḥ kāṅkatāḥ maudāḥ paippalādāḥ . chaṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_11: ca api autsargikān adhyetṛveditroḥ eva bādheran . ye anye upacārāḥ tatra na bādheran
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_12: . tittiriṇā proktāḥ ślokāḥ iti . asti tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . nanu ca uktam yājñavakyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_13: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat . yājñavakyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tulyakālatvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_14: . tatra eva vaktavyam . tadviṣayatā ca na bhavati iti . katham kāśyapinaḥ kauśikinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_15: iti . iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ bhavati iti ucyamāne avaśyam kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_16: kalpe niyamārtham draṣṭavyam . tat eva idānīm vidhyartham bhaviṣyati . katham pārāśariṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_17: bhikṣavaḥ śailālinaḥ naṭāḥ . atra api tadviṣayatā ca iti anuvartiṣyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:4868_7: katham jñāyate . yat ayam tat asya asti asmin iti matup iti dviḥ tadgrahaṇam na karoti

GS24pmbhasuu:4868_9: punaḥ santu nānāyogāḥ . nanu ca uktam oḥ añ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yat eva sarvāntyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4868_10: arthādeśanam tasya eva viṣaye syāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . goyūthavat adhikārāḥ . tat

GS24pmbhasuu:5073_0: (P_5,1.1) KA_II.336.2-23 Ro_IV.3-6 prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacane uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_1: uktam . tatra tāvat uktam prāgvacanam sakṛdvidhānārtham . adhikārāt siddham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_2: apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti . iha api prāgvacanam kriyate sakṛdvidhānārtham . sakṛt
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_3: vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ yathā syāt . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam mā kārṣam iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_4: etat asti prayojanam . adhikārāt api etat siddham . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_5: iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_6: . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaḥ prāpnoti . ugavādibhyaḥ yat chaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_7: iti chaḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt prāgvacanam kartavyam . atha kriymāṇe api prāgvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_8: katham idam vijñāyate . prāk krītāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ āhosvit prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_9: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate prāk krītāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_10: api chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . atha vijñāyate prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_11: . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt utpadyamānaḥ yat cham bādhiṣyate . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_12: astu. prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam prādhānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_13: artham pratinirdiśati . itarathā hi bahvyaḥ tatra prakṛtayaḥ paṭhyante . tataḥ yām
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_14: kām cit evam prakṛtim avadhitvena upādadīta . atha vā punaḥ astu prāk krītāt yāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_15: prakṛtayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam apavādaviṣaye api chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na vā kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_16: vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kva cit vāvacanāt . yat ayam kvac vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_17: karoti vibhāṣā havirapūpādibhyaḥ iti tat jñāpayati na apavādaviṣaye chaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_18: iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ prāgvacanena . adhikārāt siddham . nanu ca uktam adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_19: siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat ṇa vā kva cit vāvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_20: iti . atha kimartham iyān avadhiḥ gṛhyate na prāk ṭhañaḥ iti eva ucyeta . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5073_21: ācāryaḥ artheṣu ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt
