GS24pmbhasuu:5074_13: dhānāḥ iti . yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5074_14: . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5075_0: (P_5,1.2.2) KA_II.337.22-338.15 Ro_IV.7-10 ayam nābhiśabdaḥ gavādiṣu paṭhyate. tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5075_1: eva ucyate nābhi nabham ca iti . tatra codyate . nābheḥ nabhabhāve pratyayānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5075_2: prakṛtyabhāvāt . nābheḥ nabhabhāve pratyayānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5075_3: . vikṛteḥ prakṛtau abhidheyāyām pratyayena bhavitavyam na ca nābhisañjñikāyāḥ vikṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5075_4: prakṛtiḥ asti . yat eva hi tanmaṇḍalacakrāṇām maṇḍalacakram tat nabhyam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5075_5: . siddham tu śākhādiṣu vacanāt hrasvatvam ca . siddham etat . katham . śākhādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5075_6: nābhiśabdaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ hrasvatvam ca vaktavyam . nābhiḥ iva nabhyam iti . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5075_7: iha upamārthaḥ . yat tat akṣadhāraṇam parivartanam vā . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5076_0: yat tat añjanopāñjanam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam vaktavyam nābhi nabham ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5076_1: vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . yāni etāni aravanti cakrāṇi tadartham . tatra nābhisañjñikāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5076_2: vikṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ asti . yāni ca api anaravanti cakrāṇi tadartham api idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5076_3: . dṛśyate hi samudāyāt avayavasya pṛthaktvam . tat yathā vārkṣī śākhā iti . guṇāntarayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5076_4: ca vikāraśabdaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā vaibhītakaḥ yūpaḥ khādiram caṣālam iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5076_5: avayavasamudāye vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . atha yaḥ nabhyārthaḥ vṛkṣaḥ katham tatra bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5076_6: . nabhyaḥ vṛkṣaḥ nabhyā śiṃśipā iti . nabhyāt tu lugvacanam . nabhyāt tu luk vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5076_7: . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . nabhyārthaḥ nabhyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5077_0: (P_5,1.3) KA_II.338.17-21 Ro_IV.10 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham aśītiśatam
GS24pmbhasuu:5077_1: kambalyam iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . aparimāṇavistācitakambalebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5077_2: na taddhitaluki iti . idam tarhi prayojanam sañjñāyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:5077_3: . kambalīyāḥ ūrṇāḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . parimāṇaparyudāsena paryudāse
GS24pmbhasuu:5077_4: prāpte tatra kambalagrahaṇam kriyate parimāṇārtham parimāṇam ca sañjñā eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5078_0: (P_5,1.4) KA_II.338.23-339.2 Ro_IV.10-11 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:5078_1: . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . uvarṇāntāt iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5078_2: aprāpte . havirapūpādibhyaḥ aprāpte . havirapūpādibhyaḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā . prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:5079: (P_5,1.6) KA_II.339.4-5 Ro_IV.11 yatprakaraṇe rathāt ca . yatprakaraṇe rathāt ca upasaṅkhyānam . rathāya hitā rathyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_0: (P_5,1.7) KA_II.339.7-18 Ro_IV.11-12 vṛṣaśabdaḥ ayam akārāntaḥ gṛhyate . vṛṣanśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_1: api nakārāntaḥ asti . tasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam vṛṣaśabdaḥ ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_2: vṛṣṇe hitam iti vigṛhya vṛṣyam iti eva yathā syāt . tathā brahmanśabdaḥ nakārāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_3: gṛhyate . brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ ca akārāntaḥ asti . tasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam brahmanśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_4: ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ hitam iti vigṛhya brahmaṇyam iti eva yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_5: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . samānārthau etau vṛṣaśabdaḥ vṛṣanśabdaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_6: brahmanśabdaḥ brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ ca . ātaḥ ca samānārthau . evam hi āha . kutaḥ nu carasi
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_7: brahman . kutaḥ nu carasi brāhmaṇa iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_8: vigrahaḥ aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_9: iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati āvikam iti . evam iha api vṛṣāya hitam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_10: vigṛhya vṛṣyam iti bhaviṣyati . vṛṣṇe hitam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . tathā brahmaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_11: hitam iti vigṛhya brahmaṇyam iti bhaviṣyati . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ hitam iti vigṛhya vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5080_12: eva bhaviṣyati . traiśabdyam ca iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_1: pūrvapadārthahitatvāt . bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_2: anirdeśaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadārthahitatvāt . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_3: pūrvapadārthapradhāne ca pratyayaḥ iṣyate . pitṛbhogāya hite prāpnoti pitre ca eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_4: hite iṣyate . evam tarhi bhogīnarpratyayaḥ vijñāsyate . bhogīnar iti cet vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_5: . bhogīnar iti yadi pratyayaḥ vidhīyate vāvacanam kartavyam mātrīyaḥ pitrīyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_6: api yathā syāt . rājācāryābhyām nityam . rājācāryābhyām nityam iti vaktavyam . rājabhogīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_7: . ācāryāt aṇatvam ca . ācāryabhogīnaḥ . kim bhogīnarpratyayaḥ vidhīyate iti ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_8: rājācāryābhyām nityam iti vaktavyam . na iti āha . sarvathā rājācāryābhyām nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_9: iti vaktavyam . iha ca grāmaṇibhogīnaḥ senānibhogīnaḥ iti uttarapade iti hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_10: na prāpnoti . iha ca abbhoginaḥ iti apaḥ bhi iti tatvam prāpnoti . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_11: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ pūrvapadārthahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_12: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam bhogaśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā bhogavān
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_13: ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasnāni ca vartante . asti kriyāpadārthakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_14: tat yathā bhogavān ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ samyak snānādīḥ kriyāḥ anubhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_15: . tat yaḥ kriyāpadārthakaḥ tasya ayam grahaṇam . yaḥ ca pitṛsthābhyaḥ kriyābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_16: hitaḥ sambandhāt asau pitre api hitaḥ bhavati . yadi sambandhāt astu dravyapadārthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_17: api grahaṇam . yaḥ api hi pitṛdravyāya hitaḥ sambandhāt asau pitre hitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_18: . atha vā bhogaśabdaḥ śarīravācī api drśyate . tat yathā ahiḥ iva bhogaiḥ paryeti
GS24pmbhasuu:5081_19: bāhum iti. ahiḥ iva śarīraiḥ iti gamyate . evam pitṛśarīrāya hitaḥ pitṛbhogīṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_1: khavidhāne pañcajanāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pañcajanāya hitaḥ pañcajanīnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_2: samānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . yaḥ hi pañcānām janāya hitaḥ pañcajanīyaḥ saḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_3: . sarvajanāt ṭhañ ca . sarvajanāt ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ khaḥ ca . sarvajanāya hitaḥ sārvajanikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_4: sārvajanīnaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe iti ca vaktavyam . yaḥ hi sarveṣām janāya hitaḥ sarvajanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_5: saḥ . mahājanāt nityam . mahājanāt nityam ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . mahājanāya hitaḥ māhājanikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_6: . tatpuruṣe iti vaktavyam bahuvrīhau mā bhūt iti . mahān janaḥ asya mahājanaḥ mahājanāya
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_7: hitaḥ mahājanīyaḥ . yadi tarhi atiprasaṅgāḥ santi iti upādhiḥ kriyate ādyanyāse api
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_8: upādhiḥ kartavyaḥ . ātmanviśvajane samānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . yaḥ his viśveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_9: janāya hitaḥ viśvajanīyaḥ saḥ bhavati . atha matam etat anabhidhānāt ādyanyāse na
GS24pmbhasuu:5082_10: bhaviṣyati iti iha api na arthaḥ upādhigrahaṇena . iha api anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5083: (P_5,1.10) KA_II.341.8-13 Ro_IV. 15-16 sarvāt ṇasya vāvacanam . sarvāt ṇasya vā iti vaktavyam . sārvaḥ sarvīyaḥ . puruṣāt vadhe . puruṣāt vadhe iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5085: puruṣāt vadhe iti . puruṣāt vadhavikārasamūhatenakṛteṣu iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5090_0: (P_5,1.12) KA_II.341.15-20 Ro_IV.16 tadartham iti kṛtyanāmabhyaḥ ṭhañ . tadartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5090_1: iti kṛtyanāmabhyaḥ ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . indramahārtham aindramahiham gāṅgāmahiham kāśeruyajñikam
GS24pmbhasuu:5090_2: . na vā prayojanena kṛtatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . prayojanena kṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5090_3: . yat hi indramahārtham indramahaḥ tasya prayojanam bhavati . tatra prayojanam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_1: upadhyartham iti pratyayasya iha anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . upadhyabhāvāt . vikṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_2: prakṛtau abhidheyāyām pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca upadhisañjñikāyāḥ vikṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_3: asti . yat hi tat rathāṅgam tat aupadheyam iti ucyate . siddham tu kṛdantasya svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_4: añvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kṛdantasya svārthe añ vaktavyaḥ . upadhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_5: upadheyam . upadheyam eva aupadheyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_6: eva astu . nanu ca uktam upadhyartham iti pratyayānupapattiḥ iti . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_7: ayam upadhiśabdaḥ asti eva karmasādhanaḥ . upadhīyate upadhiḥ iti . asti bhāvasādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_8: . upadhānam upadhiḥ iti . tat yaḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . evam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_9: sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . vikṛteḥ prakṛtau iti vartate . prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇam nivartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_10: . tat ca avaśyam nivartyam ihārtham uttarātham ca . ihārtham tāvat . bāleyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_11: . uttarārtham ṛṣabhopānahoḥ ñyaḥ . ārṣabhyaḥ vatsaḥ iti . atha tadartham iti anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_12: utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham arthaḥ . tat asya tat asmin syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_13: tadarthe yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt iti . prākāraḥ nagarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_14: syāt iti . yadi tadartham iti anuvartate ṛṣabhopānahoḥ ñyaḥ ṛṣabhārthaḥ ghāsaḥ upānadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_15: tilakalkaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi anuvartate prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_16: nanu ca uktam balyṛṣabhayoḥ na sidhyati iti . kim punaḥ bhavān vikāram matvā āha
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_17: balyṛṣabhayoḥ na sidhyati iti . yadi tāvat yaḥ prakṛtyupamardena bhavati saḥ vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_18: vaibhītakaḥ yūpaḥ khādiram caṣālam iti na sidhyati . atha matam etat eva guṇāntarayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_19: vikāraḥ iti balyṛṣabhayoḥ api siddham bhavati . guṇantarayuktāḥ hi taṇḍulāḥ bāleyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5091_20: guṇāntarayuktaḥ ca vatsaḥ ārṣabhaḥ . aupadheyam tu na sidhyati . vacanāt svārthikaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_0: (P_5,1.16) KA_II.342.22-343.6 Ro_IV.19-21 syādgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_1: prāsādaḥ devadattasya prākāraḥ nagarasya iti . atha kriyamāṇe api syādgrahaṇe iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_2: kasmāt na bhavati . prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt . prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti . śakyārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_3: liṅ iti vaktavyam . na evam śakyam . idānīm eva hi uktam na hi upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_4: viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam iti . evam tarhi itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . tataḥ cet vivakṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_5: bhavati . vivakṣā ca dvayī . asti eva prāyoktrī vivakṣā asti laukikī . prayoktā hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_6: mṛdvyā snigdhayā ślakṣṇayā jihvayā mṛdūn snigdhān ślakṣṇān śabdān prayuṅkte . laukikī
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_7: vivakṣā yatra prāyasya sampratyayaḥ . prāyaḥ iti lokaḥ vyapadiśyate . na ca prāsādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_8: devadattasya syāt prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti atra utpadyamānena pratyayena prāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_9: sampratyayaḥ syāt . yadi evam na arthaḥ syādgrahaṇena . na hi prāsādaḥ devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5092_10: syāt prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti atra utpadyamānena pratyayena prāyasya sampratyayaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_0: (P_5,1.19.1) KA_II.343.8-344.10 Ro_IV.22-25 kimartham saṅkhyāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_1: na saṅkhyā api parimāṇam eva tatra parimāṇaparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_2: tarhi siddhe sati yat saṅkhyayāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_3: saṅkhyā anyat parimāṇam iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . aparimāṇabistācitakambaelbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_4: na taddhitaluki iti dvābhyām śatābhyām krītā dviśatā triśatā parimāṇaparyudāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_5: na bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate tat asya parimāṇam saṅkhyāyāḥ sañjñāsaṅghasūtrādhyayaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_6: iti viśeṣaṇam na prakalpate parimāṇam yā saṅkhyā iti . iha ca krītavat parimāṇat
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_7: iti saṅkhyāvihitasya pratyayasya atideśaḥ na prakalpate . śatasya vikāraḥ śatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_8: śatikaḥ . sāhasraḥ iti . yat tāvat ucyate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyā saṅkhyā anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_9: parimāṇam iti . nyāyasiddham eva etat . bhedamātram saṅkhyā āha . yat ca iṣīkāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_10: yat ca aparimāṇam sarvasya saṅkhyā bhedamātram bravīti . parimāṇam tu sarvataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_11: sarvataḥ mānam iti ca ataḥ parimāṇam iti . prasthasya ca samānākṛteḥ na kutaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_12: viśeṣaḥ gamyate na ca unmānataḥ na parimāṇataḥ na pramāṇataḥ . kim punaḥ unmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_13: kim parimāṇam kim pramāṇam . ūrdhvamānam kila unmānam . ūrdhvam yat mīyate tat unmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_14: . parimāṇam tu sarvataḥ . sarvataḥ mānam iti ca ataḥ parimāṇam . kuta etat . pariḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_15: sarvatobhāve vartate . āyāmaḥ tu pramāṇam syāt . āyāmavivakṣāyām pramāṇam iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_16: bhavati . saṅkhyā bāhyā tu sarvataḥ . ātaḥ ca sarvataḥ saṅkhyā bāhyā . bhedabhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_17: bravīti eṣā na eṣā mānam kutaḥ cana . evam ca kṛtvā saṅkhyāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_18: . yat api ucyate tat asya parimāṇam saṅkhyāyāḥ sañjñāsaṅghasūtrādhyayaneṣu iti viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_19: na prakalpate iti . āha ayam parimāṇam yā saṅkhyā iti . na ca asti saṅkhyā parimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_20: . tatra vacanāt iyatī vivakṣā bhaviṣyati . yad api ucyate krītavat parimāṇat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5093_21: saṅkhyāvihitasya pratyayasya atideśaḥ na prakalpate iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti ca tatra vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_0: (P_5,1.19.2) KA_II.344.11-345.7 Ro_IV.25-27 kim punaḥ ime ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_1: āhosvit saha arheṇa . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_2: . ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ . arhe ṭhagādayaḥ vidheyāḥ . śatam arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_3: śatyaḥ śatikaḥ . sāharaḥ iti . vasne vasanāt siddham . iha yaḥ śatam arhati śatam
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_4: tasya vasnaḥ bhavati . tatra saḥ asya aṃśavasnabhṛtayaḥ iti eva siddham . vasne vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_5: siddham iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu aprāptiḥ . vasne vacanāt siddham iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_6: aprāptiḥ . māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ kālāyasūpikaḥ . tathā guṇānām paripraśnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_7: bhavati . kim ayam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati . śatam arhati śatyaḥ śatikaḥ sāhasraḥ naiṣkikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_8: iti na sidhyati . santu tarhi sahārheṇa . ā arhāt cet bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_9: ā arhāt cet bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bhojanam arhati . pānam arhati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_10: . kim ucyate bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ iti yadā chedādibhyaḥ iti ucyate . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_11: māṃsaudanikādyartham yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat arhati . tataḥ chedādibhyaḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_12: iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5094_13: anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt bhojanādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati [R:
GS24pmbhasuu:5095_0: bhaviṣyati] . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ na kariṣyate . katham māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5095_1: kālāyasūpikaḥ . asmin dīyate asmai iti ca evam etat siddham . atha vā punaḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:5095_2: prāk arhāt . nanu ca uktam ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ iti . parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5095_3: etat vasne vacanāt siddham iti . nanu ca uktam vasne vacanāt siddham iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5095_4: aprāptiḥ . māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ kālāyasūpikaḥ . tathā guṇānām paripraśnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5095_5: bhavati . kim ayam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati . śatam arhati śatyaḥ śatikaḥ sāhasraḥ naiṣkikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5095_6: iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asmin dīyate asmai iti ca evam etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_0: (P_5,1.20.1) KA_II.345.9-25 Ro_IV. 27-29 asamāse iti kimartham . paramaniṣkeṇa krītam
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_1: paramanaiṣkikam . na etat asti . niṣkaśabdāt pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_2: yat paramaniṣkaśabdāt syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_3: prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantividhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . niṣkādiṣu asamāsagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_4: jñāpakam pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhasya . niṣkādiṣu asamāsagrahaṇam kriyate jñāpakārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_5: . kim jñāpyam . pūrvatra tadantvidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_6: prayojanam . prāk vateḥ ṭhañ iti atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_7: prayojanam . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantividhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . na ca ṭhañvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_8: kā cit prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā arhāt agopucchasaṅkhyāparimāṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_9: ṭhak . paramagopucchena krītam pāramagopucchikam . atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_10: . etat api na asti prayojanam . vidhau pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_11: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ itaḥ uttaram tadantavidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_12: jñāpane prayojanam . pāryāṇaturāyaṇacāndrāyaṇam vartayati dvaipārāyaṇikaḥ traipārāyaṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_13: . atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_14: . prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam aluki . pūrvatra eva tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5096_15: . khalayavamāṣatilavṛṣabrahmaṇaḥ ca iti . kṛṣṇatilebhyaḥ hitaḥ kṛṣṇatilyaḥ . rājamāṣebhyaḥ hitam rājamāṣyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5097_0: (P_5,1.20.2) KA_II.346.1-4 Ro_IV.29-30 prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5097_1: aluki . prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam aluki kartavyam . pāryāṇaturāyaṇacāndrāyaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5097_2: vartayati dvaipārāyaṇikaḥ traipārāyaṇikaḥ . aluki iti kimartham . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5097_3: krītam dviśūrpam . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5098_0: (P_5,1.21) KA_II.346.6-8 Ro_IV.30-31 śatapratiṣedhe anyaśatatve apratiṣedhaḥ . śatapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:5098_1: anyaśatatve pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam. iha mā bhūt . śatena krītam śatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5098_2: śāṭakaśatam iti . anyaśatatve iti kim . śatakam nidānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_0: (P_5,1.22) KA_II.346.10-18 Ro_IV.31-32 ḍateḥ ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_1: . katibhiḥ krītam katikam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tyantāyāḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_2: prāpnoti . tipratiṣedhāt ḍatigrahaṇam iti cet arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . arthavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_3: tiśabdasya grahaṇam na ca ḍateḥ tiśabdaḥ arthavān . na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_4: . na hi kevalena pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate . kena tarhi . saprakṛtikena . kva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_5: eṣā paribhāṣā bhavati . yāni etāni śabdasaṅghātagrahaṇāni . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_6: na vaktavyam . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . nanu ca uktam na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_7: vijñātum . na hi kevalena pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate iti . kevalena api pratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_0: (P_5,1.23) KA_II.346.20-347.8 Ro_IV.32-33 kasya ayam iṭ vidhīyate . kanaḥ iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_1: . tat kanaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi kanaḥ grahaṇe pratyayādhikārāt pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_2: ayam vijñāyeta . ṭitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ādiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat ṭitkaraṇe prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_3: . ṭitaḥ iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . akārāntaprakaraṇe īkāraḥ na ca eṣaḥ akārāntaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_4: api kutaḥ etat ṭitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ādiḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ akārāntaprakaraṇe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_5: anakārāntāt api īkāraḥ syāt . tasmāt kaṇaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_6: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāyāḥ atiśadantāyāḥ kan iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_7: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . vatoḥ iti eṣā pañcamī kan iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_8: prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_9: pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5101_0: (P_5,1.24) KA_II.347.10-14 Ro_IV.33-34 asañjñāyām iti kimartham . triṃśatkaḥ viṃśatkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5101_1: . katham ca atra kan bhavati . saṅkhyāyāḥ kan bhavati iti . atiśadantāyāḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5101_2: prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati atra kan iti yat ayam viṃśatikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5101_3: khaḥ iti pratyayāntanipātanam karoti . viṃśateḥ etat jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:5101_4: yogāpekṣam jñāpakam . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . viṃśatitriṃśabhyām kan bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5102_0: (P_5,1.25) KA_II.347.16-20 Ro_IV.34 ṭithan ardhāt ca . ṭithan ardhāt ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5102_1: . ardhikaḥ ardhikī . kārṣāpaṇāt vā pratiḥ ca . kārṣāpaṇāt ṭiṭhan vaktavyaḥ vā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5102_2: pratiḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kārṣāpaṇikaḥ kārṣāpaṇikī pratikaḥ pratikī .
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_0: (P_5,1.28) KA_II.347.22-349.4 Ro_IV.35-37 dvigoḥ luki uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_1: uktam dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam. arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_2: . iha api dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam . dvigoḥ nimittam yaḥ taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_3: tasya luk bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_4: . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_5: atannimittāt api . arthaviśeṣasya asampratyaye atannimittāt api vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_6: . dvayoḥ śūrpayoḥ samāhāraḥ dviśūrpī . dviśūrpyā krītam iti vigṛhya dviśūrpam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_7: eva yathā syāt . atha kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe katham idam vijñāyate . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_8: nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt iti āhosvit saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_9: tannimittāt iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate tasya nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_10: iti kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe atra prāpnoti . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_11: . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam . atha vijñāyate saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_12: nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yatha na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_13: tathā astu . saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_14: etat . yat ayam āha arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . tat tarhi tannimittagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_15: kartavyam . na kartavyam . dvigoḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_16: . dvigoḥ taddhitasya luk bhavati . kim ca dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . nimittam . yasmin dviguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_17: iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . idam tarhi vaktavyam arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_18: atannimittāt api iti . etat ca na vaktavyam . iha asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_19: dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_20: . traiśaurpikam iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ aparasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_21: utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_22: utpattiḥ bhavati . evam iha api dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam iti vigṛhya dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_23: iti bhaviṣyati . dviśūrpyā krītam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva bhaviṣyati . atha asañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_24: iti kimartham . pāñcalohitikam pāñcakalāpikam . sañjñāpratiṣedhānarthakyam ca tannimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_25: lopasya . sañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tannimittatvāt lopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_26: . na antareṇa taddhitam taddhitasya ca lukam dviguḥ sañjñā asti . yaḥ tasmāt utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_27: na asu tannimittam syāt . evam tarhi idam syāt . pañcānām lohitānām samāhāraḥ pañcalohitī
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_28: pañcalohityā krītam . atra api pañcalohitam iti eva bhavitavyam . katham . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_29: hi etat arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . uktam saṅkhyātve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_30: tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam . uktam saṅkhyātve adhyardhagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_31: . kim uktam . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca samāsakanvidhyartham luki ca agrahaṇam iti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_32: iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam . tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇam anarthakam . dvigoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5105_0: (P_5,1.30-31) KA_II.349.12-18 Ro_IV.37-38 dvitribhyām dvaiyogyam . dvitribhyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5105_1: yat ucyate dvaiyogyam etat draṣṭavyam . kim idam dvaiyogyam iti . dvayoḥ yogayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5105_2: bhavam dviyogam . dviyogasya bhāvaḥ dvaiyogyam iti . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5106: aviśeṣeṇa itaḥ uttaram dvitribhyām iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:5107: dvitribhyām dvaiyogyam iti . tatra ca bahugrahaṇam . tatra ca bahugrahaṇam kartavyam . bahuniṣkam bahunaiṣkikam . bahubistam bahubaistikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5108_0: (P_5,1.33) KA_II.349.20-350.4 Ro_IV.38 khāryāḥ īkan kevalāyāḥ ca . khāryāḥ īkan kevalāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5108_1: ca iti vaktavyam . khārīkam . kākiṇyāḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam .kākiṇyāḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5108_2: kartavyam . adhyardhakākiṇīkam dvikākiṇīkam . kevalāyāḥ ca . kevalāyāḥ ca iti vaktavyam . kākiṇīkam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5109_0: (P_5,1.35) KA_II.350.6-11 Ro_IV.38-39 śataśāṇābhyām vā . śataśāṇābhyām vā iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5109_1: . adhyardhaśatam adhyardhaśatyam pañcaśatam pañcaśatyam adhyardhaśāṇam adhyardhaśāṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5109_2: pañcaśāṇam pañcaśāṇyam . dvitripūrvāt aṇ ca . dvitripūrvāt aṇ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5109_3: dviśāṇam triśāṇam dvaiśāṇam traiśāṇam dviśāṇyam triśāṇyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_0: (P_5,1.37) KA_II.350.13-351.6 Ro_IV.39-40 tena krītam iti karaṇāt . tena krītam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_1: atra karaṇāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadattena krītam . yajñadattena krītam
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_2: iti . akartrekāntāt . akartrekāntāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadattena pāṇinā
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_3: krītam iti . saṅkhyaikavacanāt dvigoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_4: . iha api yathā syāt . pañcabhiḥ krītam pañcakam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_5: . ekavacanāntāt iti vakṣyati . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . ekavacanāt . ekavacanāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_6: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . śūrpābhyām krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti . dvigoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_7: . dvigoḥ ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_8: triśūrpam iti . yadi ekavacanāntāt iti ucyate mudgaiḥ krītam maudgikam māṣaiḥ krītam
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_9: māṣikam iti na sidhyati . parimāṇasya saṅkhyāyāḥ yat ekavacanam tadantāt iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_10: . tat tarhi ekavacanāntāt iti vaktavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe bahu vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_11: . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati śūrpābhyām krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_12: vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . yadi evam karaṇāt akartrekāntāt iti api na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_13: . kartuḥ kartrekāntāt vā kasmāt na bhavati . anabhidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5111_0: (P_5,1.38) KA_II.351.8-14 Ro_IV.40-41 saṃyoganipātayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ . saṃyogaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:5111_1: saḥ bhavati idam kṛtvā idam avāpyate iti . utpātaḥ nāma saḥ bhavati yādṛcchikaḥ bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5111_2: vā chedaḥ vā padmam vā parṇam vā . tasyanimittaprakaraṇe vātapittaśleṣmabhyaḥ śamakopanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5111_4: kartavyam . vātasya śamanam kopanam vā vātikam . paittikam ślaiṣmikam . sannipātāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5111_5: ca . sannipātāt ca iti vaktavyam . sānnipātikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5112_0: (P_5,1.39) KA_II.351.16-18 Ro_IV.41 yatprakaraṇe brahmavarcasāt ca . yatprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5112_1: brahmavarcasāt ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . brahmavarcasasya nimittam brahmvarcasyaḥ . utpātaḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5113_0: (P_5,1.47) KA_II.351.20-352.2 Ro_IV.41 tad asmin dīyate asmai iti ca . tad asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5113_1: dīyate asmai iti ca iti vaktavyam . pañca vṛddhiḥ vā āyaḥ vā lābhaḥ vā śulkaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5113_2: upadā vā dīyate asmai pañcakaḥ . saptakaḥ . aṣṭakaḥ . navakaḥ . daśakaḥ . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5113_3: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yat hi yasmai dīyate tasmin api tat dīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5113_4: . tat asmin dīyate iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5114_0: (P_5,1.48) KA_II.352.4-8 Ro_IV.41-42 ṭhanprakaraṇe anantāt upasaṅkhyānam . ṭhanprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5114_1: anantāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvitīyakaḥ . tṛtīyakaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5114_2: . pūraṇāt iti ucyate . na ca etat pūraṇāntam . anā etat paryavapannam . pūraṇam nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:5114_3: arthaḥ . tam artham āha tīyaśabdaḥ . pūraṇam saḥ asau bhavati . pūraṇantāt svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5114_4: bhāge an . saḥ api pūraṇam bhavati eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5115: (P_5,1.52) KA_II.352.10-11 Ro_IV.42 tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca . tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca iti vaktavyam . droṇam pacati . drauṇī . drauṇikī .
GS24pmbhasuu:5116_0: (P_5,1.55) KA_II.352.13-15 Ro_IV.42-43 kulijāt ca iti siddhe lukkhagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5116_1: pūrvsamin trikabhāvāt . kulijāt ca iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ lukkhagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5116_2: kim kāraṇam . pūrvasmin trikabhāvāt . pūrvasmin yoge sarvaḥ eṣaḥ trikaḥ nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_0: (P_5,1.57-58.1) KA_II.352.18-354.6 Ro_IV.43-46 sañjñāyām svārthe . sañjñāyām svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_1: pratyayaḥ utpādyaḥ . pañca eva pañcakāḥ śakunayaḥ . trikāḥ śālaṅkāyanāḥ . saptakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_2: brahmavṛkṣāḥ . tataḥ parimāṇini . tataḥ paraḥ pratyayaḥ parimāṇini iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_3: . pañcakaḥ saṅghaḥ . daśakaḥ saṅghaḥ . jīvitaparimāṇe ca upasaṅkhyānam . jīvitaparimāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_4: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam asya ṣāṣṭikaḥ . sāptatikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_5: jīvitaparimāṇe ca iti anarthakam vacanam kālāt iti siddhatvāt . jīvitaparimāṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_6: iti anarthakam vacanam . kim kāraṇam . kālāt iti siddhatvāt . kālāt iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_7: . iha yasya ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam ṣaṣtim asu bhūtaḥ bhavati . tatra tam adhīṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_8: bhṛtaḥ bhūtaḥ bhāvī iti eva siddham . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . iha vacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_9: hi lukprasaṅgaḥ . iha hi kriyamāṇe luk prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_0: dviṣāṣṭikaḥ . triṣāṣṭikaḥ . anena sati luk bhavati . tena sati kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_1: . ā arhāt iti ucyate . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi ime kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_2: saṅkhyāśabdāḥ ime . ime api kālaśabdāḥ . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_3: tarhi yaḥ yaḥ kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_4: . ramaṇīyam kālam bhūtaḥ . śobhanam kālam bhūtaḥ . atha matam etat . kāle dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_5: śabdaḥ kālaśabdaḥ kālam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti na ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_6: . jīvitaparimāṇe tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vārṣaśatikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_7: . vārṣasahasrikaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . na hi varṣaśataśabdaḥ saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_8: . kim tarhi saṅkhyeye vartate varṣaśataśabdaḥ . evam tarhi anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_9: khāraśatādyartham . anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . khāraśatādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_10: . khāraśatikaḥ rāśiḥ . khārasahastrikaḥ rāśiḥ . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ . iha vacane hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_11: lukprasaṅgaḥ iti . na brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_12: . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ . param arhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_13: . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kālāt iti eva siddham . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_14: ca uktam na ime kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi . saṅkhyāśabdāḥ iti . nanu ca uktam ime api
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_15: kālaśabdāḥ . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate . nanu ca uktam yadi tarhi yaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_16: kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati iti . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_17: . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt ramaṇīyādiṣu utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5119: (P_5,1.57-58.2) KA_II.354.7-9 Ro_IV.46 stome ḍavidhiḥ pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . stome ḍaḥ vidheyaḥ . kim prayojanam . pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ . saptadaśaḥ stomaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_0: (P_5,1.59) KA_II.355.2-357.8 Ro_IV.46-56 ime viṃśatyādayaḥ saprakṛtikāḥ sapratyayakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_1: nipātyante . tatra na jñāyate kā prakṛtiḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ kaḥ pratyayārthaḥ iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_2: vaktavyam iyam prakṛtiḥ ayam pratyayaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti . ime brūmaḥ dviśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_3: ayam daśadarthābhidāhinaḥ svārthe śaticpratyayaḥ nipātyate vinbhāvaḥ ca . dvau daśatau
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_4: viṃśatiḥ . viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ . viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_5: samāsaḥ na upapadyate . viṃśatigavam iti . kim kāraṇam . dravyam anabhihitam . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_6: anabhihitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . ṣaṣṭhyantam ca samāse pūrvam nipatati . tatra goviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_7: iti prāpnoti . na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca viṃśatigavam tu na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_8: . iha ca triṃśatpūlī catvāriṃśatpūlī samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ samāsaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_9: . vacanam ca vidheyam . viṃśatiḥ . dvitvāt daśatoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_10: prāpnoti . evam tarhi parimāṇini viṃśatyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . parimāṇini cet punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_11: svārthe pratyayavidhānam . parimāṇini cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . viṃśakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_12: saṅghaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ ca . ṣaṣṭhī ca vidheyā . gavām viṃśatiḥ . dravyam abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_13: . tasya abhihitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . ekavacanam ca vidheyam . viṃśatiḥ gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_14: . gobhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti . anārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_15: vā prātipadikavijñānāt yathā sahasrādiṣu . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ viṃśatyādīnām nyāyyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_16: . katham sidhyati . prātipadikavijñānāt . katham prātipadikavijñānam . viṃśatyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_17: avyutpannāni prātipadikāni yathā sahasrādiṣu . tat yathā sahasram ayutam arbudam
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_18: iti na ca anugamaḥ kriyate bhavati ca abhidhānam . yathā sahasrādiṣu iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_19: atha sahasrādiṣu api katham bhavitavyam . sahasram gavām . sahasram gāvaḥ . sahasragavam
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_20: . gosahasram iti . yāvatā atra api sandehaḥ na asūyā kartavyā yatra anugamaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_21: . nanu ca uktam viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ . parimāṇini cet punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_22: svārthe pratyayavidhānam . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāye viṃśatyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_23: bhaviṣyanti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saṅghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_24: iti vartate . saṅghaḥ samūhaḥ samudāyaḥ iti anarthāntaram . te ete viṃśatyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_25: samudāye santaḥ bhāvavacanāḥ bhavanti bhāvavacanāḥ santaḥ guṇavacanāḥ bhavanti guṇavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_26: santaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti anyaiḥ guṇavacanaiḥ . anyeṣu ca guṇavacaneṣu kadā cit guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5120_27: guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti . kadā cit guṇinā guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_0: paṭasya śuklaḥ iti . tat yadā tāvat ucyate viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_1: iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tadā guṇaguṇinoḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ tiṣṭhatu tāvat . parimāṇini
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_2: cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayavidhānam iti saṃhanane vṛttaḥ saṃhanane vartiṣyate . saṅkhyāsaṃhanane
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_3: vṛttaḥ dravyasaṃhanane vartiṣyate . atha ṣaṣṭhī tadā guṇinā guṇaḥ viśeṣyate . vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_4: ubhayoḥ api . yadi tarhi ime viṃśatyādayaḥ guṇavacanāḥ syuḥ sadharmabhiḥ anyaiḥ guṇavacanaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_5: bhavitavyam . anye ca guṇavacanāḥ dravyasya liṅgasaṅkhye anuvartante . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_6: . śuklam vastram . śuklā śāṭī . śuklaḥ kambalaḥ . śuklau kambalau . śuklāḥ kambalāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_7: iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_8: . viṃśatyādayaḥ punaḥ na anuvartante . anye api vai guṇavacanāḥ na avaśyam dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_9: liṅgasaṅkhye anuvartante . tat yathā . gāvaḥ dhanam . putrā apatyam . indrāgnī devatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_10: . viśvedevāḥ devatā . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyai iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_11: . atha atra ananuvṛttau hetuḥ śakyaḥ vaktum . bāḍham śakyaḥ vaktum . kāmam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_12: ucyatām . iha kadā cit guṇaḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5122: pañca uḍupaśatāni tīrṇāni . pañca phalakaśatāni tīrṇāni . aśvaiḥ yuddham . asibhiḥ yuddham iti . na ca asayaḥ yudhyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:5123_0: asiguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ yudhyante guṇaḥ tu khalu prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . iha tāvat gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5123_1: dhanam iti dhinoteḥ dhanam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . putrāḥ apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5123_2: iti apatanāt apatyam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . indrāgnī devatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5123_3: viśvedevāḥ devatā iti diveḥ aiśvaryakarmaṇaḥ devaḥ . tasmāt svārthe tal . ekaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5123_4: . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5123_5: iti dakṣeḥ vṛddhikarmaṇaḥ dakṣiṇā ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5123_6: ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . viṃśatyādiṣu ca api ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5123_7: vivakṣitaḥ . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi viṃśatyādiṣu bhāvavacaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5123_8: doṣaḥ . goviṃśatiḥ ānīyatām iti bhāvānayane codite dravyānanam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5124_0: atha iha gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti katham ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇalambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:5124_1: kriyante iti . asambhavāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite
GS24pmbhasuu:5124_2: dravye ārambhaṇādīni kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva . asambhavāt bhāvānayanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_1: . chedādipathibhyaḥ nityagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vigrahadarśanāt . vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_2: dṛśyate . chedam arhati . panthānam gacchati iti . vikārārtham tarhi idam nityagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_3: kriyate . vikāreṇa vigrahaḥ mā bhūt iti . virāgaviraṅgam ca . panthaḥ ṇa nityam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_4: . vikārārtham iti cet akaṅādibhiḥ tulyam . vikārārtham iti cet akaṅādibhiḥ tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_5: etat . yathā akaṅādibhiḥ vikāraiḥ vigrahaḥ na bhavati evam ābhyām api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_6: . kim punaḥ iha akartavyam nityagrahaṇam kriyate āhosvit anyatra kartavyam na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_7: . iha akartavyam kriyate . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta sanniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_8: ubhayoḥ api abhāvaḥ . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattābhyām idam kartavyam iti . devadattāpāye
GS24pmbhasuu:5126_0: (P_5,1.71) KA_II.357.22-24 Ro_IV.58 yajñartvigbhyāmtat karma arhati iti upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5126_1: . yajñartvigbhyāmtat karma arhati iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . yjañakarma arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:5126_2: yajñiyaḥ deśaḥ . ṛtvikkarma arhati ārtvijīnam brāhmaṇakulam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5127_0: (P_5,1.72) KA_II.358.2-10 Ro_IV.58-59 tat vartayati iti anirdeśaḥ tatra adarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5127_1: . tat vartayati iti anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . pārāyaṇam kaḥ vartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5127_2: . yaḥ parasya karoti . turāyaṇam kaḥ vartayati . yaḥ carupuroḍāśān nirvapati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5127_3: adarśanāt . na ca tatra pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . iṅyajyoḥ ca darśanāt . iṅyajyoḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5127_4: dṛśyate . yaḥ pārāyaṇam adhīte saḥ pārāyaṇikaḥ iti ucyate . yaḥ turāyaṇena yajate
GS24pmbhasuu:5127_5: saḥ taurāyaṇikaḥ iti ucyate . yaḥ ca eva adhīte yaḥ parasya karoti ubhau tau vartayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5127_6: . yaḥ ca yajate yaḥ ca yaḥ carupuroḍāśān nirvapati ubhau tau vartayataḥ . ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5128_0: (P_5,1.74) KA_II.358.12-18 Ro_IV.59 yojanam gacchati iti krośaśatayojanaśatayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5128_1: . yojanam gacchati iti krośaśatayojanaśatayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . krośaśatam
GS24pmbhasuu:5128_2: gacchati iti krauśaśatikaḥ . yojanaśatam gacchati iti yaujanaśatikaḥ iti . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5128_3: abhigamanam arhati iti ca . tataḥ abhigamanam arhati iti ca krośaśatayojanaśatayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5128_4: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . krośaśatāt abhigamanam arhati krauśaśatikaḥ bhikṣuḥ . yojanaśatāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_2: . vāripathena gacchati vāripathikaḥ . vāripathena āhṛtam vāripathikam . vāri . jaṅgala
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_3: . jaṅgalapathena gacchati jāṅgalapathikaḥ . jaṅgalapathena āhṛtam jāṅgalapathikam
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_4: . jaṅgala . sthala . sthalapathena gacchati sthālapathikaḥ . sthalapathena āhṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_5: sthālapathikam . sthala . kāntāra . kāntārapathena gacchati kāntārapathikaḥ . kāntārapathena
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_6: āhṛtam kāntārapathikam . ajapathaśaṅkupathābhyām ca . ajapathaśaṅkupathābhyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_7: iti vaktavyam . ajapathena gacchati ājapathikaḥ . ajapathena āhṛtam ājapathikam.
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_8: śaṅkupathena gacchati śāṅkupathikaḥ . śaṅkupathena āhṛtam śāṅkupathikam . madhukamaricayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_9: aṇ sthalāt . madhukamaricayoḥ aṇ sthalāt vaktavyaḥ . sthālapatham madhukam . sthālapatham maricam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5130_0: (P_5,1.80) KA_II.12-18 Ro_IV.60-61 adhīṣṭabhṛtayoḥ dvitīyānirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5130_1: adarśanāt . adhīṣṭabhṛtayoḥ dvitīyānirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tatra adarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5130_2: . na hi asau māsam adhīṣyate . kim tarhi muhūrtam adhīṣṭaḥ māsam tat karma karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5130_3: . siddham tu caturthīnirdeśāt . siddham etat . katham . caturthīnirdeśāt . caturthīnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5130_4: kartavyaḥ . tasmai adhīṣṭaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi caturthīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5130_5: . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . māsārthaḥ muhūrtaḥ māsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5131: (P_5,1.84) KA_II.359.20-22 Ro_IV.61-62 avayasi ṭhan ca iti anantarasya anukarṣaḥ . avayasi ṭhan ca iti anantarasya anukarṣaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :

GS24pmbhasuu:5137_0: (P_5,1.96) KA_II.361.14-22 Ro_IV.65-66 kāryagrahaṇam anarthakam tatrabhavena kṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5137_1: . kāryagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatrabhavena kṛtatvāt . yat hi māse kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5137_2: māse bhavam tat bhavati . tatra tatra bhavaḥ iti eva siddham . kim idam bhavān kāryagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5137_3: eva pratyācaṣṭe na punaḥ dīyategrahaṇam api . yathā eva hi yat māse kāryam tat māse
GS24pmbhasuu:5137_4: bhavam bhavati evam yat api māse dīyate tat api māse bhavam bhavati . tatra tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5137_5: bhavaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . na tat māse dīyate . kim tarhi māse gate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5137_6: evam tarhi aupaśleṣikam adhikaraṇam vijñāsyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgottarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:5137_7: idam paṭhitavyam . tasya dakṣiṇā yajñākhyebhyaḥ . tatra ca dīyate . tataḥ kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_0: (P_5,1.97) KA_II.362.2-11 Ro_IV.66 aṇprakaraṇe agnipadādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . aṇprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_1: agnipadādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . trīṇi imāni aṇgrahaṇāni . vyuṣṭādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_2: aṇ . samayaḥ tat asya prāptam . ṛtoḥ aṇ . prayojanam . viśākhāṣāḍhāt aṇ manthadaṇḍayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_3: iti . tatra na jñāyate katarasmin aṇprakaraṇe agnipadādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . aviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_4: sarvatra . vyuṣṭādibhyaḥ aṇ bhavati iti uktvā agnipadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_5: agnipade dīyate kāryam vā āgnipadam . pailumūlam . samayaḥ tat asya prāptam . ṛtoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_6: aṇ . agnipadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . upavastā prāptaḥ asya aupavastram . prāśitā
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_7: prāptaḥ asya prāśitram . prayojanam . viśākhāṣāḍhāt aṇ manthadaṇḍayoḥ .agnipadādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_8: ca iti vaktavyam . cūḍā prayojanam asya cauḍam . śraddhā prayojanam asya śrāddham .

GS24pmbhasuu:5139_3: . goprapadanīyam . aśvaprapadanīyam . ruhi . prāśādārohaṇīyam . svargādibhyaḥ yat
