GS24pmbhasuu:5140_1: . ekāgārāt nipātanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . ṭhañprakaraṇāt . ṭhañ prakṛtaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5140_2: saḥ anuvartiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . caure iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:5140_3: . ekāgāram prayojanam asya bhikṣoḥ iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt ekāgārāt caure iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5141_1: ākālāt nipātanam narthakam . kim kāraṇam . ṭhañprakaraṇāt . ṭhañ prakṛtaḥ . saḥ anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5141_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam . etasmin viśeṣe nipātanam kariṣyāmi samānakālasya ādyantavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5141_3: iti . ākālāt ṭhan ca . ākālāt ṭhan ca vaktavyaḥ . ākālikī . ākālikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_0: (P_5,1.115) KA_II.363.11-364.10 Ro_IV.69-75 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_1: . yat tat tṛtīyāsamartham kriyā cet sā bhavati iti ucyate . katham ca tṛtīyāsamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_2: nāma kriyā syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarve ete śabdāḥ guṇasamudāyeṣu vartante . brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_3: kṣatriyaḥ . vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ iti . ātaḥ ca guṇasamudāye evam hi āha . tapaḥ śrutam
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_4: ca yoniḥ ca iti etad brāhmaṇakārakam . tapaḥśtrutābhyām yaḥ hīnaḥ jātibrāhmaṇaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_5: saḥ . tathā gauraḥ śucyācāraḥ piṅgalaḥ kapilakeśaḥ iti etān api abhyantarān brāhmaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_6: guṇan kurvanti . samudāyeṣu ca śabdāḥ vṛttāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_0: kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam brāhmaṇaśabdaya samudāye vṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_1: tarhi tṛtīyāsamartham viśeṣyate pratyayārthaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_2: . tṛtīyāsamarthāt kriyāvācinaḥ guṇatulye api pratyayaḥ syāt . putreṇa tulyaḥ sthūlaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_3: . putreṇa tulyaḥ piṅgalaḥ . astu tarhi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam . yat tat tulyam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_4: cet sā bhavati iti . evam api tṛtīyāsamartham aviśeṣitam bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_5: . tṛtīyāsamarthāt akriyāvācinaḥ kriyātulye api pratyayaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_6: . yat tat tulyam kriyā cet sā bhavati iti ucyate . tulayā ca sammitam tulyam . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_7: ca tṛtīyāsamartham api kriyā pratyayārthaḥ api kriyā tataḥ tulayam bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_8: vā punaḥ astu yat tat tṛtīyāsamartham kriyā cet sā bhavati iti eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_9: pratyayārthaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tṛtīyāsamarthāt kriyāvācinaḥ guṇatulye
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_10: api pratyayaḥ syāt . putreṇa tulyaḥ sthūlaḥ . putreṇa tulyaḥ piṅgalaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_11: doṣaḥ . yat tat tṛtīyāsamartham kriyā cet sā bhavati iti ucyate . tulayā ca sammitam
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_12: tulyam . yadi ca tṛtīyāsamartham api kriyā pratyayārthaḥ api kriyā tataḥ tulayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_13: bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_14: evam ca eva kṛtvā ācāryeṇa sūtram paṭhitam . vatinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam kṛtam . api
GS24pmbhasuu:5149_15: ca vateḥ avyayeṣu pāṭhaḥ na kartavyaḥ bhavati . kriyāyām ayam bhavan liṅgasaṅkhyābhyam na yokṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5150_0: (P_5,1.116) KA_II.365.12-17 Ro_IV.75-77 kimartham idam ucyate na tena tulyam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5150_1: cet vatiḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . tṛtīyāsamarthāt tatra pratyayaḥ yadā anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5150_2: kartavyām kriyām anyaḥ karoti tadā pratyayaḥ utpādyate . na ca kā cid ivaśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:5150_3: yoge tṛtīyā vidhīyate . nanu ca sapatamī api na vidhīyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:5150_4: yat ivaśabdena yoge saptamīsamarthāt vatim śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati ivaśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:5150_5: yoge saptamī iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . deveṣu iva nāma . brāhmaṇeṣu iva
GS24pmbhasuu:5151_0: (P_5,1.117) KA_II.364.19-22 Ro_IV.77-79 kimartham idam ucyate na tena tulyam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5151_1: cet vatiḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . tṛtīyāsamarthāt tatra pratyayaḥ yadā anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5151_2: kartavyām kriyām anyaḥ karoti tadā pratyayaḥ utpādyate . iha punaḥ dvitīyāsamarthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5151_3: ātmārhāyām kriyāyām arhatikartari niścitabalādhāne pratyayaḥ utpādyate . brāhmaṇavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5151_4: bhavān vartate . etat vṛttam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_0: (P_5,1.118.1) KA_II.365.2-6 Ro_IV.79 arthagrahaṇam kimartham . na upasargāt chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_1: dhātavu iti eva ucyeta . dhātuḥ vai śabdaḥ . śabde kāryasya asambhavāt arthe kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_2: vijñāsyate . kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthaḥ . kriyā . idam tarhi prayojanam . uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_3: yathā vijñāyeta . dhātukṛtaḥ arthaḥ dhātvarthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ dhātukṛtaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_4: . sādhanam . kim prayojanam . sādhane ayam bhavan liṅgasaṅkhyābhyam yokṣyate . udgatāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5153_1: vatyupasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strīvat . puṃvat iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5153_2: . imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam vatim
GS24pmbhasuu:5153_3: bādheyātām . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na vatyarthe nañsnañau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5153_4: iti yat ayam striyāḥ puṃvat iti nirdeśam karoti . evam api strīvat iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_1: . strīpuṃsābhyām tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strībhāvaḥ strītvam strītā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_2: kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_3: sāmānyavihitam vatim bādheyātām . vāvacanam ca . vāvacanam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_4: . nañsnañau api yathā syātām . strībhāvaḥ straiṇam . pummbhāvaḥ pauṃsnam iti . apavādasamāveśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_5: vā siddham . apavādasamāveśāt vā siddham etat . tat yathā imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_6: samāveśaḥ bhavati evam ābhyām api bhaviṣyati . na eva īśvaraḥ ājñāpapayati na api
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_7: dharmasūtrakārāḥ paṭhanti imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_8: tarhi ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt yatnāt imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_9: . na ca etau atra abhyantarau . etau api atra abhyantarau . katham . apavādasadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_10: apavādāḥ bhavanti iti . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ apavādasadeśāḥ apavādāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_11: . api ca kutaḥ etat etau api atra abhyantarau na punaḥ pūrvau vā syātām parau vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5154_12: . evam tarhi vakṣyati ā ca tvāt iti atra cakārakaraṇasya prayojanam . nañsnañbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_0: (P_5,1.119.2) KA_II.366.4-368.4 Ro_IV.83-93 tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_1: . tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . abhiprāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_2: devadattasya modakeṣu bhojane . ye naḥ bhāvāḥ te naḥ bhāvāḥ putrāḥ putraiḥ ceṣṭante
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_3: iti . siddham tu yasya guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tvatalau .
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_4: siddham etat . katham . yasya guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_5: guṇe vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca abhiprāyādīnām bhāvāt dravye devadattaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_6: vartate . kim punaḥ dravyam ke punaḥ guṇāḥ . śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ guṇāḥ . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_7: anyat dravyam . kim punaḥ anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam āhosvit ananyat . guṇasya ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_8: bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśam kurvan khyāpayati anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam iti . ananyat
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_9: śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam . na hi anyat upalabhyate . paśoḥ khalu api viśasitasya parṇaśate
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_10: nyastasya na anyat śabdādibhyaḥ upalabhyate . anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam tat tu anumānagamyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_11: . tat yathā oṣadhivanaspatīnām vṛddhihrāsau . jyotiṣām gatiḥ iti . kaḥ asau anumānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_12: . iha samāne varṣmaṇi pariṇāhe ca anyat tulāgram bhavati lohasya anyat kārpāsānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_13: . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . tathā kaḥ cit spṛśan eva chinatti kaḥ cit lambamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_14: api na chinatti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . kaḥ cit ekena eva prahāreṇa vyapavargam
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_15: karoti kaḥ cit dvābhyām api an karoti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . atha vā yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_16: guṇāntareṣu api prādurbhāvatsu tattvam na vihanyate tat dravyam . kim punaḥ tattvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_17: . tadbhāvaḥ tattvam . tat yathā āmalakādīnām phalānām raktādayaḥ pītādayaḥ ca guṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_18: prāduḥ bhavanti . āmalakam badaram iti eva bhavati . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5155_19: . guṇasandrāvaḥ dravyam iti . yadi tarhi ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe pratyayāḥ utapdyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_0: ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti . ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti iyati ucyamāne dviguṇā rajjuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_1: triguṇā rajjuḥ atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . guṇaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_2: eva sameṣu avayaveṣu vartate . tat yathā dviguṇā rajjuḥ triguṇā rajjuḥ iti . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_3: dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā guṇavān ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_4: ca vartante . asti aprādhānye vartate . tat yathā yaḥ yatra apradhānam bhavati saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_5: āha guṇabhūtāḥ vayam atra iti . asti ācāre vartate . tat yathā guṇavān ayam brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_6: iti ucyate yaḥ samyak ācāram karoti . asti saṃskāre vartate . tat yathā saṃskṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_7: annam guṇavat iti ucyate . atha vā sarvatra eva ayam guṇaśabdaḥ sameṣu avayaveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_8: vartate . tat yathā dviguṇam adhyayanam triguṇam adhyayanam iti ucyate . carcāguṇān
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_9: kramaguṇān ca apekṣya bhavati na saṃhitāguṇān carcāguṇān ca . yadi evam guṇavat annam
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_10: iti guṇaśabdaḥ na upapadyate . na hi annasya sūpādayaḥ guṇāḥ samāḥ bhavanti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_11: avaśyam varṣmataḥ parimāṇataḥ eva vā sāmyam bhavati . kim tarhi yuktitaḥ api . ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_12: ca yuktitaḥ . yaḥ hi mudgaprasthe lavaṇaprastham prakṣipet na adaḥ yuktam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_13: yadi tāvat adeḥ annam na adaḥ attavyam syāt . atha aniteḥ annam na adaḥ jagdvhā prāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_14: . śuklādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . śuklatvam . śuklatā iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_15: punaḥ kāraṇam śuklādayaḥ eva udāhriyante na punaḥ vṛkṣādayaḥ api . vṛkṣatvam vṛkṣatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_16: iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ubhayavacanāḥ hi ete dravyam ca āhuḥ guṇam ca . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_17: tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . ime api tarhi ubhayavacanāḥ . katham . ārabhyate matublopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_18: guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk bhavati iti . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_19: . ḍitthādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . ḍitthatvam . ḍitthatā . ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_20: iti . atra api kaḥ cit prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca . tena kṛtām kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_21: guṇam vā yaḥ kaḥ cit karoti saḥ ucyate ḍitthatvam te etat ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam te etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_22: evam ḍitthāḥ kurvanti . evam ḍāmbhiṭṭāḥ kurvanti . yaḥ tarhi prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_23: ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca tasya vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_24: kāthañcitkaḥ prayogaḥ evam vṛttiḥ api bhaviṣyati . yat vā sarve bhāvāḥ svena bhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_25: bhavanti saḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ tadabhidhāne . kim ebhiḥ tribhiḥ bhāvagrahaṇaiḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_26: . ekena śabdaḥ pratinirdiśyate dvābhyām arthaḥ . yat vā sarve śabdāḥ svena arthena
GS24pmbhasuu:5156_27: bhavanti . saḥ teṣām arthaḥ iti tadabhidhāne vā tvatalau
GS24pmbhasuu:5157_0: bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . na evam anyatra bhavati . na hi tena raktam rāgāt iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5157_1: śabdena rakte pratyayāḥ utpadyante . śabde asambhavāt arthena rakte pratyayāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5157_2: . tat tarhi anyatarat kartavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:5157_3: ca uktam tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5157_4: anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt abhiprāyādiṣu utapattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_1: tvataloḥ svarasiddhyartham . tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣdhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_2: kim prayojanam . tvataloḥ svarasiddhyartham . tvataloḥ svarasiddhiḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_3: tvataloḥ avakāśaḥ bhāvasya vacanam pratiṣedhasya avacanam . brāhmaṇatvam . brāhmṇatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_4: . nañsamāsasya avakāśaḥ pratiṣedhasya vacanam bhāvasya avacanam . abrāhmaṇaḥ . avṛṣalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_5: . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti . abrāhmaṇatvam . abrāhmaṇatā . nañsamāsaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_6: pūrvavipratiṣdhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_7: tvatalau prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_8: bhavati iti . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pratiṣedham apekṣate . nañsamāsaḥ api tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_9: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt eva . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_10: bhavati iti . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ bhāvam apekṣate . pradhānam tadā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_11: . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . nañsamādāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_12: anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti vakṣyati . tatra vyavasthārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_13: idam vaktavyam . vā chandasi . vā chandasi nañsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nirvīryatām vai
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_14: yajamānaḥ āśāste apaśutām . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya . agotām anapatyatām . bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_15: idam yuktam udāharaṇam . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya iti . idam tu ayuktam apaśutām
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_16: iti . na hi asau samāsabhāvam āśāste . kim tarhi . uttarapadābhāvam āśāste . na paśoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_17: bhāvaḥ iti . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_18: vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . svarottarapadavṛddhyartham . svarārtham uttarapadavṛddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5158_19: ca . svarārtham tāvat . aprathimā . amradimā . uttarapadavṛddhyartham . aśauklyam . akārṣṇyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_0: (P_5,1.120) KA_II.369.4-16 Ro_IV.95-97 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . anukarṣaṇārthaḥ . tvatalau
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_1: anukṛṣyete . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtau tvatalau anuvartiṣyete . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_2: paṭhati . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam apavādasamāveśārtham . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_3: kriyate apavādasamāveśārtham . imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_4: . na etat asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti evam imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_5: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_6: syātām yataḥ ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti eva yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_7: tābhyaḥ tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ yataḥ ca ucyete . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt ye
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_8: arthāḥ tatra tvatalau yathā syātām yatra ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_9: . ā tvāt iti eva ā tvāt ye arthāḥ tatra tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ yatra ca ucyete . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_10: tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā syātām yasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_11: ca prakṛteḥ atasmin viśeṣe anyaḥ pratyayaḥ utpadyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . strīpuṃsābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5159_12: tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5160: (P_5,1.121) KA_II.369.19-370.12 Ro_IV.97-100 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . tvataloḥ iti āha . na etat asi prayojanam . iṣyete nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt tvatalau :
GS24pmbhasuu:5161_0: abrāhmaṇatvam abrāhmaṇatā iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . na nañpūrvāt iti uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5161_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . na nañpūrvāt iti uttarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5161_2: etat asti prayojanam . parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5161_3: . na ca tatra kā cit nañpūrvā prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5161_4: prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tarhi tadantavidhiḥ asti . patyantapurohitādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5161_5: yak iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt apatyantāt yak bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5161_6: nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt iti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ nañpūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5161_7: bahuvrīheḥ bhavati iti . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:5163: apṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ apṛthutvam apṛthutā iti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ anyapūrvāt tatpuruṣāt bhavati iti . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:5165_0: paramapṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ paramapṛthutvam paramapṛthutā . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5165_1: uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ sāpekṣāt bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . nañsamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5165_2: anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5165_3: etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sarve ete taddhitāḥ sāpekṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5165_4: bhavanti iti yat ayam nañaḥ guṇapratiṣedhe sampādyarhahitālamarthāḥ taddhitāḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_0: (P_5,1.122) KA_II.370.14-19 Ro_IV.100-101 vāvacanam kimartham . vākyam api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_1: syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛṭā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam . tvatalau api yathā syātām . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_3: . ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt yatnāt tvatalau api bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_4: pṛthvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam aṇsamāveśārtham . pṛthvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam kriyate aṇsamāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5167_1: . brāhmaṇādiṣu cāturvarṇyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . cāturvarṇyam . cāturvaidyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5167_2: . cāturāśramyam . arhataḥ num ca . arhataḥ num ca ṣyañ ca vaktavyaḥ . arhataḥ bhāvaḥ ārhantyam ārhatī .
GS24pmbhasuu:5168_0: (P_5,1.125) KA_II.371.4-6 Ro_IV.101-102 kim idam nalope varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5168_1: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi varṇagrahaṇam steyam . nalope kṛte ayādeśaḥ prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5168_2: saṅghātagrahaṇam antyasya lopaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . siddhaḥ antyasya lopaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5168_3: iti eva . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5169: (P_5,1.130) KA_II.371.8-10 Ro_IV.102 aṇprakaraṇe śrotriyasya . aṇprakaraṇe śrotriyasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam ghalopaḥ ca . śrotriyasya bhāvaḥ śrautram .
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_0: (P_5,2.4) KA_II.372.2-21 Ro_IV.103-105 tilādibhyaḥ khañ ca . tilādibhyaḥ khañ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_1: iti vaktavyam . tilyam . tailīnam . kimartham idam ucyate na yatā mukte dhānyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_2: bhavane kṣetre khañ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . umābhaṅgayoḥ adhānyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_3: . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti ucyate . na ca umābhaṅge dhānye . cameṣu yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_4: paṭhyate tat dhānyam . na ca ete tatra paṭhyete . tat tarhi khañgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_5: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_6: iti . yadi tat anuvartate vrīhiśālayoḥ ḍhak yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat iti khañ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_7: khañ api prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ . vrīhiśālayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_8: ḍhak bhavati . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ . yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat bhavati . dhānyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_9: bhavane kṣetre khañ bhavati . vibhāṣā tilamāṣomābhaṅgaṇubhyaḥ . bhavanekṣetregrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_10: anuvartate . dhānyānām iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkaplutayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_11: utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_12: prakṛtāpavādaḥ vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ . anyasya pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_13: vacanāt cakārasya ca anukarṣaṇārthasya akaraṇāt prakṛtasya khañaḥ ḍhagyatau bādhakau
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_14: bhaviṣyataḥ yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_15: jñāpayati anuvartante ca nāma vidhayaḥ na ca anuvartanāt eva bhavanti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_16: . yatnāt bhavanti . atha vā yatā mukte dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_17: . nanu ca uktam . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . umābhaṅgayoḥ adhānyatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_18: doṣaḥ . dhinoteḥ dhānyam . ete ca api dhinutaḥ . atha vā śaṇasaptadaśāni dhānyāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:5171: (P_5,2.6) KA_II.372.23-373.2 Ro_IV.105 sammukha iti kim nipātyate . sammukha iti samasya antalopaḥ . sammukha iti samasya antalopaḥ nipātyate . samamukhasya darśanaḥ sammukhīnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5172_0: (P_5,2.9) KA_II.373.4-6 Ro_IV.105-106 ayānayam neyaḥ iti ucyate . tatra na jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5172_1: kaḥ ayaḥ kaḥ anayaḥ iti . ayaḥ pradakṣiṇam . anayaḥ prasavyam . pradakṣiṇaprasavyagaminām
GS24pmbhasuu:5172_2: śārāṇām yasmin paraiḥ padānām asamāveśaḥ saḥ ayānayaḥ . ayānayam neyaḥ ayānayīnaḥ śāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5173_0: (P_5,2.10) KA_II.373.8-15 Ro_IV.106-107 parovara iti kim nipātyate . parovara iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5173_1: parasotvavacanam . parovara iti parasya otvam nipātyate . yadi evam parasyautvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5173_2: iti prāpnoti . śakandhunyāyena nirdeśaḥ . atha vā na evam vijñāyate parasya otvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5173_3: nipātyate iti . katham tarhi . parasya śabdarūpasya ādeḥ utvam nipātyate iti . parān
GS24pmbhasuu:5173_4: ca avarān ca anubhavati parovarīṇaḥ . atha parampara iti kim nipātyate . paraparatarāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:5173_5: paramparabhāvaḥ . paraparatarāṇām paramparabhāvaḥ nipātyate . parān ca paratarān
GS24pmbhasuu:5174_0: (P_5,2.12) KA_II.373.17-374.9 Ro_IV.107-108 iha samāṃsamīnā gauḥ supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5174_1: iti subluk prāpnoti . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam . samām
GS24pmbhasuu:5174_2: samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam bhaviṣyati . yat ayam yalopam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:5174_3: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na atra luk bhavati iti . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5174_4: alugvijñānam iti cet uttarapadasya lugvacanam . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5174_5: alugvijñānam iti cet uttarapadasya luk vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu pūrvapadasya yalopavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5174_6: . siddham etat . katham . pūrvapadasya yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anutpattau uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5174_7: ca vāvacanam . anutpattau pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca yalopaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . samām
GS24pmbhasuu:5174_8: samām vijāyate . samāyām samāyām vijāyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5175_0: (P_5,2.14) KA_II.374.11-14 Ro_IV.108 āgavīnaḥ iti kim nipātyate . goḥ āṅpūrvāt a
GS24pmbhasuu:5175_1: tasya goḥ pratidānāt kāriṇi khaḥ . goḥ āṅpūrvāt a tasya goḥ pratidānāt kāriṇi khaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5175_2: nipātyate . a tasya goḥ pratidānāt karmakārī āgavīnaḥ karmakaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5176_0: (P_5,2.20) KA_II.374.16-18 Ro_IV.109 kim yaḥ śālāyām adhṛṣṭaḥ saḥ śālīnaḥ kūpe vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5176_1: yat akāryam tat kaupīnam . na iti āha . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . śālāpraveśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5176_2: arhati adhṛṣṭaḥ saḥ śālīnaḥ . kūpāvataraṇam arhati akāryam tat kaupīnam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5177_0: (P_5,2.21) KA_II.374.20-21 Ro_IV.109-110 vrātena jīvati iti ucyate . kim vrātam nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:5177_1: . nānājātīyāḥ aniyatavṛttayaḥ utsedhajīvinaḥ saṅghāḥ vrātāḥ . teṣām karma vrātam
GS24pmbhasuu:5178_0: (P_5,2.23) KA_II.375.2-6 Ro_IV.110 haiyaṅgavīnam iti kim nipātyate . hyogodohasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5178_1: hiyaṅgvādeśaḥ sañjñāyām tasya vikāre . hyogodohasya hiyaṅgvādeśaḥ nipātyate sañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5178_2: viṣaye tasya vikāre iti etasmin arthe . hyogodohasya vikāraḥ haiyaṅgavīnam ghṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5178_3: . sañjñāyām iti kimartham . hyogodohasya vikāraḥ udaśvit . atra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5179_0: (P_5,2.25) KA_II.375.8-13 Ro_IV.110-111 mūle iti vaktavyam . pakṣasya mūlam pakṣatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5179_1: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . mūle iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . tasya pākamūle
GS24pmbhasuu:5179_2: pīlvādikarṇāidibhyaḥ kuṇabjāhacau iti . yadi tat anuvartate pāke api prāpnoti . mūle
GS24pmbhasuu:5179_3: iti anuvartate . pāke iti nivṛttam . katham punaḥ ekayoganirdiṣṭayoḥ ekadeśaḥ anuvarteta
GS24pmbhasuu:5179_4: ekadeśaḥ vā nivarteta . ekayoganirdiṣṭānām api ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5179_5: . saṅkhyāvayādeḥ ṅīp . dāmahāyanāntāt ca . saṅkhyādeḥ iti anuvartate . avyayādeḥ iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5180_0: (P_5,2.27) KA_II.375.15-17 Ro_IV.111 iha nānā iti sahārthaḥ gamyeta . dvau hi pratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5180_1: prakṛtam artham gamayataḥ . na na saḥ saha eva iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5180_2: . kim tarhi prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam etat . vi nañ iti etābhyām asahavācibhyām nānāñau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_0: (P_5,2.28) KA_II.375.19-376.6 Ro_IV.111-112 kasmin arthe śālajādayaḥ bhavanti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_1: saha iti vartate . bhavet siddham viśāle śṛṅge viśaṅkaṭe śṛṅge iti . iha khalu saṅkaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_2: iti saṅgatārthaḥ gamyate . prakaṭam iti pragarārthaḥ gamyate . utkaṭam iti udgatārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_3: gamyate . evam tarhi sādhane śālajādayaḥ bhavanti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_4: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . upasargebhyaḥ ime vidhīyante . upasargāḥ ca punaḥ evamātmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_5: yatra kaḥ cit kriyāvācai śabdaḥ prayujyate tatra kriyāviśeṣam āhuḥ . yatra hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_6: prayujyate sasādhanam tatra kriyām āhuḥ . te ete upasargebhyaḥ vidhīyamānāḥ sasādhanāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_7: kriyāyām bhaviṣyanti . evam api bhavet siddham viśāle śṛṅge iti . idam tu na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_8: . viśālaḥ . viśaṅkaṭaḥ iti . etat api siddham . katham . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . viśāle
GS24pmbhasuu:5181_9: asya staḥ viśālaḥ . viśaṅkaṭe asya staḥ viśaṅkaṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_1: upasaṅkhyānam . kaṭacprakaraṇe alābūtilomābhyaḥ rajasi abhidheye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_2: . alābūkaṭaḥ . tilakaṭaḥ . umākaṭaḥ . bhaṅgāyāḥ ca . bhaṅgāyāḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_3: bhaṅgākaṭaḥ . goṣṭhādayaḥ sthānādiṣu paśunāmādibhyaḥ . goṣṭhādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sthānādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_4: artheṣu paśunāmādibhyaḥ vaktavyāḥ . gogoṣṭham . avigoṣṭham . kaṭac ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_5: avikaṭaḥ uṣṭrakaṭaḥ . paṭac ca vaktavyaḥ . avipaṭaḥ uṣṭrapaṭaḥ . goyugaśabdaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_6: pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . uṣṭragoyugam . kharagoyugam . tailaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_7: . iṅgudatailam . sarṣapatailam . śākaṭaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ikṣuśākaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_8: . mūlaśākaṭam . śākinaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ikṣuśākinam mūlaśākinam . upamānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_9: vā siddham . upamānāt vā siddham etat . gavām sthānam goṣṭham . yathā gavam tadvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_10: uṣṭrāṇām . kaṭac vaktavyaḥ iti . yathā nānādravyāṇām saṅghātaḥ kaṭaḥ evam avayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_11: saṃhatāḥ avikaṭaḥ . paṭat ca vaktayaḥ iti . yathā paṭaḥ prastīrṇaḥ evam avayaḥ prastīrṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_12: avipaṭaḥ . goyugaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . goḥ yugam goyugam . yathā goḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_13: tadvat uṣṭrasya . uṣṭragoyugam . tailaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_14: tailaśabdaḥ vikāre vartate . evam ca kṛtvā tilatailam iti api siddham bhavati . śākaṭaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5182_15: ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ eva . śākinaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_0: (P_5,2.33) KA_II.377.6-14 Ro_IV.115 inacpiṭackāḥ pratyayāḥ vaktavyāḥ cikacicik iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_1: ete ca prakṛtyādeśāḥ vaktavyāḥ . cikinaḥ . cipiṭaḥ . cikkaḥ . klinnasya cilpil laḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_2: ca asya cakṣuṣī . klinnasya cil pil iti etau prakṛtyādeśau vaktavyau laḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_3: asya cakṣuṣī iti etasmin arthe . klinne asya cakṣuṣī cillaḥ . pillaḥ . cul ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_4: . cullaḥ . yadi asya iti ucyate cille cakṣuṣī pille cakṣuṣī iti na sidhyati . tasmān
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_5: na arthaḥ asya grahaṇe . katham cillaḥ pillaḥ iti . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . cille asya
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_6: staḥ cillaḥ . pille asya staḥ pillaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5184_0: (P_5,2.37) KA_II.337.16-378.17 Ro_IV.115-118 pramāṇe iti kimayam pratyayārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5184_1: pramāṇam pratyayārthaḥ na . pramāṇe iti na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kva tarhi pratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5184_2: bhavanti . tadvati . kutaḥ etat . asya iti vartanāt . asya iti vartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5184_3: . tad asya sañjātam tārakādibhyaḥ itac iti . prathamaḥ ca dvitīyaḥ ca ūrdhvamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5184_4: matau mama . ūrudvayasam . ūrudaghnam . pramāṇe laḥ . pramāṇe laḥ vaktavyaḥ : śamaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_0: vitastiḥ . dvigoḥ nityam . dvigoḥ nityam laḥ vaktavyaḥ . dviśatam . triśatam . dvidiṣṭiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_1: . tridiṣṭiḥ . dvivitastiḥ . trivitastiḥ . kimartham idam ucyate . saṃśaye śrāviṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_2: vakṣyati yasya asyam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . ḍaṭ stome . ḍaṭ stome vaktavyaḥ . pañcadaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_3: stomaḥ . śacśanoḥ ḍiniḥ . śacśanoḥ ḍiniḥ vaktavyaḥ . triṃśinaḥ māsāḥ . pañcadaśinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_4: ardhamāsāḥ . viṃśateḥ ca iti vaktavyam . viṃśinaḥ aṅgirasaḥ . pramāṇaparimāṇābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_5: saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṃśaye . mātrac vaktavyaḥ . śamamātram . diṣṭimātram . vitastimātram
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_6: . kuḍavamātram . pañcamātrāḥ . daśamātrāḥ . vatvantāt svārthe dvayasajmātracau bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_7: . vatvantāt svārthe dvayasajmātracau bahulam vaktavyau . tāvat eva tāvaddvayasam
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_8: . tāvanmātram . yāvat eva yāvaddvayasam . yāvanmātram . [pramāṇam pratyayārthaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_9: tadvati asya iti vartanāt . prathamaḥ ca dvitīyaḥ ca ūrdhvamāne matau mama . pramāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5186_10: laḥ . dvigoḥ nityam . ḍaṭ stome . śacśanoḥ ḍiniḥ . pramāṇaparimāṇābhyām saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_0: (P_5,2.39.1) KA_II.378.19-379.1 Ro_IV.118-119 kimartham parimāṇe iti ucyate na pramāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_1: iti vartate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat parimāṇagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_2: anyat pramāṇam anyat parimāṇam iti . ḍāvatau arthavaiśeṣyāt nirdeśaḥ pṛthak ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_3: . na etat jñāpakasādhyam anyat pramāṇam anyat parimāṇam iti . uktaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_4: . mātrādyapratighātāya . evam ca kṛtvā mātrādīnām pratighātaḥ na bhavati . bhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_5: siddhaḥ ca ḍāvatoḥ . ḍāvatvantāt mātrajādīnām bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5188_1: sādṛśe upasaṅkhyānam . vatupprakaraṇe yuṣmadasmadbhyām chandasi sādṛśe upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5188_2: kartavyam . na tvāvān anyaḥ divyaḥ na parthivaḥ na jātaḥ na janiṣyate . tvavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5188_3: purūvaso . yajñam viprasya mavataḥ . tvatsadṛśasya . matsadṛśasya iti . [ḍāvatau
GS24pmbhasuu:5188_4: arthavaiśeṣyāt nirdeśaḥ pṛthak ucyate . mātrādyapratighātāya . bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ ca ḍāvatoḥ (R IV.120)]
GS24pmbhasuu:5189_0: (P_5,2.40) KA_II.379.7-10 Ro_IV.120 kena vihitasya kimidambhyām vatupaḥ vaḥ ghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5189_1: ucyate . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati kimidambhyām vatup iti yat ayam kimidambhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5189_2: uttarasya vatupaḥ vaḥ ghatvam śāsti . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . kimidambhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5189_3: vatup bhavati . tataḥ vaḥ ghaḥ iti . vaḥ ca asya ghaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5190_0: (P_5,2.41) KA_II.379.12-15 Ro_IV.120-121 bahuṣu iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kiyān
GS24pmbhasuu:5190_1: . kiyantau . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kim iti etat paripraśne vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:5190_2: paripraśnaḥ ca anirjñāte anirjñātam ca bahuṣu . dvyekayoḥ punaḥ nirjñātam . nirjñātatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5190_3: dvyekayoḥ paripraśnaḥ na bhavati . paripraśnābhāvāt kim eva tāvat na asti kutaḥ pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5191_0: (P_5,2.42) KA_II.379.17-380.4 Ro_IV.121-122 iha kasmāt na bhavati . bahavaḥ avayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5191_1: asyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ iti . avayave yā saṅkhyā iti ucyate . na ca kā cit saṅkhyā asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5191_2: yasyāḥ bahuśabdaḥ avayavaḥ syāt . nanu ca iyam asti saṅkhyā iti eva . na eṣā saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5191_3: . sañjñā eṣā . avayavavidhāne avayavini pratyayaḥ . avayavavidhāne avayavini pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5191_4: bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . pañca avayavāḥ . daśa avayavāḥ iti . atha avayavini
GS24pmbhasuu:5191_5: iti ucyamāne avayavasvāmini kasmāt na bhavati . pañca paśvavayavāḥ devadattasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5191_6: . avayavaśabdaḥ ayam guṇaśabdaḥ asya iti ca vartate . tena yam prati avayavaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5191_7: tasmin avayavini pratyayena bhavitavyam . kam ca prati avayavaḥ guṇaḥ . samudāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5191_8: . yadi evam avayavini iti api na vaktavyam . avayaveṣu kasmāt na bhavati . asya iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5192_0: (P_5,2.44) KA_II.380.6-12 Ro_IV.122-123 kimartham udāttaḥ iti ucyate . udāttaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5192_1: syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . pratyayasvareṇa api eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5192_2: . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam prasajyeta . atha udāttaḥ iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5192_3: kutaḥ etat ādeḥ udāttatvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ antasya iti . udāttavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5192_4: yasya aprāptaḥ svaraḥ tasya bhaviṣyati . kasya ca aprāptaḥ . ādeḥ . antasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_0: (P_5,2.45) KA_II.380.12-381.5 Ro_IV.123-125 iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekādaśa māṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_1: adhikāḥ asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate iti . adhike samānajātau . samānajātau adhike iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_2: . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ adhikāḥ asyām kārṣāpaṇatriṃsati
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_3: iti . iṣṭam śatasahasrayoḥ . śatasahasrayoḥ adhike iṣyate . atha ekādaśam śatasahasram
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_4: iti kasya ādhikye bhavitavyam . yasya saṅkhyā tadādhikye ḍaḥ kartavyaḥ mataḥ mama
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_5: . yadi tāvat śatāni saṅkhyāyante śatādhikye bhavitavyam . atha sahasrāṇi saṅkhyāyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_6: sahasrādhikye bhavitavyam . ḍavidhāne parimāṇaśabdānām ādhikyasya adhikaraṇābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_7: anirdeśaḥ . ḍavidhāne parimāṇaśabdānām ādhikyasya adhikaraṇābhāvāt anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_8: nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . na hi ekādaśānām śatam adhikaraṇam . siddham tu pañcamīnirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_9: . siddham etat . katham . pañcamīnirdeśāt . pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat asmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_10: adhikam iti . saḥ tarhi pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_11: vyāpake vaiṣayike vā adhikaraṇe sambhavaḥ na asti aupaśleṣikam adhikaraṇam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5193_12: . ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ upaśliṣṭāḥ asmin śate ekādaśam śatam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5194_0: (P_5,2.46) KA_II.381.7-16 Ro_IV.125-126 kimartham śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam . śadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5194_1: antagrahaṇam pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ adhikārtham . śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5194_2: kriyate . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5195_0: ekatriṃśam śatam . iṣyate ca atra api syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5195_1: iti antagrahaṇam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5195_2: . saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca . saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . gotriṃśat adhikarm
GS24pmbhasuu:5195_3: asmin śate iti . viṃśateḥ ca . viṃśateḥ ca antagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5195_4: syāt . ekaviṃśam śatam . cakārāt saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . goviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_0: (P_5,2.47) KA_II.381.18-382.16 Ro_IV.126-129 nimāne guṇini . nimāne guṇini iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_1: . kim prayojanam . guṇeṣu mā bhūt . bhūyasaḥ . bhūyasaḥ iti ca vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_2: . bhūyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ utpattiḥ yathā syāt alpīyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_3: utpattiḥ mā bhūt iti . ekaḥ anyataraḥ . ekaḥ cet anyataraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_4: . iha mā bhūt . dvau yavānām trayaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . samānānām . samānānām ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_5: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ekaḥ yavānām adhyardhaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . tat tarhi bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_6: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yat tāvat ucyate . guṇini iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_7: . guṇeṣu kasmāt na bhavati . asya iti vartate . yat uktam bhūyasaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_8: iti . na vaktavyam . alpīyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ utpattiḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_9: anabhidhānāt . yat uktam ekaḥ cet anyataraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_10: . kasmāt na bhavati dvau yavānām trayaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . tantram vibhaktinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_11: . yat api ucyate samānānām ca iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_12: ekaḥ yavānām adhyardhaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . anabhidhānāt . nimeye ca api dṛśyate . nimeye
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_13: ca api pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . dvimayāḥ yavāḥ . trimayāḥ . kim punaḥ iha nimānam kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_14: nimeyam yāvatā ubhayam tyajyate . satyam evam etat . kva cit tu kā cit prasṛtatarā
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_15: gatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā . samāne tyāge dhānyam vikrīṇite yavān vikrīṇīte iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_16: . na kaḥ cit āha kārṣāpaṇam vikrīṇite iti . atha vā yena adhigamyate tat nimānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_0: (P_5,2.48) KA_II.382.18-383.22 Ro_IV.129-133 tasya pūraṇe iti atiprasaṅgaḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_1: pūraṇe iti atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prapnoti . pañcānām uṣṭrikāṇām pūraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_2: ghaṭaḥ . siddham tu saṅkhyāpūraṇe iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . saṅkhyāpūraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_3: iti vaktavyam . evam api ghaṭe prāpnoti . saṅkhyeyam hi asau adbhiḥ pūrayati . saṅkhyāpūraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_4: iti brūmaḥ na saṅkhyeyapūraṇe iti . yasya vā bhāvāt anyasaṅkhyātvam tatra . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_5: vā yasya bhāvāt anyā saṅkhyā pravartate tatra iti vaktavyam . evam api dvitīye adhyāye
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_6: aṣṭamaḥ iti prāpnoti . sarveṣām hi teṣām bhāvāt saṅkhyā pravartate . caramopajāte
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_7: pūrvasmin ca anapagate iti vaktavyam . evam api ekādaśīdvādaśyau sauviṣṭakṛtī . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_8: dvitīyam idam tṛtīyam . daśa daśamāni iti na sidhyati . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_9: eva astu . nanu ca uktam tasya pūraṇe iti atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_10: saṅkhyāpūraṇe iti vacanāt iti . tat tarhi saṅkhyāgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_11: . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāyāḥ guṇasya nimāne mayaṭ iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_12: tarhi na iyam vṛttiḥ upālabhyate . kim tarhi . vṛttisthānam upālabhyate . vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_13: eva atra na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pratyayārthābhāvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_14: svāṛthikaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā pūrvasyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ parāpekṣāyāḥ utpattiḥ vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5197_15: uttarā ca sāṅkhyā ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . atha vā nyūne ayam kṛtsnaśabdaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5198_0: caturṣu pañcaśabdaḥ . atha vā sarve eva dvyādayaḥ anyonyam apekṣante . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5198_1: dvitīye adhyāye aṣṭamaḥ iti prāpnoti . bhavati eva . prakṛtyarthāt bahiḥ sarvā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5198_2: prāyeṇa lakṣyate . pūraṇe syāt katham vṛttiḥ . vacanāt iti lakṣyatām . tasyāḥ pūrvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5198_3: tu yā saṅkhyā tasyāḥ [R tasyām ] bhavatu taddhitaḥ . ādeśaḥ ca ottarā saṅkhyā tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5198_4: nyāyyā bhaviṣyati . nyūne vā kṛtsnaśabdaḥ ayam pūrvasyām uttarām yadi sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5198_5: ca tayā tasyāḥ tathā nyāyyā bhaviṣyati . anyonyam vā vyapāśritya sarvasmin dvyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5198_6: yadi pravartante tathā nyāyyā vṛttiḥ bhavati pūraṇe . bahūnām vācikā saṅkhyā pūraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5198_7: ca ekaḥ iṣyate . anyatvāt ubhayoḥ nyāyyā vārkṣī śākhā nidarśanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_0: (P_5,2.49) KA_II.383.24-384.7 Ro_IV.133-134 maḍādiṣu yasya ādiḥ tannirderdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_1: maḍādiṣu yasya ādiḥ kriyate tannirderdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . asya ādiḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_2: . akiryamāṇe hi pratyayādhikārāt pratyayaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyayāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_3: hi svare doṣaḥ . pratyayāntare hi sati svare doṣaḥ syāt . viṃśatitamaḥ . eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_4: prasajyeta . viṃśatitamaḥ iti ca iṣyate . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_5: kartavyaḥ . prakṛtam ḍaḍgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tasya pūraṇe ḍaṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_6: . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca arthaḥ . nāntāt iti pañcamī ḍaṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_7: prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati . tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_8: na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5200: (P_5,2.51.1) KA_II.384.9-10 Ro_IV.134 caturaḥ chayatau ādyakṣaralopaḥ ca . caturaḥ chayatau vaktavyau ādyakṣaralopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . turīyam . turyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5201_0: (P_5,2.51.2) KA_II.384.11-17 Ro_IV.134-135 atha kimartham thaṭthukau pṛthak kriyete
GS24pmbhasuu:5201_1: na sarvam thaṭ eva syāt thuk eva vā . thaṭthukoḥ pṛthakkaraṇam padāntavidhipratiṣedhāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5201_3: padāntapratiṣedhāṛtham ca . padāntavidhyartham tāvat . parṇamayāni pañcathāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5201_4: . rathaḥ saptathaḥ . padantasya iti nalopaḥ yathā syāt . padāntapratiṣedhāṛtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5201_5: ṣaṣṭhaḥ . padāntasya iti jaśtvam mā bhūt . iha caturthaḥ iti padāntasya iti visarjanīyaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_1: . bahukatipayavatūnām liṅgaviśiṣṭād utpattiḥ vaktavyā . iha api yathā syāt . bahvīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_2: pūraṇī bahutithī . katipayānām pūraṇī katipayathī . tāvatīnām pūraṇī tāvatithī .
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_3: bahukatipayavatūnām liṅgaviśiṣṭād utpattiḥ siddhā . katham . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_4: api grahaṇam bhavati iti . puṃvadvacanam ca . puṃvadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . bahvīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_5: pūraṇī bahutithī . kimartham na bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_6: bhasya iti ucyate . yajādau ca bham bhavati . na ca atra yajādim paśyāmaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_7: . tithukā vyavihitatvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . tithuk kriyatām puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_8: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt puṃvadbhāvaḥ . nityaḥ tithuk . kṛte api puṃvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_9: prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . tithuk api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte puṃvadbhāve prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_10: anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_11: tithuk . kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena tithuk ucyate utpanne pratyayte prakṛtipratyayau
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_12: āśritya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . puṃvadbhāvaḥ api antaraṅgaḥ . katham . uktam etat siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_13: ca pratyayavidhau iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt puṃvadbhāvaḥ . puṃvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:5203_0: (P_5,2.58) KA_II.385.15-20 Ro_IV.136-137 asaṅkhyādeḥ iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:5203_1: . ekaṣaṣṭaḥ . dviṣaṣṭaḥ . asaṅkhyādeḥ iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati ekaṣaṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5203_2: . dviṣaṣṭaḥ iti . ṣaṣṭiśabdāt pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ekaṣaṣṭiśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5203_3: syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5203_4: prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5203_5: iha tadantavidhiḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . ekaviṃśatitamaḥ . etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5204: (P_5,2.59) KA_II.385.22-386.14 Ro_IV.137-140 chaprakaraṇe anekapadāt api . chaprakaraṇe anekapadāt api iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_0: kayāśubhīyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . aprātipadikatvāt . siddham tu prātipadikavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_1: . siddham etat . katham . prātipadikavijñānāt . katham prātipadikavijñānam . svam
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_2: rūpam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā iti vacanāt . svam rūpam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_3: iti . evam yaḥ asau āmnāye asyavāmaśabdaḥ paṭhyate saḥ asya padārthaḥ . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_4: anye āmnāyaśabdāḥ anye ime . om iti āha . kutaḥ etat . āmnāyaśabdānām anyabhāvyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_5: svaravarṇānupūrvīdeśakālaniyatatvāt . svaraḥ niyataḥ āmnāye asyavāmaśabdasya . varṇānupūrvī
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_6: khalu api āmnāye niyatā asyavāmaśabdasya . deśaḥ khalu api āmnāye niyataḥ . śmaśāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_7: na adhyeyam . catuṣpathe na adhyeyam iti . kālaḥ khalu api āmnāye niyataḥ . na amāvāsyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_8: na caturdaśāyām iti . padaikadeśasubalopadarśanāt ca . padaikadeśaḥ khalu api āmnāye
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_9: dṛśyate . asyavāmīyam . nanu ca eṣaḥ sublopaḥ syāt . subalopadarśanāt ca . subalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_10: khalu api dṛśyate . asyavāmīyam iti . yadi tarhi anye āmnāyaśabdāḥ anye ime matvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5206_11: na upapadyate . asyavāmaśabdaḥ asmin asti iti . na sañjñā sañjñinam vyabhicarati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5207: (P_5,2.60) KA_II.386.16-18 Ro_IV.140 adhyāyānuvākābhyām vā luk . adhyāyānuvākābhyām vā luk vaktavyaḥ . stambhaḥ . stambhīyaḥ . gardabhāṇḍaḥ . gardabhāṇḍīyaḥ . anukaḥ . anukīyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5208_1: kāmābhidhāne iti vaktavyam . ṣaṣthyarthe hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . ṣaṣthyarthe hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:5208_2: aniṣṭaḥ prāpnoti . dhane kāmaḥ asya iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5208_3: na bhavati dhane kāmaḥ asya iti . anabhidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5209_0: (P_5,2.72) KA_II.387.5-8 Ro_IV.141 kim yaḥ śītam karoti saḥ śītakaḥ yaḥ vā uṣṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5209_1: karoti sa uṣṇakaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . tuṣāre āditye ca prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5209_2: atra draṣṭavyaḥ . śītam iva śītam . uṣṇam iva uṣṇam . yaḥ āśu kartavyān arthān cireṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5209_3: karoti saḥ ucyate śītakaḥ iti . yaḥ punaḥ āśu kartavyān arthān āśu eva karoti saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5210_0: (P_5,2.73) KA_II.387.10-13 Ro_IV.141-142 adhikam iti kim nipātyate . adyārūḍhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5210_1: uttarapadalopaḥ ca kan ca pratyayaḥ . adhyārūḍham adhikam iti . bhavet siddham adhyārūḍhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5210_2: droṇaḥ khāryām adhikaḥ droṇaḥ khāryām iti . idam tu na sidhyati . adhyārūḍhā droṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5210_3: khārī . adhikā droṇena khārī iti . gatyarthānām hi ktaḥ kartari vidhīyate . gatyarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5211_0: (P_5,2.75) KA_II.387.15-17 Ro_IV.142) kim yaḥ pārśvena anvicchati saḥ pārvśvakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5211_1: . kim ca ataḥ . rājapuruṣe prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5211_2: . pārśvam iva pārśvam . yaḥ ṛjunā upāyena anveṣṭavyān arthān anṛjunā upāyena anvicchati
GS24pmbhasuu:5212_0: (P_5,2.76) KA_II.387.19-388.2 Ro_IV.142 kim yaḥ ayaḥśulena anvicchati saḥ āyaḥśūlikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5212_1: . kim ca ataḥ . śivabhāgavate prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5212_2: . ayaḥśulam iva ayaḥśulam . yaḥ mṛdunā upāyena anveṣṭavyān arthān rabhasena upāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_0: (P_5,2.77) KA_II.388.4-8 Ro_IV.143 tāvatitham grahaṇam iti luk vāvacanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_1: vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . tāvatitham grahaṇam iti luk vāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_2: . vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā etat siddham . tāvatithena gṛhṇāti
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_3: iti luk ca . tāvatithena gṛhṇāti iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavya luk ca vaktavyaḥ . ṣaṣthena gṛhṇāti ṣaṭkaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5214_0: (P_5,2.79) KA_II.388.10-17 Ro_IV.143-144 śṛṅkhalam asya bandhanam karabhe iti anirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5214_1: . śṛṅkhalam asya bandhanam karabhe iti anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5214_2: na hi tasya śṛṅkhalabandhanam . śṛṅkhalavatyā asau rajjvā badhyate . siddham tu tadvannirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5214_3: luk ca . siddham etat . katham . tadvannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ luk ca vaktavyaḥ . śṛṅkhalavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5214_4: bandhanam iti . saḥ tarhi tadvannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha yat na antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5214_5: yasya pravṛttiḥ bhavati tat tasya nimittatvāya kalpate . na ca antareṇa śṛṅkhalam
GS24pmbhasuu:5214_6: bandhanam pravartate . atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . śṛṅkhalasahacaritam
GS24pmbhasuu:5215: (P_5,2.82) KA_II.388.19-20 Ro_IV.144 prāye sañjñāyām vaṭakebhyaḥ iniḥ . prāye sañjñāyām vaṭakebhyaḥ iniḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaṭakinī paurṇamāsī .
GS24pmbhasuu:5216_0: (P_5,2.84) KA_II.389.2-7 Ro_IV. 144-145 kim nipātyate . śrotriyan chandaḥ adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:5216_1: iti vākyārthe padavacanam . chandaḥ adhīte iti asya vākyasya arthe śrotriyan iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5216_2: etat padam nipātyate . chandasaḥ vā śrtotrabhāvaḥ tat adhīte iti ghan ca . chandasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5216_3: vā śrtotrabhāvaḥ nipātyate tat adhīte iti etasmin arthe ghan ca pratyayaḥ . chandaḥ adhīte śṛotriyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5217_0: (P_5,2.85) KA_II.389.9-12 Ro_IV.145 iniṭhanoḥ samānakālagrahaṇam . iniṭhanoḥ samānakālagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5217_1: kartavyam . adya bhukte śraḥ śrāddhikaḥ iti mā bhūt . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5218_0: (P_5,2.91) KA_II.389.14-16 Ro_IV.145-146 sañjñāyām iti kimartham . tribhiḥ sākṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5218_1: dṛṣṭam bhavati yaḥ ca dadāti yasmai ca dīyate yaḥ ca upadraṣṭā . tatra sarvatra pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5219_0: (P_5,2.92) KA_II.389.18-390.6 Ro_IV.146-147 kim nipātyate . kṣetriyaḥ śrotriyavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5219_1: . kṣetriyaḥ śrotriyavat nipātyate . parakṣetre cikitsyaḥ iti etasya vākyasya arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5219_2: kṣetriyac iti etat padam nipātyate . parakṣetrāt vā tatra cikitsyaḥ iti paralopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5219_3: ghac ca . parakṣetrāt vā tatra cikitsyaḥ iti etasmin arthe paralopaḥ nipātyate ghac
GS24pmbhasuu:5220: (P_5,2.94.1) KA_II.391.2-23 Ro_IV.147-153 kimartham imau arthau ubhau nirdiśyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:5221_0: asya asmin iti na yat yasya bhavati tasmin api tat bhavati yat ca yasmin bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5221_1: tat tasya api bhavati . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ . bhavanti hi devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5221_2: gāvaḥ na ca tāḥ tasmin ādhṛtāḥ bhavanti . bhavanti ca parvate vṛkṣāḥ na ca te tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5221_3: bhavanti . atha astigrahaṇam kimartham . sattāyām arthe pratyayaḥ yathā syāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5221_4: etat asti prayojanam . na sattām padārthaḥ vyabhicarati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5224: gāvaḥ asya āsan . gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5225: gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . bhavati na tu etasmin vākye . yadi etasmin vākye syāt yathā iha asteḥ prayogaḥ na bhavati gomān yavamān iti evam iha api na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_0: gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . sati api asteḥ prayoge yathā iha bahuvacanam śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_1: gāvaḥ asya āsan gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ evam iha api syāt . gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_2: iti . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ . gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_3: . na eṣā gavām sattā kathyate . kim tarhi . gomatsattā eṣā kathyate . asti atra vartamānakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_4: astiḥ . katham tarhi bhūtabhaviṣyatsattā gamyate . dhātusambandhe pratyayāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_5: idam tarhi prayojanam . astiyuktāt yathā syāt . anantarādiyuktāt mā bhūt iti . gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_6: asya anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya samīpe iti . atha kriyamāṇe api astrigrahaṇe iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_7: na bhavati . gāvaḥ asya santi anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya santi samīpe iti . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_8: . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham bhavati iti . yathā eva tarhi kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_9: astrigrahaṇe asāmarthyāt anantarādiṣu na bhavanti evam akriyamāṇe api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_10: . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . kriyamāṇe astrigrahaṇe na antareṇa tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:5226_11: antarādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante . akriyamāṇe punaḥ astrigrahaṇe antareṇa api tṛtīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_0: (P_5,2.94.2) KA_II.391.24-392.19 Ro_IV.153-156 atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . citraguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_1: . śabalaguḥ iti . bahuvrīhyuktatvāt matvarthasya . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . citrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_2: gāvaḥ asya santi iti . kutaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . kim avayavāt āhosvit samudāyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_3: avayavāt kasmāt na bhavati . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_4: bhavati iti . samudāyāt tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . aprātipadikatvāt . nanu ca bhoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_5: ākṛtau śāstrāṇi pravartante . tat yathā sup supā iti vartamāne anyasya ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_6: ca samāsaḥ bhavati . satyam evam etat . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam parisamāpyate . yāvati
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_7: etat parisamāpyate ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti tāvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . avayave ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_8: etat parisamāpyate na samudāye . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . pañca gāvaḥ asya santi
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_9: pañcaguḥ . daśaguḥ iti . pratyekam asāmarthyāt samudāyāt aprātipadikatvāt samāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_10: samāsena uktatvāt . na etat sāram . ukte api hi pratyayārthe utpadyate dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_11: . tat yathā dvaimāturaḥ pāñcanāpitiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ dviguḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_12: . apavādatvāt dviguḥ prāpnoti . antaraṅgatvāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_13: . anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ vartate viśiṣṭe anyapadārthe taddhitārthe dviguḥ . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_14: ca asya taddhite astigrahaṇam kriyate . yadi tarhi atiprasaṅgāḥ santi bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_15: api astigrahaṇam kartavyam astiyuktāt yathā syāt anantarādiyuktāt mā bhūt iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_16: na santi taddhitavidhau api na arthaḥ astigrahaṇena . satyam evam etat . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_17: tu idānīm taddhitavidhau astigrahaṇam . tat vai kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_18: na upādhyartham . astimān iti matup yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . aprātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_19: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ astiśabdaḥ . na eṣa asteḥ laṭ . katham avyayatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_20: . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātaḥ avyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_21: iti avyayasañjñā . evam api na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . astisāmānādhikaraṇye matup
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_22: vidhīyate . na ca asteḥ astinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam . tat etat kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_23: na upādhyartham . tasmāt dvigoḥ taddhitasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ yadi tat na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_24: sarvatra matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ iti . sati hi tasmin tena eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5228_0: (P_5,2.94.3) KA_II.392.20-393.10 Ro_IV.156-159 atha matvarthīyāt matvarthīyena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5228_1: . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:5228_2: iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5228_3: na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5229_0: daṇḍimatī śālā . hastimatī upapatyakā iti . bhavati . arthāntare vṛttāt arthāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:5229_1: vṛttiḥ . ṣaṣṭhyarthe vā vṛttam saptamyarthe vartate saptamyarthe vā vṛttam ṣaṣṭhyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_0: gomantaḥ asya santi . yavamantaḥ asya santi iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāṛaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_1: yasya gomantaḥ santi gāvaḥ api tasya santi . tatra uktaḥ gobhiḥ abhisambandhe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5230_2: iti kṛtvā taddhitaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5231_0: daṇḍimatī śālā . hastimatī upapatyakā iti . bhavati . arthāntare vṛttāt arthāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:5231_1: vṛttiḥ . ṣaṣṭhyarthe vā vṛttam saptamyarthe vartate saptamyarthe vā vṛttam ṣaṣṭhyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5231_2: vartate . iha api saptamyarthe vā vṛttam ṣaṣṭhyarthe vartate ṣaṣṭhyarthe vā vṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:5231_3: saptamyarthe vartate . anyathājātīyakaḥ khalu api gobhiḥ abhisambandhe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5231_4: anyathājātīyakaḥ tadvatā . yena eva khalu api hetunā etat vākyam bhavati gomantaḥ asya santi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5232_0: yavamantaḥ asya santi iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt matvarthīyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5232_1: matubādeḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tam ca api bruvatā samānvṛttau sarūpaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5232_2: . bhavati hi daṇḍimatī śālā hastimatī upapatyakā iti . śaiṣikāt matubarthīyāt śaiṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5232_3: matubarthīyaḥ sarūpaḥ pratyayaḥ na iṣṭaḥ . sanantāt na san iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5233_0: (P_5,2.94.4) KA_II.393.11-394.6 Ro_IV.159-161 kim punaḥ ime matupprabhṛtayaḥ sanmātre
GS24pmbhasuu:5233_1: bhavanti . evam bhavitum arhati . matupprabhṛtayaḥ sanmātre cet atiprasaṅgaḥ . matupprabhṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5233_2: sanmātre cet atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . vrīhiḥ asya . yavaḥ asya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5233_3: . tasmāt bhūmādigrahaṇam kartavyam . ke punaḥ bhūmādayaḥ . bhūmanindāpraśaṃsāsu nityayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:5233_4: atiśāyane saṃsarge astivivakṣāyām bhavanti matubādayaḥ . bhūmni :
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_0: daṇḍī chatrī . tat tarhi bhūmādigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_1: . vrīhiḥ asya . yavaḥ asya iti . uktam vā. kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . itikaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_2: khalu api kriyate . tataḥ cet vivakṣā . bhūmādiyuktasya eva ca vivakṣā . gomān yavamān
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_3: . bhūmādiyuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kasya cit yavaḥ na asti . saṅkhādakī
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_4: kakudāvartinī . nindāuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kaḥ cit na saṅkhādakī . rūpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_5: varṇavān . praśaṃsāyuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kasya cit rūpam na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_6: kṣīriṇaḥ vṛkṣāḥ . kaṇṭakinaḥ vṛkṣāḥ iti . nityayuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_7: kasya cit kṣiram na asti . udariṇī kanyā iti . atiśāyanayuktasya eva sattā kathyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_8: . na hi kasya cit udaram na asti . daṇḍī chatrī . saṃsargayuktasya eva sattā kathyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_9: . na hi kasya cit daṇḍaḥ na asti . yāvatībhiḥ khalu api gobhiḥ vāhadohaprasavāḥ kalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_10: tāvatīṣu sattā kathyate . kasya cit tisṛbhiḥ kalpante kasya cit śatena api na prakalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_11: . sanmātre ca ṛṣidarśanāt . sanmātre ca punaḥ ṛṣiḥ darśayati matupam . yavamatībhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5241_0: (P_5,2.94.5) KA_II.394.7-15 Ro_IV.161-162 guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk . guṇavacanebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5241_1: matupaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ . śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti . avyatirekāt siddham . na guṇaḥ guṇinam
GS24pmbhasuu:5241_2: vyabhicarati iti . avyatirekāt siddham iti cet dṛṣṭaḥ vyatirekaḥ . dṛśyate vyatirekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5241_3: . tat yatha paṭasya śuklaḥ iti . tathā ca liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ . evam ca kṛtvā liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5241_4: siddhāni bhavanti . śuklam vastram . śuklā śāṭī . śuklaḥ kambalaḥ . śuklau kambalau
GS24pmbhasuu:5241_5: . śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_0: (P_5,2.95) KA_II.394.17-22 Ro_IV.162-163 kimartham idam ucyate na tat asya asti asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_1: iti eva matup siddhaḥ . rasādibhyaḥ punarvacanam anyanirvṛttyartham . rasādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_2: punarvacanam kriyate anyeṣām matvarthīyānām pratiṣedhārtham . matup eva yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_3: . ye anye matvarthīyāḥ prāpnuvanti te mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . dṛśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5242_4: hi anye rasādibhyaḥ matvarthīyāḥ . rasikaḥ naṭaḥ . urvaśī vai rūpiṇī apsarasām .

GS24pmbhasuu:5245: jihīrṣā asya asti iti . prāṇyaṅgāt iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_0: (P_5,2.97) KA_II.395.6-396.5 Ro_IV.163-165 sidhmādiṣu yāni akārāntāni tebhyaḥ lacā
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_1: mukte iniṭhanau prapnutaḥ iniṭhanau ca na iṣyete . lac anyatarasyām iti samuccayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5248_2: . lac anyatarasyām iti samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā . lac ca matup ca . katham punaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5248_5: nānāyogam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā iti . yadi vibhāṣā

GS24pmbhasuu:5277_10: balāt ca ūlaḥ vaktavyaḥ tat na sahate iti etasmin arthe . balūlaḥ . vātāt samūhe

GS24pmbhasuu:5277_13: vā punaḥ etat bhaviṣyati . marudbhiḥ dattaḥ maruttaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5281_4: iti kimartham . arthavān . tadantāt ca . tadantāt ca iti vaktavyam . dhānyārthī .
GS24pmbhasuu:5281_5: hiraṇyārthī . kimartham tadantāt iti ucyate na tadantavidhinā siddham . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5281_6: prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evarm tarhi inantena saha samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5281_7: . dhānyena arthī dhānyārthī . saḥ hi samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ ayam arthayateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5281_8: ṇiniḥ syāt . evam api kriyām eva kurvāṇe syāt . tūṣṇīm api āsīnaḥ yaḥ tatsamarthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5281_9: ācarati saḥ abhiprāyeṇa gamyate arthyam anena iti . evam tarhi ayam arthaśabdaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5281_10: eva dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā arthavān ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5281_11: ca vartante . asti kriyāpadārthakaḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ . arthanam arthaḥ iti . tat yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5281_12: kriyāpadārthakaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . evam ca kṛtvā arthikapratyarthikau api siddhau bhavataḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5282_2: yadi evam kimaḥ at kva prepsyan dīpyase kva ardhamāsāḥ . atra api prāpnoti . tau
GS24pmbhasuu:5282_3: ca uktam . kim uktam . vibhaktau tavargapratiṣedhaḥ ataddhite iti . idamaḥ vibhaktisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5282_4: ca . idamaḥ vibhaktisvaraḥ ca prayojanam . itaḥ . iha . idamaḥ tṛtīyādiḥ vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5282_5: udāttā bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhavati . tyadādividhayaḥ ca . tyadādividhayaḥ ca

GS24pmbhasuu:5283_0: (P_5,3.2) KA_II.402.15-20 Ro_IV.178 bahugrahaṇe saṅkhyāgrahaṇam . bahugrahaṇe saṅkhyāgrahaṇam

GS24pmbhasuu:5284_0: (P_5,3.5.1) KA_II.403.2-15 Ro_IV.178-179 kva ayam nakāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_1: . lopaḥ asya bhavati nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_2: uccāryate . anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe api nakāre sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_3: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nalope kṛte ekāltvāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_4: kriyatām sarvādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_5: . tasya asiddhatvāt sarvādeśaḥ bhavati . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu nalopaḥ asiddhaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_6: ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . evam tarhi ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na akṛte sarvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_7: prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti na ca akṛtāyām prātipadikasañjñāyām nalopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_8: tat ānupūrvyā siddham . na etat asti prayojanam . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_9: iti akārasya akāravacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa nakāram sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_10: bhaviṣyati . asti anyat akārasya akāravacane prayojanam . kim . ye anye akārādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_11: prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham . tat yathā maḥ rāji samaḥ kvau iti makārasya makāravacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_12: anusvārādayaḥ na bhavanti . tasmāt nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:5284_13: eva .praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam a a a iti . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5285_0: (P_5,3.5.2) KA_II.403.16-24 Ro_IV.180 etadaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ . etadaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5285_1: kartavyaḥ . etadaḥ eta it iti etau ādeśau bhavataḥ tataḥ an . an ca bhavati etadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5285_2: iti . kena vihitena thakāre etadaḥ ādeśaḥ ucyate . etadaḥ ca thamaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5285_3: . etadaḥ ca thamaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . etatprakāram ittham . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5285_4: kartavyam . na kartavyam . etat jñāpayati bhavati atra thamuḥ iti yat ayam thakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:5285_5: ādeśam śāsti . kutaḥ nu khalu etajjñāpakāt atra thamuḥ bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5285_6: eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ thakārādiḥ tasmin ādeśaḥ syāt . idamā thakārādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5287_0: ime tasilādayaḥ vibhaktyādeśaḥ vā syuḥ pare vā iti . katham ca ādeśaḥ syuḥ katham

GS24pmbhasuu:5287_13: . yasmāt tasyati . pañcamyantasya taseḥ tasil bhavati iti tasil prāpnoti . anādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5287_15: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . tasil kasmāt na bhavati . svārthavijñānāt

GS24pmbhasuu:5288_0: (P_5,3.8) KA_II.405.2-8 Ro_IV.182-183 kimartham taseḥ tasil ucyate . taseḥ tasilvacanam

GS24pmbhasuu:5288_5: āgacchati . yataḥ āgacchati . paratvāt tasiḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate taseḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5290_1: yoge iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ bhavadādayaḥ . bhavān . dīrghāyuḥ . devānāmpriyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5290_3: . tataḥ bhavantam . tena bhavatā . tatra bhavatā tataḥ bhavatā . tasmai bhavate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5290_4: tatra bhavate . tataḥ bhavate . tasmāt bhavataḥ . tatra bhavataḥ . tataḥ bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5290_5: . tasmin bhavati . tatra bhavati . tataḥ bhavati . saḥ dīrghāyuḥ . tatra dīrghāyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5290_6: . tataḥ dīrghāyuḥ . tam dīrghāyuṣam . tatra dīrghāyuṣam . tataḥ dīrghāyuṣam . saḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5290_8: devānāmpriyam . tataḥ devānāmpriyam . saḥ āyuṣmān . tatra āyuṣmān . tataḥ āyuṣmān

GS24pmbhasuu:5294: (P_5,3.20) KA_II.406.16-18 Ro_IV.184 tayoḥ iti prātipadikanirdeśaḥ . tayoḥ iti prātipadikanirdeśaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5295: yogayoḥ vā pratyayayoḥ vā iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_0: (P_5,3.22) KA_II.407.2-408.2 Ro_IV.185-186 sadyaḥ iti kim nipātyate . samānasya sabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_1: dyaḥ ca ahani . samānasya sabhāvaḥ nipātyate dyaḥ ca pratyayaḥ ahani abhidheye .
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_2: samāne ahani sadyaḥ . parut parāri iti kim nipātyate . pūrvapūrvatayoḥ parabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_3: udārī ca saṃvatsare . pūrvapūrvatayoḥ parabhāvaḥ nipātyate udārī ca pratyayau saṃvatsare
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_4: abhidheye . pūrvasmin saṃvatsare parut . pūrvatare saṃvatsare parāri . aiṣamaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_5: kim nipātyate . idamaḥ samasaṇ . idamaḥ samasaṇ pratyayaḥ nipātyate saṃvatsare abhidheye
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_6: . asmin saṃvatsare aiṣamaḥ . paredyavi iti kim nipātyate . parasmāt edyavi ahani
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_7: . parasmāt edyavi pratyayaḥ nipātyate ahani abhidheye . parasmin ahani paredyavi
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_8: . adya iti kim nipātyate . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ dyaḥ ca . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ nipātyate dyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_9: ca pratyayaḥ ahani abhidheye . asmin ahani adya . pūrvedyuḥ anyedyuḥ anyataredyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_10: itaredyuḥ aparedyuḥ adharedyuḥ ubhayedyuḥ uttaredyuḥ iti kim nipātyate . pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_11: edyusuc . pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ edyusuc pratyayaḥ nipātyate ahani
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_12: abhidheye . pūrvasmin ahani pūrvedyuḥ . anyasmin ahani anyedyuḥ . anyatarasmin ahani
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_13: anyataredyuḥ . itarasmin ahani itaredyuḥ . aparasmin ahani aparedyuḥ . adharasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_14: ahani adharedyuḥ . ubhayoḥ ahnoḥ ubhayedyuḥ . uttarasmin ahani uttaredyuḥ . dyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5297_15: ca ubhayāt . ubhayaśabdāt dyuḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt manuṣyebhyaḥ ubhayadyuḥ .
