GS24pmbhasuu:5300_0: dakṣiṇataḥ grāmasya . uttarataḥ grāmasya . dakṣiṇottaraśabdau akārāntau . tasuśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_1: pratyayaḥ . bhavet siddham yadā akārāntau . yatu tu khalu ākārāntau tadā na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_2: . tadā api siddham . katham . puṃvadbhāvena . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . tasilādiṣu ā
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_3: kṛtvasucaḥ iti . na sidhyati . bhāṣitapuṃskasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ na ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_4: . nanu ca bho dakṣiṇaśabdaḥ uttaraśabdaḥ ca puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_5: bhāṣitapuṃskam iti ucyate ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . dakṣiṇā uttarā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_6: dikśabdau . dakṣiṇaḥ uttaraḥ iti vyavasthāśabdau . yadi punaḥ dikśabdāḥ api vyavasthāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_7: syuḥ . katham yāni digapadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi . diśaḥ yadā vyavasthām vakṣyanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_8: tari yaḥ yaḥ diśi vartate saḥ saḥ dikśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_9: dik śobhanā dik iti . atha matam etat diśi dṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_10: diśam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati . puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_11: tu prāpnoti . evam tarhi sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_12: iti evamartham . viśeṣaṇārtham tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:5300_13: iti . ṣaṣṭhī tasarthapratyayene iti ucyamāne iha api syāt . tataḥ grāmāt . yataḥ grāmāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5301_0: (P_5,3.31) KA_II.409.2-4 Ro_IV.191 upari upariṣṭāt iti kim nipātyate . ūrdhvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5301_1: upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca . ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca pratyayau nipātyete . upari upariṣtāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5302_0: (P_5,3.32) KA_II.409.6-16 Ro_IV.191 paścāt iti kim nipātyate . aparasya paścabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5302_1: ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . aparasya paścabhāvaḥ nipātyate ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . paścāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5302_2: dikpūrvapadasya ca . dikpūrvapadasya ca aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5302_3: . dakṣiṇapaścāt . uttarapaścāt . ardhottarapadasya ca samāse . ardhottarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5302_4: ca samāse aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dakṣiṇapaścārdhaḥ . uttarapaścārdhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5302_5: ardhe ca . ardhe ca parataḥ aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paścārdhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5303: (P_5,3.35) KA_II.409.18-20 Ro_IV.191 apañcamyāḥ iti prāk asaḥ . apañcamyāḥ iti yat ucyate prāk asaḥ tat draṣṭavyam . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5304: aviśeṣeṇa uttaram apañcamyāḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:5306_0: (P_5,3.36) KA_II.410.2-5 Ro_IV.191 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5306_1: bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5306_2: na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_0: (P_5,3.42) KA_II.410.7-15 Ro_IV.192-193 vidhārthe iti ucyate . kaḥ vidhārthaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_1: . vidhāyāḥ arthaḥ vidhārthaḥ . yadi evam ekā govidhā . ekā hastividhā . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_2: prāpnoti . evam tarhi dhāvidhānam dhātvarthapṛthagbhāve . dhāvidhānam dhātvarthapṛthagbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_3: iti vaktavyam . kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_4: pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kārakapṛthaktvam etat . yat tarhi tat kālye
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_5: bhuṅke sāyam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kālapṛthaktvam etat . yat tarhi śītam bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_6: uṣṇam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . guṇapṛthaktvam etat . kaḥ tarhi dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_7: . kārakāṇām pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā . yadi evam kriyāprakāre ayam bhavati . vidhayuktagatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_8: ca prakāre bhavanti . evaṃvidham . evaṃyuktam . evaṅgatam . evamprakāram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5308_0: (P_5,3.44) KA_II.410.17-20 Ro_IV.194 sahabhāve dhyamuñ . sahabhāve dhyamuñ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5308_1: . eikadhyam rāśim kuru . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . adhikaraṇavicāle iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5308_2: ucyate na ca saḥ eva adhikaraṇavicālaḥ yat ekam anekam kriyate . yat api anekam ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:5309: (P_5,3.45) KA_II.411.2-3 Ro_IV.194-195 dhamuñantāt svārthe ḍadarśanam . dhamuñantāt svārthe ḍaḥ dṛśyate saḥ ca vidheyaḥ . pathi dvaidhāni . saṃśaye dvaidhāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:5310_0: (P_5,3.47) KA_II.411.5-10 Ro_IV.195 pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam . pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5310_1: kartavyam . vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ . yājñikapāśaḥ . yaḥ hi yāpayitavyaḥ yāpyaḥ tatra mā
GS24pmbhasuu:5310_2: bhūt iti . atha vaiyākaraṇaḥ śarīreṇa kṛśaḥ vyākaraṇena ca śobhanaḥ kartavyaḥ vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5310_3: iti . na kartavyaḥ . katham . yasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tadguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5310_4: vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca kārśyasya bhāvāt dravye vaiyākaraṇaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5311_0: (P_5,3.48) KA_II.411.12-15 Ro_IV.195 pūraṇagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . na hi apūraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5311_1: tīyaśabdaḥ asti yatra doṣaḥ syāt . nanu ca ayam asti mukhatīyaḥ pārśvatīyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5311_2: arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam asya na bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi pūraṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5311_3: kartavyam . prāk ekādaśabhyaḥ acchandasi iti pūraṇāt yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_0: (P_5,3.52) KA_II.411.17-412.10 Ro_IV.19196-197 ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_1: . ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . ekākinau . ekākinaḥ iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_2: kāraṇam na sidhyati . ekaśabdaḥ ayam saṅkhyāpadam saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_3: . siddham tu saṅkhyādeśavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . dvibahvarthāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_4: ekaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . asahāyasya vā . asahāyasya vā ekaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_5: . asahāyaḥ ekākī . asahāyau ekākinau . asahāyāḥ ekākinaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_6: bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_7: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam ekaśabdaḥ asti eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā ekaḥ dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_8: bahavaḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ tāḥ . anyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_9: iti arthaḥ . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā . ekāgnayaḥ . ekahalāni . ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5312_10: jitam iti . tat yaḥ asahāyavācī tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_0: (P_5,3.55.1) KA_II.413.2-414.14 Ro_IV.197-205 atiśāyane iti ucyate . kim idam atiśāyane
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_1: iti . deśyāḥ sūtranibandhāḥ kriyante . yāvat brūyāt prakarṣe atiśaye iti tāvat atiśāyane
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_2: iti . kasya punaḥ prakarṣe pratyayaḥ utpadyate . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ṅyāpprātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_3: prakarṣe . ṅyāpprātipadikam vai śabdaḥ na ca śabdasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . śabde
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_4: asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . kaḥ punaḥ ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ . dravyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_5: vai dravyasaya prakarṣe iṣyate . evam tarhi guṇaḥ . evam api guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_6: . dravyam api ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ guṇaḥ api . tatra kutaḥ etat guṇasya prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_7: bhaviṣyati na punaḥ dravyasya prakarṣe iti . kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_8: kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5314_0: adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān . pāpīyān pratiprasthātā . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti . samānaguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5314_1: eṣā spardhā bhavati . adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān anyebhyaḥ praśasyebhyaḥ . pāpīyān pratiprasthātā
GS24pmbhasuu:5314_2: anyebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti kaṇiḥ ayam saukṣmye vartate . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:5314_3: ime kim cit paśyanti . ayam eṣām kāṇatamaḥ iti . adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5314_4: iha mā bhūt . mahān sarṣapaḥ . mahān himavān iti . jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5315: vṛkṣaḥ ayam plakṣaḥ ayam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_0: gotaraḥ . gotarā . aśvataraḥ iti . na eṣaḥ jāteḥ prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi . guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_1: . gauḥ ayam śakaṭam vahati . gotararḥ ayam yaḥ śakaṭam vahati sīram ca . gauḥ iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_2: yā samām samām vijāyate . gotarā iyam yā samām samām vijāyate strīvatsā ca . aśvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_3: ayam yaḥ catvāri yojanāni gacchati . aśvataraḥ ayam yaḥ aṣṭau yojanāni gacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_4: tathā tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_5: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . yasya prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_6: asti tasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati . guṇasya ca eva prakarṣaḥ na dravyasya . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_7: . evam hi dṛśyate loke . iha samāne āyāme vistāre paṭasya anyaḥ arghaḥ bhavati kāśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_8: anyaḥ māthurasya . guṇāntaram khalu api śilpinaḥ utpādayamānāḥ dravyāntareṇa prakṣālayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_9: . anyena śuddham dhautakam kurvanti anyena śaiphālikam anyena mādhyamikam . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_10: ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_11: bhūt iti . na kartavyam . samānaguṇe eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_12: . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_13: syāt . yat api ucyate adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . adūraviprakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_14: eva spardhā bhavati . na hi niṣkadhanaḥ śataniṣkadhanena spardhate . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_15: jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . jananena yā prāpyate sā jātiḥ na ca etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_16: arthasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . yat api ucyate tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_17: sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . sādhanam vai dravyam na ca dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_18: prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . kim punaḥ ekam śauklyam āhosvit nānā . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_19: ekam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ bhavati . atha nānā
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_20: samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . asti ekam śauklyam tat tu
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_21: viśeṣavat . kiṅkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . alpatvamahattvakṛtaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu ekam nirviśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_22: ca . nanu ca uktam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_23: iti . guṇāntareṇa pracchādāt prakarṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu nānā . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_24: ca uktam samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . samānaguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_25: eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5316_26: na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_0: (P_5,3.55.2) KA_II.414.15-415.17 Ro_IV.205-209 kimantāt punaḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_1: . dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt . śuklam atiśete śuklataraḥ . kṛṣṇam atiśete kṛṣṇataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_2: . yadi dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt kālaḥ atiśete kālīm kālitaraḥ iti prāpnoti kālataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_3: iti ca iṣyate . tathā kālī atiśete kālam kālataraḥ iti prāpnoti kālitarā iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_4: . tathā gārgyaḥ atiśete gargān gargataraḥ iti prāpnoti gārgyataraḥ iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_5: . tathā gargāḥ atiśerate gārgyam gārgyatarāḥ iti prāpnoti gargatarāḥ iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_6: . evam tarhi prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ bhaviṣyati . kālaḥ atiśete kālataraḥ . kālī
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_7: atiśete kālitarā . gārgyaḥ atiśete gārgyataraḥ . gargāḥ atiśerate gargatarāḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_8: prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ kumāritarā kiśoritarā avyatiriktam vayaḥ iti kṛtvā vayasi
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_9: prathame iti ṅīp prāpnoti . tarapā uktatvāt strīpratyayaḥ na bhaviṣyati . ṭāp api
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_10: tarhi na prāpnoti . ukte api hi bhavanti ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_11: iti . ṅīp api tarhi prāpnoti . evam tarhi guṇaḥ abhidhīyate . evam api liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_12: na sidhyanti . śuklataram . śuklatarā . śuklataraḥ . śuklatarau . śuklatarāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5317_13: . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayata liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_0: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_1: yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat gu asya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā kriyā abhidhīyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_2: api liṅgavacanāni na sidhyanti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . evam api dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_3: prāpnoti . yaḥ ca atiśete yaḥ ca atiśayyate ubhau tau tasya āśrayau bhavataḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_4: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . śetiḥ akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ api dhātavaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_5: bhavanti . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇam vā bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_6: kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ ca śetiḥ . atha yadi eva dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_7: atha api guṇaḥ abhidhīyate atha api kriyā kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_8: pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti āha . katham . yadā tāvat dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_9: prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ tadā kṛtyalyuṭaḥ bahulam iti evam atra lyuṭ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_10: . yadā guṇaḥ abhidhīyate tadā nyāyasiddham eva . yadā lapi kriyā tadā api nyāyasiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_11: eva . atha vā atiśāyayati iti atiśāyanam . kaḥ prayojyārthaḥ . guṇāḥ guṇinam prayojayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_12: guṇī vā guṇān prayojayati . kaḥ punaḥ iha śetyarthaḥ . iha yaḥ yatra bhavati śete
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_13: asau tatra . guṇāḥ ca guṇini śerate . śetyarthaḥ kāritārthaḥ vā nirdeśaḥ ayam samīkṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_14: . śetyarthe na asti vaktavyam . kāritārthe bravīmi te . guṇī vā guṇasaṃyogāt guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5319_15: vā guṇinā yadi abhivyajyeta saṃyogāt kāritārthaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_0: (P_5,3.55.3) KA_II.415.18-416.15 Ro_IV.209-211 iha asya api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi asya
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_1: api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi iti paratvāt ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti . atiśāyane bahuvrīhau uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_2: . kim uktam . pūrvpadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . uttarapadātiśaye
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_3: ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ iti . iha trīṇi śuklāni vastrāṇi prakarṣāpakarṣayuktāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_4: . tatra pūrvam apekṣya uttare dve tarabante . tatra dvayoḥ tarabantayoḥ ekasmāt prakarṣayuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_5: śuklataraśabdāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti śuklaśabdāt eva ca iṣyate . śuklatarasya śuklabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_6: prakṛteḥ pratyayavijñānam . śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_7: . na etat vivadāmahe śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti na asti iti . kim tarhi . śuklataraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_8: api asti . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti . tadantāt ca svārthe chandasi darśanam śreṣṭhamāya
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_9: iti . tadantāt ātiśāyikāntāt ca svārthe chandasi ātiśāyikaḥ dṛśyate . devo vaḥ savita
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_10: prarpayatu śreṣṭhamāya karmaṇe . evam tarhi madhyamāt śuklaśabdāt pūrvaparāpekṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_11: utpattiḥ vaktavyā . madhyamaḥ ca śuklaśabdaḥ pūrvam apekṣya prakṛṣṭaḥ param apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_12: nyūnaḥ na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . atha vā utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . vācakena khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_13: api utpattavyam na ca śuklataraśabdāt utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt . na khalu api bahūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_14: prakarṣe tarapā bhavitavyam . kena tarhi . tamapā . pūrveṇa spardhamānaḥ ayam labhate
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_15: sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . apekṣya madhyamaḥ pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_16: ādhikyam labhate sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti yathā amātyaḥ sthite nṛpe . astu vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_17: api taraḥ tasmāt . na apaśabdaḥ bhaviṣyati . vācakaḥ cet prayoktavyaḥ vācakaḥ cet prayujyatām .
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_0: (P_5,3.57) KA_II.416.17-417.7 Ro_IV.212-215 dvivacane iti ucyate . tatra idam na
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_1: sidhyati . dantoṣṭhasya dantāḥ snigdhatarāḥ . pāṇipādasya pādau sukumāratarau . asmākam
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_2: ca devadattasya ca devadattaḥ abhirūpataraḥ iti . yadi punaḥ dvyarthopapade iti ucyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_3: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam na kartavyam . iha api śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_4: pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti dvyarthopapade iti eva siddham . na evañjātīyakā
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_5: dvyarthatā śakyā vijñātum . iha api prasjyeta . śaṅkāśyakānām pāṭaliputrakāṇām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_6: pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatamāḥ iti . avaśyam khalu api vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_7: yaḥ hi bahūnām vibhāgaḥ tadartham . śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ ca pāṭaliputrakebhyaḥ ca māthurāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_8: abhirūpatarāḥ iti . tat tarhi dvyarthopapade iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_9: pāribhāṣikasya dvivacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi anvarthagrahaṇam . ucyate vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_10: . dvayoḥ arthayoḥ vacanam dvivacanam iti . evam api tarabīyasunoḥ ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_11: upasaṅkhyānam . tarabīyasunoḥ ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_12: . parut bhavān paṭuḥ āsīt . paṭutaraḥ ca aiṣamaḥ iti . siddham tu guṇapradhānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_13: . siddham etat . katham . guṇapradhānatvāt . guṇapradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5321_14: . guṇāntarayogāt ca anyatvam bhavati . tat yathā tam eva guṇāntarayuktam vaktāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5322_0: (P_5,3.58) KA_II.417.9-12 Ro_IV.215 evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . niyamārthaḥ . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5322_1: prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5322_2: . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5322_3: . mā evam vijñāyi . ajādī eva guṇavacanāt iti . kim ca syāt na vyañjanādī guṇavacanāt syātām .
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_0: (P_5,3.60) KA_II.417.14-418.4 Ro_IV.215-217 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_1: . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti uktvā aguṇavacanānām api ajādyoḥ ādeśāḥ ucyante . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_2: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api ajādī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_3: yat ayam ajādyoḥ parataḥ ādeśān śāsti . evam api tayoḥ iti vaktavyam syāt . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_4: parataḥ iti . yadi punaḥ ayam vidhiḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . vyañjanādī hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_5: syātām upādhīnām ca saṅkaraḥ syāt punarvidhānāt ajādyoḥ . nanu ca ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_6: . yadi api ete anuvarteran vyañjanādī tarhi na syātām . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_7: jñāpayati bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api ajādī iti yat ayam ajādyoḥ parataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_8: ādeśān śāsti . nanu ca uktam tayoḥ iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam ajādīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_9: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_10: saptamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_11: . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_12: gāva aśvā hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5323_13: sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_0: (P_5,3.66.1) KA_II.418.6-25 Ro_IV.217-220 strīliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanāntena
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_1: ca . tena strīliṅgāt eva utpattiḥ syāt ekavacanāntāt ca . punnapuṃsakaliṅgāt dvivacanabahuvacanāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_2: ca na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_3: etat . praśaṃsāyām yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt rūpap bhavati . kasmin arthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_4: svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_5: tiṅprakṛteḥ ambhāvavacanam . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt tiṅprakṛteḥ rūpapaḥ ambhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_6: vaktavyaḥ . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam . pacantirūpam iti . siddham tu kriyāpradhānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_7: . siddham etat . katham . kriyāpradhānatvāt . kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam ekā ca kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_8: . dravyapradhānam nāma . katham punaḥ jñayate kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam bhavati dravyapradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_9: nāma iti . yat kriyām pṛṣṭaḥ tiṅā ācaṣṭe . kim devadattaḥ karoti . pacati iti . dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_10: pṛṣṭaḥ kṛtā ācaṣṭe . kataraḥ devadattaḥ . yaḥ kārakaḥ hārakaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ekā
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_11: kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na sidyanti . pacataḥ . pacanti iti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_12: . kim tarhi sādhanāpekṣāṇi . iha api tarhi prāpnuvanti . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_13: . pacantirūpam iti . tiṅā uktatvāt tasya abhisambandhasya na bhaviṣyati . ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_14: api tarhi na prāpnoti . samayāt bhaviṣyati . dvivacanabahuvacanāni api tarhi samayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_15: prāpnuvanti . evam tarhi ekavacanam utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya dvibahvoḥ dvivacanabahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_16: apavāvau bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api napuṃsakatvam vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . liṅgam aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5325_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vṛṣalarūpaḥ . dasyurūpaḥ . corarūpaḥ iti . siddham tu prakṛtyarthavaiśiṣṭyavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5325_2: . siddham etat . katham . prakṛtyarthasya vaiśiṣṭye iti vaktavyam . vṛṣalarūpaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5325_3: . api ayam palāṇḍunā surām pibet . corarūpaḥ ayam . api ayam akṣṇoḥ añjanam haret
GS24pmbhasuu:5325_4: . dasyurūpaḥ ayam . api ayam dhāvataḥ lohitam pibet .
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_1: . īṣadasamāptau kriyāpradhānatvāt liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ . paṭukalpaḥ . paṭukalpau
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_2: . paṭukalpāḥ iti . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ īṣadasamāptiḥ nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_3: prāpnoti . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād siddham . siddham etat . katham . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_4: . kim tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam etat . īṣadasamāptau yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_5: kalpabādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_6: anuvartante . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_7: anupapattiḥ . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_8: tu tatsambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tatsambandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_9: īṣadasamāptisambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_10: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam īṣadasamāptaukriyāpradhānatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_11: liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_12: nanu ca uktam prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_13: jñāpayati svārthikāḥ ativartante api liṅgavacanāni iti yat ayam ṇacaḥ striyām añ
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_14: iti strīgrahaṇam karoti . yadi etat jñāpyate bahuguḍaḥ drākṣā . bahutailam prasannā
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_15: . bahupayaḥ yavāgūḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na api ativartante . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_16: . paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ iti . na etat asti . nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_17: visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ ca anirjñātaḥ . idam tarhi . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_18: . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . dravyam api anirjñātam . idam tarhi . kṛtakalpam . bhuktakalpam
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_19: . pītakalpam iti . ktāntāt pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ ktasya bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_20: kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt . ktāntāt pratyayavidhāneḥ anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_21: . ktasya bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt . bhūtakālalakṣaṇaḥ ktaḥ . kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_22: . visamāptivacanāḥ ca kalpādayaḥ . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat bhūtakālaḥ ca syāt asamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_23: ca iti . siddham tu āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . āśaṃsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_24: bhūtavat ca iti evam atra ktaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam ca api udāharaṇam paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_25: iti . nanu ca uktam nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_26: ca anirjñātaḥ iti . lokataḥ vyavahāram dṛṣṭvā guṇasya nirjñānam . tat yathā paṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_27: ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ laghunā upāyena athān sādhayati . paṭukalpaḥ ayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_28: ucyati yaḥ na tathā sādhayati . idam ca api udāharaṇam guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā
GS24pmbhasuu:5326_29: prasannā . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . nanu ca uktam dravyam api anirjñātam iti . lokataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_1: bahuc yathā syāt . bahucā mukte vākyam api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_2: prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . kalpādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_3: api yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . bahuc ucyate kalpādayaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_4: tat ubhayam vacanāt bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . akriyamāṇe hi vibhāṣāgrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_5: bahuc kalpādīn bādheta . kalpādayaḥ api anavakāśāḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . sāvakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_6: kalpādayaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . atha subgrahaṇam kimartham . subantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_7: utpattiḥ yathā syāt . prātipadikāt mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_8: atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau satyām prātipadikāt vā . yadi evam iha api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_9: subgrahaṇena . supaḥ ātmanaḥ kyac iti . iha api na asti atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_10: satyām prātipadikāt vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . subantāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_11: siddhā bhavati . prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā na prāpnoti . nanu ca prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_12: api utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā . katham . ārabhyate naḥ kye iti . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_13: kartavyam subantāt utpattau niyamārtham . tat eva prātipadikāt utpattau satyām vidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_14: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt . tiṅantāt mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_15: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_16: . bahuci subgrahaṇāt pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānam . bahuci subgrahaṇam kriyate pūrvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_17: tiṅaḥ vidhiḥ yathā vijñāyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam tiṅgrahaṇam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_18: . kva prakṛtam . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau . tiṅaḥ ca iti . evam tarhi bahuci subgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_19: pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānāt . bahuci subgrahaṇam kriyate . kim kāraṇam . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_20: vidhānāt . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ ca iti anuvartate . tat iha api prāpnoti . nanu ca tiṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_21: nivarteta . avaśyam uttarārtham anuvartyam avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti pacataki
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_22: jalpataki iti evamartham . yadi subgrahaṇam kriyate svaraḥ na sidhyati . bahupaṭavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_23: evam svaraḥ prasajyeta bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ citaḥ saprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_24: bahvakajartham iti . svaraḥ katham . svaraḥ prātipadikatvāt . subluki kṛte prātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_25: svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . atha tugrahaṇam kimartham . tugrahaṇam nityapūrvārtham . tugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_26: kriyate nityam pūrvaḥ yathā syāt . vibhāṣā mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5327_27: . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena pūrvam abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . bahuc abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5328_0: vibhāṣā bahuc bhavati iti . yadā ca bhavati tadā pūrvaḥ bhavati . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5328_1: . prāk utpatteḥ yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat utpanne api pratyaye yathā syāt . bahuguḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5328_2: drākṣā . bahutailam prasannā . bahupayaḥ yavāgūḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5328_3: . svāṛthikaḥ ayam svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5328_4: siddhe sati yat tugrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svārthikāḥ ativartante api
GS24pmbhasuu:5328_5: liṅgavacanāni iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . guḍakalpā drākṣā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5330: payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5331_1: tamādibhyaḥ kalpādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . tamādīnām avakāśaḥ prakarṣasya vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5331_2: īṣadasamāpteḥ avacanam . paṭutaraḥ . paṭutamaḥ . kalpādīnām īṣadasamāpteḥ vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5331_3: prakarṣasya avacanam . paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5331_4: paṭukalpataraḥ . mṛdukalpataraḥ . kalpādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5331_5: īṣadasamāpteḥ prakarṣe tamādiḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti prakṛteḥ eva ca iṣyate . tamādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5331_6: īṣatpradhānāt . tamādiḥ īṣatpradhānāt api bhavati . asya prakarṣaḥ asti . tasya prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:5331_7: bhaviṣyati . kasya ca prakarṣaḥ asti. prakṛteḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5332_0: (P_5,3.71-72.1) KA_II.422.16-21 Ro_IV.230 kim ayam subantasya prāk ṭeḥ bhavati āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:5332_1: ṅyāpprātipadikasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . ubhayam prakṛtam . anyatarat śakyam viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:5332_2: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi subantasya yuṣmakābhiḥ asmakābhiḥ yuṣmakāsu asmakāsu yuvakayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5332_3: āvakayoḥ iti na sidhyati . atha prātipadikasya tvayakā mayakā tvayaki mayaki iti

GS24pmbhasuu:5360_2: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svārthikāḥ ativartante api liṅgavacanāni . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5360_3: jñāpane prayojanam . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5361_1: . kim prayojanam . punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ . na ca ekasya punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5361_2: bhavati . atha kriyāgrahaṇam anuvartate āhosvit na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_0: ekaḥ bhuṅkte iti . atha anuvartamāne api kriyāgrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_1: pākaḥ iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ kasmāt na bhavati . dvau pākau. trayaḥ pākāḥ . catvāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_2: pākāḥ . pañca pākāḥ . daśa pākāḥ iti . na etat kriyāgaṇanam . kim tarhi . dravyagaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_3: etat . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti . iha api tarhi dravyagaṇanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_4: na prāpnoti . sakṛt bhuktvā . sakṛt bhoktum iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ dviḥ bhuktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_5: dviḥ boktum triḥ bhuktvā triḥ bhoktum pañcakṛtvā bhuktvā pañcakṛtvā bhoktum daśakṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_6: bhuktvā daśakṛtvā bhoktum iti dravyagaṇanān na prāpnoti . yadi khalu api punaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_7: āvṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ dviḥ āvṛtte sakṛt iti syāt triḥ āvṛtte dviḥ iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_8: anuvartate abhyāvṛttigrahaṇam na tu punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ . kim tarhi abhimukḥī
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_9: pravṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ . pūrvā ca pare prati abhimukḥī pare ca pūrvām prati abhimukhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_10: . yat api ucyate anuvartamāne api kriyāgrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ pākaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_11: iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ kasmāt na bhavati . dvau pākau. trayaḥ pākāḥ . catvāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_12: pākāḥ . pañca pākāḥ . daśa pākāḥ iti parihṛtam etat . na etat kriyāgaṇanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_13: tarhi . dravyagaṇanam etat . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_14: nanu ca uktam iha api tarhi dravyagaṇanāt na prāpnoti . sakṛt bhuktvā . sakṛt bhoktum
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_15: iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ dviḥ bhuktvā dviḥ boktum triḥ bhuktvā triḥ bhoktum pañcakṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_16: bhuktvā pañcakṛtvā bhoktum daśakṛtvā bhuktvā daśakṛtvā bhoktum iti dravyagaṇanān
GS24pmbhasuu:5362_17: na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kriyāgaṇanāt bhaviṣyati . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5365_12: . navam . pra naḥ navyebhiḥ . navaiḥ . brahma pūrvyam . pāthaḥ pūrvyam . tanuṣu pūrvyam

GS24pmbhasuu:5365_14: . saḥ pra pūrvyaḥ . saḥ pra pūrvaḥ . agnim vai pūrvyam . pūrvam . tam juṣasva yaviṣṭhya
GS24pmbhasuu:5365_15: . yaviṣṭha . hotravāham yaviṣṭhyam . yaviṣṭham . tvam ha yat yaviṣṭhya . yaviṣṭha
GS24pmbhasuu:5365_16: . samāvat vasati samāvat gṛhṇāti . samam vasati samam gṛhṇāti . samāvat devayajñe

GS24pmbhasuu:5365_20: . navīnam . naḥ ca purāṇe prāt . naḥ ca purāṇe prāt vaktavyaḥ tnaptanakhāḥ ca pratyayāḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5366_1: eva . yat eva vācā vyavahiryate tat karmaṇā kriyate . aṇprakaraṇe kulālavaruḍaniṣādacaṇḍālāmitrebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5366_3: kartavyam . kaulālaḥ . vāṛuḍaḥ . naiṣādaḥ . cāṇḍālaḥ . āmitraḥ . bhāgarūpanāmabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5366_4: dheyaḥ . bhāgarūpanāmabhyaḥ dheyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhāgadheyam . rūpadheyam . nāmadheyam

GS24pmbhasuu:5369: (P_5,4.44) KA_II.436.11-12 Ro_IV. 261 tasiprakaraṇe ādyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . tasiprakaraṇe ādyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āditaḥ . madhyataḥ . antataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5370_1: abhūtatadbhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . sampadyante yavāḥ . sampadyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5370_2: śālayaḥ iti . atha kriyamāṇe api vā abhūtatadbhāvagrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5370_3: sampadyante asmin kṣetra śālayaḥ iti . prakṛtivivakṣāgrahaṇam ca . prakṛtivivakṣāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5370_4: ca kartavyam . samīpādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . samīpādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5370_5: . samīpī bhavati . abhyāśī bhavati . antikī bhavati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5370_6: . na hi asamīpam samīpam bhavati . kim tarhi . asamīpastham samīpastham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5370_7: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . tātsthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:5371_1: udāttatḥ bhavati iti udāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekāc ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5371_2: . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5371_3: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ḍāci citkaraṇam viśeṣaṇārtham . ḍāci citkaraṇam kriyate

GS24pmbhasuu:5371_6: na bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi prāpnoti . nābhā pṛthivyāḥ nihitaḥ davidyutat . tasmāt cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5373_1: syāt . na eatat asti prayojanam . pratyayparatvena api etat siddham . idam tarhi

GS24pmbhasuu:5373_4: . pratirājam . uparājam . avyayībhāvaḥ ca samāsaḥ napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhavati iti napuṃsakaliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5373_5: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5373_6: tarhi prayojanam . na avyayībhāvāt ataḥ am tu apañcamyāḥ iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ yathā syāt

GS24pmbhasuu:5373_10: . tripurī . dvigoḥ akārāntāt iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5373_11: . puraśabdaḥ ayam akārāntaḥ . tena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . ātaḥ ca akārāntaḥ iti āha

GS24pmbhasuu:5373_13: . dvidhurī tridhurī . dvigoḥ akārāntāt iti ṅīp yathā syāt . dvigu . dvandva . dvandvasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5373_14: ca prayojanam . vāktvacam . sraktvacam . dvandvaḥ ca samāsaḥ napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:5373_16: liṅgasya . idam tarhi prayojanam . idam tarhi prayojanam . kośaḥ ca niṣat ca kośaniṣadam
GS24pmbhasuu:5373_17: . kośaniṣadinī . dvandvopatāpagarhyāt prāṇisthāt iniḥ iti iniḥ yathā syāt . dvandva
GS24pmbhasuu:5373_18: . tatpuruṣa . tatpuruṣasañjñā ca prayojanam . paramadhurā uttamadhurā . paravat liṅgam

GS24pmbhasuu:5373_22: avyayam tatpuruṣe prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . tatpuruṣa .

GS24pmbhasuu:5378_0: (P_5,4.74) KA_II.439.19-440.5 Ro_IV.266-267 anakṣe iti katham idam vijñāyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5378_1: cet akṣadhūrantaḥ samāsaḥ iti āhosvit na cet akṣaḥ samāsārthaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5378_4: iti . siddham dṛḍhadhūḥ akṣaḥ iti . idam tu na sidhyati . akṣasya dhūḥ akṣadhūḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5378_5: . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate na cet akṣadhūrantaḥ samāsaḥ iti na api na cet akṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5378_6: samāsārthaḥ iti . katham tarhi . na cet akṣasya dhūḥ iti . evam ca kṛtvā na api na
GS24pmbhasuu:5378_7: cet akṣadhūrantaḥ samāsaḥ iti vijñāyate na api na cet akṣaḥ samāsārthaḥ iti . atha

GS24pmbhasuu:5387_1: kartavyam . pradhānam yā pūraṇī iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kalyāṇī pañcamī asya
