GS24pmbhasuu:5391_0: (P_5,4.135) KA_II.443.10-13 Ro_IV.272-273 gandhasya ittve tadekāntagrahaṇam . gandhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5391_1: ittve tadekāntagrahaṇam kartavyam iha mā bhūt . śobhanāḥ gandhāḥ asya sugandhaḥ āpaṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5391_2: iti . atha anulipte katham bhavitavyam . yadi tāvat yat anugatam tat abhisamīkṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:5391_3: sugandhiḥ iti bhavitavyam . atha yat praviśīrṇam sugandhaḥ iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_0: (P_5,4.154) KA_II.443.14-444.11 Ro_IV.273-275 śeṣāt iti ucyate . kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_1: yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ ni vidhīyate saḥ śeṣaḥ . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_2: kriyate . yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ vidhīyate tābhyaḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_3: asti prayojanam . ye pratipadam vidhīyante te tatra bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_4: hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśāḥ ca samāsāntāḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā kap
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_5: . yadā na kap saḥ avakāśaḥ . kapaḥ prasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . paratvāt kap prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_6: . tasmāt śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim punaḥ idam śeṣagrahaṇam kabapekṣam yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_7: kap iti āhosvit samāsāntāpekṣam yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ samāsāntaḥ na vihitaḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_8: ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate kabapekṣam anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_9: samāsāntāpekṣam anṛkkam bahvṛkkam sūktam iti na sidhyati . astu kabapekṣam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_10: anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti . viśeṣe etat vaktavyam . anṛcaḥ māṇave bahvṛcaḥ caraṇaśākhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_11: iti . idam tarhi ūdhasaḥ anaṅi strīgrahaṇam coditam . tasmin kriyamāṇe api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_12: . evam tarhi na eva kabapekṣam śeṣagrahaṇam na api samāsāntāpekṣam . kim tarhi anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_13: yaḥ bahuvrīhyadhikāraḥ saḥ apekṣyate . anantare bahuvrīhyadhikāre yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5392_14: samāsāntaḥ na vihitaḥ iti . katham anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti . vaktavyam eva anṛcaḥ māṇave
GS24pmbhasuu:5393_0: (P_5,4.156) KA_II.444.13-17 Ro_IV.275-276 īyasaḥ upasarjanadīrghatvam ca . īyasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5393_1: upasarjanadīrghatvam ca vaktavyam . bahvyaḥ śreyasyaḥ asya bahuśreyasī . vidyamānaśreyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:5393_2: . puṃvadvacanāt siddham . puṃvadbhāvaḥ atra bhavati īyasaḥ bahuvrīhau puṃvadvacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_0: (P_6,1.1.1) KA_III.1.1-3.23 Ro_IV.279-287 ekācaḥ iti kim ayam bahuvrīhiḥ . ekaḥ ac
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_1: asmin saḥ ekāc . ekācaḥ iti . āhosvit tatpuruṣaḥ ayam samānādhikaraṇaḥ . ekaḥ ac
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_2: ekāc . ekācaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi bahuvrīhiḥ siddham papāca papāṭha . iyāya . āra
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_3: iti na sidhyati . atha tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ siddham iyāya . āra iti . papāca
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_4: papāṭha iti na sidhyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_5: . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ ayam . ekavarṇeṣu katham . ekavarṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_6: vyapadeśivadvacanāt . vyapadeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti vaktavyam . evam ekavarṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_7: dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati . ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate . tatra na jñāyate kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_8: ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ iti . vakṣyati liṭi dhātoḥ anabhyāsasya iti . tena dhātoḥ ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_9: iti vijñāyate . yadi dhātoḥ ekācaḥ siddham papāca papāṭha . jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_10: iti na sidhyati . dhātoḥ iti na eṣā ekācsamānādhikaraṇā ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ ekācaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_11: . kim tarhi avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ yaḥ ekāc avayavaḥ iti . avayavayogā eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_12: ṣaṣṭhī iti cet siddham jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati iti . papāca papāṭha iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_13: . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena dhātoḥ ekāc avayavaḥ bhavati . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_14: iti ucyate . tena yatra eva prathamaḥ ca aprathamaḥ ca tatra dvirvacanam syāt . jajāgāra
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_15: puputrīyiṣati iti . papāca papāṭha iti atra na syāt . prathamatve ca . prathamatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_16: ca kim . vyapadeśivadvacanāt siddham iti eva . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_17: . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam . ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_18: . ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham iti eva . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_19: vā . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_20: . ekājmātrasya dvirvacanārthaḥ . ekājmātrayta dvirvacanam yathā syāt . iyāya papāca
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_21: . tataḥ prathamasya . prathamasya ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_22: . yatra prathamaḥ ca aprathamaḥ ca asti tatra prathamasya ekācaḥ dvirvacanam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_23: syāt . aprathamasya mā bhūt . jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati iti . ekācaḥ avayavaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_24: avayavānām dvirvacanaprasaṅgaḥ . ekācaḥ avayavaikāctvāt avayavānām dvirvacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_25: . nenijati iti atra nijśabdaḥ api ekāc ijśabdaḥ api ekāc ikāraḥ api ekāc niśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_26: api . tatra nijśabdasya dvirvacane rūpam siddham doṣāḥ ca na santi . ijśabdasya dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_27: rūpam na sidhyati doṣāḥ ca na santi . ikārasya dvirvacane rūpam na sidhati doṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_28: ca na santi . niśabdasya dvirvacane rūpam siddham doṣāḥ tu santi . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_29: . tatra jusbhāvavacanam . tatra jusbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anenijuḥ . paryaveviṣuḥ . abhyastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_30: jheḥ jusbhāvaḥ bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti jakāreṇavyavadhānāt . svaraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_31: . svaraḥ ca na sidhyati . nenijati . yat pariveviṣati iti . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_32: bhavati ajādau lasārvadhātuke iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . adbhāvaḥ ca . adbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_33: ca na sidhyati . nenijati . pariveviṣati iti . abhyastāt iti adbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_34: . numpratiṣedhaḥ ca . numpratiṣedhaḥ ca na sidhyati . nenijat . pariveviṣat . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_35: abhyāstāt śatuḥ it numpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti jakāreṇavyavadhānāt . śāstrahāniḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_36: . śāstrahāniḥ ca bhavati . samudāyaikācaḥ śāstram hīyate . siddham tu tatsamudāyaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_37: śāstrāhāneḥ . siddham etat . katham . tatsamudāyaikāctvāt . kim idam tatsamudāyaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_38: iti . tasya samudāyaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ . ekājbhāvaḥ ekāctvam . tatsamudāyasya ekāctvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_40: . kutaḥ . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . nanu ca samudāyaikācaḥ dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5395_0: śāstram hīyate . na hīyate . kim kāraṇam . avayavātmakatvāt samudāyasya . avayavātmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5395_1: samudāyaḥ . abhyantaraḥ hi samudāye avayavaḥ . tat yathā vṛkṣaḥ pracalan sahāvayavaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5395_2: pracalati . tatra bahuvrīhinirdeśe anackasya dvirvacanam anyapadārthatvāt . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5395_3: bahuvrīhinirdeśe anackasya dvirvacanam prāpnoti . āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyapadārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5395_4: bahuvrīheḥ . anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ vartate . tena yat anyat acaḥ tasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5395_5: syāt . tat yathā citraguḥ ānīyatām iti ukte yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ santi saḥ ānīyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:5395_6: gāvaḥ . siddham tu tadguṇasaṃvijñānāt pāṇineḥ yathā loke . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:5395_7: . tadguṇasaṃvijñānāt bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ ācāryasya yathā loke . loke śuklavāsasam
GS24pmbhasuu:5395_8: ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ pracaranti iti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . evam iha api .
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_0: (P_6,1.1.2) KA_III.3.24-5.19 Ro_IV.287-293 atha yasya dvirvacanam ārabhyate kim tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_1: sthāne bhavati āhosvit dviḥprayogaḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sthāne dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_2: ṇilopavacanam samudāyādeśatvāt . sthāne dvirvacane ṇilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āṭiṭat . āśiśat
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_3: . kim kāraṇam . samudāyādeśatvāt . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_4: prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya naṣṭaḥ ṇiḥ bhavati iti ṇeḥ aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_5: . idam iha sampradhāryam . dvirvacanam kriyatām ṇilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_6: paratvāt ṇilopaḥ . nityam dvirvacanam . kṛte api ṇilope prāpnoti akṛte api . dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_7: api nityam . anyasya kṛte ṇilope prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_8: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . nityam eva dvirvacanam . katham . rūpasya sthānivatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_9: yat ca sanyaṅantasya dvirvacane . yat ca sanyaṅantasya dvirvacane codyam tat iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_10: api codyam . kim punaḥ tat . sanyaṅantasya cet aśeḥ sani aniṭaḥ . dīrghakutvaprasāraṇaṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_11: adhikasya dvirvacanāt . ābṛdhyoḥ ca abhyastavipratiṣedhaḥ . saṅāśraye ca samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_12: samudāyādeśatvāt jhalāśraye ca avyapadeśaḥ āmiśratvāt iti . astu tarhi dviḥprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_13: dvirvacanam . dviḥprayogaḥ iti cet ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvavacanam liṭi . dviḥprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_14: iti cet ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvam liṭi vaktavyam . nematuḥ . nemuḥ . sehe . sehāte
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_15: . sahire . anādeśādeḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane sati samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_16: samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ ādeśādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_17: bhavati . dviḥprayoge api dvirvacane sati na doṣaḥ . vakṣyati tatra liḍgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_18: prayojanam . liṭi yaḥ ādeśādiḥ tadādeḥ na iti . iḍvacanam ca yaṅlope . iṭ ca yaṅlope
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_19: vaktavyaḥ . bebhiditā . bebhiditum . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_20: . sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane sati samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_21: prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ bhavati yaḥ ekāc upadeśe anudāttaḥ . dviḥprayoge api
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_22: dvirvacane sati na doṣaḥ . ekājgrahaṇena aṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . ekācaḥ aṅgāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_23: . nanu ca ekaikam atra aṅgam . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ tasya aṅgasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_24: . kutaḥ etat . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . iḍdīrghapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_25: ca . iṭaḥ dīrghatvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jarīgṛhitā . jarīgṛhitum . grahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_26: aliṭi dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane samudāyasya samudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_27: ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ grahiḥ . dviḥprayoge api
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_28: dvirvacane na doṣaḥ . grahiṇā aṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . graheḥ aṅgāt iti . nanu ca ekaikam
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_29: atra aṅgam . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ tasya aṅgasañjñā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_30: . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . padādividhipratiṣedhaḥ ca . padādilakṣaṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_31: vidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siṣeca . suṣvāpa . sātpadādyoḥ iti ṣatvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_32: prāpnoti . sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane sati samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_33: prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ padādiḥ bhavati . dviḥprayoge ca api dvirvacane na
GS24pmbhasuu:5396_34: doṣaḥ . suptiṅbhyām padam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . yasmāt suptiṅvidhiḥ tadādi subantam tiṅantam
GS24pmbhasuu:5397_0: ] suptiṅvidhiḥ . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ tayā padasañjñā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5397_1: etat . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . tau eva suptiṅau tataḥ parau
GS24pmbhasuu:5397_2: sā eva ca prakṛtiḥ ādyā . ādigrahaṇam prakṛtam . samudāyapadatvam etena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5398_0: (P_6,1.2.1) KA_III.5.21-24 Ro_IV.294 dvitīyasya iti avacanam ajādeḥ iti karmadhārayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5398_1: pañcamī . dvitīyasya iti śakyam avaktum . katham . ajādeḥ iti na eṣā bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:5398_2: . ac ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam ajādiḥ . ajādeḥ . kim tarhi karmadhārayāt pañcamī . ac ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5398_3: ajādiḥ . ajādeḥ parasya iti . tatra antareṇa dvitīyagrahaṇam dvitīyasya eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_1: . dvitīyadvirvacane prathamasya nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā . aṭiṭiṣati . aśiśiṣati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_2: kāraṇam . prāptatvāt . prāpnoti ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti . nanu ca dvitīyadvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_3: prathamadvirvacanam bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānasya bādhakam syāt . asati
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_4: khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . na vā prathamavijñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_5: hi dvitīyāprāptiḥ advitīyatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . prathamavijñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_6: hi sati dvitīyasya aprāptiḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . advitīyatvāt . na hi idānīm prathamadvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_7: kṛte dvitīyaḥ dvitīyaḥ bhavati . kaḥ tarhi . tṛtīyaḥ . tat yathā dvayoḥ āsīnayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_8: tṛtīye upajāte na dvitīyaḥ dvitīyaḥ bhavati . kaḥ tarhi . tṛtīyaḥ . na hi kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_9: ucyate akṛte dvirvacane yaḥ dvitīyaḥ tasya bhavitavyam iti . kim tarhi kṛte dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_10: yaḥ dvitīyaḥ tasya bhaviṣyati . anārambhasamam evam syāt . aṭeḥ prathamasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_11: syāt . halādiśeṣaḥ . dvitīyasya dvirvacanam . halādiśeṣaḥ . trayāṇām akārāṇām pararūpatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_12: aṭiṣati iti evam rūpam syāt . na anārambhasamam . aṭeḥ prathamasya dvirvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_13: halādiśeṣaḥ . ittvam . dvitīyasya dvirvacanam . halādiśeṣaḥ . ittvam ḍvayoḥ ikārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_14: savarṇadīrghatvam . abhyāsasya asavarṇe iti iyaṅādeśaḥ . iyaṭiṣati iti etat rūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_15: yathā syāt . oṇeḥ ca uvaṇiṣati iti . na aniṣṭārthā śāstrapravṛttiḥ bhavitum arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_16: . yathā vā ādivikāre alaḥ antyavikārābhāvaḥ . yathā vā ādivividhau alaḥ antyavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_17: na bhavati evam dvitīyadvirvacane prathamadvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_18: . na aprāpte alaḥ antyavidhau ādividhiḥ ārabhyate . saḥ tasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_19: . idam api evañjātīyakam . na aprāpte prathamadvirvacane dvitīyadvirvacanamārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_20: . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_21: asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt iti . na etat asti . sati api sambhave bādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_22: bhavati . tat yathā dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti . sati api
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_23: dadhidānasya sambhave takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_24: prathamadvirvacanasya dvitīyadvirvacanam bādhiṣyate . tatra pūrvasya acaḥ nivṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_25: vyañjanasya anivṛttiḥ vaktavyā . aṭiṭiṣati iti . yathā eva acaḥ nivṛttiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_26: evam vyañjanasya api prāpnoti . tatra pūrvasya acaḥ nivṛttau vyañjanānivṛttiḥ aśāsanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_27: pūrvasya . tatra pūrvasya acaḥ nivṛttau vyañjanasya anivṛttiḥ siddhā . kutaḥ . aśāsanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_28: pūrvasya . na iha vayam pūrvasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi dvitīyasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_29: ārabhāmahe . vyañjanāni punaḥ naṭabhāryavat bhavanti . tat yathā . naṭānām striyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_30: raṅgam gatāḥ yaḥ yaḥ pṛcchati kasya yūyam kasya yūyam iti tam tam tava tava iti āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_31: . evam vyañjanāni yasya yasya acaḥ kāryam ucyate tam tam bhajante . ndrādipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_32: ca . yat ayam na ndrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pūrvanivṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_33: vyañjanasya anivṛttiḥ iti . tatra dvitīyābhāve prathamādvirvacanam pratiṣiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_34: . tatra dvitīyasya ekācaḥ abhāve prathamasya dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_35: . kim kāraṇam . pratiṣiddhatvāt . ajādeḥ dvitīyasya iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣa doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_36: . sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ . sati dvitīyadvirvacane prathamasya pratiṣedhaḥ . sati
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_37: tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti cet halādiśeṣe doṣaḥ . sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti cet halādiśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:5399_38: doṣaḥ bhavati . halādiśeṣe sati ādye hali anādyasya lopaḥ syāt . iha eva syāt . papāca .
GS24pmbhasuu:5400_0: papāṭha iti . iha na syāt . āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ iti . lokavat halādiśeṣe . lokavat halādiśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:5400_1: siddham . tat yathā loke īśvaraḥ ājñāpayati grāmāt grāmāt manuṣyāḥ ānīyantām prāgāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:5400_2: grāmebhyaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ānīyantām iti . yeṣu tatra grāmeṣu brāhmaṇāḥ na santi na tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5400_3: idānīm tataḥ anyasya ānayanam bhavati . yathā tatra kva cit api brāhmaṇasya sattā (R: sarvatra)
GS24pmbhasuu:5401_0: abrāhmaṇasya nivarttikā bhavati evam iha api kva cit api hal ādyaḥ san sarvasya anādyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5401_1: halaḥ nivartakaḥ bhavati . kva cit anyatra lopaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam . kva cit anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5401_2: lopaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam api evam prāpnoti . kva cit api dvitīyaḥ san sarvasya prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5401_3: nivartakaḥ syāt . tasmāt astu sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti eva. nanu ca uktam sati
GS24pmbhasuu:5401_4: tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti cet halādiśeṣe doṣaḥ iti . pratividhāsyate halādiśeṣe .
GS24pmbhasuu:5402_0: (P_6,1.3) KA_III.8.9-22 Ro_IV.301-302 kimartham idam ucyate . ndrādeḥ dvirvacanaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5402_1: tatra ndrāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ . ndrādeḥ ekācaḥ dvirvacanam prāpnoti . tatra ndrāṇām saṃyogādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5402_2: pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . īrṣyateḥ tṛtīyasya . īrṣyateḥ tṛtīyasya dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5402_3: . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ ekācaḥ iti . īrṣyiṣiṣati . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5404_0: īrṣyiyiṣati . kaṇḍvādīnām ca . kaṇḍvādīnām ca tṛtīyasya dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5404_1: . kaṇḍūyiyiṣati . asūyiyiṣati . vā nāmadhātūnām . vā nāmadhātūnām tṛtīyasya dve bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5404_2: iti vaktavyam . aśvīyiyiṣati . aśiśvīyiṣati . aparaḥ āha yatheṣṭam vā . yatheṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5404_3: vā nāmadhātūnām iti . puputrīyiṣati . putitrīyiṣati . putrīyiyiṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5405_0: (P_6,1.4) KA_III.9.2-7 Ro_IV.302 pūrvaḥ abhyāsaḥ iti ucyate . kasya pūrvaḥ abhyāsasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5405_1: bhavati . dve iti vartate . dvayoḥ iti vaktavyam . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5405_2: . na kartavyaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5405_3: gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5405_4: iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat
GS24pmbhasuu:5405_5: arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_1: sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . ādyudāttatve pṛthagaprasaṅgārtham . ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_2: saha bhūtayoḥ yathā syāt . ekaikasya mā bhūt iti . yasmin eva abhyastakārye adoṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_3: tat eva paṭhitam anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_4: paryāyaḥ tarhi prasajyeta . paryāyaḥ ca . pūrvasya tāvat pareṇa rūpeṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_5: na bhaviṣyati . parasya tarhi syāt . tatra ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na parasya bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_6: iti yat ayam bibhetyādīnām piti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti āha . evam vyavadhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_7: na pūrvasya jñāpakāt na parasya ucyate ca idam abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_8: . tatra saḥ eva doṣaḥ paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_9: . ubhegrahaṇam kriyate . tat sahārtham vijñāsyate . asti anyat ubhegrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_10: . kim . ubhegrahaṇam sañjñinirdeśārtham . antareṇa api ubhegrahaṇam prakḷptaḥ sañjñinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_11: . katham . dve iti vartate . idam tarhi prayojanam . yatra ubhe śabdarūpe śrūyete
GS24pmbhasuu:5406_12: tatra abhyastasañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : īrtsanti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5411: aipsan . kim ca syāt . adbhāvaḥ numpratiṣedhaḥ jusbhāvaḥ iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . adbhāve tāvat na doṣaḥ . saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_0: at abhyastāt . tataḥ ātmanepadeṣu . ātmanepadeṣu ca at bhavati . anataḥ iti ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_1: śeṣaḥ . yat api ucyate numpratiṣedhaḥ iti ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_2: . idam iha sampradhāryam . numpratiṣedhaḥ kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_3: . paratvāt numpratiṣedhaḥ . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api numpratiṣedhe prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_4: api . ekādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . anyasya kṛte numpratiṣedhe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_5: ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_6: . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ . vidhiviṣaye numpratiṣedhaḥ vidhiḥ ca numaḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_7: prāk tu sarvanāmasthānotpatteḥ ekādeśaḥ . tatra nityatvāt ca antaraṅgatvāt ca ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_8: . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate jusbhāvaḥ iti ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_9: kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . ekādeśe iti ucyate kena ca atra ekādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_10: antinā . na atra antibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . jusbhāvena bādhyate . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_11: jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . śapā vyavahitatvāt . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_12: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti vyavadhānam eva . kim puṇaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_13: nimittavān antiḥ ekādeśam tāvat pratīkṣate na punaḥ tāvati eva nimittam asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_14: antibhāvena bhāvyam . iha api tarhi tāvati eva nimittam asti iti antibhāvaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_15: . anenijuḥ . paryaveviṣuḥ iti . astu . antibhāve kṛte sthānivadbhāvāt jhigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_16: grahaṇāt jusbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā yadi api nimittavān antiḥ ayam tasya jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_17: apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargāḥ abhiniviśante . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_18: paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utasrgaḥ pravartate . na tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_19: atra kadā cit api antibhāvaḥ bhavati . apavādam jusbhāvam pratīkṣate . na khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_20: kva cit abhyastānām jheḥ ca ānantaryam . sarvatra vikaraṇaiḥ vyavadhānam . tena anena
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_21: avaśyam vikaraṇanāśaḥ pratīkṣyaḥ kva cit lukā kva cit ślunā kva cit ekādeśena . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_22: yathā ślulukau pratīkṣate evam ekādeśam api pratīkṣate . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_23: sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim . sthānivadbhāvam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_24: . vyavadhānāt na bhaviṣyati . pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ca ayam pūrvasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_25: . pūrvasmāt api vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ . tat etat asati prayojane ubhegrahaṇam sahārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_26: vijñāsyate . katham kṛtvā ekaikasya abhyastasañjñā prāpnoti . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_27: dṛṣṭā . tat yathā . vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_28: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_29: ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_30: yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate iha api sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_31: pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam guṇvṛddhisañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ sahagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_1: jakṣityādiṣu saptagrahaṇam kartavyam . sapta jakṣityādayaḥ abhyastasañjñakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_2: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . vevītyartham . vevīteḥ abhyastasañjñā yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_3: . vevyate . aparigaṇanam vā āgaṇāntatvāt . na vā arthaḥ parigaṇanena . astu āgaṇāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_4: abhyastasañjñā . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . āṅaḥ śāsu . astu . abhyastakāryāṇi kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_5: na bhavanti . bhūyiṣṭhāni parasmaipadeṣu ātmanepadī ca ayam . svaraḥ tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_6: . yatra api asya ātmanepadeṣu abhyastakāryam svaraḥ tatra api anudāttetaḥ param lasārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_7: anudāttam bhavati iti anudāttatve kṛte na asti viśeṣaḥ dhātusvareṇa udāttatve sati
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_8: abhyastasvareṇa vā . ṣasivaśī chāndasau . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati . carkarītam
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_9: abhyastam eva . hnuṅaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . astu . abhyastakāryāṇi kasmāt na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_10: . bhūyiṣṭhāni parasmaipadeṣu ātmanepadī ca ayam . svaraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . ahnviṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_11: iti pratiṣedhavidhānasāmarthyāt svaraḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha vā sapta eva ime dhātavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5413_12: paṭhyante . jakṣ abhyastasañjñaḥ bhavati . ityādayaḥ ca ṣaṭ . jakṣ ityādayaḥ ṣaṭ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5414_1: chandaḥpratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam . chandasi tujādīnām dīrghaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5414_2: . asmin ca asmin ca pratyaye iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . tutoja śabalān harān .
GS24pmbhasuu:5414_3: anārambhaḥ vā aparigaṇitatvāt . anārambhaḥ vā chandasi dīrghatvasya nyāyyaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5414_4: . aparigaṇitatvāt . na hi chandasi dīrghatvasya parigaṇanam kartum śakyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5414_5: . anyeṣām ca darśanāt . yeṣām api dīrghatvam na ārabhyate teṣām api chandasi dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5414_6: dṛśyate . tat yathā pūruṣaḥ . nārakaḥ iti . anekāntatvāt ca . yeṣām ca api ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5414_7: teṣām api anekāntaḥ . yasmin eva ca pratyaye dīrghatvam dṛśyate tasmin eva ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:5414_8: dṛśyate . māmahānaḥ ukthapātram . mamahānaḥ iti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_0: (P_6,1.8) KA_III.12.11-13.5 Ro_IV.310-311 dhātoḥ iti kimartham . īhām cakre . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_1: etat asti . liṭi iti ucyate na ca atra liṭam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_2: tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . idam tarhi . sasṛvāṃsaḥ viśṛṇvire . liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_3: dvirvacane jāgarteḥ vāvacanam . liṭi dvirvacane jāgarteḥ vā iti vaktavyam . yaḥ jāgara
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_4: tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante . yaḥ jajāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante . anabhyāsasya iti kim . kṛṣṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_5: nonāva vṛṣabhaḥ yadi idam . nonūyateḥ nonāva . abhyāsapratiṣedhānarthakyam ca chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_6: vāvacanāt . abhyāsapratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . chandasi vāvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_7: avaśyam chandasi vā dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ādityān
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_8: yāciṣāmahe . yiyāciṣāmahe iti prāpte . devatā no dāti priyāṇi . dadāti priyāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_9: maghavā dātu . maghavā dadātu . saḥ naḥ stutaḥ vīravat dhātu . vīravat dadhātu .
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_10: yāvatā idānīm chandasi vā dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate dhātugrahaṇena api na arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_11: kasmāt na bhavati sasṛvāṃsaḥ viśṛṇvire iti . chandasi vāvacanāt . tat etat dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_0: (P_6,1.9) KA_III.13.7-16.7 Ro_IV.311-317 kim iyam ṣaṣṭhī āhosvit saptamī . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_1: sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ṣaṣṭhī sanyaṅantasya dvirvacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_2: bhavitavyam . atha saptamī sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ pūrvasya dvirvacanam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_3: . sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ iti cet iṭaḥ dvirvacanam parāditvāt . sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_4: iṭaḥ dvirvacanam kartavyam . aṭiṭiṣati . aśiśiṣati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_5: . parāditvāt . iṭ parādiḥ . hanteḥ ca īṭaḥ . hanteḥ ca īṭaḥ dvirvacanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_6: . jeghnīyate . nanu ca yasya api sanyaṅantasya dvirvacanam tasya api sthānivadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_7: . īṭi sthānivadbhāvāt īṭaḥ dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dvirvacananimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_8: aci sthānivat iti ucyate na ca asau dvirvacananimittam . yasmin api dvirvacanam yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_9: api dvirvacanam sarvaḥ asau dvirvacananimittam . tasmāt īṭaḥ dvirvacanam . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_10: ubhābhyām īṭaḥ dvirvacanam kartavyam . yaḥ ca ubhayoḥ doṣaḥ na tam ekaḥ codyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_11: . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam udāttaviśeṣaṇam cet sanaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_12: . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam udāttaviśeṣaṇam cet sanaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_13: vaktavyaḥ . bibhitsati . cicchitsati . dvirvacane kṛte upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_14: iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi sanyaṅantasya . sanyaṅantasya iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_15: aśeḥ sani aniṭaḥ . sanyaṅantasya iti cet aśeḥ sani aniṭaḥ dvirvacanam vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_16: iyakṣamāṇāḥ bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ . yasya api sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ dvirvacanam tena api atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_17: avaśyam iḍabhāve yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aśeḥ hi pratipadam iṭ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_18: smipūṅrañjvaśām sani iti . tena eva dvitīyadvirvacanam api na bhaviṣyati . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_19: na etat aśeḥ rūpam . yajeḥ eṣaḥ chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ . tat yathā tubhya idam agne
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_20: . tubhyam idam agne iti prāpte . ambānām carum . nāmbānām carum iti prāpte . āvyādhinīḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_21: ugaṇāḥ . sugaṇāḥ iti prāpte . iṣkartaram adhvarasya . niṣkartāram iti prāpte . śivā
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_22: udrasya bheṣajī . śivā rudrasya bheṣajī iti prāpte . aśyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_23: punaḥ aśeḥ arthaḥ . aśnotiḥ vyaptikarmā . yajiḥ api aśyarthe vartate . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_24: anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_25: . vapiḥ prakiraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ chedane ca api vartate . keśān vapati iti . īḍiḥ studicodanāyācñāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_26: dṛṣṭaḥ īraṇe ca api vartate . agniḥ vai itaḥ vṛṣṭim īṭṭe . marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_27: . karotiḥ ayam abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe ca api vartate . pṛṣṭham kuru
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_28: . pādau kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca api dṛśyate . kaṭe kuru . ghaṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_29: kuru . aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate . evam tarhi dīrghakutvaprasāraṇaṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_30: adhikasya dvirvacanāt . dīrghatvam dvirvacanādhikasya na sidhyati . cicīṣati . tuṣṭūṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_31: . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_32: san bhavati . tatra ajantānām sani iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_33: dīrghatvam kriyatām dvirvacanam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvam . nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_34: dvirvacanam . kṛte api dīrghatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . dīrghatvam api nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_35: . kṛte api dvirvacane prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityam dīrghatvam . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_36: dvirvacane prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_37: prakṛtipratyayasya ajantatā na asti iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dvirvacanam api
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_38: anityam . anyasya kṛte dīrghatve prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_39: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt dīrghatvam . yat tarhi na akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_40: dvirvacane dīrghatvam tat na sidhyati . juhūṣati iti . kutvam dvirvacanādhikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_41: na sidhyati . jighāṃsati . jaṅghanyate . kim kāraṇam . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5416_42: . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ hantiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_0: tatra abhyāsāt hantihakārasya iti kutvam na sidhyati . samprasāraṇam ca dvirvacanādhikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_1: na sidhyati . juhūṣati. johūyate . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_2: prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ havayatiḥ bhavati . tatra hvaḥ samprasāraṇam abhyastasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_3: iti samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati hi etat hvaḥ abhyastanimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_4: iti . yāvatā ca idānīm hvaḥ abhyastanimittasya iti ucyate saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_5: yat uktam yat tarhi na akṛte dvirvacane dīrghatvam tat na sidhyati iti . ṣatvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_6: dvirvacanādhikasya na sidhyati . pipakṣati . yiyakṣati . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_7: . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ san bhavati . tatra iṇkubhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_8: uttarasya pratyayasakārasya iti ṣatvam na prāpoti . idam iha sampradhāryam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_9: kriyatām ṣatvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ṣatvam . pūrvatrāsiddhe ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_10: siddhāsiddhayoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . ābṛdhyoḥ ca abhyastavidhipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_11: ābṛdhyoḥ ca abhyastāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti . saḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . īpsati . īrtsati
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_12: . īpsan . īrtsan . aipsan . airtsan . kim ca syāt . adbhāvaḥ numpratiṣedhaḥ jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_13: iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktāḥ atra parihārāḥ . saṅāśraye ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_14: samudāyasya samudāyādeśatvāt jhalāśraye ca avyapadeśaḥ āmiśratvāt . saṅāśraye ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_15: kārye samudāyasya samudāyādeśatvāt jhalāśraye ca avyapadeśaḥ . kim kāraṇam . āmiśratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_16: . āmiśrībhūtam idam bhavati . tat yathā . kṣīrodake sampṛkte . āmiśratvāt na jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_17: kiyat kṣīram kiyat udakam iti . kasmin avakāśe kṣīram kasmin avakāśe udakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_18: evam iha api āmiśratvāt na jñāyate kā prakṛtiḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ kasmin avakāśe prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_19: kasmin avakāśe pratyayaḥ iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅi jhali iti kutvādīni na sidhyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_20: . idam iha sampradhāryam dvirvacanam kriyatām kutvādīni iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_21: paratvāt kutvādīni . pūrvatrāsiddhe kutvādīni siddhāsiddhayoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_22: . evam tarhi pūrvatrāsiddhīyam advirvacane iti vaktavyam. tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_23: . vibhāṣitāḥ prayojayanti . drogdhā drogdhā . droḍhā droḍhā . yāvatā ca idānīm pūrvatrāsiddhīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_24: advirvacane iti ucyate saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam ṣatvam na sidhyati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_25: sthāne dvirvacane ṇilopaḥ aparihṛtaḥ . sanyaṅoḥ parataḥ dvirvacane iṭaḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_26: vaktavyam . sanyaṅantasya dvirvacane hanteḥ kutvam aparihṛtam . tatra sanyaṅantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_27: dvirvacanam dviḥprayogaḥ ca iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nirdoṣaḥ . tatra idam aparihṛtam sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_28: iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti . etasya api parihāram vakṣyati ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5417_29: . katham jeghnīyate . vakṣyati etat yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām ghnī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_0: (P_6,1.12.1) KA_III.16.9-23 Ro_IV.317-318 dāśvān iti kim nipātyate . dāśeḥ vasau
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_1: dvitveṭpratiṣedhau . dāśeḥ vasau dvitveṭpratiṣedhau nipātyete . dāśvaṃsaḥ dāśuṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_2: sutam . dāśvān . sāhvān iti kim nipātyate . saheḥ dīrghatvam ca . kim ca . dvitveṭpratiṣedhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_3: ca . sāhvān balāhakaḥ . sāhvān . mīḍhvān iti kim nipātyate . miheḥ ḍhatvam ca . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_4: ca . yat ca pūrvayoḥ . kim ca pūrvayoḥ . dvitveṭpratiṣedhau dīrghatvam ca . mīḍhvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_5: tokaya tanayāya mṛḍaya . yathā iyam indra mīḍhvaḥ . mahyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_6: punaḥ mahyarthaḥ . mahatiḥ dānakarmā . ataḥ kim . itvam api nipātyam . mahyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_7: iti cet miheḥ tadarthatvāt siddham . mahyarthaḥ iti cet mihiḥ api mahyarthe vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_8: . katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_9: iti . asti punaḥ anyatra api kva cit mihiḥ mahyarthe vartate . asti iti āha . miheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5418_10: meghaḥ . meghaḥ ca kasmāt bhavati . apaḥ dadāti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5419_0: (P_6,1.12.2) KA_III.17.1-11 Ro_IV.318-319 dvirvacanaprakaraṇe kṛñādīnām ke . dvirvacanaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5419_1: kṛñādīnām ke upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . cakram . ciklidam . caknam iti . kādiṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5419_2: vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . babhruḥ . yayuḥ iti . caricalipativadīnām aci āk ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5419_3: abhyāsasya . caricalipativadīnām aci dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam āk ca abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5419_4: . carācaraḥ . calācalaḥ . patāpataḥ . vadāvadaḥ . hanteḥ ghaḥ ca . hanteḥ ghaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5419_5: vaktavyaḥ . aci dve bhavataḥ āk ca abhyāsasya . ghanāghanaḥ . pāṭeḥ ṇiluk ca dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5419_6: ca abhyāsasya ūk ca . pāṭayateḥ ṇiluk ca vaktavyaḥ . aci dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5419_7: . dīrghaḥ ca abhyāsasya ūk ca āgamaḥ . pāṭupaṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_2: . dvirvacanasya avakāśaḥ . bibhidatuḥ . bibhiduḥ . yaṇādeśasya avakāśaḥ . dadhi atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_3: . madhu atra . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cakratuḥ . cakruḥ . ayavāyāvādeśānām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_4: . cayanam . cāyakaḥ . lavanam . lāvakaḥ . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_5: . cicāya . cicayitha . lulāva . lulavitha . āllopasya avakāśaḥ . . godaḥ . kambaladaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_6: . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . yayatuḥ . yayuḥ . tasthatuḥ . tasthuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_7: . upadhālopāsya avakāśaḥ . śleṣmaghnam madhu . pittaghnam ghṛtam . dvirvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_8: saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āṭitat . āśiśat . uttvasya avakāśaḥ nipūrtāḥ piṇḍāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_9: . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . mitrātvaruṇau taturiḥ . dūre hyadhvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_10: jaguriḥ . dvirvacanam bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_11: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_14: vipratiṣedhena . dvirvacanasya avakāśaḥ . bibhidatuḥ . bibhiduḥ . samprasāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_15: avakāśaḥ . iṣṭam . suptam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . ījatuḥ . ījuḥ . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_16: . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya kiti iti bhaviṣyati pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5420_17: liṭi abhyāsasya ubhayeṣām iti . idam tarhi soṣupyate . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ījatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_0: ījuḥ iti . nanu ca uktam . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_1: kiti iti bhaviṣyati pūrvasya liṭi abhyāsasya ubhayeṣām iti . na sidhyati . na samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_2: samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . akāreṇa vyavhitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_3: kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_4: vyavadhānam eva . evam tarhi samānāṅgagrahaṇam tatra codayiṣyati . āttvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_5: . glātā . mlātā . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . jagle . mamle .
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_6: dhātvādivikārāṇām avakāśaḥ . namati . siñcati . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_7: prāpnoti . nanāma . siseca . sasnau . rītvasya avakāśaḥ . mātrīyati . pitrīyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_8: dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cekrīyate . jehrīyate . ītvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_9: . pīyate . gīyate . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pepīyate . jegīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_10: . ittvottvayoḥ avakāśaḥ . āstīrṇam . nipūrtāḥ . dvirvacanasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_11: prāpnoti . ātestīryate . nipopūryate . guṇavṛddhyoḥ avakāśaḥ . cetā . gauḥ . dvirvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_12: saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cicāya . cicayitha . lulāva . lulavitha . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_13: asti prayojanam . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_14: bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . iyāya . iyayitha . nanu ca uktam na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_15: prayojanam . astu atra dvirvacanam . dvirvacane kṛte parasya rūpasya guṇavṛddhī bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5421_16: . na sidhyati . antaraṅgatvāt savarṇadīrghatvam prāpnoti . vārṇāt āṅgam balīyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5422_0: vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5422_1: vārṇāt āṅgam balīyaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam abhyāsasya asavarṇe iti asavarṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5422_2: karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi antareṇa guṇavṛddhī asavarṇaparaḥ abhyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5422_3: bhavati . na etat asti jñāpakam . artyartham etat syāt . iyṛtaḥ . iyṛthaḥ . [uvoṇa . uvoṇithaḥ (R)
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_0: ] . yat tarhi dīrghaḥ iṇaḥ kiti iti dīrghatvam śāsti . etasya api asti vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_1: . kim . savarṇadīrghabādhanārtham etat syāt . saḥ yathā eva tarhi savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_2: bādhate evam yaṇādeśam api bādheta . evam tarhi yaṇādeśe yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_3: idam asti iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati . tataḥ eḥ anekācaḥ . eḥ ca anekācaḥ iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_4: . tataḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya . eḥ anekācaḥ iti eva . asavarṇagrahaṇam eva tarhi jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_5: . nanu ca uktam artyartham etat syāt iti . na ekam udāharaṇam asavarṇagrahaṇam prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_6: . evam api sthānivadbhāvāt iyaṅ na prāpnoti . atha sati api vipratiṣedhe yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_7: katham eva etat sidhyati . yaḥ anādiṣṭāt acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhim prati sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_8: . ādiṣṭāt ca eṣaḥ acaḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5424_0: (P_6,1.13.1) KA_III.20.2-22 Ro_IV.323-326 ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇe putrapatyoḥ tadādau
GS24pmbhasuu:5424_1: atiprasaṅgaḥ . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇe putrapatyoḥ tadādau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . putrapatyādau
GS24pmbhasuu:5425_0: kārīṣagandhyāpatikulam . varṇagrahaṇāt siddham . varṇagrahaṇe etat bhavati yasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5425_1: vidhiḥ tadādau iti na ca idam varṇagrahaṇam . varṇagrahaṇe iti cet tadantapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5425_2: . varṇagrahaṇe iti cet tadantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . putrapatyante samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5427_0: kaumudagandhyāparamapatiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yatra hi tadādividhiḥ na asti tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:5427_1: tatra bhavitavyam . siddham tu uttarapadavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . uttarapadavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5427_2: . putrapatyoḥ uttarapadayoḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5427_3: pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti sambandhiśabdau etau . sati pūrvapade uttarapadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5427_4: sati ca uttarapade pūrvapadam iti . na ca atra putrapatī uttarapade . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5428_0: kārīṣagandhīpatiḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadam iti ucyate . na hi atra ṣyaṅ pūrvapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:5428_1: asti . ṣyaṅantam etat pūrvapadam . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5428_2: bhavati . yadi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti ucyate paramakārīṣagandhīputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5429_0: paramakārīṣagandhīpatiḥ iti na sidhyati . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5429_1: bhavati astrīpratyayena iti . yadi astrīpratyayena iti ucyate atikrāntaḥ kārīṣagandhyām atikārīṣagandhyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5431_0: atikārīṣagandhyapatiḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . astrīpratyayena anupasarjanena . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5431_1: hi upasarjanam strīpratyayaḥ bhavati eṣā tatra paribhāṣā pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5432: (P_6,1.13.2) KA_III.20.23-23.25 Ro_IV.326-330 ṣyaṅante yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ teṣām sarveṣām samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . vārāhiputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5433_0: tārṇakarṇīputraḥ . tatra apratyayasthasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathāgṛhītasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5433_1: ādeśavacanāt apratyayasthe siddham . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam apratyayasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5433_2: na bhaviṣyati . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya vā . atha vā anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5433_3: kāryam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:5433_4: kriyeta apratyayasthasya vā pratiṣedhaḥ ucyeta . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5433_5: bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . kāni . prayojanam na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5433_6: . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . katham vyadheḥ viddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5433_7: iti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5433_8: asti prayojanam . kriyate nyāse eva . sāntamahataḥ dīrghatve . sāntamahataḥ dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5434_0: yaśāṃsi . pa iti asya api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5434_1: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . nopadhāyāḥ iti tatra vartate . evam api anāṃsi,
GS24pmbhasuu:5435: manāṃsi iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sāntasaṃyogena nopadhām viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sāntasaṃyogasya nopādhāyāḥ iti . evam api haṃsaśirāṃsi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5436_0: dhvaṃsaśirāṃsai iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . hammateḥ haṃsaḥ . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5436_1: āha hammateḥ haṃsaḥ iti . kim tarhi hanteḥ haṃsaḥ . hanti adhvānam iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5436_2: sarvanāmasthāne iti vartate . sarvanāmasthānaparatayā sāntasaṃyogam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5436_3: . sarvanāmasthānaparasya sāntasaṃyogasya nopādhāyāḥ iti . ankārāntasya allope . ankārāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5437_0: takṣṇe iti . ta iti atra api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5437_1: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . anā akāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5437_2: anaḥ yaḥ akāraḥ iti . evam api anasā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5438: anase iti atra api prāpnoti . ankāreṇa aṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . ankārāntasya aṅgasya anaḥ yaḥ akāraḥ iti . evam api anastakṣṇā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_0: anastakṣṇe iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_1: kāryam tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . bhasya iti upasthitam idam bhavati yaci bham
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_2: iti . tatra yajādiparatyā ankāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ anā akāram . yajādiparasya anaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_3: yaḥ akāraḥ iti . mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau . mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau prayojanam . nyamārṭ . aṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_4: api vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_5: . etat api na asti prayojanam . yathāparibhāṣitam ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī iti ikaḥ eva vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_6: bhaviṣyati . evam api mimārjiṣati iti atra prāpnoti . astu . abhyāsanirhrāsena hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_7: bhaviṣyati . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe ca . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe ca prayojanam . viduṣaḥ paśya
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_8: . vidivakārasya api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:5439_9: doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5440: vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . evam tarhi nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti na bhaviṣyati . yuvādīnām ca . yuvādīnām ca samprasāraṇe prayojanam . yūnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5442_0: yūne . yakārasya api prāpnoti . anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:5442_1: doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:5442_2: bhaviṣyati . ukāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5442_3: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5442_4: tarhi samānāṅgagrahaṇam atra codayiṣyati . rvoḥ upadhāgrahaṇam ca . rvoḥ upadhāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5442_5: ca na kartavyam bhavati . iha kasmāt na bhavati . abibhaḥ bhavān . anantyavikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:5442_6: antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5443: ādityadādividhisaṃyogādilopakutvaḍhatvabhaṣbhāvaṣatvaṇatveṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . ādividhau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . dhātvādeḥ ṣaḥ saḥ . ṇaḥ naḥ . iha eva syāt . netā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5445: siñcati . ādi . tyadādividhi . iha eva syāt . tat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_0: syaḥ iti atra na syāt . tyadādividhi . saṃyogādilopa . iha eva syāt . maṅktā . maṅktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_1: iti atra na syāt . saṃyogādilopa . kutva . iha eva syāt . paktā . paktavyambhaṣbhāva
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_2: . iti atra na syāt . kutva . ḍhatva . iha eva syāt . leḍhā . leḍhavyam iti atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_3: syāt . ḍhatva . bhaṣbhāva . iha eva syāt . abhutsi . abhutsātām iti atra na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_4: . bhaṣbhāva . ṣatva . iha eva syāt . draṣṭā . draṣṭavyam iti atra na syāt . ṣatva
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_5: . ṇatva . iha eva syāt . māṣāvāpeṇa . māṣāvāpāṇām iti atra na syāt . ṇatva . ete
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_6: doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā . na hi doṣā santi
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_7: iti paribhāṣā na kartavyā lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_8: na adhiśrīyante na ca mṛgāḥ santi iti yavāḥ na upyante . doṣāḥ khalu api sākalyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_9: parigaṇitāḥ prayojanānām udāharaṇamātram . kuta etat . na hi doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_10: . tasmāt yāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā pratividheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_11: ca doṣeṣu . idam pratividhīyate . udāttanirdeśāt siddham . yatra eṣā paribhāṣā iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_12: tatra udāttanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_13: bhavati udāttanirdeśe iti . saḥ tarhi udāttanirdeśḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_14: eva antyasadeśaḥ ca anantyasadeśaḥ ca yugapat samavasthitau tatra eṣā paribhāṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_15: . doṣeṣu ca anyatra antyasadeśaḥ anyatra anantyasadeśaḥ . prayojaneṣu punaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_16: eva antyasadeśaḥ ca anantyasadeśaḥ ca . tathājātīyakāni khalu api ācāryeṇa prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_17: paṭhitāni yāni ubhayavanti . idam ekam yathā doṣaḥ tathā rvoḥ upadhāgrahaṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5447_18: . tat ca api kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5448: (P_6,1.14) KA_III.24.2-5 Ro_IV.331 mātac . kārīṣagandhyā mātā asya kārīṣagandhīmātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_0: (P_6,1.16) KA_III.24.8-25.5 Ro_IV.331-333 vayigrahaṇam kimartham na veñ yajādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_1: paṭhyate veñaḥ ca vayiḥ ādeśaḥ kriyate tatra yajādīnām kiti iti eva siddham . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_2: etat syāt . ṅidarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ iti . tat ca na . liṭi ayam ādeśaḥ liṭ ca kit
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_3: eva . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . vayigrahaṇam veñaḥ pratiṣedhāt . vayigrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_4: veñaḥ pratiṣedhāt . veñaḥ liṭi pratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ vayeḥ mā bhūt iti . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_5: eva hi veñgrahaṇāt vidhiḥ prārthyate evam pratiṣedhaḥ api prāpnoti . na vā yakārapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_6: jñāpakaḥ apratiṣedhasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yat ayam liṭi vayaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_7: iti vayeḥ yakārasya samprasāraṇapratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpati ācāryaḥ na veñgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_8: samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . piti abhyāsārtham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_9: syāt . vayeḥ pitsu vacaneṣu abhyāsasya yakārasya samprasāraṇam mā bhūt iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_10: ca veñgrahaṇāt vayeḥ pitsu api vacaneṣu abhyāsayakārasya samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_11: siddhaḥ . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . kiti iti tatra anuvartate . evam api vayeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_12: pitsu api vacaneṣu abhyāsayakārasya samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . halādiśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_13: bādhyate . na atra halādiśeṣaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . vakṣyati hi etat abhyāsasamprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_14: halādiśeṣāt vipratiṣedhena iti . saḥ eṣaḥ vayeḥ yakārasya samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_15: piti abhyāsārthaḥ na jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati . piti abhyāsārtham iti cet na aviśiṣṭatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_16: . piti abhyāsārtham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . aviśiṣṭatvāt . aviśeṣeṇa pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_17: . nivṛttam tatra kiti iti . ātaḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa . veñaḥ api hi pitsu vacaneṣu abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_18: samprasāraṇam na iṣyate . vavau vavitha iti . vikṛtigrahaṇam khalu api pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_19: kriyate na ca vikṛtiḥ prakṛtim gṛhṇāti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5453_1: yat ucyate vṛśceḥ aviśeṣaḥ iti tat na . yadi atra rephasya samprasāraṇam na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5453_2: vakārasya prasajyeta . rephasya punaḥ samprasāraṇe sati uḥ adattvasya sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5453_3: na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . tasmāt vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5454_0: (P_6,1.17.2) KA_III.25.11-22 Ro_IV. 333-334 atha ubhayagrahaṇam kimartham . ubhayeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:5454_1: abhyāsasya samprasāraṇam yathā syāt vacisvapiyajādīnām grahādīnām ca . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5454_2: prayojanam . prakṛtam ubhayeṣām grahaṇam anuvartate . yadi anuvartate grahijyāvayivyadhivaṣṭivicativṛścatipṛcchatibhṛjjatīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5454_3: ṅiti ca iti yajādīnām ṅiti api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5454_4: . vacisvapiyajādīnām kiti . grahādīnām ṅiti ca vacisvapiyajādīnām kiti . tataḥ liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:5454_5: abhyāsasya ubhayeṣām . kiti ṅiti iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5454_6: . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5454_7: kariṣyate . vacisvapiyajādīnām kiti grahādīnām ṅiti ca iti . tataḥ liṭi abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5454_8: iti . na ca ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam . tat apekṣiṣyāmahe

GS24pmbhasuu:5500_1: syāt pībhāvavacanam anarthakam syāt . samprasāraṇe kṛte samprasāraṇaparapūrvatve

GS24pmbhasuu:5501_0: āpīnam ūdhaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_1: . tataḥ ayam pyāyaḥ pībhāvam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . siddhe hi vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_2: jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati na ca pyāyaḥ samprasāraṇena sidhyati . samprasāraṇe hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_3: antyasya prasajyeta . evam api jñāpakam eva . katham . pyāyaḥ iti na eṣā sthānaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_4: . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī . pyāyaḥ yaḥ yaṇ iti . tat etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_5: sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti yat ayam pyāyaḥ pībhāvam śāsti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_6: anaikāntikam etat . etāvat jñāpyate na sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_7: tatra kutaḥ etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti . ucyamāne api etasmin kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_8: etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti . ekayogakṣaṇam khalu api samprasāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_9: tat yadi tāvat param abhinirvṛttam pūrvam api abhinirvṛttam eva . prasaktasya anabhinirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_10: pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum na abhinirvṛttasya . yaḥ hi bhuktavantam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_11: mā bhukthāḥ iti kim tena kṛtam syāt . atha api pūrvam anabhinirvṛttam param api anabhinirvṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_12: eva . tatra nimittasaṃśrayaḥ anupapannaḥ na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_13: doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate ucyamāne api etasmin kutaḥ etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_14: iti . iha iṅgitena ceṣṭitena nimiṣitena mahatā vā sūtraprabandhena ācāryāṇām abhiprāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_15: gamyate . etat eva jñāpayati parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti yat ayam na samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_16: samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedham śāsti . yat api ucyate ekayogalakṣaṇam khalu api samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_17: . tat yadi tāvat param abhinirvṛttam pūrvam api abhinirvṛttam eva . prasaktasya anabhinirvṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_18: pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum iti . astu ubhayoḥ abhinirvṛttiḥ . na vayam pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_19: pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . samprasāraṇāśrayam yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_20: . tataḥ pūrvatve pratiṣiddhe yaṇādeśena siddham . yat api ucyate atha api pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_21: anabhinirvṛttam param api anabhinirvṛttam eva . tatra nimittasaṃśrayaḥ anupapannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_22: iti . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā indrārthā sthūṇā indraḥ iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_23: iha api samprasāraṇārtham samprasāraṇam . tat yat prasāraṇārtham prasāraṇam tasmin

GS24pmbhasuu:5504_0: etat prayojanam . videśastham api yat samprasāraṇam tasya api pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5504_1: . vyathaḥ liṭi . vivyathe . na etat asti prayojanam . halādiśeṣāpavādaḥ atra samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_0: yūne . ucyamāne api etasmin na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ukāreṇa vyavadhānāt . ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_1: kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_2: vyavadhānam eva . evam tarhi samānāṅgagrahaṇam ca . samānāṅgagrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_3: . na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam samānāṅge iti vaktavyam . tatra upoṣuṣi doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_4: upoṣuṣi doṣaḥ bhavati . na vā yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ tasmin prāptipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_5: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ tasmin dvitīyā yā
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_6: prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . atra ca vasiḥ kvasau aṅgam kvasantam punaḥ vibhaktau .
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_7: atha vā yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ iti anena kim kriyate . yāvat brūyāt prasaktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_8: anabhinirvṛttasya pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum iti . atra ca yadā vaseḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_9: tadā kvasoḥ yadā ca kvasoḥ abhinirvṛttam tadā vaseḥ bhavati . atha vā yasya aṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_10: prasāraṇaprāptiḥ iti anena kim kriyate . yāvat brūyāt asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:5505_11: iti . asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya vasausamprasāraṇasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5506_0: (P_6,1.37.3) KA_III.33.9-17 Ro_IV.349-350 ṛci treḥ uttarapadādilopaḥ chandasi . ṛci
GS24pmbhasuu:5506_1: treḥ samprasāraṇam vaktavyam . uttarapadādilopaḥ chandasi vaktavyaḥ . tṛcam sūktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5506_2: . tṛcam sāma . chandasi iti kim . tryṛcāni . rayeḥ matau bahulam . rayeḥ matau samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5506_3: bahulam vaktavyam . ā revān etu naḥ viśaḥ . na ca bhavati . rayiman puṣṭivardhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5506_4: . kakṣyāyāḥ sañjñāyām . kakṣyāyāḥ sañjñāyām matau samprasāraṇam vaktavyam . kakṣīvantam
GS24pmbhasuu:5506_5: yaḥ āśijaḥ . kaṇvaḥ kakṣīvān . sañjñāyām iti kim . kaṣyāvān hastī .
GS24pmbhasuu:5507_0: (P_6,1.39) KA_III.33.19-34.2 Ro_IV.350 vaścāsyagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5507_1: kiti veñaḥ na samprasāraṇam bhavati iti eva siddham . katham . samprasāraṇe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5507_2: uvaṅādeśe ca dvirvacanam savarṇadīrghatvam . tena siddham vavatuḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5510: ūvuḥ . vayeḥ api nityam yakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ samprasāraṇasya ūyatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5511: ūyuḥ . traiśabyam ca iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati . yadi evam vavau,
GS24pmbhasuu:5512: vavitha iti na sidhyati . lyapi ca iti anena cakāreṇa liṭ api anukṛṣyate . tasmin nitye prasāraṇapratiṣedhe prāpte iyam kiti vibhāṣā ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5514: ec yaḥ upadeśe iti āhosvit ejantantam yat upadeśe iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5515: ec yaḥ upadeśe iti ḍhaukitā traukitā iti atra api prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:5516_0: ejantantam yat upadeśe iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . nanu ca ejantantam yat upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5516_1: api vijñāyamāne atra api prāpnoti . etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena ejantam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5516_2: upadeśe . arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ . nanu ca ec yaḥ upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5516_3: na doṣaḥ bhavati . aśiti iti ucyate na ca atra aśitam paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca kakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5516_4: eva atra aśit . na kakāre bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5516_5: . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5516_6: . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:5517_0: abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5517_1: . evam iha api aśiti iti śitpratiṣedhāt anyasmin aśiti śitsadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5517_2: . kim ca anyat śitsadṛśam . pratyayaḥ . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:5522_0: paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . nanu ca ejantantam yat upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5522_1: paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . santu . āyādiṣu kṛteṣu sthānivadbhāvāt ejgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5522_2: grahaṇāt punaḥ āttvam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ec yaḥ upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5522_3: āyādiṣu kṛteṣu sthānivadbhāvāt ejgrahaṇena grahaṇāt āttvam bhaviṣyati . na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5522_4: . analvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ alvidhiḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi ejantantam yat upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5523: hūtavān iti atra api prāpnoti . bhavatu eva atra āttvam . śravaṇam kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvatvam asya bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_0: āttvam kriyatām pūrvatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt pūrvatvam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_1: idam iha sampradhāryam . āttvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_2: paratvāt āttvam . nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api āttve prāpnoti akṛte api . āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_3: api nityam . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam āttvam . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_4: samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . tena bādhyate . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_5: lakṣaṇantareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva āttvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_6: nimittam hanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_7: āttve kṛte samprasāraṇam samprasāraṇapūrvatvam . kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ āttvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_8: . atha api katham cit āttvam anityam syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . upadeśagrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_9: kariṣyate . yadi na kriyate cetā stotā iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_10: jñāpayati na paranimittakasya āttvam bhavati iti yat ayam krīṅjīṇām ṇau āttvam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_11: . na etat asti jñāpakam . niyamārtham etat syāt . krīṅjīṇām ṇau eva iti . yat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5524_12: mīnātiminotidīṅām lyapi ca iti atra ejgrahaṇam anuvartayati . iha tarhi glai glānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5527_0: śo niśāmīyam paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:5527_1: āyādayaḥ āttvam bādhante iti yat ayam aśiti iti pratiṣedham śāsti . yadi hi bādheran
GS24pmbhasuu:5527_2: śiti api bādheran . atha vā punaḥ astu ec yaḥ upadeśe iti . nanu ca uktam glai glānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5530_0: śo niśāmīyam paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti iti . atra api śitpratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5530_1: na āyādayaḥ āttvam bādhante iti . āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam . āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5530_2: kartavyam . jagle mamle . aśiti iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5531_0: . śakāraḥ it yasya saḥ ayam śit . na śit aśit . aśiti iti . katham tarhi . śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5531_1: it śit . na śit śit aśit . aśiti iti . yadi evam stanandhayaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5532: (P_6,1.45.2) KA_III.35.20-37.5 Ro_IV.355-358 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5533: yat anyat śitaḥ iti āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5534: śiti na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5535_0: glāyanti mlayanti . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . śidaśitoḥ ekādeśaḥ ādivat syāt . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5535_1: anyat śitaḥ iti kṛtvā āttvam prāpnoti . pratyayavidhiḥ . pratyayavidhiḥ ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5535_2: . suglaḥ sumlaḥ . ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ na prāpnoti . aniṣṭasya pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5535_3: śravaṇam prasajyeta . abhyāsarūpam ca . abhyāsarūpam ca na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5536: jagle mamle . ivarṇābhyāsatā prāpnoti . ayavāyāvām pratiṣedhaḥ ca . ayavāyāvām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_0: paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . astu tarhi prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ śiti na iti . śiti
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_1: pratiṣedhe ślulukoḥ upasaṅkhyānam rarīdhvam trādhvam śiśīte . śiti pratiṣedhe ślulukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_2: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . divaḥ naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam . luk . trādhvam naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_3: devā nijuraḥ vṛkasya . śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat divaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_4: naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam iti . na etat rai iti asya rūpam . kasya tarhi . rāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_5: dānakarmaṇaḥ . śiśīte śṛṅge iti na etat śyateḥ rūpam . kasya tarhi . śīṅaḥ . śyatyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_6: vai gamyate . kaḥ punaḥ śyateḥ arthaḥ . śyatiḥ niśāne vartate . śīṅ api śyatyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_7: vartate . katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_8: bhavanti iti . tat yathā . vapiḥ prakiraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ chedane ca api vartate . keśān
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_9: vapati iti . īḍiḥ studicodanāyācñāsu dṛṣṭaḥ īraṇe ca api vartate . agniḥ vai itaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_10: vṛṣṭim īṭṭe . marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti . karotiḥ ayam abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_11: ca api vartate . pṛṣṭham kuru . pādau kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_12: api dṛśyate . kaṭe kuru . ghaṭe kuru . aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_13: sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ . śiti iti ucyate na ca atra śitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_14: . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . trādhvam iti luṅi eṣaḥ vyatyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_15: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ . nanu ca uktam aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_16: ādivattvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_17: vyavadhānam . yat api pratyayavidhiḥ iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ejantebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5541_18: ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ iti yat ayam hvāvāmaḥ ca iti aṇam kabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5542: pratyākhyāyate saḥ yogaḥ . atha api kriyate evam api na doṣaḥ . katham . liṭi iti anuvartate . dvilakārakaḥ ca ayam nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5543_0: liṭi lakārādau iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5543_1: iti . yat api uktam ayavāyāvām pratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . śiti pratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5544: (P_6,1.45.3) KA_III.37.6-16 Ro_IV.358-359 prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ . prātipadikānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . gobhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5547_0: naubhiḥ . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na prātipadikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5547_1: āttvam bhavati iti yat ayam rāyaḥ halaḥ iti āttvam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5547_2: . niyamārtham etat syāt . rāyaḥ hali eva iti . yat tarhi ā otaḥ amśasoḥ iti āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5547_3: śāsti . etasya api asti vacane prayojanam . ami vṛddhibādhanārtham etat syāt śasi
GS24pmbhasuu:5547_4: pratiṣedhārtham ca . tasmāt prātipadikānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5547_5: dhātvadhikārāt prātipadikasyāprāptiḥ . dhātvadhikārāt prātipadikasya āttvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5547_6: . dhātoḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . liṭi dhātoḥ anabhyāsasya iti . atha api nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:5547_7: evam api adoṣaḥ . upadeśe iti ucyate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5548_0: (P_6,1.48) KA_III.37.18-22 Ro_IV.359 āttve ṇau līyateḥ upasaṅkhyānam pralambhanaśālīnīkaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5548_1: . āttve ṇau līyateḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . pralambhane ca arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5548_2: śālīnīkaraṇe ca nityam āttvam yathā syāt . pralambhane tāvat . jaṭābhiḥ ālāpayate
GS24pmbhasuu:5548_3: . śmaśrubhiḥ ālāpayate . śālīnīkaraṇe . śyenaḥ vārtikam ullāpayate . rathī rathinam upalapayate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5549_0: (P_6,1.49) KA_III.38.2-8 Ro_IV.360-361 sidhyateḥ ajñānārthasya . sidhyateḥ ajñānārthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5549_1: iti vaktavyam . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . apāralaukike iti ucyamāne aniṣṭam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5549_2: . annam sādhayati brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dāsyāmi iti . asti punaḥ ayam sidhyatiḥ kva cit anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5549_3: vartate . asti iti āha . tapaḥ tāpasam sedhayati . jñānam asya prakāśayati . svāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5549_4: eva enam karmāṇi sedhayanti . jñānam asya prakāśayanti iti arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_0: (P_6,1.50.1) KA_III.38.10-39.12 Ro_IV.361-363 mīnātyādīnām āttve upadeśavacanam pratyayavidhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_1: . mīnātyādīnām āttve upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām āttvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_2: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pratyayavidhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām āttve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_3: iṣṭaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ yathā syāt . ke punaḥ pratyayāḥ upadeśivadbhāvam prayojayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_4: . kāḥ . kāḥ tāvat na prayojayanti . kim kāraṇam . ecaḥ iti ucyate na ca keṣu ec asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_5: . ṇaghañyujvidhayaḥ tarhi prayojayanti . ṇa . avadāyaḥ . ātaḥ iti ṇaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_6: . ghañ . avadāyaḥ vartate . ātaḥ iti ghañ siddhaḥ bhavati . kim ca bho ātaḥ iti bhañ
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_7: ucyate . na khalu api ātaḥ iti ucyate ātaḥ tu vijñāyate . katham . aviśeṣeṇa ghañ
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_8: utsargaḥ . tasya ivarṇāntāt uvarṇāntāt ca ajapau apavādau . tatra upadeśāvasthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_9: āttve kṛte apavādasya nimittam na asti iti kṛtvā utsargeṇa ghañ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_10: evam ca kṛtvā na ca ātaḥ iti ucyate ātaḥ tu vijñāyate . yuc . īṣadavadānam svavadānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_11: . ātaḥ iti yuc siddhaḥ bhavati . idam vipratiṣiddham ecaḥ upadeśaḥ iti . yadi ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_12: na upadeśe atha upadeśe na ecaḥ . ecaḥ ca upadeśe ca iti vipratiṣiddham . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_13: vipratiṣiddham . āha ayam ecaḥ upadeśe iti . yadi ecaḥ na upadeśe atha upadeśa na
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_14: ecaḥ . te vayam viṣayam vijñāsyāmaḥ . ejviṣaye iti . tat tarhi upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_15: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . āt ecaḥ upadeśe iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_16: prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam viṣayaviśeṣaṇena ca iha arthaḥ . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_17: bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_18: sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_19: iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati ṭat yathā . śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_20: tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate ca śālayaḥ ca bhāvyante . yat api ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_21: khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt
