GS24pmbhasuu:5568_0: (P_6,1.61) KA_III.40.17-41.16 Ro_IV.366-368 ye ca taddhite śirasaḥ ādeśārtham . ye
GS24pmbhasuu:5568_1: ca taddhite iti atra śirasaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam .ādeśārtham . ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5568_2: yathā vijñāyeta . prakṛtyantaram mā vijñāyi . kim ca syāt . yakārādau taddhite askārāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5568_3: śravaṇam prasajyeta . śīrṣaṇyaḥ hi mukhyaḥ bhavati . śīrṣaṇyaḥ kharaḥ . vā keśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5568_4: . vā keśeṣu śirasaḥ śīrṣanbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śīrṣaṇyāḥ keśāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5569: śirasyāḥ . aci śīrṣaḥ . aci parataḥ śirasaḥ śīrṣabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hāstiśīrṣiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_0: pailuśīrṣiḥ . chandasi ca . chandasi ca śirasaḥ śīrṣabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dve śīrṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_1: . iha hāstiśīrṣyā pailuśīrṣyā iti śirasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣanbhāvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_2: . astu . naḥ taddhite iti ṭilopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ye ca abhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_3: iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . yadi punaḥ ye aci taddhite iti ucyeta . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_4: bhavati . iñi śīrṣanbhāve kṛte ṭilopena siddham . na evam śakyam . iha hi sthūlaśirasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_5: idam sthaulaśīrṣam iti anaṇi iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_6: . na cet evam śirasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣanbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . pākṣikaḥ eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_7: . katarasmin pakṣe . ṣyaṅvidhau dvaitam bhavati . aṇiñoḥ vā ādeśaḥ ṣyaṅ aṇiñbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_8: vā paraḥ iti . tat yadā tāvad aṇiñoḥ ādeśaḥ tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadā hi aṇiñbhyām paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5571_9: na tadā doṣaḥ bhavati aṇiñbhyām vyavahitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5572_0: (P_6,1.63) KA_III.41.19-42.6 Ro_IV.368-369 śasprabhṛtiṣu iti ucyate . aśasprabhṛtiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5572_1: api dṛśyate . śalā doṣaṇī . kakut doṣaṇī . yācate mahādevaḥ . padādiṣu māṃspṛtsnūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5572_2: upasaṅkhyānam . padādiṣu māṃspṛtsnūnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . māṃs . yat nīkṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5572_3: māṃspacanyāḥ . māṃsapacanyāḥ iti prāpte . māṃs . pṛt. pṛtsu martyam . pṛtanāsu martyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5572_4: iti prāpte . pṛt . snu . na te divaḥ na pṛthivyaḥ adhi snuṣu . adhi sānuṣu iti prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:5572_5: . nas nāsikāyāḥ yattaskṣudreṣu . yattaskṣudreṣu parataḥ nāsikāyāḥ nasbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5572_6: . yat . nasyam . yat . tas . nastaḥ . tas. kṣudra . naḥkṣudraḥ . avarṇanagarayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5572_7: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . nāsikyaḥ varṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5573: nāsikyam nagaram . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat nāsikyaḥ varṇaḥ iti . parimukhādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . nāsikyam nagaram iti . saṅkāśādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5574: (P_6,1.64) KA_III.42.8-43.10 Ro_IV.369-371 dhātugrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt : ṣoḍan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5576: ṣoḍikaḥ . atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5577: peṣṭā peṣṭum . na etat asti prayojanam . astu atra satvam . satve kṛte iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya iti ṣatvam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:5578: laṣitā laṣitum . idam ca api udārharaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:5579_0: peṣṭā peṣṭum . nanu ca uktam astu atra satvam . satve kṛte iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5579_1: iti ṣatvam bhaviṣyati iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi pekṣyati iti ṣatvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5579_2: ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si iti katvam na syāt . sādeśe subdhātuṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatīnām pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5582: ṣvaṣkate . subdhātūnām tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ . yadi evam na arthaḥ dhātugrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati ṣoḍan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_0: ṣoḍikaḥ iti . upadeśe iti vartate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ . ṣṭhiveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_1: api dvitīyaḥ varṇaḥ ṭhakāraḥ . yadi ṭhakāraḥ teṣṭhīvyate iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_2: thakāraḥ . yadi thakāraḥ ṭuṣṭhyūṣati ṭeṣṭhīvyatie iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_3: imau ṣṭhivū . akasya dvitīyaḥ varṇaḥ ṭhakāraḥ aparasya thakāraḥ . yasya thakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_4: tasya satvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi dvau imau dviṣakārau ṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatī . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_5: bhavati . pūrvasya satve kṛte pareṇa sannipāte ṣṭutvam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_6: . iha hi śvaliṭ ṣṭhīvati madhuliṭ ṣvaṣkate ṣṭutvasya asiddhatvāt ḍaḥ si dhuṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_7: dhuṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi yakārādī dviṣakārau ṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatī . kim yakāraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_8: śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ . atha kimartham ṣakāram upadiśya tasya sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_9: ādeśaḥ kriyate na sakāraḥ eva upadiśyeta . laghvartham iti āha . katham . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_10: ayam ṣakāram upadiśya sakāram ādeśam uktvā laghunā upāyena ṣatvam nirvartayati ādeśapratyayayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_11: iti . itarathā hi yeṣām ṣatvam iṣyate teṣām tatra grahaṇam kartavyam syāt . ke punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_12: ṣopadeśāḥ dhātavaḥ . paṭhitavyāḥ . kaḥ atra bhavataḥ puruṣakāraḥ . yadi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_13: pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum tat ucyatām . antareṇa api pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:5584_14: . katham . ajdantyaparāḥ sādayaḥ ṣopadeśāḥ smiṅsvadisvidisvañjisvapayaḥ ca sṛpisṛjistṛstyāsekṛsṛvarjam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5585_0: (P_6,1.65) KA_III.43.12-18 Ro_IV.372 atha kimartham ṇakāram upadiśya tasya nakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5585_1: ādeśaḥ kriyate na nakāraḥ eva upadiśyeta . laghvartham iti āha . katham . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5585_2: ayam ṇakāram upadiśya nakāram ādeśam uktvā laghunā upāyena ṇatvam nirvartayati upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5585_3: asamāse api ṇopadeśasya iti . itarathā hi yeṣām ṇatvam iṣyate teṣām tatra grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5585_4: kartavyam syāt . ke punaḥ ṇopadeśāḥ dhātavaḥ . paṭhitavyāḥ . kaḥ atra bhavataḥ puruṣakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5585_5: . yadi antareṇa pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum tat ucyatām . antareṇa api pāṭham kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5585_6: cit śakyate vaktum . katham . sarve nādayaḥ ṇopadeśāḥ nṛtinandinardinakkināṭināthṛnādhṛnṝvarjam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_0: (P_6,1.66.1) KA_III.43.20-44.7 Ro_IV.372-374 vyoḥ lope kvau upasaṅkhyānam . vyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_1: lope kvau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iha api yathā syāt . kaṇḍūyateḥ apratyayaḥ kaṇḍūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_2: iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . vali iti ucyate na ca atra valādim paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_3: . nanu ca ayam kvip eva valādiḥ bhavati . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_4: . idam iha sampradhāryam . kviblopaḥ kriyatām yalopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_5: paratvāt kviblopaḥ nityatvāt ca . nityaḥ khalu api kviblopaḥ . kṛte api yalope prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_6: akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt paratvāt ca kviblopaḥ . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_7: yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_8: pratyayalakṣaṇam . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_9: idam api bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali . tataḥ veḥ . vyantayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_10: ca vyoḥ lopaḥ bhavati . tataḥ apṛktasya . apṛktasya ca lopaḥ bhavati . veḥ iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5587: (P_6,1.66.2) KA_III.44.8-45.2 Ro_IV.374-375 valopāprasiddhiḥ ūḍbhāvavacanāt . valopasya aprasiddhiḥ . āsremāṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5588_0: jīradānuḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . ūḍbhāvavacanāt . cchvoḥ śūṭ anunāsike ca iti ūṭh prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5588_1: . atiprasaṅgaḥ vraścādiṣu . vraścādiṣu ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . vraścanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5590_0: vraṇaḥ iti . upadeśasāmarthyāt siddham . upadeśasāmarthyāt vraścādiṣu lopaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5590_1: . upadeśasāmarthyāt siddham iti cet samprasāraṇahalādiśeṣeṣu sāmarthyam . upadeśasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5590_2: siddham iti cet asti anyat upadeśavacane prayojanam . samprasāraṇahalādiśeṣeṣu kṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5592_0: vivraściṣati iti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5592_2: lopaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . anārambhaḥ vā . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ valopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5593: jīradānuḥ iti . āsremāṇam jīradānuḥ iti varṇalopāt . āsremāṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5594: jīradānuḥ iti chāndasāt varṇalopāt siddham . yathā saṃsphānaḥ gayasphānaḥ . tat yathā saṃsphayanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5598: (P_6,1.67) KA_III.45.4-20 Ro_IV.375-376 darvijāgṛvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : darviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_0: jāgṛviḥ . kim ucyate darvijāgṛvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti yadā apṛktasya iti ucyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_1: . bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kriyamāṇam api codayanti . tat vā kartavyam darvijāgṛvyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_2: vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .veḥ lope darvijāgṛvyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ anunāsikaparatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_3: veḥ lope darvijāgṛvyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_4: kasmāt na bhavati . anunāsikaparatvāt . anunāsikaparasya viśabdasya grahaṇam na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5599_5: atra anunāsikaparaḥ viśabdaḥ . śuddhaparaḥ ca atra viśabdaḥ . yadi anunāsikaparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5601: atra na prāpnoti . na hi etasmāt viśabdāt anunāsikam param paśyāmaḥ . anunāsikaparatvāt iti na evam vijñāyate . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ asmāt saḥ ayam anunāsikaparaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5602: anunāsikaparatvāt iti . katham tarhi . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ asmin saḥ ayam anunāsikaparaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5604_0: atra prāpnoti . asiddhaḥ atra anunāsikaḥ . evam api dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5604_1: . ivi divi dhivi . dhātvantasya ca arthavadgrahaṇāt . arthavataḥ viśabdasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5604_2: . na dhātvantaḥ arthavān . vasya vā anunāsikatvāt siddham . atha vā vakārasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5604_3: idam anunāsikasya grahaṇam . santi hi yaṇaḥ sānunāsikāḥ niranunāsikāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:5605_0: (P_6,1.68) KA_III.46.2-47.12 Ro_IV.377-380 yadi punaḥ ayam apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5605_1: vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . dvihalapṛktagrahaṇam tisyoḥ ca grahaṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5605_2: bhavati . halantāt apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ cet nalopābhāvaḥ yathā pacan iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5605_3: halantāt apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ cet nalopābhāvaḥ . rājā takṣā . saṃyogāntalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5605_4: asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ na prāpnoti yathā pacan iti . tat yathā pacan,
GS24pmbhasuu:5606_0: yajan iti atra saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ na bhavati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5606_1: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddhaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ nalope iti yat ayam na ṅisambuddhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5606_2: iti sambuddhau pratiṣedham śāsti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti pacan,
GS24pmbhasuu:5607: yajan . tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam bhavati . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yaḥ sambuddhau anantaraḥ . vasvādiṣu datvam saṃyogādilopabalīyastvāt . vasvādiṣu datvam na sidhyati . ukhāsrat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5608: parṇadvhat . kim kāraṇam . saṃyogādilopabalīyastvāt . saṃyogāntalopāt saṃyogādilopaḥ balīyān . yathā kūṭataṭ iti . tat yathā kūṭataṭ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_0: kāṣṭhataṭ iti atra saṃyogāntalopāt saṃyogādilopaḥ balīyān bhavati . nanu ca datve
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_1: kṛte na bhaviṣyati . asiddham datvam . tasya asiddhatvāt prāpnoti . siddhakāṇḍe paṭhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_2: vasvādiṣu datvam sau dīrghatve iti . tatra sau dīrghatvagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . vasvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_3: datvam iti eva . evam api apadāntatvāt na prāpnoti . atha sau api padam bhavati rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_4: takṣā nalope kṛte vibhakteḥ śravaṇam prāpnoti . sā eṣā ubhayataspāśā rajjuḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_5: . rāttalopaḥ niyamavacanāt . rāt tasya lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . abibhaḥ bhavān . ajāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_6: bhavān . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . niyamavacanāt . rāt sasya iti etasmāt niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_7: na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . rāt sasya iti atra takāraḥ api nirdiśyate . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_8: kīrtayateḥ apratyayaḥ kīḥ iti prāpnoti . kīrt iti ca iṣyate . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_9: . roḥ uttvam ca . roḥ uttvam ca vaktavyam . abhinaḥ atra,
GS24pmbhasuu:5610_0: acchinaḥ atra . saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvāt ataḥ ati iti uttrvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5610_1: na vā saṃyogāntalopasya uttve siddhatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . saṃyogāntalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5610_2: uttve siddhatvāt . saṃyogāntalopaḥ uttve siddhaḥ bhavati . yathā harivaḥ medinam
GS24pmbhasuu:5610_3: iti . tat yathā harivaḥ medinam tvā iti atra saṃyogāntalopaḥ uttve siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5610_4: . saḥ eva darhi doṣaḥ sā eṣā ubhayataspāśā . tasmāt aśakyaḥ apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5610_5: vijñātum . na cet vijñāyate dvihalapṛktagrahaṇam tisyoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5611: (P_6,1.69.1) KA_III.47.14-48.27 Ro_IV.380-383 sambuddhilope ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . sambuddhilope ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . he katarat,
GS24pmbhasuu:5612_0: he katamat . kim ucyate ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti yadā apṛktasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5612_1: anuvartate . apṛktādhikārasya nivṛttatvāt . nivṛttaḥ apṛktādhikāraḥ . kim ḍatarādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5612_2: pratiṣedham vakṣyāmi iti apṛktādhikāraḥ nivartyate . na iti āha . tat ca amartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5612_3: . saḥ ca avaśyam apṛktādhikāraḥ nivartyaḥ . kimartham . amartham . amaḥ lopaḥ yathā syāt . he kuṇḍa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5613_0: he pīṭha . nivṛtte api apṛktādhikāre amaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na hi lopaḥ sarvāpahārī
GS24pmbhasuu:5613_1: . mā bhūt sarvasya lopaḥ . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya lope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5613_2: dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt he kuṇḍa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5614_0: he pīṭha iti . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam syāt . tat tu na labhyate . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5614_1: atra hi tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti akārasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . akāralope
GS24pmbhasuu:5614_2: ca sati makāre ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatve he kuṇḍām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_0: he pīṭhām iti etat rūpam prasajyeta . evam tarhi halaḥ lopaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_1: halgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . halṅyābbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_2: dīrghāt sutisi apṛktam hal iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_3: arthaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . eṅ hrasvāt iti eṣā pañcamī hal iti asyāḥ prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_4: prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . evam api prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_5: kṛte he pīṭhā iti etat rūpam prasajyeta . ami pūrvatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_6: . ami iti ucyate na ca atra amam paśyāmaḥ . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_7: . atha vā idam iha sampradhāryam . sambuddhilopaḥ kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_8: kartavyam . paratvāt ekādeśaḥ . evam api ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt sambuddhilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_9: na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ bhaviṣyati . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_10: . na ubhayataḥ āśrayaḥ kariṣyate . katham . na evam vijñāyate . hrasvāt uttarasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_11: sambuddheḥ lopaḥ bhavati iti . katham tarhi . hrasvāt uttarasya halaḥ lopaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_12: saḥ cet sambuddheḥ iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_13: . kim uktam . siddham anunāsikopadhatvāt iti . evam api dalopaḥ sādhīyaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_14: . dukkaraṇāt vā . atha vā duk ḍatarādīnām iti vakṣyāmi . ḍitkaraṇāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_15: ḍit ayam śabdaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ tarhi ḍakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_16: nyāse eva . dviḍakāraḥ nirdeśaḥ adḍ ḍatarādibhyaḥ iti . evam api lopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5615_17: vihitaviśeṣaṇam hrasvagrahaṇam . yasmāt hrasvāt sambuddhiḥ vihitā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5616: (P_6,1.69.2) KA_III.49.1-10 Ro_IV.383-384 apṛktasambuddhilopābhyām luk . apṛktasambuddhilopābhyām luk bhavati vipratiṣedhena . apṛktalopasya avakāśaḥ gomān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5618: jatu . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tat brāhmaṇakulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5619: yat brāhmaṇakulam . sambuddhilopasya avakāśaḥ he agne,
GS24pmbhasuu:5620: he vāyo . lukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . he trapu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5621_0: he jatu . luk bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5621_1: lopalukoḥ lugavadhāraṇāt yathā anaḍuhyate iti . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5621_2: kāraṇam . lopalukoḥ lugavadhāraṇāt . lopalukoḥ hi luk avadhāryate . luk lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5621_3: . yathā anaḍuhyate iti . tat yathā anaḍvān iva ācarati anaḍuhyate iti atra lopalukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5622: (P_6,1.70) KA_III.49.12-19 Ro_IV.384 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5623: ta tā piṇḍānām iti . pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham . na sidhyati . numā vyavahitatvāt pūrvasavarṇaḥ na prāpnoti . chandasi napuṃsakasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ madhoḥ gṛhṇāti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5624_0: mahoḥ tṛptā iva āsate iti evamartham . tatra pūṃvadbhāvena numaḥ nivṛttiḥ . numi
GS24pmbhasuu:5624_1: nivṛtte pūrvasavarṇena siddham . bhavet siddham agne trī te vajinā trī ṣadhasthā
GS24pmbhasuu:5624_2: iti . idam tu na sidhyati ta tā piṇḍānām iti . idam api siddham . katham . sāptamike
GS24pmbhasuu:5624_3: pūrvasavarṇe kṛte punaḥ ṣāṣṭhikaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api jasi guṇaḥ prāpnoti . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5624_4: etat . jasādiṣu chandovāvacanam prāk ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5625_1: dvigusvaraḥ ca . tuki pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5628_0: daśāratni chatram . tuke kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5628_1: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ tuk .
GS24pmbhasuu:5628_2: antaraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . idam tarhi grāmaṇiputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5629_0: senāniputraḥ iti hrasvatve kṛte tuk prāpnoti . grāmaṇiputrādiṣu ca aprāptiḥ . grāmaṇiputrādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5629_1: ca aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt eva . atha vā parādiḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5629_2: . parādau saṃyogādeḥ iti atiprasaṅgaḥ . parādau saṃyogādeḥ iti atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5629_3: . apacchāyāt . vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti etvam prasajyeta . vilopavacanam ca . veḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5630: somasut . apṛktasya iti veḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . apṛktagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi na kriyate darviḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5632_0: atra api prāpnoti . anunāsikaparasya viśabdasya grahaṇam śuddhaparaḥ ca atra viśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5632_1: . evam api satukkasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na
GS24pmbhasuu:5632_2: bhaviṣyati . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . parītat . satukkasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5632_3: valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi abhaktaḥ . abhakte svaraḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5632_4: tarhi svare doṣaḥ bhavati . dadhi chādayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5633_0: madhu chādayati . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ na prāpnoti . nanu ca tuk eva atiṅ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5633_1: tukaḥ parasya nighātaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5633_2: . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyukte ivayukte vā anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5633_3: . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam
GS24pmbhasuu:5633_4: eva ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api atiṅ iti tiṅpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5633_5: anyasmāt atiṅaḥ tiṅsadṛśāt kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca anyat atiṅ tiṅsadṛśam . padam .

GS24pmbhasuu:5634_1: nāma triprakāram vyāpakam aupaśleṣikam vaiṣayikam iti . śabdasya ca śabdena kaḥ anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5634_2: abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ upaśleṣāt . ikaḥ yaṇ aci . aci upaśliṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5634_3: iti . tatra antareṇa saṃhitāgrahaṇam saṃhitāyām eva bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:5635_2: sānubandhakayoḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate āṅaḥ gatikarmapravacanīyasampratyayārthaḥ māṅaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5642_1: na siddham yaṇam atra paśya . asiddham atra jaśtvam . tasya asiddhatvāt yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5642_2: prāpnoti . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5642_3: tasya prāpnoti . pacati iti . evam tarhi dīrghasya yaṇ . dīrghasya yaṇ ādeśam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:5642_4: . tat dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5642_5: . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti . tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5642_6: . aci iti eṣā saptamī dīrghāt iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:5642_7: pūrvasya iti . bhavet siddham kumārī atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5643: brahmabandhvartham iti . idam tu na sidhyati . dadhi atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5644_0: madhu atra iti . hrasvaḥ iti prtavṛttam . hrasvagrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:5644_1: . kva prakṛtam . hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk iti . yadi tat anuvartate dīrghāt padāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5644_2: vā iti hrasvāt api padāntāt vikalpena prāpnoti . sambandhavṛttyā . sambandham anuvartiṣyate

GS24pmbhasuu:5673_2: niyamārthaṅ bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta . dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5673_3: tannimittasya eva iti . mā evam vijñāyi . dhātoḥ eva tannimittasya iti . kim ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5673_4: . adhātoḥ tannimittasya na syāt . śaṅkavyam dāru ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5675: (P_6,1.82) KA_III.55.4-5 Ro_IV.395 tat iti anena kim pratinirdiśyate . saḥ eva krīṇātyarthaḥ . iha mā bhūt . kreyam naḥ dhānyam . na ca asti krayyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5676_1: . bhayyādiprakaraṇe hradayyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . hradayyāḥ āpaḥ . av śarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5676_2: ca . śarasya ca hradasya ca ataḥ av vaktayaḥ . hradavyāḥ āpaḥ . śaravyāḥ vai tejanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5676_3: . śaravyasya paśūn abhighātakaḥ syāt . śaruvṛttāt vā siddham . śaruvṛttāt vā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5676_4: punaḥ siddham etat . ṛñjatī śaruḥ iti api dṛśyate . ṛñjatī śaruḥ iti api śaruśabdapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5676_5: dṛśyate . śaruhastaḥ iti ca loke . śaruhastaḥ iti ca loke śarahastam upācaranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_0: (P_6,1.84.1) KA_III.56.2-57.6 Ro_IV.396-398 ekavacanam kimartham . ekavacanam pṛthak
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_1: ādeśapratiṣedhārtham . ekavacanam kriyate ekaḥ ādeśaḥ yathā syāt . pṛthak ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_2: mā bhūt iti . na vā dravyavat karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛtteḥ . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_3: etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . dravyavat karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛtteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_4: ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_5: bhavati . anayoḥ pūlayoḥ kaṭam kuru . anayoḥ mitpiṇḍayoḥ ghaṭam kuru iti . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_6: ucyate ekam iti ekam ca asau karoti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_7: ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . tat ca ekavākyabhāvāt . ekavākyabhāvāt dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_8: dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca ekavākyabhāvāt . vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_9: dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ ca . bhrasjaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_10: ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām iti . yat tāvat ucyate ekavākyabhāvāt iti tat na . arthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_11: prakaraṇāt vā loke dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca arthāt prakaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_12: vā . vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ dvau ādeśau bhavataḥ . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_13: naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ . ubhau sābhyāsasya iti . katham yat tat uktam vyākaraṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_14: hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_15: ca . bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām iti . iha tāvat jvaratvarasrivyavimavām
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_16: upadhāyāḥ ca iti . stām dvau ūṭhau . na asti doṣaḥ . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_17: iha bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām iti . vakṣyati hi etat . bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_18: lopaḥ āgamaḥ ram vidhīyate iti . yat ucyate arthāt prakaraṇāt vā iti tat na . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_19: kāraṇam . ekavākyabhāvāt eva loke dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca ekavākyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_20: . aṅga hi bhavān grāmyam pāṃsulapādam aprakaraṇajñam āgatam bravītu anayoḥ pūlayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_21: kaṭam kuru . anayoḥ mitpiṇḍayoḥ ghaṭam kuru iti . ekam eva asau kariṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_22: yat uktam vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ dvau ādeśau bhavataḥ . radābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_23: niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ . ubhau sābhyāsasya iti . iha tāvat radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_24: naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ iti dve vākye . katham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5677_25: naḥ . tataḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ iti . iha ubhau sābhyāsasya iti ubhaugrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5678_1: yathā loke ṭatra avayave śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ prāpnoti yathā loke . tat yathā loke
GS24pmbhasuu:5678_2: . vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5678_3: pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . tathā garbhāṣṭame brāhmaṇaḥ upaneyaḥ iti sakṛt upanīya kṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5678_4: śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . tathā triḥ hṛdayaṅgamābhiḥ adbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5678_5: aśabdābhiḥ upaspṛśet iti sakṛt upaspṛśya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5678_6: na bhavati . evam iha api khaṭvendre kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā mālendrādiṣu na
GS24pmbhasuu:5678_7: syāt . siddham tu dharmopadeśane anavayavavijñānāt yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5678_8: etat . katham . dharmopadeśanam idam śāstram . dharmopadeśane ca asmin śāstre anavayavena
GS24pmbhasuu:5678_9: śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_0: brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ . surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_1: ca na pīyate . yadi ca avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt ekam ca brāhmaṇam ahatvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_2: ekām ca surām apītvā anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . tathā pūrvavayāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_3: iti pūrvavayomātram pratyutthīyate . yadi avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_4: pūrvavayasam pratyutthāya anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . tathā vede khalu api . vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_5: brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam vasante vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_6: ijyate . yadi avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt sakṛt iṣṭvā punaḥ ijyā na pravarteta
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_7: . ubhayathā iha loke dṛśyate . avayavena api śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ anavayavena api
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_8: . katham punaḥ idam ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . iha tāvat vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_9: brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti . agnyādhānam yajñamukhaprtipattyartham . sakṛt ādhāya
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_10: kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ pratipannam yajñam iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_11: atra avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā garbhāṣṭame brāhmaṇaḥ upaneyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_12: . upanayanam saṃskārārtham . sakṛt ca asau upanītaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ bhavati . ataḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_13: api avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā triḥ hṛdayaṅgamābhiḥ adbhiḥ aśabdābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_14: upaspṛśet iti . upasparśanam śaucārtham . sakṛt ca asau upaspṛśya śuciḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_15: ataḥ atra api avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . iha idānīm brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_16: . surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇavadhe surāpāne ca mahān doṣaḥ uktaḥ . saḥ brāhmaṇavadhamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_17: surāpānamātre ca prasaktaḥ . ataḥ atra anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_18: pūrvavayāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttheyaḥ iti . pūrvavayasaḥ apratyutthāne doṣaḥ uktaḥ pratyutthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_19: ca guṇaḥ . katham . ūrdhvam prāṇāḥ hi utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavire āyati . pratyutthānābhābhivādābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_20: punaḥ tān pratipadyate iti . saḥ ca prūrvavayomātre prasaktaḥ . ataḥ atra api anavayavena
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_21: śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_22: iti ijyāyāḥ kim cit prayojanam uktam . kim . svarge loke apsarasaḥ enam jāyāḥ bhūtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_23: upaśerate iti . tat ca dvitīyasyāḥ tṛtīyasyāḥ ca ijyāyāḥ bhavitum arhati . ataḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_24: api anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā śabdasya api jñāne prayoge prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_25: uktam . kim . ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhuk
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_26: bhavati iti . yadi ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge loke
GS24pmbhasuu:5679_27: kāmadhuk bhavati kimartham dvitīyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca prayujyate . na vai kāmānām tṛptiḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_0: (P_6,1.84.3) KA_III.58.18-59.8 Ro_IV.402-403 atha pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham . pūrvaparagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_1: parasya ādeśapratiṣedhārtham . pūrvaparagrahaṇam kriyate parasya ādeśapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_2: . parasya ādeśaḥ mā bhūt . āt guṇaḥ iti . katham ca prāpnoti . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_3: parasya . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi parasya kāryam ucyate . tat yathā dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_4: apaḥ īt iti . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭārtham tu . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭārtham ca pūrvaparagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_5: . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ yathā pakalpeta . anirdiṣṭe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_6: hi pūrvaparagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya aprasiddhiḥ syāt . kasya . sthāneyogatvasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_7: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āt iti eṣā pañcamī aci iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_8: iti uttarasya iti . tathā ca aci iti eṣā saptamī āt iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_9: tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5680_10: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ubhe yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:5681: saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakḷptiḥ tatra ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ iti . saḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_0: (P_6,1.85.1) KA_III.59.10-60.6 Ro_IV. 404-406 kimartham idam ucyate . antādivadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_1: āmiśrasya ādeśavacanāt . antādivat iti ucyate āmiśrasya ādeśavacanāt . āmiśrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_2: ayam ādeśaḥ ucyate . saḥ na eva pūrvagrahaṇena gṛhyate na api paragrahaṇena . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_3: yathā kṣīrodake sampṛkte āmiśratvāt na eva kṣīragrahaṇena gṛhyate na api udakagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_4: . iṣyate ca grahaṇam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti antādivacvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_5: . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra yasya antādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_6: tannirdeśaḥ . tatra yasya antādivadbhāvaḥ iṣyate tannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . asya antavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_7: bhavati asya ādivat bhavati iti vaktavyam . siddham tu pūrvaparādhikārāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_8: etat . katham . pūrvaparādhikārāt . pūrvaparayoḥ iti vartate . pūrvasya kāryam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_9: antavat bhavati . parasya kāryam prati ādivat bhavati . atha yatra ubhayam āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_10: kim tatra pūrvasya antavat bhavati āhosvit parasya ādivat bhavati . ubhayataḥ āśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_11: na antādivat . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . laukikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_12: ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ . tat yathā loke yaḥ dvayoḥ tulyabalayoḥ preṣyaḥ bhavati saḥ tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_13: paryāyeṇa kāryam karoti . yadā tu tam ubhau yugapat preṣayataḥ nānādikṣu ca kārye
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_14: bhavataḥ tatra yadi asau avirodhāṛthī bhavati tataḥ ubhayoḥ na karoti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5682_15: kāraṇam ubhayoḥ na karoti . yaugapadyāsambhavāt . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_0: (P_6,1.85.2) KA_III.60.7-63.7 Ro_IV.406-411 atha antavattve kāni prayojanāni . antavattve
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_1: prayojanam bahvacpūrvapadāt ṭhajvidhāne . antavattve bahvacpūrvapadāt ṭhajvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_2: prayojanam . dvādaśānyikaḥ . pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ ekādeśaḥ pūrvapadasaya antavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_3: bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum bahucpūrvapadāt ṭhac bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_4: yatra kṛte api ekādeśe bahvacpūrvapadam bhavati . tarayodaśānyikaḥ . pratyayaikādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_5: pūrvavidhau . pratyayaikādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau prayojanam . madhu pibanti . śidaśitoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_6: ekādeśaḥ śitaḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum śiti iti pibādeśaḥ . kva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5683_7: syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . pibati . vaibhaktasya ṇatve . vaibhaktasya ṇatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5684_0: surāpeṇa . uttarapadavibhaktyoḥ ekādeśaḥ uttarapadasya antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5684_1: kartum ekājuttarapade ṇaḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . kṣīrapāṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5685: surāpāṇam . adasaḥ īttvottve . adasaḥ īttvottve prayojanam . amī atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5688_0: amū āsāte . adasvibhaktyoḥ ekādeśaḥ adasaḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum adasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5688_1: aseḥ dāt u daḥ maḥ etaḥ īt bahuvacane iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . amībhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5690: hāryā . tidatiroḥ ekādeśaḥ titaḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum tit svaritam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . kāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_0: hāryaḥ . svaritatvam vipratiṣedhāt . svaritatvam kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_1: . paratvāt svaritatvam bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_2: nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api svaritatve prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . anyathāsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_3: kṛte svaritatve prāpnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte svaritatve prāpnoti . svarabhinnasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_4: ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_5: . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ padasya svaritatvam . svaritatvam api antaraṅgam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_6: . uktam etat padagrahaṇam parimāṇārtham iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt svaritatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_7: . svaritatve kṛte āntaryataḥ svaritānudāttayoḥ ekādeśaḥ svaritaḥ bhaviṣyati . liṅgaviśiṣtagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_8: vā . atha vā prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣtasya api grahaṇm bhavati iti evam atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5691_9: svaritatvam bhaviṣyati . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam ca prayojanam . guḍodakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5692_0: mathitodakam . pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ ekādeśaḥ pūrvapadasya antavat bhavati yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5692_1: śakyeta kartum udake akevale pūrvapadasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5692_2: . yatra akādeśaḥ na bhavati . udaśvidudakam . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam ca . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5692_3: ca vipratiṣedhāt . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5694_0: guḍodakam . pūrvapadāntodāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ ca avaśyam vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5694_1: āśrayayitavyaḥ . ekādeśe hi svaritāprasiddhiḥ . ekādeśe hi svaritasya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5694_2: syāt . yaḥ hi manyate astu atra ekādeśaḥ ekādeśe kṛte pūrvapadāntodāttatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5694_3: iti svaritatvam tasya na sidhyati svaritaḥ vā anudātte padādau iti . mathitodakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5696_0: prāśitā . kṛdgatyoḥ ekādeśaḥ gateḥ antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum gatikārakopapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5696_1: kṛdantam uttarapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra na akādeśaḥ . prakārakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5697_0: prakaraṇam . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam ca . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam ca vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5697_1: . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5700_0: prāśitā . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ ca avaśyam vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5700_1: āśrayayitavyaḥ . ekādeśe hi a prasiddhiḥ uttarapadasya aparatvāt . yaḥ hi manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5700_2: astu atra ekādeśaḥ ekādeśe kṛte kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati iti kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5700_3: tasya na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . uttarapadasya aparatvāt . na hi idānīm ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5700_4: kṛte uttarapadam param bhavati . nanu ca antādivadbhāvena param . ubhayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5701: āśraye na antādivat . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ ca ekādeśāt . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ ca ekādeśāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . uttarapadavṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ pūrvatraigartakaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5704_0: aparaiṣukāmaśaḥ . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ekādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:5704_1: antaraṅgabalīyastvāt . ekādeśaḥ tu prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgasya balīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5704_2: . antaraṅgam balīyaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra vṛddhividhānam . tatra vṛddhiḥ vidheyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5704_3: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati pūrvottarapadayoḥ tāvat kāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5704_4: na ekādeśaḥ iti yat ayam na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5704_5: jñāpakam . indre dvau acau . tatra ekaḥ yasya īti ca iti lopena hriyate aparaḥ ekādeśena
GS24pmbhasuu:5704_6: . tataḥ anackaḥ indraḥ sampannaḥ . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vṛddheḥ . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5704_7: pūrvapadottarapadyoḥ tāvatkāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti tataḥ na indrasya parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5705: (P_6,1.85.3) KA_III.63.8-64.8 Ro_IV.411-412 atha ādivattve kāni prayojanāni . ādivattve prayojanam pragṛhyasañjñāyām . ādivattve pragṛhyasañjñāyām prayojanam . agnī iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5706_0: vāyū iti . dvivacanādvivacanayoḥ ekādeśaḥ dvivacanasya ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5706_1: kartum īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . trapuṇī iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5707_0: jatunī iti . suptiṅābvidhiṣu . suptiṅābvidhiṣu prayojanam . sup . vṛkṣe tiṣṭhati

GS24pmbhasuu:5707_2: subantam padam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:5708: yaje iti . tiṅatiṅoḥ ekādeśaḥ tiṅaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum tiṅantam padam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . pacati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5710: mālā . abanāpoḥ ekādeśaḥ āpaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum ābantāt soḥ lopaḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . kruñcā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5712_0: devadiśā . āṅgrahaṇe padavidhau . āṅgrahaṇe padavidhau prayojanam . adya āhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5712_1: kadā āhate . āṅanāṅoḥ ekādeśaḥ āṅaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5712_2: iti ātmanepadam bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati . āhate
GS24pmbhasuu:5712_3: . āṭaḥ ca vṛddhividhau . āṭaḥ ca vṛddhividhau prayojanam . adya aihiṣṭa . kadā aihiṣṭa
GS24pmbhasuu:5712_4: . āṭaḥ adyaśabdasya ca ekādeśaḥ āṭaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum āṭaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5712_5: aci vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na . aihiṣṭa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5713: aikṣiṣṭa . kṛdantaprātipadikatve ca . kṛdantaprātipadikatve ca prayojanam . dhārayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5714: pārayaḥ . kṛdakṛtoḥ ekādeśaḥ kṛtaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum kṛdantam prātipadikam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na . kārakaḥ , hārakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5715_0: (P_6,1.85.4) KA_III.64.9-65.6 Ro_IV.413-414 na abhyāsādīnām hrasvatve . abhyāsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5715_1: hrasvatve na antādivat bhavati iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ abhyāsādayaḥ . abhyāsohāmbārthanadīnapuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5722_1: prāpnoti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā etat vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5722_2: . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam . bahiraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:5722_3: . varṇāśrayavidhau ca . varṇāśrayavidhau ca na antādivat bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5722_4: kim prayojanam . prayojanam khaṭvābhiḥ juhāva asyai aśvaḥ iti . iha khaṭvābhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5724: ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati iti aisbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat taparakaraṇe prayojanam . kim . kīlālapābhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5725_0: śubhaṃyābhiḥ . juhāva . ātaḥ au ṇalaḥ iti autvam prāpnoti . asyai aśvaḥ iti . eṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5725_1: padāntāt ati iti pūrvatvam prāpnoti . na vā atādrūpyātideśāt . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5725_2: kim kāraṇam . atādrūpyātideśāt . na iha tādrūpyam atidiśyate . rūpāśrayāḥ vai ete
GS24pmbhasuu:5726_0: (P_6,1.86.1) KA_III.65.8-66.7 Ro_IV.414-415 kimartham idam ucyate . ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5726_3: tāvat . kosiñcat . yosiñcat . ekādeśe kṛte iṇaḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5727_0: pretya . ekādeśe kṛte hrasvasya iti tuk na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5727_1: prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra utsargalakṣaṇāprasiddhiḥ utsargābhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5728_0: pretya iti . kim kāraṇam . utsargābhāvāt . hrasvasya iti ucyate na ca atra hrasvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5728_1: paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca atra api asiddhavacanāt siddham . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5728_2: na anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet tat na
GS24pmbhasuu:5728_3: . kim kāraṇam . anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . na hi anyasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5728_4: anyasya prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati . na hi devadattasya hantari hate devadattasya prādurbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5728_5: bhavati . tasmāt sthānivadvacanam asiddhatvam ca . tasmāt sthānivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5730_0: yosiñcat iti atra asiddhatvam . sthānivadvacanānarthakyam śāstrāsiddhatvāt . sthānivadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5730_1: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . śāstrāsiddhatvāt . na anena kāryāsiddhatvam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5730_2: kim tarhi . śāstrāsiddhatvam anena kriyate . ekādeśaśāstram tukśāstre asiddham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5731: (P_6,1.86.2) KA_III.66.8-23 Ro_IV.416-418 samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ iti vaktavyam . śakahūṣu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5733: vṛkṣe chatram . ṅi . iṭ . apace cchatram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5734_0: apace chatram . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5734_1: . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kutaḥ . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5734_2: . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5734_3: ekādeśaḥ . yadi padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ susasyāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5736: atra ṣatvam prāpnoti . tugvidhim prati padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ . ṣatvam prati ekādeśamātram asiddham bhavati . yadi ṣatvam prati ekādeśamātram asiddham śakahūṣu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5738: atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . katham susasyāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_0: supippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_1: ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5739_2: ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvam bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate śakahūṣu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5740_0: parivīṣu iti atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti . tulyajātīyakasya jñāpakam . kim ca tuljyajātīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5740_1: . yaḥ kupvoḥ . yadi evam veñaḥ apratyaye parataḥ uḥ iti prāpnoti ut iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5740_2: . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . atha vā na evam vijñāyate . pūrvasya ca padādeḥ parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5740_3: ca padāntasya iti . katham tarhi . parasya ca padādeḥ pūrvasya ca padāntasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5741_0: (P_6,1.87.1) KA_III.66.25-68.3 Ro_IV.418-420 guṇagrahaṇam kimartham na āt ekaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5741_1: iti eva ucyeta . āt ekaḥ cet guṇaḥ kena . āt ekaḥ cet guṇaḥ kena idānīm bhaviṣyati . khaṭvendraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5744_0: mālodakam . sthāne antaratamaḥ hi saḥ . sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5744_1: . aidautau api tarhi prapnutaḥ . aidautau na eci tau uktau . aidautau na bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5744_2: . kim kāraṇam . eci hi aidautau ucyete . iha tarhi khaṭvarśyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_0: ṛkāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . ṛkāraḥ na ubhayāntaraḥ . ubhayoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ tena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_1: . na ca ṛkāraḥ ubhayoḥ antaratamaḥ . ākāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . ākāraḥ na ṛti dhātau
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_2: saḥ . ākāraḥ na bhaviṣyati . kim kāraṇam . ṛti dhātau ākāraḥ ucyate . tat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_3: bhaviṣyati . ṛkārādau dhātau eva na anyatra iti . plutaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_4: ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ . viṣaye plutaḥ ucyate . yadā ca saḥ viṣayaḥ bhavitavyam tadā plutena
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_5: . āntaryāt trimātracaturmātrāḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . āntaryataḥ trimātracaturmātrāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_6: sthāne trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ mā bhūvan iti . khaṭvā indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ . khaṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_7: udakam khaṭvodakam . khaṭvā īṣā khaṭveṣā . khaṭvā ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā . khaṭvā elakā khaṭvailakā
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_8: . khaṭvā odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ khaṭvā aitikāyanaḥ khaṭvaitikāyanaḥ . khaṭvā aupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_9: khaṭvaupagavaḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api guṇagrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra trimātracaturmātrāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_10: sthāne trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ na bhavanti . taparatvāt ne te smṛtāḥ . tapare
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_11: guṇavṛddhī . nanu ca bhoḥ taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_12: paraḥ taparaḥ iti . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt . yavaḥ stavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_13: . lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . kim dakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:5746_14: prayojanam . atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api .

GS24pmbhasuu:5752: (P_6,1.89.1) KA_III.68.16-69.6 Ro_IV.421-422 kim idam etyedhatyoḥ rūpagrahaṇam āhosvit dhātugrahaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi rūpagrahaṇam siddham upaiti ,

GS24pmbhasuu:5754_1: . iṇi ikārādau vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ . iṇi ikārādau vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . upetaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5754_2: pretaḥ iti . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . vṛddhiḥ eci . tataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5754_4: . evam api ā itaḥ etaḥ . upetaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_0: pretaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . āṅi pararaūpam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_1: pararūpam iyam vṛddhiḥ ārabhyate . sā yathā eṅi pararūpam bādhate evam āṅi pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_2: bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_3: ca aprāpte eṅi pararūpam iyam vṛddhiḥ ārabhyate . āṅi pararūpe punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_4: ca . athavā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti iyam vṛddhiḥ eṅi pararūpam

GS24pmbhasuu:5771_0: (P_6,1.90) KA_III.70.2-5 Ro_IV.423 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . vṛddheḥ anukarṣaṇārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5771_1: na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā vṛddhiḥ anuvartiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5771_2: ātaḥ aci vṛddhiḥ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:5771_3: prāpnoti . pararūpam . usi omāṅkṣu āṭaḥ pararūpapratiṣedham codayiṣyati . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_0: (P_6,1.91.1) KA_III.70.7-14 Ro_IV.423-424 dhātau iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . prarṣabham
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_1: vanam . upasargāt vṛddhividhau dhātugrahaṇe uktam . kim uktam . gatyupasargasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_2: kriyāyoge yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ tam prati iti vacanam iti . kriyamāṇe api dhātugrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_3: prarcchakaḥ iti prāpnoti . yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ tam prati iti vacanāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_4: . idam tarhi prayojanam . upasargāt ṛti dhātau vṛddhiḥ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat

GS24pmbhasuu:5887_0: plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat pūrvasmin yoge dīrghagrahaṇam tat uttaratra nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:5887_1: . evam api idam iha pūrvasavarṇagrahaṇam kriyate . tena ami api pūrvasavarṇaḥ prasajyeta . vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5888_0: plakṣam . dvimātraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . savarṇagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5888_1: savarṇagrahaṇam na kriyate kutaḥ vyavasthā . āntaryataḥ . yadi evam agnī vāyū trimātraḥ prāpnoti vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5889_0: plakṣam dvimātraḥ . tasmāt savarṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5889_1: anuvartate . tasmin anuvartamāne ami pūrvaḥ iti api vaktavyam . atha kimartham pṛthak
GS24pmbhasuu:5889_2: ucyate na iha eka eva ucyeta . prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ ami ca iti . yadi prathamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5889_3: pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ami ca iti ucyate tana ami api dīrghaḥ prasajyeta . vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5890_0: plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghagrahaṇam nivartayiṣyate . evam api pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5890_1: prasajyeta . savarṇagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi savarṇagrahaṇam na kriyate pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5890_2: yoge vipratiṣiddham . yadi pūrvaḥ na dīrghaḥ atha dīrghaḥ na pūrvaḥ . pūrvaḥ dīrghaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5895: plakṣam . yathā eva hi yogavibhāgaḥ pararūpam bādhate evam ami pūrvatvam api bādheta . nakārābhāvaḥ ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt . natvasya ca abhāvaḥ . vṛkṣān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5896_0: plakṣān . kim kāraṇam . ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt . tasmāt iti anena anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5896_1: yogaḥ pratinirdiśyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tasmāt iti anena anantaraḥ yogaḥ pratinirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5896_2: . iha mā bhūt . etān gāḥ paśya [R:
GS24pmbhasuu:5897_0: etān gāḥ caturaḥ balivardān paśya] iti . astu tarhi ekayogaḥ eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5897_1: ekayoge hi jaśśahoḥ pararūpaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ijgrahaṇam tu jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5897_2: pararūpābhāvasya . yat ayam na āt ici iti ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5897_3: na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ijgrahaṇasya idam prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_0: plakṣān . yadi ca jaśśasoḥ pararūpam syāt ijgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . paśyati tu
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_1: ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . tataḥ ijgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_2: jñāpakam . uttarārtham etat syāt . dīrghāt jasi ca ici ca iti . yadi uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_3: etat syāt atra eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam kurvīta . iha api tarhi kriyamāṇam yadi uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_4: na jñāpakam bhavati . evam tarhi yadi uttarārtham etat syāt na eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_5: kurvīta na api jasgrahaṇam . etāvat ayam brūyāt . dīrghāt śasi pūrvasavarṇaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_6: iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dīrghāt śasi eva na anyatra iti . saḥ ayam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_7: laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe yat ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_8: pararūpam bhavati iti . atha vā punaḥ astu yogavibhāgaḥ . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_9: anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ami api yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_10: kariṣyate . ami . ami yat uktam tat na bhavati iti . tataḥ pūrvaḥ . pūrvaḥ ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_11: ami iti . yat api ucyate nakārābhāvaḥ ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt iti . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_12: arhati tasmāt iti anena anantaram yogam pratinirdeṣṭum . evam kila pratinirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_13: . tasmāt pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt iti . tat ca na . evam pratinirdiśyate . tasmāt akaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_14: savarṇāt iti . atha vā tasmāt prathamyoḥ dīrghāt iti . atha vā punaḥ astu ami ekayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_15: . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_16: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_17: pararūpam bādhiṣyate ami pūrvatvam na bādhiṣyate . yadi etat asti madhye apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_18: purastāt apavādāḥ iti na arthaḥ ekena api yogavibhāgena . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_19: vidhīn bādhante iti evam pararūpam savarṇadīrghatvam bādhiṣyate prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_20: na bādhiṣyate . atha vā saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_21: supi ca iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi bahuvacane . bahuvacane ca ataḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati . ekāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5900_22: ca bhavati bahuvacane jhali iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . vṛṣāṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5901: plakṣāṇām . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghatve kṛte hrasvāśrayaḥ nuṭ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām nuṭ iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5902_0: atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvam . nityam khalu api dīrghatvam . kṛte api nuṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:5902_1: prāpnoti akṛte api . nityatvāt paratvāt ca dīrghatve kṛte hrasvāśrayaḥ nuṭ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5902_2: . evam tarhi ādgrahaṇam iha api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . āt jaseḥ asuk
GS24pmbhasuu:5902_3: iti . tena kṛte api dīrghatve nuṭ bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5903_0: śubhaṃyām . ātaḥ lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5903_1: kriyatām nuṭ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ . evam tarhi hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:5903_2: iti atra ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti ātaḥ lopaḥ sambandham anuvartiṣyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5903_3: . kīlālapānām brāhmaṇakulānām . napuṃsakasya na iti anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_0: (P_6,1.103) KA_III.80.23-81.19 Ro_IV.446-448 kim idam natvam puṃsām bahutve bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_1: āhosvit puṃśabdāt bahuṣu . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . natvam puṃsām bahutve cet puṃśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_2: iṣyate striyām . tat na sidhyati . bhrūkuṃsān paśya iti . napuṃsake tathā eva iṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_3: . tat na sidhyati . ṣaṇḍhān paśya . paṇḍakān paśya iti . strīśabdāt ca prasajyate

GS24pmbhasuu:5907_1: na sidhyati . sthūrān paśya iti . kuṇḍinyāḥ ararakāyāḥ . apatyam ca na sidhyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:5907_3: . tataḥ natvam bhaviṣyati . puṃsprādhānye te eva syuḥ ye doṣāḥ pūrvacoditāḥ . bhrūkuṃsān
GS24pmbhasuu:5907_4: paśya . ṣaṇḍhān paśya . paṇḍakān paśya . cañcāḥ paśya . vadhrikāḥ paśya . kharakuṭīḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5907_5: paśya iti . tasmāt yasmin pakṣe alpīyāṃsaḥ doṣāḥ tam āsthāya pratividheyam doṣeṣu .

GS24pmbhasuu:5909: (P_6,1.108.1) KA_III.82.2 Ro_IV.448 vā chandasi iti eva . mitrāvaruṇau yajyamānaḥ . mitrāvaruṇau ijyamānaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5910_2: kim prayojanam . asamānāṅgapratiṣedhārtham . asamānāṅgasya mā bhūt iti . śakahvartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_0: parivyartham . siddham asamprasāraṇāt . siddham etat . katham . asamprasāraṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_1: vākyasya samprasāraṇasañjñā na varṇasya . atha varṇasya samprasāraṇasañjñāyām doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_2: eva . varṇasya ca samprasāraṇasañjñāyām na doṣaḥ . katham . anyaḥ ayam samprasāraṇāsamprasāraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_3: sthāne ekaḥ ādiśyate . kāryakṛtatvāt vā . atha vā sakṛt kṛtam pūrvatvam iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_4: punaḥ na bhaviṣyati . tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_5: kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_6: yat tasya punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . yaḥ tu tadāśrayam prāpnoti na tat śakyam bādhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_7: . tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_8: vasante vasante ijyate . tasmāt pūrvoktaḥ eva parihāraḥ siddham asamprasāraṇāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_9: . yadi tarhi na idam samprasāraṇam hūtaḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_10: vacanaprāmāṇyāt . anavakāśam dīrghatvam . tat vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyati . antavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5911_11: vā . atha vā pūrvasya kāryam prati antavat bhavati iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5912: (P_6,1.108.2) KA_III.82.21-84.23 Ro_IV.450-455 āṭaḥ vṛddheḥ iyaṅ . āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti etasmāt iyaṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ aikṣiṣṭa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5915_0: adhyaiyātām adhyaiyata . iyaṅādeśaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5915_1: . antaraṅgā āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ . aṅgasya

GS24pmbhasuu:5915_4: api . iyaṅ api nityaḥ . kṛte api āṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ iyaṅ . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5915_5: āti prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgā āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam

GS24pmbhasuu:5915_8: āṅabhyāsayoḥ . āt guṇāt savarṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kva . āṅabhyāsayoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5929_1: na arthaḥ . astu atra āt guṇaḥ ayavau ca halādiśeṣaḥ . punaḥ āt guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5930: upejatuḥ iti . idam tu na sidhyati : upopatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5931: upopuḥ iti . atra hi āt guṇe kṛte odantaḥ nipātaḥ iti pragṛhyasañjñā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5932_0: pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . padāntaprakaraṇe prkṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5932_1: na ca eṣaḥ padāntaḥ . padāntabhaktaḥ padāntagrahaṇena grāhīṣyate . evam tarhi etat

GS24pmbhasuu:5944_0: (P_6,1.113) KA_III.85.5-24 Ro_IV.457-459 kimartham aplutāt aplute iti ucyate . plutāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_1: parasya plute vā parataḥ mā bhūt iti . plutāt parasya susrotā3 atra nu asi . plute
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_2: parataḥ tiṣṭhatu payaḥ ā3gnidatta . ataḥ ati iti ucyate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ plutāt parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_3: plute vā parataḥ . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt prāpnoti . atha aplutāt aplute
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_4: iti ucyamāne yāvatā asiddhaḥ plutaḥ kasmāt eva atra na prāpnoti . aplutabhāvinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_5: aplutabhāvini iti evam etat vijñāyate . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhaḥ plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_6: svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate . yat ayam plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti plutasya prakṛtibhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_7: śāsti . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . aplutādaplutavacane akārahaśoḥ samānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_8: pratiṣedhaḥ . aplutādaplutavacane akārahaśoḥ samānapade pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . payo3ṭ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:5945_1: . bahiraṅgaḥ pluraḥ . antaraṅgam uttvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:5945_2: tarhi prāpnoti . susrotā3 atra nu asi . antaraṅgaḥ atra plutaḥ bahiraṅgam uttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5945_3: . kva punaḥ iha antaraṅgaḥ plutaḥ kva vā bahiraṅgam uttvam uttvam vā antaraṅgam plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5945_4: vā bahiraṅgaḥ . vākyāntasya vākyādau antaraṅgaḥ plutaḥ bahiraṅgam uttvam . samānavākye
GS24pmbhasuu:5945_5: padāntasya padādau uttvam antaraṅgam bahiraṅgaḥ plutaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam bahiraṅgatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5945_6: uttve hetuḥ vyapadiśyate na punaḥ asiddhatvam api . yathā eva hi ayam bahiraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5945_7: evam asiddhaḥ api . evam manyate . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ āśrayāt siddhaḥ bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5945_8: vā yasyām na aprāptāyām paribhāṣāyām uttvam ārabhyate sā āśrayāt siddhā syāt . kasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5945_9: ca na aprāptāyām . asiddhaparibhāṣāyām . bahiraṅgaparibhāṣāyām punaḥ prāptāyām aprāptāyām ca .
