GS24pmbhasuu:5946_1: sarvapratiṣedhaḥ . nāntaḥpādam iti sarvasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . katham . aci iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_2: . aci yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . nāntaḥpādam iti sarvapratiṣedhaḥ cet atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5946_3: . nāntaḥpādam iti sarvapratiṣedhaḥ cet atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_0: prati agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat . evam tarhi ati iti vartate . akārāśrayam yat prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_1: tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . akārāśrayam iti cet uttvavacanam . akārāśrayam iti cet uttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_2: vaktavyam . kālaḥ aśvaḥ . śatadhāraḥ ayam maṇiḥ . ayavoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca . ayavoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_3: ca pratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . sujāte aśvasūnṛte . adhvaro adribhiḥ sutam . śukram
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_4: te anyat . eṅprakaraṇāt siddham . eṅaḥ ati iti vartate . eṅaḥ ati yat prāpnoti tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5947_5: pratiṣedhaḥ . eṅprakaraṇāt siddham cet uttvapratiṣedhaḥ . eṅprakaraṇāt siddham cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5948_0: vāyoḥ atra. ataḥ roḥ aplutāt aplute eṅaḥ ca iti uttvam prāpnoti . punaḥ eṅgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5948_1: siddham . punaḥ eṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . tat tarhi kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5948_2: anuvartate . nanu ca uktam eṅprakaraṇāt siddham cet uttvapratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5948_3: doṣaḥ . padāntābhisambaddham eṅgrahaṇam anuvartate na ca eṅaḥ padāntāt paraḥ ruḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_0: (P_6,1.123) KA_III.86.22-87.18 Ro_IV.461-463 goḥ agvacanam gavāgre svarasiddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_1: . goḥ ak vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . gavāgre svarasiddhyartham . gavāgre svarasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_2: yathā syāt . gavāgram . avaṅādeśe hi svare doṣaḥ . avaṅādeśe hi svare doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_3: . antodāttasya āntaryataḥ antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasjyate . katham punaḥ ayam antodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_4: yadā ekāc . vyapadeśivadbhāvena . yathā eva tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvena antodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_5: evam ādyudāttaḥ api . tatra āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . satyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_6: evam etat . na tu idam lakṣaṇam asti . prātipadikasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_7: idam punaḥ asti . prātipadikasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . saḥ asau lakṣaṇena antodāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_8: . tatra āntaryataḥ antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasjyeta . yadi punaḥ gameḥ ḍo
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_9: vidhīyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . pratyayādyudāttatve kṛte āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_10: ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ ayam ādyudāttaḥ yadā ekāc . vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_11: . yathā eva tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvena ādyudāttaḥ evam antodāttaḥ api . tatra āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_12: antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasjyeta . satyam evam etat . na tu idam lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_13: asti . pratyayasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . idam punaḥ asti . pratyayasya ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_14: udāttaḥ bhavati iti . saḥ asau lakṣaṇena ādyudāttaḥ . tatra āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_15: ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .etat api ādeśe na asti . ādeśasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_16: iti . prakṛtitaḥ anena svaraḥ labhyaḥ . prakṛtiḥ ca asya yathā eva ādyudāttā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_17: antodāttā api . evam tarhi ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_18: bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktayaḥ . yathā eva nipātanasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5949_19: prakṛtsvarasya bādhakaḥ evam samāsasvarasya api . gavāsthi , gavākṣi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5950_0: (P_6,1.124) KA_III.87.20-22 Ro_IV.463 indrādau iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5950_1: gavendrayajñe vīhi iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate indre
GS24pmbhasuu:5950_2: aci iti . katham tarhi . aci bhavati . katarasmin . indre aci iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_1: mā bhūt iti . ma etat asti prayojanam . pūrvasmin eva yoge vibhāṣāgrahaṇam nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam . plutapragṛhyāṇam aci prakṛtibhāvaḥ eva yathā syāt . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_3: anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . śākalam . sinnityasamāsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_4: śākalapratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . atha ajgrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_5: . aci prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt . plutapragṛhyeṣu ajgrahaṇam anarthakam adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_6: siddham . plutapragṛhyeṣu ajgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . adhikārāt eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_7: . aci iti prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti . tat tu tasmin prakṛtibhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_8: . tat tu dvitīyam ajgrahaṇam kartavyam prakṛtibhāvārtham . tasmin aci pūrvasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_9: yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . jānu u asya rujati . jānū asya rujati . jānv asya rujati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5952_0: (P_6,1.125.2) KA_III.87.12-23 Ro_IV.465-466 atha kimartham plutasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5952_1: ucyate . svarasandhiḥ mā bhūt iti . ucyamāne api etasmin svarsandhiḥ prāpnoti . plute
GS24pmbhasuu:5952_2: kṛte na bhaviṣyati . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt prāpnoti . plutaprakṛtibhāvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5952_3: tu jñāpakam ekādeśāt plutaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti . yat ayam plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti prakṛtibhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5952_4: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ ekādeśāt plutaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena iti . ekādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5952_5: plutaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet śālendre atiprasaṅgaḥ . ekādeśāt plutaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:5952_6: iti cet śālendre atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . śālāyām indraḥ śālendraḥ . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5952_7: . na vā atiprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ plutaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5953_0: (P_6,1.126) KA_III.89.2-5 Ro_IV.466 āṅaḥ anarthakasya . āṅaḥ anarthakasya iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5953_1: . iha mā bhūt . indraḥ bāhubhyām ātarat . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahulagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5953_2: na bhaviṣyati . āṅaḥ anunāsikaḥ chandasi bahulam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_0: (P_6,1.127.1) KA_III.89.7-19 Ro_IV.467-468 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . prakṛtyā iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_1: anukṛṣyate . kim prayojanam . svarasandhiḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_2: . hrasvavacanasārmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . bhavet dīrghāṇām hrasvavacanasārmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_3: svarasandhiḥ na syāt . hrasvānām tu khalu svarasandhiḥ prāpnoti . hrasvānām api hrasvavacanasāmarthyān
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_4: svarasandhiḥ na bhaviṣyati . na hrasvānām hrasvāḥ prāpnuvanti . na hi bhuktavān punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_5: bhuṅkte . na ca kṛtaśmaśruḥ punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . nanu ca punaḥpravṛttiḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_6: dṛṣṭā . bhuktavān ca punaḥ bhuṅkte kṛtaśmaśruḥ ca punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_7: tatra punaḥpravṛttiḥ bhavati bhojanaviśeṣāt śilpiviśeṣāt vā . hrasvāṇām punaḥ hrasvavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_8: na kim cit prayojanam asti . akṛtakāri khalu api śāstram agnivat . tat yathā agniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_9: yad adagdham tat dahati . hrasvāṇām api hrasvavacane etat prayojanam svarasandhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_10: mā bhūt iti . kṛtakāri khalu api śāstram parjanyavat . tat yathā parjanyaḥ yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_11: ūnam pūrṇam ca sarvam abhivarṣayati . idam tarhi prayojanam . plutapragṛhyāḥ anukṛṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_12: . ikaḥ asavarṇe śākalyasya hrasvaḥ ca plutaprgṛhyāḥ ca prakṛtyā . nityagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5954_13: api etat prayojanam uktam . anyatarat śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:5955_1: śākalapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ . prajām vindāma ṛtviyām . vaiyākaraṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5956: sauvaśvaḥ . nityagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . sitsamāsayoḥ śākalam na bhavati iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . vāpyām āsvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5959: nadyātiḥ . īṣā akṣādiṣu chandasi prakṛtibhāvamātram . īṣā akṣādiṣu chandasi prakṛtibhāvamātram draṣṭavyam . īṣa akṣaḥ . ka īm are piśaṅgila . yathā aṅgadaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5960: (P_6,1.128.1) KA_III.90.5-9 Ro_IV.469 kimartham idam ucyate . ṛti akaḥ savarṇārtham . savarṇārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . hotṛ ṛśyaḥ . anigantārtham ca . khaṭva ṛśyaḥ , māla ṛśyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5961_0: (P_6,1.128.2) KA_III.90.10-16 Ro_IV.469 ṛti hrasvāt upasargāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:5961_1: . ṛti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti etasmāt upasargāt vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:5961_2: hrasvaḥ bhavati iti etasya avakāśaḥ khaṭva ṛśyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5962: māla ṛśyaḥ . upasargāt vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā hrasvatvam . yadā na hrasvatvam tadā avakāśaḥ . hrasvaprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . upārdhnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5963_0: prārdhnoti . upasargāt vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5963_1: . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam tatra dhātugrahaṇasya prayojanam . upasargāt ṛti dhātau vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5963_2: eva yathā syāt . anyat yat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5964_0: (P_6,1.129) KA_III.90.18-91.8 Ro_IV.469-470 upasthite iti ucyate . kim idam upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:5964_1: nāma . anārṣaḥ itikaraṇaḥ . suślokā3 iti suśloketi . atha vadvacanam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5964_3: . plutakāryam pratiṣidhyate . trimātratā na pratiṣidhyate . kim ca idānīm trimātratāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5964_4: apratiṣedhe prayojanam yāvatā plutakārye pratiṣiddhe svarasandhinā bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5964_5: plutapratiṣedhe hi pragṛhyaplutapratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ anyena vihitatvāt . plutapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:5964_6: hi sati pragṛhyasya api plutasya trimātratāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . agnī3 iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5965_0: vāyū3 iti . kim ca idānīm tasyāḥ api trimātratāyāḥ apratiṣedhe prayojanam yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5965_1: plutakārye pratiṣiddhe svarasandhinā bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5965_2: anyena vihitatvāt . anyena hi lakṣaṇena plutapragṛhyasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ ucyate pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5966_0: (P_6,1.130) KA_III.91.10-14 Ro_IV.470 kimartham idam ucyate . ī3 cākravarmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5966_1: iti anupasthitārtham . anupasthitārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . cinu hi3 idam . cinu hīdam
GS24pmbhasuu:5966_2: . sunu hi3 idam . sunu hīdam . īkāragrahaṇena na arthaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa cākravarmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5966_3: ācāryasya aplutavat bhavati iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . vaśa3 iyam , vaśeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5967_0: (P_6,1.131) KA_III.91.16-20 Ro_IV.471 kimarthaḥ takāraḥ . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5967_1: tatkalaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5967_2: mātrikaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ūṭhi kṛte āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5967_3: . tadartham taparaḥ kṛtaḥ . evamarthaḥ taparaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5968: (P_6,1.135.1) KA_III.91.22-94.2 Ro_IV.471-478 kātpūrvagrahaṇam kimartham . kāt pūrvaḥ yathā syāt . saṃskartā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5969_0: saṃskartum . na etat asti prayojanam . suṭ iti ādiliṅgaḥ ayam karotiḥ ca kakārādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5969_1: . tatra antareṇa kātpūrvagrahaṇam kāt pūrvaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:5969_2: suṭi kātpūrvavacanam akakārādau kātpūrvārtham . suṭi kātpūrvavacanam kriyate akakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:5970_0: sañcaskaruḥ . suṭi kātpūrvavacanam akakārādau kātpūrvārtham iti cet antareṇa api
GS24pmbhasuu:5970_1: tat siddham . suṭi kātpūrvavacanam akakārādau kātpūrvārtham iti cet antareṇa api
GS24pmbhasuu:5970_2: kātpūrvagrahaṇam siddham . katham . dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena . dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5970_3: kriyatām suṭ iti suṭ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . tatra dvirvacanam bhavati iti asya
GS24pmbhasuu:5973_0: sañcaskaruḥ . suṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5973_1: dvirbhūte śabdāntarabhāvāt punaḥ prasaṅgaḥ . dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5973_2: dvirbhūte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ suṭ iti punaḥ suṭ syāt . dvirbhūte śabdāntarabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5973_3: punaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam . suṭi kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5973_4: iti punaḥ dvirvacanam prāpnoti . tathā ca anavasthā . punaḥ suṭ punaḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5973_5: iti cakrakam anavasthā prasajyeta . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ . na hi anavasthākāriṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:5973_6: śāstreṇa bhavitavyam . śāstrataḥ hi nāma vyavasthāt . tatra suṭi kṛte dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5973_7: . dvirvacanena avasthānam bhaviṣyati . aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam . aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5974: samaskārṣīt . abhyāsavyavāye ca . abhyāsavyavāye ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sañcaskaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_0: sañcaskaruḥ . kim ucyate abhyāsavyavāye iti yadā idānīm eva uktam dvirvacanāt suṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_1: vipratiṣedhena iti . avipratiṣedhaḥ vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . avipratiṣedhaḥ vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_2: suṭaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ suṭ . antaraṅgam dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_3: . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . evamartham eva tarhi kātpūrvagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_4: kāt pūrvaḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe api vai kātpūrvagrahaṇe atra na sidhyati . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_5: ayam kātpūrvagrahaṇena śakyaḥ madhye praveśayitum . kim kāraṇam . ādiliṅgaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_6: kriyate karotiḥ ca kakārādiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca lpunaḥ ātideśikaḥ karotiḥ akakārādiḥ . pākṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_7: ayam doṣaḥ . katarasmin pakṣe . suḍvidhau dvaitam bhavati . aviśeṣeṇa vā vihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_8: suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam deśaprakḷptyartham syāt viśeṣeṇa vā vidhiḥ iti . dvirvacanavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_9: ca api dvaitam bhavati . sthāne dvirvacanam syāt dviḥ prayogaḥ vā dvirvacanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_10: . tat yadā dviḥ prayogaḥ dvirvacanam aviśeṣeṇa vihitasya ca suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_11: deśaprakḷptyartham tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadā hi sthāne dvirvacanam tadā yadi aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_12: vihitasya suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam deśaprakḷptyartham atha api viśeṣavidhiḥ na tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_13: doṣaḥ bhavati . dviḥprayoge ca api dvirvacane na doṣaḥ . samparibhyām iti na eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_14: pañcamī . kā tarhi . tṛtīyā . samparibhyām upasṛṣṭasya iti . vyavahitaḥ ca api upasṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_15: bhavati . upadeśivadvacanam ca . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5975_16: liṭiguṇacaṅidīrghapratiṣedhārtham . liṭi guṇārtham caṅi dīrghapratiṣedhārtham . liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_0: sañcaskaruḥ . caṅi dīrghapratiṣedhārtham ca . samaciskarat . liṭi guṇārthena tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_1: na arthaḥ . vakṣyati etat saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne saṃyogopadhāgrahaṇam kṛñartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_2: . caṅi dīrghapratiṣedhena api na arthaḥ . padam iti iyam bhagavataḥ kṛtrimā sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_3: . yuktam iha draṣṭavyam . kim antaraṅgam kim bahiraṅgam iti . dhātūpasargayoḥ kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_4: yat tat antaraṅgam . kutaḥ etat . pūrvam hi dhātuḥ upasargeṇa yujyate paścāt sādhanena
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_5: . na etat sāram . pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa . sādhanam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_6: kriyām nirvartayati . tām upasargaḥ viśinaṣti . abhinirvṛttasya ca arthasya upasargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_7: viśeṣaḥ śakyam kartūm . satyam evam etat . yaḥ tu asau dhātūpasargayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_8: tam abhyantaram kṛtvā dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5976_9: yaḥ hi manyate pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa iti tasya āsyate guruṇā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5977: akarmakaḥ upāsyate guruḥ iti kena sakarmakaḥ syāt . evam kṛtvā suṭ sarvataḥ antaraṅgatarakaḥ bhavati kātpūrvagrahaṇam ca api śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:5978_0: (P_6,1.135.2) KA_III.94.3-20 Ro_IV.478-480 yadi punaḥ ayam suṭ kāt pūrvāntaḥ kriyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5978_1: . kāt pūrvāntaḥ iti cet ruvidhipratiṣedhaḥ . kāt pūrvāntaḥ iti cet kaḥ cit vidheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5978_2: kaḥ cit patiṣedhyaḥ . saṃskartā . samaḥ vidheyaḥ suṭaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . samaḥ tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5978_3: na vidheyaḥ . vakṣyati etat sampuṅkānām satvam ruvidhau hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5978_4: suṭaḥ ca api na pratiṣedhyaḥ . samaḥ suṭi iti dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_0: suṭi sakārādau iti . atha vā padādiḥ kariyṣyate . parādau iḍgrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_1: parādiḥ iḍguṇau prāpnutaḥ . saṃskṛṣīṣṭa . ṛtaḥ ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iṭ prāpnoti . saṃskriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_2: . guṇaḥ artisaṃyogādyoḥ iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi abhaktaḥ kariṣyate . abhakte
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_3: svaraḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ svaraḥ na sidhyati . saṃskaroti . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_4: na prāpnoti . nanu ca suṭ eva atiṅ . na suṭaḥ parasya nighātena bhavitavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_5: kāraṇam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_6: ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā abrāhmaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_7: ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam kṣatriyam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīyā kṛtī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5979_8: . evam iha api atiṅ iti pratiṣedhāt anyasmāt atiṅsadṛśāt kāryam vijñāyate . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5980_1: harṣajīvikākulāyakaraṇeṣu iti vaktavyam . apaskirate vṛṣabhaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ . apaskirate
GS24pmbhasuu:5981_0: (P_6,1.144) KA_III.95.2-9 Ro_IV.480-481 kim idam sātatye iti . santatabhāvaḥ sātatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5981_1: . yadi evam sāntatye iti bhavitavyam . samaḥ hitatatayoḥ vā lopaḥ . samaḥ hitatatayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5984: satatam . samtumunoḥ kāme . samtumunoḥ kāme lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sakāmaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5985: bhoktukāmaḥ . manasi ca iti vaktavyam . samanāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5986: bhoktumanāḥ . avaśyamaḥ kṛtye . avaśyamaḥ kṛtye lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . avaśyabhāvyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5987: (P_6,1.145) KA_III.95.11-14 Ro_IV.481 idam atibahu kriyate sevite ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5989_0: pramāṇe iti . sevitapramāṇayoḥ iti eva siddham . kena idānīm asevite bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5989_1: nañā sevitapratiṣedham vijñāsyāmaḥ . na evam śakyam . sevitaprasaṅge eva syāt . asevite
GS24pmbhasuu:5989_2: na syāt . asevitagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe bahuvrīhiḥ ayam vijñāsyate . avidyamānasevite
GS24pmbhasuu:5990_0: (P_6,1.150) KA_III.95.16-20 Ro_IV.482 viṣkiraḥ śakunau vikiraḥ vā . viṣkiraḥ śakunau
GS24pmbhasuu:5990_1: vikiraḥ vā iti vaktavyam . śakunau vā iti hi ucyamāne śakunau vā syāt anyatra api
GS24pmbhasuu:5990_2: nityam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na vāvacanena śakuniḥ abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5991: viṣkiraḥ iti etat nipātanam śakunau vā nipātyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_0: (P_6,1.147) KA_III.96.2-9 Ro_IV.482-483 āścaryam adbhute . āścaryam adbhute iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_1: iha api yathā syāt . āścaryam uccatā vṛkṣasya . āścaryam nīlā dyauḥ . āścaryam antarikṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_2: abandhanāni nakṣatrāṇi na patanti iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . anitye
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_3: iti eva siddham . iha tāvat āścaryam uccatā vṛkṣasya iti . āścaryagrahaṇena na vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_4: abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . uccatā . sā ca anityā . āścaryam nīlā dyauḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_5: āścaryagrahaṇena dyauḥ abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . nīlatā . sā ca anityā . āścaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_6: antarikṣe abandhanāni nakṣatrāṇi na patanti iti . na āścaryagrahaṇena nakṣatrāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_7: abhisambadhyante . kim tarhi . patanakriyā . sā ca anityā . tatra anitye iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_0: (P_6,1.154) KA_III.96.11-14 Ro_IV.483 maskarigrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham maskarī
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_1: parivrājakaḥ iti . ininā etat matvarthīyena siddham . maskaraḥ asya asti . na vai
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_2: maskaraḥ asya asti iti maskarī parivrājakaḥ . kim tarhi mā kṛta karmāṇi . mā kṛta
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_3: karmāṇi . śāntiḥ vaḥ śreyasī iti āha . ataḥ maskarī parivrājakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5994_1: draṣṭavyaḥ . pāraskaraḥ deśaḥ . kāraskaraḥ vṛkṣaḥ . rathaspā nadī . kiṣkindhā guhā
GS24pmbhasuu:5994_2: . kiṣkuḥ . tadbṛhatoḥ karapatyoḥ coradevatayoḥ suṭ talopaḥ ca . taskaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5995: bṛhaspatiḥ . prāyasya citticittayoḥ suṭ askāraḥ vā . prāyaścittiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5997_0: (P_6,1.158.1) KA_III.97.2-6 Ro_IV.484-485 kim anudāttāni padāni bhavanti ekam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:5997_1: varjayitvā . na iti āha . pade yeṣām udāttaprasaṅgaḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti ekam acam
GS24pmbhasuu:5997_2: varjayitvā . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5999: anudāttāḥ padasya iti vā . na kartavyaḥ . anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti eva siddham . katham . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣyakāḥ eṣām puṣyakāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6000: kālakāḥ eṣām kālakāḥ iti . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ , ghāṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6001_0: (P_6,1.158.2) KA_III.97.7-25 Ro_IV.485-486 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate . āgamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6001_1: vikārasya prakṛteḥ pratyayasya ca pṛthak svaranivṛttyartham ekavarjam padasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6002: anaḍvāhaḥ . vikārasya . asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ . asthnā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6005_0: taittirīyaḥ . eteṣām pade yugapat svaraḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekasya syāt iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6005_1: ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti anudāttam padam ekavarjam . evamartham idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6005_2: . na etat asti prayojanam . yaugapadyam tavai siddham . yat ayam tavai ca antaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6005_3: yugapat iti siddhe yaugapadye yaugapadyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:6005_4: svaraḥ bhavati iti . paryāyaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . paryāyaḥ riktaśāsanāt . yat ayam rikte
GS24pmbhasuu:6005_5: vibhāṣā iti siddhe paryāye paryāyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na paryāyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6005_6: iti . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . etat udātte jñāpakam syāt . svaritena samāviśet .
GS24pmbhasuu:6005_7: svaritena samāveśaḥ prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_0: (P_6,1.158.3) KA_III.98.1-99.21 Ro_IV.487-491 ārabhyamāṇe api etasmin yoge anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_1: vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt . anudātte vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_2: . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ vipratiṣedham je dīrghāt bahvacaḥ iti . saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_3: na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt . asati khalu sambhave vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_4: bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . katham sambhavaḥ yadā anudāttam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_5: ekavarjam iti ucyate . tat iha na asti . kim kāraṇam . na anena udāttatvam pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_6: . kim tarhi anudāttatvam anena kriyate asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayoḥ ca udāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_7: syāt anyeṣām ca anudāttatvam . yadi punaḥ ayam adhikāraḥ vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_8: . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . je dīrghāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_9: ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . upasthitam idam bhavati anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . antyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_10: pūrvam bahvacaḥ . upasthitam idam bhavati anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . tatra pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_11: astu varjyamānatā pareṇa vā iti pareṇa bhaviṣyati paratvāt . na evam śakyam . ṣāṣthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_12: ekaḥ svaraḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ syāt . ye anye saptādhyāyyām svarāḥ te na saṅgṛhītāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_13: . samānodare śayite o ca udāttaḥ . asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_14: tu ekānanudāttatvāt . siddham etat . katham . ekānanudāttatvāt . ekānanudāttam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_15: bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim idam ananudāttatvāt iti . na udāttaḥ anudāttaḥ . na anudāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_16: . ananudāttaḥ . ekaḥ ananudāttaḥ asmin tat idam ekānanudāttam . ekānanudāttatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_17: iti . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_18: vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_19: iyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . kāryakālam hi sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra kāryam tatra upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_20: idam draṣṭavyam . je dīrghāntasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . upasthitam idam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_21: anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . antyāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ . upasthitam idam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_22: anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . tatra pūrveṇa astu varjyamānatā pareṇa vā iti pareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_23: bhaviṣyati paratvāt . atha vā na idam pāribhāṣikānudāttasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_24: . anvarthagrahaṇam . avidyamānodāttam anudāttam iti . ekavarjam iti ca aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_25: sandehāt . ekavarjam iti ca aprasiddhiḥ . kutaḥ sandehāt . na jñāyate kaḥ ekaḥ varjayitavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_26: iti . siddham tu yasmin anudātte udāttavacanānarthakyam tadvarjam . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_27: . katham . yasmin anudātte udāttavacanam anarthakam syāt saḥ ekaḥ varjayitavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_28: prakṛtipratyayayoḥ svarasya sāvakāśatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . prakṛtipratyayayoḥ svarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6006_29: sāvakāśatvāt aprasiddhiḥ syāt . prakṛtisvarasya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttaḥ pratyayaḥ . pacati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6007: paṭhati . pratyayayasvarasya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttā prakṛtiḥ . samatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6009_0: taittirīyaḥ . vipratiṣedhāt pratyayasvaraḥ . vipratiṣedhāt pratyayasvaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6009_1: . na evam . vipratiṣedhe param kāryam iti ucyate . na paraḥ pratyayasvaraḥ . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6009_2: doṣaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati . vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6009_3: pratyayasvaraḥ iti cet kāmyādiṣu citkaraṇam . vipratiṣedhāt pratyayasvaraḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:6011: ṛtīyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . prakṛtisvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . prakṛtisvare pratyayasvarābhāvaḥ . prakṛtisvare pratyayasvarasya abhāvaḥ . kartavyam,
GS24pmbhasuu:6012_0: taittirīyaḥ . siddham tu prakṛtisvarabalīyastvāt pratyayasvarabhāvaḥ . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6012_1: . katham . prakṛtisvarāt balīyastvāt pratyayasvarasya bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . prakṛtisvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6013_1: balīyān bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat ca anekapratyayasamāsārtham . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6013_2: satiśiṣṭasvarabalīyastvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . anekapratyayārtham anekasamāsārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6013_3: ca . anekapratyayārtham tāvat . aupagavaḥ . prakṛtisvaram aṇsvaraḥ bādhate . aupagavatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6013_4: . tvasvaraḥ aṇsvaram bādhate . aupagavatvakam . tvasvaram kasvaraḥ bādhate . anekasamāsārtham . rājapuruṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6015: rājapuruṣaputrapuruṣaḥ . yadi satiśiṣṭasvarabalīyastvam ucyate syādisvaraḥ sārvadhātukasvaram bādheta . sunutaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_0: cinutaḥ . syādisvarāprasaṅgaḥ ca tāseḥ parasya anudāttavacanāt . syādisvarasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_1: aprasaṅgaḥ . kutaḥ . tāseḥ parasya anudāttavacanāt . yat ayam tāseḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_2: anudāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ satiśiṣṭaḥ api vikaraṇasvaraḥ lasārvadhātukasvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_3: na bādhate . śāstraparavipratiṣedhāniyamāt vā śabdavipratiṣedhāt siddham . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_4: śāstraparavipratiṣedhe na sarvam iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati iti kṛtvā śabdavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6016_5: vijñāsyate . yadi śabdavipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati kāmyādayaḥ citaḥ kartavyāḥ . putrakāmyati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6018_0: ṛtīyate . śabdavipratiṣedhaḥ nāma bhavati yatra ubhayoḥ yugapatprasaṅgaḥ na ca kāmyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6018_1: yugapatprasaṅgaḥ . vibhaktisvarāt nañsvaraḥ balīyān . vibhaktisvarāt nañsvaraḥ balīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:6018_2: iti vaktavyam . vibhaktisvarasya avakāśaḥ . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti . nañsvarasya avakāśaḥ . abrāhmaṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6019_0: avṛṣalaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . atisraḥ . nañsvaraḥ bhavati . vibhaktinimittasvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6019_1: ca . vibhaktinimittasvarāt ca nañsvaraḥ balīyān iti vaktavyam . vibhaktinimittasvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6020_0: anaḍvāhaḥ . nañsvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . acatvāraḥ . ananaḍvāhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6020_1: . yat ca upapadam kṛti nañ . yat ca upapadam kṛti nañ tasya svaraḥ balīyān iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6020_2: . akaraṇiḥ hi te vṛṣala . sahanirdiṣṭasya ca . sahanirdiṣṭasya ca nañaḥ svaraḥ balīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:6021_0: (P_6,1.159) KA_III.101.6-12 Ro_IV.494 kimartham kṛṣateḥ vikṛtasya grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6021_1: na kṛṣātvataḥ iti eva ucyeta . yasya kṛṣeḥ vikaraṇe etat rūpam tasya yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6021_2: iha mā bhūt . halasya karṣaḥ iti . atha kimartham matupā nirdeśaḥ kriyate na karṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6021_3: iti eva ucyeta . karṣāt iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva ākārāt anantaraḥ ghañ asti tatra eva syāt : dāyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6023: pāṭhaḥ . na kva cit ākārāt anantaraḥ ghañ asti . iha api dāyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6024: dhāyaḥ iti yukā vyavadhānam . evam api vihitaviṣeṣanam ākāragrahaṇam vijñāyeta . ākārāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . matubgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_0: (P_6,1.161.1) KA_III.101.14-102.2 Ro_IV.494-495 anudāttasya iti kimartham . prāsaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_1: vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ . udāttalope svaritodāttayoḥ abhāvāt anudāttagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_2: . udāttalope svaritodāttayoḥ abhāvāt anudāttagrahaṇam anarthakam . ha hi kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_3: udāttaḥ udātte svarite vā lupyate . sarvaḥ anudātte eva . nan ca ayam udāttaḥ svarite
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_4: lupyate . prāsaṅgam vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ iti . eṣaḥ api nighāte kṛte anudātte eva lupyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_5: . idam iha sampradhāryam . nighātaḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_6: lopaḥ . evam tarhi ayam adya nighātasvaraḥ sarvasvarāṇām apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_7: utsargaḥ bhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_8: vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit thāthādisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_9: bhavati . apavādam nighātam pratīkṣate . tatra nighātaḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:6025_10: paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ asau avidyamānodāttaḥ anudāttaḥ lupyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6026_0: (P_6,1.161.2) KA_III.102.3-20 Ro_IV.495-497 kim punaḥ anudāttasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6026_1: āhosvit ādiḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . antaḥ iti cet śnamksayuṣmadasmadidaṅkiṃlopeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6026_2: svaraḥ . antaḥ iti cet śnamksayuṣmadasmadidaṅkiṃlopeṣu svaraḥ na sidhyati . śnam . vindate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6027: khindate . śnam . ksa . mā hi dhukṣātām . mā hi dhukṣāthām . ksa . yuṣmadasmad . yuṣmabhyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6029: kiyān . astu tarhi ādiḥ . ādiḥ iti cet indhīta dvayam iti antaḥ . ādiḥ iti cet indhīta dvayam iti antodāttatvam na sidhyati . indhīta . dvayam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_0: trayam . ādau siddham . astu tarhi ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca uktam ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_1: iti cet indhīta dvayam iti antaḥ iti . vidīndhikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_2: liṅi siddham . vidīndhikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam liṅi na iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_3: . liṅgrahaṇena na arthaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa ikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_4: liṅi siddham . vidīndhikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam na iti eva . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:6031: khindate . ayaci katham . ayaci citkaraṇāt . ayaci citkaraṇasāmarthyāt antodāttatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_0: (P_6,1.162) KA_III.102.22-103.25 Ro_IV.497-499 kim dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_1: ādiḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam . dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_2: antaḥ iti cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam kartavyam . abhyastānām ādiḥ anudātte ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_3: vaktavyam . bagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . bāntaḥ ca pibiḥ ādyudāttaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_4: . pibati . san ca nit . san ca nit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . cikīrṣati jihīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_5: . niti iti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . astu tarhi ādiḥ . ādau ūrṇapratyayadhātuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_6: antodāttatvam . ādau ūrṇapratyayadhātuṣu antodāttatvam na sidhyati . ūrṇoti . ūrṇu
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_0: ṛtīyate . antodāttavacanāt siddham . astu tarhi antodāttaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_1: uktam dhātoḥ antaḥ iti cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_2: . anudātte ca grahaṇam kartavyam iti . kriyate nyāse eva . abhyastānām ādiḥ anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_3: ca iti . bagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . pibau nipātanāt . pibau ādyudāttanipātanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_4: . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . san ca nit kartavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_5: . avaśyam sanaḥ viśeṣaṇārthaḥ nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . sanyaṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6034_6: iti . sayaṅoḥ iti iyati ucyamāne haṃsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6036: atra api prāpnoti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . jugupsate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_0: mīmāṃsate iti . arthavān eṣaḥ . na vai kaḥ cit arthaḥ ādiśyate . yadi api kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_1: arthaḥ na ādiśyate anirdiṣṭārthāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti antataḥ svārthe bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6037_2: . kaḥ ca asya svārthaḥ . prakṛtyarthaḥ . iha api prāpnoti . haṃsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6038_0: vatsaḥ iti . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6038_1: . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . atha vā dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātoḥ saśabdāntasya dve bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6039_0: (P_6,1.163) KA_III.104.2-7 Ro_IV.500 citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham . citaḥ saprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6039_1: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . bahvakajartham . bahujartham akajartham ca . bahujartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6045_0: viśvake . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6045_1: puṣyakāḥ eṣām puṣyakāḥ kālakāḥ eṣām kālakāḥ iti . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6046: ghāṭaḥ iti . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ ca citvān citaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_0: (P_6,1.166) KA_III.104.9-22 Ro_IV.500-501 jasaḥ iti kimartham . tisṛkā . tisṛbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_1: jasgrahaṇānarthakyam anyatra abhāvāt . tisṛbhyaḥ jasgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_2: . anyatra abhāvāt . na hi anyat tisṛśabdāt antodāttatvam prayojayati anyat ataḥ jasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_3: . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayaḥ eva tisṛśabdaḥ . tena ekavacanadvivacane na staḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_4: . śasi bhavitavyam udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_5: . tatra ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ halādiḥ jhali upottamam iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_6: tatra antareṇa jasaḥ grahaṇam jasaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm eva udāhṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_7: tisṛkā iti . nitsvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte anyasvare tisṛsvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_8: ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva anudāttau suppitau iti etam svaram bādhate evam nitsvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_9: api bādheta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_10: anudāttau suppitau iti etasmin tisṛsvaraḥ ārabhyate . nitsvaraḥ punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_11: ca . atha vā madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam tisṛsvaraḥ anudāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:6047_12: suppitau iti svaram bādhiṣyate nitsvaram na bādhiṣyate . upasamastārtham eke jasaḥ grahaṇam icchanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_0: (P_6,1.167) KA_III.105.2-106.7 Ro_IV.502-504 śasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_1: catasraḥ paśya . caturaḥ śasi striyām apratiṣedhaḥ ādyudāttanipātanāt . caturaḥ śasi
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_2: striyām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . śasi svaraḥ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_3: bhavati . ādyudāttanipātanāt . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_4: śasi svarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_5: nipātanasvaraḥ śasi svaram bādhate evam vibhaktisvaram api bādheta catasṛṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_6: . vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca halādigrahaṇāt . vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca siddhaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_7: . halādigrahaṇāt . yat ayam ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ halādiḥ iti halādigrahaṇam karoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_8: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na nipātanasvaraḥ vibhaktisvaram bādhate iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_9: . ādyudāttanipātane hi halādigrahaṇānarthakyam . ādyudāttanipātane hi sati halādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_10: anarthakam syāt . na hi anyat halādigrahaṇam prayojayati anyat ataḥ catasṛśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_11: . ṣaṭsañjñāḥ tāvat na prayojayanti . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_12: na staḥ . jaśśasī ca atra lupyete . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . triśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_13: ca api na prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_14: na staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt jasi na bhaviṣyati . śasi bhavitavyam ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_15: udāttena udāttaḥ iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . tisṛśabdaḥ ca api na
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_16: prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_17: . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt jasi na bhavitavyam . śasi bhavitavyam udāttayaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_18: halpūrvāt iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . catuḥśabdaḥ tisṛśabdaḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_19: na prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane na
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_20: staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt jasi na bhavitavyam . śasi bhavitavyam caturaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_21: śasi iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . tatra catasṛśabdāt ekasmāt śas asarvanāmasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_22: ajādiḥ vibhaktiḥ asti . yadi ca atra nipātanasvaraḥ syāt halādigrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_23: syāt . na eva vā punaḥ atra śasisvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . yaṇādeśe kṛte śasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_24: pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā . avaśiṣṭasya tarhi prāpnoti . ṛkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_25: na bhaviṣyati . yaṇādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_26: . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ svaravidhim prati na sthānivat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_27: na eṣaḥ asti pratiṣedhaḥ . uktam etat pratiṣedhe svaradīrghayalopeṣu lopādādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6050_0: (P_6,1.168.1) KA_III.106.9-18 Ro_IV.504-505 sau iti kim idam prathamaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6050_1: grahaṇam āhosvit saptamībahuvacanasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . saptamībahuvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6050_2: grahaṇam . katham jñāyate . yat ayam na gośvansāvavarṇa iti gośunoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:6050_3: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yadi prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam syāt gośunoḥ pratiṣedhavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6050_4: anarthakam syāt . nanu ca arthasiddhiḥ eva eṣā . anugṛhītāḥ smaḥ yaiḥ asmābhiḥ prathamaikavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6050_5: āsthāya gośunoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . bhavet pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6050_6: doṣāḥ tu bhavanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . svinā khinā . antodāttatvam na prāpnoti . svinkhinau
GS24pmbhasuu:6050_7: na staḥ . uktam etat ekākṣarāt kṛtaḥ jāteḥ saptamyām ca na tau smṛtau . svavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6051: khavān iti eva bhavitavyam . iha tarhi yādbhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6052: yābhiḥ iti na sidhyati . tasmāt saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6053_0: (P_6,1.168.2) KA_III.106.19-25 Ro_IV.505-506 sau ekācaḥ udāttatve tvanmadoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6053_1: . sau ekācaḥ udāttatve tvanmadoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tvayā mayā . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:6053_2: yasmāt tṛtīyādiḥ tasya abhāvāt sau . siddham etat . katham . yasmāt atra tṛtīyādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6053_3: vibhaktiḥ na tat sau asti . yadi api etat sau na asti prakṛtiḥ tu asya sau asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6053_4: prakṛteḥ ca anekāctvāt . yadi api tasya prakṛtiḥ asti sau anekāc tu sā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6054_0: (P_6,1.169) KA_III.107.2-5 Ro_IV.506 uttarapadagrahaṇam kimartham . yathā ekājgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6054_1: uttarapadaviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . ekācaḥ uttarapadāt iti . atha akriyamāṇe uttarapadagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6054_2: kasya ekājgrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . samāsaviśeṣaṇam . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit ekāc
GS24pmbhasuu:6054_3: samāsaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:6057_0: (P_6,1.171) KA_III.107.7-10 Ro_IV.507 padādiṣu nicantāni prayojayanti . anyāni padādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:6057_1: udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddhāni . ūṭhi upadhāgrahaṇam antyapratiṣedhārtham . ūṭhi upadhāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6057_2: kartavyam . kim prayojanam . antyapratiṣedhārtham . antyasya mā bhūt . akṣadyuvā , akṣadyuve .
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_0: (P_6,1.172) KA_III.107.13-22 Ro_IV.507-508 dīrghagrahaṇam kimartham . aṣṭasu prakrameṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_1: brāhmaṇaḥ ādadhīta . dīrghāt iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati aṣṭasu prakrameṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_2: brāhmaṇaḥ ādadhīta iti . ṣaṭsvaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte ṣaṭsvare aṣṭanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_3: svaraḥ ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva dīrghāt bādhate evam hrasvāt api bādheta . na dīrghāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_4: ṣaṭsvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . āte kṛte ṣaṭsañjñābhāvāt . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_5: aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam ṣaṭsañjñājñāpakam ākārāntasya nuḍartham . aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_6: kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati ātve kṛte ṣaṭsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_7: iti . kim etasya jñapane prayojanam . ākārāntasya nuḍartham . ākārāntasya nuḍ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_8: bhavati . aṣṭānām iti . nanu ca nityam ātvam . etat eva jñāpayati vibhāṣā ātvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6058_9: yat ayam dīrghagrahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi aṣṭanaḥ iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6059: (P_6,1.173) KA_III.2-4 Ro_IV.508 nadyajādyudāttatve bṛhanmahatoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . nadyajādyudāttatve bṛhanmahatoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . bṛhatī mahatī bṛhatā mahatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6060_0: (P_6,1.174) KA_III.108.6-16 Ro_IV.509-510 halpūrvāt iti kimartham . agnaye vāyave
GS24pmbhasuu:6060_1: . udāttayaṇi halgrahaṇam nakārāntārtham . udāttayaṇi halgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6060_2: prayojanam . nakārāntārtham . nakārāntāt api yathā syāt . vākpatnī citpatnī . halpūrvagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6060_3: ca samudāyādeśatvāt . halpūrvagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāṛaṇam . samudāyādeśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6060_4: . samudāyaḥ atra ādeśaḥ . svaritatve ca avacanāt . svaritatve ca halpūrvagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6060_5: avacanāt manyāmahe halpūrvagrahaṇam anarthakam iti . yat tāvat ucyate udāttayaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:6060_6: halgrahaṇam nakārāntārtham iti kriyate nyāse eva . dvinakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ . udāttayaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6060_7: halpūrvāt na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti . yat api ucyate halpūrvagrahaṇānarthakyam ca samudāyādeśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6060_8: iti . ayam asti kevalaḥ ādeśaḥ . bahutitavā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6061_1: regrahaṇam kartavyam . ā revān etu naḥ viśaḥ . tripratiṣedhaḥ ca . treḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6062: (P_6,1.177) KA_III.109.2-21 Ro_IV.510-512 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kiśorīṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6063: kumārīṇām . hrasvāt iti vartate . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . agnīnām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6064_0: vāyūnām . kim kāraṇam . dīrghatve kṛte hrasvābhāvāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6064_1: kriyatām svaraḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvam . evam tarhi nāmsvare
GS24pmbhasuu:6064_2: matau hrasvagrahaṇam . nāmsvare matau hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam . matau hrasvāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6064_3: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . āha ayam hrasvāntāt na ca nāmi hrasvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6065: hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . sāmpratikābhāve bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyate ayam ca asti sāmpratikaḥ : tisṛṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_0: catasṛṇām iti . na etat asti . ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ halādiḥ iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_1: . tasmin nitye prāpte iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_2: . ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ nām udāttaḥ bhavati . tataḥ halādiḥ . halādiḥ ca vibhaktiḥ udāttā
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_3: bhavati ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ iti . idam tarhi tvam nṛṇam nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_4: atra api nṛ ca anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_5: sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . jhalgrahaṇam tatra anuvartate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_6: tatra anuvartate . iha mā bhūt . nrā nre . udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_7: atra svaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi nari . na ekam udāharam hrasvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_8: prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt nām iti eva brūyāt . tatra vacanāt bhūtapūrvagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_9: vijñāsyate . hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . atha vā na evam vijñāyate . nām svarau
GS24pmbhasuu:6066_10: matau hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . katham tarhi . nāmsvare matau hrasvāt iti vartate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6067_0: (P_6,1.182) KA_III.109.23-110.11 Ro_IV.512-513 sau iti kim prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6067_1: āhosvit saptamībahuvacanasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . purastāt eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6067_2: nirṇayaḥ saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam iti . iha api tat eva bhavitum arhati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:6068: yābhyām brāhmaṇābhyām atra na prāpnoti . vidhiḥ api atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi etat bhavati yat sau rūpam . idam tarhi tebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6069_0: yebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ . vidhiḥ ca sidddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ tu na prāpnoti . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6069_1: punaḥ kim cit sati iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati āhosvit doṣāntam eva . asti iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:6070_0: tābhyaḥ brāhmaṇībhyaḥ iti vidhiḥ ca sidddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca . asti tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6070_1: prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam . yadi prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam tena iti svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6070_2: puṃsi na sidhyati . na ca avaśyam puṃsi eva striyām puṃsi napuṃsake ca . tena brāhmaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6070_3: tayā brāhmaṇyā tena kuṇḍena iti . saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇe api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6070_4: ubhābhyām eva pratiṣedhe yattatadoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam . na gośvansāvavarṇarāḍaṅkruṅkṛdbhyaḥ yattadoḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6071: (P_6,1.185) KA_III.13-24 Ro_IV.514-515 titi pratyayagrahaṇam . titi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ . kirati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6072_0: girati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6072_1: . yadi dakāraḥ āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti . bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6072_2: na iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yadi bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti ucyate adasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6073_0: amūbhyām iti atra na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ukāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6073_1: bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam iti yat ayam divaḥ ut iti ukāram taparam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6073_2: . evamartham eva tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam atra mā bhūt iti . na eṣaḥ takāharaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6073_3: . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . yadi dakāraḥ na jñāpakam bhavati . evam tarhi taparaḥ tatkālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6073_4: iti dakāraḥ api cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . yadi evam cartvasya asiddhatvāt haśi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6073_5: iti uttvam prāpnoti . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā asaṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6075_0: (P_6,1.186.1) KA_III.111.3-16 Ro_IV.515-517 adupadeśāt iti kim idam vijñāyate . akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6075_1: yaḥ upadeśaḥ iti āhosvit akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6076_0: hathaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6076_1: bhavati . nanu ca akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti vijñāyamāne api atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6076_2: etat api hi vyapadeśivadbhāvena akārāntam bhavati upadeśe . arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6076_3: . yadi tarhi akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti vijñāyate mā hi dhukṣātām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6077_0: mā hi dhuṣāthām atra api prāpnoti . astu . anudāttatve kṛte lope udāttanivṛttisvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6077_1: siddham . na sidhyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . adnudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6077_2: kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi idam adya lasārvadhādukānudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6077_3: pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:6077_4: apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utasrgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6077_5: abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . apavādaviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6077_6: lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam pratīkṣate . tatra ānudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6077_7: atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ asau avidyamānodātte
GS24pmbhasuu:6078_1: abhyastasijarthaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatve saptamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . lasārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:6078_2: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . abhyastasijarthaḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6078_3: lasārvadhātuke . sijantasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati lasārvadhātuke . lasārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:6078_4: iti ucyamāne tasya eva ādyudāttatvam syāt . yadi saptamīnirdeśaḥ kriyate tāsyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6078_5: eva anudāttatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tāsiyādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī lasārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:6078_6: iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_1: vipratiṣedhena . citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya avakāśaḥ calanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6080: copanaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ . āste śete . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āsīnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6081_0: śayānaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6081_1: . kim kāraṇam . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ . na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6081_2: ādeḥ anudāttatvam antasya udāttatvam . na avaśyam dvikāryayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6081_3: . kim tarhi. asambhavaḥ api . nanu ca atra api asti sambhavaḥ . ādeḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6081_4: antasya udāttatvam iti . asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . na eṣaḥ asti sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6081_5: . vakṣyati etat svaravidhau saṅghātaḥ kāryī bhavati iti . mukaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6082_0: yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6082_1: na prāpnoti . nanu ca ayam muk adupadeśabhaktaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6082_2: sidhyati . aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca aṅgam . saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6082_3: muk adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum . atha ayam adbhaktaḥ syāt gṛhyeta ayam adupadeśagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6082_4: . bāḍham gṛhyeta . adbhaktaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . tat katham . vakṣyati etasya parihāram
GS24pmbhasuu:6082_5: . itaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . itaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . idbhiḥ ca vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6083: paṭhataḥ . itaḥ ca anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . yadi anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ adiprabhṛtijuhotyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . attaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6084_0: juhutaḥ iti . adupadeśāt iti anudāttatvam prāpnoti . tatra adiprabhṛtijuhotyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6084_1: apratiṣedhaḥ sthānyādeśābhāvāt . tatra adiprabhṛtibhyaḥ juhotyādibhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6084_2: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anudāttatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sthānyādeśābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6084_3: . na eva atra sthāninam na eva ādeśam paśyāmaḥ . anudāttaṅidgrahaṇāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6084_4: yat ayam anudāttaṅidgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na luptavikaraṇebhyaḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6084_5: bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . śnanartham etat syāt . vindāte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6085: khindāte . yat tarhi ṅidgrahaṇam karoti . na hi śnamvikaraṇaḥ ṅit bhavati . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinutaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6088_0: punītaḥ . ṅitaḥ iti anudāttatvam prāpnoti . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6088_1: sarvasya upadeśaviśeṣaṇatvāt . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6088_2: pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anudāttatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sarvasya upadeśaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6091: (P_6,1.187) KA_III.113.10-12 Ro_IV.520-521 sicaḥ ādyudāttatve aniṭaḥ pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . sicaḥ ādyudāttatve aniṭaḥ pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . mā hi karṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6092: mā hi kārṣam . aniṭaḥ iti kimartham . mā hi laviṣam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6093_0: (P_6,1.188) KA_III.113.14-17 Ro_IV.521 svapādīnām vāvacanāt abhyastasvaraḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6093_1: . svapādīnām vāvacanāt abhyastasvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svapādīnām vāvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6093_2: avakāśaḥ svapanti śvasanti . abhyastasvarasya avakāśaḥ dadati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6094: dadhati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . jagrati . abhyastasvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_0: (P_6,1.190) KA_III.113.19-22 Ro_IV.521 anudātte ca iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ lopayaṇādeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_1: . anudātte ca iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . avidyamānodātte iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_2: prayojanam . lopayaṇādeśārtham . lopayaṇādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6096: (P_6,1.191.1) KA_III.114.2-3 Ro_IV.522 sarvasvaraḥ anackasya . sarvasvaraḥ anackasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt sarvake .
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_0: (P_6,1.191.2) KA_III.114.6-115.2 Ro_IV.522-525 bhyādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_1: bhūt . dadāti dadhāti . na etat asti prayojanam . abhyastasvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_2: . antataḥ ubhayam syāt . anavakāśāḥ khalu api vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_3: ca abhyastasvaraḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . mimīte . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_4: pūrvasya udāttatvam yathā syāt . āṭaḥ pūrvasya mā bhūt iti . bibhayāni . na ca eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_5: asti viśeṣaḥ pratyayāt vā pūrvasya udāttatve sati āṭaḥ vā . api ca pidbhaktaḥ pidgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_6: grāhiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . pratyayāt pūrvasya udāttatvam yathā syāt . āṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_7: eva mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . pidbhaktaḥ pidgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_8: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pratyayagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svaravidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_9: saṅghātaḥ kāryī bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_10: anudāttatvam vipratiṣedhena iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati . atha pūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_11: kimartham na tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti pūrvasya eva bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_12: siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svaravidhau saptamyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_13: tadantasaptamyaḥ bhavanti iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . upottamam riti ridantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_14: . caṅi anyatarasyām caṅantasya . yadi etat jñāpyate caturaḥ śasi iti śasantasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_15: prāpnoti . śasgrahaṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . itarathā hi tatra eva ayam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_16: ūḍidampadādyappumraidyubhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ ca iti . atha pidgrahaṇam kimartham . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_17: mā bhūt . jāgrati. na etat asti prayojanam . bhavati eva atra pūrveṇa . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_18: prayojanam daridrati . ākāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6097_19: . sthānivadbhāvād vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ svarasandhim
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_0: (P_6,1.195) KA_III.115.4-21 Ro_IV.525-526 yaki rapare upasaṅkhyānam . yaki rapare
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_1: upasaṅkhyānamkartavyam . stīryate svayam eva . upadeśavacanāt siddham . upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_2: vaktavyam . upadeśavacane janādīnām . upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_3: . jayate svayam eva . jāyate svayam eva . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_4: . ajantānām kartṛyaki vā ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . cīyate svayam eva . ciyate svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_5: eva . jayate svayam eva . jāyate svayam eva . tataḥ upadeśe . upadeśe ca ajantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_6: kartṛyaki vā ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . stīryate svayam eva . stīryate svayam eva . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_7: tarhi upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . na hi antareṇa upadeśagrahaṇam yogāṅgam jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_8: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tāsyanudāttenṅidadupadeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_9: lasārvadhātukam anudāttam ahnviṅoḥ iti . nanu ca uktam upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_10: na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_11: na sidhyati iti . katham tarhi . janādīnām api āttve upadeśavacanam kartavyam . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_12: tarhi tatra upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:6098_13: prakṛtam . anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ jhali kṅiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6099_0: (P_6,1.196) KA_III.115.23-116.1 Ro_IV.526 seḍgrahaṇam kimartham na thali iṭ antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6099_1: vā iti ucyeta . iṭ antaḥ vā iti ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta papaktha . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6099_2: prayojanam . acaḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi prayojanam yayātha iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_0: (P_6,1.204) KA_III.116.3-21 Ro_IV.527-528 kimartham idam ucyate na ñniti ādiḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_1: iti eva siddham . ñniti iti ucyate na ca atra ñnitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_2: . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . aṅgādhikāroktasya saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_3: na lumatā aṅgasya iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati upamānasya ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_5: jñāpakārtham kriyate . kim jñāpyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anubandhalakṣaṇe svare
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_6: pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . gargaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6106: ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt iti . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:6108: taddhitasya kitaḥ iti antodāttatvam na bhavati . yadi anubandhalakṣaṇe iti ucyate pathipriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6110: pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryaḥ jñāpayati svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api sarpiḥ āgaccha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6112: āmantritasya ca iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . iha ca : ma hi datām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6114: ādiḥ sicaḥ anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ saptamīnirdiṣṭe svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api sarvastomaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6116: sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi anubandhalakṣaṇe iti eva . katham pathipriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6118: pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne luki lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6119: (P_6,1.205) KA_III.116.23-117.12 Ro_IV.529-530 niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dattābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6120: guptābhyām . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ atra dīrghaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6121_0: antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . antareṇa pratiṣedham antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6121_1: ca etām paribhāṣām siddham . katham . na evam vijñāyate na cet ākārāntā niṣṭhā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6121_2: . katham tarhi . na cet ākārāt parā niṣṭhā iti . yadi evam nirdeśaḥ ca eva na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6121_3: . na hi eṣā ākārāt parā pañcamī yuktā . iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6122: rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na cet avarṇāt parā niṣṭhā iti . bhavet nirdeśaḥ upapannaḥ . iha tu prāpnoti . āptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6123: rāddhaḥ iti . iha ca na prāpnoti . yataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6124: rataḥ . evam tarhi vihitaviśeṣaṇam akāragrahaṇam . na cet akārārāntāt vihitā niṣṭhā iti . evam api dattaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6125: atra na prāpnoti iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6126: rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi kāryiviśeṣaṇam akāragrahaṇam . na cet ākārāraḥ kāryī bhavati . evam api adya aṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6128: atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6130_0: (P_6,1.207) KA_III.117.14-19 Ro_IV.530 kim nipātyate . āśite kartari nipātanam upadhādīrhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6130_1: ādyudāttatvam ca . āśitaḥ iti ktaḥ kartari nipātyate upadhādīrhatvam . āśitavān āśitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6130_2: . ādyudāttatvam ca nipātyate . ādyudāttatvam anipātyam . adhikārāt siddham . upadhādīrhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6130_3: anipātyam . āṅpūrvasya prayogaḥ . yadi evam avagrahaḥ prāpnoti . na lakṣaṇena padakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6130_4: anuvartyāḥ . padkāraiḥ nāma lakṣaṇam anuvartyam . yathālakṣaṇam padam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6131: (P_6,1.208, 215) KA_III.117.22-118.3 Ro_IV.531 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . yadi sañjñāyām upamānam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6132_0: niṣṭhā ca dvyac anāt iti nitye prāpte ārambhaḥ tata prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . veṇuriktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6132_1: aprāpte . veṇuriktayoḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . veṇuḥ iva veṇuḥ . riktaḥ nāma kaḥ cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:6133_0: (P_6,1.217) KA_III.118.5-8 Ro_IV. 531 upottamagrahaṇam kimarthan na riti pūrvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6133_1: eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . matoḥ pūrvam āt sañjñāyām striyām iti atra pūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6133_2: na kartavyam bhavati . evam tarhi upottamagrahaṇam uttarārtham . caṅi anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6133_3: upottamam iti eva . iha mā bhūt . mā hi sma dadhat .
GS24pmbhasuu:6134: (P_6,1.220-221) KA_III.118.11-15 Ro_IV.532 kimartham idam ucyate na vatyāḥ iti eva ucyate . vatyāḥ iti iyati ucyamāne rājavatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6135_0: atra api prasajyeta . atha avatyāḥ iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6135_1: nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na eṣaḥ avatīśabdaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . anvatīśabdaḥ . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6135_2: eva tarhi nalopasya asiddhatvāt na avatīśabdaḥ evam vatvasya api asiddhatvāt na avatīśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6136: (P_6,1.222) KA_III.118.17-119.14 Ro_IV.532-534 coḥ ataddhite . cusvaraḥ ataddhite iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dādhīcaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6137_0: mādhūcaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . pratyayasvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6137_1: bhaviṣyati . sthānāntaraprāptaḥ cusvaraḥ . pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ anudāttau suppitau
GS24pmbhasuu:6137_2: iti . anudāttau suppitau iti asya udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ . udāttanivṛttisvarasya cusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6137_3: . saḥ yathā eva udāttanivṛttisvaram bādhate evam pratyayasvaram api bādheta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6137_4: atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6137_5: . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6137_6: tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti dadhīcaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na tṛtīyādilakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6137_7: pratiṣedham ṣiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . yena kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6138_0: plakṣavān atra na prāpnoti . matubgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6138_1: . hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti . yadi tat anuvartate vetasvān iti atra prāpnoti . matubgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6138_2: anuvartate ḍmatup ca eṣaḥ . yadi tari matubgrahaṇe ḍmatupaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati vetasvān
GS24pmbhasuu:6138_3: iti atra vatvam na prāpnoti . sāmānyagrahaṇam vatve iha punaḥ viśiṣṭasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6138_4: . yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ na asti dadhīcī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6138_5: api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta kumārī iti . satiśiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6138_6: khalu api cusvaraḥ . katham . cau iti ucyate . yatra asya etat rūpam . ajādau asarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:6138_7: abhinirvṛtte akāralope nakāralope ca . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate coḥ ataddhite iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6139: (P_6,1.223) KA_III.119.16-120.24 Ro_IV.534-537 samāsāntodāttatve vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam . samāsāntodāttatve vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : rājadṛṣat,
GS24pmbhasuu:6140_0: brāhmaṇasamit . halsvaraprāptau vā vyañjanam avidyamānavat . atha vā halsvaraprāptau
GS24pmbhasuu:6140_1: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kimartham idam ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6140_2: ucyate na halsvaraprāptau avidyamānavat iti eva ucyate svaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:6140_3: bhavati iti vā . dvirbaddham subaddham bhavati iti . yadi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6141_0: udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti svaritatvam na prāpnoti . udāttāt ca svaravidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6141_1: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6141_2: prayojanāni . prayojanam lidādyudāttāntodāttvidhayaḥ . liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:6144: jihīrṣakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6147_0: kṛtiḥ iti atra na syāt . dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva syāt ūrṇoti . pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:6147_1: iti atra na syāt . idam tāvat yat ucyate halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:6147_2: bhavati iti katham hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . tat ca api bruvatā udāttāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6147_3: svaravidhau iti vaktavyam . tathā anudāttādeḥ antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat vyañjanādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6147_4: vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6147_5: iti ucyeta . atha svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti ucyamāne anudāttādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6147_6: antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat kim siddham bhavati vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca . bāḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:6147_7: siddham . katham . svaravidhiḥ iti sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6149: svarasya vidhiḥ svaravidhiḥ iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . udaśvitvān ghoṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6150_0: vidyutvān balāhakaḥ iti . hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:6150_1: tarhi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti . nanu ca uktam katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6150_2: hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . uccaiḥ udāttaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_0: nīcaiḥ anudāttaḥ iti atra ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam nivṛttam . tasmin nivṛtte halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_1: api svaraprāptiḥ bhavati . yat api ucyate udāttāt ca svaravidhau iti vaktavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_2: . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya anudāttasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_3: . avidyamānodāttam anudāttam . tasya svaritaḥ iti . yat api ucyate tat vyañjanādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_4: vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddham tat bhavati vyañjanādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_5: vyañjanāntāt ca iti yat ayam na uttarapade anudāttādau iti uktvā apṛthivīrudralkpūṣamanthiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_6: iti pratiṣedham śāsti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_7: jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā yat ayam yataḥ anāvaḥ iti nāvaḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_0: (P_6,2.1) KA_III.121.2-123.3 Ro_IV.538-542 kimartham idam ucyate . bahuvrīhisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_1: śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ sukṛt . sukṛt ācāryaḥ samāsāntodāttatve prāpte bahuvrīhisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_2: apavādam śāsti . na etat asti prayojanam . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . nañsubhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_3: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . nañsubhyām eva bahuvrīheḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_4: na anyasya iti . evam api kutat etat pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_5: parasya iti . parasya śitiśāsanāt . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_6: . śiteḥ eva na anyataḥ iti . yat tāvat ucyate nañsubhyām niyamārtham iti kṣepe vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_7: nañaḥ asiddhaḥ . udarāśveṣuṣu kṣepe iti etasmin prāpte tataḥ etat ucyate . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_8: ucyate parasya śitiśāsanāt iti parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . parasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6152_9: . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti . yadi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaram samāsāntodāttatvam bādhate capriyaḥ vāpriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6153_0: atra api prāpnoti . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . antodāttatvam cavāpriye siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6153_1: kutaḥ . sambhavāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . asti ca sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6153_2: yat ubhayam syāt . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6153_3: dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6153_4: bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaram samāsāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6153_5: bādhiṣyate . evam tarhi prakṛtāt vidheḥ . bahuvrīhau prkṛtyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6153_6: bhavati iti . kim ca prakṛtam . udāttaḥ iti ca vartate . evam api kāryapriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_0: atra na prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti . atha vā svaritagrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_1: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tit svaritam iti . bahuvrīhau ṛte siddham . antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_2: api bahuvrīhigrahaṇam siddham . tatpuruṣe kasmāt na bhavati . tatpuruṣe tulyārthatṛtīyāsaptamyupamānāvyayadvitīyākṛtyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_3: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvigau tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . igante dvigau
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_4: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvandve tarhi prāpnoti . rājanyabahuvacanadvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_5: andhakavṛṣṇiṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . avyayībhāve tarhi prāpnoti . paripratyupāpāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_6: varjyamānāhorātrāvayaveṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_7: niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati eteṣām eva tatpuruṣādiṣu iti na punaḥ evam niyamaḥ syāt eteṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_8: tatpuruṣādiṣu eva iti . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_9: . eteṣām tarhi bahuvrīheḥ ca paryāyaḥ prāpnoti . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca paryāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_10: na prakalpate . yat ayam dvitribhyām pāddanmūrdhasu bahuvrīhau diṣṭivitasyoḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_11: siddhe paryāye paryāyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na paryāyaḥ bhavati iti . udātte
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_12: jñāpakam tu etat . udātte etat jñāpakam syāt . svaritena samāviśet . svaritena samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_13: prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti . bahuvrīhisvaram śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ sukṛt
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_14: . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . parasya śitiśāsanāt . kṣepe vidhiḥ nañaḥ asiddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_15: parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . prakṛtāt vidheḥ . bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_16: ṛte siddham . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca paryāyaḥ na prakalpate
GS24pmbhasuu:6155_17: . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . svaritena samāviśet .
GS24pmbhasuu:6156_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . tatpuruṣe vibhaktiprakṛtisvaratve karmadhāraye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6156_2: . paramam kārakam paramakārakam paramena kārakeṇa paramakārakeṇa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6157_0: parame kārake paramakārake . siddham tu lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6157_1: grahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6157_2: pratipadam yaḥ dvitīyātṛtīyāsaptamīsamāsaḥ tasya grahaṇam lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam . avyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:6157_3: parigaṇanam kartavyam . avyaye nañkunipātānām . avyaye nañkunipātānām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6161: pītvāsthirakaḥ . ktvāyām vā pratiṣedhaḥ . ktvāyām vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . snātvākālakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6162_0: pītvāsthirakaḥ . ubhayam na vaktavyam . nipātanāt siddham . nipātanāt etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6162_1: . kim nipātanam . avaśyam atra samāsārtham lyababhāvārtham ca nipātanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_1: . sadṛśagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tṛtīyāsamāsavacanāt . sadṛśaśabdena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_2: ucyate . tatra tṛtīyāpūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti eva siddham . ṣaṣṭhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_3: tarhi idam vaktavyam . pituḥ sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ iti . ṣaṣṭhyartham iti cet tṛtīyāsamāsavacanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_4: . ṣaṣṭhyartham iti cet tṛtīyāsamāsavacanam anarthakam syāt . kim kāraṇam . iha asmābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_5: traiśabdyam sādhyam . pitrā sadṛśaḥ pituḥ sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ iti . tatra dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_6: śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ apareṇa samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_7: . tat yathā aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_0: āvikam iti evam pituḥ sadṛśaḥ iti vigṛhya pitṛsadṛśaḥ iti bhaviṣyati pitrā sadṛśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6164_1: iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . avaśyam tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ yatra ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6165: adhayayanasadṛśaḥ iti . yadi tarhi tasya nibandhanam asti tat eva vaktavyam idam na vaktavyam . idam api avaśyam vaktavyam yatra ṣaṣṭhī śrūyate tadartham . dāsyāḥsadṛśaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:6188_0: upasamāhṛtam . gateḥ anantaragrahaṇam anarthakam gatiḥ gatau anudāttavacanāt . gateḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6188_2: gateḥ anudāttatvam ucyate . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . tatra yasya aprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6188_3: tasmāt antodāttaprasaṅgaḥ. tatra yasya gateḥ aprakṛtisvaratvam tasmāt antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6188_4: prāpnoti antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti . prakṛtisvaravacanāt hi ananodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6188_5: . prakṛtisvaravacanasāmarthyāt hi antodāttatvam na bhaviṣyati . yadi hi syāt prakṛtisvaravacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6188_6: idānīm kimartham syāt . prakṛtisvaravacanam kimartham iti cet ekagatyartham . prakṛtisvaravacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6188_7: kimartham iti cet ekagatyartham . yatra ekaḥ gatiḥ tadartham etat syāt . prakṛtam ,

GS24pmbhasuu:6189_1: api vai anantagrahaṇe atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . gatiḥ anantaraḥ pūrvapadam

GS24pmbhasuu:6189_5: .apūrvapadārtham iti cet kārake atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . āgataḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:6190_1: prāpnoti . siddham tu gateḥ antodāttāprasaṅgāt . siddham etat . katham .yat tat gateḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6191: prahṛtam . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6194_0: dūrādāgataḥ . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6194_1: gateḥ tat prasaṅktavyam bhedaḥ prabhedaḥ iti evamartham . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6194_2: kariṣyate . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti . tataḥ ktaḥ . ktāntam uttarapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:6194_3: antodāttam bhavati . atra kārakopapadagrahaṇam . anuvartate gatigrahaṇam nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:6194_4: . atha vā upariṣṭād yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti sūpamānāt ktaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6196_0: pravṛddhādīnām ca iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi kārakāt . kārakāt ca ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:6196_1: bhavati . tataḥ dattaśrutayoḥ eva āśiṣi kārakāt iti . evam ca kṛtvā na arthaḥ anantagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6196_2: . katham abhyuddhṛtam . ut haratikriyam viśinaṣṭi . udā viśiṣṭam abhiḥ viśinaṣṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:6196_3: . . tatra gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti ca prāpnoti gatiḥ gatau iti ca . gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti

GS24pmbhasuu:6199_0: upasamāhṛtam . gatiḥ gatau iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .evam tarhi siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:6199_1: yat anantaragrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā kṛdgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6199_2: gatikārakapūrvasya api iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . avataptenakulasthitam te etat ,
