GS24pmbhasuu:6201_0: (P_6,2.50) KA_III.128.16-129.2 Ro_IV.555-556 kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . yathā takārādigrahṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6201_1: kṛdviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . takārādau niti kṛti iti . atha akriyamāṇe kṛdgrahaṇe kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6201_2: takārādigrahṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . uttarapadaviśeṣaṇam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6201_3: syāt prataritā prataritum . iha na syāt prakartā prakartum . tādau niti kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6201_4: . tādau niti kṛdgrahaṇam anarthakam . kriyamāṇe api kṛdgrahaṇe aniṣṭam śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:6201_5: . takārādau uttarapade niti kṛti iti . akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam . nit yaḥ takārādiḥ tadante
GS24pmbhasuu:6201_6: uttarapade iti . yāvatā kriyamāṇe api aniṣṭam vijñāyate akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6201_7: eva iṣṭam vijñāsyāmaḥ . kṛdupadeśe vā tādyartham iḍartham .kṛdupadeśe tarhi tādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6201_8: iḍartham kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛdupadeśe yaḥ takārādiḥ iti evam yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6201_9: . kim prayojanam . iḍartham . iḍādau api siddham bhavati . pralavitā pralavitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:6202_1: . anigantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇādeśe prakṛtisvarabhāvaḥ prāpnoti . pratyaṅ pratyañcau
GS24pmbhasuu:6202_2: pratyañcaḥ . anigantavacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . anigantavacanam kimartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6202_3: cet ayaṇādiṣṭārtham . ayaṇādiṣṭārtham etat syāt . yadā yaṇādeśaḥ na . kadā ca yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6202_4: na . yādā śākalam . uktam vā . kim uktam . samāse śākalam na bhavati iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6203: pratīcaḥ pratīicā . cusvaraḥ tatra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ayam eva iṣyate . vakṣyati hi etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:6204_0: coḥ anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye iti . yat tarhi nyadhyoḥ prakṛtisvaram śāsti . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6204_1: hi yaṇādiṣṭārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . etat api ayaṇādiṣṭārtham eva syāt . yadā yaṇādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:6204_2: . kadā ca yaṇādeśaḥ na . yādā śākalam . uktam vā . kim uktam . samāse śākalam na
GS24pmbhasuu:6204_3: bhavati iti . yatra tarhi añcateḥ akāraḥ lupyate . adhīcaḥ adhīcā . cusvaraḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6204_4: bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ayam eva iṣyate . vakṣyati he etat coḥ anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:6204_5: iti . yat tarhi neḥ eva prakṛtisvaram śāsti . eṣaḥ hi yaṇādiṣṭārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6204_6: api ayaṇādiṣṭārtham eva syāt . katham . akṛte yaṇādeśa pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:6204_7: udāttasvaritoḥ yaṇaḥ svaritaḥ vā anudāttasya iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . nyaṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:6204_8: . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate anigantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇādeśe prakṛtisvarabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6205_0: (P_6,2.52.2) KA_III.129.22-131.14 Ro_IV.557-561 coḥ anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:6205_1: . cusvarāt anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:6205_2: cusvarasya avakāśaḥ dadhīcaḥ paśya . dadhīcā dadhīce . anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:6205_3: iti asya avakāśaḥ parāṅ parāñcau parāñcaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . avācā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_0: avāce . avakāśaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā cusvarasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvini
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_1: pratiṣedhāt itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ . na vā etat vipratiṣedhena api sidhyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_2: tarhi sidhyati . cusvarasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvini pratiṣedhāt . cursvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_3: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvinaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ cusvaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_4: akriyamāṇe hi pratiṣedhe sarvāpavādaḥ ayam cusvaraḥ . katham . pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_5: anudāttau suppitau iti . anudāttau suppitau iti asya udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ . udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_6: cusvaraḥ . saḥ yathā eva udāttanivṛttisvaram bādhate evam anigantasvaram api bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_7: . yadi tāvat saṅkhyātaḥ sāmyam ayam api caturthaḥ . samāsāntodāttatvasya apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_8: avyayasvaraḥ . avyayasvarasya kṛtsvaraḥ . kṛtsvarasya ayam . ubhayoḥ caturthayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_9: yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . satiśiṣṭaḥ tarhi cusvaraḥ . katham . cau iti ucyate . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_10: asya etat rūpam . ajādau asarvanāmasthāne abhinirvṛtte akāralope nakāralope ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_11: tasmāt suṣthu ucyate na vā cusvarasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvini pratiṣedhāt itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_12: hi sarvāpavādaḥ iti . vibhaktīṣatsvarāt kṛtsvaraḥ . vibhaktisvarāt īṣatsvarāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_13: kṛtsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . vibhaktisvarasya avakāśaḥ akṣaśauṇḍaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6208: idhmapravraścanaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti pūrvāhṇesphoṭakāḥ . kṛtsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . īṣatsvarasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6210: īṣatpiṅgalaḥ . kṛtsvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6211: īṣadbhedaḥ . kṛtsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarāt hārisvaraḥ . citsvarāt hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6217: mātṛgavaḥ . hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kṛtsvarāt ca . kṛtsvarāt ca hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kṛtsvarasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6218: idhmapravraścanaḥ . hārisvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_0: vāḍavahṛtaḥ . hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā haraṇapratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_1: kṛtsvarābhādhakatavsya . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . haraṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_2: jñāpakaḥ kṛtsvarābhādhakatvasya . yat ayam aharaṇe iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_3: ācāryaḥ na kṛtsvaraḥ hārisvaram bādhate iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . anaḥ bhāvakarmavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_4: iti etasmin prāpte tata etat ucyate . yadi evam sādhīyaḥ jñāpakam . kṛtsvarasya apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_5: anaḥ bhāvakarmavacanaḥ iti . bādhakam kila bādhate kim punaḥ tam . yuktasvaraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6222: aśvavallavaḥ . kṛtsvarasya saḥ eva. iha ubhayam prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6226_0: (P_6,2.80) KA_III.131.16-25 Ro_IV.561-562 upamānam iti kimartham . śabdārthaprakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:6226_1: eva iti iyati ucyamāne pūrveṇa atiprasaktam iti kṛtvā niyamaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6226_2: kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha na syāt . puṣphārī phalahārī . upamānagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:6226_3: doṣaḥ bhavati . atha śabdārthagrahaṇam kimartham . upamānam prakṛtau eva iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6226_4: ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta . vṛkavañcī vṛkaprekṣī . śabdāṛthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6226_5: na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha prakṛtigrahaṇam kimartham . śabdārthaprakṛtiḥ eva yaḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:6226_6: tatra yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . kokilabhivyāhārī . atha evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6226_7: . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6226_8: bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyete :

GS24pmbhasuu:6269: kurājyam . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:6272: paramakārakam . gatikārakopapadāt iti ucyamāne api tatra prāpnoti . etat hi kārakam . idam tarhi . devadattasya kārakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6273: devadattakārakam . idam ca api udāharaṇam paramam kārakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_0: paramakārakam iti . na etat kārakam . kārakaviśeṣaṇam etat . yāvat brūyāt prakṛṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_1: kārakam śobhanam kārakam iti tāvat etat paramakārakam iti . atha kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6275_0: nivārāṇasiḥ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati gatyādibhyaḥ prakṛtisvaratve kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6275_1: anyasya uttarapadasya abhāvāt . gatyādibhyaḥ prakṛtisvaratve kṛdgrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6275_2: . kim kāraṇam . anyasya uttarapadasya abhāvāt . na hi anyat gatiyādibhyaḥ uttarapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:6275_3: asti anyat ataḥ kṛtaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dhātoḥ hi dvaye pratyayāḥ vidhīyante tiṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6275_4: kṛtaḥ ca . tatra kṛtā saha samāsaḥ bhavati tiṅā ca na bhavati . tatra antareṇa kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6275_5: kṛtaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm eva udāhṛtam niṣkauśāmbiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6276_0: nirvārāṇasiḥ iti . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ na ca nisaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6276_1: kauśāmbīśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kṛtprakṛtau vā gatitvāt adhikāṛtham kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6276_2: . kṛtprakṛtau tarhi gatitvāt adhikāṛtham kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛtprakṛtiḥ dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6276_3: . dhātum ca prati kriyāyogaḥ . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati iti iha eva syāt . praṇīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_0: unnāyakaḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti na evam vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_1: yasya kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_2: tarhi yā kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_3: na ca kaḥ cit kevalaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ syāt . kevalaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_4: arthasya vācakaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā kṛdadhikasya bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yayam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_5: eva arthasya vācakaḥ praṇīḥ iti . eṣaḥ api hi kartṛviśiṣṭasya . ayam tarhi tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_6: eva arthasya vācakaḥ prabhavanam iti . tasmāt kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . yadi kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6278_7: kriyate āmante svaraḥ na prāpnoti . prapacatitarām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6279_0: prajalpatitarām . asati punaḥ kṛdgrahaṇe kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam tasya atiśaye tarap
GS24pmbhasuu:6279_1: utpadyate tarabantasya svārthe ām . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti bhavati eva saṅghātam
GS24pmbhasuu:6279_2: prati kriyāyogaḥ . na ca kaḥ cit kevalaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6279_3: . kevalaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā adhikasya bhaviṣyati . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6279_4: yayam tasya eva arthasya vācakaḥ prabhavanam iti . eṣaḥ api dravyaviśiṣṭasya . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6279_5: kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati kriyāvat api iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6286_2: . tat bahoḥ eva yathā syāt . nañsubhyām mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ekayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:6286_3: api hi sati yasya uttarapadabhūmā asti tasya bhaviṣyati . kasya ca asti . bahoḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6286_4: . idam tarhi prayojanam . na guṇādayaḥ avyavāḥ iti vakṣyati . tat bahoḥ eva yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6286_5: syāt . nañsubhyām mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ekayoge api sati yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6286_6: guṇādayaḥ avayavā santi tasya kasya ca santi . bahoḥ eva . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati bahoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6286_8: . uttarapadasya ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . nañaḥ jaramaramitramṛtāḥ . ajaraḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:6299_0: (P_6,2.197) KA_III.139.8-140.6 Ro_IV.577-579 kim idam dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6299_1: āhosvit nakārāntagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6299_2: cet nakārāntasya upasaṅkhyānam . dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam cet nakārāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6299_3: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvimūrdhā trimūrdhā . astu tarhi nakārāntagrahaṇam . nakārānte
GS24pmbhasuu:6299_4: akārāntasya . nakārānte akārāntasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvimūrdhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6300_0: trimūrdhaḥ . udāttalopāt siddham . astu tarhi nakārāntagrahaṇam . antodāttatve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:6300_1: lopaḥ udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddham . idam iha sampradhāryam . antodāttatvam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:6300_2: lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:6300_3: . antodāttatvam kriyatām samāsāntaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6300_4: . nityaḥ samāsāntaḥ . kṛte api antodāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api . antodāttatvam api
GS24pmbhasuu:6300_5: nityam . kṛte api samāsānte prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam antodāttatvam . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:6300_6: samāsānte prāpnoti . paratvāt lopena bhavitavyam . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:6300_7: vihanyate na tat anityam . na ca samāsāntaḥ eva antodāttatvasya nimittam hanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6300_8: avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram lopaḥ pratīkṣyaḥ . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6301_0: ṭilopaḥ . ṭilope kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddham . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:6301_1: . nan u anena asandigdhena nakārāntasya grahaṇena bhavitavyam yāvatā mūrdhasu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6301_2: ucyate . yadi hi akārāntasya grahaṇam syāt mūrdheṣu iti brūyāt . sā eṣā samāsāntārthā
GS24pmbhasuu:6301_3: vicāraṇā . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . vibhāṣā samāsāntaḥ bhavati iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6307_3: . atha vā yuktaḥ eva atra pañcamyarthaḥ . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ gṛhītvā ,

GS24pmbhasuu:6309_1: kartavyam . añjasākṛtam . puṃsānujaḥ januṣāndhaḥ vikṛtākṣaḥ iti ca . puṃsānujaḥ januṣāndhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6309_2: vikṛtākṣaḥ iti ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . puṃsānujaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6312: (P_6,3.5) KA_III.143.2-8 Ro_IV. 585-586 ātmanaḥ ca pūraṇe . ātmanaḥ ca pūraṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ātmanāpañcamaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6313_0: ātmanādaśamaḥ . anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā tṛtīyā draṣṭavyā . ātmā pañcamaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:6313_1: ātmāpañcamaḥ . atha vā yuktaḥ eva atra tṛtīyārthaḥ . ātmanā kṛtam tat tasya yena
GS24pmbhasuu:6313_2: asau pañcamaḥ . katham janārdanaḥ tu ātmacaturthaḥ eva iti . bahuvrīḥ ayam . ātmā
GS24pmbhasuu:6314: (P_6,3.7-8) KA_III.143.11-18 Ro_IV.586-587 ātmanebhāṣaparasmaibhāṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ātmanebhāṣaparasmaibhāṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ātmanebhāṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6315: parasmaibhāṣaḥ . tat katham kartavyam . yadi vyākaraṇe bhavā vaiyākaraṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6316: vaiyākaraṇī ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā vaiyākaraṇakhyāyām iti . atha hi vaiyākaraṇānām ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā na arthaḥ upasaṅkhyānena . yadi api vyākaraṇe bhavā vaiyākaraṇī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6317_0: vaiyākaraṇī ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā evam api na arthaḥ upasaṅkhyānena . vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6317_1: . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . ātmanepadam . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6319: (P_6,3.9) KA_III.143.20-144.17 Ro_IV.587-588 hṛddyubhyām ṅeḥ upasaṅkhyānam . hṛddyubhyām ṅeḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . hṛdispṛk ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6320_0: divispṛk . anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā saptamī draṣṭavyā . hṛdayam spṛśati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6320_1: hṛdispṛk . divam śprśati iti divispṛk . haladantādhikāre goḥ upasaṅkhyānam . haladantādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:6320_2: goḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gaviṣthiraḥ . na kartavyam . lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6320_3: . luk kriyatām avādeśaḥ iti avādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . avādeśe kṛte halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6320_4: iti eva siddham . lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet bhūmipāśe atiprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6320_5: lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet bhūmipāśe atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bhūmyām pāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6321_0: bhūmipāśaḥ . akaḥ ataḥ iti vā sandhyakṣarārtham . evam tarhi aviśeṣeṇa saptamyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6321_1: alukam uktvā akaḥ ataḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . akaḥ ataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6321_2: eva bhavati na anyataḥ iti . tena sandhyakṣarāṇām siddham bhavati . sidhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:6321_3: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam haladantādhikāre goḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6321_4: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . gaviṣṭhiraśabdaḥ vidādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6321_5: paṭhyate . asakṛt khalu api nipātanam kriyate . gaviyudhibhyā sthiraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_0: (P_6,3.10) KA_III.144.19-145.13 Ro_IV.589-591 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_1: . katham ca prāpte katham ca aprāpte . yadi sañjñāyām iti vartate tataḥ prāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_2: atha nivṛttam tataḥ aprāpte . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . kāranāmni vāvacanārtham cet ajādau
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_3: atiprasaṅgaḥ . kāranāmni vāvacanārtham cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_4: prāpnoti . avikaṭe uraṇaḥ dātavyaḥ avikaṭoraṇaḥ . astu tarhi aprāpte . aprāpte samāsavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_5: . yadi aprāpte samāsaḥ vidheyaḥ . prāpte punaḥ sati sañjñāyām iti eva samāsaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_6: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati bhavati atra samāsaḥ iti yat ayam kāranāmni
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_7: saptamyāḥ alukam śāsti . yadi api tāvat jñāpakāt samāsaḥ syāt svaraḥ tu na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_8: . yat hi tat saptamīpūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_9: eva iti evam tat . na eva atra anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . kim tarhi saptamīhāriṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_10: dharmye aharaṇe iti anena atra svareṇa bhavitavyam .kim ca bhoḥ sañjñāḥ api loke
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_11: kriyante na lokaḥ sañjñāsu pramāṇam . loke ca kāranāma sañjñā . nanu ca uktam kāranāmni
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_12: vāvacanārtham cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6323_0: tataḥ halādau . halādau ca kāranāmni saptamyāḥ aluk bhavati . idam idānīm kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6323_1: . niyamārtham . halādau eva kāranāmni na anyatra . kva mā bhūt . avikaṭe uraṇaḥ dātavyaḥ avikaṭoraṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6324: (P_6,3.11) KA_III.145.15-16 Ro_IV.591 gurau antāt ca . gurau antāt ca iti vaktavyam . anteguruḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6325: (P_6,3.13) KA_III.145.18-146.2 Ro_IV.591-592 svāṅgagrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate siddham hastebandhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6327: cakrabandhaḥ iti na sidhyati . atha nivṛttam siddham cakrebhandaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6329_0: hastabandhaḥ iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na insiddhabadhnātiṣu iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6329_1: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvatra eva atra uttarapadādhikare tatpuruṣed kṛti bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:6329_2: iti prāpte na insiddhabadhnātiṣu iti pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . tasmin nitye prāpte iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6329_3: vibhāṣā ārabhyate . evam api na jñāyate kasmin viṣaye vibhāṣā kasmin viṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6329_4: iti . ghañantasya idam bandhaśabdasya grahaṇam pratiṣedhe punaḥ dhātugrahaṇam . ghañante
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_0: (P_6,3.14) KA_III.146.4-16 Ro_IV.592-594 tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam akarmadhāraye . tatpuruṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_1: kṛti bahulam iti atra akarmadhāraye iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . parame kārake paramakārake
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_2: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahulavacanāt na bhaviṣyati . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_3: lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate na tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam iti eva siddham . lugaluganukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_4: bahulavacanasya akṛtsnatvāt . lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate akṛtsnam bahulavacanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_5: . yadi akṛtsnam yat anena kṛtam akṛtam tat . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ akṛtsnam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_6: kṛtsnam ca kārakam ca sādhakam ca nirvartakam ca . yat ca anena kṛtam suktṛtam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_7: . kimartham tarhi lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate . udāharaṇabhūyastvāt . te khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_8: vidhayaḥ suparigṛhītāḥ bhavanti yeṣu lakṣaṇam prapañcaḥ ca . kevalam lakṣaṇam kevalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_9: prapañcaḥ vā na tathā kārakam bhavati . avaśyam khalu asmābhiḥ idam vaktavyam bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:6330_10: anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti . sarvavedapāṛiṣadam hi idam śāstram . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6333: paśyatoharaḥ . āmuṣyāyaṇāmuṣyputrikā iti upasaṅkhyānam . āmuṣyāyaṇāmuṣyputrikā iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āmuṣyāyaṇaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6334_0: āmuṣyaputrikā . āmuṣyakulikā iti ca vaktavyam . āmuṣyakulikā . devānāmpriyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6334_1: ca . devānāmpriyaḥ iti ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . devānāmpriyaḥ . śepapucchalāṅgūleṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6334_2: śunaḥ sañjñāyām . śepapucchalāṅgūleṣu śunaḥ sañjñāyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śunaḥśephaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6336: śunolāṅgūlaḥ . divaḥ ca dāse . divaḥ ca dāse upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . divodāsāya gāyata .
GS24pmbhasuu:6337: (P_6,3.23) KA_III.147.9-12 Ro_IV.595 vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ tatpūrvapadottarapadagrahaṇam . vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ tatpūrvapadottarapadagrahaṇam kartavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6340: vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt . atha eṣām vyatikareṇa bhavitavyam . bāḍham bhavitavyam . hotuḥputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6342_0: (P_6,3.25.1) KA_III.147.14-18 Ro_IV.595 kva ayam nakāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6342_1: . lopaḥ asya bhavati nalopaḥ prātipadikasya iti . yadi na śrūyate kimartham uccāryate
GS24pmbhasuu:6342_2: . raparatvam mā bhūt iti . kriyamāṇe api vai nakāre raparatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6342_3: . nalope kṛte eṣaḥ api hi uḥ sthāne aṇ śiṣyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajymānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6342_4: eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca ayam uḥ sthāne aṇ eva śiṣyate . kim tarhi aṇ ca anaṇ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6343: (P_6,3.25.2) KA_III.147.18-148.18 Ro_IV.596-597 katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_0: ṛkārāntānām yaḥ dvandvaḥ iti āhosvit dvandve ṛkārasya iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_1: ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam . ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_2: kartavyam . pitāputrau . kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ . kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . ṛkārāntānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_3: dvandve na jñāyate kasya ānaṅā bhavitavyam iti . astu tarhi dvande ṛkārasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_4: aviśeṣeṇa pitṛpitāmahādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa pitṛpitāmahādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_5: bhavati . pitṛpitāmahau iti . astu tarhi ṛkārāntānām yaḥ dvandvaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_6: ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . putragrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_7: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . putre anyatarasyām iti . yadi tat anuvartate vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_8: svasṛpatyoḥ putre ca iti putre api vibhāṣā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_9: anuvartiṣyate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . ṛtaḥ vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_10: putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . vibhāṣā svasṛpatyoḥ putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_11: ākrośe . ānaṅ ṛtaḥ dvandve . putragrahaṇam anuvartate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_12: . yat api ucyate kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ iti . kāryī ca nirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_13: iti vartate . ṅit ca ayam kriyate . saḥ antareṇa api kāryinirdeśam ṛkārāntasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_14: bhaviṣyati . putre tarhi kāryī anirdiṣṭaḥ . putre ca kāryī nirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . ṛkāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_15: api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ . tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_16: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . putre iti eṣā saptamī ṛtaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:6344_17: prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6345: (P_6,3.26) KA_III.148.20-149.2 Ro_IV.597 devatādvandve ubhayatra vāyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . devatādvandve ubhayatra vāyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vāyvagnī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6346: agnivāyū . brahmaprajāpatyādīnām ca . brahmaprajāpatyādīnām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . brahmaprajāpatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6348_0: skandviśākhau . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . dvandve iti vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:6348_1: punaḥ dvandragrahaṇasya etat prayojanam lokavedayoḥ yaḥ dvandvaḥ tatra yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6348_2: . kaḥ ca lokavedayoḥ dvandvaḥ . vede ye sahanirvāpanirdiṣṭāḥ na ca ete sahanirvāpanirdiṣṭāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6349: (P_6,3.28) KA_III.149.4-5 Ro_IV.598 id vṛddhau viṣṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . id vṛddhau viṣṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āgnāvaiṣṇavam carum nirvapet .
GS24pmbhasuu:6350_0: (P_6,3.32-33) KA_III.149.8-10 Ro_IV.598 kim nipātyate . pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ ṛkārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6350_1: arārau nipātyete . mātarapitarau bhojayataḥ . mātarapitarau ānaya . a mā gantām pitarāmātarā
GS24pmbhasuu:6350_2: ca a mā somaḥ amṛtatvaya gamyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6351_0: (P_6,3.34.1) KA_III.150.3-16 Ro_IV.599-601 bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti katham idam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6351_1: . samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam āhosvit kva cit bhāṣitapuṃskam iti . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6351_2: ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam iti garbhibhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6353: prasūtabhāraḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate kva cit bhāṣitapuṃskam iti droṇībhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6355: pātrībhāryaḥ atra api prāpnoti . astu samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam iti . katham garbhibhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6357_0: prasūtabhāraḥ iti . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . atha kimartham ūṅaḥ pṛthak pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6357_1: ucyate na yatra eva anyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tatra eva ayam ucyeta . na kopadhāyāḥ iti uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:6357_2: tataḥ ūṅaḥ ca iti ucyeta . tatra api ayam arthaḥ dviḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6357_3: . na evam śakyam . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ puṃvat karmadhāraye pratiṣiddhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6358: kārikā vṛndārikā kārakavṛndārikā iti evam iha api syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6359_0: brahmabandhūḥ vṛndārikā brahmabandūvṛndārikā iti . atha pṛthak pratiṣedhe api ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:6359_1: yāvatā saḥ pratiṣiddhārthaḥ ārambhaḥ kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . pṛthakpratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6359_2: . atha vā anūṅ iti tatra anuvartiṣyate . atha vā na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6359_3: tarhi paryudāsaḥ ayam yat anyat anūṅ iti . saḥ ca pratiṣedhāṛthaḥ ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_0: (P_6,3.34.2) KA_III.150.17-153.20 Ro_IV.601-609 kim punaḥ idam puṃvadbhāve strīgrhaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_1: strīpratyayagrahaṇam āhosvit strīśabdgrahaṇam āhosvit stryarthagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_2: atra viśeṣaḥ . puṃvadbhāve strīgrahaṇam strīpratyayagrahaṇam cet tatra puṃvat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_4: cet tatra puṃvat iti uttarapade tatpratiṣedhaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . kasya . strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_5: pratiṣedhaḥ . kim ucyate strīpratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na punaḥ anyat api kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_6: cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_7: atidiśyeta . anārambhāt puṃsi . na hi kim cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_8: samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya atidiśyeta . tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_9: anyat ataḥ strīpratyayapratiṣedhāt . katham punaḥ puṃvat iti anena strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_10: pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_11: samarthayitum . tat yathā . uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_12: asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi . evam iha api puṃvat bhavati puṃvat na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_13: vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe . yathā puṃsaḥ strīpratyayaḥ na bhavati evam samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_14: uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya na bhavati iti . prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ . prātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6360_15: ca pratyāpattiḥ vaktavyā . enī bhāryā asya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_0: śyetabhāryaḥ . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_1: strītvam . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena naśabdaḥ na śrūyeta . striyām iti ucyamānaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_2: . sthānivatprasaṅgaḥ ca . sthānivabhāvaḥ ca prāpnoti . paṭvībhārā asya paṭubhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_3: . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . tasya sthānivabhāvāt yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_4: prāpnoti . kimartham idam ubhayam ucyate na prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_5: sthānivabhāvaḥ api coditaḥ syāt . purastāt idam ācāryeṇa dṛṣṭam sthānivatprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_6: ca iti tat paṭhitam . tataḥ uttarakālam idam dṛṣṭam prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_7: iti . tat api paṭhitam . na ca idānīm ācāryāḥ sūtrāṇi kṛtvā nivartayanti . vataṇḍyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_8: puṃvadvacanam . vataṇḍyādiṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ vataṇḍyādayaḥ . lugalugastrīviṣayadvistrīpratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_9: . luk . gārgyaḥ vṛndārikā gargavṛndārikā . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_10: nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena yaśabdaḥ na śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_11: . astriyām iti hi luk ucyate . luk . aluk . vataṇḍī vṛndārikā vātaṇḍyavṛndārikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_12: puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_13: . tasya anivṛttatvāt luk striyām vataṇḍāt iti yakārasya luk prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_14: ayam īkāre eva luk ucyeta . tat īkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_0: striyām . īkāravidhau vai apratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kriyate vataṇḍa iti . śārṅgaravādau
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_1: sapratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ vai sapratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_2: ca luk prāpnoti . aluk . astrīviṣaya . kauṇḍīvṛsī vṛndārikā kauṇḍīvṛsyavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_3: . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_4: . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena yaśabdaḥ śrūyeta . astriyām iti hi ñyaḥ vidhīyate . astrīviṣaya
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_5: . dvistrīpratyaya . gārgyāyaṇī vṛndārikā gārgyavṛndārikā . atra puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_6: . kim kāraṇam . bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅaḥ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_7: iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ na asau uttarapade yaḥ ca uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_8: na asau bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ iti . astu tarhi strīśabdagrahaṇam . strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6364_9: iti cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ iti cet sarvasya strīśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6365_0: aṅgārakāḥ nāma śakunayaḥ . teṣām kālikāḥ striyaḥ . kālikāvṛndārikāḥ . aṅgārakavṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6365_1: prāpnuvanti . kṣemavṛddhayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ . teṣām tanukeśyaḥ striyaḥ . tanukeśīvṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_0: kacchapasya ḍulī . ṛśyasya rohit . aśvasya vaḍavā . puruṣasya yoṣit . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_1: . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_2: bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvatra prasaṅgaḥ . katham ca nāma na upādīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_3: yāvatā bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . bhāṣitapuṃskānupapattiḥ ca . hyarthe ca ayam caḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_4: paṭhitaḥ . sarvaḥ hi śabdaḥ bhāṣitapuṃskāt paraḥ śakyaḥ kartum . astu tarhi arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_5: . arthātideśe vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ . arthātideśe vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_6: paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ vipratiṣedham puṃvadbhāvāt hrasvatvam khidghādikeṣu iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_7: vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . dvikāryayogaḥ hi nāma vipratiṣedhaḥ na ca atra ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_8: dvikāryayuktaḥ . śabdasya hrasvatvam arthasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . kim ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6366_9: aviśeṣāt iti . sarvasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_0: aṅgārakāḥ nāma śakunayaḥ . teṣām kālikāḥ striyaḥ . kālikāvṛndārikāḥ . aṅgārakavṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_1: prāpnuvanti . kṣemavṛddhayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ . teṣām tanukeśyaḥ striyaḥ . tanukeśīvṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_2: . kṣemavṛddhivṛndārikāḥ prāpnuvanti . haṃsasya varaṭā . kacchapasya ḍulī . ṛśyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_3: rohit . aśvasya vaḍavā . puruṣasya yoṣit . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_4: viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ bhavati iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_5: ca nāma na upādīyate yāvatā bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . bhāṣitapuṃskānupapattiḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_6: bhavati . na hi arthen paurvāparyam asti . ayam tāvat adoṣaḥ yat ucyate arthātideśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_7: vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ iti . na avaśyam dvikārayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_8: . asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca atra asti asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asambhavaḥ . puṃvadbhāvaḥ abhinirvartamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_9: hrasvatvasya nimittam vihanti . hrasvatvam abhinirvartamānam puṃvadbhāvam bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_10: . sati asambhave yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_11: iti . tasmāt astu saḥ eva madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ . nanu ca uktam strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6367_12: iti cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samāsanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:6368_0: bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ yasmin saḥ ayam bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ iti . yadi evam luk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6368_1: . nipātanāt na bhaviṣyati . atha vā aluk prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6368_2: anūṅ iti anyena strīpratyayagrahaṇam śakyam vijñātum . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6368_3: tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6368_4: . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśaḥ ānīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6368_5: . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api anūṅ iti ūṅpratiṣedhāt anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6368_6: ūṅsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate . kim ca anyat anūṅ ūṅsadṛśam . strīpratyayaḥ . evam api iḍabiḍ vṛndārikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6376: atra puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6377: (P_6,3.34.3) KA_III.153.21-28 Ro_IV.609-610 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . paṭvīmṛdvyau bhārye asya paṭvīmṛdubhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6378_0: āhosvit paṭumṛdubhāryaḥ iti . paṭvīmṛdubhāryaḥ iti bhavitavyam . puṃvadbhāvaḥ kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6378_1: na bhavati . bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . nanu ca bhoḥ paṭuśabdaḥ mṛduśabdaḥ puṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:6378_2: bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau
GS24pmbhasuu:6378_3: . samānāyām ākṛtau api etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . katham . ārabhyate matublopaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6378_4: tarhi bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade kṛtaḥ tasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6378_5: ca akṛtaḥ na asau bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade .
GS24pmbhasuu:6379_1: pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . kalyāṇī pañcamī asya pakṣasya kalyāṇapañcamīkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6379_2: pakṣaḥ iti . atha iha katham bhavitavyam kalyāṇī pañcamī āsām rātrīṇām iti . kalyāṇīpañcamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6379_3: rātrayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . rātrayaḥ atra pradhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6380_0: (P_6,3.35) KA_III.154.6-155.24 Ro_IV.610-614 iha ke cit tasilādayaḥ ā kṛtvasucaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6380_1: paṭhyante yeṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ na iṣyate ke cit ca anyatra paṭhyante yeṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6380_2: iṣyate . tatra kim nyāyyam . parigaṇanam kartavyam . tasilādī tratasau . tratasau
GS24pmbhasuu:6380_3: tasilādī draṣṭavyau . tasyām śālāyām vasati . tatra vasati . tasyāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6385: yataḥ . taratamapau . taratamapau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyatarā darśanīyatamā . caraḍjātīyarau . caraḍjātīyarau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . paṭucarī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6386: paṭujātīyā . kalpabdeśīyarau . kalpabdeśīyarau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyakalpā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6387: darśanīyadeśīyā . rūpappāśapau . rūpappāśapau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyarūpā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6388: darśanīyapāśā . thamthālau . thamthālau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . kayā ākṛtyā katham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6389: yayā yathā . dārhilau . dārhilau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . tasyām velāyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6391: tarhi . tilthyanau . tilthyanau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . vṛkī vṛkatiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6392_0: ajathyā yūthiḥ . śasi bahvalpārthasya . śasi bahvalpārthasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6392_1: . bahvībhyaḥ dehi . bahuśaḥ dehi . alpaśaḥ . tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya . tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6393: paṭutā . guṇavacanasya iti kimartham . kaṭhyāḥ bhāvaḥ kaṭhītvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6394: kaṭhītā . bhasya aḍhe taddhite . bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hastinīnām samūhaḥ hāstikam . aḍhe iti kimartham . śyaineyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6398: atra na prāpnoti . iha ca prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6400: sāpatnaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ anapatye iti ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha hi na syāt . gārgyāyaṇyāḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ gārgaḥ jālmaḥ . astu tarhi aḍhe iti eva . katham kauṇḍinyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6401: sāpatnaḥ iti . kauṇḍinye nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ iti . sāpatnaśabdaḥ prakṛtayataram . [R 613:
GS24pmbhasuu:6402: sāpatnaḥ prakṛtyantatatvāt . sāpatnaśabdaḥ prakṛtayataram asti .] katham agnāyī devatā asya sthālīpākasya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6403_0: āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ iti . astu tarhi anapatye iti . katham gārgaḥ jālmaḥ . gārgāgneyau
GS24pmbhasuu:6403_1: na saṃvadete . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . ṭhakchasoḥ ca . ṭhakchasoḥ ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6405_0: bhavadīyāḥ . ṭhaggrahaṇam kimartham na ike kṛte ajādau iti . na evam śakyam . ajādilakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6405_1: hi māthitikādivat prasaṅgaḥ . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat prasajyeta . tat yatha
GS24pmbhasuu:6405_2: mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6406_0: (P_6,3.36) KA_III.156.2-6 Ro_IV.614 maningrahaṇam kimartham . māningrahaṇam astryartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6406_1: asamānādhikaraṇārtham ca . māningrahaṇam kriyate astryartham asamānādhikaraṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6406_2: ca . astryartham tāvat . darśanīyām manyate devadattaḥ yajñadattām darśanīyamānī
GS24pmbhasuu:6406_3: ayam asyāḥ . asamānādhikaraṇārtham . darśanīyām manyate devadattā yajñadattām darśanīyamāninī iyam asyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6407: (P_6,3.37) KA_III.156.8-17 Ro_IV.615-616 kim idam evamādi anukramaṇam ādyasya yogasya viṣaye āhosvit puṃvadbhāvamātrasya . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ādyasya yogasya viṣaye mādhyamkīyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6409_0: atra na prāpnoti . vidhīḥ api atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . bhāṣitapūṃśkāt anūṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:6409_1: iti ucyate . na hi etat bhavati bhāṣitapūṃśkāt anūṅ . idam tarhi vilepikāyāḥ dharmyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6409_2: vailepikam . vidhiḥ ca siddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca na prāpnoti . atha puṃvabhāvamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6410_0: jātilakṣaṇaḥ puṃvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi na kopadhāyāḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6410_1: puṃvabhāvamātrasya uttaram evamādi anukramaṇam ādyasya yogasya viṣaye . na kopadhapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:6410_2: taddhitavugrahaṇam . na kopadhapratiṣedhe taddhitavugrahaṇam kartavyam . taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6410_3: yaḥ kakāraḥ voḥ ca yaḥ kakāraḥ tasya grahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pākabhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6412: (P_6,3.40) KA_III.156.19-157.2 Ro_IV.616 svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini . svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . dīrghamukhamānī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6413: ślakṣṇamukhamāninī . yadi amānini iti ucyate dīrghamukhamāninī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6414: ślakṣṇamukhamānininī iti na sidhyati . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6415_0: (P_6,3.42.1) KA_III.157.4-14 Ro_IV.616-617 kimartham idam ucyate . puṃvat karmadhāraye
GS24pmbhasuu:6415_1: pratiṣiddhārtham . pratiṣiddhāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . na kopadhāyāḥ iti uktam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6415_2: api puṃvat bhavati . kārikā vṛndārikā kārakavṛndārikā kārakajātīyā kārakadeśīyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6415_3: sañjñāpūraṇayoḥ ca iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . dattā vṛndārikā dattavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:6415_4: dattajātīyā dattadeśīyā . pañcamī vṛndārikā pañcamavṛndārikā pañcamajātīyā pañcamadeśīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6415_5: . vṛddhinimittasya iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . sraughnī vṛndārikā sraughnavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:6415_6: sraughnajātīyā sraughnadeśīyā . svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6415_7: bhavati . ślakṣṇamukhī vṛndārikā ślakṣṇamukhavṛndārikā ślakṣṇamukhajātīyā ślakṣṇamukhadeśīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6415_8: . jāteḥ ca iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . kaṭhī vṛndārikā kaṭhavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:6416: (P_6,3.42.2) KA_III.157.15-24 Ro_IV.617-618 kukkuṭyādīnām aṇḍādiṣu puṃvadvacanam . kukkuṭyādīnām aṇḍādiṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kukkuṭyāḥ aṇḍam kukkuṭāṇḍam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6418_0: kākyāḥ śāvaḥ kākaśāvaḥ . na vā astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6418_1: kāraṇam astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt . na atra strīpūrvapadam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6418_2: . astrīpūrvapadam . ubhayoḥ aṇḍam ubhayoḥ padam ubhayoḥ śāvaḥ . yadi api tāvat atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6418_3: etat śakyate vaktum iha tu katham . mṛgyāḥ kṣīram mṛghakṣīram iti . atra api na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6418_4: astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt iti eva . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avāvivakṣā syāt . sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6418_5: api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6418_6: vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6419: (P_6,3.42.3) KA_III.158.1-18 Ro_IV.618-619 agneḥ īttvāt varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena . agneḥ īttvāt varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . agneḥ īttvasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6422_0: āgnivāruṇīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta . varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6422_1: yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6422_2: . katham . agneḥ īttvam varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ . na avaśyam dvikārayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6422_3: . kim tarhi . asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca atra asti asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asau asambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6422_4: . agneḥ īttvam abhinirvartamanam varuṇasya vṛddhim bādhate . varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ abhinirvartamanā
GS24pmbhasuu:6422_5: agneḥ īttvam bādhate . eṣaḥ asambhavaḥ . sati asambhave yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . pūṃvadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6422_6: hrasvatvam khidghādiṣu . pūṃvadbhāvāt hrasvatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena khidghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6424: mṛdubhāryaḥ . khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6428: hariṇimmanyā . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6434: paṭvitamā . ke hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6438_0: mṛdvikā . hrasvatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm hrasvatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6438_1: puṃvadbhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛt gatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6439: (P_6,3.43) KA_III.158.21-159.9 Ro_IV.620-621 ṅīgrahaṇam kimartham . anekācaḥ hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne khaṭvātarā mālātarā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6440: atra api prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti vartate . evam api dattātarā guptātarā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6441: atra api prāpnoti . ītaḥ iti vartate . evam api grāmaṇītaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6442: senāṇītaraḥ atra api prāpnoti . striyām iti vartate . evam api grāmaṇītarā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6443: senāṇītarā atra api prāpnoti . striyāḥ striyām iti vartate . śeṣaprakḷptyartham tarhi ṅīgrahaṇam kartavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6444: nadyāḥ śeṣasya anyatarasyām iti . kaḥ śeṣaḥ . āṅīca yā nadī ṅyantam ca yat ekāc . antareṇa api ṅīgrahaṇam kḷptaḥ śeṣaḥ . katham . ītaḥ iti vartate . anīt ca yā nadī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_0: īdantam ca yat ekāc . śeṣagrahaṇam ca api śakyam akartum . katham . aviśeṣeṇa ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_1: nadyāḥ anyatarasyām hrasvatvam utsargaḥ . tasya anekācaḥ nityam hrasvatvam apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_2: . tasmin nitye prāpte ugitaḥ vibhāṣā ārabhyate . yadi evam lakṣmitarā tantritarā
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_3: iti na sidhyati . lakṣmītarā tantrītarā iti prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etad saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:6445_4: . lakṣmītarā tantrītarā iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti . ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6446: (P_6,3.46.1) KA_III.160.2-161.5 Ro_IV.622-627 iha kasmāt na bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_0: amahān mahān sampannaḥ mahadbhūtaḥ candramāḥ iti . anyaprakṛtiḥ tu amahān mahatprakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_1: mahān mahati eva . anyaḥ mahān . anyaḥ mahān bhūtaprakṛtau vartate . mahān mahati
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_2: eva . tasmāt āttvam na syāt . tasmāt āttvam na bhaviṣyati . puṃvattvam tu katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_3: bhavet atra . puṃvadbhāvaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti . amahatī mahatī sampannā mahadbhūtā
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_4: brāhmaṇī . evam tarhi amahati mahān hi vṛttaḥ tadvācī ca atra bhūtaśabdaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_5: amahati hi mahacchabdaḥ vartate tadvācī ca atra bhūtaśabdaḥ prayujyate . kiṃvācī
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_6: . mahadvācī . tasmāt sidhyati puṃvat . tasmāt sidhyati puṃvadbhāvaḥ . yadi evam āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_7: api prāpnoti . mahadbhūtaḥ candramāḥ . nivartyam āttvam tu manyante . āttvam api
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_8: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yaḥ tu mahataḥ pratipadam samāsaḥ uktaḥ tadāśrayam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_9: āttvam kartavyam manyante na lakṣaṇena lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_10: pratipadoktasya eva iti pratipadam yaḥ samāsaḥ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam . lakṣaṇoktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_11: ca ayam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . mahān bāhuḥ asya mahābāhuḥ iti . śeṣavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_12: tu yaḥ asau pratyārambhāt kṛtaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tasmāt sidhyati tasmin . yasmāt śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_13: bahuvrīhiḥ iti siddhe anekam anyapadārthe iti āha tena pratipadam bhavati . pradhānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_14: vā yataḥ vṛttiḥ . atha vā gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye kāryasampratyayaḥ . tat yathā gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6447_15: anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve
GS24pmbhasuu:6448: gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat evam . yat hi śabdāśrayam śabdamātre tat bhavati . śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyāttve .
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_1: puṃvadvacanam ca asamānādhikaraṇārtham . mahadāttve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6449_2: kartavyam puṃvadbhāvaḥ ca asamānādhikaraṇārthaḥ kartavyaḥ . mahatyāḥ ghāsaḥ mahāghāsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6451_0: mahatyāḥ viśiṣṭaḥ mahāviśiṣṭaḥ . aṣṭanaḥ kapāle haviṣi . aṣṭanaḥ kapāle haviṣi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6451_1: kartavyam . aṣṭākapālam carum nirvapet . haviṣi iti kimartham . aṣṭakapālam brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6451_2: . gavi ca yukte . gavi ca yukte upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aṣṭāgavena śakaṭena . yukte
GS24pmbhasuu:6452: (P_6,3.47) KA_III.161.17-18 Ro_IV.629 prāk śatāt iti vaktavyam iha mā bhūt . dviśatam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6456: (P_6,3.48) KA_III.161.20-162.3 Ro_IV.629 sarveṣāṅgrahaṇam kimartham . catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau sarveṣām vibhāṣā yathā syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6457_0: dvyaṣṭanoḥ ca treḥ ca . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam dvyaṣṭangrahaṇamanuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6457_1: . yadi tat anuvartate treḥ trayaḥ dvyaṣṭanoḥ ca iti dvyaṣṭanoḥ api dtrayaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6457_2: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya
GS24pmbhasuu:6457_3: gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate . dvyaṣṭanaḥ saṅkhyayām abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6457_4: treḥ trayaḥ . tataḥ vibhāṣā catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau sarveṣām iti . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam tat apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:6458_0: (P_6,3.50) KA_III.162.5-17 Ro_IV.629-631 yaṇgrahaṇam idam pratyayagrahaṇam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6458_1: pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti yadaṇante prāpnoti . yadaṇgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6458_2: rūpagrahaṇam lekhagrahaṇāt . yadaṇgrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam draṣṭavyam . kutaḥ . lekhagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6458_3: . yat ayam lekhagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na yadaṇante bhavati iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:6459_0: atyalpam idam ucyate . sarvatra eva uttarapadādhikāre pratyayagrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6459_1: draṣṭavyam . kutaḥ . lekhagrahaṇāt eva . kim prayojanam . kumārī gauritarā . ghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6459_2: nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . yadi etat jñāpyate khiti anavyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6459_3: iti khiti eva anantarasya anavyayasya hrasvatvam prāpnoti . khiti anantaraḥ hrasvabhāvī
GS24pmbhasuu:6459_4: na asti iti kṛtvā khidante bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ayam asti stanandhayaḥ iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6459_5: api śapā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:6459_6: bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:6459_7: anantarasya na bhavati iti yat ayam anavyayasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . na hi khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:6461_0: padopahatārtham] . padādeśe antodāttanipātanam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . padopahatārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6461_1: . pādena upahatam padopahatam . tṛtīyā karmaṇi iti prakṛtisvaratve pūrvapadāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6461_2: yathā syāt . upadeśivadvacanam ca svarasiddhyartham . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6461_3: . kim prayojanam . svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām antodāttanipātane kṛte samāsasvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6462: (P_6,3.53) KA_III.163.6-7 Ro_IV.632 padbhāve ike caratau upasaṅkhyānam . padbhāve ike caratau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pādābhyām carati padikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6463: (P_6,3.56) KA_III.163.9 Ro_IV.632 niṣke ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . panniṣkeṇa pādaniṣkeṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:6464: (P_6,3.57) KA_III.163.11-12 Ro_IV.632 sañjñāyām uttarapadasya iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . lohitodaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_0: (P_6,3.59) KA_III.163.14-164.2 Ro_IV.633 ekahalādau iti kimartham . udakasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_1: . ucyamāne api etasmin atra prapnoti . etat api ekahalādi . kim kāraṇam . ekaikavarṇavartitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_2: vācaḥ uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām . ekaikavarṇavartinī vāk . na dvau varṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_3: yugapat uccārayati . tat yathā gauḥ iti ukte yāvat gakāre vāk vartate tāvat na aukāre
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_4: na visarjanīye . yāvat auakāre na tāvat gakāre na visarjanīye . yāvat visarjanīye
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_5: na tāvat gakāre na aukāre . uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām . uccaritaḥ varṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_6: pradhvastaḥ ca . atha aparaḥ prayujyate . na varṇaḥ varṇasya sahāyaḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6466_7: ekahalādau iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca ekahalādiḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6467: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ ekahalādiḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yatra ekam halam uccārya ac ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6468: (P_6,3.61) KA_III.164.4-19 Ro_IV.634-635 ikaḥ hrasvatvam uttarapadamātre . ikaḥ hrasvatvam uttarapadamātre vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6469_0: alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . sarvānte hi lokavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6469_1: . lokavijñānāt hi yat eva sarvāntam padam tasmin pūrvapadasya hrasvatvam syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6469_2: vā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . alābūḥ ca karkandhūḥ ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6473_0: alābukarkandhudṛnbhūnām phalam alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . yadi evam dṛnbhvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6473_1: pūrvanipātaḥ prāpnoti . rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . atha vā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6475_0: alābūḥ ca karkandhudṛnbhuphalam ca alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . evam api phalena
GS24pmbhasuu:6475_1: akṛtaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavati . pratyekam phalaśabdaḥ parisamāpyate . iyaṅuvaṅavyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6475_2: . iyaṅuvaṅbhāinām avyayānām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śrīkulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6478: kuḍyībhūtam vṛṣalakulam . abhrūkaṃsādīnām iti vaktavyam . bhrukuṃsaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6480: akāraḥ bhrūkaṃsādīnām iti vaktavyam . bhrakuṃsaḥ , bhrakuṭiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6481: (P_6,3.62) KA_III.164.21 Ro_IV.635-636 taddhite kim udāharaṇam . ekatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6482: ekatā . na etat asti prayojanam . puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . tāsilādiṣu ā kṛtvasucaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekasyāḥ āgatam ekarūpyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6483: ekamayam . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ekatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_0: ekatā . nanu ca uktam puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati . uktam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_1: tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya iti . atha uttarapade kim udāharaṇam . ekaśāṭī . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_2: . puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_3: . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekasyāḥ kṣīram ekaṣīram . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ekaśāṭī
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_4: . nanu ca uktam puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati . na kopadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6484_5: iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat kopadhapratiṣedhe taddhitavugrahaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6485: (P_6,3.66) KA_III.165.9-166.3 Ro_IV.636-637 khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ anajantatvāt . khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ . kālimmanyā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_0: hariṇimmanyā . kim kāraṇam . anajantatvāt . mumi kṛte anajantatvāt hrasvatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_1: prāpnoti . siddham tu hrasvāntasya mumvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . hrasvāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_2: mum bhavati iti vaktavyam . sanniyogāt vā . atha vā sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_3: yatnaḥ codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . mum ca . kim ca. yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_4: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . hrasvatvam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_5: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ anajantatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_6: parihṛtam etat siddham tu hrasvāntasya mumvacanāt iti . tat tarhi hrasvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_7: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ikaḥ hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_8: gālavasya iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_9: iti eṣā saptamī hrasvaḥ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_10: pūrvasya iti . atha vā khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . khiti hrasvabhāvī na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_11: iti kṛtvā bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāsyate . ajantam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . atha vā kāryakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_12: sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_13: idam bhavati acaḥ iti . tatra vacanāt anajantasya api bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6486_14: vacanāt prāpnoti . vāṅmanyaḥ iti . na etat asti . ikaḥ iti vartate . evam api khaṭvammanyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6487: atra na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ābgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṅyāpoḥ sañjñācchandasoḥ bahulam iti . evam api kīlālapammanyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6488: śubhaṃyammanyaḥ atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt pūrvoktau eva parihārau .
GS24pmbhasuu:6489_0: (P_6,3.68.1) KA_III.166.5-167.3 Ro_IV.638-639 amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6489_1: . amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe prayojanam ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśāḥ . amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6489_2: ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśāḥ prayojanam . ātvam prayojanam . gāmmanyaḥ . pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6489_3: prayojanam . strīmmanyaḥ . guṇaḥ prayojanam . narammanyaḥ . iyaṅuvaṅau prayojanam . śriyammanyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6490_1: . amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe ātvapūrvasavarṇayoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . aprathamātvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6490_2: . prathamayoḥ iti ucyate na ca atra prathamām paśyāmaḥ . kim ca bhoḥ ātvam prathamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6490_3: iti ucyate . na khalu prathamayoḥ iti ucyate . prathamayoḥ iti tu vijñāyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6490_4: . amśasoḥ iti ucyate . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . śassahacaritaḥ yaḥ amśabdaḥ . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6490_5: śassahacaritaḥ . prathamā eva . nanu ca pratyayavadanudeśāt bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6491_0: hi] viśeṣānatideśaḥ . sāmanye hi atidiśyamāne viśeṣaḥ na atidiṣṭaḥ bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6491_1: yathā . brahmaṇavat asmin kṣatriye vartitavyam iti sāmānyam yat brāhmaṇakāryam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6491_2: kṣatriye atidiśyate . yat viśiṣṭam māṭhare kauṇḍinye vā na tat atidiśyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6491_3: iha api sāmānyam yat pratyayakāryam tat atidiśyate yat viśiṣṭam dvitīyaikavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6491_4: bhavati prathamayoḥ iti na tat atidiśyate . siddham tu dvitīyaikavacanavadvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6491_5: . siddham etat . katham . dvitīyaikavacanavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6491_6: vā . atha vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . am ca am ca am . icaḥ ekācaḥ am bhavati ampratyayavat
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_0: (P_6,3.68.2) KA_III.167.4-14 Ro_IV.639-640 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . śriyam ātmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_1: manyate brāhmaṇakulam . śriyammanyam āhosvit śrimanyam iti . śriyammanyam iti bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_2: . svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti luk kasmāt na bhavati . na aprāpte luki am ārabhyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_3: yathā eva supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti etam bādhate evam svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti etam
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_4: ami lukam bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_5: . na ca aprāpte supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti etasmin etat ārabhyate . svamoḥ napuṃsakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_6: iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_7: iti evam supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti etam bādhate . svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti etam
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_8: na bādhiṣyate . evam tarhi asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_9: amaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ luk na bhaviṣyati . na eṣā paribhāṣā uttarapadādhikāre śakyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6492_10: vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . dviṣantapaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6493: parantapaḥ . saṃyogāntalopaḥ na syāt . tasmāt śrimanyam iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6494: (P_6,3.70) KA_III.167.16-168.14 Ro_IV.641-642 astusatyāgadasya kāre . astusatyāgadasya kāre upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . astuṅkāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6496_0: agadaṅkāraḥ . bhakṣasya chandasi . bhakṣasya chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6496_1: te bhakṣaṅkārasya . chandasi iti kim . bhakṣakārasya tat matam iti . dhenoḥ bhavyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6496_2: . dhenoḥ bhavyāyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dhenumbhavyā . lokasya pṛṇe . lokasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6496_3: pṛṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . lokamprṇasya dhanvinaḥ . itye anabhyāśasya . itye
GS24pmbhasuu:6496_4: anabhyāśasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . anabhyāśamityaḥ . bhrāṣṭrāgnyoḥ indhe . bhrāṣṭrāgnyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_0: agnimindhaḥ . gile agilasya . gile agilasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . timiṅgilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_1: . agilasya iti kimartham . gilagilaḥ . gilagile ca iti vaktavyam . timiṅgilagilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6497_2: . uṣṇabhadrayoḥ karaṇe . uṣṇabhadrayoḥ karaṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . uṣṇaṅkaraṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6498: bhadraṅkaraṇam . sūtograrājabhojakulamerubhyaḥ duhituḥ putraṭ vā . sūtograrājabhojakulamerubhyaḥ duhituḥ putraṭ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam . sūtaputrī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_0: (P_6,3.72) KA_III.168.16-20 Ro_IV.642-643 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_1: . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . khiti iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:6510_2: . rātreḥ aprāpte . rātreḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā . prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . rātrimmanyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6512: (P_6,3.73) KA_III.168.22-169.8 Ro_IV.642-643 kimartham nañaḥ sānubandhakasya grahaṇam kriyate na nasya iti eva ucyeta . nasya iti ucyamāne karṇaputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6513: varṇaputraḥ iti atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam api praśnaputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6514: viśnaputraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam api vāmanaputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6515_0: pāmanaputraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tasmāt sānubandhakasya grahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6515_1: nañaḥ nalope avakṣepe tiṅi upasaṅkhyānam . nañaḥ nalope avakṣepe tiṅi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6515_2: kartavyam . apacasi vai tvam jālma . akaroṣi vai tvam jālma .
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_0: (P_6,3.74) KA_III.169.10-16 Ro_IV.644 kimartham tasmāt iti ucyate na nuṭ aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_1: eva ucyeta . nuṭ aci iti ucyamāne nañaḥ eva nuṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_2: kariṣyate . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . tadoḥ saḥ sau anantyayoḥ iti tadoḥ grahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_3: kartavyam . tatra hi tavargānirdeśe etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt . aneṣaḥ karoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_4: . yāvatā pūrvāntaḥ saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati . na evam śakyam . anuṣṇaḥ iti nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_5: prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ prasajyeta . nugvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . ṅamuṭ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_6: prāpnoti . tasmāt parādiḥ kartavyaḥ . parādau ca kriyamāṇe tasmāt iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6517: (P_6,3.76) KA_III.169.18-170.4 Ro_IV.644-645 kimartham āduk ucyate na aduk eva ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6519_0: ekānnaśatam . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6519_1: prāpnoti . evam tarhi aduṭ kariṣyate . aduṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum . ānunāsikyam hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:6519_2: syāt . yat hi tat yaraḥ anunāsike anunāsikaḥ va iti padāntasya iti evam tat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6519_3: punaḥ kāraṇam padāntasya iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt . budhnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6521_0: badhnāti . evam tarhi anuṭ kariṣyate . anuṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum . vibhāṣayā ānunāsikyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6521_1: . tena idam eva rūpam syāt ekānnaviṃśatiḥ . idam na syāt . ekānnaviṃśatiḥ iti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:6521_2: tarhi aduk eva . nanu ca uktam ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6521_3: doṣaḥ . akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6521_4: bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6521_5: saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidhiḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . pararūpam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6521_6: prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya punaḥ nimittam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6522_0: (P_6,3.78) KA_III.170.6-12 Ro_IV.645-646 sahasya halopavacanam . sahasya halopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6522_1: vaktavyaḥ . sādeśe hi svare doṣaḥ . sādeśe hi [sati] svare doṣaḥ syāt . āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6523_0: sabhāryaḥ .] saḥ tarhi lopaḥ vaktatvyaḥ . na vaktatvyaḥ . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6523_1: . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6523_2: vaktavyaḥ . saḥ yathā eva hi nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram bādhate evam samāsasvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6525_0: (P_6,3.79) KA_III.170.14-17 Ro_IV.646 granthānte vacanānarthakyam avyayībhāvena kṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6525_1: . granthānte vacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . avyayībhāvena kṛtatvāt . avyayībhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:6525_2: ca akāle iti eva siddham . yaḥ tarhi kālottarapadaḥ granthāntaḥ tadartham idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6527_1: aviśeṣāt . upasarjanasya vāvacane sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya upasarjanasya sādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6529_0: sahakṛtvā . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6529_1: sādeśaḥ bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . siddham tu bahuvrīhinirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6529_2: . siddham etat . katham . bahuvrīhinirdeśāt . bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6530_0: sahakṛtvapriyaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . bahuvrīhau yat uttarapadam iti evam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6530_1: . nanu etat api bahuvrīhau uttarapadam . evam tarhi bahuvrīhau yat upasarjanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6530_2: evam vijñāsyate . bahuvrīhau ca yat upasarjanam bahuvrīhim prati ca yat upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6530_3: . saḥ tarhi bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha kaḥ cit pradhānānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6530_4: eva samāsaḥ kaḥ cit upasarjanānām eva kaḥ cit pradhānopasarjanānām . tat yaḥ upasarjanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6530_5: eva samāsaḥ tat upasarjanam . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ ghāṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6530_6: iti . atha vā matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣyakāḥ eṣām te ime puṣyakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6530_7: . kālakāḥ eṣām te ime kālakāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6531: (P_6,3.83): KA_III.171.13-14 Ro_IV.648 prakṛtyā āśiṣi agavādiṣu . prakṛtyā āśiṣi agavādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sagave savatsāya sahalāya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6532_0: (P_6,3.86) KA_III.171.16-19 Ro_IV.648 caraṇe kim nipātyate . brahmaṇi upapade samānapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:6532_1: vrate karmaṇi careḥ ṇiniḥ vratalopaḥ ca . brahmaṇi upapade samānapūrve vrate karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:6532_2: careḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayaḥ vratalopaḥ ca nipātyate . samāne brahmaṇi vratam catarti iti sabrahmacārī .
GS24pmbhasuu:6533: (P_6,3.89) KA_III.171.21-22 Ro_IV.649 dṛgdṛśavatuṣu dṛkṣe upasaṅkhyānam . dṛgdṛśavatuṣu dṛkṣe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sadṛkṣāsaḥ pratisadṛkṣāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6534: (P_6,3.93, 116) KA_III.172.2-11 Ro_IV.649-650 kimartham añcatinahyādiṣu kvibgrahaṇam kriyate . iha mā bhūt . samañcanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6535_0: upanahanam . na etat asti prayojanam . uttarapade iti vartate na ca antareṇa kvipam
GS24pmbhasuu:6535_1: añcatinahyādayaḥ uttarapadāni bhavanti . tatra antareṇa kvibgrahaṇam kvibante eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6535_2: bhaviṣyati . tadādividhinā prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati añcatinahyādiṣu kvibgrahaṇanārthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6535_3: yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe . añcatinahyādiṣu kvibgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6535_4: . yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe . algrahaṇeṣu etat bhavati na ca idam algrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6535_5: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat kvibgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra dhātugrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6535_6: tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . ataḥ kṛkami iti atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6536: ayaskṛt ayaskāra iti api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6537_1: . adrisadhryoḥ antodāttatvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . kṛtsvaranivṛttyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6542: sadhryañcaḥ . tatra chandasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra chandasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . viśvācī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6543: ghṛtācī . yadi chandasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate katham sā kadrīcī . evam tarhi chandasi striyām bahulam iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6544: (P_6,3.97) KA_III.173.2-5 Ro_IV.651 samāpaḥ īttvapratiṣedhaḥ . samāpaḥ īttvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . samāpam nāma devayajanam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:6546: antarīpam . iha mā bhūt . prāpam , parāpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6547: (P_6,3.98) KA_III.173.7-8 Ro_IV.651 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na udanoḥ deśe iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6548: anūpaḥ . savarṇadīrghatven siddham . na sidhyati . avagrahe doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6549_0: (P_6,3.99) KA_III.173.11-13 Ro_IV.651 aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyasthasya iti ucyate . tatra idam
GS24pmbhasuu:6549_1: na sidhyati . anyasya idam anyadīyam . anyasya kārakam anyatkārakam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6549_2: aviśeṣeṇa anyasya duk chakārakayoḥ iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6550: (P_6,3.101) KA_III.173.16-17 Ro_IV.651 kadbhāve trau upasaṅkhyānam . kadbhāve trau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kutsitāḥ trayaḥ kattrayaḥ . ke vā trayaḥ . na bibhṛyuḥ kattrayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_0: (P_6,3.109.1) KA_III.173.19-174.15 Ro_IV.652-654 pṛṣodarādīni iti ucyate . kāni pṛṣodarādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_1: . pṛṣodaraprakārāṇi . kāni punaḥ pṛṣodaraprakārāṇi . yeṣu lopāgamavikārāḥ śrūyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_2: na ca ucyante . atha yathā iti kim idam . prakāravacane thāl . atha kim idam upadiṣṭāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_3: iti . uccāritāni . kutaḥ etat . diśiḥ uccāraṇakriyaḥ . uccārya hi varṇān āha updiṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_4: ime varṇāḥ iti . kaiḥ punaḥ upadiṣṭāḥ . śiṣṭaiḥ . ke punaḥ śiṣṭāḥ . vaiyākaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_5: . kutaḥ etat . śāstrapūrvikā hi śiṣṭiḥ vaiyākaraṇāḥ ca śāstrajñāḥ . yadi tarhi śāstrapūrvikā
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_6: śiṣṭiḥ śiṣṭipūrvakam ca śāstram tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_7: na prakalpante . evam tarhi nivāsataḥ ācārataḥ ca . saḥ ca ācāraḥ āryāvartte eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_8: . kaḥ punaḥ āryāvarttaḥ . prāk ādarśāt [R adarśanāt] pratyak kālakavanāt dakṣiṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_9: himavantam uttareṇa pāriyātram . etasmin āryanivāse ye brāhmaṇāḥ kumbhīdhānyāḥ alolupāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_10: agṛhyamāṇakāraṇāḥ kim cit antareṇa kasyāḥ cit vidyāyāḥ pāragāḥ tatrabhavantaḥ śiṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_11: . yadi tarhi śiṣṭāḥ śabdeṣu pramāṇam kim aṣṭādhyāyyā kriyate . śiṣṭajñānārthā aṣṭādhyāyī
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_12: . katham punaḥ aṣṭādhyāyyā śiṣṭāḥ śakyāḥ vijñātum . aṣṭādhyāyīm adhīyānaḥ anyam paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_13: anadhīyānam ye atra vihitāḥ śabdāḥ tān prayuñjānam . saḥ paśyati . nūnam asya daivānugrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_14: svabhāvaḥ vā yaḥ ayam na ca aṣṭādhyāyīm adhīte ye ca asyam vihitāḥ śabdāḥ tān prayuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:6551_15: . nūnam ayam anyān api jānāti . evam eṣā śiṣṭajñānārthā aṣṭādhyāyī .
GS24pmbhasuu:6552: (P_6,3.109.2) KA_III.174.16-175.7 Ro_IV.654-655 dikśabdebhyaḥ tīrasya tārabhāvaḥ vā . dikśabdebhyaḥ tīrasya tārabhāvaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . dakṣiṇatīram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6553_0: dakṣiṇatāram . vācaḥ vāde ḍatvam valabhāvaḥ ca uttarapadasya iñi . vācaḥ vāde ḍatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6553_1: vaktavyam valabhāvaḥ ca uttarapadasya iñi vaktavyaḥ . vāgvādasya apatyam vāḍvaliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6553_2: . ṣaṣaḥ utvam datṛdaśasu uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca . ṣaṣaḥ utvam vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6554_0: ṣoḍaśa . dhāsu vā . dhāsu vā iti vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca vaktavyam . ṣoḍhā
GS24pmbhasuu:6554_1: ṣaḍḍhā kuru . atha kimartham bahuvacananirdeśaḥ kriyate na punaḥ dhāyām iti eva ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6554_2: . nānādhikaraṇavācī yaḥ dhāśabdaḥ tasya grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6554_3: ṣaṭ dadhāti iti ṣaḍdhā iti . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6554_4: utvam vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ca ṣṭutvam . dūḍāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6557_0: dūḍhyaḥ . svaro rohatau chandasi . svaro rohatau chandasi utvam vaktavyam . ehi tvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6557_1: jāye svo rohāva . pīvopavasanādīnām chandasi lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pīvopavasanānām payopavasanānām śriyā idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6558_0: (P_6,3.111) KA_III.175.9-14 Ro_IV. 656 pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham na tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:6558_1: pūrvasya iti pūrvasya eva bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . na hi ḍhralopena ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:6559: haraṇīyam . na evam vijñāyate ḍhroḥ lopaḥ ḍhralopaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6560: ḍhralope iti . katham tarhi . ḍhroḥ lopaḥ asmin saḥ ayam ḍhralopaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6561_0: ḍhralope iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ pūrvagrahaṇena . bhavati hi ḍhralopena ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:6561_1: . idam tarhi prayojanam . uttarapade iti vartate . tena ānantaryamātre yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6562: (P_6,3.112) KA_III.175.16-176.4 Ro_IV.656-657 varṇagrahaṇam kimartham na sahivahoḥ ot asya iti eva ucyeta . vṛddhau api kṛtāyām yathā syāt . udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6564: udavoḍha iti . atha avarṇagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . ūḍhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_0: ūḍhavān iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhavatu atra ottvam . śravaṇam kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_1: bhavati . pūrvatvam asya bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām pūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_2: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ottvam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . evam tarhi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_3: iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_4: ottvam . nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api ottve prāpnoti akṛte api . ottvam api nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_5: . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam ottvam . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_6: prāpnoti . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_7: anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva ottvasya nimittam vihanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_8: pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt ottvam . ottve kṛte samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6565_9: samprasāraṇapūrvatvam . tatra kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ ottvam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6566: (P_6,3.121) KA_III.176.6 Ro_IV.658 apīlvādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . rucivaham , cāruvaham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6567: (P_6,3.122) KA_III.176.8-13 Ro_IV.658 amnuṣyādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . prasevaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6569: prasāraḥ . sādakārayoḥ kṛtrime . sādakārayoḥ kṛtrime iti vaktavyam . iha eva yathā syāt . prāsādaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6570: prākāraḥ . iha mā bhūt . eṣaḥ asya prasādaḥ . eṣaḥ asya prakāraḥ . prativeśādīnām vibhāṣā . prativeśādīnām vibhāṣā dīrghatvam vaktavyam . prativeśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6574: (P_6,3.124) KA_III.176.15-20 Ro_IV.658-659 katham idam vijñāyate . dā iti etasmin takārādau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6575: āhosvit dā iti etasmin takārānte iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate takārādau iti nīttā vittā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6576_0: atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate takārānte iti sudattam pratidattam atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6576_1: . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat takārādau iti . katham nīttā vittā . cartve
GS24pmbhasuu:6576_2: kṛte bhaviṣyati . asiddham cartvam . tasya asiddhatvāt na prāpnoti . āśrayāt siddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6576_3: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu takārānte iti . katham sudattam pratidattam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6577_0: (P_6,3.138) KA_III.177.5-10 Ro_IV.659 iha anye ācāryāḥ cau pratyaṅgasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:6577_1: āhuḥ . tat iha api sādhyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na pratyaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6577_2: bhavati iti yat ayam cau dīrghatvam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6578_0: (P_6,3.139) KA_III.177.2-3 Ro_IV.659-660 ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6578_1: . ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ikaḥ hrasvasya avakāśaḥ . grāmaṇikulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6579: senānikulam . samprasāraṇadīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā hrasvatvam . yadā na hrasvatvam saḥ avakāśaḥ . hrasvaprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . kārīṣagandhīputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6580_0: kaumudagandhīputraḥ . samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:6580_1: dīrghatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt hrasvatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6580_2: yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_0: (P_6,4.1.1) KA_III.178.2-10 Ro_IV.661-662 ā kutaḥ ayam adhikāraḥ . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_1: aṅgādhikāraḥ . yadi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_2: kartavyam . prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati pratyayalakṣaṇena siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_3: . astu tarhi prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ . yadi prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_4: aṅgādhikāraḥ vavraśca vakārasya samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_5: punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati uḥ adatvasya sthānivadbhāvān na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_6: iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . saḥ ca idānīm aparihāraḥ bhavati yat tat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_7: aṅgānyatvāt ca siddham iti . astu tarhi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_8: . nanu ca uktam guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam kartavyam iti . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6582: (P_6,4.1.2) KA_III.178.11-179.10 Ro_IV.662-665 kim punaḥ iyam sthānṣaṣṭhī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_0: aṅgasya sthāne iti . evam bhavitum arhati . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī cet pañcamyantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_1: ca adhikāraḥ . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī cet pañcamyantasya ca adhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_2: . aṅgāt iti api vaktavyam . anucyamāne hi ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati iti ataḥ iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_3: aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī . tatra aśakyam vivibhaktikatvāt ataḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_4: viśeṣayitum . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . akārāt parasya bhismātrasya ais-bhāvaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_0: odanabhissaṭā iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprasiddhiḥ . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_1: sidhyanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ iti śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_2: ca . ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti goheḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_3: parasparam prati aṅgapratyayasaṅjñābhāvāt . siddham etat . katham . parasparam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_4: aṅgapratyayasaṅjñe bhavataḥ . aṅgasañjñām prati pratyayasañjñā pratyayasañjñām prati
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_5: aṅgasañjñā . kim ataḥ yat parasparam prati aṅgapratyayasaṅjñe bhavataḥ . sambandhaṣaṣthīnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_6: ca . sambandhaṣaṣthīnirdeśaḥ ca ayam kṛtaḥ bhavati . aṅgasya yaḥ bhis-śabdaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_7: . kim ca aṅgasya bhis-śabdaḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_8: ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . evam api avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ aviśeṣitāḥ bhavanti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_9: api sambandhe eva . evam api sthānam aviśeṣitam bhavati . sthānam api sambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_10: eva . evam api na jñāyate kva sthānaṣaṣṭhī kva viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī iti . yatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:6585_11: anyayogam na apekṣate sā sthānaṣaṣṭhī . yatra hi anyayogam apekṣate sā viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:6586_0: (P_6,4.1.3) KA_III.179.11-180.23 Ro_IV.665-669 kāni punaḥ aṅgādhikārasya prayojanani
GS24pmbhasuu:6586_1: . aṅgādhikārasya prayojanam samprasāraṇadīrghatve . halaḥ uttarasya samprasāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6590: durutam . nāmsanoḥ ca . nāmsanoḥ ca dīrghatve prayojanam . nāmi dīrghaḥ bhavati . agnīnām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6591: vāyūnām . aṅgasya iti kimartham . krimiṇām paśya . pāmanām paśya . sani dīrghaḥ bhavati . cicīṣati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6592: tuṣṭūṣati . aṅgasya iti kimartham . dadhi sanoti . madhu sanoti . liṅi etve . liṅi etve prayojanam . gleyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6594: nirvāyāt . ataḥ bhisaḥ aistve . ataḥ bhisaḥ aistve prayojanam . vṛkṣaiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6596: odanabhissaṭā . luṅādiṣu aḍāṭau . luṅādiṣu aḍāṭau prayojanam . akārṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6599: bhruvau bhruvaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham . śryartham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6600: bhrvartham . yuṣmadasmadoḥ prayojanam . sāmaḥ ākam . yuṣmākam asmākam . aṅgasya iti kimartham . yuṣmatsāma ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6601: asmatsāma . tātaṅ prayojanam . jīvatāt bhavān . aṅgasya iti kimartham . paca hi tāvat tvam . jalpa tu tāvat tvam . āmi nuṭ prayojanam . kumārīṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6604: ām iti āha . āne muk prayojanam . pacamānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6605: yajamānaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham . prāṇaḥ . ke hrasvaḥ prayojanam . kiśorikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6606: kumārikā . aṅgasya iti kimartham . kumārī kāyati kumārīkaḥ . yi dīrghaḥ prayojanam . cīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6610_0: abbhakṣaḥ . na etāni santi prayojanāni . katham . arthavadgrahaṇapratyayagrahaṇābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6610_1: siddham . arthavadgrahaṇapratyayagrahaṇābhyām etāni siddhāni . kva cit arthavadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6610_2: na anarthakasya iti evam bhaviṣyati kva cit pratyayāpratyayoḥ grahaṇe pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6610_3: eva grahaṇam bhavati iti . atha vā pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhyeṣye . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:6610_4: pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhīṣe prākarot ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6612_0: upasargāt pūrvam aḍāṭau prāpnutaḥ . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6612_1: tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam . siddham etat . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6612_2: vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam bhavati iti evam upasargāt pūrvam aḍāṭau na bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6613: (P_6,4.2) KA_III.180.25-181.10 Ro_IV.669-670 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:6614_0: tṛtīyaḥ . aṇprakaraṇāt ṛkārasya aprāptiḥ . aṇprakaraṇāt ṛkārasya dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6614_1: . aṇaḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrghaḥ aṇaḥ iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:6614_2: ikaḥ kāśe iti anena iggrahaṇena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . iggrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6614_3: ca aṇviśeṣaṇatvāt . aṇviśeṣaṇam iggrahaṇam . aṇaḥ ikaḥ iti . yadi tarhi aṇviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6614_4: iggrahaṇam cau dīrghaḥ bhavati iti iha na prāpnoti : avācā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6615: avāce . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṇgrahaṇam anuvartate iggrahaṇam nivṛttam . evam api kartṝcā kartṝce ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6616: atra na prāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam . kasmāt na bhavati tṛtīyaḥ . nipātanāt . kim nipātanam . dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthaturyāṇi anyatarasyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6617_0: (P_6,4.3) KA_III.181.12-182.4 Ro_IV.670-673 kimartham āmaḥ sanakārasya grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6617_1: na āmi dīrghaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kena idānim sanakārake bhaviṣyati . nuṭ ayam āmbhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6618_0: nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet . nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:6618_1: dīrghatve na nuṭ syāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām nuṭ iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6618_2: atra kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ . nityam dīrghatvam . kṛte api nuṭi prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:6618_3: api . nityatvāt dīrghatve kṛte hrasvāśrayaḥ nuṭ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi āha ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6618_4: hrasvāntāt nuṭ iti na ca hrasvāntaḥ asti . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanāt yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6618_5: tat na asti . na idam vacanāt labhyam . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6619_0: catasṛṇām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . iha tāvat catasṛṇām iti ṣaṭcaturbhyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6619_1: iti evam bhaviṣyati . tisṛṇām iti trigrahaṇam api tatra prakṛtam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:6619_2: prakṛtam . treḥ trayaḥ iti . idam tarhi tvam nṛṇam nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ . na ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:6619_3: udāharaṇam hrasvagrahaṇam prayojayati . tatra vacanāt bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6619_4: . hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . uttarāṛtham tarhi sanakāragrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6619_5: nopadhāyāḥ ca carmaṇām . nopadhāyāḥ nāmi yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : carmaṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6620: varmaṇām iti . nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet . vacanāt yatra tat na asti . nopadhāyāḥ ca carmaṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_1: . hanaḥ kvau upadhālakṣaṇam dīrghatvam prāpnoti . anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_2: . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vṛtrahaṇau vṛtrahaṇaḥ iti . niyamavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_3: . inhanpūṣāryamṇām śau sau ca iti etasmāt niyamavacanāt dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati
