GS24pmbhasuu:6621_4: . niyamavacanāt siddham iti cet sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe niyamavacanāt anyatra aniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_5: . niyamavacanāt siddham iti cet sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe niyamavacanāt anyatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_6: na prāpnoti . kva anyatra . vṛtrahaṇi bhrūṇahani . evam tarhi dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_7: inprabhṛtīnām tam viniyamya suṭi iti suvidvān . dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha inprabhṛtīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_0: inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne dīrghaḥ bhavati . kimartham idam . niyamāṛtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_1: inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne eva na anyatra . śau niyamam punaḥ eva vidadhyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_2: . tataḥ śau . śau eva sarvanāmasthāne na anyatra . tataḥ sau . sau eva sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_3: na anyatra . bhrūṇahani iti tathā asya na duṣyet . tathā asya bhrūṇahani iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_4: bhavati . śāsti nivartya suṭi iti aviśeṣe śau niyamam kuru vā api asamīkṣya . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_5: vā nivṛtte sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe aviśeṣeṇa śau niyamam vakṣyāmi . inhanpūṣāryamṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_6: śau eva . tataḥ sau . sau eva . iha api tarhi niyamāt na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_0: indraḥ vṛtrahāyate . dīrghavidheḥ upadhāniyamāt me hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_1: . upadhālakṣaṇadīrghatvasya niyamaḥ na ca etat upadhālakṣaṇam dīrghatvam . suṭi api
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_2: vā prakṛte anavakāśaḥ śau niyamaḥ aprakṛtapratiṣedhe . atha vā anuvartamāne sarvanāmasthānagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_3: anavakāśaḥ śau niyamaḥ aprakṛtasya api dīrghatvasya niyāmakaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_4: . yasya hi śau niyamaḥ suṭi na etat tena na tatra bhavet viniyamyam . yasya hi śiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_5: sarvanāmasthānam na tasya suṭ . yasya suṭ sarvanāmasthānam na tasya śiḥ . tatra sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_6: niyamyam na asti iti kṛtvā aviśeṣeṇa śau niyamaḥ vijñāsyate . dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_7: inprabhṛtīnām tam viniyamya suṭi iti suvidvān . śau niyamam punaḥ eva vidadhyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_8: bhrūṇahani iti tathā asya na duṣyet . śāsti nivartya suṭi iti aviśeṣe śau niyamam
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_9: kuru vā api asamīkṣya . dīrghavidheḥ upadhāniyamāt me hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_10: doṣaḥ . suṭi api vā prakṛte anavakāśaḥ śau niyamaḥ aprakṛtapratiṣedhe . yasya hi
GS24pmbhasuu:6623_11: śau niyamaḥ suṭi na etat tena na tatra bhavet viniyamyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6624: (P_6,4.14) KA_III.183.20-184.11 Ro_IV.677-679 atvasantasya dīrghatve pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . atvasantasya dīrghatve pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gomān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6625_0: yavamān . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6625_1: grahaṇam na iti evam pitaḥ na prāpnoti . ananubandhakagrahaṇe iti ucyate . sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6625_2: idam grahaṇam . evam tarhi tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya grahaṇam na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6625_3: evam pitaḥ na prāpnoti . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . pakāralope
GS24pmbhasuu:6625_4: kṛte na atubantam bhavati atvantam eva . yathā eva tarhi pakāralope kṛte na atubantam
GS24pmbhasuu:6625_5: evam ukāralope api kṛte na atvantam . nanu ca bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati atvantam
GS24pmbhasuu:6625_6: . yathā eva tarhi bhūtapūrvagatyā atvantam evam atubantam api . evam tarhi āśrīyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6625_7: bhūtapūrvagatiḥ atvantam ca āsrīyate na atubantam . na sidhyati . iha hi vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6626_0: yatra asya etat rūpam iti . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca na antareṇa laukikam prayogam . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6626_1: ca laukike prayoge sānubandhakānām prayogaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6626_2: . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . upadeśe ca etat atubantam na atvantam . yadi punaḥ atśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:6626_3: gṛhītvā dīrghatvam ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta : jagat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6627: janagat . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti : kṛtavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6628: bhuktavān iti . kva tarhi syāt . pacan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6629: yajan . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣtam ca na sidhyati . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6630: (P_6,4.16.1) KA_III.184.13-25 Ro_IV.679-680 gameḥ dīrghatve iṅgrahaṇam . gameḥ dīrghatve iṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . iṅgameḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6631_0: sañjigaṃsate vatsaḥ mātrā iti . agrahaṇe hi anādeśasya api dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6631_1: hi iṅgrahaṇe anādeśasya api dīrghatvam prasajyeta . sañjigaṃsate vatsaḥ mātrā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6631_2: . na vā chandasi anādeśasya api dīrghatvadarśanāt iṅgrahaṇānarthakyam . na vā iṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6631_3: kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . chandasi anādeśasya api dīrghatvadarśanāt . chandasi anādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6631_4: api gameḥ dīrghatvam dṛśyate . svargam lokam sañjigāṃsat . chandasi anādeśasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:6631_5: dīrghatvadarśanāt iṅgrahaṇam anarthakam . yathā eva tarhi chandasi anādeśasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:6631_6: gameḥ dīrghatvam bhavati evam bhāṣāyām api prāpnoti . tasmāt iṅgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6631_7: . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ sani . ajantānām sani dīrghaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6631_8: . tataḥ hanigamyoḥ . hanigamyoḥ ca sani dīrghaḥ bhavati . acaḥ iti eva . acaḥ sthāne yau hanigamī .
GS24pmbhasuu:6632_0: (P_6,4.16.2) KA_III.185.1-7 Ro_IV.681 atha upadhāgrahaṇam anuvartate uta aho na .
GS24pmbhasuu:6632_1: kim ca ataḥ . sani dīrghe upadhādhikāraḥ cet vyañjanapratiṣedhaḥ . sani dīrghe upadhādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6633_0: cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati iti evam artham . evam tarhi nivṛttam . anadhikāre uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6633_1: uktam . hanigamidīrgheṣu ajgrahaṇam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6633_2: plutaḥ iti yatra brūyāt acaḥ iti etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6634_0: (P_6,4.19.1) KA_III.185.9-16 Ro_IV.681-683 atha , ūṭ ādiḥ kasmān na bhavati . ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6634_1: ṭit bhavati iti prāpnoti . kasya punaḥ ādiḥ . vakārasya . astu . vakārakasya kā pratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6634_2: . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām
GS24pmbhasuu:6634_3: upadhāyāḥ ca iti dvau ūṭau syātām . evam tarhi na eṣaḥ ṭit . kaḥ tarhi . ṭhit . yadi tarhi ṭhit ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6635_0: dhautaḥ paṭaḥ iti etyedhatyūṭsu iti vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . cartve kṛte bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6635_1: . asiddham cartvam . tasya asiddhatvāt na prāpnoti . āśrayāt siddhatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6635_2: . asati anyasmin āśrayāt siddhatvam syāt asti ca anyaḥ siddhaḥ vāhaḥ uṭ iti . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6635_3: api ṭhit kariṣyate . tatra ubhayoḥ cartve kṛte āśrayāt siddhatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6636_0: (P_6,4.19.2) KA_III.185.17-186.15 Ro_IV.683-686 atha kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate uta
GS24pmbhasuu:6636_1: aho na . kim ca ataḥ . śūṭtve kṅidadhikāraḥ cet chaḥ ṣatvam . śūṭtve kṅidadhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6638_0: praṣṭavyam . tukprasaṅgaḥ ca . tuk ca prāpnoti . nivṛtte api kṅidgrahaṇe avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6638_1: atra tugabhāvārthaḥ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt hi tuk prāpnoti . cchvoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6638_2: sannipātagrahaṇam vijñāyate . nanu evam api antyasya prāpnoti . sannipātagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6638_3: sarvasya bhaviṣyati . evam api aṅgasya prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6638_4: iti evam aṅgasya na bhaviṣyati . yadi evam utpucchayateḥ apratyayaḥ utpuṭ iti prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6639: utput iti ca iṣyate . tathā vāñchateḥ apratyayaḥ vān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6640_0: vāṃśau vāṃśaḥ iti na sidhyati . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . tatra tu etāvān viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6640_1: . anuvartamāne kṅidgrahaṇe chaḥ ṣatvam vaktavyam tatra ca api sannipātagrahaṇam vijñeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6640_2: . nivṛtte divaḥ ūḍbhāvaḥ . nivṛtte divaḥ ūḍbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . dyubhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_0: dyubhiḥ iti . ūṭhi kṛte divaḥ ut iti uttvam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_1: dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti . tadartham taparaḥ kṛtaḥ . evamartham taparaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_2: . kva punaḥ kṅidgrahaṇam prakṛtam . anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_3: ajjhanagamām sani kvijhaloḥ ca iti kvijhaloḥ api dīrghatvam prāpnoti . jhali tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_4: na doṣaḥ . sanam jhalgrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sani jhalādau iti . kvau api ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_5: jñāpayati na anena kvau dīrghatvam bhavati iti yat ayam kvibvacipracchyāyatastukaṭaprujuśrīṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_6: dīrghaḥ asamprasāram ca iti dīrghatvam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6643_1: uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6643_2: utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca iti . iha api asiddhavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6643_3: utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca . ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham tāvat . āgahi jahi gataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6644: gatavān . anunāsikalope jabhāve ca kṛte ataḥ lopaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6645_0: ataḥ heḥ iti ca prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt na bhavati . utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6645_1: edhi śādhi . astiśāstyoḥ ettvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhallakṣaṇam dhitvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6645_2: . asiddhatvāt bhavati . atha atragrahaṇam kimartham . atragrahaṇam viṣayārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6645_3: viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . atra etasmin ābhācchāstre ābhācchāstram asiddham yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6648_0: (P_6,4.22.2) KA_III.187.10-189.13 Ro_IV.688-693 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6648_1: . prayojanam śaittvam dhitve . śābhāvaḥ ettvam ca dhitve prayojanam . edhi śādhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6648_2: . astiśāstyoḥ ettvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhallakṣaṇam dhitvam na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6648_3: bhavati . śābhāvaḥ tāvat na prayojayati . evam vakṣyāmi . śās hau śā hau iti . yatvabhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6648_4: sakāraḥ . tatra sāt dhitvam dhi ca iti sakārasya lopaḥ . atha vā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6649_0: ā hau iti vakṣyāmi . evam api sakārasya prāpnoti . upadhāyāḥ iti vartate . upadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6649_1: ātve kṛte sāt dhitvam dhi ca iti sakārasya lopaḥ . atha vā na hau iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6649_2: tatra ettve pratiṣiddhe sāt dhitvam dhi ca iti sakārasya lopaḥ . ettvam api lopāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6649_3: vijñāsyate na ca sakārasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . hilopaḥ uttve . hilopaḥ uttve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6649_4: . kuru iti atra hilope kṛte sārvadhātukapare ukāre iti uttvam na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6649_5: bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati tatra sārvadhātukagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6649_6: sārvadhātuke bhūtapūrvamātre yathā styāt uttvam . tāstilopeṇyaṇādeśāḥ aḍāḍvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6649_7: . talopaḥ astilopaḥ iṇaḥ ca yaṇādeśaḥ aḍāḍvidhau prayojanam . akāri ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6650: aihī iti . talope kṛte luṅi iti aḍāṭau na klprāpnutaḥ . asiddhatvāt bhavataḥ . astilopaḥ iṇaḥ ca yaṇādeśaḥ prayojanam . āsan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6651_0: āyan iti . iṇastyoḥ yaṇlopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ anajāditvāt āṭ na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6651_1: . astilopaḥ tāvat na prayojayati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati lopāt āṭ balīyān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6651_2: yat ayam śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti taparakaraṇam karoti . iṇyaṇādeśaḥ ca api na prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6651_3: . yaṇādeśe yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati . tataḥ eḥ anekācaḥ . eḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6651_4: anekācaḥ iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati . tataḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya yaṇ bhavati . eḥ anekācaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6651_5: eva . sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ . upadeśaḥ iti vartate . tatra upadeśāvasthāyām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6651_6: aḍāṭau bhavataḥ . atha vā ārdhadhātuke iti vartate . atha vā luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu aṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6654_0: aupyata iti na sidhyati . vakṣyati etat ajādīnām aṭā siddham iti . anunāsikalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6654_1: hilopāllopayoḥ jabhāvaḥ ca . anunāsikalopaḥ hilopāllopayoḥ jabhāvaḥ ca prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6655_0: gatavān . anunāsikalope kṛte jabhāve ca ataḥ heḥ ataḥ lopaḥ iti ca lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6655_1: . asiddhatvāt na bhavati . anunāsikalopaḥ tāvat na prayojayati . allope upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6655_2: vartate . yadi upadeśe iti vartate dhinutaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6656: kṛṇutaḥ atra na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na upadeśagrahaṇena prakṛtiḥ abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . ārdhadhātukam abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6657_0: ārdhadhātukopadeśe yat akārāntam iti . jabhāvaḥ ca na prayojayati . hilope yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6657_1: kariṣyate . ataḥ heḥ . tataḥ utaḥ ca . utaḥ ca heḥ luk bhavati iti . tataḥ pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6657_2: . pratyayāt iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . atha kimartham anunāsikalopaḥ hilopāllopayoḥ jabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6657_3: ca iti ucyate na anunāsikalopajabhāvau allopahilopayoḥ iti eva ucyate . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6657_4: mā bhūt iti . anunāsikalopaḥ hilope prayojayati . maṇḍūki tābhiḥ āgahi . rohitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6657_5: ca iha a gahi . marudbhiḥ agne agahi . samprasāraṇam avarṇalope . samprasāraṇam avarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:6658: maghone . samprasāraṇe kṛte yasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:6660_0: iti . rebhāvaḥ āllope . rebhāvaḥ āllope prayojanam . kim svit garbham prathamam dadhre
GS24pmbhasuu:6660_1: āpaḥ . rebhāve kṛte ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6660_2: . etat api na asti prayojanam . chāndasaḥ rebhāvaḥ liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:6660_3: api bhavati . tatra sārvadhātukam apit ṅit bhavati iti ṅitvam . śnābhyastayoḥ ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6661: (P_6,4.22.3) KA_III.189.14-190.9 Ro_IV.693-695 yadi tarhi ayam yogaḥ na ārabhyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6662_0: ut tu kṛñaḥ katham oḥ vinivṛttau . iha kurvaḥ kurmaḥ kuryāt iti ukāralope kṛte sārvadhātukapare
GS24pmbhasuu:6662_1: ukāre iti uttvam na prāpnoti . ṇeḥ api ca iṭi katham vinivṛttiḥ . iha ca kārayateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6662_2: kāriṣyate ṇeḥ aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ na prāpnoti . abruvataḥ tava yogam imam syāt luk
GS24pmbhasuu:6662_3: ca ciṇaḥ nu katham na tarasya . iha ca ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_0: akāritarām ahāritarām iti ciṇaḥ uttarasya tarasya luk na syāt . cam bhagavān kṛtavān
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_1: tu tadartham tena bhavet iṭi ṇeḥ nivṛttiḥ . iha syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu bhāvakarmaṇoḥ upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_2: ajjhanagrahadṛśām vā ciṇvat iṭ ca kim ca . ṇilopaḥ ca . mvoḥ api ye ca tathā api
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_3: anuvṛttau . iha api kurvaḥ kurmaḥ kuryāt iti mvoḥ ye ca iti etat api anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_4: . ciṇluki ca kṅitaḥ eva luk syāt . ciṇluki api prakṛtam kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_5: kva prakṛtam . gamahanakhanaghasām lopaḥ kṅiti anaṅi iti . tat vai saptamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_6: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . ciṇaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī kṅiti iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_7: lprakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . ut tu kṛñaḥ katham oḥ vinivṛttau . ṇeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_8: api ca iṭi katham vinivṛttiḥ . abruvataḥ tava yogam imam syāt luk ca ciṇaḥ nu katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_9: na tarasya . cam bhagavān kṛtavān tu tadartham tena bhavet iṭi ṇeḥ nivṛttiḥ . mvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6663_10: api ye ca tathā api anuvṛttau . ciṇluki ca kṅitaḥ eva luk syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_0: (P_6,4.22.4) KA_III.190.10-192.8 Ro_IV.695-701 ārabhyamāṇe api etasmin yoge siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_1: vasusamprasāraṇam ajvidhau . vasusamprasāraṇam ajvidhau siddham vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_2: . papuṣaḥ paśya . tasthuṣaḥ paśya . ninyuṣaḥ paśya . cicyuṣaḥ paśya . luluvuṣaḥ paśya
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_3: . pupuvuṣaḥ paśya iti . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte aci iti ākāralopādīni yathā syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_4: iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyanti . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt asiddhatvāt ca . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_5: ca eva hi vasusamprasāraṇam asiddham ca . āttvam yalopāllopayoḥ paśuṣaḥ na vājān
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_6: cākhāyitā cākhāyitum . āttvam yalopāllopayoḥ siddham vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_7: paśuṣaḥ na vājān . paśuṣaḥ iti ātttvasya asiddhatvāt ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti ākāralopaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_8: prāpnoti . cākhāyitā cākhāyitum iti āttvasya asiddhatvāt yasya halaḥ iti yalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6664_9: prāpnoti . samānāśrayavacanāt siddham . samānāśrayam asiddham bhavati vyāśrayam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6669_0: pupuvuṣaḥ paśya iti . vasau ākāralopādīni vasantasya vibhaktau samprasāraṇam . paśuṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6669_1: iti viṭi āttvam viḍantasya vibhaktau ākāralopaḥ . cākhāyitā cākhāyitum iti yaṅi āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6669_2: yaṅantasya ca ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6669_3: gaṃsyate . atragrahaṇasāmarthyāt . nanu ca anyat atragrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6669_4: . kim uktam . atragrahaṇam viṣayārtham iti . adhikārāt api etat siddham . iha papuṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6672_0: dvau hetū vypadiṣṭau bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvam asiddhatvam ca iti . tatra bhavaet asiddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6672_1: pratyuktam bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvam tu na eva pratyuktam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ bahiraṅgam antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6672_2: iti ca pratidvandvibhāvinau etau arthau . katham . sati antaraṅge bahiraṅgam sati
GS24pmbhasuu:6672_3: ca bahiraṅge antaraṅgam . na ca atra antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samavasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6672_4: asti . na anabhinirvṛtte bahiraṅge antaraṅgam prāpnoti . tatra nimittam eva bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6672_5: antaraṅgasya . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ ca ayādeśe lyapi . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ ca ayādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6673_0: pratamayya gataḥ . prabebhidayya gataḥ . pracecchidayya gataḥ . prastanayya gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6673_1: . pragadayya gataḥ . hrasvayalopāllopānām asiddhatvāt lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6673_2: na prāpnoti . atra api eṣaḥ parihāraḥ samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . ṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:6673_3: ete vidhayaḥ ṇeḥ lyapi ayādeśaḥ . vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ . vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ siddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6674: babhūvuḥ : vukaḥ asiddhatvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ prāpnoti . upadidīye ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6676: yuṭaḥ asiddhatvāt yaṇādeśaḥ prāpnoti . vukaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . vukam na vakṣyāmi . evam vakṣyāmi :
GS24pmbhasuu:6677_0: bhuvaḥ luṅliṭoḥ ūt upadhāyāḥ iti . atra uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6677_1: . evam api kutaḥ nu khalu etat uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6677_2: na punaḥ sāmpratikī yā upadhā tasyāḥ syāt bhakārasya . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . oḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6677_3: . tena uvarṇasya bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham babhūvatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6679_0: babhūva babhūvitha iti . kim kāraṇam . guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ uvarṇābhāvāt . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6679_1: guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhāt . katham kittvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6679_2: indhibhavatibhyām ca iti . tat vai vayam kittvam pratyācakṣmahe vukā . iha tu kittvena
GS24pmbhasuu:6679_3: vuk pratyākhyāyate . kim punaḥ atra nyāyyam . vugvacanam eva nyāyyam . sati api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:6679_4: kittve syātām eva atra guṇavṛddhī . kim kāraṇam . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6679_5: na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . evam tarhi na arthaḥ vukā na api kittvena . stām atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6679_6: guṇavṛddhī . guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ avāvoḥ ca kṛtayoḥ yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6679_7: . katham . oḥ iti atra avarṇam api pratinirdiśyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6680_0: . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapau kīlālapāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6680_1: evam tarhi vyoḥ iti vartate . tena uvarṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . oḥ vyoḥ iti . iha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:6680_2: oḥ iti anuvartate . vyoḥ iti nivṛttam . yuṭaḥ ca api na vaktavyam . yuḍvacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6680_3: na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat yuḍvacane prayojanam . kim . dvayoḥ yakārayoḥ śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6680_4: yathā syāt . na vyañjanaparasya anekasya ekasya vā yakārasya śravaṇam prati viśeṣaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6681_0: (P_6,4.22.5) KA_III.192.9-193.19 Ro_IV.701-705 kim punaḥ prāk bhāt asiddhatvam āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:6681_1: saha tena . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam sandehaḥ . āṅā ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate āṅ ca punaḥ sandeham
GS24pmbhasuu:6682: ā pāṭaliputrāt vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6683: kim prāk pāṭaliputrāt saha tena iti . evam iha api sandehaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_0: prāk bhāt saha tena iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . prāk bhāt iti cet sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_1: upasaṅkhyānam . prāk bhāt iti cet sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_2: śunaḥ paśya . śunā śune . samprasāraṇe kṛte allopaḥ anaḥ iti prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_3: saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na saṃyogāt vamantāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_4: . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . na astri atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_5: viśeṣaḥ allopena vā nivṛttau satyām pūrvatvena vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . allopena
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_6: nivṛttau satyām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_7: . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_8: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_9: . śunaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na vayam lakṣaṇasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_10: yena kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . yatra tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_11: vibhaktisvaraḥ na asti . bahuśunī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_12: pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasjyeta kumārī iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_13: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ śuni avatarati iti yat ayam śvanśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_14: gaurādiṣu paṭhati . antodāttārtham yatnam karoti . siddham hi syāt ṅīpā eva . maghonaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_15: paśya . maghonā maghone . samprasāraṇe kṛte yasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_16: saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_17: tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . vakṣyati etat maghavan-śabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_18: iti . bhūguṇaḥ . bhūyān . bhūbhāve kṛte oḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ saha tena
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_19: asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_20: api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . dīrghoccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . asti dīrghoccāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_21: prayojanam . kim . bhūmā iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . bahoḥ nañvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6684_22: uttarapadabhūmni iti . atha vā punaḥ astu saha tena iti . ā bhāt iti cet susamprasāraṇayalopaprasthādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6688_0: pupuvuṣaḥ iti . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte aci iti ākāralopādīni na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6688_1: doṣaḥ . uktam etat samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . vasau ākāralopādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:6688_2: vasantasya vibhaktau samprasāraṇam . yalopaḥ . saurī balākā . yaḥ asau aṇi akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6688_3: lupyate tasya asiddhatvāt īti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . atra api eṣaḥ eva parihāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6688_4: samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . aṇi akāralopaḥ aṇantasya īti lopaḥ . prasthādiṣu . preyān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6689_0: stheyān . prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6689_1: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6690_0: (P_6,4.23) KA_III.193.21-194.8 Ro_IV.705-707 atha kimartham śnamaḥ saśakārasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6690_1: kriyate na nāt nalopaḥ iti eva ucyeta . nāt nalopaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne nanditā nandakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6690_2: iti atra api prasajyeta . evam tarhi evam vakṣyāmi nāt nalopaḥ aniditām . tataḥ halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6690_3: upadhāyāḥ kṅiti . aniditām iti . na evam śakyam . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6691_0: hinasti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam nanditā nandakaḥ iti prāpnoti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6691_1: tarhi kṅiti iti vartate . evam api hinasti iti atra na prāpnoti . na eṣā parasaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:6691_2: . kā tarhi . satsaptamī . kṅiti sati . evam tarhi naśabdaḥ eva atra kṅittvena viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6691_3: kṅit cet naśabdaḥ bhavati iti . evam api yajñānām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6692_0: yatnānām iti atra na prāpnoti . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:6692_1: . dīrghatvam kriyatām nalopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6692_2: saśakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . atha kriyamāṇe api saśakāragrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati viśnānām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6693: praśnānām iti . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6694_0: (P_6,4.24) KA_III.194.10-195.4 Ro_IV.707-709 aniditām nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6694_1: upasaṅkhyānam . aniditām nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6696_0: vikampitaḥ . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nibarhayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6696_1: nibarhakaḥ . aci iti kimartham . nibṛṃhyate . aniṭi iti kimartham . nibṛṃhitā nibṛṃhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:6696_2: . tat tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . bṛhiḥ prakṛtyantaram . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6696_3: . aci iti lopaḥ ucyate . anajādau api dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6697: nibṛhyate . aniṭi iti ucyate . iṭau api dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6698: nibarhitum . ajādau iti ucyate . ajādau api na dṛśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6699_0: nibṛṃhayati nibṛṃhakaḥ . rañjeḥ ṇau mṛgamaraṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . rajayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6699_1: mṛgān . mṛgamaraṇe iti kimartham . rañjayati vastrāṇi . ghinuṇi ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6699_2: kartavyam . rāgī . ghinuṇi nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . tyajaraja iti . aśakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6699_3: dhātunirdeśe nipātanam tantram āśrayitum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6701_0: daṃṣṭrā . na etat dhātunipātanam . kim tarhi . pratyayāntasya etat rūpam . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6701_1: ca asya pratyaye lopaḥ bhavati . daṃśasañjasvañjām śapi iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu
GS24pmbhasuu:6703: rajaḥ iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu kittvāt siddham . kitaḥ eva ete auṇādikāḥ . tat yathā rucakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_0: (P_6,4.34) KA_III.195.8-196.2 Ro_IV.709-711 śāsaḥ ittve āśāsaḥ kvau . śāsaḥ ittve
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_1: āśāsaḥ kvau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āśīḥ iti . kim punaḥ idam niyamārtham āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_2: vidhyartham . katham ca niyamārtham syāt katham vā vidhyartham . yadi tāvat śāsimātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_3: grahaṇam tataḥ niyamārtham . athi hi yasmāt śāsaḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_4: vidhyartham . yadi api śāsimātrasya grahaṇam evam api vidhyartham eva . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_5: aṅhaloḥ iti ucyate na ca atra halādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca kvip eva halādiḥ . kvipaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_6: lope kṛte halādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . kviblopaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_7: aṅhaloḥ itttvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṅhaloḥ itttvam . nityaḥ kviblopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_8: . kṛte api aṅhaloḥ itttve prāpnoti akṛte api . nityatvāt kviblope kṛte halādyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_9: na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_10: . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā ca idam api
GS24pmbhasuu:6705_11: bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ . tataḥ kvau . kvau ca śāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6706: mitraśīḥ . tataḥ āṅaḥ . āṅpūrvāt ca kvau śāsaḥ it bhavati . āśīḥ iti . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . āṅpūrvāt śāsaḥ kvau eva . kva mā bhūt . āśāsyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6707_0: āśāsyamānaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aviśeṣeṇa śāsaḥ it bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6707_1: iti uktvā tataḥ aṅi iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . aṅi eva ajādau na
GS24pmbhasuu:6707_2: anyasmin ajādau iti . iha api tarhi niyamāt ittvam prāpnoti . āśāsyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6708: āśāsyamānaḥ iti . yasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam na ca etasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ . katham āśīḥ iti . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . kṣiyāśīḥpraiṣeṣu tiṅ ākāṅkṣam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6709_0: (P_6,4.37) KA_III.196.5-8 Ro_IV.711 anudāttopadeśe anunāsikalopaḥ lyapi ca . anudāttopadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6709_1: anunāsikalopaḥ lyapi ca iti vaktavyam . pramatya pratatya . tataḥ vā amaḥ . vā amaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6709_2: iti vaktavyam . prayatya prayamya praratya praramya praṇatya praṇamya .
GS24pmbhasuu:6710: (P_6,4.40) KA_III.196.10-12 Ro_IV.712 gamādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . parītat sahakaṇṭhikā . saṃyat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6711: sanut iti . ūṅ ca gamādīnām iti vaktavyam . agregūḥ , bhrūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6712: (P_6,4.42.1) KA_III.196.14-22 Ro_IV.712-713 atha kim ayam samuccayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6715: sani jhalādau iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti . sisaniṣati jijaniṣate cikhaniṣati . atha sanviśeṣaṇam jhalgrahaṇam jātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6716_0: jātavān iti atra na prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat samuccayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6716_1: nanu ca uktam sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . prakṛtam jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6716_2: anuvartate . tena sanam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sani jhalādau iti . atha vā punaḥ astu sanviśeṣaṇam . katham jātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6717_0: jātavān iti . prakṛtam jhali kṅiti iti anuvartate . yadi evam na arthaḥ jhalgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6717_1: . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . janasanakhanām anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:6717_2: . tataḥ sani . sani ca janasanakhanām anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_0: (P_6,4.42.2) KA_III.197.1-198.12 Ro_IV.713-716 sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_1: . sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_2: avakāśaḥ anye tanotyādayaḥ . āttvasya avakāśaḥ anye janādayaḥ . sanoteḥ anunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_3: ubhayam prāpnoti . sātaḥ sātavān iti . āttvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_4: vipratiṣedhaḥ . na hi sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya anye tanotyādayaḥ avakāśaḥ . sanoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_5: yaḥ tanotyādiṣu pāṭhaḥ saḥ anavakāśaḥ . na khalu api āttvasya anye janādayaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_6: . sanoteḥ yat āttve grahaṇam tat anavakāśam . tasya anavakāśatvāt ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_7: . evam tarhi tanotyādiṣu pāṭhaḥ tāvat sāvakāśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anyāni tanotyādikāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_8: . tanādibhyaḥ tathāsoḥ iti . āttve api grahaṇam sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sani ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_9: ye vibhāṣā ca . ubhayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_10: . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ pūrvatra asiddhe na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ abhāvāt uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_11: iti . ekasya nāma abhāve vipratiṣedhaḥ na syāt kim punaḥ yatra ubhayam na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_12: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamām
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_13: gaṃsyate . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ iti yat ayam ghumāśthāgāpājahātisām
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_14: hali iti halgrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . halgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6718_15: halādau īttvam yathā syāt iha mā bhūt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6720_0: kambaladaḥ iti . yadi ca atra vipratiṣedhaḥ na syāt halgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6720_1: astu atra īttvam . īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6720_2: iha vipratiṣedhaḥ . tataḥ halgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . vyavasthārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6720_3: etat syāt . halādau īttvam yathā syāt ajādau mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6720_4: prasajyeta . nanu ca asiddhatvāt eva iyaṅādeśaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na śakyam īttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6720_5: iyaṅādeśe asiddham vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_0: dhiyau dhiyaḥ piyau piyaḥ iti . na etat īttvam . kim tarhi . dhyāpyoḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_1: etat . samānāśrayam khalu api asiddham bhavati vyāśram ca etat . katham . kvau īttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_2: kvibantasya vibhaktau iyaṅādeśaḥ . vyavasthārtham eva tarhi halgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_3: . kutaḥ hi etat īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ na punaḥ lopasya asiddhatvāt īttvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_4: . tatra cakrakam avyavasthā prasajyeta . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ . na hi avyavasthākāriṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_5: śāstreṇa bhavitavyam . śāstrataḥ nāma vyavasthā . tatra īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_6: lopena vyavasthānam bhaviṣyati . na khalu api tasmin tat eva asiddham bhavati . vyavasthārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_7: eva tarhi halgrahaṇam kartavyam . halādau īttvam yathā syāt ajādau mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_8: kutaḥ hi etat īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ lopena avasthānam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ lopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_9: asiddhatvāt īttvam īttvena vyavasthānam syāt . tat eva khalu api tasmin asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_10: bhavati . katham . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇānarthakyam saṅghātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_11: apratyayatvāt talopasya ca asiddhatvāt iti . ciṇaḥ luk ciṇaḥ luki eva asiddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_12: . evam tarhi yadi vyavasthārtham etat syāt na eva ayam halgrahaṇam kurvīta . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_13: ayam īttvam uktvā tasya ajādau lopam apavādam vidadhīta . idam asti . ātaḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_14: iṭi ca iti . tataḥ ghumāśthāgāpājahātisām . lopaḥ bhavati iṭi ca ajādau kṅiti . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_15: punaḥ idam . īttvam vakṣyāmi tadbādhanārtham . tataḥ īt . īt ca bhavati ghvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_16: . tataḥ eḥ liṅi . vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ . na lyapi . mayateḥ it anyatarasyām . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_17: yati . yati ca īt bhavati . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat halgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6721_18: karoti garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6722: (P_6,4.45) KA_III.198.14-18 Ro_IV.717 iha anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . sanaḥ ktici lopaḥ ca ātttvam ca vibhāṣā iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:6723: sarvaḥ eva ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . iha lopaḥ api prakṛtaḥ āttvam api prakṛtam vibhāṣāgrahaṇam api prakṛtam . tatra kevalam abhisambandhamātram kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:6724: sanaḥ ktici lopaḥ ca āttvam ca vibhāṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6725_0: (P_6,4.46) KA_III.198.20-199.15 Ro_IV.717-721 kāni punaḥ ārdhadhātukādhikārasya prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6725_1: . ataḥ lopaḥ yalopaḥ ca ṇilopaḥ ca prayojanam āllopaḥ īttvam etvam ca ciṇvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6725_2: ca sīyuṭi . ataḥ lopaḥ . cikīrṣitā cikīrṣitum . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . cikīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:6725_3: . na etat asti prayojanam . astu atra sanaḥ akāralopaḥ . śapaḥ akārasya śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6725_4: bhaviṣyati . śapaḥ eva tarhi mā bhūt . etat api na asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6725_5: jñāpayati na anena śabakārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam adiprabhṛtibhyaḥ śapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6725_6: lukam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . kāryāṛtham etat syāt . vittaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6726_0: mṛṣṭaḥ iti . yat tarhi ākārāntebhyaḥ lukam śāsti . idam tarhi prayojanam . vṛkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6726_1: plakṣasya . ataḥ lopaḥ . prāpnoti . yalopaḥ api prayojanam . bebhiditā cecchiditā
GS24pmbhasuu:6726_2: . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . bebhidyate cecchidyate . ṇilopaḥ . pācyate yājyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6726_3: . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . pācayati yājayati . āllopaḥ . yayatuḥ yayuḥ . āradhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:6726_4: iti kimartham . yānti vānti . īttvam . dīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6727: dhīyate . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . adātām adhātām . etvam . sneyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6728_0: mleyāt . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . snāyāt . ciṇvadbhāvaḥ ca sīyuṭi . ciṇvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:6728_1: sīyuṭi kim udāharaṇam . kāriṣīṣṭa hāriṣīṣṭa . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . kriyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6728_2: hriyeta . na etat udāharaṇam . yakā vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi udāharaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:6730: kriyeta hriyeta . nanu ca uktam yakā vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati iti . yakaḥ eva tarhi mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . vṛddhiḥ . vṛddhau ca kṛtāyām yuk prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:6731_0: (P_6,4.47) KA_III.199.17-200.11 Ro_IV.721-723 ayam ram rephasya sthāne kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:6731_1: bhavati . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti anena acām antyāt paraḥ kriyate . rephasya tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6731_2: śravaṇam kasmāt na bhavati . ṣaṣṭhyuccāraṇasāmarthyāt . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti bhrasjaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6731_3: ropadhayoḥ lopaḥ āgamaḥ ram vidhīyate iti . bhrasjādeśāt samprasāraṇam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6731_4: . bhrasjādeśāt samprasāraṇam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . bhrasjādeśasya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6734_0: bhṛṣṭavān . samprasāraṇam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6734_1: . na vaktavyaḥ . raseḥ vā ṛvacanāt siddham . rasoḥ vā ṛ bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . rasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6734_2: vā ṛvacane sici vṛddheḥ bhrasjādeśaḥ . rasoḥ vā ṛvacane sici vṛddheḥ bhrasjādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6734_3: vaktavyaḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām idam eva rūpam syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6736_0: abhārkṣīt . sarvathā vayam pūrvavipratiṣedhāt na mucyāmahe sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:6736_1: eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhrasjādeśāt samprasāraṇam vipratiṣedhena iti . idam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6736_2: sampradhāryam . bhrasjādeśaḥ kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6736_3: bhrasjādeśaḥ . nityatvāt samprasāraṇam . kṛte api bhrasjādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:6736_4: . bhrasjādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6736_5: . yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tasya ca upadhāyāḥ ca kṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ bhrasjādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6736_6: . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na hi varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6736_7: gṛhyante . atha api gṛhyante evam api anityaḥ . katham . upadeśaḥ iti vartate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6736_8: ca avaśyam upadeśagrahaṇam anuvartyam barībhṛjjyataḥ iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6739: śriyau śriyaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : āṭiṭat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6740: āśiśat . nanu ca atra yaṇādeśena bhavitavyam . idam tarhi : atatakṣat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6742: ninyuḥ . ṇilopasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : āṭiṭat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6744: sakhāyau sakhāyaḥ . ṇilopasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:6752_0: kāryate hāryati . ṇilopaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6752_1: . na vaktavyaḥ . santu atra ete vidhayaḥ . eteṣu vidhiṣu kṛteṣu sthānivadbhāvāt ṇigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6752_2: grahaṇāt ṇilopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iyaṅādeśe hi doṣaḥ syāt . antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6752_3: lopaḥ prasajyeta . allopasya iyaṅyaṇoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6756: jihīrṣakaḥ . guṇasya allopasya ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . dīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6757: api kākaḥ śyenāyate . allopasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:6758_0: cikīrṣyate jihīrṣyate . allopaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6758_1: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_0: (P_6,4.49) KA_III.201.8-202.2 Ro_IV.726-728 kim idam yalope varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_1: saṅghātagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . yalope varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_2: . yalope varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śucyitā śucyitum
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_3: . asti tarjo saṅghātagrahaṇam . yadi saṅghātagrahaṇam antyasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_4: antyasya pūrveṇa eva . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati . evam api tena
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_5: atiprasaktam iti kṛtvā niyamaḥ vijñāyeta . yasya halaḥ eva na anyataḥ . kva mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_6: . lolūyitā popūyitā . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_7: . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . antyasya lopaḥ prāptaḥ saḥ sarvasya vidheyaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_8: apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyama astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_9: api antyasya prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na hi lopaḥ sarvāpahārī . nanu ca saṅghātagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_10: sarvasya bhaviṣyati . saṅghātagrahaṇam cet kyasya vibhāṣāyām doṣaḥ . saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_11: cet kyasya vibhāṣāyām doṣaḥ bhavati . samidhitā samidhyitā . yadā lopaḥ tadā sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_12: lopaḥ . yadā alopaḥ tadā sarvasya alopaḥ prāpnoti . ādeḥ paravacanāt siddham . halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_13: iti pañcamī . tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti yakārasya eva bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_14: vā punaḥ astu varṇagrahaṇam . nanu ca uktam yalope varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_15: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgāt iti hi vartate . na vā aṅgāt iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_16: asti . evam tarhi aṅgasya iti sambandhaṣaṣṭhī vijñāsyate . aṅgasya yaḥ yakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6759_17: kim ca aṅgasya yakāraḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6760_0: (P_6,4.51) KA_III.202.4-9 Ro_IV.728 atha aniṭi iti kimartham . kārayitā kārayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:6760_1: . aniṭi iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati kārayitā kārayitum . niṣṭhāyām seṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:6760_2: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . niṣṭhāyām eva seṭi ṇeḥ lopaḥ bhavati na ayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6760_3: . kva mā bhūt . kārayitā kārayitum . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:6760_4: asti . niṣṭhāyām seṭi . janita mantra . śamitā yajñe . tataḥ ay . ayādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6760_5: ṇeḥ seṭi . tata āmantālvāyetnviṣṇuṣu ay bhavati iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_0: (P_6,4.52.1) KA_III.202.11-203.6 Ro_IV.728-730 atha seḍgrahaṇam kimartham . niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_1: seḍgrahaṇam aniṭi pratiṣedhārtham . niṣṭhāyām seḍgrahaṇam kriyate aniṭi pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_2: yathā syāt iti . sañjñapitaḥ paśuḥ iti . niṣṭhāyām seḍgrahaṇam aniṭi pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_3: iti cet tat siddham aniḍabhāvāt . niṣṭhāyām seḍgrahaṇam aniṭi pratiṣedhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_4: cet antareṇa api seḍgrahaṇam tat siddham . katham . aniḍabhāvāt . nanu ca yasya vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_5: iti jñapeḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ . ekācaḥ hi pratiṣedhaḥ . ekācaḥ hi saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ jñapiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_6: ca anekāc . iḍbhāvārtham tu tannimittatvāt lopasya . iḍbhāvārtham tarhi seḍgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_7: kriyate . katham punaḥ seṭi iti anena iṭ śakyaḥ bhāvayitum . tannimittatvāt lopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_8: . na atra akṛte iṭi ṇilopena bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . seṭi iti ucyate . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6761_9: hi ṇilope iṭpratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi seḍgrahaṇe ṇilope kṛte ekācaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6762_0: hāritam . evam tarhi na arthaḥ seḍgrahaṇena na api sūtreṇa . katham . saptame yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6762_1: kariṣyate . idam asti . niṣṭhāyām na iṭ bhavati . tataḥ ṇeḥ . ṇyantasya niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6763_0: hāritam . tataḥ vṛttam . vṛttam iti ca nipātyate . kim nipātyate . ṇeḥ niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6763_1: lopaḥ nipātyate . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . atra eva ṇeḥ niṣṭhāyām lopaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6763_2: na anyatra . kva mā bhūt . kāritam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6766: vartitā bhikṣā iti . tataḥ adhyayane . adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6767_1: . vṛdhiramiśṛdhīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātukatvāt . vardhantu
GS24pmbhasuu:6767_2: tvā suṣṭutayaḥ giraḥ me . vardhayantu iti evam prāpte . bṛhaspatiḥ tvā sumne ramṇātu
GS24pmbhasuu:6767_3: . ramayatu iti evam prāpte . agne śardha mahate saubhagāya . śardhaya iti evam prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:6767_4: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . vṛdhiramiśṛdhīnām ārdhadhātukatvāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6767_5: . katham ārdhadhātukatvam . anye api hi dhātupratyayāḥ ubhayathā chandasi dṛśyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:6768: (P_6,4.55) KA_III.203.14-20 Ro_IV.731-732 kim punaḥ ayam ktnuḥ āhosvit itnuḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ktnau iṭi ṇeḥ guṇavacanam . ktnau iṭi ṇeḥ guṇaḥ vaktavtyaḥ . gadayitnuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6769_0: stanayitnuḥ . astu tarhi itnuḥ . itnau pratyayāntarakaraṇam . yadi tarhi itnuḥ pratyayāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6769_1: kartavyam . ayādeśe ca upasaṅkhyānam . ayādeśe ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ubhayam kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6770_0: (P_6,4.56) KA_III.203.22-204.9 Ro_IV. 732-733 lyapi laghupūrvasya iti cet vyañjanānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6770_1: upasaṅkhyānam . lyapi laghupūrvasya iti cet vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6770_2: . praśamayya gataḥ . pratamayya gataḥ . allope ca gurupūrvāt pratiṣedhaḥ . allope
GS24pmbhasuu:6770_3: ca gurupūrvāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pracikīrṣya gataḥ . lyapi laghupūrvāt iti vacanāt

GS24pmbhasuu:6770_5: lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . praśamayya gataḥ . pratamayya gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6770_6: . prabebhidayya gataḥ . pracecchidayya gataḥ . pragadayya gataḥ . prastanayya gataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6771_1: gataḥ . āpaḥ sānubandhakanirdeśāt iṅi siddham . āpaḥ sānubandhakanirdeśaḥ kariṣyate

GS24pmbhasuu:6771_3: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6772: (P_6,4.62.1) KA_III.205.3-12 Ro_IV. 734-736 bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti katham idam vijñāyate . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ye syādayaḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6773_0: āhosvit bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ ye syādayaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6773_1: ye syādayaḥ iti sīyuṭ viśeṣitaḥ syasictāsayaḥ aviśeṣitāḥ . atha vijñāyate bhāvakarmavācini
GS24pmbhasuu:6773_2: parataḥ ye syādayaḥ iti syasictāsayaḥ viśeṣitāḥ sīyuṭ aviśeṣitaḥ . yathā icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:6773_3: tathā astu . astu tāvat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ye syādayaḥ iti . syasictāsayaḥ ca viśeṣitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6773_4: . nanu ca uktam sīyuṭ viśeṣitaḥ syasictāsayaḥ aviśeṣitāḥ iti . syasictāsayaḥ ca viśeṣitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6773_5: . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yak bhavati iti atra syādayaḥ api anuvartiṣyante . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6773_6: vā punaḥ astu bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ ye syādayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam syasictāsayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6773_7: viśeṣitāḥ sīyuṭ aviśeṣitaḥ iti . sīyuṭ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6773_8: sīyuṭ na asti iti kṛtva bhāvakarmavācini sīyuṭi kāryam vijñāsyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:6774_1: iṭ bhavati . aṅgasya iti vartate . yadi evam āditaḥ iṭ prāpnoti aḍāḍvat . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6774_2: aḍāṭau ṭittvāt āditaḥ bhavataḥ tadvat . evam tarhi syādīnām eva bhaviṣyanti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6774_3: api ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . nanu ca bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . na eṣā ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_0: bhāve ca arthe karmaṇi ca iti . evam tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti eṣā saptamī syādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_1: iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_2: na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi arthena paurvāparyam asti . arthe asambhavāt tadvācini
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_3: śabde kāryam vijñāsyate . evam api sīyuṭaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi saptame yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_4: kariṣyate . ārdhadhātukasya iṭ . yāvān iṭ nāma saḥ sarvaḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_5: . tataḥ valādeḥ . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ bhavati iti . yadi evam syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_6: iṭ bhavati ciṇvadbhāvaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_7: iṭ bhavati ajjhanagrahadṛśām vā ciṇvat iti kva cit eva ciṇvadbhāvaḥ syāt . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_8: syādīn apekṣiṣyāmahe . syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu iṭ bhavati ajjhanagrahadṛśām vā ciṇvat syādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6775_9: iti . atha ke punaḥ imam iṭam prayojayanti . ye anudāttāḥ . atha ye udāttāḥ teṣām

GS24pmbhasuu:6776_1: icchatā api bhavatā udāttebhyaḥ anena eva iṭ labhyaḥ na punaḥ anena astu tena vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6776_2: iti tena eva syāt vipratiṣedhena . nanu ca nityaḥ ayam kṛte api tasmin prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:6776_3: api prāpnoti . na tu asmin kṛte api saḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . avalāditvāt . tasmāt

GS24pmbhasuu:6778_0: glāyiṣyate . hanteḥ ca ghatvam prayojanam . haniṣyate ghāniṣyate . dīrghaḥ ca uktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6778_1: yaḥ mitām vā ciṇi iti saḥ ca prayojanam . śamiṣyate śāmiṣyate tamiṣyate tāmiṣyate

GS24pmbhasuu:6778_3: ṇeḥ aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ yathā syāt . katham punaḥ ayam nityaḥ . kṛtākṛtaprasaṅgitvāt

GS24pmbhasuu:6780_1: . vadhibhāvāt sīyuṭi ciṇvadbhāvaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . vadhibhāvasya avakāśaḥ : vadhyāt ,

GS24pmbhasuu:6790_0: adhyāyiṣyate . luṅi iti haniṇiṅādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . aṅgasya iti tu prakaraṇāt aṅgaśāstrātideśāt

GS24pmbhasuu:6791: (P_6,4.64) KA_III.207.9-21 Ro_IV.741-743 atha iḍgrahaṇam kimartham . iḍgrahaṇam akṅidartham . iḍgrahaṇam kriyate akṅiti lopaḥ yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6792_0: papitha tasthitha iti . sārvadhātuke ca ādi iti ārdhadhātukādhikārāt upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6792_1: . sārvadhātuke ca ādi iti ārdhadhātukādhikārāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iṣam ūrjam
GS24pmbhasuu:6792_2: aham itaḥ ādi . nanu ca kṅiti iti vartamāne yathā eva iḍgrahaṇam akṅidartham evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6792_3: ārdhadhātuke iti api vartamāne iḍgrahaṇam sārvadhātukārtham bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati

GS24pmbhasuu:6793: aci bhavati . katarasmin . kṅiti iti . kim tarhi acā kṅit viśeṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6794_0: kṅiti bhavati . katarasmin . aci iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam acā kṅit viśeṣyate . yathā

GS24pmbhasuu:6796_1: iti darśanāt . īttve vakāre pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . ghṛtam ghṛtapāvānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6797_0: ghṛtam ghṛtapāvānaḥ pibata . vasām vasapāvānaḥ pibata iti . yadi tarhi vakāre pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6797_1: ucyate katham dīvarī pīvarī iti . dhīvarī pīvarī iti ca uktam . kim uktam . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6797_2: īttvam . kim tarhi . dhyāpyoḥ etat samprasāraṇam iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6797_3: . na vaktavyaḥ . vanip eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati na kvanip iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6798_1: . aṭaḥ api iṣyate . tat tarhi aṭaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6798_2: . kva prakṛtam . luṅlaṅlṅkṣu aṭ udāttaḥ iti . yadi tat anuvartate āṭ ajādīnām aṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:6798_3: ca iti aṭ api prāpnoti . astu . aṭi kṛte punaḥ āṭi bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi aṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:6799: ahārṣīt . aḍvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi aḍvacanāt na syāt : aihiṣṭa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6800: aikṣiṣta . āḍvacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi āḍvacanāt prāpnoti : akārṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6801_0: ahārṣīt . akṛte aṭi yaḥ ajādiḥ iti evam etat vijñāsyate . kim vaktavyam etat . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6801_1: hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ajvacanasāmarthyāt . yadi kṛte aṭi yaḥ ajādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6801_2: tatra syāt ajgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . atha vā upadeśe iti vartate . atha vā ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:6801_3: iti vartate . atha vā luṅlaṅlṅkṣu aṭ iti dvilakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:6802: luṅādiṣu lakārādiṣu yaḥ ajādiḥ iti . sarvathā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6804_0: aupyata iti etat na sidhyati . evam tarhi ajādīnām aṭā siddham . ajādīnām aṭā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6804_1: siddham . na arthaḥ āṭā . evam tarhi vṛddhyartham āṭ vaktavyaḥ . vṛddhyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6804_2: cet aṭaḥ . aṭaḥ vṛddhim vakṣyāmi . yadi tarhi aṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ ucyate asvavaḥ hasati
GS24pmbhasuu:6804_3: iti atra . vṛddhiḥ prapnoti roḥ utve kṛte . dhātau vṛddhim aṭaḥ smaret . dhātau aṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6804_4: vṛddhim vakṣyāmi . tat tarhi dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6804_5: kariṣyate . aṭaḥ aci vṛddhiḥ bhavati . tataḥ upasargāt ṛti vṛddhiḥ bhavati . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6804_6: dhātau . dhātau iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . iha tarhi : āṭīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6805_0: āśīt iti ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti . pararūpam guṇe na aṭaḥ . pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:6805_1: guṇe aṭaḥ na iti vakṣyāmi . omāṅoḥ usi tat samam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi

GS24pmbhasuu:6805_4: bahulam dīrgham . bahulam chandasi dīrghatvam dṛśyate . tat yathā : pūruṣaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:6807_1: . antaraṅgatvāt vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . tasmāt na arthaḥ āḍgrahaṇena . ajādīnām aṭā

GS24pmbhasuu:6821_0: unnyaḥ . asaṃyogapūrvasya iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6821_1: . dhātoḥ iti vartate . tatra dhātunā saṃyogam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . dhātoḥ yaḥ saṃyogaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6833: (P_6,4.87) KA_III.22-211.14 Ro_IV.751-752 huśnugrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anyasya abhāvāt . na hi anyat sārvadhātuke asti yasya yaṇādeśaḥ syāt . nanu ca ayam asti : yāti ,
