GS24pmbhasuu:7242_4: bhaviṣyati . gaurādiṣu na paṭhyate . na hi kim cit tunantam gaurādiṣu paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7242_5: evam tarhi etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati atra īkāraḥ iti yat ayam īkāre tṛjvadbhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7242_6: śāsti . tena eva bhāvanam cet syāt aniṣṭaḥ api prasajyate . yadi api na asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7242_7: ṅīpaḥ vā ṅīṣaḥ vā ṅīn api tu prāpnoti . iha ca na prāpnoti . pañcabhiḥ kroṣṭrībhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7242_8: krītaiḥ rathaiḥ pañcakroṣṭṛbhiḥ rathaiḥ iti . evam tarhi na ca aparam nimittam sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7242_9: ca pratyayalakṣaṇena . na ca aparam nimittam āśrīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:7243: asmin parataḥ kroṣṭuḥ tṛjvat bhavati iti . kim tarhi aṅgasya kroṣṭuḥ tṛjvat bhavati . aṅgasañjñā ca bhavati pratyayalakṣaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7246: tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyate . āhosvit rūpātideśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_0: tṛcaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tṛjvat iti śāstrātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_1: cet yathā ciṇi tadvat . tṛjvat iti śāstrātideśaḥ cet yathā ciṇi tadvat prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_2: katham ca ciṇi . uktam aṅgasya iti tu prakaraṇāt āṇgaśāstrātideśāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_3: āṅgam yat kāryam tat atidiśyate . evam iha api anaṅguṇadīrghatvāni atidiṣṭāni raparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_4: anatidiṣṭam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra raparavacanam . tatra raparatvam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_5: tat vaktavyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . guṇe atidiṣṭe raparatvam api atidiṣṭam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_6: katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . ṛtaḥ ṅisarvanāmasthānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_7: guṅaḥ bhavati . upasthitam idam bhavati uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . evam tarhi ayam anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_8: doṣaḥ jāyate . āhatya tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyeta anāhatya vā iti . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_9: . yadi āhatya dīrghatvam atidiṣṭam anaṅguṇaraparatvāni anatidiṣṭāni . atha anāhatya
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_10: anaṅguṇaraparatvāni atidiṣṭāni dīrghatvam anatidiṣṭam . astu āhatya . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_11: dīrghatvam atidiṣṭam anaṅguṇaraparatvāni anatidiṣṭāni iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_12: atidiṣṭe anaṅguṇaraparatvāni api atidiṣṭāni bhavanti . katham . upadhāyāḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_13: na ca akṛteṣu eteṣu dīrghabhāvini upadhā bhavati . kutaḥ nu khalu etat eteṣu vidhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_14: kṛteṣu yā upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ kroṣṭoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_15: tasmin kṛte avādeśe ca yā upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . na ekam udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_16: yogārambham prayojayati iti . tatra tṛjvadvacanasāmarthyāt eteṣu vidhiṣu kṛteṣu yā
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_17: upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā kim naḥ etena āhatya anāhatya vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_18: . āhatya anāhatya ca tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyate . atha vā punaḥ astu rūpātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_19: . atha etasmin rūpātideśe sati kim prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_20: kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate ṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_21: ekaḥ atidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni anatidiṣṭāni . atha kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu ṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_22: anatidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni atidiṣṭāni . ubhayathā ca svaraḥ anatidiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_23: na hi svaraḥ rūpavān . astu prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_24: ṛkāraḥ atidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni anatidiṣṭāni iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_25: ṛkāre atidiṣṭe svāśrayāḥ atra ete vidhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . yat api ucyate ubhayathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_26: ca svaraḥ anatidiṣṭaḥ na hi svaraḥ rūpavān iti sacakāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt svaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_27: . rūpātideśaḥ iti cet sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ . rūpātideśaḥ iti cet sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_28: . sarvasya tunantasya tṛśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu rūpātideśāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_29: etat . katham . rūpātideśāt . rūpātideśaḥ ayam . nanu ca evam eva kṛtvā codyate rūpātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_30: iti cet sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ iti . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadāditadantavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_31: . siddham etat . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_32: grahaṇam bhavati iti evam tunantasya tṛjantaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_33: eva tṛjantam prāpnoti . idam api prāpnoti paktā iti . āntaratamyāt ca siddham . kroṣṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_34: yat antaratamam tat bhaviṣyati . kim punaḥ tat . kruśeḥ yaḥ tṛc vihitaḥ tadantam
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_35: . tṛjvadvacanam anarthakam tṛjviṣaye tṛcaḥ mṛgavācitvāt . tṛjviṣaye etat tṛjantam
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_36: mṛgavāci . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam . tunaḥ sarvanāmasthāne nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_37: yathā syāt . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham iti cet siddham yathā anyatra api . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_38: iti cet tat antareṇa vacanam siddham yathā anyatra api aviśeṣavihitāḥ śabdāḥ niyataviṣayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7247_39: dṛśyante . kva anyatra . tat yathā . gharatiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ ghṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7249: gharmaḥ iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . raśiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ rāśiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7251: raśanā iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . luśiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ loṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_0: iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam vibhāṣā vakṣyāmi iti . vibhāṣā tṛtīyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_1: aci iti . vāvacanānarthakyam ca svabhāvasiddhatvāt . vāvacanam ca anarthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_2: kāraṇam . svabhāvasiddhatvāt . svabhāvataḥ eva tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu vibhaktiṣu tṛjantam
GS24pmbhasuu:7254: 91-92 guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num pūrvavipratiṣiddham . guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . tatra guṇasya avakāśaḥ . agnaye ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7257: jatune . vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ . sakhāyai . sakhāyaḥ . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni iti . auttvasya avakāśaḥ . agnau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7258: vāyau . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . trapuṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_0: jatuni iti . tṛjvadbhāvasya avakāśaḥ . kroṣṭunā . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_1: . kṛśakṛoṣṭune arṇyāya . hitakroṣṭune vṛṣalakulāya . num bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_2: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_3: param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti . numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ nuṭ . numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7259_4: nuṭ pūrvavipratiṣedhena vaktavyaḥ . numaḥ avakāśaḥ . trapūṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7262: jatūnām . aci rādeśasya avakāśaḥ . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . nuṭaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tisṛṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7264_0: kroṣṭunā . nuṭaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kroṣṭūnām . nuṭ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7264_1: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhāt . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7265_0: catasṛṇām iti . katham tarhi sidhyati . nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhāt . nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7265_1: vaktavyaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ rādeśaḥ . saḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7265_2: eva guṇapūrvasavarṇau bādhate eva nuṭam api bādheta . tasmāt nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7265_3: . tasmāt nuḍviṣaye rādeśasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7265_4: jñāpayati na rādeśaḥ nuṭam bādhate iti yat ayam na tisṛcatasṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7268: 92.12-13 ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā . ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā iti vaktavyam . anaḍuhī , anaḍvāhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7270: 93.4-8 ittvottvābhyām guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . ittvottvayoḥ avakāśaḥ . āstīrṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7277: nipārakaḥ . guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . ayuktaḥ ayam vipratiṣedhaḥ yaḥ ayam guṇasya ittvottayoḥ ca . katham . nityaḥ guṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7279: 94.3-95.9 sici vṛddhau okārapratiṣedhaḥ . sici vṛddhau okārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7281_0: udavoḍha iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . okārāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7281_1: . ottvam kriyatām vṛddhiḥ iti . vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . okārāt vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7281_2: vipratiṣedhena iti cet ottvābhāvaḥ . okārāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet ottvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7282_0: udavoḍham . udavoḍha iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam tatra varṇagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7282_1: vṛddhau api kṛtāyām ottvam yathā syāt . punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham yathā prasāraṇādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7282_2: dvirvacanam . atha vā punaḥprasaṅgāt atra vṛddhau kṛtāyām ottvam bhaviṣyati . sauḍhāmitrau
GS24pmbhasuu:7282_3: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam ottvam . asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7284_0: 95.10-96.3 antagrahaṇam kimartham na ataḥ rlaḥ iti eva ucyate . kena idānīm tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7284_1: bhaviṣyati . tadantavidhinā . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam antaśabdaḥ asti eva avayavavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:7285_0: vasanāntaḥ . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā . udakāntam gataḥ . udakasamīpam gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7285_1: iti gamyate . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . aṅgāntau
GS24pmbhasuu:7285_2: yau rephalakārau tayoḥ samīpe yaḥ akāraḥ tasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . aśvallīt , avabhrīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_0: 96.5-101.2 halgrahaṇam kimartham . samuccayaḥ yathā vijñāyeta . vadivrajyoḥ ca halantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_1: ca acaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ajgrahaṇāt eva atra samuccayaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_2: . vadivrajyoḥ ca acaḥ ca iti . asti anyat ajgrahaṇe prayojanam vadivrajiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_3: yathā vijñāyeta . vadivrajyoḥ ecaḥ iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt vadivrajyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_4: ataḥ iti evam brūyāt . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . ataḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_5: prayojanam halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . kasya punaḥ ajantasya prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7288: ajihīrṣīt . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ākārasya tarhi prāpnoti . ayāsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7289: avāsīt . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vā vṛddhau asatyām vā . sandhyakṣarasya tarhi prāpnoti . na vai sandhyakṣaram antyam asti . nanu ca idam asti ḍhalope kṛte udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7291_0: udavoḍha iti . asiddhaḥ ḍhalopaḥ tasya asiddhatvāt na etat antyam bhavati . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7291_1: uttaram paṭhati . halgrahaṇam iṭi pratiṣedhārtham . halgrahaṇam kriyate iṭi pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7291_2: . na iṭi iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati saḥ halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . alāvīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7292_0: apāvīt . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7292_1: . anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . anantaram yat vṛddhividhānam tat pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7292_2: etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . tat ca anantyārtham . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7292_3: ca anantaram vṛddhividhānam anantyārtham vijñāyate . katham punaḥ anantaram vṛddhividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7292_4: anantyārtham śakyam vijñātum . antyasya vacanānarthakyāt . antyasya vṛddhividhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7292_5: prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā anantaram vṛddhividhānam anantyārtham vijñāyate . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7292_6: vibhāṣārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . ataḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti vibhāṣā vṛddhim vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7292_7: sā halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . acikīrṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_0: ajihīrṣīt . ataḥ vibhāṣārtham iti cet siddham vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt . ataḥ vibhāṣārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_1: iti cet tat antareṇa api halgrahaṇam siddham . katham . vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_2: vṛddheḥ lopaḥ balīyān bhavati iti . idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_3: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_4: akṛtāyām api . anityaḥ lopaḥ na hi kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti . paratvāt sagiḍbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_5: bhavitavyam . na atra sagiṭau prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekācaḥ tau vali iti vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_6: ekācaḥ sagiṭau ucyete atha vā vali iti tatra anuvartate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_7: tau valī iti vā . dardrāteḥ mā bhūt iti . daridrāteḥ na sagiḍbhyām bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_8: uktam etat daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . yaḥ ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_9: pratyayavidhau siddhaḥ siddhaḥ asau sagiḍvidhau . evamartham eva tarhi ekājgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_10: anuvartyam atra sagiṭau mā bhūtām iti . saḥ eṣaḥ nityaḥ lopaḥ vṛddhim bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_11: . kam punaḥ bhavān vṛddheḥ avakāśam matvā āha nityaḥ lopaḥ iti . anavakāśā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_12: lopam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśā vṛddhiḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ : akaṇīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7294_0: akāṇīt . katham punaḥ sati antye anantyasya vṛddhiḥ syāt . bhavet yaḥ atā aṅgam viśeṣayet
GS24pmbhasuu:7294_1: tasya anantyasya na syāt . vayam tu khalu aṅgena akāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . tatra anantyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7294_2: vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ antyasya lopaḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7294_3: . atha vā ārabhyate pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ ṇyallopau iyaṅyaṇguṇavṛddhidīrghatvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7294_4: pūrvavipratiṣiddham . sā tarhi eṣā anantyārthā vṛddhiḥ halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7294_5: mā bhūt . apipaṭhiṣīt . etat api na asti prayojanam . katham . halādeḥ iti na eṣā bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:7295: hal ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam halādiḥ halādeḥ iti . kā tarhi . karmadhārayāt pañcamī . hal
GS24pmbhasuu:7296_0: ādiḥ halādiḥ halādeḥ parasya iti . yadi karmadhārayāt pañcamī acakāsīt atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7296_1: . sicā anantaryam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . halādeḥ parasya sici anantarasya iti . yadi sicā
GS24pmbhasuu:7297_0: akāṇīt atra na prāpnoti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi vacanāt prāpnoti . acakāsīt

GS24pmbhasuu:7385_1: vijñāyeta . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iti . atha akriyamāṇe ārdhadhātukagrahaṇe kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_2: valādigrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . aṅgasya iti vartate . aṅgaviśeṣaṇam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_3: . aṅgasya valādeḥ āditaḥ iṭ prasajyeta āḍāḍvat . tat yathā āḍāṭau aṅgasya āditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_4: bhavataḥ tadvat . kriyamāṇe api ārdhadhātukagrahaṇe aniṣṭam śakyam vijñātum . valādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_5: ārdhadhātukasya yat aṅgam iti . akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam . aṅgasya yaḥ valādiḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_6: ca aṅgasya valādiḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_7: . pratyaye . yāvatā kriyamāṇe ca aniṣṭam vijñāyate akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam tatra akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_8: eva iṣṭam vijñāsyāmaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . āste,
GS24pmbhasuu:7386: śete . etat api na asti prayojanam . rudādibhyaḥ sārvadhātuke iti etanniyamārtham bhaviṣyati . rudādibhyaḥ eva sārvadhātukaḥ iṭ bhavati na anyebhyaḥ iti . evam api vṛkṣatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7387_0: vṛkṣatā atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7387_1: . nanu dhātoḥ eva ayam vihitaḥ . na ca ayam dhātoḥ iti evam vihitaḥ . kva punaḥ dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7387_2: prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ it dhātoḥ iti . tat vai ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam pañcamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7387_3: vihitaḥ śakyate viśeṣayitum . atha idānīm ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca api vihitaḥ śakyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7389: 127.2-130.4 snukramoḥ anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam . snukramoḥ anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prasnavitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7394_0: prakramitavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aviśeṣeṇa snukramoḥ iḍāgamam
GS24pmbhasuu:7394_1: uktvā ātmanepadapare na iti vakṣyāmi . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7394_2: pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe ca tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_0: prakraṃsyante . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_1: . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . evam tarhi ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhim prati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_2: bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyapavargaḥ . tatparaparasīyuṭoḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_3: . siddham tu snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭpratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_4: . snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya na iṭ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi snoḥ ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_5: samānapadasthasya iṭ na bhavati iti ucyate prasnavitā iva ācarati prasnavitrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_6: atra na prāpnoti . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam atra ātmanepadam . kramoḥ ca . kramoḥ ca ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_7: samānapadasthasya iṭ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . atha kimartham krameḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_8: kriyate na snukramibhyām iti eva ucyeta . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_9: vakṣyatgi tat krameḥ eva syāt snoḥ mā bhūt . vyatiprasnavitārau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7400: vyatiprasnativāraḥ . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prakrantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_0: upakrantā . tat tarhi idam bahu vaktavyam . snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_1: na bhavati iti vaktavyam . krameḥ ca iti vaktavyam . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_2: kṛti iti vaktavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam snukramoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_3: anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . snukramī eva ātmanepadanimittatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_4: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . na cet snukramī ātmanepadasya nimitte iti . katham punaḥ dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_5: nāma ātmanepadasya nimittam syāt . dhātuḥ eva nimittam . āha hi bhagavān anudāttaṅitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_6: ātmanepadam śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . yatra tarhi dhātuḥ na āśrīyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_7: iti . atra api dhātuḥ eva āśrīyate . bhāvakarmavṛttāt dhātoḥ iti . katham prakramitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_8: . sati ātmanepade nimittaśabdaḥ vartate . katham prakrantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7402: upakrantā . tasmāt asati api . katham prakramitavyam . tasmāt sati eva . katham prakrantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7403: upakrantā . vaktavyam eva etat kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti iti . atha vā kṛti iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7405_0: 131.5-135.9 graheḥ dīrghatve iḍgrahaṇam . graheḥ dīrghatve iḍgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7405_1: iṭaḥ dīrghaḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7405_2: ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti . evam api kartavyam eva . agrahaṇe hi asampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7405_3: ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt . akriyamāṇe hi iḍgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7405_4: . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . kriyamāṇe ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:7405_5: iḍgrahaṇe . ciṇvadiṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . ciṅvaditaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . grāhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7405_6: . yaṅlope ca . yaṅlope ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jarīgṛhitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7407_0: jarīgṛhitavyam . yadi punaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñāyeta . iṭ dīrghaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:7407_1: vipratiṣiddham . iṭ dīrghaḥ iti cet vipratiṣiddham bhavati . yadi iṭ na dīrghaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7407_2: atha dīrghaḥ na iṭ . iṭ dīrghaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7407_3: dīrghatvābhāvaḥ . pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne dīrghatvasya abhāvaḥ . vuvūrṣate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7409_0: vavarīṣate . atra api iṭ dīrghaḥ iti anuvartiṣyate . yat tarhi videśastham pratiṣidhya
GS24pmbhasuu:7409_1: punarvidhānam tat na sidhyati . jṝvraścyoḥ ktvi . śryukaḥ kiti iti anena pratiṣiddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7410_0: jarītvā . īṭaḥ vidhiḥ iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . yathāprāptaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7410_1: tarhi iṭaḥ grahaṇe īṭaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati jarītvā na ktvā seṭ iti kittvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7410_2: na prāpnoti . iha ca agrhīt iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sijlopaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca agrahīt
GS24pmbhasuu:7410_3: na iṭi iti vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . hmyantānām iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7410_4: . atra api na iṭ iti eva anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam iḍgrahaṇam anuvartyam adhākṣīt
GS24pmbhasuu:7411_0: agrahīḍhvam vibhāṣā iṭaḥ iti mūrdhanyaḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:7411_1: iṭaḥ grahaṇe īṭaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati iti . bhavati cet pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7411_2: dīrghābhāvaḥ iti eva . tasmāt aśakyaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñātum . na cet vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7411_3: iṭaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ārdhadhātukasya iti vartate . grahaḥ parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7411_4: ārdhadhātukasya dīrghatvam vakṣyāmi . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . grahaṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7412: grahaṇīyam . valādeḥ iti vartate . evam api grahītā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_0: grahītum atra na prāpnoti . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . evam api grāhakaḥ atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_1: . kim ca iṭpratīghātena khalu api dīrghatvam ucyamānam iṭam bādhate . tasmāt iṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_2: grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ārdhadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_3: iṭ valādeḥ iti . nanu ca uktam evam api kartavyam eva agrahaṇe hi asampratyayaḥ ṣaṣṭhyanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_4: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . grhaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī iṭ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_5: tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam ciṇvadiṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_6: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . katham . prakṛtasya iṭaḥ idam dīrghatvam na ca ciṇvadiṭ prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_7: . yaṅlope katham . yaṅlope ca uktam iṭi sarvatra . kva sarvatra . yadi eva prakṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_8: iṭaḥ dīrghatvam atha api iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñāyeta . yaṅlope ca uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_0: 136.2-139.5 atha vā iti vartamāne punaḥ vāvacanam kimartham . punaḥ vāvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_1: liṅsicoḥ nivṛttyartham . punaḥ vāvacanam kriyate liṅsicoḥ nivṛttyartham . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_2: sūtisūyatyoḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate . suvateḥ mā bhūt . atha kimartham dhūñaḥ sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_3: grahaṇam kriyate . dhuvateḥ mā bhūt iti . kim punaḥ iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_4: . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . yadi svaratiḥ udāttaḥ tataḥ prāpte . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_5: anudāttaḥ tataḥ aprāpte . svaratiḥ udāttaḥ . svaratiḥ udāttaḥ paṭhyate . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_6: tarhi vāvacanam . vāvacanam nivṛttyartham . vāvacanam kriyate nivṛttyartham . anudātte
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_7: hi kiti vāprasaṅgaḥ pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt . anudātte hi sati kiti vibhāṣā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_8: . svṛtvā . pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt . pratiṣidhya kila ayam punaḥ vidhīyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_9: yathā eva ekājlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham bādhate evam śryukaḥ kiti iti etam api bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_10: . yadi tarhi udāttaḥ svaratiḥ paṭhiṣyati vipratiṣedham svarateḥ veṭtvāt ṛtaḥ sye
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_11: vipratiṣedhena iti saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . saḥ vidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_12: pratiṣedhaḥ vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ api vidhiḥ na mṛdūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_13: iva kārpāsānām kṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva ekājlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_14: bādhate evam imam api bādhiṣyate . atha vā yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_15: na ca aprāpte valādilakṣaṇe iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate syalakṣaṇe punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_16: ca . atha vā madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā valādilakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_17: iṭam bādhiṣyate syalakṣaṇam na bādhiṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu anudāttaḥ . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_18: uktam anudātte hi kiti vāprasaṅgaḥ pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_19: . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte ekājlakṣaṇe pratiṣedhe iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_20: vibhāṣā ārabhyate śryukaḥ kiti iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā śryukaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_21: kiti iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ udāttārthaḥ ca yebhyaḥ ca anudāttebhyaḥ iṭ prāpyate tadbādhanārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_22: ca . atha vā śryukaḥ kiti iti iha anuvartiṣyate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7415_23: na iyam vibhāṣā uglakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhasya viṣaye bhavati iti yat ayam sanīvantardhabhrasjadambhuśrisvṛyūrṇubharajñapisanām
GS24pmbhasuu:7417_0: 139.7-12 iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kimartham . iḍgrahaṇam nityārtham . nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7417_1: ayam ārambhaḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhā atra vibhaṣā pūrveṇa eva tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7417_2: nityaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . na atra pūrveṇa vibhāṣā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7417_3: vibhāṣā iti pratiṣedhāt . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt vibhaṣā labhyeta punaḥ iḍgrahaṇāt iṭ eva bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7419: 140.1-3 iṣeḥ takāre śyanpratyayāt pratiṣedhaḥ . iṣeḥ takāre śyanpratyayāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha mā bhūt . preṣitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7423: 140.5-7 iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kimartham . punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam nityārtham . iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kriyate nityārtham . nityārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7425: 140.9-141.2 gameḥ iṭ parasmaipadeṣu cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam . gameḥ iṭ parasmaipadeṣu cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . jigamiṣitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7427_0: jigamiṣitavyam . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . aviśeṣeṇa gameḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7427_1: iḍāgamam uktvā ātmanepadapare na iti vakṣyāmi . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7427_2: kim uktam . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7427_3: iha api ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7427_4: . taparapare tāvat . saṅjigaṃsiṣyate . sīyuṭi . saṅgaṃsīṣṭa . ekādeśe . saṅgaṃsyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7427_5: . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . siddham tu gameḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7427_6: iṭpratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . gameḥ ātmanepadena samānapadastheṇa na bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7429: 141.3-142.9 vṛtādipratiṣedhe ca . kim . kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:7431_0: vivṛtsitavyam . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . aviśeṣeṇa vṛtādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7431_1: iṭpratiṣedham uktvā ātmanepadaparaḥ iṭ bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . ātmanepadapare iḍvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7431_3: iṭ vaktavyaḥ . taparapare tāvat . vivartiṣiṣyate . sīyuṭi . vartiṣīṣṭa . ekādeśe . vartiṣyante ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_0: vardhiṣyante . siddham tu vṛtādīnām ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iḍvacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_1: etat . katham . vṛtādīnām ātmanepadena samānapdasthasya iṭ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_2: . catustāsikḷpigrahaṇānarthakyam ca . caturgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . sarvebhyaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_3: vṛtādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iṣyate . tāsigrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . nivṛttatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_4: sakārasya . nivṛttam sakārādau iti . tāsgrahaṇe ca idānīm akriyamāṇe kḷpigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_5: api na arthaḥ eṣaḥ api hi vṛtādiḥ pañcamaḥ . bhavet kḷpigrahaṇam na kartavyam tāsgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7432_6: tu kartavyam . yat hi tat sakārādau iti na tat śakyam nivartayitum tṛci api hi prasajyeta . vartitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_0: vardhitā . tāsgrahaṇe ca idānīm kriyamāṇe kḷpigrahaṇam api kartavyam anyebhyaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_1: vṛtādibhyaḥ tāsau mā bhūt iti . bhavet tāsgrahaṇam kartavyam kḷpigrahaṇam tu na eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_2: kartavyam . anyebhyaḥ api vṛtādibhyaḥ tāsau kasmāt na bhavati . parasmaipadeṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_3: vartate kḷpeḥ eva ca tāsparasmaipadaparaḥ na anyebhyaḥ vṛtādibhyaḥ . yadi evam tāsgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7433_4: api na arthaḥ . tṛci kasmāt na bhavati . parasmaipadeṣu iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_0: 143.2-144.5 tāsau atvatpratiṣedhe ghaseḥ pratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ akāravattvāt . tāsau
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_1: atvatpratiṣedhe ghaseḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . jaghasitha . kim kāraṇam . akāravattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_2: . saḥ api hi akāravān . siddham tu halādigrahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham . halādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_3: kartavyam . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam . aṭhyaśī prayojayataḥ . āthyaśī tāvat na prayojayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_4: . kim kāraṇam . tāsau aniṭaḥ iti ucyate seṭau ca imau tāsau . añjvaśū tarhi prayojayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_5: . añjvaśū ca api na prayojayataḥ . kim kāraṇam . tāsau nityāniṭaḥ iti ucyate vibhāṣiteṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_6: ca etau . adiḥ tarhi prayojayati . āditha . kriyamāṇe api vai halādigrahaṇe atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_7: prāpnoti . jaghasitha . eṣaḥ api halādiḥ . tasya ca abhāvāt tāsau . tāsau aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_8: iti ucyate na ca ghasiḥ tāsau asti . nanu ca yaḥ tāsau na asti aniṭ api asau tāsau
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_9: bhavati . na evam vijñāyate yaḥ tāsau aniṭ iti . katham tarhi . yaḥ tāsau asti aniṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_10: ca iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saptamyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7435_11: api vai vatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā . mathurāyām iva mathurāvat . pāṭaliputre iva pāṭaliputravat
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_0: 145.2-146.3 kimartham idam ucyate na acaḥ tāsvat thali aniṭaḥ nityam iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7437_1: . evam tarhi niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . ṛtaḥ eva bhāradvājasya na anyataḥ bhāradvājasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_0: vavitha iti . ṛtaḥ bhāradvājasya iti niyamānupapattiḥ aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_1: ṛtaḥ bhāradvājasya iti niyamānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_2: . guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anajantatvāt pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . asati niyame kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7438_3: doṣaḥ . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iṭ vaktavyaḥ . pecitha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7439_0: śekitha iti . yadiḥ punaḥ ayam bhāradvājaḥ purastāt apakṛṣyeta . acaḥ tāsvat thali
GS24pmbhasuu:7439_1: aniṭaḥ nityam bhāradvājasya . upadeśe atvataḥ bhāradvājasya . tataḥ ṛtaḥ . bhāradvājasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7439_2: iti nivṛttam . sidhyate evam ayam tu bhāradvājaḥ svasmāt matāt pracyāvitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7439_3: . evam tarhi yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ tāsvat thali aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7439_4: nityam upadeśe . tataḥ atvataḥ . atvataḥ ca upadeśe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7441: 146.5-7 vṛgrahaṇam kimartham na kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti eva siddham . evam tarhi niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . nigamaḥ eva yathā syāt . kva mā bhūt . vavaritha .
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_0: 147 kimartham idam ucyate . vasvekājādghasāṃvacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_1: ārambhaḥ . vasau ekājāt ghasām eva . kva mā bhūt . bibhidvān . kim ucyate niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_2: iti na punaḥ vidhyarthaḥ api syāt . pratiṣedhaḥ api hi atra prāpnoti na iṭ vaśi kṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_3: iti . kṛt ca eva hi ayam vaśādiḥ ca . evam tarhi kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_4: etasmāt niyamāt atra iṭ bhaviṣyati . na atra tena pariprāpaṇam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_5: . prakṛtilakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhasya saḥ pratyārambhaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_6: . ubhayoḥ saḥ pratyārambhaḥ . katham jñāyate . vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇāt . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_7: . imau vṛṅvṛñau udāttau tayoḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . paśyati tu
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_8: ācāryaḥ ubhayoḥ saḥ pratyārambhaḥ iti tataḥ vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇam karoti . na khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_9: kaḥ cit ubhayavān pratiṣedhaḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca . tulyajātīye asati
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_10: yathā eva prakṛtilakṣaṇasaya niyāmakaḥ bhavati evam pratyayalakṣaṇasya api niyāmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_11: bhaviṣyati . atha yāvatā vasau ekājbhyaḥ iṭā bhavitavyam kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ niyamārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_12: vā sati vidhyarthe vā . na khalu kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ . āhopuruṣikāmātram tu bhavān āha
GS24pmbhasuu:7443_13: vidhyartham iti . vayam tu brūmaḥ niyamārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7445: 148-149 atha ekājgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . bibhidvān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_0: cicchidvān iti . kriyamāṇe api vā ekājgrahaṇe atra prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api hi ekāc .
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_1: evam tarhi kṛte dvirvacane yaḥ ekāc . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_2: gaṃsyate . ekājgrahaṇasāmarthyāt . na hi kaḥ cit akṛte cirvacane enakāc asti yadartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_3: ekājgrahaṇam kriyate . nanu ca ayam asti jāgartiḥ . gāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman . yat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_4: ākāragrahaṇam karoti na hi kaḥ cit akṛte dvirvacane ākārāntaḥ anekāc asti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_5: ca ayam asti daridrātiḥ . na daridrāteḥ iṭā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_6: daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . yaḥ ca idānīm pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_7: siddhaḥ siddhaḥ asau iḍvidhau . evam api bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyeta . ākārāntaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_8: bhūtapūrvaḥ iti . ekājgrahaṇam eva tarhi jñāpakam . nanu ca uktam jāgartyartham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7446_9: syāt . na ekam udāharaṇam ekājgrahaṇam prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_0: 150-151 atha ghasigrahaṇam kimartha na ekāc iti eva siddham . ghasigrahaṇam anackatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_1: . ghasigrahaṇam kriyate lope kṛte anackatvāt iṭ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_2: . iṭ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_3: api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . iṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api lope prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_4: iṭ na hi kṛte lope prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anackatvāt . evam tarhi dvirvacane kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_5: abhyāse yaḥ akāraḥ tadāśrayaḥ iṭ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . dvitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_6: lopasya paratvāt . dvirvacanam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_7: . lope kṛte anackatvāt dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . ghasigrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_8: doṣaḥ bhavati . katham . vacanāt iṭ bhaviṣyati . iṭi kṛte dvirvacanam kriyatām lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7448_9: iti yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7451: dadṛśivān . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . dṛśeḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7454: 151.8-12 svarateḥ veṭtvāt ṛtaḥ sye vipratiṣedhena . svaratilakṣaṇāt vāvacanāt ṛtaḥ sye iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svaratilakṣaṇasya vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ . svartā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7455: svaritā . ṛtaḥ sye iti asya avakāśaḥ . kariṣyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7457: asvariṣyat . ṛtaḥ sye iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7463: avāsīt . na etat asti . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ sati vā iṭi asati vā . idam tarhi . ayaṃsiṣṭām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7472: avāsiṣuḥ . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ayaṃsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7476_0: avāsīt . nanu ca uktam na asti atra viśeṣaḥ sati vā iṭi asati vā iti . ayam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7476_1: viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra iṭ na syāt vṛddhiḥ prasajyeta . iṭi punaḥ sati na iṭi iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7476_2: siddhaḥ bhavati . mā bhūt evam hmyantānām iti evam bhaviṣyati . atra api na iṭi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7476_3: anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam iḍgrahaṇam anuvartyam adhākṣīt iti evamartham . ākārāntāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7476_4: ca api padapūrvāḥ ekavacane udāharaṇam . mā hi yāsīt . yadi atra iṭ na syāt anudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7476_5: īṭaḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . iṭi punaḥ sati uktam etat arthavat tu sicaḥ citkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7476_6: hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam iti tatra ekādeśaḥ udāttena udāttaḥ iti udāttatvam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7478: 152.13-153.4 kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ na iśīḍajanām sdhve iti eva ucyeta . īśaḥ dhve mā bhūt iti . iṣyate eva :
GS24pmbhasuu:7479: īśidhve iti . īḍajanoḥ tarhi se mā bhūt iti . iṣyate eva . īḍiṣe ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7480_0: janiṣe iti . īśaḥ tarhi sve mā bhūt iti . iṣyate eva . īśiṣva iti . se tarhi yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7480_1: svaśabdaḥ tatra yathā syāt kriyāsamabhihāre yaḥ svaśabdaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7480_2: api iṣyate . saḥ bhavān īśiṣva iti eva ayam īṣṭe iti . ātaḥ ca iṣyate evam hi āha
GS24pmbhasuu:7480_3: siddham tu loṇmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya kriyāsamabhihāre dvirvacanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7482: 154.1-6 kim sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi akārāt paraḥ yāśabdaḥ ārdhadhātukam asti . nanu ca ayam asti . cikīrṣyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7483: jihīrṣyāt . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim tarhi asmin yoge udāharaṇam . pacet ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7484: yajet . atra api ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . saḥ yathā eva ayādeśaḥ dīrghatvam bādhate evam lopam api bādheta . tasmāt sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7486: 155.2-156.15 muki svare doṣaḥ . muki sati svare doṣaḥ bhavati . pacamānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7487_0: yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt anudāttatvam na prāpnoti . nanu ca ayam muk adupadeśabhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7487_1: adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . na sidhyati . aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7487_2: aṅgam saḥ ayam saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum . evam tarhi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7487_3: kariṣyate . abhakte ca . kim . svare doṣaḥ bhavati . pacamānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_0: yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt anudāttatvam na prāpnoti . evam tarhi parādiḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_1: . parādau dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi parādiḥ kriyate ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_2: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tiṅi iti evam tat . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_3: yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam muki svare doṣaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat adupadeśabhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_4: adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_5: aṅgam saḥ ayam saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum iti . atha ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_6: adbhaktaḥ syāt gṛhyeta adupadeśagrahaṇena . bāḍham gṛhyeta . adbhaktaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_7: . tat katham . ataḥ yā iyaḥ iti atra akāragrahaṇam pañcamīnirdiṣṭam aṅgasya iti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_8: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam tatra aśakyam vivibhaktitvāt ataḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_9: . tat prakṛtam iha anuvartiṣyate . evam api ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . ānaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7488_10: eṣā saptamī ataḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:7626_1: saḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . ṭāppratiṣedhārtham . ṭāp mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_2: ṭilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . atha vā śeṣasaptamyā śeṣe lopaḥ vidhīyate . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_3: yuṣmadasmadoḥ lopaḥ iti iyatā antyasya lopaḥ siddhaḥ . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_4: yat śeṣagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam avaśiṣṭasya lopaḥ yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_5: luptaśiṣṭe hi tasya āhuḥ kāryasiddhim manīṣiṇaḥ . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_6: na sarveṣām tyadādīnām atvam bhavati iti yat ayam kimaḥ kaḥ iti kādeśam śāsti . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_7: hi kimaḥ at bhavati iti eva brūyāt . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_8: na ca kimaḥ attvena sidhyati . attve hi sati antyasya prasajyeta . siddham antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_9: pūrveṇa eva tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ikārasya bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantyārthe

GS24pmbhasuu:7626_12: prāpnoti . tyadādīnām iti vartate na ca anyat kimaḥ tyadādiṣu kakāravat asti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_13: api anaikāntikam jñāpakam . etāvat tu jñāpyate na sarveṣām tyadādīnām atvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_14: iti tatra kutaḥ etat dviparyantānām bhaviṣyati na punaḥ yuṣmadasmadantānām vā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_15: bhavadantānām vā . kim ca avaśyam khalu api uttarārtham kimaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_16: . ku tihoḥ kva ati iti . kādeśaḥ khalu api avaśyam sākackārthaḥ vaktavyaḥ kaḥ kau

GS24pmbhasuu:7673_1: antyopadhalakṣaṇāyāḥ vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . krauṣṭuḥ jāgataḥ iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:7673_2: ca acāmādivṛddhiḥ antyopadhalakṣaṇām vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānā
GS24pmbhasuu:7673_3: anyasya bādhikā syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7673_4: yat ubhayam syāt . lokavijñānāt siddham . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7673_5: yathā . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadhi dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7673_6: takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave acāmādivṛddhiḥ antyopadhalakṣaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:7673_7: vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na aprāpte dadhidāne takradānam ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7673_8: tat prāpte ārabhyamāṇam bādhakam bhaviṣyati . iha punaḥ aprāptāyām antyopadhalakṣaṇāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7674: sauśrutaḥ iti . puṣkarasadgrahaṇāt vā . atha vā yat ayam anuśatikādiṣu puṣkarasacśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ acāmādivṛddhau antyopadhalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7676: 189.3-192.2 devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam . devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam kartavyam . devikādyādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . dāvikākulāḥ śālayaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:7677_2: . ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham . ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ . na evam vijñāyate devikādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_3: aṅgānām acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ bhavati iti . katham tarhi . ñṇiti aṅgasya acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_4: bhavati saḥ cet devikādīnām ādjyac bhavati iti . āntaratamyanivartakatvāt vā . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_5: vā na anena anantaratamā vṛddhiḥ nirvartyate . kim tarhi antaratamā anena nivartyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_6: . siddhā atra vṛddhiḥ taddhiteṣu acām ādeḥ iti eva tatra anena antaratamā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_7: nivartyate . parihārāntaram eva idam matvā paṭhitam katham ca idam parihārāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_8: syāt . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam adyajviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_9: devikādayaḥ iti . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ syuḥ iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_0: sudevikāyām bhavaḥ saudevikaḥ iti . atha atra api ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_1: parihārāntaram na bhavati . na brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_2: kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_3: . sañjñāvidhau . vṛddhiḥ āt aic devikādīnām ākāraḥ iti . idhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_4: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam anyatra tadgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_5: tadantagrahaṇāt vā iti . parihṛtam etat ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham iti . nyagrodhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_6: ca kevalagrahaṇāt . nyagrodhe ca kevalagrahaṇāt manyāmahe ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_7: iti . tasya hi kevalagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt nyāgrodhamūlāḥ śālayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_8: iti . yadi ca ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ tataḥ kevalagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_9: tat etat katham kṛtvā jñāpakam bhavati . yadi nyagrodhaśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_10: bhavati . atha hi nyagrohati iti nyagrodhaḥ tataḥ niyamārtham padāntaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_11: na jñāpakam bhavati . vahīnarasya idvacanam . vahīnarasya ittvam vaktavyam . vahīnarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_12: apatyam vaihīnariḥ . kuṇaravāḍavaḥ tu āha . na eṣaḥ vahīnaraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . vihīnaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_13: eṣaḥ . vihīnaḥ naraḥ kāmabhogābhyām vihīnaraḥ . vihīnarasya apatyam vaihīnariḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:7689_0: 195.13-197.2 atha parasya avṛddhiḥ iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_1: śauvam māṃsam ṭilope kṛte aijāgamaḥ na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam svādhyāyaśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_2: paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ prāpnoti . yatha icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_3: tathā astu . astu tāvat anuvartate . katha śauvam māṃsam . ānupūrvyā siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_4: . na atra akṛte aijāgame ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_5: bhavitavyam . tat etat ānupūrvyā siddham bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_6: nanu ca uktam svādhyāyaśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_7: pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ prāpnoti iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati svādhyāyaśabdam dvārādiṣu paṭhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_8: . evam kil paṭhyeta svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ iti . tat ca na . suṣṭhu vā adhyayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_9: svādhyāyaḥ śobhanam vā adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ . atha api svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7689_10: evam api na doṣaḥ . acām ādeḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7691_0: 197.4-198.5 ayam śvanśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat tadādeḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7691_1: . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadādividhinā prāpnoti . na eva tadādividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7691_2: asti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pratiṣedhe śvādigrahaṇam jñāpakam anyatra śvangrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7691_3: tadādigrahaṇasya śauvahānādyartham . pratiṣedhe śvādigrahaṇam kriyate jñāpakārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7691_4: . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra śvangrahaṇe tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7691_5: . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . śauvahānādyartham . śauvahānam nāma nagaram . śauvādaṃṣṭraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7691_6: maṇiḥ iti . ikārādigrahaṇam ca śvāgaṇikādyartham . ikārādigrahaṇam ca kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7691_7: kim prayojanam . śvāgaṇikādyartham . śvagaṇena carati śvāgaṇikaḥ . tadantasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7691_8: anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ . tadantasya ca anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śvābhastreḥ svam śvābhastram .

GS24pmbhasuu:7693_1: syāt acām ādeḥ mā bhūt . na etat asti prayojanam . avayavāt iti pañcamī tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7693_2: api uttarapadagrahaṇam uttarapadasya eva bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi susarvārdhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7693_3: janapadasya iti . susarvārdhāt iti pañcamī . diśaḥ amadrāṇām . diśaḥ iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:7693_4: . prācām grāmanagarāṇām . diśaḥ iti eva . saṅkhyāyāḥ saṃvatsarasaṅkhyasya ca . saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7693_5: iti pañcamī . varṣasya abhaviṣyati . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti eva . parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7693_6: iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti eva . idam tarhi prayojanam je proṣṭhapadānām uttarapadasya

GS24pmbhasuu:7698_0: 199.11-201.3 nagaragrahaṇam kimartham na prācām grāmāṇām iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_1: . anyaḥ grāmaḥ anyat nagaram . katham jñāyate . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_2: . kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati grāmāt . saḥ hi āha . na grāmāt nagarāt iti . nanu ca bho
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_3: yaḥ eva grāmaḥ tat nagaram . katham jñāyate . lokataḥ . ye hi grāme vidhayaḥ na iṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_4: sādhīyaḥ te nagare na kriyante . tat yathā . abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_5: iti ukte sutarām nāgaraḥ api na bhakṣyate . tathā grāme na adhyeyam iti sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_6: nagare na adhīyate . tasmāt yaḥ eva grāmaḥ tat nagaram . katham yat uktam evam hi
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_7: kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati grāmāt saḥ āha na grāmāt nagarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_8: iti . saṃstyāyaviśeṣam asau ācaṣṭe . saṃstyāyaviśeṣāḥ hi ete grāmaḥ ghoṣaḥ nagaram
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_9: saṃvāhaḥ iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam karoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_10: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_11: jñāpane prayojanam . viśiṣṭaliṅgaḥ nadīdeśaḥ agrāmāḥ iti atra nagarapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7698_12: saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . yadi etat jñāpyate udīcyagrāmāt ca bahvacaḥ antodāttāt

GS24pmbhasuu:7698_15: jñāpakārtham . tatra atinirbandhaḥ na lābhaḥ . tasmāt yasmin eva grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam

GS24pmbhasuu:7779_9: iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt prathamānirdiṣṭam dvitīyānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:7779_10: ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt pañcamīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:7779_12: prātipadikāni . evam api karmaṭhaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi aṅgasya iti sambandhaṣaṣṭhī

GS24pmbhasuu:7779_18: iti kādeśaḥ prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . akāralopasya sthānivadbhāvāt na bhaviṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:7786: ñṇinnakāraparasya hakārasya saḥ cet hanteḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . ghnanti ,

GS24pmbhasuu:7788_2: na prāpnoti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt prāpnoti . hananam icchati hananīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7788_3: hananīyateḥ ṇvul hananīyakaḥ iti . sthānivadbhāvāt ca acaḥ nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7789: ghnantu . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hantā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_0: hantum . nakāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt alope na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat nakāragrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_1: prayojanam . kim . śrūyamāṇaviśeṣaṇam . yatra nakāraḥ śrūyate tatra yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_2: iha mā bhūt . hataḥ hathaḥ iti . siddham tu upadhālope iti vacanāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_3: . katham . upadhālope ca iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_4: eva astu . nanu ca uktam hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre aprasiddhiḥ iti . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_5: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu hakāraviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam hakārasya iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_6: ñṇiti aprāptiḥ iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam iha api vacanāt prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_7: hananīyakaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_8: . na ca kva cit dhātvavayavena avyavadhānam etena punaḥ saṅghātena vyavadhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_9: na ca bhavati . yat api ucyate sthānivadbhāvāt ca acaḥ nakāre aprasiddhiḥ iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_10: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_11: doṣaḥ . ānantaryam iha āśrīyate hakārasya nakāraḥ iti . kva cit ca sannipātakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_12: ānantaryam śāstrakṛtam anānantaryam kva cit ca na sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_13: . lope sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam alope na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7790_14: yatra kutaḥ cit eva ānantaryam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_0: 217.15-218.8 abhyāsāt kutvam asupaḥ . abhyāsāt kutvam asupaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha

GS24pmbhasuu:7792_2: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . hanteḥ abhyāsāt iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ hanteḥ abhyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_3: . hanteḥ eṣaḥ abhyāsaḥ . katham . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti . evam tarhi hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_4: aṅgasya yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ hanteḥ aṅgasya abhyāsaḥ . hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_5: aṅgasya eṣaḥ abhyāsaḥ . katham . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti . evam tarhi yasmin hantiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_6: aṅgam tasmin yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt iti ucyate . yasmin ca atra hantiḥ aṅgam na tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_7: abhyāsaḥ yasmin ca abhyāsaḥ na tasmin hantiḥ aṅgam bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:7794_1: . heḥ caṅi pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aṅgānyatvāt . ṇyantam etat aṅgam

GS24pmbhasuu:7797_0: jijyuḥ iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_1: pratipadoktasya eva iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . sā tarhi eṣā paribhaṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_2: . avaśyam kartavyā adhyāpya gataḥ iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_1: . kvādyajivrajiyācirucīnām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . kutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_2: kasmāt na bhavati . niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvavacanāt . niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_3: seṭaḥ ca ete niṣṭhāyām . yadi niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvam ucyate katham śokaḥ samudraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_4: iti . śucyubjyoḥ ghañi kutvam . śucyubjyoḥ ghañi kutvam vaktavyam . katham arkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7799_5: . arceḥ kavidhānāt siddham . na etat ghañantam . auṇādikaḥ eṣaḥ kaśabdaḥ tasmin āṣṭamikam kutvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_0: 221.2-8 bhujaḥ pāṇau . bhujaḥ pāṇau iti vaktavyam . katham nyubjaḥ upatāpe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_1: nyubjeḥ kartṛtvāt apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . kutvam kasmat
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_2: na bhavati . kartṛtvāt . na etat ghañantam . kartṛpratyayaḥ eṣaḥ . nyubjati iti nyubjaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_3: . adhikaraṇasādhanaḥ vai lakṣyate ghañ . nyubjitāḥ śerate asmin nyubjaḥ upatāpe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7801_4: . eṣaḥ api hi kartṛsādhanaḥ eva . nyubjayati iti nyubjaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:7805: 222.10-14 [bhojyam abhyavahārhye] . bhojyam abhyavahārye iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . bhojyaḥ sūpaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_0: bhojyā yavāgūḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . bhakṣiḥ ayam kharaviśade vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_1: tena drave na prāpnoti . na avaśyam bhakṣiḥ kharaviśade eva vartate . kim tarhi anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7809: 223.2-4 vā iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati . tat agniḥ agnaye dadāt . astu atra lopaḥ āṭaḥ śravaṇam bhaviṣyati tena ubhayam sidhyati . dadhat ratnāni dāśuṣe ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_0: 223.6-224.1 [otaḥ śiti] . otaḥ śiti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . uttaratra śidgrahaṇābhāvāya
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_1: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ ṣṭhivuklamvācamām śiti iti śidgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_2: . nanu ca bhoḥ śyangrahaṇam api tarhi uttarārtham kartavyam . śamām aṣṭānām dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_3: śyani iti śyangrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . atra api astu śiti iti eva . yadi śiti
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_4: iti ucyate anu tvā indraḥ bhramatu madatu atra api prāpnoti . śamādibhiḥ atra śitam
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_5: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . śamādīnām yaḥ śit iti . kaḥ ca śamādīnām śit . śamādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7813: yasyati atra prāpnoti . aṣṭānām iti vacanāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7815: 224.3-5 dīrghatvam āṅi camaḥ . dīrghatvam āṅi camaḥ iti vaktavyam . ācāmati . iha mā bhūt . uccamati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7818: 224.7-13 iṣeḥ chatvam ahali . iṣeḥ chatvam ahali iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . iṣṇāti ,

GS24pmbhasuu:7819_1: atra prāpnoti . atha ahali iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra chatvam na bhavati . na evam

GS24pmbhasuu:7819_3: ahali iti . yadi evam aci iti api vartamāne na doṣaḥ . na hi acā śit viśeṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7819_4: śiti bhavati katarsmin aci iti . katham tarhi . śitā ac viśeṣyate . aci bhavati katarsmin śiti iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:7827_0: sunuyuḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . na evam vijñāyate mideḥ guṇaḥ jusi ca iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_1: . mideḥ guṇaḥ ajusi ca iti . kim idam ajusi iti . ajādau usi ajusi iti . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:7828: jahruḥ iti . evam tarhi śiti iti vartate . evam api ajuhavuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7829_0: abibhayuḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati na hi us
GS24pmbhasuu:7829_1: śidbhūtapūrvaḥ . us śidbhūtapūrvaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā usi yaḥ śidbhūtapūrvaḥ tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7829_2: bhaviṣyati . atha vā kriyate nyāse eva . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7829_3: mideḥ guṇaḥ jusi ca iti . katham tarhi . mideḥ guṇaḥ u jusi iti . kim idam u jusi

GS24pmbhasuu:7832_0: jāgarakaḥ iti guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7832_1: vaktavyaḥ . ciṇṇaloḥ pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt anyatra guṇabhūtasya vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7832_3: vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti . kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ :

GS24pmbhasuu:7834_4: pratiṣedhaḥ . jusi pūrveṇa guṇavidhānam . jusi pūrveṇa guṇaḥ vidhīyate jusi ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7834_5: . ṇali ca . kim . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt iti eva . ṇali ca pūrveṇa guṇaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7834_6: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ iti . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ . ataḥ anyatra vidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7834_7: vau aguṇatvam . ataḥ anyatra vidhāne vau aguṇatvam . na vā paryudāsasāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7834_8: na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . paryudāsasāmarthyāt atra guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . asti

GS24pmbhasuu:7834_10: pratiṣedhe grahaṇam anunāsikaparaḥ ca kvau viśabdaḥ . vasvartham tarhi paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7834_11: syāt . jāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman . katham punaḥ veḥ paryudāsaḥ ucyamānaḥ vasvarthaḥ śakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7834_12: vijñātum . sāmarthyāt vasvartham iti vijñāsyate . vasvartham iti cet na sārvadhātukatvāt

GS24pmbhasuu:7834_14: sārvadhātukasañjñā . chāndasaḥ kvasuḥ . liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7834_15: . tatra sārvadhātukam apin ṅit iti ṅittvāt paryudāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā vakārasya
