GS24pmbhasuu:7960: sasvaruḥ iti idam tu na sidhyati sañcaskaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7961_0: sañcaskaruḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . suṭaḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgam suṭ . antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7961_1: guṇaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . saṃyogādigrahaṇe tu kriyamāṇe saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7961_2: ananyārtham vijñāyate . ṛtaḥ liṭi guṇāt ñṇiti vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena . ṛtaḥ liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:7961_3: guṇāñ ñṅiti vṛddhiḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ṛtaḥ liṭi guṇasya avakāśaḥ . sasvaratuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7964_0: dadhvāra . ñṇiti vṛddhiḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7964_1: . atha vā punaḥprasaṅgāt guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7964_2: . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ parihāraḥ . punaḥprasaṅgaḥ nāma saḥ bhavati yatra tena eva kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7964_3: prāpnoti tena eva ca akṛte . atra khalu guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7964_4: vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti akṛte ca acaḥ ñṇiti iti . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate liti guṇāt ñṇiti
GS24pmbhasuu:7966_0: 254.5-10 kimartham hrasvaḥ vā iti ucyate na guṇaḥ vā iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:7966_1: arthaḥ guṇagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7966_2: ca saṃyogādeḥ guṇaḥ iti . ṛtaḥ hrasvatvam ittvapratiṣedhārtham . ṛtaḥ hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7966_3: ucyate ittvapratiṣedhārtham . ittvam mā bhūt iti . guṇaḥ vā iti iyati ucyamāne guṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7966_4: mukte ittvam prasajyeta . hrasvaḥ vā iti ucyamāne hrasvena mukte yathāprāptaḥ guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7968: 255.2-5 ke aṇaḥ hrasvatve taddhitagrahaṇam kṛnnivṛttyartham . ke aṇaḥ hrasvatve taddhitagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . kṛnnivṛttyartham . kṛti mā bhūt . rākā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7969: dhākā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:7972: upohyate . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt . evam api ā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7977_0: 256.1-5 eteḥ liṅi upasargāt . eteḥ liṅi upasargāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . īyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7977_1: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . upasargāt iti vartate . evam tarhi ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7977_2: anvācaṣṭe upasargāt iti anuvartate iti . na etat anvākhyeyam adhikārāḥ anuvartante
GS24pmbhasuu:7977_3: iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta adhikārāḥ anuvarteran .
GS24pmbhasuu:7979: 256.7-11 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na riṅ ṛtaḥ iti eva ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : mātrīyati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7980_0: pitrīyati . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:7980_1: yat dīrghoccāraṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā aṅgavṛtte punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7980_2: vṛttau avidhiḥ niṣṭhitasya iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . pibeḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_0: 256.13-257.3 yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām īṭ . yaṇprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām īṭ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_1: . jeghnīyate . yadi īṭ abhyāsarūpam na sidhyati . evam tarhi yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7982_2: hiṃsāyām īk . evam api upadhālopaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām ghnī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7985: aputrasya iti . aputrādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:7986: janīyantaḥ nvagravaḥ putrīyantaḥ sudānavaḥ . chandasi pratiṣedhe dīrghapratiṣedhaḥ . chandasi pratiṣedhe dīrghatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saṃsvedayuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7987_0: mitrayuḥ . na vā aśvāghasya ādvacanam avadhāraṇārtham . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7987_1: . aśvāghasya ādvacanam avadhāraṇārtham bhaviṣyati aśvāghayoḥ eva chancasi dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7989: 258.2-6 śyateḥ ittvam vrate nityam . śyateḥ ittvam vrate nityam iti vaktavyam . saṃśitavrataḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . devatrātaḥ galaḥ grāhaḥ itiyoge ca sadvidhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7990: mithaḥ te na vibhāṣyante gavākṣaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7992: 259.2-15 avadattam vidattam ca pradattam ca ādikarmaṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7993_0: sudattam anudattam ca nidattam iti ca iṣyate . kim punaḥ ayam takārāntaḥ āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:7993_1: dakārāntaḥ uta dhakārāntaḥ atha vā thakārāntaḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tānte doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7993_2: dīrghatvam syāt . yadi takārāntaḥ dasti iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . dānte doṣaḥ niṣṭhānatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7993_3: . atha dakārāntaḥ radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ iti natvam prāpnoti . dhānte doṣaḥ dhatvaprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7993_4: . atha dhāntaḥ jhaṣaḥ tathoḥ dhaḥ adhaḥ iti dhatvam prāpnoti . thānte adoṣaḥ tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7993_5: thāntaḥ . atha thakārāntaḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_0: 260.2-261.4 acaḥ upasargāt tatve ākāragrahaṇam . acaḥ upasargāt tatve ākāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_1: kartavyam . na kartavyam . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti ākārasya bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_2: . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ādeḥ hi parasya . atra hi tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_3: parasya iti dakārasya prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avarṇaprakaraṇāt siddham . asya
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_4: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . asya dvau iti . yadi avarṇagrahaṇam anuvartate dadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_5: doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi evam vakṣyāmi daḥ adghoḥ iti . daḥ yaḥ ākāraḥ tasya at
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_6: bhavati . tataḥ acaḥ upasargāt taḥ . asya iti eva . evam api sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_7: . na asau sūtrabhedaḥ . sūtrabhedam kam upācaranti . yatra tat eva anyat sūtram kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_8: bhūyaḥ vā . yat hi tat eva upasaṃhṛtya kriyate na asau sūtrabhedaḥ . atha vā dvitakārakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_9: nirdeśaḥ kriyate saḥ anekāl śit sarvasya iti sarvasya bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . adbhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7996_0: adbhyaḥ iti . acaḥ iti vartate . tat ca avaśyam ajgrahaṇam anuvartyam lavābhyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7996_1: evamartham . atha vā tritakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate ihārthau dvau uttarārthaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7996_2: ekaḥ . dyateḥ ittvāt acaḥ taḥ . dyateḥ ittvāt acaḥ taḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7997: nirditavān . acaḥ taḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ . prattam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:7999: vīttam . acaḥ taḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:8001: 261.6-10 apaḥ bhi māsaḥ chandasi . apaḥ bhi iti atra māsaḥ chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:8002: mā adbhiḥ iṣṭvā indraḥ vṛtrahā . atyalpam idam ucyate . svavassvatavasoḥ māsaḥ uṣasaḥ ca taḥ iṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:8008: 261.12-14 istvam sani rādhaḥ hiṃsāyām . istvam sani rādhaḥ hiṃsāyām iti vaktavyam . pratiritsati . hiṃsāyām iti kimartham . ārirātsati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8010_0: 262.1-9 jñapeḥ īttvam anantyasya . jñapeḥ īttvam anantyasya iti vaktavyam . jñīpsati
GS24pmbhasuu:8010_1: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . lopaḥ antyasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8010_2: vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ ca ṇilopaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . kāraṇā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8011_0: hāraṇā . evam api īttvam antyasya lopasya bādhakam syāt . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8011_1: bādhakāḥ bhavanti īttvam api sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ . katham punaḥ sati
GS24pmbhasuu:8011_2: antye anantyasya īttvam syāt . bhavet yaḥ acā āṅgam viśeṣayet tasya anantyasya na
GS24pmbhasuu:8011_3: syāt . vayam tu khalu aṅena acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . aṅgasya acaḥ yatratatrasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8011_4: iti . evam api ubhayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ paratvāt īttvam prāpnoti . tasmāt anantyasya iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8013: 262.11-12 abhyāsasya anaci . abhyāsasya iti yat ucyate tat anaci draṣṭavyam . patāpataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8017: halām ādiḥ halādiḥ halādiḥ śiṣyate iti . āhosvit karmadhārayaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8018_0: hal ādiḥ halādiḥ halādiḥ śiṣyate iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . halādiśeṣe ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8018_1: iti cet ajādiṣu śeṣaprasaṅgaḥ . halādiśeṣe ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ iti cet ajādiṣu śeṣaḥ prāpnoti . ānakṣa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8020_0: ānakṣuḥ . astu tarhi karmadhārayaḥ . karmadhārayaḥ iti cet ādiśeṣanimittatvāt lopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8020_1: tadabhāve lopavacanam . karmadhārayaḥ iti cet ādiśeṣanimittatvāt lopasya tadabhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:8020_2: ādyasya halaḥ abhave lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āṭatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8021_0: āṭuḥ . tasmāt anādilopaḥ . tasmāt anādiḥ hal lupyate iti vaktavyam . uktam vā . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8021_1: uktam . pratividhāsyate halādiśeṣaḥ iti . ayam idānīm saḥ pratividhānakālaḥ . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:8021_2: pratividhīyate . idam prakṛtam atra lopaḥ abhyāsasya iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi . hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8021_3: . hrasvaḥ bhavati ādeśaḥ . abhyāsasya lopaḥ iti anuvartate . tatra hrasvabhāvinām
GS24pmbhasuu:8021_4: hrasvaḥ lopabhāvinām lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . tataḥ halādiḥ śeṣaḥ ca iti . atha vā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8021_5: vakṣyāmi . hrasvaḥ ahal . hrasvaḥ bhavati abhyāsasya iti . tataḥ ahal . ahal ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8021_6: abhyāsaḥ . tataḥ ādiḥ śeṣaḥ . ādiḥ śeṣaḥ bhavati abhyāsasya iti . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8021_7: kariṣyate . hrasvādeśaḥ bhavati abhyāsasya . tataḥ hal . hal ca lupyate abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8021_8: . tataḥ ādiḥ śeṣaḥ . ādiḥ śeṣaḥ ca bhavati abhyāsasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_1: . kharpūrvāḥ khayaḥ śiṣyante kharaḥ lupyante iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ucicchiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_2: . vyucicchiṣati . tukaḥ śravaṇam mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_3: . cartve kṛte tuk na bhaviṣyati . asiddham cartvam tasya asiddhatvāt tuk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_4: . siddhakāṇḍe paṭhitam abhyāsajaśtvacartvam ettvatukoḥ iti . evam api antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_5: prāpnoti tasmāt kharpūrvagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ettvatuggrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_6: kariṣyate . abhyāsajaśtvacartvam siddham iti eva . ādiśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ tu . ādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_7: tu prāpnoti . tiṣṭhāsati . nanu ca anādiśeṣaḥ ādiśeṣam bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_8: ucyamānam anyasya bādhakam syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_9: ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . yadi ādiśeṣaḥ api bhavati śarpūrvavacanam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_10: kimartham syāt . śarpūrvavacanam kimartham iti cet khayām lopapratiṣedhārtham . śarpūrvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_11: kimartham iti cet khayām lopaḥ mā bhūt iti . vyapakarṣavijñānāt siddham . vyapakarṣavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_12: siddham etat . kim idam vyapakarṣavijñānāt iti . apavādavijñānāt . apavādatvāt atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_13: anādiśeṣaḥ ādiśeṣam bādhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam katham anyasya ucyamānam anyasya bādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_14: syāt iti . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . yadi tat na ucyeta kim iha syāt . halādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_15: . halādiśeṣaḥ cet na aprāpte halādiśeṣe idam ucyate tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_16: api ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_17: syāt iti sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_18: takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam bādhakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_19: . evam iha api sati api sambhave anādiśeṣaḥ ādiśeṣam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_0: 266.14-267.15 dādharti iti kim nipātyate . dhārayateḥ ślau abhyāsasya dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_1: ṇiluk ca . anipātyam . tūtujānavadabhyāsasya dīrghatvam parṇaśuṣivat ṇiluk bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_2: . dhṛṅaḥ vā abhyāsasya dīrghatvam parasmaipadam ca . anipātyam . tūtujānavadabhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_3: dīrghatvam yudhyativat parasmaipadam bhaviṣyati . dardharti iti kim nipātyate . dhārayateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_4: ślau abhyāsasya ruk ṇiluk ca . anipātyam . devāaduhravadruṭ parṇaśruṣivat ṇiluk bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_5: . dhṛṅaḥ vā abhyāsasya ruk parasmaipadam ca . anipātyam . devāaduhravat ruḍyudhyativat
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_6: parasmaipadam ca bhaviṣyati . bobhūtu iti kim nipātyate . bhavateḥ yaṅlugantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_7: aguṇatvam nipātyate . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham atra aguṇatvam bhūsuvoḥ tiṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_8: iti . evam tarhi niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . atra eva yaṅlugantasya guṇaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_9: na anyatra iti . kva mā bhūt . bobhavīti iti . tetikte iti kim nipātyate . tijeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_10: yaṅlugantasya ātmanepadam nipātyate . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham atra ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_11: anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam iti . niyamārtham tarhi bhaviṣyati . atra eva yaṅlugantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_12: ātmanepadam bhavati na anyatra iti . kva mā bhūt . bebhidi iti cecchidi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_0: 268.2-269.2 kimartham svapeḥ abhyāsasya samprasāraṇam ucyate yadā sarveṣu abhyāsasthāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_1: svapeḥ samprasāraṇam uktam . svāpigrahaṇam vyapetārtham . svāpigrahaṇam kriyate vyapetārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_2: . vyapetārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . suṣvāpayiṣati iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_3: iti . tatra kyajante atiprasaṅgaḥ . tatra kyajante atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_4: prāpnoti . svāpakam icchati svāpakīyati svāpakīyateḥ san sisvāpakīyiṣati iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_5: tu ṇigrahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham . ṇigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . nirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_6: eva hi vyaktam ṇyantasya grahaṇam iti . na atra nirdeśaḥ pramāṇam śakyam kartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:8027_7: yathā hi nirdeśaḥ tathā iha api prasajyeta . svāpam karoti svāpayati svāpayateḥ san
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_0: 269.4-8 trigrahaṇānarthakyam gaṇāntatvāt . trigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_1: gaṇāntatvāt . trayaḥ eva nijādayaḥ . uttarārtham tu . uttarārtham tarhi trigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_2: kartavyam . bhṛñām it trayāṇām yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . jahāti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_0: 269.10-270.3 artigrahaṇam kimartham na bahulam chandasi iti eva siddham . na hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_1: chandaḥ arteḥ śluḥ labhyaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe yat artigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_2: ācāryaḥ bhāṣāyām śluḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . iyarti iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8033: 270.5-272.2 aicoḥ yaṅi dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam . aicoḥ yaṅi dīrghatvam prāpnoti . ḍoḍhaukyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8034_0: totraukyate iti . nanu ca hrasvatve kṛte dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8034_1: kim kāraṇam . hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam . hrasvatvam kriyatām dīrghatvam iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8034_2: atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvena bhavitavyam . na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8034_3: utsargābādhakatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8034_4: utsargābādhakatvāt . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādāḥ utsargān na bādhante iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8034_5: kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam sanvadbhāvasya dīrghatvam . acīkarat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_0: ajīharat . sanvadbhāvam apavādatvāt dīrghatvam na bādhate . mānprabhṛtīnām dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_1: ittvasya . mānprabhṛtīnām dīrghatvam apavādatvāt ittvam na bādhate . gaṇeḥ ītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_2: halādiśeṣasya . gaṇeḥ ītvam apavādatvāt halādiśeṣam na bādhate . idam ayuktam vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_3: . kim atra ayuktam . aicoḥ yaṅi dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam iti uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_4: tataḥ ucyate na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya utsargābādhakatvāt iti . tasyāḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_5: paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni nāma ucyante prayojanam sanvadbhāvasya dīrghatvam mānprabhṛtīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_6: dīrghatvam ittvasya gaṇeḥ ītvam halādiśeṣasya iti ca . na ca sanvadbhāvam apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_7: dīrghatvam bādhate . kim tarhi paratvāt . na khalu api mānprabhṛtīnām dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_8: apavādatvāt dīrghatvam bādhate . kim tarhi antaraṅgatvāt . na khalu api gaṇeḥ īttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_9: apavādatvāt halādiśeṣam bādhate . kim tarhi anavakāśatvāt . evam tarhi iyam paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_10: kartavyā abhyāsavikāreṣu bādhakāḥ na bādhante iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:8035_11: . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam akitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8038: raṃramyate . akitaḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati yaṃyamyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8039_0: raṃramyate iti . nuki kṛte anajantatvāt . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . akidvacanam anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8039_1: kidantasya alaḥ antyanivṛttyartham . akidvacanam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8039_2: . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra kidantasya abhyāsasya alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8039_3: . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prayojanam hrasvatvāttvettvaguṇeṣu . hrasvatvam . avacacchatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_0: cocchuṣyate . tuki kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . vipratiṣedhāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_1: . na etāni santi prayojanāni . vipratiṣedhena api etāni siddhāni . tuk kriyatām ete
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_2: vidhayaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ iti . tadantāgrahaṇāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_3: . atha vā na evam vijñāyate abhyāsasya ajantasya ṛkārāntasya akārāntasya igantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_4: iti . katham tarhi . abhyāse yaḥ ac abhyāse yaḥ ṛkāraḥ abhyāse yaḥ akāraḥ abhyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_5: yaḥ ic iti . evam ca kṛtvā dīrghatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_6: sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim apavādaḥ nuk dīrghatvasya iti . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_7: sati yat akitaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_8: abhyāsavikāreṣu bādhakāḥ na bādhante iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . aicoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8043_9: yaṅi dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ hrasvāt hi param dīrghatvam iti uktam saḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8046: raṃramyate iti rūpāsiddhiḥ . nuki sati yaṃyamyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8047: raṃramyate iti rūpam na sidhyati . anusvārāgamavacanāt siddham . anusvārāgamaḥ vaktavyaḥ . evam api idam eva rūpam syāt yaṃyyamyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8048: idam na syāt yaṃyamyate . padāntavat ca . padāntāt ca iti vaktavyam . vā padāntasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8050: 274.12-14 rīk ṛtvataḥ saṃyogārtham . rīk ṛtvataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . saṃyogārtham . saṃyogāntāḥ prayojayanti . varīvṛścyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8056: marmṛjyamānāsaḥ iti ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . marmṛjyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8059_0: 275.6-12 kim idam ṛkāragrahaṇam aṅgaviśeṣaṇam . ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8059_1: abhyāsaviśeṣaṇam . ṛkārāntasya abhyāsasya iti . aṅgaviśeṣaṇam iti āha . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8059_2: . yat ayam taparakaraṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi kaḥ cit abhyāse dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8059_3: asti yadartham taparakaraṇam kriyeta . atha aṅgaviśeṣaṇe ṛkāragrahaṇe sati taparakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8059_4: kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . cākīrti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8061: cākirati . kiratim carkarītāntam pacati iti atra yaḥ nayet ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8062: prāptijñam tam aham manye prārabdhaḥ tena saṅgrahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8064: 276.1-278.3 iha kasmāt na bhavati . ajajāgarat . laghuni caṅpare iti ucyate vyavahitam ca atra laghu caṅparam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . acīkarat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_0: ajīharat . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt prāpnoti . ajajāgarat . yena na avyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_1: tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kena ca na avyavadhānam . varṇena . etena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_2: saṅghātena vyavadhānam bhavati na bhavati ca . evam api acikṣaṇat atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_3: . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati evañjātīyakānām ittvam iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_4: atsmṛdṝtvaraprathamradastṝspaśām iti ittvabādhanārtham attvam śāsti . sanvadbhāvadīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_5: ṇeḥ ṇici upasaṅkhyānam . sanvadbhāvadīrghatve ṇeḥ ṇici upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_0: avīvadat vīṇām parivādakena . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ṇicā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_1: . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_2: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ dīrghavidhim prati na sthānivat iti . evam api anaglopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_3: pratiṣedham prāpnoti . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_4: idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_5: vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām api . lopaḥ api anityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_6: . anyasya kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām anyasya śabdāntasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_7: anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_8: na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . mīmādīnām tu lopaprasaṅgaḥ . mīmādīnām tu lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_9: . amīmapat . siddham tu rūpātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . rūpātideśaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_10: sani yādṛśam abhyāsarūpam tat sanvadbhāvena atidiśyate na ca mīmādīnām sani abhyāsarūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_11: asti . aṅgānyatvāt vā siddham . atha vā ṇyantam etat aṅgam anyat . lope kṛte na aṅgānyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_12: . sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgam anyat . katham ajijñapat . atra sani api ṇyantasya eva upādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_13: āpjñapyṛdhām īt iti . atra aṅgānyatvābhāvāt abhyāsalopaḥ syāt . tasmāt pūrvaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_1: kriyate alontyanivṛttyartham . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_2: mā bhūt iti . kva punaḥ alontyanivṛttyarthena arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena . nityavīpsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_3: iti . nityavīpsayoḥ iti ucyate na ca antyasya dvirvacanena nityatā vīpsā vā gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_4: . iha tarhi pareḥ varjane iti antyasya api dvirvacanena varjyamānatā gamyeta . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_5: ca . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham ca sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ yathā prakalpeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_6: . anirdeśe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe sarvagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_7: syāt . kasya . sthāneyogatvasya . kva punaḥ iha ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārthena arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_8: yāvatā sarvatra eva ṣaṣṭhī uccāryate . parervarjane prasamupodaḥpādapūraṇe uparyadhyadhasaḥsāmīpye
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_9: vākyāderāmantritasya iti . iha na kā cit ṣaṣṭhī nityavīpsayoḥ iti . nanu ca eṣā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_10: ṣaṣṭhī . na eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . kim tarhi . arthanirdeśaḥ eṣaḥ . nitye ca arthe vīpsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_11: ca iti . alontyanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_12: . nityavīpsayoḥ dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_13: jñāpayati na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam tasyaparamāmreḍitam anudāttamca
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_14: iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . dviśabdaḥ ayam ekāc tasya ekāctvāt tasyaparamāmreḍitam
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_15: anudāttamca iti etat na asti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_16: tataḥ tasya paramāmreḍitam anudāttamca iti āha . yadi tarhi na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_17: ke tarhi idānīm dve bhavataḥ . dviśabdena yat ucyate . kim punaḥ tat . dviśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_18: ayam saṅkhyāpadam saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ . saṅkhyeye dve bhaviṣyataḥ . ke
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_19: punaḥ te . pade vākye mātre vā . tat yadā tāvat pade vākye vā tadā anekāltvāt sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_20: siddhaḥ . yadā mātre api tadā anekālśitsarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_21: tarhi ardhamātre tadā sarvādeśaḥ na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ca ardhamātre dviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_22: ucyete . kim kāraṇam . iha vyākareṇe yaḥ sarvālpīyān svaravyavahāraḥ saḥ mātrayā
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_23: bhavati na ardhamātrayā vyavahāraḥ asti . tena ardhamātre na bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_24: kutaḥ etat pade dve bhaviṣyataḥ iti na punaḥ vākye syātām mātre vā . nityavīpsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_25: dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate na ca vākyadvirvacanena mātrādvirvacanena vā nityatā vīpsā
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_26: vā gamyate . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham eva tarhi sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam . na vā padādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_27: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . padādhikārāt . padasya iti prakṛtya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_28: vakṣyāmi . tat ca samāsataddhitavākyanivṛttyartham . tat ca avaśyam padagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_29: kartavyam samāsanivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham ca . samāsanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_30: tāvat . saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadam . taddhitanivṛttyartham . dvipadikā tripadikā . māṣaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_31: kārṣāpaṇaśaḥ . vākyanivṛttyartham . grāme grāme pānīyam . māṣam māṣam dehi . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_32: kriyamāṇe api vai padagrahaṇe samāsanivṛttyartham iti katham idam vijñāyate . samasasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_33: nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit samāse nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_34: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi viñāyate samāsasya nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_35: siddham saptaparṇaḥ saptaparṇau saptaparṇāḥ iti saptaparṇābhyām saptaparṇebhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_36: atra prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate samāse nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti saptaparṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_37: saptaparṇau saptaparṇāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tathā taddhitanivṛttyartham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_38: katham idam vijñāyate . taddhitasya nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_39: taddhite nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_40: nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti siddham dvipadikāḥ tripadikāḥ dvipadikābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_41: tripadikābhyām māṣaśaḥ kārṣāpaṇaśaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate taddhite nivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_42: taddhitanivṛttyartham iti dvipadikāḥ tripadikāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tathā vākyanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8069_43: iti katham idam vijñāyate . vākyasya nivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_0: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate vākyasya nivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_1: yadi vākyam vīpsāyuktam bhavitavyam eva dvirvacanena . atha api avayavaḥ bhavatu
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_2: eva . tat etat kriyamāṇe api padagrahaṇe ālūnaviśīrṇam bhavati . kim cit saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_3: kim cit asaṅgṛhītam . sagatigrahaṇam ca . sagatigrahaṇam ca kartavyam . prapacati
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_4: prapacati . prakaroti prakaroti iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . na hi sagatikam
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_5: padam bhavati . samāsanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . samāsena uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_6: vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . kim ca bhoḥ samāsaḥ vīpsāyām iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_7: khalu vīpsāyām iti ucyate gamyate tu saḥ arthaḥ . tatra uktaḥ samāsena iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_8: dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . yatra ca samāsena anuktā vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_9: . tat yathā . ekaikavicitāḥ anyonyasahāyāḥ iti . atha vā yat atra vīpsāyuktam na
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_10: adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . parvaṇi parvaṇi sapta parṇāni asya . paṅktau paṅktau
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_11: aṣṭau padāni asya iti . taddhitanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . taddhitena
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_12: ukatvāt vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . taddhitaḥ khalu api vīpsāyām iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_13: . yatra ca taddhitena anuktā vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam . tat yathā . ekaikaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_14: dadāti iti . vākyanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . padadvirvacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_15: uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ vākyadvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . yatra ca padadvirvacanena anuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_16: vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam . tat yathā . prapacati prapacati . prakaroti prakaroti
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_17: . uttarārtham tarhi padagrahaṇam kartavyam . tasyaparamāmreḍitam anudāttamca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_18: vakṣyati tat padadvirvacane yathā syāt vākyadvirvacanemā bhūt . mahyam grahīṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_19: mahyam grahīṣyati . mām abhivyāhariṣyati mām abhvyāhariṣyati . katham ca atra dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_20: . chāndasatvāt . svaraḥ api tarhi chāndasatvāt eva na bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_21: tarhi padagrahaṇam kartavyam . padasya padāt iti vakṣyati tat padagrahaṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_22: bhavati . sarvagrahaṇam api tarhi uttarārtham . anudāttaṃsarvamapādādau iti vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_23: tat sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam bhavati . ubhayam kriyate tatra eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8072_0: 288-292 ihārtham eva tarhi ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham anyatarat kartavyam . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8072_1: sthāne dvirvacanam yathā syāt dviḥprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . ām pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:8072_2: devadattā3 āmaekāntaramāmantritamanantike iti ekāntaratā na syāt . iha ca paunaḥpunyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8072_3: paunaḥpunikam iti aprātipadikatvāt taddhitotpattiḥ na syāt . yadi tarhi sthāne dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8072_4: rājā rājā vāk vāk padasya iti nalopādīni na sidhyanti . idam iha sampradhāryam .

GS24pmbhasuu:8106_7: iha na syāt vṛkṣāḥ plakṣāḥ . na vā padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt . na vā ūrdhvam padādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_8: kartavyaḥ yaṇekādeśasvaraḥ . kim kāraṇam . padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt . padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_9: iti na eṣā sthānaṣaṣṭhī . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_10: . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . pratyākhyāyate sthanaṣaṣṭhī . antagrahaṇāt vā nalope
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_11: . atha vā yat ayam nalopaḥprātipadikāntasya iti antagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8106_12: ācāryaḥ viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī eṣā na sthānaṣaṣṭhī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8108: 322-324 sarvavacanam kimartham . sarvavacanam anādeḥ anudāttārtham . sarvagrahaṇam kriyate anādeḥ api anudāttatvam yathā syāt iti . tiṅatiṅaḥ iha eva syāt devadattaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_0: devadattaḥ karoti iti . sarvavacanam anādeḥ anudāttārtham iti cet luṭi pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_1: siddham . sarvavacanam anādeḥ anudāttārtham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . luṭi pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_2: siddham . yat ayam luṭi pratiṣedham śāsti naluṭ iti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_3: api anudāttatvam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi luḍantam ādyudāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_4: asti . alo'ntyavidhiprasaṅgaḥ tu . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_5: prāpnoti . yatra hi ādividhiḥ na asti alo'ntyavidhinā tatra bhavitavyam . tatra kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_6: doṣaḥ . tiṅatiṅaḥ iti iha eva syāt devadattayajñadattau kurutaḥ iha na syāt devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_7: karoti iti . lṛṭi pratiṣedhāt siddham . yat ayam lṛṭi pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_8: ācāryaḥ anantyasya api anudāttatvam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi lṛḍantam
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_9: antodāttam asti . nanu ca idam asti bhokṣye iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . na vā padādhikārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_11: iti vāmnau ādayaḥ savibhaktikasya yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_12: padasya iti hi vartate vibhaktyantam ca padam tatra antareṇa sarvagrahaṇam savibhaktikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_13: bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham yatra vibhaktyantam padam yatra tu khalu vibhaktau padam
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_14: tatra na sidhyati . grāmaḥ vām dīyate . grāmaḥ nau dīyate . janapadaḥ vām dīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_15: . janapadaḥ nau dīyate . nanu ca sthagrahaṇam kriyate tena savibhaktikasya eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_16: . astī anyat sthagrahaṇasya prayaojanam . kim . śrūyamāṇavibhakiviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8110_17: . yatra vibhaktiḥ śrūyate tatra yathā syāt iha mā bhūt iti yuṣmatputraḥ dadāti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8112_0: 324-325 samānavākye nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ . samānavākye iti prakṛtya nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8115_5: . atho grāme kambalaḥ me svam . atho grāme kambalaḥ mama svam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8117_0: 327 kim idam tiṅaḥ gotrādiṣu kutsanābhīkṣṇyagrahaṇam pāṭhaviśeṣaṇam . kutsanābhīkṣṇyayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8117_1: arthayoḥ gotrādīni bhavanti tiṅaḥ parāṇi anudāttāni iti . āhosvit anudāttaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8117_2: . tiṅaḥ parāṇi gotrādīni kutsanābhīkṣṇyayoḥ arthayoḥ anudāttāni bhavanti iti . tiṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8117_3: gotrādiṣu kutsanābhīkṣṇyagrahaṇam pāṭhaviśeṣaṇam . tiṅaḥ gotrādiṣu kutsanābhīkṣṇyagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8117_4: kriyate pāṭhaviśeṣaṇam . pāṭhaḥ viśeṣyate . anudāttaviśeṣaṇe hi anyatra gotrādigrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8117_5: kutsanābhīkṣṇyagrahaṇam . anudāttaviśeṣaṇe hi sati anyatra gotrādigrahaṇe kutsanābhīkṣṇyagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8117_7: iti vaktavyam syāt . anudāttagrahaṇam vā . atha vā yāni anudāttāni iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8117_8: syāt . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate tiṅaḥ gotrādiṣu kutsanābhīkṣṇyagrahaṇam pāṭhaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8117_9: anudāttaviśeṣaṇe hi anyatra gotrādigrahaṇe kutsanābhīkṣṇyagrahaṇam anudāttagrahaṇam vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8119_0: 327-328 atiṅaḥ iti kimartham . pacati karoti . atiṅvacanam anarthakam samānavākyādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8119_1: . atiṅvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . samānavākyādhikārāt . samānavākye iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8119_2: na ca samānavākye dve tiṅante staḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8121_0: 328 nipātaiḥ iti kimartham . yat kūjati śakaṭam . yatī kūjati śakaṭī . yan rathaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8121_1: kūjati . nipātaiḥ iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati . yat kūjati śakaṭam . yatī
GS24pmbhasuu:8121_2: kūjati śakaṭī . yan rathaḥ kūjati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8121_3: . na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . yāvadyathābhyām iha na
GS24pmbhasuu:8121_4: syāt yāvat asti atra eṣaḥ saraḥ janebhyaḥ kṛṇavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:8123: 329 caṇ ṇidviśiṣṭaḥ cedarthe . caṇ ṇidviśiṣṭaḥ cedarthe draṣṭavyaḥ . ayam ca vai mariṣyati . ayam cet mariṣyati . na ca pitṛbhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ dāsyati . aprāyaścittikṛtau ca syātām .
GS24pmbhasuu:8125_0: 329 anekam iti kim udāharaṇam . yadā hi asau mattaḥ bhavati atha yat tapati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8125_1: etat asti . ekam atra hiyuktam aparam yadyuktam tataḥ ubhayoḥ api anighātaḥ . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:8125_2: tarhi . anṛtam hi mattaḥ vadati pāpmā enam vipunāti . ekam khalu api . agniḥ hi pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8127_0: 330 pūjāyām iti vartamāne punaḥ pūjāgrahaṇam kimartham . anighātapratiṣedhābhisambaddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8127_1: tat . yadi tat anuvarteta iha api anighātapratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . iṣyate ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8127_2: nighātapratiṣedhaḥ . yathā punaḥ tatra yāvat yathā iti etābhyām anighāte prāpte anighātapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8127_3: ucyate iha idānīm kena anighāte prāpte anighātapratiṣedhaḥ ucyeta . iha api yadvṛttānnityam iti evamādibhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8129: 330 kimartham idam ucyate na gatyarthaloṭā lṛṭ iti eva siddham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . ehi manye prahāse eva yathā syāt . kva mā bhūt . ehi manye rathena yāsyasi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8131_0: 331 kim idam apūrvagrahaṇam jātuviśeṣaṇam . jātuśabdāt apūrvāt tiṅantam iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8131_1: tiṅantaviśeṣaṇam . jātuśabdāt tiṅantam apūrvam iti . jātuviśeṣaṇam iti āha . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8131_2: jñāyate . yat ayam kiṃvṛttañcaciduttaram iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:8131_3: apūrvam iti etat anuvartate na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat kiṃvṛttam ca ciduttaram syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8131_4: tiṅantam ca apūrvam . atra api tiṅantaviśeṣaṇam eva . katham . kiṃvṛttāt ciduttarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8131_5: tiṅantam apūrvam iti . yat tarhi āhoutāhocānantaram iti anantaragrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8131_6: etasya api asti vacane prayojanam . kim . śeṣaprakḷptyartham etat syāt . śeṣevibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8131_7: kaḥ ca śeṣaḥ . sāntaram śeṣaḥ iti . antareṇa api anantaragrahaṇam prakḷptaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8131_8: . katham. apūrvaḥ iti vartate . śeṣe vibhāṣā . kaḥ ca śeṣaḥ . sapūrvaḥ śeṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_0: 332-333 lṛṭaḥ prakṛtibhāve kartuḥ anyatve upasaṅkhyānam kārakānyatvāt . lṛṭaḥ prakṛtibhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_1: kartuḥ yat kārakam anyat tasya anyatve upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āgaccha devadatta
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_2: grāmam odanam bhokṣyase . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . kārakānyatvāt . na cet
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_3: kārakam sarvānyat iti ucyate sarvānyat ca atra kārakam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sarvānyatpratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_4: āśrīyate na punaḥ asarvānyadvidhānena āśrīyeta . kartā ca atra asarvānyaḥ tataḥ kartṛsāmānyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_5: siddham . kartṛsāmānyāt siddham iti cet tadbhede anyasāmānye prakṛtibhāvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_6: . kartṛsāmānyāt siddham iti cet tadbhede kartṛbhede anyasmin kārakasāmānye prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_7: prāpnoti . āhara devadatta śālīn yajñadatta enān bhokṣyate . evam tarhi vyaktam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_8: paṭhitavyam na cet kartā sarvānyaḥ iti . na cet kartā sarvānyaḥ iti cet anyābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_9: pratiṣedham eke . na cet kartā sarvānyaḥ iti cet anyābhidhāne pratiṣedham eke icchanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_10: . uhyantām devadattena śālayaḥ yajñadattena bhokṣyante iti prāpnoti bhokṣyante iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_11: ca iṣyate . siddham tu tiṅoḥ ekadravyābhidhānāt . siddham etat . katham . tiṅoḥ ekadravyābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8133_12: . yatra tiṅbhyām ekam dravyam abhidhīyate tatra iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_0: 334-336 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . āmaḥ ekāntare aikaśrutyapratiṣedhaḥ . āmaḥ ekāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_1: aikaśrutyasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . katham punaḥ aprakṛtasya asaṃśabditasya aikaśrutyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_2: pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . anantike iti ucyate . anantikam ca kim . dūram . dūrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_3: sambuddhau ekaśrutiḥ ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . nighātaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_4: tu . nighātaḥ tu prāpnoti . ām bhoḥ devadatta3 . āmantritasya anudāttatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_5: . siddham tu pratiṣedhādhikāre pratiṣedhavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pratiṣedhādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_6: pratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt nighātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na eva vā punaḥ atra aikaśrutyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_7: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anantike iti ucyate anyat ca dūram anyat anantikam . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_8: evam plutaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti plutaḥ api hi dūrāt iti ucyate . iṣṭam eva etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8135_9: saṅgṛhītam . ām bhoḥ devadatta iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8137_0: 336-338 kimartham idam ucyate . yadādaiḥ eva sarvaiḥ etaiḥ anighātakāraṇaiḥ yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:8137_1: anighātaḥ ucyate . yathā eva pūrvaiḥ yoge evam paraiḥ api . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:8137_2: . yaddhituparasya chandasi anighātaḥ anyaparapratiṣedhārthaḥ . yaddhituparasya chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:8137_3: anighātaḥ ucyate anyaparapratiṣedhārthaḥ . anyaparasya pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8137_4: jāye svaḥ rohāva ehi . atha idānīm rohāva iti anena yukte ehi iti asya kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:8137_5: bhavati . loṭ ca gatyarthaloṭā yuktaḥ iti prāpnoti . na ruhiḥ gatyarthaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8137_7: ruhigrahaṇam karoti . yadi na ruhiḥ gatyarthaḥ ārohanti hastinam manuṣyāḥ ārohayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8137_9: iti karmasañjñā na prāpnoti . tasmāt na etat śakyam vaktum na ruhiḥ gatyarthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8137_10: . kasmāt tarhi rohāva iti anena yukte ehi iti asya na bhavati . chāndasatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_0: 338 āmreḍiteṣu agateḥ sagatiḥ api tiṅ iti atra gatigrahaṇe upasargagrahaṅam . āmreḍiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_1: agateḥ sagatirapitiṅ iti atra gatigrahaṇe upasargagrahaṇam draṣṭavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_2: . śuklīkaroti cana . krṣṇīkaroti cana . yatkāṣṭhā śuklīkaroti . yatkāṣṭhā kṛṣṇīkaroti
GS24pmbhasuu:8139_3: . apara āha . sarvatra eva āṣṭamike gatigrahaṇe upasargagrahaṇam draṣtavyam gatirgatautiṅicodāttavativarjam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8141_0: 339 yadvṛttāt iti ucyate tatra idam na sidhyati yaḥ pacati yam pacati iti . vṛttagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8141_1: tadvibhaktyantam pratīyāt . katham yataraḥ pacati yatamaḥ pacati iti . ḍataraḍatamau
GS24pmbhasuu:8141_2: ca pratīyāt . katham yadā dadāti iti . eṣaḥ api vibhaktisañjñaḥ . katham yāvat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8141_3: atra eṣaḥ saraḥ janebhyaḥ kṛṇavat . yāvadyathābhyām iti evam bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8141_4: yadryaṅ vāyuḥ pavate yatkāmāḥ te juhumaḥ . evam tarhi yat asmin vartate yadvṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:8141_5: yadvṛttāt iti evam bhaviṣyati . vā yāthākāmye . vā yāthākāmye iti vaktavyam . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8141_6: kva cana yajate devayajane eva yajate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8143_0: 340 pūjitasya anudāttatve kāṣṭhādigrahaṇam . pūjitasya anudāttatve kāṣṭhādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8143_1: kartavyam . kāṣṭhādibhyaḥ pūjanāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . śobhanaḥ adhyāpakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8143_2: . malopavacanam ca . malopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . dāruṇādhyāpakaḥ dāruṇābhirūpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8145_0: 340-341 sagatigrahaṇam kimartham . sagatigrahaṇam apadatvāt . sagatigrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8145_1: apadatvāt . padasya iti vartate na hi sagatikam padam bhavati . uttarārtham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8145_2: uttarārtham ca sagatigrahaṇam kriyate . kutsane ca supi agotrādau sagatiḥ api . prapacati
GS24pmbhasuu:8145_3: pūti . atha apigrahaṇam kimartham . agatikasya api yathā syāt . yat kāṣṭhā pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:8145_4: . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham pūrveṇa agatikasya . na sidhyati . malopābhisambaddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8145_5: tat . yadi tat anuvarteta iha api malopaḥ prasajyeta . dāruṇam pacati iti . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8145_6: ca apigrahaṇam kriyate . kutsane ca supi agotrādau agatiḥ api iti . pacati pūti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8147_0: 341-342 tiṅnighātāt pūjanāt pūjitam anudāttam vipratiṣedhena . tiṅnighātāt pūjanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8147_1: pūjitam anudāttam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . tiṅnighātasya avakāśaḥ . devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8147_2: pacati . pūjanāt pūjitam anudāttam iti asya avakāśaḥ . kāṣṭādhyāpakaḥ . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8147_3: prāpnoti . kāṣṭhā pacati . pūjanāt pūjitam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8151_1: tiṅi avadhāraṇāt . gateḥ anudāttatve gatigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tiṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_2: avadhāraṇāt . tiṅica udāttavati iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . tiṅi udāttavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_3: eva gatiḥ anudāttaḥ bhavati na anyatra iti . chandortham tarhi gatigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_4: . chandasi gatau parataḥ anudāttatvam yathā syāt mandraśabde mā bhūt . a mandraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_5: indra haribhiḥ yāhi mayuraromabhiḥ . chandortham iti cet na agatitvāt . chandortham
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_6: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . agatitvāt . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_7: bhavataḥ na ca atra āṅaḥ mandraśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi yāhiśabdam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_8: . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . abhyuddharati upasamādadhāti iti . atra api na abheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_9: udam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi haratim prati kriyāyogaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . udam
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_10: prati kriyāyogaḥ . katham . uddharatikriyām viśinaṣṭi . udā viśiṣṭām abhiḥ viśinaṣṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_11: . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti bhavati eva saṅghātam prati kriyāyogaḥ . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_12: mandrasādhanā kriyā āṅā vyajyate . ā yāhi mandraiḥ iti . nanu pūrvam dhātuḥ upasargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_13: yujyate paścāt sādhanena iti . na etat sāram . pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_14: upasargeṇa . kim kāraṇam . sādhanam hi kriyām nirvartayati tām upasargaḥ viśinaṣṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_15: abhinirvṛttasya ca arthasya upasargeṇa viśeṣaḥ śakyaḥ vaktum . satyam evam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_16: yaḥ tu asau dhātūpasargayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ tam abhyantare kṛtvā dhātuḥ sādhanena
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_17: yujyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena
GS24pmbhasuu:8151_18: yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa iti āsyate guruṇā iti akarmakaḥ upāsyate guruḥ iti kena

GS24pmbhasuu:8153_0: 347-349 tiṅgrahaṇam kimartham . tiṅgrahaṇam udāttavataḥ parimāṇārtham . tiṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_1: kriyate udāttavataḥ parimāṇārtham . tiṅi udāttavati yathā syāt mandraśabde mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_2: . ā mandraiḥ indra haribhiḥ yāhi . yadyogāt gatiḥ . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_3: bhavataḥ na ca āṅaḥ mandraśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi yāhiśabdam prati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_4: yadyogāt gatiḥ iti cet pratyayodāttatve aprasiddhiḥ . yadyogāt gatiḥ iti cet pratyayodāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_5: aprasiddhiḥ syāt . yatprakaroti . tasmāt tiṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . yadi tiṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_6: kriyate āmante na prāpnoti . prapacatitarām . prajalpatitarām . asati punaḥ tiṅgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_7: kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam tasmāt atiśaye tarap utpadyate tarabantāt svārthe ām tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_8: yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti bhavati etam saṅghātam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_9: kriyāyogaḥ . tasmāt na arthaḥ tiṅgrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati . a mandraiḥ indra
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_10: haribhiḥ yāhi mayuraromabhiḥ . yadyogāt gatiḥ iti . nanu ca uktam yadyogāt gatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_11: iti cet pratyayodāttatve aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadkriyāyuktāḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_12: evam vijñāyate yasya kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_13: iti . katham tarhi . yā kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:8157_1: vidyamānavattvāt uttaratra ānantaryasya aprasiddhiḥ syāt . imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati
GS24pmbhasuu:8157_2: . gaṅgeśabdaḥ ayam yamuneśabdam prati avidyamānavat bhavati . tatra āmantritasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8157_3: padāt parasya iti anudāttatvam na syāt . siddham tu padapūrvasya iti vacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8157_4: etat . katham . padapūrvasya iti vacanāt . padapūrvasya ca āmantritasya avidyamānavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_0: 350-352 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . avidyamānavattve prayojanam āmantritayuṣmadasmattiṅnighātāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_1: . āmantritasya padāt parasya anudāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva bhavati pacasi devadatta
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_2: . devadatta yajñadatta iti atra na bhavati avidyamānavattvāt āmantritasya . yuṣmadasmadoḥṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayorvāmnāvau
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_3: iti iha eva bhavati grāmaḥ vām svam janapadaḥ nau svam . devadattayajñadattau yuvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_4: svam iti atra na bhavati avidyamānavattvāt āmantritasya . tiṅatiṅaḥ iti iha eva bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_5: devadattaḥ pacati . devadatta pacasi iti atra na bhavati avidyamānavattvāt āmantritasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_6: . pūjāyām anantarapratiṣedhaḥ . pūjāyām anantarapratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . yāvat pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_7: śobhanam . yāvat devadatta pacati iti atra api siddham bhavati . jātu apūrvam . jātu
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_8: apūrvam prayojanam . jātu pacati . devadatta jātu pacasi iti atra api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_9: . āho utāho ca anantaravidhau . āho utāho ca anantaravidhau prayojanam . āho pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_10: . āho devadatta pacasi iti atra api siddham bhavati . utāho pacasi . utāho devadatta
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_11: pacasi iti atra api siddham bhavati . āmaḥ ekāntaravidhau . āmaḥ ekāntaravidhau prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8159_12: . ām pacasi devadatta . ām bhoḥ pacasi devadatta atra api siddham bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:8161_1: namāni . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . na āmantrite samānādhikaraṇe sāmānyavacanam . tataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8163_1: iti śakyam avaktum . katham . vibhāṣitam viśeṣavacane iti ucyate tena yat prati viśeṣavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8163_2: iti etat bhavati tasya bhaviṣyati . kim ca prati etat bhavati . sāmānyavacanam . aparaḥ āha :

GS24pmbhasuu:8164_1: yat prati sāmānyavacanam iti etat bhavati . kim ca prati etat bhavati . viśeṣavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_0: 354-356 yā iyam sapādasaptādhyāyī anukrāntā etasyām ayam pādonaḥ adhyāyaḥ asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_1: veditavyaḥ . yadi sapādāyām saptādhyāyyām ayam pādonaḥ adhyāyaḥ asiddhaḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_2: yaḥ iha saptamīnirdeśāḥ pañcamīnirdeśāḥ ca ucyante ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśāḥ ca ucyante te api
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_3: asiddhāḥ syūḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalojhali hrasvādaṅgāt saṃyogāntasyalopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_4: eteṣām nirdeśānām asiddhatvāt tasminnitinirdeṣṭepūrvasya tasmādityuttarasya ṣaṣṭhīsthāneyogā
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_5: iti etāḥ paribhāṣāḥ na prakalperan . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadi api idam tatra asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_6: tat tu iha siddham . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_7: . jhalojhali . hrasvādaṅgāt . saṃyogāntasyalopaḥ . upasthitam idam bhavati tasminnitinirdiṣṭepūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_8: tasmādityuttarasya ṣaṣṭhīsthāneyogā iti . yadi kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_9: iyam api paribhāṣā asti vipratiṣedhe param iti sā api iha upatiṣṭheta . tatra kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_10: doṣaḥ . visphoryam avagoryam iti guṇāt dīrghatvam syāt vipratiṣedhena . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_11: paṭhati . pūrvatrāsiddhe na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ abhāvāt uttarasya . pūrvatrāsiddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_12: na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhāvāt uttarasya . dvayoḥ hi sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_13: vipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati na ca pūrvatrāsiddhe param pūrvam prati bhavati . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_14: dogdhā dogdhum ghatvasya asiddhatvāt ḍhatvam prāpnoti kāṣṭhataṭ kūṭataṭ saṃyogādilopsya
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_15: asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntalopaḥ prāpnoti . apavādaḥ vacanaprāmāṇyāt . anavakāśau etau
GS24pmbhasuu:8166_16: vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyataḥ . tasmāt kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam iti na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_0: 356-357 pūrvatrāsiddham adhikāraḥ . pūrvatrāsiddham iti adhikāraḥ ayam draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_1: . kim prayojanam . parasya parasya pūrvatra pūrvatra asiddhavijñānārtham . paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_2: paraḥ yogaḥ pūrvam pūrvam yogam prati asiddhaḥ yathā syāt . anadhikāre hi samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_3: asiddhavijñānam . anadhikāre hi sati samudāyasya samudāye asiddhatvam vijñāyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_4: tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra ayatheṣṭam prasajyeta . yodhuṅmān
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_5: guḍaliṇmān iti . ghatvaḍhatvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhayaḥ iti vatvam prasajyeta . tasmāt adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_0: 357-358 asiddhavacanam kimartham . asiddhavacane uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_2: ca iti . evam iha api pūrvatrāsiddhavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhārtham utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_3: ca . ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhārtham tāvat . rājabhiḥ takṣabhiḥ rājabhyām takṣabhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_4: rājasu takṣasu iti nalope kṛte ataḥ iti aisbhāvādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . asiddhatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_5: bhavanti . utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca . amuṣmai amuṣmāt amuṣya amuṣmin iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_6: mubhāve kṛte ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . asiddhatvāt bhavanti . suparvāṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_7: suparvāṇaḥ . ṇatve kṛte nopadhāyāḥ iti dīrghatvam na prapnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8172_0: 358 subvidhim prati nalopaḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . bhavet iha rājabhiḥ takṣabhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8172_1: iti nalope kṛte ataḥ iti aisbhāvaḥ na syāt . iha tu khalu rājabhyām takṣabhyām rājasu
GS24pmbhasuu:8172_2: takṣasu iti nalope kṛte dīrghatvaittve prāpnutaḥ. na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . subvidhiḥ iti sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_0: 359-361 atha sañjñāvidhau kim udāharaṇam . pañca sapta . pañca sapta iti atra nalope
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_1: kṛte ṣṇāntāṣaṭ iti ṣaṭsañjñā na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati . sañjñāgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_2: ca tannimittatvāt lopasya . sañjñāgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tannimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_3: lopasya . na akṛtāyām ṣaṭsañjñāyām jaśśasoḥ luk na ca akṛte luki padasañjñā na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_4: akṛtāyām padasañjñāyām nalopaḥ prāpnoti . tat etat ānupūrvyā siddham bhavati . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_5: tarhi prayojanam pañcabhiḥ saptabhiḥ iti ṣaṭtricaturbhyohalādiḥ jhalyupottamam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_6: eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . svare avadhāraṇāt ca . svare avadhāraṇāt ca sañjñāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_7: anarthakam . svare avadhāraṇam kriyate svaravidhim prati iti . tugvidhau kim udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_8: . vṛtrahabhyām vṛtrahabhiḥ . nalope kṛte hrasvasyapitikṛtituk iti tuk prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_9: asiddhatvāt na bhavati . tugvidhau ca uktam . kim uktam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_10: animittam tadvighātasya iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . kṛti iti vakṣyāmi . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:8176_11: bhūt . brahmahacchatram bhrūṇahacchāyā . na eṣaḥ sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8178_0: 361-362 iha ne yat kāryam prāpnoti tat prati mubhāvaḥ na asiddhaḥ iti ucyate nābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8178_1: ca eva tāvat na prāpnoti . evam tarhi na mu ṭādeśe . na mu ṭādeśe iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8178_2: kim idam ṭādeśaḥ iti . ṭāyāḥ ādeśaḥ ṭādeśaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ṭāyāḥ ādeśe iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8178_3: ṭāyām ādeśe aprasiddhiḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . amunā iti atra mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8178_4: atodīrghoyañi supica iti dīrghatvam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_0: ṭāyām ādeśaḥ ṭādeśaḥ iti . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_1: . nanu ca uktam ne yat kāryam prāpnoti tasmin mubhāvaḥ na asiddhaḥ iti ucyate nābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_2: ca eva tāvat na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha iṅgitena ceṣṭitena nimiṣitena
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_3: mahatā vā sūtranibandhena ācāryāṇām abhiprāyaḥ lakṣyate . etat eva jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_4: atra nābhāvaḥ iti yat ayam ne parataḥ asiddhatvapratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā dvigatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_5: api hetavaḥ bhavanti . tat yathā . āmrāḥ ca siktāḥ pitaraḥ ca prīṇitāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_6: tathā vākyāni api dvigatāni dṛśyante . śvetaḥ dhāvati . alambusānām yātā iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_7: vā vṛddhakumārīvākyavat idam draṣṭavyam . tat yathā . vṛddhakumārī indreṇa uktā varam
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_8: vṛṇīṣva iti sā varam avṛṇīta putrāḥ me bahukṣīraghṛtam odanam kāṃsyapātryām bhuñjīran
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_9: iti . na ca tāvat asyāḥ patiḥ bhavati kutaḥ putrāḥ kutaḥ gāvaḥ kutaḥ dhānyam . tatrs
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_10: anayā ekena vākyena patiḥ putrāḥ gāvaḥ dhānyam iti sarvam saṅgṛhītam bhavati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_11: iha api ne asiddhatvapratiṣedham bruvatā nābhāvaḥ api saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8182_0: 362-364 yaṇsvaraḥ yaṇādeśe svaritayaṇaḥ svaritārtham . yaṇsvaraḥ yaṇādeśe siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8182_1: vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . svaritayaṇaḥ svaritārtham . svaritayaṇaḥ svaritatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8182_2: yathā syāt . khalapvi aṭati . khalpvi aśnāti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8182_3: . āha ayam svaritayaṇaḥ iti na ca asti siddhaḥ svaritaḥ tatra āśrayāt siddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8182_4: bhaviṣyati . āśrayāt siddhatvam iti cet udāttāt svarite doṣaḥ . āśrayāt siddhatvam

GS24pmbhasuu:8194_0: 377-378 na ṅisambuddhyoḥ anuttarapade . na ṅisambuddhyoḥ anuttarapade iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_1: . iha mā bhūt . carmaṇi tilā asya carmatilaḥ iti . rājan vṛndāraka rājavṛndāraka
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_2: iti . vā napuṃsakānām . vā napuṃsakānām iti vaktavyam . he carma he carman . he varma
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_3: he varman . tat tarhi anuttarapade iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na ṅisambuddhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_4: iti ucyate na ca atra ṅisambuddhī paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_5: iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . na kvacit ṅiḥ lopena lupyate sarvatra lumatā
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_6: eva . yathā eva iha bhavati ārdre carman lohite carman iti evam iha api syāt carmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_7: tilā asya carmatilaḥ iti . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . evam tarhi ṅyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_8: tāvat na arthaḥ . bhatvāt tu ṅau pratiṣedhānarthakyam . ṅau pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_9: . kim kāraṇam . bhatvāt . bhasañjñā atra bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi bhasañjñā atra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_10: rathantare sāman iti atra allopaḥ anaḥ iti allopaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam

GS24pmbhasuu:8194_12: kutvam bhatvāt jaśtvam na bhavati . evam iha api padatvāt allopaḥ na bhatvāt nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_13: na bhaviṣyati . tasmāt na arthaḥ ṅigrahaṇena . sambuddhyarthena ca api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_14: . katham . sambuddhyantānām asamāsaḥ . rājavṛndāraka iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_15: hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam samāsena

GS24pmbhasuu:8227_5: . āvyādhinīḥ sugaṇāḥ iti prāpte . iṣkartāram adhvarasya . niṣkartāram iti prāpte

GS24pmbhasuu:8227_7: . na kartavyam . yat etat rātsasya iti sakāragrahaṇam tat sicaḥ grahaṇam vijñāsyate

GS24pmbhasuu:8227_11: iti eva bhavitavyam . dhi sakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ . cakāddhi iti prayojanam . āśādhvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8227_12: tu katham te syāt . jaśtvam sasya bhaviṣyati . sarvatra evam prasiddham syāt . śrutiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8227_13: ca api na bhidyate . luṅaḥ ca api na mūrdhanye grahaṇam . seṭi duṣyati . ghasibhasyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8227_14: na sidhyet tu . tasmāt sijgrahaṇam na tat . chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ vā yathā iṣkartāramadhvare . dāder dhātor ghaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8236_5: kṛte jhaṣantaḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt na jhaṣantaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . dadhaḥ tathoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8236_7: . kim kāraṇam . sthānivatpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra sthanivadbhāvaḥ pūrvatrāsiddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8236_8: na sthānivat iti . sa ca avaśyam pratiṣedhaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ . itarathā hi alope pratiṣedhaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8247_0: 396-397 vṛddhinimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ . vṛddhinimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_1: . prayojanam kārtikṣaitiphaullayaḥ . kārtiḥ iti vṛddhau kṛtāyām radābhyām iti natvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_2: prāpnoti . kṣaitiḥ iti vṛddhau kṛtāyām kṣiyodīrghāt iti natvam prāpnoti . phaulliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_3: iti vṛddhau kṛtāyām udupadhatvasanniyogena latvam ucyamānam na prāpnoti . atha ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_4: api pratiṣedhe vṛddhinimittāt iti katham idam vijñāyate . vṛddhiḥ eva nimittam vṛddhinimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_5: vṛddhinimittāt iti . āhosvit vṛddhiḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_6: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate vṛddhiḥ eva nimittam vṛddhinimittam vṛddhinimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_7: iti kṣaitiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ kārtiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . atha vijñāyate vṛddhiḥ nimittam asya
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_8: saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittāt iti kārtiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ kṣaitiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_9: . ubhayathā ca phaulliḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_10: eva nimittam vṛddhinimittam vṛddhinimittāt iti . nanu ca uktam kṣaitiḥ saṅgrhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_11: kārtiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ iti . kārtiḥ ca saṅgṛhītaḥ . katham . vṛddhiḥ bhavati guṇaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_12: iti rephaśirāḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ abhinirvartate . atha vā punaḥ astu vṛddhiḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_13: asya saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittāt iti . nanu ca uktam kārtiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_14: kṣaitiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ iti . kṣaitiḥ ca saṅgṛhītaḥ . katham . yat tat vṛddhiśāstram
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_15: tasmin vṛddhiśabdaḥ vartate . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_16: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:8247_17: natvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . evam ca kṛtvā latvam api siddham bhavati phaulliḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:8251_1: . kasmāt na bhavati akṣitam asi mā me kṣeṣṭhāḥ iti . nirdeśāt eva idam abhivyaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8251_2: dīrghasya grahaṇam iti . yadi hrasvasya grahaṇam syāt kṣeḥ iti eva brūyāt . na atra

GS24pmbhasuu:8251_4: api . na atra aprāptā vibhaktiḥ . siddhā atra vibhaktiḥ prātipadikāt iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8251_5: prātipadikasañjñā . arthavat prātipadikam iti . nanu ca adhātuḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8251_6: . na eṣaḥ dhātuḥ dhātoḥ eṣaḥ anukaraṇaḥ . yadi anukaraṇaḥ iyaṅādeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8251_7: . prakṛtivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti evam iyaṅādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi prakṛtivat
GS24pmbhasuu:8251_8: anukaraṇam bhavati iti ucyate svādyutpattiḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ātideśikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8251_9: svāśrayāṇi api na nivartante . atha api etat na asti ātideśikānām svāśrayāṇi api
GS24pmbhasuu:8251_10: na nivartante iti evam api na doṣaḥ . avaśyam atra sarvataḥ nairdeśikī vibhaktiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8253_0: 400-401 añceḥ natve vyaktapratiṣedhaḥ . añceḥ natve vyaktasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_1: . vyaktam anṛtam kathayati iti . añjivijñānāt siddham . na etat añceḥ rūpam . añjeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_2: etat rūpam . añcatyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ punaḥ añcatyarthaḥ . añcatiḥ prakāśane
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_3: vartate . añcitam gacchati . prakāśayati ātmānam iti gamyate . na vai loke añcitam
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_4: gacchati iti prakāśanam gamyate . kim tarhi . samādhānam gamyate . samāhitaḥ bhūtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_5: gacchati iti . evam tarhi añcateḥ aṅkaḥ aṅkaḥ ca prakāśanam . aṅkitāḥ gāvaḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_6: anyābhyaḥ gobhyaḥ prakāśyante . añcatyarthaḥ iti cet añjeḥ tadarthatvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_7: añcatyarthaḥ iti cet añjiḥ api añcatyarthe vartate . katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_8: arthe vartate . katham añjiḥ añcatyarthe vartate . anekārthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_9: . asti punaḥ kva cit anyatra api añjiḥ añcatyarthe vartate . asti iti āha . añjeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_10: añjanam añjanam ca prakāśanam . aṅkteṣiṇī iti ucyate yat tat sitam ca asitam ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_11: prakāśayati . tathā añjeḥ vyañjanam vyañjanam ca prakāśanam . yat tat snehena madhureṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_12: ca jaḍīkṛtānām indriyāṇām svasmin ātmani vyavasthāpanam saḥ rāgaḥ tat vyañjanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8253_13: anvartham khalu api nirvacanam . vyajyate anena iti vyañjanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8255: 401-402 avātābhidhāne . avātābhidhāne iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . nirvāṇaḥ agniḥ vātena . nirvāṇaḥ pradīpaḥ vātena iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:8257_1: vihitaḥ igupadhāt . na etat niṣṭhāntam . kim tarhi kṛśaḥ eṣaḥ igupadhāt kaḥ vihitaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8263_0: 403-404 kim ayam vidhiḥ āhosvit pratiṣedhaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tāvat vidhiḥ nakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8263_1: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . radābhyānniṣṭhātonaḥpūrvasyacadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8263_2: iti . tat vā anekena nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . atha pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8263_3: hrīgrahaṇam anarthakam na hi etasmāt vidhiḥ asti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:8263_4: tāvat vidhiḥ . nanu ca uktam nakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8263_5: . kva prakṛtam . radābhyānniṣṭhātonaḥpūrvasyacadaḥ iti . tat vā anekena nipātanena
GS24pmbhasuu:8263_6: vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum iti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . atha vā kriyate

GS24pmbhasuu:8263_10: bhavati etasmāt vidhiḥ iti yat ayam hrīgrahaṇam karoti .

GS24pmbhasuu:8268_1: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvatra eva atra bhidiḥ vidāraṇasāmānye vartate tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā

GS24pmbhasuu:8270_0: 407 pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham na kvinaḥ kuḥ iti eva ucyeta . kvinaḥ kuḥ iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8270_1: ucyamāne vakārasya eva kutvam prasajyeta . nanu ca lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . anavakāśam

GS24pmbhasuu:8332_5: vivṛddhiḥ asmin saḥ ayam ubhayavivṛddhiḥ ubhayavivṛddhiprasaṅgāt iti . imau aicau
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_6: samāhāravarṇau mātrā avarṇasya mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ iti tayoḥ plutaḥ ucyamāne ubhayavivṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_7: prāpnoti . tat yathā . abhivardhamānaḥ garbhaḥ sarvāṅgaparipūrṇaḥ vardhate . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_8: prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra ayatheṣṭam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_9: . caturmātraḥ plutaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu idutoḥ dīrghavacanāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_10: katham . idutoḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat etat katham kṛtvā siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_11: . yadi samaḥ pravibhāgaḥ mātrā avarṇasya mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ . atha hi ardhamātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_12: avarṇasya adhyardhamātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ prāpnoti . atha hi adhyardhamātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_13: avarṇasya ardhamātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ ardhacaturthamātraḥ prāpnoti . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_14: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatra ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . tatra sauryabhagavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:8332_15: uktam aniṣṭijñaḥ vāḍavaḥ paṭhati . iṣyate eva caturmātraḥ plutaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:8341_4: . dīrghatvam śākalam ca mā bhūt iti . agnā3yindram . paṭā3vudakam . etat api na asti

GS24pmbhasuu:8341_7: tadartham . bho3yindra . bho3yiha iti . yadi tarhi tasya nibandhanam asti tat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8341_8: vaktavyam idam na vaktavyam . idam api avaśyam vaktavyam svarārtham . tena hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:8341_9: udāttasvaritayoryaṇaḥsvarito'nudāttasya iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . anena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8341_10: sati asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi asya nibandhanam asti idam eva vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8341_11: tat na vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam tat api avaśyam vaktavyam yau plutapūrvau idutau
GS24pmbhasuu:8341_12: aplutavikārau tadartham bho3yindra bho3yiha iti . chāndasam etat dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:8341_13: bhavati . yat tarhi na chāndasam . bho3yindram sāma gāyati . eṣaḥ api chandasi dṛṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8341_14: anuprayogaḥ iti . kim nu yaṇā bhavati iha na siddham yvau idutoḥ yat ayam vidadhāti

GS24pmbhasuu:8341_16: bhavati plutapūrvaḥ tasya yaṇam vidadhāti apavādam . tena tayoḥ ca na śākaladīrghau
