GS24pmbhasuu:8348_0: 431-432 sambuddhau iti ucyate tatra idam na sidhyati . bhoḥ brāhmaṇāḥ iti . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8348_1: vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇam na iti iha na prāpnoti . bhoḥ brāhmaṇi . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8348_2: . avyayam eṣaḥ bhoḥśabdaḥ na eṣā bhavataḥ pravṛttiḥ . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8348_3: ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā nipātaḥ avyayam iti avyayasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8351_0: 432-434 sampuṅkānām satvam . sampuṅkānām satvam vaktavyam . saṃskartā puṃskāmā kāṃs
GS24pmbhasuu:8351_1: kān iti . ruvidhau hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . ruvidhau hi sati aniṣṭam prasajyeta . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8351_2: tāvat saṃskartā iti vā śari iti prasajyeta . puṃskāmā iti idudupadhasya iti ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8351_3: prasajyeta . kāṃs kān iti kupvoḥ hkaḥ prasajyeta . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8351_4: . kriyate nyāse eva . samaḥ suṭi iti dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8352_0: samaḥ suṭi sakāraḥ bhavati . tat prakṛtam uttaratra anuvartiṣyate . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8352_1: naśchavyapraśān iti atra api prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . samaḥsuṭi . pumaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8352_2: khayi ampare saḥ bhavati . naḥ chavi apraśān ruḥ bhavati pumaḥ khayi ampare sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8352_3: . ubhayatharkṣu dīrghādaṭisamānapāde nṝnpe svatavānpāyau ruḥ bhavati pumaḥ khayi
GS24pmbhasuu:8352_4: ampare sakāraḥ . kān āmreḍite sakāraḥ . pumaḥ khayi ampare iti nivṛttam . samaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_0: 434-435 ḍhalope apadāntagrahaṇam . ḍhalope apadāntagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_1: . śvaliṭ ḍhaukate . guḍaliṭ ḍhaukate . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . jaśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_2: atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . jaśbhāvāt iti cet uttaratra ḍhasya abhāvāt apavādaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_3: . jaśbhāvāt iti cet uttaratra ḍhakārasya abhāvāt asiddhatvāt apavādaḥ ayam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_4: . kasya . jaśtvasya . tasmāt siddhavacanam . tasmāt siddhatvam vaktavyam . kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_5: . ṣṭutvasya . saṅgrahaṇam vā . saṅgrahaṇam vā kartavyam . saṅi ḍhaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_6: . tattarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . ānantaryam iha āśrīyate ḍhakārasya ḍhakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_7: iti . kva cit ca sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam śāstrakṛtam anānantaryam kva cit ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_8: eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam . ṣṭutve sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam jaśtve na
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_9: eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam . yatra kutaḥ cit eva ānantaryam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_0: 435-439 visarjanīyaḥ anuttarapade . visarjanīyaḥ anuttarapade iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_1: mā bhūt . nārkuṭaḥ nārpatyaḥ iti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_2: kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ rephaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ visarjanīyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_3: asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ parihāraḥ . antaraṅgam bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_4: iti pratidvandvabhāvinau etau pakṣau . sati antaraṅge bahiraṅgam sati bahiraṅge antargam
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_5: . na ca atra antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samavasthānam asti . kim kāraṇam . asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_6: . na ca anabhinirvṛtte bahiraṅge antaraṅgam prāpnoti . tatra nimittam eva bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_7: antaraṅgasya . animittam bahiraṅgam antaraṅgasya . kim kāraṇam . asiddhatvāt . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_8: asiddhatvam yāvatā pūrvatra asiddham iti asiddhā paribhāṣā . asiddham bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_9: antaraṅge . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam iti kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_10: idam bhavati asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti . evam eṣā siddhā paribhāṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_11: . kutaḥ nu khalu etat dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ pūrvatra asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_12: iti ca asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti ca pūrvatrāsiddham iti etām upamṛdya asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_13: bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti etayā vyavasthā bhaviṣyati na punaḥ asiddham bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_14: antaraṅge iti etām upamṛdya purvatrāsiddham iti etayā vyavasthā syāt . ataḥ kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:8357_15: ataḥ ayuktaḥ parihāraḥ na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8359: 439 kimartham idam ucyate na kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti eva siddham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . roḥ eva supi na anyasya supi . kva mā bhūt . gīrṣu dhūrṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_0: 440-441 aśgrahaṇam anarthakam anyatra abhāvāt . aśgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_1: . anyatra abhāvāt . na hi anyatra ruḥ asti anyat ataḥ aśaḥ . nanu ca ayam asti. chandaḥsu
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_2: payaḥsu iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sukāraparaḥ eva udāhriyate na punaḥ ayam vṛkṣaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_3: plakṣaḥ tatra iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . visarjanīye kṛte na bhaviṣyati . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_4: tarhi visarjanīye kṛte na bhaviṣyati . chandaḥsu payaḥsviti . sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_5: . nanu ca iha api sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . vṛkṣaḥ tatra plakṣaḥ tatra iti . analvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_6: sthānivadbhāvaḥ . atha ayam alvidhiḥ syāt śakyam aśgrahaṇam avaktum . bāḍham śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_7: . alvidhiḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . katham . idam asti rori iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi kharavasānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_8: visarjanīyaḥ raḥ . tataḥ roḥ supi visarjanīyaḥ raḥ iti eva . uttarārtham tarhi aśgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_9: kartavyam halisarveṣām hali aśi iti yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:8364: 442 kimartham idam ucyate na lopaḥ śākalyasya iti eva siddham . okārāt lopavacanam nityārtham . okārāt lopavacanam kriyate . nityārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8369: tantra*utam . pade iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati tantre ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8372: tantra*utam iti . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . uttarārtham tarhi padagrahaṇam kartavyam ṅamohrasvādaciṅamuṇnityam iti apade mā bhūt . daṇḍinā śakaṭinā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8374: 443 yavalapare yavalāḥ vā . yavalapare hakāre yavalāḥ vā iti vaktavyam . kiyhyaḥ kim hyaḥ . kivhvalayati kim hvalayati . kilhlādayati kim hlādayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_0: 443-444 iha dhuḍādiṣu kecit pūrvāntāḥ kecit parādayaḥ . yadi punaḥ sarve eva pūrvāntāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_1: syuḥ sarve eva parādayaḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . dhugādiṣu ṣṭutvaṇatvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_2: . dhugādiṣu satsu ṣṭutvaṇatvayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ṣṭutvasya tāvat . śvaliṭtsāye
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_3: . madhuliṭtsāye . ṣṭunāṣṭuḥ iti ṣṭutvam prāpnoti . parādau punaḥ sati napadāntāṭṭoranām
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_4: iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . ṇatvasya . kurvannāste . kṛṣannāste . raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_5: it ṇatvam prāpnoti . parādau punaḥ sati padāntasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_6: . santu tarhi parādayaḥ . parādau chatvaṣatvavidhipratiṣedhaḥ . yadi parādayaḥ chatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_7: vidheyam ṣatvam ca pratiṣedhyam . chatvam vidheyam . kurvañcchete . kṛṣañcchete .
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_8: yat hi tat śaścho'ṭi iti jhayaḥ padāntāt iti evam tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam jhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_9: padāntāt iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt . purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ virapśin iti . ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_10: ca pratiṣedhyam . pratyaṅksiñca . udaṅksiñca . ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_11: . pūrvānte punaḥ sati sātpadādyoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . tasmāt santu
GS24pmbhasuu:8376_12: yathānyāsam eva kecit pūrvāntāḥ kecit parādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8378_0: 444 ayam tu khalu śi tuk chatvārtham niyogataḥ pūrvāntaḥ kartavyaḥ tatra kurvañcchete
GS24pmbhasuu:8378_1: kṛṣañcchete iti raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ścutve
GS24pmbhasuu:8378_2: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti kṣubhnādiṣu na ṇakāraḥ bhavati . tataḥ stoḥ ścunā
GS24pmbhasuu:8378_3: . stoḥ ścunā sannipāte na ṇakāraḥ bhavati . tataḥ ścuḥ . ścuḥ ca bhavati stoḥ ścunā sannipāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_0: 444-446 ṅamuṭi padādigrahaṇam . ṅamuṭi padādigrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . daṇḍinā
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_1: śakaṭinā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . padāt iti vartate . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_2: paramadaṇḍinā paramacchattriṇā iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat uttarapadatve
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_3: ca apadādividhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api padāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_4: vaktavyam . yat hi tat prakṛtam prāk supi kutsanāt iti evam tat . evam tarhi ṅamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_5: eva ayam ṅamuṭ kriyate . katham . padasya iti vartate ṅamaḥ iti ca na eṣā pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_6: . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī . padāntasya ṅamaḥ ṅamuṭ bhavati hrasvāt uttarasya aci
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_7: iti . yadi ṅamaḥ eva ṅamuṭ kriyate kurvannāste kṛṣannāste raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_8: iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . padāntasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . padāntasya iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_9: na eṣaḥ padāntaḥ . padāntabhaktaḥ padāntagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . evam api na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_10: . kim kāraṇam . uktam etat na vā padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt iti . evam tarhi pade
GS24pmbhasuu:8380_11: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . uñi ca pade iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8382_0: 446 kimartham mayaḥ uttarasya uñaḥ vaḥ vā iti ucyate na ikaḥ yaṇaci iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8382_1: . na sidhyati . pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8382_2: eva ucyeta ikaḥ yaṇaci mayaḥ uñaḥ vā iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kimvāvapanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8382_3: mahat . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ prasajyeta . vatve punaḥ sati asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8385_0: plakṣaḥ iti . saṃhitāyām iti vartate . evam api atra prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8385_1: sannikarṣaḥ saṃhitā iti ucyate . saḥ yathā eva pareṇa paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ evam pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8385_2: api . evam tarhi anavakāśā avasānasañjñā saṃhitāsañjñām bādhiṣyate . atha vā saṃhitāsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_0: sādhīyaḥ yaḥ paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ . yadi eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_1: anavakāśā avasānasañjñā saṃhitāsañjñām bādhate atha api saṃhitāsañjñāyām prakarṣagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_2: vijñāyate ubhayathā doṣaḥ bhavati . iṣyante itaḥ uttaram avasāne saṃhitākāryāṇi tāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_3: na sidhyanti . aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_4: na sarvasya visarjanīyasya satvam bhavati iti yat ayam kharavasānayorvisjanīyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_5: āha . itarathā kharavasānayoḥ saḥ bhavati iti eva brūyāt . tat ca laghu bhavati visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_6: saḥ iti etat ca na vaktavyaṃ bhavati . avaśyam śarparevisarjanīyaḥ iti atra prakṛtinirdeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_7: visarjanīyagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha idānīm etat api rasānnidhyārtham purastāt apakrakṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_8: kharavasānayoḥ saḥ iti atra eva evam api kupvoḥ XkkaXppau ca iti evamādinā anukramaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_9: vyavacchinnam bhobhagoaghoapūrvasyayo'śi iti atra rugrahaṇam kartavyam syāt . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_10: api ekam visarjanīyagrahaṇam vyājaḥ bhavati . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_11: sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na sarvasya visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_12: satvam bhavati iti . evam api anaikāntikam jñāpakam . etāvat jñāpyate na sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_13: vijanīyasya satvam bhavati iti tatra kutaḥ etat iha bhaviṣyati vṛkṣaḥ tatra plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_14: tatra iti iha na bhaviṣyati vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_15: na asya visarjanīyasya satvam bhavati iti yat ayam śarpare visarjanīyaḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_16: atha vā hali iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . hali sarveṣām iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_17: mayaḥ uñaḥ vaḥ vā hali ca iti hali api vatvam prāpnoti . śamu naḥ . śamu yoḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:8386_18: . evam tarhi visarjanīyasyasaḥ iti atra khari iti anuvartiṣyate . atha vā sambandham anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8388: 450 vāśarprakaraṇe kharpare lopaḥ . vāśarprakaraṇe kharpare lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vṛkṣāḥ sthātāraḥ . vṛkṣāḥ sthātāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_0: 450-453 sasya kupvoḥ visarjanīyajihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyāḥ . sasya kupvoḥ visarjanīyajihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_1: vaktavyāḥ . visarjanīyādeśe hi śarparayoḥ eva ādeśaprasaṅgaḥ . visarjanīyādeśe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_2: sati śarparayoḥ eva kupvoḥ hkkahppau syātām . adbhiḥ psātam . vāsaḥ kṣaumam . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_3: na bhaviṣyataḥ . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . puruṣaḥ tsarukaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_4: . na vaktavyam . yat etat visarjanīyasya saḥ iti atra visarjanīyagrahaṇam etat uttaratra
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_5: anuvartiṣyate tasmin ca śarpare visarjanīyaḥ asiddhaḥ . na asiddhaḥ . katham . adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_6: nāma triprakāraḥ . kaḥ cit ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati yathā pradīpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_7: suprajvalitaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . aparaḥ yathā rajjvā ayasā vā baddham kāṣṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_8: anukṛṣyate tadvat . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_9: upatiṣṭhate . tat yadā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_10: hi yat etat visarjanīyasyasaḥ iti atra visarjanīyagrahaṇam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_11: sat anyat sampadyate tasmin ca śarpare visarjanīyaḥ siddhaḥ . evam ca krtvā śarparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_12: eva kupvoḥ hkkahppau syātām . adbhiḥ psātam . vāsaḥ kṣaumam iti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_13: kariṣyate . śarpare visarjanīyaḥ . vā śari . tataḥ kupvoḥ . kupvoḥ ca śarparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_14: visarjanīyasya visarjanīyaḥ bhavati iti . kimartham idam . kupvoḥ hkkahppau vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_15: tadbādhanārtham . tataḥ hkkahppau bhavataḥ kupvoḥ iti eva . śarparayoḥ iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_16: . atha vā śarparevisarjanīyaḥ iti etat kupvoḥ hkkahppau ca iti atra anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8392_0: 453-454 saḥ apadādau anavyayasya . saḥ apadādau anavyayasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:8392_1: bhūt . prātaḥkalpam punaḥkalpam . roḥ kāmye niyamārtham . roḥ kāmye iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8392_2: . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . roḥ eva kāmye na anyasya . payaskāmyati . kva mā
GS24pmbhasuu:8392_3: bhūt . gīḥkāmyati pūḥkāmyati . upadhmānīyasya ca satvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8392_4: . ayam ubjiḥ upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate tasya satve kṛte jaśbhāve ca abhyudgaḥ samudgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8392_5: iti etat rūpam yathā syāt . yadi upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate ubjijiṣati iti upadhmānīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8392_6: dvirvacanam prāpnoti . dakāropadhe punaḥ sati nandrāḥsaṃyogādayaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8392_7: siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi dakāropadhaḥ paṭhyate kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8393_0: ubjitā ubjitum iti . asiddhe bhaḥ udjeḥ . idam asti stoḥścunāścuḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:8393_1: . bhaḥ udjeḥ . udjeḥ ca ścunā sannipāte bhaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8393_2: na vaktavyam . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . bhujanyubjaupāṇyupatāpayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8393_3: iti . iha api prāpnoti . abhyudgaḥ samudgaḥ . akutvaviṣaye nipātanam . atha vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:8393_4: etat ubjeḥ rūpam . kim tarhi gameḥ dvyupasargāt ḍaḥ vidhīyate . abhyudgataḥ abhyudgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8395_0: 454-456 kim aviśeṣeṇa satvam uktvā tataḥ iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya ṣatvam ucyate āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8395_1: iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya eva ṣatvam vidhīyate . kim ca ataḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8395_2: satvam uktvā iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya ṣatvam ucyate niṣkṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_0: niṣpītam iti atra satvasya asiddhatvāt ṣatvam na prāpnoti . atha iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_1: eva ṣatvam vidhīyate satvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_2: satvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam namaspurasorgatyoḥ iti atra sakāragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_3: . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe ṣatvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_4: ṣatvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam idudupadhasya ca apratyasya iti atra ṣakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_5: kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe satvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_6: anuvartate satvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam tirasaḥ anyatarasyām iti atra sakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_7: kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe ṣatvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_8: anuvartate ṣatvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam dvistriścaturitikṛtvo'rthe isusoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_9: sāmarthye nityaṃsamāse anuttarapadasthasya iti ṣakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_10: ca kriyamāṇe satvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate satvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_12: sakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat aviśeṣeṇa satvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8396_13: uktvā iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya ṣatvam ucyate . nanu ca uktam niṣkṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8397_0: niṣpītam iti atra satvasya asiddhatvāt ṣatvam na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8397_1: jñāpayati na yoge yogaḥ asiddhaḥ . kim tarhi prakaraṇe prakaraṇam asiddham iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:8397_2: ayam upasargāt asamāse api ṇopadeśasya iti asamāsepigrahaṇam karoti . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8397_3: astu iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya ṣatvam vidhīyate . nanu ca uktam satvam api anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8397_4: utāho na kim ca ataḥ yadi anuvartate satvam api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham
GS24pmbhasuu:8397_5: anuvartiṣyate . saḥ apadādau . iṇaḥṣaḥ . namaspurasoḥ gatyoḥ sakāraḥ iṇaḥ uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8397_6: ṣakāraḥ . idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya ṣakāraḥ namaspurasoḥ gatyoḥ sakāraḥ . tirasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8397_7: anyatarasyām sakāraḥ idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya ṣakāraḥ . dvistriścaturitikṛtvo'rthe
GS24pmbhasuu:8397_8: isusoḥsāmarthye nityamsamāse'nuttarapadasthasya iti ṣakāraḥ tirasaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8399_0: 456-457 idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya iti cet pummuhusoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . idudupadhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8399_1: ca apratyayasya iti cet pummuhusoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . puṃskāmā muhuḥkāmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8399_2: . vṛddhibhūtānām ṣatvam vaktavyam . dauṣkulyam naiṣpuruṣyam . plutānām tādau ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8399_3: plutānām tādau ca kupvoḥ ca iti vaktavyam . sarpi3ṣṭara . barhī3ṣṭara ni3ṣkula du3ṣpuruṣa
GS24pmbhasuu:8399_4: . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahirangalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8401_0: 457-458 iha kasmāt na bhavati . pituḥ karoti . mātuḥ karoti . apratyayavisarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8401_1: iti ṣatvam prasajyeta . apratyayavisarjanīyasya iti ucyate pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8401_2: ayam . lupyate atra pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ rātsasya iti . evam tarhi . bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8401_3: jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu bhrātuṣputraśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:8401_4: paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_0: 458-460 dvistriścaturgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . pañcakṛtvaḥ karoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_1: kṛtvorthagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . catuṣkapālaḥ catuṣkaṇṭakaḥ iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_2: asti . astu etena vibhāṣā pūrveṇa nityaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte pūrveṇa iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_3: vibhāṣā ārabhyate sā yathā eva iha bādhikā bhavati catuḥ karoti catuṣkaroti iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_4: catuṣkapāle api bādhikā syāt . na atra pūrveṇa ṣatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . apratyayavisarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_5: iti ucyate pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca ayam . lupyate pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ rātsasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_6: . tasmāt kṛtvorthagrahaṇam kartavyam . dvistriścaturgrahaṇam śakyamavaktum . kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_7: na bhavati pañcakṛtvaḥ karoti iti . idudupadhasya iti vartate . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_8: akriyamāṇe dvistriścaturgrahaṇe kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇena visarjanīyaḥ viśeṣyeta . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_9: kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt dviṣkaroti dviḥ karoti . iha na syāt catuṣkaroti catuḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_10: iti . dvistriścaturgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇe dvistriścaturaḥ viśeṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_11: . dvistriścaturṇām kṛtro'rthe vartamānānām yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_12: prayojanam . padasya iti vartate tat kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyaḥ . padasya kṛtvo'rthe
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_13: vartamānasya yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti . kṛtvasujarthe ṣatvam bravīti . kasmāt catuṣkapāle
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_14: mā . ṣatvam vibhāṣayā bhūt . nanu siddham tatra pūrveṇa . siddhe hi ayam vidhatte
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_15: caturaḥ ṣatvam tadā api krtvo'rthe . lupte kṛtvo'rthīye rephasya visarjanīyaḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_16: . evam sati tu idānīm dviḥ triḥ catuḥ iti anena kim kāryam . anyaḥ hi na idudupadhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_17: kṛtvo'rthe kaḥ cit api asti . akriyamāṇe grahaṇe visarjanīyaḥ tadā viśeṣyeta . caturaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_18: na sidhyati tadā rephasya visarjanīyaḥ hi . tasmin tu gṛhyamāṇe yuktam caturaḥ viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8403_19: bhavati . prakṛtam padam tadantam tasya api viśeṣaṇam nyāyyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8405_0: 460-462 anuttarapadasthasya iti kimartham . paramasarpiḥkuṇḍikā . atha idānīm anena
GS24pmbhasuu:8405_1: mukte pūrveṇa ṣatvam vibhāṣā kasmāt na bhavati isusoḥ sāmarthye iti . nānāpadārthayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8405_2: vartamānayoḥ khyāyate yadā yogaḥ . tasmin ṣatvam kāryam tat yuktam tat ca me na iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8405_3: . vyapekṣāsāmarthye pūrvayogaḥ na ca atra vyapekṣāsāmarthyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8405_4: vyapekṣāsāmarthyam āśrīyate na punaḥ ekārthībhāvaḥ yathā anyatra . aikārthye sāmarthye
GS24pmbhasuu:8405_5: vākye ṣatvam na me prasajyeta . aikārthye sāmarthye sati vākye ṣatvam na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_0: sarpiṣ karoti . sarpiḥ karoti iti . tasmāt iha vyapekṣām sāmarthyam sādhu manyante
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_1: . atha cet kṛdantam etat tataḥ adhike na eva me bhavet prāptiḥ . yadi kṛdantam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_2: tataḥ adhikasya ṣatvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_3: grahaṇam bhavati iti . vākye api tarhi na prāpnoti . paramasarpiṣkaroti paramasarpiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_4: karoti iti . vākye ca me vibhāṣā pratiṣedhaḥ na prakalpeta . yat ayam anuttarapadasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_5: iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati vākye vibhāṣā iti . atha cet
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_6: saṃvijñānam nitye ṣatve tataḥ vibhāṣā iyam . atha avyutpannam prātipadikam tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_7: nitye ṣatve prāpte iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate . siddham ca me samāse . ṣatvam . kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_8: tarhi idam ucyate . pratiṣedhārthaḥ tu yatnaḥ ayam . anuttarapadasthasya iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_9: vakṣyāmi iti . nānāpadārthayoḥ vartamānayoḥ khyāyate yadā yogaḥ . tasmin ṣatvam kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_10: tat yuktam tat ca me na iha . aikārthye sāmarthye vākye ṣatvam na me prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_11: tasmāt iha vyapekṣām sāmarthyam sādhu manyante . atha cet kṛdantam etat tataḥ adhike
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_12: na eva me bhavet prāptiḥ . vākye ca me vibhāṣā pratiṣedhaḥ na prakalpeta . atha cet
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_13: saṃvijñānam nitye ṣatve tataḥ vibhāṣā iyam . siddham ca me samāse pratiṣedhārthaḥ tu yatnaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8408_0: 463 atha mūrdhanyagrahaṇam kimartham na apadāntasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:8408_1: tatra ayam api arthaḥ ṣakāragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati prakṛtam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:8408_2: prakṛtam . iṇaḥṣaḥ iti . na evam śakyam . avaśyam mūrdhanyagrahaṇam kartavyam ihārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8408_3: uttarārtham ca . ihārtham tāvat . iṇaḥṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāmdho'ṅgāt iti atra ṃūrdhanyagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8408_4: na kartavyam bhavati . uttarārtham ca . raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade iti atra ṇakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8408_5: na kartavyam bhavati . tatra ayam api arthaḥ padāntasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8410_0: 464-465 sagrahaṇam kimartham na saheḥ sāḍaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . saheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8410_1: sāḍaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ bhavati iti ucyamāne antyasya prasajyeta . nanu ca antyasya mūrdhanyavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:8410_2: prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā sakārasya bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantyārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:8410_3: ārambhe sakārasya bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ ākārasya syāt . sthane antaratamaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8410_4: iti sakārasya bhaviṣyati . bhavet prakṛtitaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām siddham syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8410_5: . ādeśataḥ tu antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ākārasya prasajyeta . tasmāt sakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8410_6: kartavyam . uttarārtham ca sakāragrahaṇam kriyate . ādeśapratyayayoḥ sakārasya yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8411_0: stutam . atha sahigrahaṇam kimartham na sāḍaḥ saḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . saheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8411_1: eva sāḍrūpam bhavati na anyasya . yadi evaṃ . sāḍaḥ ṣatve samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8411_2: . sāḍaḥ ṣatve samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sāḍaḥ daṇḍaḥ. sāḍaḥ vṛścikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8411_3: iti . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . arthavataḥ sāḍśabdasya grahaṇam na ca eṣaḥ arthavān
GS24pmbhasuu:8411_4: . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti cet taddhitalope arthavattvāt pratiṣedhaḥ . arthavadgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8411_5: siddham iti cet taddhitalope arthavattvāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saha aḍena sāḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8411_6: sāḍasya apatyam sāḍiḥ atra prāpnoti . na vaktavyaḥ . ṣatvatukoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8411_7: na eṣaḥ sāḍśabdaḥ . evam api saha ḍena saḍaḥ saḍasya apatram sāḍiḥ atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8413_1: pratiṣedaḥ vaktavyaḥ . niṃsse niṃssva iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8413_2: numā eva vyavāye visarjanīyena eva vyavāye śarā eva vyavāye iti . kim vaktavyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8413_3: . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8413_4: yathā . guṇavṛddhisañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:8413_5: vākyaparisamāptiḥ . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena
GS24pmbhasuu:8413_6: bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . evam tarhi . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8413_7: kariṣyate . numvyavāye . tataḥ visarjanīyavyavāye . tataḥ śarvyavāye . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8413_8: yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . pratyekam vyavāyaśabdaḥ parisamāpyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8415: 466-467 ādeśapratyayayoḥ ṣatve sarakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśapratyayayoḥ ṣatve sarakaḥ pratiṣedaḥ vaktavyaḥ : kṛsaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8417: sarakaḥ iti . saragādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:8418_0: varsam tarsam iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8418_1: . na vai etat ṣatve śakyam vijñātum uṇadayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8418_2: hi na syāt . sarpiṣaḥ yajuṣaḥ iti . evam tarhi . bahulavacanāt siddham . bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:8421: ādeśasya yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . āhosvit samānādhikaraṇā :
GS24pmbhasuu:8422_0: ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ādeśapratyayayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8422_1: iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:8422_2: cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bisam bisam . musalam musalam . samānādhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8422_3: ca aprāptiḥ . samānādhikaraṇānām ca ṣatvasya aprāptiḥ . eṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8423: akārṣīt . astu tarhi samānādhikaraṇā . yadi samānādhikaraṇā siṣeca suṣvāpa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8424_0: atra na prāpnoti . na dhātudvirvacane sthāne dvirvacanam śakyam āsthātum . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:8424_1: hi prasajyeta sarīsṛpyate iti . tasmāt tatra dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam . iha tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8424_2: kariṣyati hariṣyati pratyayaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8424_3: yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . iha tarhi akārṣīt pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8424_4: iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi : joṣiṣat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8425: mandiṣat iti pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api iṭi kṛte pratyayasya sakāraḥ . iha tarhi indraḥ mā vakṣat saḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8426_0: saḥ devan yakṣat . nānāvibhaktīnām ca samāsānupapattiḥ . nānāvibhaktīnām ca samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8426_1: na upapadyate ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8426_2: . ādeśasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ pratyayasakārasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti . sa tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8426_3: kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . katham . astu tāvat avayavaṣaṣṭhī . nanu ca uktam ādeśapratyayayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8426_4: iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8426_5: . yat api ucyate samānādhikaraṇānām ca aprāptiḥ iti vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8426_6: . atha vā punaḥ astu samānādhikaraṇā . katham kariṣyati hariṣyati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8426_7: jñāpayati bhavati evañjātīyakānām ṣatvam iti yat ayam sātpadādyoḥ iti sātpratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:8426_8: śāsti . atha vā punaḥ astu ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . katham indraḥ mā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8427_0: vakṣat saḥ devān yakṣat . vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8427_1: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8427_2: dve prathamārtham ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham avacanāt lokavijñanāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8427_3: . yat api nānāvibhaktīnām ca samāsānupapattiḥ iti ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati nānāvibhaktyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8427_4: eṣaḥ samāsaḥ iti yat ayam śāsivasighasīnāñca iti ghasigrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8427_5: jñāpakam . yadi hi ādeśasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti evam syāt ghasigrahaṇam anarthakam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8427_6: . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ tasya ṣatvam iti tataḥ ghasigrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_0: 470-471 stautiṇigrahaṇam kimartham . astautiṇyantānām mā bhūt . sisikṣati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_1: evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . niyamārthaḥ . sthautiṇyantānām eva na anyeṣām iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_2: asti prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakārakaraṇam niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_3: bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta stautiṇyoḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_4: ṣaṇi iti . mā evam vijñāyi stautiṇyoḥ ṣaṇi eva iti . iha na syāt tuṣṭāva . atha ṣaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_5: iti kimartham . seṣīvyate . kaḥ vinate anurodhaḥ . avinate niyamaḥ mā bhūt . suṣupsati
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_6: iti . kaḥ sānubandhe anurodhaḥ . ṣaśabdamātre niyamaḥ mā bhūt . suṣupiṣe indram .
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_7: suṣupiṣe iha iti . abhyāsāt iti kimartham . abhyāsāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_8: syāt upasargāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ mā bhūt . abhiṣiṣikṣati . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_9: asiddham upasargāt ṣatvam tasya asiddhatvāt niyamaḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_10: . sani yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ yathā syāt yaṅi yaḥ abhyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_11: tasmāt yā prāptiḥ tatra niyamaḥ mā bhūt iti . soṣupyateḥ san soṣupiṣate . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_12: abhyāsāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ yathā syāt dhātoḥ yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_13: bhūt . adhīṣiṣati . nanu ca ṣaṇi iti ucyate . ṣaṇi iti na eṣā parasaptamī śakyā vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_14: sanyaṅantam hi dvirucyate . tasmāt eṣā satsaptamī ṣaṇi sati iti . satsaptamī cet prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8431_0: 472 kimartham idam ucyate . sthādiṣu abhyāsavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8431_1: ārambhaḥ . sthādiṣu eva abhyāsasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . abhisusūṣati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8431_2: kimartham abhyāsena ca iti ucyate . tadvyavāye ca aṣopadeśārtham . tadvyavāye abhyāsavyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:8431_3: ca aṣopadeśasya api yathā syāt . abhiṣiṣeṇayiṣati . avarṇārtham ṣaṇi pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8431_4: ca . avaṇārtham tavat . abhitaṣṭhau . ṣaṇi pratiṣedhārtham . abhiṣiṣikṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_0: 473-474 upasargāt ṣatve nisaḥ upasaṅkhyānam aniṇantatvāt . upasargāt ṣatve nisaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . niḥṣuṇoti niḥṣiñcati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_2: aniṇantatvāt . iṇantāt upasargāt ṣatvam ucyate na ca nis* iṇantaḥ . na vā varṇāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_3: ṣatvasya tadviśeṣakaḥ upasargaḥ dhātuḥ ca . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . varṇāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_4: ṣatvasya . varṇāśrayam ṣatvam . tadviśeṣakaḥ upasargaḥ dhātuḥ ca . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_5: iṇantāt upasargāt iti . katham tarhi . iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya saḥ cet iṇ upasargasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_6: saḥ cet sakāraḥ sunotyādīnām iti . tatra śarvyavāye iti eva siddham . yadi evam dhātūpasargayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_7: abhisambandhaḥ akṛtaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha api prāpnoti . vigatāḥ secakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_8: asmāt grāmāt visecakaḥ grāmaḥ . dhātūpasargayoḥ ca abhisambandhaḥ kṛtaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_9: . sunotyādibhiḥ atra upasargam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ sunotyādīnām yaḥ upasargaḥ tasya yaḥ iṇ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8435_0: 474 sunotyādīnām ṣatve ṇyantasya upasaṅkhyānam adhikatvāt . sunotyādīnām ṣatve ṇyantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8435_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . abhiṣāvayati . kim kāraṇam . adhikatvāt . vyatiriktaḥ sunotyādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8435_2: iti kṛtvā upasargāt sunotyādīnām iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . na vā avayavasya ananyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8435_3: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . avayavasya ananyatvāt . avayavaḥ atra ananyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8437_0: 474-475 nāmadhātoḥ tu pratiṣedhaḥ . nāmadhātoḥ tu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sāvakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8437_1: icchati abhisāvakīyati parisāvakīyati . na vā anupasargatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8437_2: kim kāraṇam . anupasargatvāt . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8437_3: na ca atra sunotim prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi sāvakīyatim prati . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:8438_0: abhiṣāvayati . atra api na sunotim prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi sāvayatim prati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8438_1: sunotim prati atra kriyāyogaḥ . katham . na asau evam preṣyate sunu abhi iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8438_2: tarhi . upasargaviśiṣṭām asau kriyām preṣyate abhiṣuṇu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8440_0: 475 aprateḥ iti vartate utāho nivṛttam . nivṛttam iti āha . katham jñāyate . yogavibhāgakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8440_1: . itarathā hi sadistambhyoḥ aprateḥ iti eva brūyāt . asti anyat yogavibhāgakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8440_2: prayojanam . kim . avāccālambanāvidūrvayoḥ iti vakṣyati tat stambheḥ eva yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8440_3: sadeḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ekayoge api sati yasya ālambanāvidūrye
GS24pmbhasuu:8440_4: staḥ tasya bhaviṣyati . kasya ca ālambanāvidūrye staḥ . stambheḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8442_0: 475 atha yaḥ prāṇī aprāṇī ca katham tatra bhavitavyam . anuṣyandete matsyodake iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8442_1: . āhosvit anusyandete matsyodake iti . yadi tāvat aprāṇī vidhinā āśrīyate asti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8442_2: aprāṇī iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam ṣatvena . atha prāṇī pratiṣedhena āśrīyate asti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8442_3: prāṇī iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam pratiṣeedhena . kim punaḥ atra arthasatattvam . devāḥ jñātum arhanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8444: 476 aniṣṭhāyām iti vartate utāho nivṛttam . nivṛttam iti āha . katham jñāyate . yogavibhāgakaraṇasāmarthyāt . itarathā hi viparibhyām ca skandeḥ aniṣṭhāyām iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8446: 476 iṇgrahaṇam kimartham . iṇgrahaṇam ḍhatve kavarganivṛttyartham . iṇghrahaṇam kriyate kavargāt ḍhatvam mā bhūt iti . pakṣīdhvam yakṣīdhvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8449: iṇaḥ uttareṣām ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭām yaḥ dhakāraḥ iti . āhosvit dhakāraviśeṣaṇam :
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_0: iṇaḥ uttarasya dhakārasya saḥ cet ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭām dhakāraḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_1: . tatra pratyayaparatve iṭaḥ liṭi ḍhatvam parāditvāt . tatra pratyayaparatve iṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_2: liṭi ḍhatvam na prāpnoti . luluviḍhve luluvidhve iti . kim kāraṇam . parāditvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_3: iṭ parādiḥ . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . alaviḍhvam alavidhvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_4: . astu tarhi dhakāraviśeṣaṇam . dhakāraparatve ṣīdhvami ananantaratvāt iṭaḥ vibhāṣābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_5: . dhakāraparatve ṣīdhvami ananantaratvāt iṭaḥ vibhāṣā na prāpnoti . laviṣīḍhvam laviṣīdhvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_6: iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . luluviḍhve luluvidhve iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8450_7: . iṇgrahaṇasya ca aviśeṣaṇatvāt ṣyādimātre ḍhatvaprasaṅgaḥ . iṇgrahaṇasya ca aviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8452: yakṣīdhvam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgāt iti vakṣyāmi . aṅgagrahaṇāt ca doṣaḥ . iha na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_0: upadidīyiḍhve . yaḥ hi atra aṅgāntyaḥ iṇ na tasmāt uttaraḥ iṭ yasmāt ca uttaraḥ iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_1: na asau aṅgāntyaḥ iṇ iti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat pratyayaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_2: . nanu ca uktam tatra pratyayaparatve iṭaḥ liṭi ḍhatvam parāditvāt luluviḍhve luluvidhve
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_3: iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam asti vacane prayojanam . kim . alaviḍhvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_4: alavidhvam iti . yat etasmin yoge liḍgrahaṇam tadanavakāśam tasya anavakāśatvāt vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_5: bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu dhakāraviśeṣaṇam iti . nanu ca uktam dhakāraparatve
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_6: ṣīdhvami ananantaratvāt iṭaḥ vibhāṣābhāvaḥ laviṣīḍhvam laviṣīdhvam iti . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_7: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam asti vacane prayojanam . kim . luluviḍhve luluvidhve iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_8: . yat etasmin yoge ṣīdhvaṅgrahaṇam tat anavakāśam tasya anavakāśatvāt vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_9: . yat api ucyate iṇgrahaṇasya ca aviśeṣaṇatvāt ṣyādimātre ḍhatvaprasaṅgaḥ iti aṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_10: iti vakṣyāmi . nanu ca uktam aṅgagrahaṇāt ca doṣaḥ iti . pūrvasmin yoge yat aṅgagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8454_11: tat uttaratra nivṛttam . atha vā pūrvasmin yoge iṇgrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam uttaratra dhakāraviśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8456_0: 478-479 agneḥ dīrghāt somasya . agneḥ dīrghāt somasya iti vaktavyam . agnīṣomau .
GS24pmbhasuu:8456_1: itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi aniṣṭam prasajyeta . agnisomau māṇavakau
GS24pmbhasuu:8456_2: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye sampratiprattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8456_3: . tat yathā . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8456_4: tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve bhavataḥ . gauḥ tiṣṭhati . gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8456_5: evam bhavati . yat hi śabdāśrayam śabdamātre tat bhavati . śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyātve .
GS24pmbhasuu:8458_0: 480 sāntābhyām ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . mātuḥṣvasā mātuḥsvasā . pituḥṣvasā
GS24pmbhasuu:8458_1: pituḥsvaseti . mātuḥ pituḥ iti sāntagrahaṇānarthakyam ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8458_2: . mātuḥ pituḥ iti sāntagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8458_3: . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti sāntasya api bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8460: 480-481 astigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . anusṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8461_0: visṛtam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . yadkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:8461_1: bhavataḥ na ca etam sakāram prati kriyāyogaḥ . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti abhiṣanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8461_2: viṣanti iti na hi astiḥ kriyāvacanaḥ . kaḥ punaḥ āha na astiḥ kriyāvacanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8461_3: kriyāvacanaḥ astiḥ . ātaḥ ca kriyāvacanaḥ vyatyanuṣate kartarikarmavyatihāre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8461_4: anena ātmanepadam bhavati . karmavyatihāraḥ ca kaḥ . kriyāvyatihāraḥ . prāduḥśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8461_5: tarhi mā bhūt . prāduḥśabdaḥ ca niyataviṣayaḥ kṛbhvastiyoge eva vartate . upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8461_6: tarhi syateḥ mā bhūt iti . iṣyate upasargāt syateḥ ṣatvam . ātaś ca iṣyate . evam hi āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:8462_1: tarhi syateḥ mā bhūt iti . prāduḥśabdaḥ ca niyataviṣayaḥ kṛbhvastiyoge eva vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8462_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:8463: anusūteḥ apratyayaḥ anusūḥ anusvaḥ apatyam ānuseyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8465_0: 481-483 kimartham svapeḥ supibhūtasya grahaṇam kriyate . supeḥ ṣatvam svapeḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:8465_1: . supeḥ ṣatvam ucyate tat svapeḥ mā bhūt iti . susvapnaḥ visvapnak iti . visuṣvāpa
GS24pmbhasuu:8465_2: iti kena na . visuṣvāpa iti atra kasmāt na bhavati . halādiśeṣāt na supiḥ . halādiśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:8465_3: kṛte na eṣaḥ supiḥ bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam . halādiśeṣaḥ kriyatām samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8465_4: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt halādiśeṣaḥ . iṣṭam pūrvam prasāraṇam . iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8465_5: halādiśeṣāt pūrvam samprasāraṇam . ātaḥ ca iṣyate . evam hi āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_0: abhyāsasamprasāraṇam halādiśeṣāt vipratiṣedhena iti . evam tarhi sthādiṣu abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_1: iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . sthādīnām niyamaḥ na atra prāk sitāt uttaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_2: supiḥ . prāk sitasaṃśabdanāt saḥ niyamaḥ uttaraḥ ca supiḥ paṭhyate . evam tarhi arthavadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_3: na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . anarthake viṣuṣupuḥ . yadi arthavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_4: grahaṇam viṣuṣupuḥ iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . supibhūtaḥ dviḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_5: . supibhutasya dvirvacanam . supeḥ ṣatvam svapeḥ mā bhūt . visuṣvāpa iti kena na
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_6: . halādiśeṣāt na supiḥ . iṣṭam pūrvam prasāraṇam . sthādīnām niyamaḥ na atra prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_7: sitāt uttaraḥ supiḥ . anarthake viṣuṣupuḥ supibhūtaḥ dviḥ ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8468_0: 483-484 kapiṣṭhalaḥ gotraprakṛtau . kapiṣṭhalaḥ gotraprakṛtau iti vaktavyam . gotre
GS24pmbhasuu:8468_1: iti ucyamāne iha eva syāt . kāpiṣṭhaliḥ . iha na syāt . kapiṣṭhalaḥ kāpiṣṭhalāyanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8468_2: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate kapiṣṭhalaḥ iti gotre nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8468_3: iti . katham tarhi . gotre yaḥ kapiṣṭhalaśabdaḥ tasya ṣatvam nipātyate yatra vā tatra vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8470: 484 sthaḥ iti kim idam dhātugrahaṇam āhosvit rūpagrahaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi dhātugrahaṇam gosthānam iti atra prāpnoti . atha rūpagrahaṇam savyeṣṭhāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8472_0: savyeṣṭhā sārathiḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8472_1: . katham gosthānam iti . savanādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu rūpagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8474: savyeṣṭhā sārathiḥ iti . sthaḥ sthāsthinsthṝṇām iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8478: 485 hrasvāt tādau tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ . hrasvāt tādau tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhindyustarām chindyustarām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8480_0: 485 stutastomayoḥ chandasi anarthakam vacanam pūrvapadāt iti siddhatvāt . stutastomayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8480_1: chandasi vacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadāt iti siddhatvāt . pūrvapadāt iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_0: 485-486 sanoteḥ anaḥ iti ca . kim . vacanam anarthakam iti eva . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_1: iti siddhatvāt . niyamārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . sanoteḥ anakārasya eva yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_2: syāt . iha mā bhūt . gosanim iti . sanoteḥ anaḥ iti niyamārtham iti cet savanādikṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_3: siddham . sanoteḥ anaḥ iti niyamārtham iti cet savanādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . sanartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_4: tu . sanartham tu idam vaktavyam . sisaniṣati . etat api na asti prayojanam . stautiṇyorevaṣaṇyabhyāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_5: iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . ṇyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam . sisānayiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_6: . katham punaḥ aṇyantasya pratiṣedhe ṇyantaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . sāmarthyāt . aṇyantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_7: pratiṣedhavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā ṇyante vijñāsyate . atha vā ayam asti aṇyantaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8485_0: 486 kimartham savādiṣu aśvasaniśabdaḥ paṭhyate . pūrvapadāt iti ṣatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8485_1: tadbādhanārtham . na etat asti prayojanam . iṇantāt iti tatra anuvartate aniṇantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8485_2: ca ayam . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat savanādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8485_3: aśvasaniśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ aniṇantāt api ṣatvam bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8485_4: etasya jñāpane prayojanam . jalāṣāham māṣaḥ iti etat siddham bhavati . atha vā ekadeśavikṛtārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8487_0: 486-487 upasargāt iti yā prāptiḥ bhavitavyam tasyāḥ pratiṣedhena utāho na . na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8487_1: . kim kāraṇam . upasargāt ṣatvam pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate tat yathā eva padādilakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8487_2: pratiṣedham bādhate evam sicaḥ yaṅi iti etam api bādhate . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8487_3: . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte padādilakṣaṇe pratiṣedhe upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8487_4: ṣatvam ārabhyate sicaḥ yaṅi iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8487_5: apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam upasargāt ṣatvam padādilakṣaṇam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:8487_6: bādhiṣyate sicaḥ yaṅi iti etam na bādhiṣyate . tasmāt abhisesicyate iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8489: 487 kimartham sahiḥ soḍhabhūtaḥ gṛhyate . yatra asya etat rūpam tatra yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . pariṣahate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8491_0: 487 stambhusivusahām caṅi upasargāt . stambhusivusahām caṅi upasargāt iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8491_1: . kim prayojanam . upasargāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . abhyāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8491_2: yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti . paryasīṣahat .
GS24pmbhasuu:8493_0: 487 sani kim udāharaṇam . susūṣati . na etat asti prayojanam . stautiṇyoḥ eva ṣaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:8493_1: iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . abhisusūṣati . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8493_2: prayojanam . sthādiṣvabhyāsenacābhyāsasya iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:8496: 487 sadaḥ liṭi pratiṣedhe svañjeḥ upasaṅkhyanam . sadaḥ liṭi pratiṣedhe svañjeḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pariṣasvaje .
GS24pmbhasuu:8498: 488-490 raṣābhyām ṇatve ṛkāragrahaṇam . raṣābhyām ṇatve ṛkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade ṛkārāt ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt : mātṝṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_0: pitṝṇām iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tadāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_1: ṇatvam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_2: gṛhyante . ekadeśe nuḍādiṣu ca uktam . kim uktam . agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_3: ṛkāragrahaṇam iti . tasmāt gṛhyante . evam api na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ananantaratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_4: . yat tat rephāt param bhakteḥ tena vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . aḍvyavāye iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_5: bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . varṇaikadeśāḥ ke varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_6: . ye vyapavṛktāḥ api varṇāḥ bhavanti . yat ca atra rephāt param bhakteḥ na tat kva
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_7: cit api vyapavṛktam dṛśyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_8: samānapade . tataḥ vyavāye . vyavāye ca raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ aṭkupvāṅnumbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_9: iti . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . etaiḥ eva akṣarasamāmnāyikaiḥ vyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_10: na anyaiḥ iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ṛkārāt ṇatvam iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_11: kṣubhnādiṣu nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati . na etat asti jñāpakam . vṛddhyartham etat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_12: . nārnamaniḥ iti . yat tarhi tatra eva tṛpnotiśabdam paṭhati . yat ca api nṛnamanaśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_13: paṭhati . nanu ca uktam vṛddhyartham etat syāt iti . bahiraṅgā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_14: ṇatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8499_15: . ṛtaḥ naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati . tataḥ chandasi avagrahāt ṛtaḥ iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8501_0: 490-491 aḍvyavāye ṇatve anyavyavāye pratiṣedhaḥ . aḍvyavāye ṇatve anyavyavāye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8501_1: vaktavyaḥ . ādarśena akṣadarśena . na vā anyena vyapetatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8501_2: kāraṇam . anyena vyapetatvāt . anyena atra vyavāyaḥ . yadi api atra anyena vyavāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8501_3: aṭā api tu vyavāyaḥ asti tatra asti aḍvyavāye iti prāpnoti . aṭā eva vyavāye bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8501_4: . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . aḍgrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8501_5: . yadi hi yatra aṭā ca anyena ca vyavāyaḥ tatra syāt aḍgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8501_6: vyavāye naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti eva brūyāt . asti anyat aḍgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8501_7: . yaḥ anirdiṣṭaiḥ eva vyavāyaḥ tatra mā bhūt . kṛtsnam mṛtsnā iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8501_8: syāt śarvyavāye na iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8503_0: 491 tatsamudāye ṇatvāprasiddhiḥ yathā anyatra . tatsamudāye vyavāyasamudāye ṇatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8503_1: aprasiddhiḥ . arkeṇa argheṇa . yathā anyatra api vyavāyasamudāye kāryam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8503_2: . kva anyatra . numvisarjanīyaśarvyavāye'pi niṃsse niṃssva iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8503_3: anyatra api vyavāyasamudāye kāryam na bhavati . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:8503_4: iti . tat yathā . guṇavṛddhisañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8503_5: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8503_6: ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . yadi evam ekena vyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:8503_7: na prāpnoti . kiriṇā ririṇā iti . ubhayathā api vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8503_8: . gargaiḥ saha na bhoktavyam iti pratyekam ca na sambhujyate samuditaiḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_0: 491-492 kuvyavāye hādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ . kuvyavāye hādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vakavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_1: . kim prayojanam . prayojanam vṛtraghnaḥ srughnaḥ prāghāni iti . hanteratpūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_2: iti atpūrvagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . numvyavāye ṇatve anusvārābhāve pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_3: . numvyavāye ṇatve anusvārābhāve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prenvanam prenvanīyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_4: anāgame ca ṇatvam . anāgame ca ṇatvam vaktavyam . tṛmpaṇīyam . anusvāravyavāyavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_5: tu siddham . anusvāravyavāye naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . tadanusvāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_6: kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . nakāre anusvāraḥ parasavarṇībhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_7: nirdiśyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . prenvanam prenvanīyam . anusvāraviśeṣaṇam numgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_8: . numaḥ yaḥ anusvāraḥ iti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . tṛmpaṇam tṛmpaṇīyam . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_9: tarhi ayogavāhānām aviśeṣeṇa upadeśaḥ coditaḥ tatra anusvāre kṛte aḍvyavāye iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_10: siddham . yadi evam na arthaḥ numgrahaṇena . anusvāre kṛte aḍvyavāye iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8507_0: 493 pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām uttarapadagrahaṇam . pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām uttarapadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8507_2: pūrvapadasthasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt . khārapāyaṇaḥ karaṇapriyaḥ .. tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8507_3: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti sambandhiśabdau etau . sati
GS24pmbhasuu:8507_4: pūrvapade uttarapadam bhavati sati ca uttarapade pūrvapadam bhavati . tatra sambandhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8507_5: etat gantavyam yat prati pūrvapadam iti etat bhavati tatsthasya niyamaḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8507_6: ca prati etat bhavati . uttarapadam prati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_0: 493-494 sañjñāyām niyamavacane gapratiṣedhāt niyamapratiṣedhaḥ . sañjñāyām niyamavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_1: gapratiṣedhāt niyamasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyate agaḥ iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_2: nityam ṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra pūrveṇa sañjñāyām ca asañjñāyām ca nityam ṇatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_3: . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām . tataḥ agaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_4: . gāntāt pūrvapadāt yā ca yāvatī ṇatvaprāptiḥ tasyāḥ sarvasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_5: vā yathā sarvanāmasañjñāyām . na vā arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . ṇatvam kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_6: . yathā sarvanāmasañjñāyām . uktam ca sarvanāmasañjñāyām sarvanāmasañjñāyām nipātanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_7: ṇatvābhāvaḥ iti . yathā punaḥ tatra nipātanam kriyate sarvādīni sarvanāmāni iti iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_8: idānīm kim nipātanam . iha api nipātanam asti . kim . aṇṛgayanādibhyaḥ iti . na eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_9: vā punaḥ atra pūrveṇa ṇatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . samānapade iti ucyate na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_10: etat samānapadam . samāse kṛte samānapadam . samānam eva yat nityam na ca etat nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_11: samānapadam eva . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . samānagrahaṇasāmarthyāt.
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_12: yadi hi yat samānam ca asamānam ca tatra syāt samanagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8511: 494 dvyakṣaratryakṣarebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadāruvanam . irikādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . irikāvanam timiravanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8513_0: 494-495 adantāt adantasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dīrghāhnī śarat iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8513_1: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na eṣā ahanśabdāt ṣaṣṭhī . kā tarhi . ahnaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8513_2: prathamā pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ ca . atha vā yuvādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8515: 495 āhitopasthitayoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . ikṣuvāhaṇam śaravāhaṇam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:8516: vāhanam vāhyāt iti vaktavyam . yadā hi gargāṇām vāhanam apaviddham tiṣṭhati tadā mā bhūt . gargavāhanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8518: 495 vāprakaraṇe girinadyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . vāprakaraṇe girinadyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . giriṇadī girinadī . cakraṇitambā cakranitambā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_1: ṇatve samāsāntagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . asamāsāntapratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_2: asamāsāntasya mā bhūt . gargabhaginī dakṣabhaginī iti . na vā bhavati gargabhagiṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_3: iti . bhavati yadā etat vākyam gargāṇām bhagaḥ gargabhagaḥ gargabhagaḥ asyāḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_4: iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati gargāṇām bhaginī gargabhaginī iti tadā na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_5: . tadā mā bhūt iti . yadi samāsāntagrahaṇam kriyate māṣavāpiṇī vṛīhivāpiṇī atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_6: prāpnoti . liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇe ca uktam . kim uktam . gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8522: 496 tatra yuvādipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra yuvādīnām pratiṣedaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āryayūnā kṣatriyayūnā prapakvāni paripakvāni dīrghāhnī śarat iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8524_0: 496-497 atha iha katham bhavitavyam . māṣakumbhavāpeṇa vrīhikumbhavāpeṇa iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8524_1: nityam ṇatvena bhavitavyam āhosvit vibhāṣayā . yadā tāvat etat vākyam bhavati kumbhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8524_2: vāpaḥ kumbhavāpaḥ māṣāṇām kumbhavāpaḥ māṣakumbhavāpa iti tadā nityam ṇatvena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8524_3: . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati māṣāṇām kumbhaḥ māṣakumbhaḥ māṣakumbhasya vāpaḥ māṣakumbhavāpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_0: 497-498 asamāsagrahaṇam kimartham . samāse iti vartate asamāse api yathā syāt . praṇamati
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_1: pariṇamati . kva punaḥ samāsagrahaṇam prakṛtam . pūrvapadātsañjñāyāmagaḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_2: punaḥ tena samāsagrahaṇam śakyam vijñātum . pūrvapadagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . samāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_3: etat bhavati pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti . atha apigrahaṇam kimartham . samāse api
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_4: yathā syāt . praṇāmakaḥ pariṇāmakaḥ . yadi tarhi samāse ca asamāse ca iṣyate na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_5: asamāsepigrahaṇena . nivṛttam pūrvapadāt iti . aviśeṣeṇa upasargāt ṇatvam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_6: . samāse niyamāt na prāpnoti . asiddham upasargāt ṇatvam tasya asiddhatvāt niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_7: na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat asamāse apigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_8: ācāryaḥ na yoge yogaḥ asiddhaḥ . kim tarhi prakaraṇe prakaraṇam asiddham iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_9: etasya jñapane prayojanam . yat tat uktam niṣkṛtam niṣpītam iti atra satvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8526_10: ṣatvam na prāpnoti iti saḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_0: 498 ṇopadeśam prati upasargābhāvāt anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . yatkriyāyuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_1: tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ na ca ṇopadeśam prati kriyāyogaḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_2: āha ayam upasargāt asamāse api ṇopadeśasya iti na ca ṇopadeśam prati upasargaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_3: tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet padalope pratiṣedhaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_4: iti cet padalope pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pragatāḥ nāyakāḥ asmāt grāmāt pranāyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_5: grāmaḥ iti . siddham tu yam prati upasargaḥ tatsthasya iti vacanāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_6: . katham . yam prati upasargaḥ tatsthasya ṇaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_7: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ṇopadeśam prati upasargābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_8: anirdeśaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ṇopadeśaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate ṇaḥ upadeśaḥ ṇopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8528_9: ṇopadeśasya iti . katham tarhi . ṇaḥ upadeśaḥ asya saḥ ayam ṇopadeśaḥ ṇopadeśasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_0: 499 hinumīnāgrahaṇe vikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam . hinumīnāgrahaṇe vikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_1: kartavyam . prahiṇoti pramīṇīte . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_2: . prahiṇutaḥ pramīṇāti . siddham acaḥ sthānivattvāt . siddham etat . katham . acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_3: sthānivattvāt . sthānivadbhāvāt atra ṇatvam bhaviṣyati . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_4: pūrvatrāseddhe na sthānivat iti . doṣāḥ eva ete tasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ tasya doṣaḥ saṃyogādilopalatvaṇatveṣu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8532_0: 499 loṭ iti kimartham . prahimāni kulāni . pravapāni māṃsāni . āni loḍgrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8532_1: arthavadgrahaṇāt . āni loḍgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . arthavadgrahaṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8532_2: arthavataḥ āniśabdasya grahaṇam na eṣaḥ arthavān . anupasargāt vā . atha vā yatkriyāyuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8532_3: tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ na ca etam āniśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8532_4: api tarhi na prāpnoti . prayāṇi pariyāṇi iti . atra api na āniśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8532_5: . āniśabdam prati atra kriyāyogaḥ . katham . yatkriyayuktāḥ iti na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8532_6: yasya kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8532_7: tarhi . yā kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8534_0: 500 neḥ gadādiṣu aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam . neḥ gadādiṣu aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8534_1: . praṇyagadat pariṇyagadat . āṅā ca iti vaktavyam . praṇyāgadat . nanu ca ayam aṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:8534_2: gadādibhaktaḥ gadādigrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . na sidhyati . aṅgasya aṭ ucyate vikaraṇāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:8534_3: ca aṅgam saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ gadādigrahaṇena grahītum . evam tarhi aḍvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:8534_4: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . aṭkupvāṅnumvyavāye api iti . tat vai kāryiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8534_5: nimittaviśeṣaṇena ca iha arthaḥ . tatra api nimittaviśeṣaṇam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8536_0: 500-501 antagrahaṇam kimartham . aniteḥ antagrahaṇam sambuddhyartham . aniteḥ antagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8536_1: kriyate sambuddhyartham . he prāṇ . apraraḥ āha . aniteḥ antaḥ padāntasya . aniteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8536_2: antagrahaṇam kriyate padāntasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti tadbādhanārtham . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8536_3: vā tasmāt anantaraḥ . atha vā ayam antaśabdaḥ asti eva avayavavācī . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:8537_0: vastrāntaḥ vasanāntaḥ iti . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā . udakāntam gataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8537_1: udakasamīpam gataḥ iti gamyate . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya grahaṇam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8537_2: . aniteḥ samīpe yaḥ rephaḥ tasmāt nasya yathā syāt . prāṇiti . iha mā bhūt . paryaniti .

GS24pmbhasuu:8543_0: 502 katham idam vijñayate . okārāt paraḥ otparaḥ na otparaḥ anotparaḥ iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_1: okāraḥ paraḥ asmāt saḥ ayam otparaḥ na otparaḥ anotparaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_2: vijñayate okārāt paraḥ otparaḥ na otparaḥ anotparaḥ iti pra naḥ muñcatam atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_3: prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate okāraḥ paraḥ asmāt saḥ ayam otparaḥ na otparaḥ anotparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8543_4: iti pra ṇaḥ vaniḥ devakṛtā atra na prāpnoti . ubhayathā ca prakrame doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8544: pra naḥ muñcatam . pra* u naḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8545: pra u naḥ . bhāvini api oti na iṣyate . bhāvini api okāre ṇatvam na iṣyate . evam tarhi upasargāt bahulam iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8547: 503 kṛtsthasya ṇatve nirviṇṇasya upasaṅkhyānam . kṛtsthasya ṇatve nirviṇṇasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nirviṇṇaḥ aham anena vāsena .

GS24pmbhasuu:8549_1: kartavyam . prāpyamāṇam prāpyamānam . tadvidhānāt siddham . vihitaviśeṣaṇam ṇigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8549_2: . ṇyantāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . aḍadhikārāt vā . atha vā aḍvyavāye iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_0: 503-504 kimartham idam ucyate na kṛtyacaḥ iti eva siddham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_1: . ijādeḥ eva ca sanumkāt na anyasmāt sanumkāt iti . kva mā bhūt . pramaṅkanam parimaṅkanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_2: . sanumaḥ ṇatve avadhāraṇāprasiddhiḥ vidheyabhāvāt . sanumaḥ ṇatve avadhāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_3: aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . vidheyabhāvāt . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_4: na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . ṇyantāt vibhāṣā prāptā tatra nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_5: ṇatvam vidheyam . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_6: na niyamaḥ . siddham tu pratiṣedhādhikāre sanumgrahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_7: pratiṣedhādhikāre sanumgrahaṇāt . pratiṣedhādhikāre sanumgrahaṇam kartavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_8: bhābhūpūkamigamipyāyivepisanumām iti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . preṅgaṇam preṅgaṇīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_9: . kṛtsthasya ca ṇatve ijādeḥ sanumaḥ grahaṇam . kṛtsthasya ca ṇatve ijādeḥ sanumaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_10: grahaṇam kartavyam . sidhyati sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_11: ca uktam sanumaḥ ṇatve avadhāraṇāprasiddhiḥ vidheyabhāvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_12: iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . halaścejupadhāt iti . tat vai tatra ādiviśeṣaṇam antaviśeṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_13: ca iha arthaḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate tatra ādiviśeṣaṇam iti . ijupadhāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_14: atra na arthaḥ antaviśeṣaṇena . tatra ādiviśeṣaṇam sat iha antaviśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_15: . katham . ijādeḥ iti ucyate tatra na arthaḥ ādiviśeṣaṇena . atha vā ijādeḥ sanumaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8551_16: iti atra ṇervibhāṣā iti etat anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8553_0: 505 bhādiṣu pūñgrahaṇam . bhādiṣu pūñgrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . prapavaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8553_1: somasya iti . ṇyantasya ca upasaṅkhyanam . ṇyantasya ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:8557_0: 505 naśeḥ aśaḥ . naśeḥ aśaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . pranaṅkṣyati parinaṅkṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:8585: 509 chatvam ami tacchlokena tacchmaśruṇā iti prayojanam . chatvam ami iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . tacchlokena . tacchmaśruṇā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8587_0: 509 savarṇagrahaṇam kimartham . jharaḥ jhari savarṇagrahaṇam samasaṅkhyapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8587_1: . jharaḥ jhari savarṇagrahaṇam kriyate samasaṅkhyapratiṣedhārtham . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8587_2: mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . iha na syāt . śiṇḍhi piṇḍhi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8589_0: 509-512 kimartham idam ucyate . akāraḥ ayam akṣarasamāmnāye vivṛtaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8589_1: saṃvṛtatāpratyāpattiḥ kriyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vivṛtaḥ upadiśyate . ādeśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8589_2: savarṇārtham akāraḥ vivṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ . ākārasya tathā hrasvaḥ tadartham pāṇineḥ a a
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_0: devadattā3 . āntaryataḥ vivṛtasya vivṛtau dīrghaplutau yathā syātām . savarṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_1: ca . akāraḥ savarṇagrahaṇena ākāram api yathā gṛhṇīyāt . ākārasya tathā hrasvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8591_0: atimālaḥ iti atra ākārasya hrasvaḥ ucyamānaḥ vivṛtaḥ prāpnoti saḥ saṃvṛtaḥ syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8591_1: evamarthā prayāpattiḥ . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . akārasya pratyāpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:8591_2: dīrghapratiṣedhaḥ . akārasya pratyāpattau dīrghasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . khaṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8591_3: mālā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva prakṛtitaḥ savarṇagrahaṇam evam ādeśataḥ api bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8591_4: tatra āntaryataḥ hrasvasya hrasvaḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . ādeśasya ca anaṇtvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8591_5: na savarṇagrahaṇam . ādeśasya ca anaṇtvāt savarṇānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti . keṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:8591_6: . udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikānām . siddham tu taparanirdeśāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8591_7: . taparanirdeśāt . taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . at a* iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:8592: akārasya pratyāpattau dīrghapratiṣedhaḥ . akārasya pratyāpattau dīrghasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :

GS24pmbhasuu:8593_1: prayojanam . vṛkṣābhyām plakṣābhyām . atra api dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati
